column2: Gaihcij dwg Cangqdiq cauh gwnzmbwn caeuq lajdeih okdaeuj he.
Ngamqngamq cauh mwhde, gijmaz gijmaz cungj mij baenz maz yiengh—hoengq vatvat, laep saengxsaengx, laeg lumxlumx, luj raemx laeg mij'z daej nwih. Gij Hoenzsaenz Cangqdiq youq gwnz raemx mbin yubyub.
Gajlaeng Cangqdiq naeuz: “Rongh!” Yiengq couh doq miz rongh lo.
De raen gij rongh he baenz; couh dawz gij rongh caeuq gij laep doxfaen okdaeuj.
De couh an gij rongh heuh guh ‘doengxngoenz,’ gij laep an guh ‘doengxngwnz.’ Yiengq doengxngoenz caeuq doengxngwnz, couh dwg ngoenz he lo.
Gajlaeng Cangqdiq caiq naeuz: “Caengz gvangq yubyub he mbe okdaeuj! Cab haeuj gij raemx he bae, dawz gij raemx doxgek hwnjdaeuj!”

Yiengq de doq gangj couh doq baenz lo. De cauh ok caengz gvangq yubyub mwnq le, couh dawz gij raemx gek baenz song caengz hwj, caengz he youq baixgwnz, caengz he youq baixlaj, couh yienghneix cauh baenz lo.
De couh heuh caengz cungqgyan mwnq guh ‘mbwn.’ Yiengq doengxhaet goq, doengxhaemh daeuj, couh dwg ngoenz daixngeih lo.
Cangqdiq caiq naeuz: “Gij raemx laj mbwn gyonj youq mwnq he hwj! Hawj gij doem loh okdaeuj!” Yiengq de doq gangj couh doq baenz lo.
De an mwnq doem hawq mwnq heuh guh ‘deih,’ an mwnq raemx doxgyonj mwnq heuh guh ‘haij.’ De raen yienghneix caemh baenz.
Cangqdiq caiq naeuz: “Doem, hwnj doeng go sae go! Hwnj go dawz ceh hah, go mak miz ceh hah! Hwnj gak go gak yiengh.” Yiengq de doq gangj couh doq baenz lo.
Gij doem couh yienghneix miz doeng go sae go heu swdswd he did hwnjdaeuj: go haeux hah, go byaek hah, go mak hah, gak go gak yiengh. De raen yienghneix caemh baenz.
Yiengq doengxhaet goq, doengxhaemh daeuj, couh dwg ngoenz daixsam lo.
Cangqdiq caiq naeuz: “Doengh aen rongh sagsag!”
Couh yienghneix, de cauh song aen rongh sagsag hung he,
Cangqdiq dawz doengh aen rongh neix baij coengq youq gwnzmbwn, hawj doengh aen de ciuq roengz lajdoem ma, ciuq goqdoh,
hawj doengh aen de dingh ok doengxngoenz doengxngwnz, faen ok gij rongh caeuq gij laep. De raen yienghneix caemh baenz.
Yiengq doengxhaet goq, doengxhaemh daeuj, couh dwg ngoenz daixseiq lo.
Cangqdiq caiq naeuz: “Youq ndaw raemx ij miz doeng duz sae duz lix! Ij baenx gyoengq baenx gyoengq hwj!”

Couh yienghneix, de couh cauh doengh duz hunghung loetloet he youq ndaw haij caeuq gak cungj doengh duz youq ndaw raemx he, caiq cauh doengh duz miz fwed ndaej mbin he, gak duz gak yiengh. De raen yienghneix caemh baenz.

Cangqdiq youhcaiq hoh fuk hawj doengh duz neix naeuz: “Doengh duz youq ndaw raemx he, gou hawj faenhsou ndaej fat lwg lailai hwj, fat hwj ndaw haij rim bae. Doengh duz roeg mbin youq cungqgyan mbwn he, gou caemh hawj faenhsou ndaej fat lwg lai hwj.”
Yiengq doengxhaet goq, doengxhaemh daeuj, couh dwg ngoenz daixhaj lo.
Cangqdiq caiq naeuz: “Doeng duz sae duz lajdeih! Duz loegcuk! Duz daek duz nengz! Duz nyaen duz yex!” Yiengq de doq gangj couh doq miz lo.
Cangqdiq couh yienghneix cauh ok sojmiz dih doenghduz, gak duz gak yiengh. De raen yienghneix caemh baenz.

Cangqdiq youhcaiq naeuz: “Daegraeuz ij cauh vunz, cauh gyoengqde luj raeuz, sawjhawj gyoengqde guenj gij bya ndaw haij hah, gij roeg gwnz mbwn hah, gij loegcuk hah, doenghgij duz nyaen duz yex hah, caeuq doenghgij duz daek duz nengz hah, sojmiz hih doenghduz cungj guenj liux bae.”
Yienghneix Cangqdiq couh cauh vunz lo. De cauh luj bonjfaenh de, cauh baenz vunzsai caeuq vunzbaz.

Cauh le, Cangqdiq couh hoh fuk hawj song boux de, doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou ij fat doengh daih gajlaeng lailai hwj, hwngqhwngq seiqseiq, lajmbwn dauqcawq cungj miz bae. Faenhsou caemh ij guenj baenx cenz lajmbwn: guenj gij bya ndaw haij, gij roeg gwnz mbwn, caeuq gij doenghduz youq lajdeih youq he.”
De vanzlij naeuz: “Neq! Lajmbwn doengh go miz ceh caeuq doengh go dawz mak he hah, gou cungj nyok hawj faenhsou aeu ma gw.

Doengh go heu swdswd he hah, gou couh nyok hawj doenghduz aeu ma gw. Duz nyaen duz yex hah, duz daek duz nengz hah, duz roeg gwnz mbwn hah, fanjcingq dwg duz diemjcaw he, couh ndaej gw doengh go de lo.” Yiengq de couh yienghneix dingh ndei lo.
Guh ndaej le, Cangqdiq yawjyawj, raen sojmiz de cauh okdaeuj hih cungj baenz raixcaix. Yiengq doengxhaet goq, doengxhaemh daeuj, couh dwg ngoenz daixroek lo.
Couh yienghneix, mbwnmbwn deihdeih sojmiz hih cungj cauh liux lo.
Cangqdiq cauh sojmiz hih liux le, daengz ngoenz daixcaet, couh gijmaz cungj mbouj cauh lo.
De caemh dawz ngoenz neix gek okdaeuj, guh ngoenz dwzbez he, soengq fuk hawj ngoenz neix, aenvih de youq ngoenz neix dingz roengzma, gijmaz cungj mbouj cauh lo.
Couh yienghneix, Cangqdiq cauh liux mbwnmbwn deihdeih sojmiz hih lo.
Yehhozvaz
lajdeih faexfaex nywjnywj, ndaw reih byaekbyaek haeuxhaeux, cungj mij miz saek go, aenvih de mijyaengz hawj miz fwn doek, caemh mij vunz geng hah ndaem hah;
hoeng, daj lajdoem miz fwi hwnj daeuj, hawj gij doem ndaej ywnh ndaej cumx.
Gajlaeng Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq aeu doem ma baenj hwj cauh guh boux vunz he,
Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq caiq youq baixdoeng mwnq Ihdenq mwnq guh aen suen he. De couh dawz de cauh hih boux vunz mwnq coengq youq ndaw suen mwnq.

De caiq hawj doengh go faex gyaeugyaeu ndeindei he daj lajdoem did hwnjdaeuj, caemh giet gij mak ndei gw he. Youq cungqgyan suen caemh miz go faex hawj vunz mbouj rox rai he, caeuq miz go faex hawj vunz ndaej rox faenbied ndei caeuq yak he.
Aen suen neix miz diuz dah he ndaej gag iemqraemx aen suen de. Diuz dah neix faen miz seiq nga riuz okbae.
Diuz daixdaeuz heuh dah Bijsoenh; de riuz gvax goq Hahfeizlah. (Hahfeizlah mwnq dieg neix miz gim;
gij gim he cwnz raixcaix. Caemh miz baujsig caeuq cungj iengfaex rang fwtfwt he.)
Diuz daixngeih heuh dah Gihywnq; diuz de riuz gvax goq Gujsiz.
Diuz daixsam heuh dah Dijgwzlijswh; diuz de riuz goq Yaqsuz dih baixdoeng. Diuz daixseiq heuh dah Youqfazlahdij.
Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq dawz boux vunz mwnq coengq youq ndaw suen Ihdenq hwj, hawj de youq mwnq youq, caemh hawj de youq ndaw de dajgeng dajndaem caeuq guenjleix aen suen neix.
Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq caemhcaiq hanh boux vunz mwnq, naeuz: “Ndaw suen neix hih mak maz, mwngz cungj ndaej seizbienh gw,
caenhgag ndaek go ndaej hawj vunz rox faenbied ndei caeuq yak mwnq dawz hih mak, mwngz baenzbaenz cungj mbouj ndaej gw. Hauhnaeuz mwngz gw nex, dangjciengz ngoenz de gaengjdingq ngaiz rai lo.”
Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq naeuz: “Boux vunzsai dog gag youq mbouj daiq baenz geijlai; gou ij cauh bouxdoih he hawj de. Boux de caemh ndaej hab de, bang de cij ndaej.”

Gajlaeng Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq couh aeu doem ma baenj cauh gak cungj doenghduz, duz vuenz cix miz, duz byaij cix miz, duz mbin cix miz, dawz daeuj hawj boux vunz mwnq, hawj de an coh hawj gyoengqde. Yiengq boux vunz mwnq couh an coh hawj sojmiz hih doenghduz.
De an coh hawj doengh duz cukseng hah, duz roeg mbin gwnz mbwn he hah, caeuq doengh duz nyaen hah, hoeng, youq ndaw doengh duz neix, cungj mij saek duz ndaej hab hawj de guh doih.

Yiengq, Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq couh hawj boux vunz mwnq ninz ndaekndaek hwj; ninz ndaekndaek hwj le, Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq couh daj gwnz ndang de aeu diuz ndoksej he, gajlaeng caiq doiqyungz hob gij noh de boiz.
Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq couh yungh diuz ndoksej neix ma cauh boux vunzbaz he, caiq daiq de bae daengz dangqnaj boux vunz mwnq.
Boux vunz mwnq raen le couh naeuz:
Boux vunz neix dwg ndaw ndok gou hih ndok, ndaw noh gou hih noh;
Gij ndok de dajlaeng gou daeuj, gij noh de caemh dwg dajlaeng gou daeuj.
Gou ij hawj de heuh guh ‘vunzbaz,’ aenvih de dajlaeng vunzsai ok daeuj he.
Couh vih yienghneix, vunzsai ij biek boh biek meh, caeuq yah doxcaeuq youq, luj baenz aen ndang he,
Mwhde, gannaeuz gvanjbaz de cungj loxgenz loxgangh lah, hoeng, song boux de cungj mbouj rox najnyaenq.

Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq cauh hih sojmiz doenghduz, suenq duz ngwz ceiq ganvad. Duz ngwz cam boux vunzbaz mwnq naeuz: “Cangqdiq cingqcaen naeuz faenhsou, mbouj hawj faenhsou gw ndaw suen neix sojmiz hih mak haz?”
Boux vunzbaz mwnq han naeuz: “Ndaw suen neix hih mak maz, raeuz cungj ndaej gw;

caenhgag ndaek go youq cungqgyan suen mwnq hih gij mak de, Cangqdiq gimqcij mbouj hawj raeuz gw. Mbouj danhcij naeuz mbouj hawj gw, daiqlienz mo cungj mbouj hawj mo. Hauhnaeuz raeuz mbouj dingq nex, raeuz gaengjdingq ngaiz rai.”
Hoeng, duz ngwz mwnq engq han de naeuz: “Faenhsou gaengjdingq mbouj ngaiz rai law!
Cangqdiq mbouj hawj faenhsou gw dwg aenvih de rox, hauhnaeuz faenhsou gw gij mak go faex mwnq nex, faenhsou couh ndaej singqsag goqdaeuj, ndaej luj de yienghmwnq rox faenbied ndei caeuq yak lo.”
Yiengq, boux vunzbaz mwnq caemh raen gij mak gwnz go faex mwnq cix ndeiyawj, caemhcix lujnaeuz ndei gw raixcaix nwih, youhcaiq ndaej hawj vunz rox faenbied ndei caeuq yak he.

Song boux de gw le, couh majcangq singqsag hwnjdaeuj; singqsag hwnjdaeuj le, laixlawz cij rox naeuz bonjfaenh yienzlaiz dwg loxgenz loxgangh he. Gajlaeng gyoengqde couh aeu mbaw faex hung, couh dwg mbaw go uzvahgoj, aeu ma neb hwj dangj bonjfaenh.
Daengz
Hoeng, Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq engq heuh boux vunz mwnq, naeuz: “Mwngz youq mwnqlaw lah?”
Yiengq boux vunz mwnq han naeuz: “Gou dingqri sing mwngz youq ndaw suen byaij le, couh ndoj hwnjdaeuj lo, aenvih gou dwg loxgenz loxgangh he; gou lau.”
Gajlaeng Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq naeuz: “Byawz naeuz mwngz ni mwngz loxgenz loxgangh lah? Dwg mbouj dwg mwngz gw gij mak gou gimqcij mbouj hawj mwngz gw he?”
Boux vunz mwnq caiq han naeuz: “Mwngz aeu hawj gou guxdoih hih boux vunzbaz mwnq, de aeu gij mak gwnz go faex mwnq hawj gou gw; gou couh gw lo.”
Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq dingq le, couh cam boux vunzbaz mwnq naeuz: “Mwngz vihmaz ij yienghneix guh nej?”
Yiengq boux vunzbaz mwnq doi naeuz: “Dwg duz ngwz yaeuh hawj gou gw lah.”

Gajlaeng, Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq doiq duz ngwz naeuz: “Mwngz ij vih gienh saeh neix hwj ngaiz souh daengz mang, simqciq ngaiz mang ij beij sojmiz hih doenghduz ngaiz mang he lai. Daj seizneix hwnj, mwngz ij aeu dungx ma vuenz, baenxseiq cungj dwg nem doem nem naez.

Gou ij hawj mwngz caeuq vunzbaz miz caeuz; doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz caeuq doengh daih gajlaeng de doxhaemzcaeuz. Doengh daih gajlaeng de hih boux he ij haih ndaek raeuj mwngz, mwngz caemh ij haih gij giujdin boux de.”

Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq caemh doiq boux vunzbaz mwnq naeuz: “Gou ij hawj mwngz mwh daiqndang he cix dwgrengz cix hojyouq; daengz mwh seng he, caemh ij in'in hojyouq hojyouq ij rai bae cij ndaej. Gannaeuz yienghneix lah, hoeng, mwngz vanzlij ciuqyiengh sij mbouj ndaej goeng mwngz; goeng mwngz caemh ijsiengj guenjciq mwngz.”

Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq caemh vanzlij doiq boux vunz mwnq, couh dwg boux heuh Yaqdangh mwnq, naeuz: “Mwngz gingqyienz dingq gij vah mehyah mwngz, caeg gw gij mak gou gimqcij mbouj hawj mwngz gw he! Yiengq, gij dieg ij vih mwngz hwj ngaiz souh daengz mang, mwngz caemh ij baenxseiq vunz cungj ij guh hong dwgrengz hwj cij ndaej daj ndaw reih sou haeujma hih gij gw.
Lajdoem caemh ij hwnj miz oenoen cahcah, nywjnywj nyaengqnyaengq. Mwngz caemh ij ngaiz daj cungj dieg neix aeu doenghgij gw he.
Mwngz ij guh hong hwj hanh riuz hanh roenx cij ndaej miz gw imq, itcig daengz rai roengz doem bae, aenvih mwngz dwg aeu doem ma cauh he, ij gvi hawj ndaw doem boiz.”
Gajlaeng Yaqdangh an coh hawj mehyah de heuh Yaqvah
Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq aeu naeng nyaen ma guh buh hawj Yaqdangh caeuq mehyah de daenj.

Gajlaeng, Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq ndaw hoz de gag naeuz: “Boux vunz neix gaenq luj raeuz ndaej rox faenbied ndei caeuq yak he hih lo. Gou mbouj hawj de caiq caeg mbaet aeu gij mak gwnz go faex hawj vunz mbouj rox rai hih mwnq ma gw lo; hauhnaeuz de caeg gw nex, de couh yungjyenj lix roengzbae nej.”

Sojhij Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq couh boenq song boux de ok suen Ihdenq bae. Yienzlaiz Cangqdiq dwg aeu doem ma baenj cauh guh Yaqdangh he, yiengq de couh hawj de bae geng dieg dajndaem, daj ndaw doem ndaej gij gw.

Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq boenq boux vunz mwnq deuz le, couh baij geij boux cenmonz bajsouj he daj gwnzmbwn roengz daeuj, souj youq suen Ihdenq hih mbiengj baixdoeng, caemhcaiq coengq fag giemq he youq mwnq. Fag giemq neix ndaej cienq seiq fueng bat baih, caemhcaiq ndaej ok feiz he. Cangqdiq yienghneix guh couh dwg hen mbouj hawj vunz bae daengz go mak hawj vunz gw le mbouj rox rai mwnq.

Yaqdangh caeuq mehyah de ninz. Ninz le, mehyah de couh mizndang, seng miz daeglwg he. Meh de naeuz: “Aenvih Yehhozvaz bang gou, sawjhawj gou ndaej daeglwg neix,” yiengq couh an coh hawj daeglwg neix heuh Gaihyinj.
Gajlaeng de caiq seng daeglwg he, an coh heuh Yaqbwz. Yaqbwz dwg boux ciengx yiengz he, Gaihyinj dwg boux dajndaem he.
Miz ngoenz he, Gaihyinj aeu doenghgij de ndaem ndaej hih gij gw, aeu ma guh gij dajbwiz he soengq hawj Yehhozvaz.

Yaqbwz nej, Yaqbwz caemh daj ndaw gyoengq yiengz de aeu geij duz yiengzlwg daixdaeuz he dih gij noh ceiq ndei he, aeu ma guh gij dajbwiz he soengq hawj Yehhozvaz. Hoeng, Yehhozvaz haenj Yaqbwz caeuq gij dajbwiz de,
dauq mij haenj Gaihyinj caeuq gij dajbwiz de. Yiengq Gaihyinj cungj ndatheiq hwj naj ndaem ndetndet bae.
Gajlaeng Yehhozvaz cam Gaihyinj naeuz: “Mwngz vihmaz ndatheiq hwj naj ndaem ndetndet bae nej?
Hauhnaeuz mwngz rox guh vunz nex, gou swhmboujyienz haenj mwngz; mbouj nex, mwngz couh veizyiemj, yungzheih famh coih. Coih couh veizyiemj luj
Gajlaeng, Gaihyinj doiq daegnuengx de naeuz: “Raeuz bae rog reihnaz bax!”
Gajlaeng Yehhozvaz cam Gaihyinj naeuz: “Daegnuengx mwngz nej, de youq mwnqlaw lah?”
Gaihyinj han naeuz: “Mbouj rox law. Nanzdauh gou dwg boux fuqswz yawj daegnuengx gou hih maz?”
Yiengq Yehhozvaz caiq saemjcam naeuz: “Mwngz guh gijmaz saeh hax? Gou lujnaeuz dingqri gij lwed daegnuengx mwngz daj laj doem yiengq gou daejdaej danqdanq.
Mwngz gaj de mwhmwnq, gij dieg aj bak gyan gw gij lwed daegnuengx mwngz daj ndaw fawz mwngz riuz okdaeuj he. Sojhij mwngz couh vih yienghneix hwj ngaiz mang lo.
Mwngz dajgeng hah, dajndaem hah, gij dieg caiq mbouj ok doenghgij gw hawj mwngz laem lo; mwngz ngaiz dauqcawq bae liuzlangq cij ndaej.”
Yiengq, Gaihyinj doiq Yehhozvaz naeuz: “Fad baenxlai naek, gou dingx mbouj ndaej hah!
Mwngz boenq gou ok mwnq dieg neix bae, mbouj hawj gou caiq raen mwngz, gou couh bienqbaenz boux mij gya mij dangq hih boux liuzlangq he lo. Yiengq gij vunz raen gou cungj ij gaj gou!”

Hoeng Yehhozvaz naeuz: “Mbouj ngaiz law. Hauhnaeuz byawz gaj mwngz hih, de couh ij souh daengz caet boix hih bauqwngq.” Yiengq Yehhozvaz couh youq gwnz ndang Gaihyinj guh gij geiqhauh he, mbouj hawj vunz raen de le gaj de.
Gajlaeng, Gaihyinj couh daj Yehhozvaz mwnq bae daengz dieg Nozdwz.

Gaihyinj caeuq mehyah de ninz. Mehyah de couh daiqndang, seng miz daeglwg he, gij coh de heuh Hijnoz. Mwhde Gaihyinj caemh hwnq aen singz he; de aeu gij coh daeglwg de ma an aen singz neix heuh Hijnoz.
Gajlaeng Hijnoz seng Hijnaz; Hijnaz seng Mijhuqyajliq; Mijhuqyajliq seng Majdujsajliq; Majdujsajliq seng Lahmwz.
Lahmwz aeu song mehyah, meh he heuh Yaqdaq, meh he heuh Sijlah.
Yaqdaq seng Yajbaz; Yajbaz dwg gij vunz dauqcawq bae dajciengx hih, daengz mwnqlawz youq mwnqlawz hih cojgoeng.
Daegnuengx Yajbaz heuh Youzbaz; Youzbaz dwg gij vunz danz gimz boq dig hih cojgoeng.
Sijlah seng Dujbaz-Gaihyinj; Dujbaz-Gaihyinj dwg cangh diz doengz diz diet hih cojgoeng. Nazmaj dwg dahnuengx Dujbaz-Gaihyinj.
Miz baez he, Lahmwz doiq song mehyah de naeuz:
Yaqdaq, Sijlah, dingq gou naeuz;
Faenhsou dwg gou hih yah, ij dingq gij vah gou naeuz.
Gou gajrai sienghaih gou hih vunz,
Daiqlienz saeg gou bungq gou hih lwgngez cungj gaj.
Gajhaih Gaihyinj hih vunz
Ij souh daengz caet boix hih bauqwngq;
Gajhaih gou nex,
Ij souh daengz caetcib caet boix dih bauqwngq.

Yaqdangh caiq caeuq mehyah de ninz; meh de caiq seng miz daeglwg he. Yaqvah naeuz: “Cangqdiq caiq hawj daeglwg he hawj gou dingj Yaqbwz, aenvih Yaqbwz ngaiz Gaihyinj gajrai lo.” Yiengq couh an coh hawj de heuh Caihdwz.
Gajlaeng Caihdwz caemh miz daeglwg he, an coh hawj de heuh Hijnozswq.
Daj mwhmwnq, gij vunz ij heuh Cangqdiq nex, couh yungh Yehhozvaz gij coh neix ma heuh.
Laj neix dwg Yaqdangh hih doengh daih gajlaeng.
Cangqdiq cauh vunz mwhde, dwg cauh luj bonjfaenh de he.
De cauh miz vunzsai caeuq vunzbaz song boux. Mwh cauh vunz mwhde, caemh soengq fuk hawj gyoengqde, heuh gyoengqde ‘vunz.’
Yaqdangh ndaej baksam bi mwhmwnq, miz daeglwg he, gij coh de heuh Caihdwz; de luj daxboh de.
Yaqdangh miz Caihdwz le, caiq souh ndaej baenx betbak bi, caemh vanzlij miz lwg.
Yaqdangh souh ndaej baenx goujbak samcib bi cij rai.
Caihdwz ndaej bak lingz haj bi mwhde, de miz daeglwg he, an coh heuh Hijnozswq.
Caihdwz miz Hijnozswq le, caiq souh ndaej betbak lingz caet bi, caemh vanzlij miz lwg.
De souh ndaej baenx goujbak itcib ngeih bi cij rai.
Hijnozswq ndaej goujcib bi mwhde, miz daeglwg he, an coh heuh Gaihnamz.
De miz Gaihnamz le, vanzlij souh ndaej betbak itcib haj bi, caemh vanzlij miz lwg.
De souh ndaej baenx goujbak lingz haj bi cij rai.
Gaihnamz ndaej caetcib bi mwhde, miz daeglwg he, an coh heuh Majlwzlez.
De miz Majlwzlez le, vanzlij souh ndaej betbak seiqcib bi, caemh vanzlij miz lwg.
De souh ndaej baenx goujbak it bi cij rai.
Majlwzlez ndaej roekhaj bi mwhde, miz daeglwg he, an coh heuh Yajlez.
De miz Yajlez le, vanzlij souh ndaej betbak samcib bi, caemh vanzlij miz lwg.
De souh ndaej baenx betbak goujcib haj bi cij rai.
Yajlez ndaej itbak roekcib ngeih bi mwhde, miz daeglwg he, an coh heuh Hijnoz.
De miz Hijnoz le, vanzlij souh ndaej betbak bi, caemh vanzlij miz lwg.
De souh ndaej baenx goujbak roekcib ngeih bi cij rai.
Hijnoz ndaej roekcib haj bi mwhde, miz daeglwg he, an coh hawj de heuh Majdujsajlah.
De miz Majdujsajlah le, caemh vanzlij souh ndaej sambak bi, caemh vanzlij miz lwg. De siengzseiz haenj dingq Cangqdiq gaen Cangqdiq.
De ndaej sambak roekcib haj bi mwhmwnq,
Cangqdiq couh ciep de bae; gij vunz couh mbouj raen de haem lo, aenvih de baenx seiqvunz cungj haenj dingq Cangqdiq gaen Cangqdiq.
Majdujsajlah ndaej itbak betcib caet bi mwhde, miz daeglwg he, an coh hawj de heuh Lahmwz.
De miz Lahmwz le, vanzlij souh ndaej caetbak betcib ngeih bi, caemh vanzlij miz lwg.
De souh ndaej baenx goujbak roekcib gouj bi cij rai.
Lahmwz ndaej itbak betcib ngeih bi mwhde, miz daeglwg he.

Lahmwz naeuz: “Cangqdiq mang gij dieg, hawj raeuz dwgrengz sinhoj guh hong; daeglwg neix ndaej hawj raeuz daj ndaw dwgrengz sinhoj ndaw de ndaej daengz vued.” Yiengq de couh an coh hawj de heuh Nozyaq.
De miz Nozyaq le, vanzlij souh ndaej hajbak goujcib haj bi, caemh vanzlij miz lwg.
De souh ndaej baenx caetbak caetcib caet bi cij rai.
Nozyaq ndaej hajbak bi le, cij miz sam daeglwg, couh dwg Cenj, Hamz caeuq Yajfuz.
Gij vunz mbouj dingz hih seng lwg; lajmbwn couh menhmenh miz vunz lai hwnjdaeuj. Gij lwgsau gij vunz caemh gyaeu raixcaix,
yiengq, vunz cwng doengh boux ‘lwg cwnz’ he mwnq raen doenghheij lwgsau heijvunz mwnq gyaeu le, couh seizbienh genj aeu ma guh yah.

Gajlaeng Yehhozvaz naeuz: “Vunz giqyienz dwg ndangnoh hih vunz, yiengq gij Hoenzsaenz gou hozbiet ij yungjyenj youq laeng gyoengqde laem; gij mingh gyoengqde caemh mbouj ndaej souh cauhgoq bakngeih bi laem lo.”

Mwhmwnq gij vunz cwng hih ‘lwg cwnz’ he caeuq gij lwgsau vunz gaep guh gvanjbaz le, doengh daih gajlaeng de cix yak cix ak, youq gujdaiq cienfanh miz mingz he. Yiengq youq mwhneix, caemh miz dujfeij (gajlaeng caemh vanzlij miz he). Gij vunz couh heuh gij dujfeij neix heuh ‘vunz goeg.’
Yiengq, Yehhozvaz raen gij vunz cungj gig yakrwix, ndaw sim naemj hih cungj dwg gig doegdoeg siebsieb le,
de couh vih bonjfaenh de cauh vunz hwj siengsim.
De naeuz: “Gou ij dawz gou soj cauh hih vunz hah, doengh duz cukseng hah, duz vuenz lajdoem he hah, caeuq duz mbin gwnz mbwn he hah cungj cawz liux, cawzraeg bae, aenvih gou ienq cauh gyoengqde lo.”
Hoeng, caenhgag Nozyaq youq ndaw lwgra Yehhozvaz cij dwg boux vunz ndei he.
Laj neix dwg ranz Nozyaq dih lizsij.
Nozyaq dwg boux simndei simsoh he hih vunz; youq daih mwhde, Nozyaq dwg boux mij gijmaz ndaej diudik he dih vunz, aenvih de haenj dingq Cangqdiq gaen Cangqdiq.
De miz sam daeglwg, couh dwg Cenj, Hamz caeuq Yajfuz.
Mwhmwnq, lajmbwn sojmiz hih vunz youq ndaw lwgra Cangqdiq cungj dwg yakyak rwixrwix he.
Cangqdiq yawjraen lajmbwn, yawjraen gij vunz cungj dwg doegdoeg siebsieb le,
de couh doiq Nozyaq naeuz: “Gou gietdingh ij cawz vunz, aenvih gyoengqde sawjhawj lajmbwn dauqcawq cungj dwg doegdoeg siebsieb. Sojhij gou ij cawz sojmiz hih vunz caeuq lajmbwn sojmiz he.
Mwngz ij aeu faex coengzbek ma cauh aen ruz luj aen sieng he. Aen ruz neix caemh ij gek miz baenx fungh baenx fungh hwj, ndawndaw rogrog cungj ij duz lizcingh haeujbae.
Aen ruz neix hih gij raez de ij guh miz itbak samcib sam mij raez, gvangq ij miz ngeihcib ngeih mij gvangq, sang ij miz cibsam mij sang.
Aen ruz neix hih yiemhfung ij miz lingz denj haj mij,
“Gou ij hawj raemx dumh mbwn liux bae, cawz sojmiz hih doenghduz, fanjcingq lajmbwn sojmiz hih cungj cawz liux bae.
Hoeng, gou ij dingh yiengh he hawj mwngz,
“Gou vanzlij ij hawj gak cungj doengh duz cukseng caeuq doengh duz vuenz lajdoem he hah, doengh duz mbin gwnz mbwn he hah,
Mwngz caemh ij diuh doenghgij gw he hwj hawj faenhsou caeuq gak cungj doenghduz laem.”
Gajlaeng Nozyaq caemh ciuq Cangqdiq raengq hih yienghmwnq bae guh lo.

Yehhozvaz caiq doiq Nozyaq naeuz: “Mwngz caeuq ndaw ranz mwngz hih vunz cungj ij haeuj ndaw ruz bae, aenvih gou rox, mwngz youq ndaw lwgra gou, lajmbwn caenhgag miz mwngz dwg boux simndei simsoh he hih vunz.

Mwngz caemh ij daiq caet doiq gak cungj doenghduz, couh dwg doengh duz ndaej aeu ma guh dajbwiz he, haeuj ndaw ruz bae; moix it doiq dwg duzboux duzmeh. Gak cungj doengh duz mbouj ndaej aeu ma guh dajbwiz he caemh ij daiq doiq he haeuj bae, caemh dwg daiq duzboux duzmeh;
doengh duz mbin gwnz mbwn hih caemh ij daiq caet doiq, moix doiq caemh dwg duzboux duzmeh. Yienghmwnq, gak cungj cukseng caeuq gak cungj roeg mbin cungj ndaej louz guh cungj, mbouj lau rairaeg lo,
aenvih goq caet ngoenz laem, gou couh ij hawj fwn doek hung, lienzdaemh doek baenx seiqcib ngwnzngoenz, dawz gou soj cauh hih miz mingh hih cungj cawzraeg bae.”
Yiengq, Nozyaq caemh ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq hih yienghmwnq bae guh lo.
Mwh raemx dumh mbwn mwhde, Nozyaq ngamqluj ndaej roekbak bi.
De caeuq yah caeuq lwg caeuq bawx cungj haeuj ndaw ruz bae ndoj raemxdumh.
Doengh duz ndaej aeu ma guh dajbwiz he caeuq doengh duz mbouj ndaej aeu ma guh dajbwiz he, doengh duz roeg mbin gwnz mbwn he caeuq doengh duz vuenz lajdoem he,
cungj caemh ciuq Cangqdiq raengq hih yienghmwnq duzboux duzmeh baenx doiq baenx doiq hwj daeuj daengz Nozyaq mwnq, gaen Nozyaq haeuj ndaw ruz bae lo.
Cingqgawq goq caet ngoenz le, raemx cungj dumh sojmiz hih dieg liux.

Couh dwg Nozyaq ndaej roekbak bi hih bi mwnq dih ngeihnyied cibcaet hauh, sawqmwh laj doem sojmiz hih mboq cungj danh mboenxmboenx hwnjdaeuj mbouj dingz; gwnzmbwn fwn doek roengz regreg, lujnaeuz gwnzmbwn miz baj gyaegfairaemx hoi liux lo nwih,
doek baenx seiqcib ngwnzngoenz.
Couh youq ngoenz fwn doek hunghung mwnq, Nozyaq caeuq mehyah de, caeuq sam daeglwg de, Cenj, Hamz, Yajfuz, caeuq doengh mehbawx de haeuj ndaw ruz bae lo.
Gak cungj doengh duz nyaen hah, gak cungj doengh duz cukseng hah, gak cungj doengh duz vuenz he hih hah, gak cungj doengh duz roeg mbin gwnz mbwn he hih hah,
fanjcingq doengh duz diemjcaw he cungj caemh baenx doiq baenx doiq hwj daeuj daengz Nozyaq mwnq gaen Nozyaq haeuj ndaw ruz bae lo.
Sojmiz hih doenghduz cungj caemh ciuq Cangqdiq raengq hih yienghmwnq, duzboux duzmeh baenx doiq baenx doiq hwj haeuj ruz bae lo. Gajlaeng Yehhozvaz couh bang Nozyaq haep aen dou ruz lo.
Fwn doek hung gig yungyiemj, lienzdaemh doek baenx seiqcib ngoenz; lajmbwn dauqcawq cungj miz raemx. Raemx yied hwnj yied sang; aen ruz daj lajdoem fouz hwnjdaeuj.
Raemx yied hwnj yied sang, ruz yied fouz yied sang.
Raemx yied dumh yied sang, lajmbwn sojmiz hih bya cungj dumh liux.
Hoeng raemxdumh vanzlij yied hwnj yied sang, mauh goq dingjbya caet mij sang.
Lajmbwn sojmiz hih doenghduz, couh dwg doengh duz mbin he hah, doengh duz cukseng hah, doengh duz nyaen hah, doengh duz vuenz he hah, caeuq sojmiz hih vunz hah cungj rai liux.
Fanjcingq gwnz hawq sojmiz aeu ndaeng ma diemjcaw hih cungj rai liux lo.

Couh yienghneix, Cangqdiq cawz gwnz hawq sojmiz miz mingh he: vunz hah, doengh duz cukseng hah, duz vuenz he hah, duz mbin he hah, cungj cawz liux. Caenhgag lij lw Nozyaq caeuq gaen de haeuj ndaw ruz bae hih vunz caeuq doenghduz laem lo.
Raemx dumh mbwn, dumh baenx bakhaj ngoenz baenx lai.
Cangqdiq mbouj lumz Nozyaq caeuq gaen de haeuj ndaw ruz bae hih doenghduz, couh hawj miz rumz ci, ci hawj gij raemx roengz.
Mboq raemx laj doem caeuq gij raemx gwnz mbwn cungj gven bae, fwn caemh dingz lo.
Yiengq raemx couh menhmenh roengz.
Raemx vanzlij menhmenh roengz, daengz cibnyied it hauh, couh gaihcij loh raen dingjbya lo.
Caiq goq seiqcib ngoenz le, Nozyaq couh hoi conghcang ruz,
coengq duz roegga he. Yiengq duz roegga neix mbin bae mbin dauq, mbin daengz raemx roengz liux.
Yiengq Nozyaq caiq coengq duz roegguqgap he okbae, siengj yawjyawj raemx roengz liux mijyaengz.
Hoeng, raemx vanzlij dumh; duz roegguqgap gaenhbaenj mij mwnq dieg ndaej ndwn he, yiengq duz de couh doiqyungz mbin ma boiz. Nozyaq raen le, couh iet fawz ciep duz de haeuj maj ndaw ruz boiz.
Gajlaeng Nozyaq caiq daengj caet ngoenz. Caet ngoenz le, de caiq doiqyungz coengq duz roegguqgap he okbae.
Ok bae daengz yiengqhaemh le, duz roegguqgap mwnq ndaw bak de gamz miz mbaw makmbi ngamq mbaet he, mbin ma daengz Nozyaq mwnq. Yiengq Nozyaq couh rox naeuz raemx roengz lo.
Caiq goq caet ngoenz le, Nozyaq youhcaiq coengq duz roegguqgap okbae, hoeng mbat neix mij raen duz roegguqgap caiq mbin ma laem lo.

Bi Nozyaq ndaej roekbak lingz it bi dih yienznyied it hauh, raemxdumh dungjdungj roengz liux lo. Yiengq Nozyaq couh hoi gij goemq aen ruz hwj ndomq ok rog daeuj yawj, ndomq raen rog neix gij doem gaihcij hawq lo.
Caiq daengz ngeihnyied ngeihcib caet hauh, lajdoem cungj hawq liux lo.
Gajlaeng Cangqdiq doiq Nozyaq naeuz:
“Mwngz caeuq yah caeuq lwg caeuq bawx ok ruz ma bax!
Mwngz caemh ij daiq doengh duz gaen mwngz haeuj bae he ok ma, hawj gyoengqde ok ma fat doengh daih gajlaeng, fat hawj lajmbwn dauqcawq cungj miz bae.”
Gajlaeng Nozyaq caeuq yah caeuq lwg caeuq bawx ok ma lo.
De caemh hawj sojmiz doengh duz youq ndaw ruz he hih, cungj caemh baez cungj baez cungj hwj hawj gyoengqde ok ma lo.
Hawj gyoengqde ok ma le, gajlaeng de couh caeb aen daiz dajbwiz he, dawz gak cungj doengh duz ndaej aeu ma guh dajbwiz hih aeu ma coemh hwj bwiz Yehhozvaz.

Gajlaeng Yehhozvaz mupraen gij heiq rang coemh hwj dajbwiz mwnq le, ndaw sim de gag naemj: “Gou gan rox, gij vunz daj lij iq, ndaw sim cix miz cungj doegdoeg siebsieb he lo, hoeng gou mbouj caiq vih gij vunz hwj mang gij dieg haem lo, mbouj caiq luj mbat neix cawz lajmbwn sojmiz miz mingh hih lo.
Cijaeu baezneix mbwn mbouj doemq dieg mbouj loemq, couh gaengjdingq miz ndaem miz sou, miz nit miz hwngq, miz seizdoeng miz seizhah, miz ngwnz miz ngoenz.”
Cangqdiq soengq fuk hawj Nozyaq caeuq gij lwg de, doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou ij seng haujlai haujlai lwg, sawj doengh daih gajlaeng faenhsou youq lajmbwn dauqcawq cungj miz rim bae.

Hawj lajmbwn sojmiz hih doengh duz cukseng hah, duz nyaen duz yex hah, doengh duz roeg mbin gwnz mbwn he hah, doengh duz vuenz lajdoem he hah, caeuq ndaw haij sojmiz hih bya hah cungj lau faenhsou, vanzlij caemh ngaiz faenhsou guenj.

“Seizneix gou ij dawz sojmiz hih doenghduz neix hawj faenhsou aeu ma guh gij gw he; gaxgonq gou caenhgag hawj doenghgo hawj faenhsou aeu ma guh gij gw, hoeng seizneix gou daiqlienz doenghduz cungj hawj faenhsou aeu ma guh gij gw.
Hoeng, faenhsou mbouj ndaej gw gij noh daiq lwed he, aenvih ndaw lwed miz mingh.
“Famzsoj bouxlawz haih vunz rai hih, bouxlawz couh ij ngaiz vunz gaj; hauhnaeuz miz doenghduz haih vunz rai hih,
“Faenhsou ij seng lwg lailai hwj, hawj gij lwglwg lanlan doengh daih gajlaeng faenhsou fatdad hwngqhwngq seiqseiq hwj lajmbwn dauqcawq cungj miz bae.”
Cangqdiq caiq doiq Nozyaq caeuq doengh daeglwg de naeuz:
“Gou seizneix ij doiq faenhsou caeuq doenghheij lwglwg lanlan doengh daih gajlaeng faenhsou baujcingq,
vanzlij caemhcaiq caeuq lajmbwn sojmiz hih doenghduz, couh dwg doengh duz gaen mwngz haeuj ndaw ruz bae hih doengh duz mwnq
Couh dwg naeuz, gou baujcingq baezneix mbouj caiq raemx dumh mbwn, mbouj caiq cawz sojmiz miz mingh hih lo.”
Cangqdiq youhcaiq naeuz: “Gou ij guh gij geiqhauh he, geiqhauh gou caeuq faenhsou caeuq sojmiz miz mingh hih yungjyenj baujcingq.
Couh dwg gou dawz saijdoengz coengq youq ndaw fwj, aeu saijdoengz ma guh geiqhauh, geiqhauh gou caeuq seiqgyaiq dih baujcingq.
Hauhnaeuz gou hawj gwnzmbwn gvaq fwj caeuq miz saijdoengz yienh youq ndaw de nex,
gou couh ndaejgeiq gou caeuq faenhsou caeuq lajmbwn sojmiz miz mingh hih baujcingq, couh mbouj hawj fwn doek hwj dumh daengz cawz lajmbwn sojmiz miz mingh hih bae lo.
Caenhnaeuz gou raen saijdoengz yienh youq ndaw fwj nex, gou couh ndaejgeiq gou doiq faenhsou caeuq lajmbwn sojmiz miz mingh hih yungjyenj mbouj rox bienq dih baujcingq lo.
Gij neix couh dwg gou geiqhauh gou caeuq lajmbwn sojmiz miz mingh hih baujcingq.”
Gaen Nozyaq daj ndaw ruz ok ma hih doengh daeglwg de couh dwg Cenj, Hamz caeuq Yajfuz. (Hamz dwg daxboh Gyahnamz.)
Gajlaeng sam daeglwg Nozyaq hih doengh daih gajlaeng cungj faensanq youq seiqgyaiq hih gak dieg.
Nozyaq dwg boux nungzminz he, yiengq de ok ruz ma le, couh sien guh aen suen he hwj ndaem buzdauz.
Miz mbat he, de gw laeuj fiz le, loxgenz loxgangh hwj ninz youq ndaw cangqbungz.
Gajlaeng ngaiz Hamz (couh dwg daxboh Gyahnamz) raen de loxgenz loxgangh hwj, couh ok bae naeuz song boux beix de ni.

Yiengq Cenj caeuq Yajfuz dingq le, couh dawz diuz buhbauz raez he ma bangj youq song hongzmbaq bonjfaenh gyoengqde hwj, doenq dauqlaeng byaij haeuj ndaw cangqbungz bae, dawz diuz buhbauz raez neix goemq youq gwnz ndang daxboh gyoengqde. Gyoengqde cungj dwg veq naj doxok, mij yawjraen daxboh loxgenz loxgangh.
Gajlaeng, Nozyaq laeuj singj le, rox naeuz Hamz, daeglwg ceiq iq de, raen de loxgenz loxgangh, caemhcaiq bae naeuz song boux beix de ni,

couh mang Hamz dih daeglwg iq de Gyahnamz, naeuz: “Gyahnamz caeuq doengh daih gajlaeng de wnggai ngaiz mang! Gyahnamz baezneix ij ngaiz guh Cenj caeuq Yajfuz dih ceiq cuij ceiq yaez dih hoiq, daiqlienz doengh daih gajlaeng de cungj dwg yienghneix.”
De caiq naeuz:
Gou wnggai haenh Yehhozvaz, Cenj dih Cangqdiq!
Gyahnamz caemh ij guh Cenj dih hoiq.
Muengh Cangqdiq sawj Yajfuz fatdad!
Muengh de caeuq Cenj yungjyenj doxndei roengzbae!
Gyahnamz caemh guh hoiq de.
Raemxdumh goq le, Nozyaq vanzlij souh ndaej sambak haj bi.
De rai mwhde ndaej goujbak haj bi.
Laj neix dwg doengh daeglwg Nozyaq—Cenj, Hamz caeuq Yajfuz—dih doengh daih gajlaeng. Raemxdumh goq le, gyoengqde cungj seng miz lwg.
Gij lwg Yajfuz dwg Gohgwz, Majgoz, Majdaiq, Yajvanz, Dujbah, Mijsez caeuq Dizlah.
Gij lwg Gohgwz dwg Yaqsizgihnaz, Liqfaz caeuq Dozgyahmaj.
Gij lwg Yajvanz dwg Hijliqcah, Dahswh, Gihdiz caeuq Lohdanh.
Doengh boux neix cungj dwg gij cojgoeng doenghheij minzcuz youq henz haij mwnq. Gyoengqde cungj dwg ciuq bonjfaenh hih minzcuz ma laeb guek; gak aen minzcuz caemh gag miz bonjfaenh hih vah.
Gij lwg Hamz dwg Gujsiz, Mwzsih,
Gij lwg Gujsiz dwg Sihbah, Hahfeizlah, Sajfuzdah, Lahmaj caeuq Sajfuzdizgyah.
Gij lwg Lahmaj dwg Siqbah caeuq Dijdanq.
Gujsiz caemh miz daeglwg he heuh Ningzluz; daeg neix caemh dwg lajmbwn boux ceiq rem he dih vunz.
De youq ndaw lwgra Yehhozvaz dwg boux dwknyaen rem he hih vunz, sojhij gij vunz cungj haenj dawz de ma beij naeuz: “Rem luj Ningzluz dwk nyaen nwih.”
De ngamq laeb guek hih mwhde, dwg daj dieg Siqnaz hih Bahbez hah, Hijliz hah, Yaqgyaz hah, caeuq Gyazniz hah doengh aen singz neix laeb guek.
Gajlaeng de vanzlij bae daengz dieg Yaqsuz hwnq Niznizveih Singz, Liqhozbwz Singz, Gyahlah Singz,
caeuq youq Niznizveih Singz, Gyahlah Singz song aen singz neix hih cungqgyan de hwnq Liqsenh Singz. (Gyahlah dwg aen singz hung he.)
Mwzsih dih doengh daih gajlaeng dwg Luqdih vunz, Yaqnazmij vunz, Liqhahbij vunz, Nazfuzdujhih vunz,
Bwzswhlujsiq vunz, Gyahswhluqhih vunz caeuq Gyahfeihdoz vunz. (Feihliqswq vunz dwg daj Gyahfeihdoz vunz fat okdaeuj he.)
Gyahnamz seng miz Sihdoenq; Sihdoenq dwg daeglwg daeuz. Doengh daih gajlaeng Gyahnamz caemh dwg Hwz vunz,
Yehbuqswh vunz, Yaqmohliq vunz, Gwzgyahsaj vunz,
Hihveiq vunz, Yaqgih vunz, Sihniz vunz,
Yaqvajdij vunz, Sijmajliq vunz, Hahmaj vunz. Gajlaeng gij vunz Gyahnamz hih gak aen gyahcuz cungj fat hwj cienfanh gvangq he.
Gyoengqde hih dieg dwg dajlwh Sihdoenq daengz fueng Gihlah'wj dih Gyahcaq, caiq dajlwh Gyahcaq daengz Sojdohmaj, Ngozmohlah, Yazmaj, Sijbenj, itcig daengz Lahcah.
Gwnz neix cungj dwg Hamz hih doengh daih gajlaeng. Gyoengqde cungj dwg gag miz aen cuz bonjfaenh, gij vah bonjfaenh, caemh gag laeb aen guek bonjfaenh.
Cenj dwg daeggo Yajfuz, caemh dwg cojgoeng Hihbwz.
Gij lwg Cenj dwg Hijlanz, Yaqsuz, Yaqfazsaj, Luqdwz caeuq Yaqlanz.
Gij lwg Yaqlanz dwg Uhswh, Huqlwz, Gihdez caeuq Majswh.
Daeglwg Yaqfazsaj dwg Cahlah; Cahlah seng Hihbwz.
Hihbwz seng miz song daeglwg; daegdaeuz gij coh de heuh Fazlwz
Gij lwg Yozdanh dwg Yaqmohdaz, Cahlez, Hahcazmajfeih, Yehlah,
Hahdohlanz, Ucaz, Dwzlah,
Ngozbahluq, Yaqbijmajliq, Siqbah,
Ahfeiz, Hahfeizlah caeuq Yozbah. Gyoengqde cungj dwg doengh daih gajlaeng Yozdanh.
Gyoengqde youq hih deixfueng dwg daj
Doengh daih gajlaeng Cenj cungj dwg gag miz bonjfaenh hih minzcuz, bonjfaenh hih guek, caemh gag miz bonjfaenh hih vah.

Gwnz neix cungj dwg sam daeglwg Nozyaq dih gak aen minzcuz. Gyoengqde cungj dwg ciuq gak aen minzcuz ma gag laeb guek. Daj raemx dumh mbwn goq le, lajmbwn sojmiz hih minzcuz cungj dwg dajlaeng gij lwg Nozyaq fat okdaeuj he.
Mwhmwnq lajmbwn sojmiz hih vunz cungj dwg gangj cungj vah he.
Mwhde gij vunz cungj dwg youq baixdoeng youq; gajlaeng gyoengqde menhmenh baez mwnq baez mwnq senj, yiengq bae daengz dieg Siqnaz raen miz mwnq bingzyienz he le, gyoengqde couh youq mwnq youq.

Gyoengqde youq mwnq youq le, couh doxcimciek hwj naeuz: “Ox! Daengj raeuz daj cien oenq cien ma hwnq ranz bax.” Gajlaeng gyoengqde couh yungh cien ma dingj guh rin caep ranz, caemh dwg aeu lizcingh ma dingj guh ceijniz caep cien.

Gajlaeng gyoengqde caiq naeuz: “Daeuj! Daengj raeuz hwnq aen singz he bax! Ndaw singz caemh ij miz aen dap sang fwdfwd he hwj ma riengz gij coh gyoengqraeuz. Yienghmwnq gij vunz raeuz caemh mbouj faensanq daengz ciqgyaiq gak dieg bae lo.”
Gajlaeng Yehhozvaz yawjraen gyoengq vunz neix cauh singz caeuq hwnq dap le,

de couh naeuz: “Ox! Gyoengqde dwg aen minzcuz he, caemh dwg gangj cungj vah he. Mbat neix gyoengqde cauh singz hwnq dap, cij ngamqngamq dwg gaihcij; baezneix gyoengqde ijsiengj guh hih saeh, mij'z naeuz guh mbouj daengz hih saeh lo.
Daeuj, daengj raeuz roengz bae gaujluenh gij vah gyoengqde bae, hawj gyoengqde miz geij cungj vah hwj, gyoengq dingq mbouj rox gyoengq he bae.”
Couh yienghneix, Yehhozvaz sawjhawj gyoengqde faensanq daengz ciqgyaiq gak dieg bae, guh hawj gyoengqde mbouj ndaej mbouj ngaiz dingz hwnq aen singz mwnq bae.
Aenvih Yehhozvaz youq mwnq gaujluenh gij vah gyoengq vunz mwnq, hawj gij vunz faensanq daengz ciqgyaiq gak dieg bae, yiengq couh heuh aen singz mwnq heuh Bahbez.
Laj neix dwg doengh daih gajlaeng Cenj.
Raemx dumh mbwn goq song bi le, Cenj ndaej bak bi mwhde, miz Yaqfazsaj.
Cenj miz Yaqfazsaj le, de vanzlij souh ndaej hajbak bi, caemh vanzlij miz lwg.
Yaqfazsaj ndaej samcib haj bi mwhde, miz Cahlah;
de miz Cahlah le, vanzlij souh ndaej seiqbak lingz sam bi, caemh vanzlij miz lwg.
Cahlah ndaej samcib bi mwhde, miz Hihbwz;
de miz Hihbwz le, vanzlij souh ndaej seiqbak lingz sam bi, caemh vanzlij miz lwg.
Hihbwz ndaej samcib seiq bi mwhde, miz Fazlwz;
de miz Fazlwz le, vanzlij souh ndaej seiqbak sam bi, caemh vanzlij miz lwg.
Fazlwz ndaej samcib bi mwhde, miz Lahnguz;
de miz Lahnguz le, vanzlij souh ndaej songbak lingz gouj bi, caemh vanzlij miz lwg.
Lahnguz ndaej samcib ngeih bi mwhde, miz Sihluz;
de miz Sihluz le, vanzlij souh ndaej songbak lingz caet bi, caemh vanzlij miz lwg.
Sihluz ndaej samcib bi mwhde, miz Nazhoq;
de miz Nazhoq le, vanzlij souh ndaej songbak bi, caemh vanzlij miz lwg.
Nazhoq ndaej ngeihcib gouj bi mwhde, miz Dahlah;
de miz Dahlah le, vanzlij souh ndaej itbak itcib gouj bi, caemh vanzlij miz lwg.
Dahlah daengz caetcib bi hih bi mwnq, gaenq miz sam daeglwg lo, couh dwg Yaqbwzlanz, Nazhoq caeuq Hahlanz.
Laj neix dwg Dahlah hih doengh daih gajlaeng de.
Dahlah miz Yaqbwzlanz, Nazhoq caeuq Hahlanz. Yiengq Hahlanz caiq miz Lozdwz
caeuq song dahlwg, couh dwg Mizgyah caeuq Hiqgyah.
Sajlaiz mij miz lwg, dwg mehmaen he.

Dahlah daiq daeglwg de Yaqbwzlanz caeuq daeglan de Lozdwz (Lozdwz couh dwg daeglwg Hahlanz) vanzlij miz mehbawx de Sajlaiz daj dieg Gyahlwzdij dih Uzwj Singz bae dieg Gyahnamz. Hoeng gyoengqde bae daengz Hahlanz Singz le, couh youq mwnq youq lo.
Dahlah souh ndaej songbak lingz haj bi; de rai youq Hahlanz.

Miz baez he, Yehhozvaz doiq Yaqbwzlanz naeuz: “Mwngz ij lizgaih bonjdeih mwngz, ndaw ranz bohmeh mwngz, caeuq gij caencik beixnuengx mwngz, bae mwnq he; yiengq daengz mwh he, gou swhmboujyienz naeuz mwngz ni mwnqlaw.

Gou gaengjdingq hawj mwngz miz lwg, miz lan, miz laenj, fatdad lailai hwj bienqbaenz aen guek hunghung he. Gou caemh ij soengq fuk hawj mwngz, hawj mwngz miz mingz, gij vunz caemh ndaej dajlaeng mwngz ndaej miz fuk.
Bouxlawz hoh fuk hawj mwngz hih, gou caemh hoh fuk hawj bouxlawz; bouxlawz mang mwngz hih, gou caemh mang bouxlawz. Lajmbwn sojmiz hih minzcuz cungj dwg dajlaeng mwngz ndaej miz fuk.”
Yiengq Yaqbwzlanz caemh ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq hih yienghmwnq bae guh lo;
vanzlij giqcuz byaij bae, bae daengz Siqgiemq hih mwnq Mozliq miz go faex hung he. Mwhmwnq gij vunz Gyahnamz vanzlij youq mwnq youq.

Youq mwnq Yehhozvaz yienh hawj Yaqbwzlanz raen, doiq de naeuz: “Yaqbwzlanz, gou ij dawz mwnq dieg neix soengq hawj doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz.” Yiengq, Yaqbwzlanz couh youq mwnq Yehhozvaz yienh hawj de raen hih mwnq caeb aen daiz dajbwiz he bwiz de docih de.

Gajlaeng Yaqbwzlanz caiq daj mwnq senj bae Bwzdwzliq hih mbiengj baixdoeng dih mwnq canhgih he dap bungz youq. Mwnq canhgih mwnq hih mbiengj baixsae dwg Bwzdwzliq, mbiengj baixdoeng dwg gaenh aen singz heuh Ngaiq he. De caiq youq mwnq caeb aen daiz dajbwiz he hawj Yehhozvaz, gingqbaiq Yehhozvaz.
Gajlaeng Yaqbwzlanz caiq baez mwnq baez mwnq yiengq baixnamz senj bae, bae daengz Gyahnamz hih mbiengj baixnamz mwnq gansauq mwnq.
Aenvih dieg Gyahnamz roeb daengz iekvangh gig youqgaenj, yiengq Yaqbwzlanz couh yiengq baixnamz bae, bae daengz dieg Ngaihgiz, youq mwnq camqciz youq.
Mwh gyoengqde ijvanh daengz Ngaihgiz hih mwhde, Yaqbwzlanz doiq mehyah de naeuz: “Gou rox mwngz dwg boux vunzbaz gyaeugyaeu ndeindei he.
Hauhnaeuz gij vunz Ngaihgiz rox naeuz mwngz dwg mehyah gou nex, gyoengqde couh ij ciengj aeu mwngz, couh dawz gou gajrai bae.
Yiengq mwngz couh ij naeuz gyoengqde ni naeuz mwngz dwg dahnuengx gou lah. Gyoengqde couh vih mwngz hwj doiq gou ndei, mbouj gaj gou lo.”
Gajlaeng cingqgawq luj de gangj gwhraix; mwh gyoengqde byaij daengz Ngaihgiz hih mwhde, gij vunz Ngaihgiz raen mehyah de gyaeu raixcaix.

Doenghheij daqcwnz goengjvuengz Ngaihgiz caemh raen de gig gyaeu, couh youq dangqnaj goengjvuengz haenh de, naeuz de gyaeu ij rai bae. Gajlaeng de couh ngaiz daiq haeuj ndaw vangzgungh bae laeng goengjvuengz lo.
Yiengq goengjvuengz caemh vih de hwj doiq Yaqbwzlanz gig ndei, soengq hawj Yaqbwzlanz baenxbienh cwzcwz, yiengzyiengz, lozdoz lozdoz, lawzgoeng, lawzmeh
Gajlaeng, Yehhozvaz vih goengjvuengz aeu mehyah Yaqbwzlanz, couh fad goengjvuengz, hawj de caeuq ndaw ranz de cungj baenz bingh hung.
couh baij vunz bae heuh Yaqbwzlanz daeuj, doiq de naeuz: “Mwngz vihmaz ij yienghneix doiq gou? Vihmaz mbouj naeuz gou ni de dwg mehyah mwngz nej?
Vihmaz ij naeuz de dwg dahnuengx mwngz nej? Guh hawj gou aeu de ma guh yah. Nex! Mehyah mwngz youq dineix; mwngz vaiqdi daiq de deuz!”
Gajlaeng goengjvuengz couh hawj gij vunz de gam Yaqbwzlanz caeuq mehyah de caeuq doenghheij hoiq de, boenq gyoengqde deuz, daiqlienz doenghheij doxgaiq de cungj hawj de dawz deuz liux.
Yiengq Yaqbwzlanz couh daiq mehyah de caeuq Lozdwz, daiqlienz de sojmiz hih cungj daj Ngaihgiz ok ma, bae Gyahnamz dih baixnamz.
Hoeng mwhneix, Yaqbwzlanz gaenq dwg boux fouqfouq mizmiz he lo, gimgim ngaenzngaenz cukseng cukseng cungj daixbaj.

Gajlaeng de caiq daj baixnamz baez mwnq baez mwnq yiengq Bwzdwzliq senj bae. Couh yienghneix, de senj ma daengz mwnq gaxgonq de youq mwnq dap bungz youq goq he, couh dwg mwnq Bwzdwzliq caeuq aen singz Ngaiq hih cungqgyan de,
caemh dwg de youq mwnq caeb aen daiz dajbwiz he hwj gingqbaiq Yehhozvaz hih mwnq.
Gaen Yaqbwzlanz ma hih Lozdwz caemh gag miz ndaw ranz de hih vunz caeuq vunzhoiq, daiqlienz baenxbienh cwzcwz yiengzyiengz.
Gajlaeng, aenvih song ranz de hih vunz hah, gyadangq hah cungj daiq lai lai,
Couh vih yienghneix, Yaqbwzlanz doiq Lozdwz naeuz: “Raeuz dwg beixnuengx hwj; mbouj ndaej doxceng nej! Daiqlienz gyoengq dajciengx mwngz caeuq gyoengq dajciengx gou cungj caemh mbouj ndaej doxceng.

Mboujyienz raeuz faengya sat lox. Manx dieg neix mbouj dwg youq dangqnaj mwngz maz? Mwngz ij senj aeu mwnqlaw cungj ndaej, youzcaih mwngz aiq. Mwngz senj aeu mbiengj gvaz, gou couh aeu mbiengj swix; mwngz senj aeu mbiengj swix, gou couh aeu mbiengj gvaz.”

Gajlaeng Lozdwz couh muenghyawj seiqhenz, yawjraen gij dieg henz dah Yozdanq fueng Sojwj mwnq, baenx doengh bingz bwdbwd, cix cumx cix ywnh, caenh luj aen suen Yehhozvaz, caemh luj gij dieg Ngaihgiz nwih. (Mwnq dieg neix ndaw de caemh miz Sojdohmaj caeuq Ngozmohlah; mwhde Yehhozvaz vanzlij mijyaengz cawz song aen singz neix.)
De raen yienghneix le, couh senj aeu mwnq dah Yozdanq hih manx dieg bingz bwdbwd mwnq, caemh senj bae baixdoeng he youq. Song boux de couh yienghneix doxfaen youq lo.
Yiengq Yaqbwzlanz couh youq dieg Gyahnamz youq; Lozdwz youq manx dieg miz cingzciq, bingz bwdbwd he, gaenh Sojdohmaj Singz he dap bungz hwj youq.
Hoeng, gij vunz Sojdohmaj youq ndaw lwgra Yehhozvaz dwg doegdoeg siebsieb he hih vunz.
Lozdwz caeuq Yaqbwzlanz doxfaen gak vunz gak youq le, Yehhozvaz doiq Yaqbwzlanz naeuz: “Yaqbwzlanz! Mwngz dajlwh mwnq mwngz youq hih, yiengq doeng sae namz baek bae yawj;
famzsoj mwngz yawjraen hih dieg, gou cungj ij nyok hawj mwngz caeuq doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz, caemh dwg yungjyenj nyok roengzbae.

Gou caemh ij hawj doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz lai luj gij boenqcingh lajdoem, geq cungj geq mbouj rox liux; miz byawz ndaej geq gij boenqcingh lajdoem liux nex, caemh ndaej geq doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz liux lo.”
De caiq naeuz: “Bae! Mwngz ij byaij gij dieg goqdoh bae, aenvih gou ij dawz dieg neix nyok hawj mwngz.”
Gajlaeng Yaqbwzlanz couh senj cangqbungz bae daengz mwnq Hihbwzlwnz dih boux heuh Manqliq he dih byozfaex mwnq bae youq. De caemh youq mwnq caeb aen daiz dajbwiz he hwj bwiz Yehhozvaz.
Mwh Amqlahfeih guh Siqnaz

seiq goengjvuengz neix doxgaep hwj daiq bing bae hoenx haj aen singz hih vuengz, couh dwg goengjvuengz Sojdohmaj, Bijlah; goengjvuengz Ngozmohlah, Bijcah; goengjvuengz Yazmaj, Siqnaz; goengjvuengz Sijbenj, Canqhijbez; caeuq goengjvuengz Bijlah. (Bijlah couh dwg Sojwj.)
Gyoengq bing haj goengjvuengz neix bae gumh Sihdingh doxcomz. (Gumh Sihdingh couh dwg Yienz Haij.)
Doengh goengjvuengz neix, gyoengqde ngaiz goeng Gihdaqlaujmaj guenjciq baenx cibngeih bi, hoeng daengz daixcibsam bi le, gyoengqde couh fanj hwnjdaeuj, mbouj fug de guenj.
Yiengq daengz daixcibseiq bi, goeng Gihdaqlaujmaj caeuq sam goengjvuengz caeuq de doxndei he couh daiq bing bae doxhoenx.
caiq daengz Sih'wj canhgih, caemh hoenx ndaej hingz gij vunz Hozliq cuz, vanzlij boenq gyoengqde bae daengz gaenh aen ndoi henz Ihlwz-Bahlanz mwnq.
Gajlaeng gyoengqde caiq ma daengz Anh-Mizbah (couh dwg Gyahdihswh) hoenx ndaej hingz gij vunz Yaqmajliz cuz, caeuq gij vunz Yaqmohliq cuz youq Hahsijsoenh-Dahmaj he, ciengj aeu gij dieg gyoengqde.
Yiengq goengjvuengz Sojdohmaj hah, Ngozmohlah hah, Yazmaj hah, Sijbenj hah, caeuq Bijlah hah, haj aen singz neix dih vuengz cungj daiq bing bae daengz gumh Sihdingh doxcomz hwj demq
Mwhmwnq, youq gumh Sihdingh dauqcawq cungj dwg baenx u baenx u lizcingh.
Yiengq, seiq goengjvuengz couh duet aeu Sojdohmaj caeuq Ngozmohlah song aen singz neix sojmiz hih doxgaiq caeuq haeux.
Ngamqluj mwhde, Lozdwz, daeglwg daeg nuengxau Yaqbwzlanz, youq Sojdohmaj Singz youq, sojhij daiqlienz de caeuq de sojmiz hih doxgaiq cungj caemh ngaiz gaemh ngaiz duet bae liux.

Gajlaeng, caeklaiq miz boux he ndaej deuz okma, bae naeuz Yaqbwzlanz ni gienh saeh neix. Mwhmwnq Yaqbwzlanz cingq youq laeng Manqliq dih byozfaex mwnq youq. (Manqliq dwg Yaqmohliq vunz he.) Manqliq caeuq Hijsizgoz caeuq Yaqnaij sam boux neix cungj dwg beixnuengx he; hauhnaeuz miz maz, gyoengqde caeuq Yaqbwzlanz cungj dwg gaep mbiengj he.

Yaqbwzlanz dingq naeuz Lozdwz ngaiz gaemh bae le, couh majcangq daiq gij vunzhoiq youq ndaw ranz de seng he, sambak itcib bet boux hauxseng ywnqlenq goq rox doxhoenx he, bae req gaen seiq goengjvuengz mwnq; gyoengqde itcig req bae daengz Danq.

Daengz Danq le, de couh caeuq gij vunz de domh lij singjngwnz, faen baenx geij buek hwj gunghoenx dizyinz, hoenx hwj dizyinz cungj riq deuz bae. Gajlaeng de vanzlij boenq gyoengqde, itcig boenq bae daengz Hozbaj. (Hozbaj dwg youq Daqmajswqgwz dih baixbaek he.)

De couh dawz sojmiz ngaiz ciengj bae hih doxgaiq cungj dued aeu ma boiz, caemh ndaej gouq daeglwg nuengxau de Lozdwz, daiqlienz gij vunzbaz hah, doenghheij vunz ngaiz gaemh bae he hah, caeuq de sojmiz dih doxgaiq, cungj caemh ndaej dued aeu dauqma boiz liux.
Mwh Yaqbwzlanz gunghoenx gyoengqde dauq ma hih mwhde, goengjvuengz Sojdohmaj daeuj daengz gumh Cahveih daeuj ciep de. (Gumh Cahveih couh dwg Gumh Vuengz.)
Caemh miz Mwzgihsijdwz, goengjvuengz Sajlaengj; Mwzgihsijdwz dwg goengjsae dajbwiz hawj gienz akak rengzrengz dih Cangqdiq he. De dawz bingj dawz laeuj buzdauz daeuj ciep de,
caemh hoh fuk hawj de naeuz: “Muengh boux cauh gwnzmbwn sojmiz hih caeuq cauh lajdeih sojmiz dih gienz akak rengzrengz dih Cangqdiq soengq fuk hawj mwngz!

Boux hawj mwngz hoenx ndaej hingz hih gienz akak rengzrengz dih Cangqdiq, wnggai haenh!” Gajlaeng Yaqbwzlanz couh dajlaeng bonjfaenh de dued ndaej aeu ma boiz hih doxgaiq, aeu cib faenh cih it daeuj soengq hawj Mwzgihsijdwz.
Gajlaeng goengjvuengz Sojdohmaj doiq Yaqbwzlanz naeuz: “Gij doxgaiq mwngz hoenx ndaej hingz ma hih cungj dwg gvi hawj mwngz; mwngz caenhgag hawj gij vunz gou hawj gou couh ndaej lo.”
Yiengq Yaqbwzlanz han de naeuz: “Gou yiengq Yehhozvaz boux cauh gwnzmbwn caeuq lajdeih sojmiz hih gienz akak rengzrengz dih Cangqdiq baujcingq,
famz dwg gij doxgaiq mwngz hih, mboujguenj dwg diuz mae cix ndaej, diuz caghaiz he cix ndaej, gou cungj mbouj aeu.
Goq gienh saeh neix le, Yaqbwzlanz lujnaeuz fangxngwnz yienghmwnq dingqri Yehhozvaz doiq de naeuz: “Yaqbwzlanz, mwngz gaejyungh lau; gou dangq baj doenqbaiz

Hoeng Yaqbwzlanz han naeuz: “Ceiq miz gienz dih Yehhozvaz hax! Gou daiq lwg cungj mbouj miz haem; mwngz ij nyok hawj gou guxmaz nex? Baezneix gij gyadangq gou cungj dwg ngaiz boux youq ndaw ranz gou Hijliqhijseq, vunz Daqmajswqgwz Singz, ciep aeu he lah.”
Yaqbwzlanz caiq naeuz: “Mwngz cungj mij hawj gou miz saek daeglwg haem, fanjcingq baezneix vanzlij dwg bouxhoiq youq ndaw ranz gou seng he ndaej ciep aeu gij gyadangq gou lah.”
Gajlaeng Yehhozvaz caiq doiq de naeuz: “Mij dwg law, boux mwnq mbouj ndaej ciep aeu gij gyadangq mwngz nej; ij dwg daeglwg mwngz caenseng he cij ndaej ciep aeu gij gyadangq mwngz lah.”

Yehhozvaz gangj daengz mwnqneix le, couh daiq Yaqbwzlanz ok rog bae, doiq de naeuz: “Hawjm'z muenghmuengh yawj gwnzmbwn lux, gij ndaundeiq gwnzmbwn bijhuzcih bae; mwngz geq ndaej liux haz?” De vanzlij naeuz: “Doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz baezneix caemh ij luj gij ndaundeiq gwnzmbwn yienghmwnq bijhuzcih bae, geq cungj geq mbouj rox liux.”
Yaqbwzlanz dingq daengz doenghgij vah neix le, couh sinq Yehhozvaz lo, yiengq Yehhozvaz couh yawj Yaqbwzlanz suenq boux hab'eiq habhoz de dih vunz hih lo.

Yehhozvaz vanzlij caiq doiq de naeuz: “Gou dwg Yehhozvaz; gou daiq mwngz daj mwnq Gyahlwzdij dih Uzwj mwnq dieg mwnq daeuj daengz dineix, couh dwg ij dawz gij dieg neix nyok hawj mwngz, hawj mwngz aeu ma guh gij gyadangq mwngz.”
Hoeng, Yaqbwzlanz dauq cam naeuz: “Ceiq miz gienz dih Yehhozvaz hax, gou ij baenzlawz rox gou ij ndaej gij dieg neix nej?”

Yehhozvaz dingq de yienghneix cam de le, couh raengq de naeuz: “Mwngz couh aeu duz cwzcoh ndaej sam bi he, duz yiengzbyacoh ndaej sam bi he, duz menzyiengzdaeg ndaej sam bi he, duz roegraeu he caeuq duz roegguqgaplwg he daeuj laeng gou dineix.”

Gajlaeng Yaqbwzlanz caemh ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq hih yienghmwnq dawz doengh duz neix bae lo, dawz bae buq faen song mbiengj hwj, mbiengj caeuq mbiengj doxdoiq baij ndei. Cawz duz roeg mbouj buq, sojmiz hih cungj buq liux lo.
Sawqmwh miz roegga mbin roengzdaeuj, ndwn youq gij noh doengh duz buq faen song mbiengj mwnq. Yaqbwzlanz raen le, couh aux doengh duz de deuz.
Yiengq daengz gyangjngoenz ijvanh doek mwhde, Yaqbwzlanz couh ralaep ndaek fwjfwq lo. Sawqmwh lujnaeuz miz ndaek cungj laep saengxsaengx hawj vunz roxnginh yum he guem youq gwnz ndang Yaqbwzlanz.

Couh youq mwhneix, Yehhozvaz couh doiq Yaqbwzlanz naeuz: “Mwngz ijaeu rox, doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz ij ngaiz doz youq vaihdieg youq, caemh ij ngaiz guh hoiq gij vunz dieg mwnq, caemh ngaiz gij vunz dieg mwnq yawj mbouj hwnj, souh haemz souh hoj baenx seiqbak bi.
Hoeng, gou gaengjdingq ij fad, fad gij vunz dieg mwnq hawj gyoengqde guh hoiq hih; doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz gaengjdingq ndaej daiq baenx haujlai haujlai cienzcaiz daj mwnq okma.
Mwngz nej, mwngz gaengjdingq ndaej souhyienz raixcaix, caemh dwg bingzbingz an'an rai gvaqseiq.
Doenghgij lwglwg lanlan mwngz, daengz daixseiq daih, couh dwg naeuz goq seiqbak bi le,
Gyangjngoenz doek le, mbwn laep cupcup liux. Sawqmwh, miz ndaek aen luzfeiz oenq ngaujngauq he caeuq foekfeiz dawz yiegyieg he dajlwh cungqgyan gij noh baij doxdoiq mwnq goq bae.
Couh youq mwhneix, Yehhozvaz youq mwnq doiq Yaqbwzlanz baujcingq naeuz: “Gou dawz mwnq dieg neix nyok hawj doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz, couh dwg dajlwh diuz dah Ngaihgiz
daiqlienz gij dieg gij vunz Gihniz cuz hah, gij dieg gij vunz Gihnizsij cuz hah, gij dieg gij vunz Gyazmohniz cuz hah,
gij dieg gij vunz Hwz cuz hah, gij dieg gij vunz Bijliqsij cuz hah, gij dieg gij vunz Liqfazyimh cuz hah,
gij dieg gij vunz Yaqmohliq cuz hah, gij dieg gij vunz Gyahnamz cuz hah, gij dieg gij vunz Gwzgyahsaj cuz caeuq gij dieg gij vunz Yehbuqswh cuz hah,
Mehyah Yaqbwzlanz Sajlaiz mij seng saek boux lwg hawj de. Sajlaiz miz dahhoiq he heuh Yaqgyaz, dwg Ngaihgiz vunz he.

Miz baez he, Sajlaiz doiq Yaqbwzlanz naeuz: “Giqyienz Yehhozvaz mij hawj gou miz lwg, hawj gou maen vwz, gou couh gouz mwngz caeuq dahhoiq gou ninz bax! Saekseiz de lij ndaej seng lwg hawj gou haem.” Yiengq Yaqbwzlanz caemh dungziq gij cawjeiq mehyah de.
Gajlaeng Sajlaiz couh hawj dahhoiq de hawj Yaqbwzlanz guh yahnoix. (Mwhmwnq Yaqbwzlanz gaenq youq dieg Gyahnamz youq baenx cib bi lo).
Couh yienghneix, Yaqbwzlanz couh caeuq Yaqgyaz ninz; ninz le, Yaqgyaz couh mizndang lo. Yiengq de rox bonjfaenh de mizndang le, couh yawj mbouj hwnj meh cawjranz de.

Sajlaiz raen yienghneix le, couh ienq Yaqbwzlanz aeu, naeuz: “Mwngz huh, dwg mwngz mbouj deng; dahhoiq neix cij yawj mbouj hwnj gou. Gou hawj de hawj mwngz guh yahnoix; de rox bonjfaenh de mizndang le, couh yawj mbouj hwnj gou. Gou muengh Yehhozvaz daeuj buenq gij saeh neix, dwg mwngz deng haj cixnaeuz dwg gou deng.”

Gajlaeng, Yaqbwzlanz han de naeuz: “Dahhoiq dwg dahhoiq mwngz, youz mwngz guenj; mwngz haenj baenzlawz guenj couh baenzlawz guenj, caih mwngz aiq.” Couh vih yienghneix, Sajlaiz couh gaihcij doiq de mbouj ndei, yawj de ngawz, yiengq Yaqgyaz caemh vih yienghneix hwj deuz okbae lo.
Gajlaeng Yehhozvaz de yienh ok luj bouxcai
Raen le, cam de naeuz: “Yaqgyaz, dahhoiq Sajlaiz, mwngz daj mwnqlaw daeuj lah? Ij bae mwnqlaw lah?”
Yaqgyaz han naeuz: “Gou dajlaeng mehcawj gou mwnq deuz okdaeuj lah.”
Gajlaeng bouxcai neix doiq de naeuz: “Mwngz ij doiqyungz maj laeng mehcawj mwngz mwnq bae, ij fug de guenj cij ndaej.”
Bouxcai neix caiq doiq de naeuz: “Gou caemh ij hawj doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz fat lailai hwj hanz geq cungj geq mbouj rox liux bae.”
Bouxcai neix vanzlij caiq naeuz: “Hawjm'z yawj lux, mwngz seizneix gaenq mizndang lo; baezneix mwngz gaengjdingq seng miz daeglwg he. Mwngz ij an coh hawj de heuh Hijsizmajliq,
Daeglwg mwngz, baezneix gij singqheiq de mbouj ndei; de caeuq vunz mbouj doxhuz, vunz caemh caeuq de mbouj huz. De caeuq gij beixnuengx de mbouj doxndei, gag youq mwnq he youq.”

Yaqgyaz dingq daengz doenghgij vah neix le, couh doeksaet hwj naeuz: “Ox! Gou youq dineix ndaej cingqcaen raen baixlaeng boux yawj caeuq cauqguq gou hih Cangqdiq!” Gajlaeng de cungj dwg heuh Yehhozvaz heuh guh ‘yawj caeuq cauqguq gou dih Cangqdiq.’
Couh vih yienghneix, gij vunz couh heuh aen cingj neix heuh Biqwj-Lahhaijlaiz.
Gajlaeng Yaqgyaz seng daeglwg he hawj Yaqbwzlanz. Yaqbwzlanz couh an coh hawj daeglwg neix heuh Hijsizmajliq.
Yaqgyaz seng daeglwg neix hih mwhde, Yaqbwzlanz ndaej betcib roek bi.

Yaqbwzlanz ndaej goujcib gouj bi mwhde, Yehhozvaz yienh hawj de raen, doiq de naeuz: “Gou dwg akak rengzrengz cauh gwnzmbwn caeuq lajdeih sojmiz hih gaiqgaiq cungj ndaej guh daengz dih Cangqdiq. Mwngz ijaeu dingq gou gaen gou, ij guh boux vunz cix soh cix lauxsaed he.
Yiengq gou couh dingh gij he hawj mwngz, couh dwg hawj doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz fat lailai hwj hwngqhwngq seiqseiq bae.”
Yaqbwzlanz dingq daengz dineix le, couh bomz roengz doem bae sax de. Cangqdiq caiq naeuz:
“Gou dingh hawj mwngz hih couh dwg: Mwngz ndaej guh baenx haujlai haujlai aen minzcuz dih cojgoeng.
Daj seizneix doxbae, gij coh mwngz mbouj caiq heuh Yaqbwzlanz laem lo; ij gaij coh heuh Yaqbwzlahhanj

Cangqdiq youhcaiq naeuz: “Gou gaengjdingq ij hawj doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz fatdad lailai hwj, hwngqhwngq seiqseiq bienqbaenz haujlai haujlai aen minzcuz. Doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz caemh miz vunz dang vuengz.

Gou caemh ij yiengq mwngz caeuq doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz baujcingq; gij baujcingq neix dwg cien nienz fanh daih cungj mbouj bienq he, couh dwg gou ij guh Cangqdiq mwngz caeuq Cangqdiq doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz.

Mwnq dieg mwngz seizneix doz youq he, couh dwg baenx cenz Gyahnamz hih dieg, gou caemh ij nyok hawj mwngz caeuq nyok hawj doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz, hawj faenhsou ndaej yungjyenj aeu ma guh gyadangq; gou caemh dwg Cangqdiq gyoengqde.”
Cangqdiq youhcaiq doiq Yaqbwzlahhanj naeuz: “Mwngz caeuq doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz ijaeu hengz gou dingh hawj faenhsou hih,
couh dwg faenhsou sojmiz hih vunzsai cungj ij gozlij; gij neix couh dwg gou caeuq mwngz caeuq doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz dingh hih gveihdingq.
Faenhsou cungj ij ngaiz gozlij; gij neix couh dwg geiqhauh gou yiengq faenhsou soj baujcingq dih baengzgawq.

Seiqseiq daihdaih sojmiz hih vunzsai, mboujguenj dwg youq ndaw ranz seng hih cixnaeuz dwg aeu ngaenz daj rog cawx ma hih, fanjcingq ngamq seng okdaeuj ndaej daengz daixbet ngoenz hih, cungj ij ngaiz gozlij.
Youq ndaw ranz seng he caeuq aeu ngaenz cawx ma he cungj ij ngaiz gozlij; yienghneix, couh youq gwnz ndang faenhsou miz geiqhauh, geiqhauh

Hoeng, gij vunzsai mbouj gozlij hih couh mbouj suenq aen minzcuz mwngz dih vunz. Mbouj danhcij naeuz yienghneix, vanzlij caiq ngaiz boenq deuz, mbouj hawj de dep, aenvih de mbouj soenhsouj gij gveihdingq gou.”
Cangqdiq vanzlij caiq doiq Yaqbwzlahhanj naeuz: “Mwngz mbouj ndaej caiq heuh mehyah mwngz heuh Sajlaiz laem lo; gou ij gaij coh hawj de heuh Sajlah lo.

Gou caemh ij soengq fuk hawj de, hawj de seng daeglwg he hawj mwngz; doengh daih gajlaeng de caemh fat lai hwj bienqbaenz haujlai haujlai aen minzcuz. Doengh daih gajlaeng de caemh miz vunz dang vuengz.”

Dingq daengz neij le, Yaqbwzlahhanj couh bomz roengz doem bae sax de, caemh caegcaeg riu, ndaw sim de gag naemj: “Bak bi hih vunz laux cungj lij ndaej miz lwg haj? Sajlah gaenq ndaej goujcib bi lo, vanzlij ndaej seng lwg haj?”
couh doiq Cangqdiq naeuz: “Gou naemj, vanzlij dwg mwngz lai soengq fuk hawj Hijsizmajliq suenq lo.”
Hoeng, Cangqdiq dauq han naeuz: “Mbouj hah! Mehyah mwngz gaengjdingq ndaej seng daeglwg he hawj mwngz; mwngz caemh ij an coh hawj de heuh Hijsaj.

Gangj naeuz Hijsizmajliq, gou caemh dapwngq mwngz, dapwngq mwngz soengq fuk hawj de, hawj de miz cibngeih daeglwg. Cibngeih daeglwg neix caemh dwg ndaej dang vuengz, doengh daih gajlaeng de caemh ndaej fatdad lailai hwj bienqbaenz aen guek hunghung he.
Hoeng gou naeuz mwngz ni hax, daengz bimoq hih mwhneix, Sajlah gaengjdingq seng Hijsaj hawj mwngz. Gou caeuq mwngz soj dingh hih caemh dwg caeuq Hijsaj dingh hih.”
Cangqdiq gangj doenghgij vah neix sat le, couh bae lo.

Couh youq ngoenz mwnq, Yaqbwzlahhanj couh ciuq Cangqdiq raengq hih yienghmwnq bae guh; de hawj daeglwg de Hijsizmajliq caeuq ndaw gyahcuz de sojmiz hih vunzsai, mboujguenj dwg youq ndaw ranz de seng haj cixnaeuz aeu ngaenz cawx ma hih, cungj ij gozlij.
Mwh Yaqbwzlahhanj gozlij mwhde, de ndaej goujcib gouj bi.
Mwh Hijsizmajliq gozlij mwhde, de ndaej cibsam bi. Couh yienghneix, ndaw ranz Yaqbwzlahhanj sojmiz hih vunzsai, mboujguenj dwg youq ndaw ranz de seng haj cixnaeuz aeu ngaenz cawx ma he hih,
Miz ngoenz he, mwh ceiq ndit ceiq hwngq hih mwhde, Yehhozvaz youq byozfaex hung Manqliq mwnq yienh hawj Yaqbwzlahhanj raen. Mwhde Yaqbwzlahhanj dwg naengh youq bakdou cangqbungz he.

De sawqmwh ngiengx raeuj hwnjdaeuj, yawjraen miz sam boux vunzsai ndwn youq doiqmienh de, yiengq de couh nyungjnyat riq goqbae coh gyoengqde. Daengz dangqnaj gyoengqde le, couh bomz roengz doem bae sax gyoengqde,
naeuz: “Bouxcawj gou hax, gou dwg bouxhoiq mwngz. Danghnaeuz mwngz yawj ndaej hwnj gou nex, couh cingj mwngz youq dineix;
daengj gou, bouxhoiq mwngz, bae aeu di raemx ma hawj faenhsou swiqswiq ha,
Gou caiq dawz di gij gw he daeuj hawj faenhsou gw; hawj faenhsou gw le haemq miz singjsaenz byaij roen. Faenhsou giqyienz daeuj daengz gou, bouxhoiq mwngz neij lo, couh hawj gou daih faenhsou bax.”
Gyoengqde dingq le, couh han naeuz: “Ndaej hah, couh ciuq mwngz gangj hih yienghmwnq bax.”
Yiengq Yaqbwzlahhanj couh vaiqdi nyungjnyat riq haeuj cangqbungz maj doiq Sajlah naeuz: “Mwngz vaiqdi aeu samcib gaen
De naeuz gawq neix sat le, youhcaiq riq haeuj lanz cwz bae, genj aeu duz cwzlwg ceiq biz ceiq oiq he ma hawj bouxhoiq de gaj hwj loengh byaek.
Loengh ndaej le, Yaqbwzlahhanj caemh dawz niuznaij hah, naijsoemj hah, caeuq noh cwzlwg hah daeuj hawj gyoengqde gw. Gyoengqde gw mwhde, bonjfaenh de ndwn youq laj go faex henz gyoengqde,
Gajlaeng, gyoengqde cam de naeuz: “Mehyah mwngz nej?”
De han naeuz: “Ox, de youq ndaw cangqbungz.”
Yiengq ndaw sam boux mwnq miz boux he naeuz: “Daengz bimoq hih mwhneix, gou gaengjdingq caiq daeuj laeng mwngz dineix. Daengz mwhmwnq, mehyah mwngz gaengjdingq ndaej seng miz daeglwg he.”
Mwh boux mwnq gangj gawq vah neix hih mwhde, Sajlah couh ndwn youq baixlaeng boux mwnq hih bakdou cangqbungz, de caemh dingqri gawq vah neix.
Gizsaed, Yaqbwzlahhanj caeuq Sajlah cungj laux ladlad liux lo; Sajlah ndwennaengz daeuj hih gij doxgaiq mwnq cungj caemh senqsi cix dingz lo.
Yiengq de dingqri boux mwnq gangj gij vah neix le, couh caegcaeg riungoemx hwj gag naeuz: “Gou caeuq goeng gou cungj caet laux bat nyangq liux lo, hoeng cungj lij miz cungj saeh ndei neix hwj haz?”
Gajlaeng, Yehhozvaz doiq Yaqbwzlahhanj naeuz: “Sajlah vihmaz ij caeg riungoemx naeuz: ‘Gou cungj laux ladlad liux lo; dangqcaen lij ndaej miz lwg haem haj?’ cungj vah neijx?

Nanzdauh faenhsou mbouj rox, gou, Yehhozvaz, nwj miz naeuz miz gij saeh gou guh mbouj daengz he haj? Daengz bimoq hih mwhneix, gou bietdingh daeuj dineix; daengz mwhmwnq, Sajlah baenzbaenz cungj seng miz daeglwg he.”
Sajlah dingqri doengh gawq vah neix le, cungj simvueng hwj mbouj nginh naeuz bonjfaenh de caeg riu; de naeuz: “Gou mij riu nej!”
Hoeng, Yehhozvaz naeuz: “Mij riu! Mwngz mingzmingz riu hwhlweng, lij naeuz mij riu.”
Gajlaeng sam boux mwnq couh ij bae Sojdohmaj Singz, Yaqbwzlahhanj caemh soengq gyoengqde bae duenh roen he. Bae daengz mwnq yawj roengzbae ndaej raen Sojdohmaj he le,
Yehhozvaz ndaw hoz de gag naeuz: “Gou mbouj siengj muenz Yaqbwzlahhanj, mbouj siengj muenz de gou ijvanh guh hih saeh,
aenvih gou ij hawj Yaqbwzlahhanj hih doengh daih gajlaeng de bienqbaenz aen minzcuz youh hung youh giengz he; gou caemh sawjhawj lajmbwn aen'aen minzcuz cungj dwg dajlaeng de ndaej miz fuk.

Gou senj de, dwg ij hawj de songyauq gij lwglan doengh daih gajlaeng de, hawj gyoengqde dingq gij vah gou, guh vunz ndei vunz soh; yienghneix gou couh ndaej hengz gou caeuq Yaqbwzlahhanj soj dingh he lo.”

Yehhozvaz de gag gangj daengz dineix le, couh doiq Yaqbwzlahhanj naeuz: “Gou dingqri miz haujlai haujlai vunz gauqsoq naeuz gij vunz Sojdohmaj caeuq gij vunz Ngozmohlah doegdoeg siebsieb hih vah lo, gij coih gyoengqde gig yiemzcungq.
Seizneix gou couh ij roengz bae yawjyawj, yawjyawj gyoengqde dwg mbouj dwg luj gij vunz gauq naeuz hih yienghmwnq. Hauhnaeuz mbouj dwg, gou swhmboujyienz gag rox.”
Yehhozvaz yienghneix gangj le, linghvaih hih song boux mwnq couh yiengq Sojdohmaj byaij bae lo, hoeng, Yehhozvaz vanzlij dwg ndwn youq dangqnaj Yaqbwzlahhanj.
Yiengq, Yaqbwzlahhanj couh byaij bae dep de cam naeuz:

Yiengq, hauhnaeuz ndaw singz mwnq miz hajcib boux vunz ndei nex, mwngz cungj ij cawz aen singz mwnq sojmiz hih vunz bae haz? Mwngz mbouj vih ndaw singz mwnq miz hajcib boux vunz ndei hwj nyiuz ndaw singz mwnq sojmiz hih vunz, mbouj cawz aen singz mwnq haj?

Gouz mwngz gaejyungh dawz vunz ndei caeuq vunz rwix cungj itheij gaj veiq! Vunz ndei caeuq vunz rwix cungj gaj nex, couh dwg naeuz ndei yak cungj mbouj faen lo; mwngz gaengjdingq mbouj veiq yienghneix guh hih, mbouj dwg haz? Aenvih mwngz dwg boux saemjbuenq baenx cenz lajmbwn he, guh hih saeh caemh dwg goengbingz he, mij dwg maz?”
Gajlaeng, Yehhozvaz han naeuz: “Hauhnaeuz gou youq ndaw aen Sojdohmaj Singz raen miz hajcib boux vunz ndei nex, gou couh vih gyoengqde hwj nyiuz ndaw singz mwnq sojmiz hih vunz mbouj gaj.”
Yiengq Yaqbwzlahhanj caiq naeuz: “Bouxcawj gou hax! Gou gannaeuz dwg boux yawj mbouj hwnj ra he hih vunz lah, hoeng, gou vanzlij mbeihung hwj caiq cam mwngz.
Hauhnaeuz ndaw singz mwnq ngamq miz seiqcib haj boux vunz ndei lah, yiengq mwngz caemh ij vih noix bae haj boux vunz ndei hwj cawz ndaw singz mwnq sojmiz hih vunz laj?”
Yehhozvaz dingq le, han de naeuz: “Hauhnaeuz gou youq ndaw singz mwnq ndaej raen miz seiqcib haj boux vunz ndei nex, gou couh mbouj cawz ndaw singz mwnq sojmiz hih vunz.”
Yiengq, Yaqbwzlahhanj youhcaiq cam naeuz: “Bouxcawj gou hax! Hauhnaeuz ndaw singz mwnq cij miz seiqcib boux lah nej, baenzlawz yiengh?”
De caiq han naeuz: “Vih seiqcib boux mwnq, gou caemh mbouj cawz ndaw singz mwnq sojmiz hih vunz lo.”

Yaqbwzlahhanj dingq le, couh doiq Yehhozvaz naeuz: “Bouxcawj gou hax, gou vanzlij caiq cam mwngz, gouz mwngz gaejyungh fatheiq gou; gou vanzlij ij caiq cam mwngz, hauhnaeuz caenhgag miz samcib boux lah nej?”
Yehhozvaz youhcaiq han naeuz: “Hauhnaeuz miz samcib vunz nex, gou caemh mbouj cawz aen singz mwnq sojmiz hih vunz.”
Yaqbwzlahhanj youhcaiq naeuz: “Bouxcawj gou hax! Gouz mwngz gaejyungh aeuqheiq gou baenxlai mbeihung caiq cam mwngz, hauhnaeuz cijngamq miz ngeihcib vunz nej?”
De vanzlij caiq han naeuz: “Cijngamq miz ngeihcib vunz gou caemh mbouj cawz aen singz mwnq sojmiz hih vunz.”
Yaqbwzlahhanj vanzlij caiq naeuz: “Bouxcawj gou hax! Gou caiq gouz mwngz gaejyungh fatheiq gou, nyiuz gou youhcaiq cam mwngz mbat laem, hauhnaeuz caenhgag miz cib boux vunz ndei lah nej?”
Yehhozvaz youhcaiq han de naeuz: “Yiengq gou couh vih cib boux vunz ndei mwnq hwj mbouj cawz aen singz mwnq sojmiz hih vunz.”
Yehhozvaz gangj doenghgij vah neix sat le, couh bae lo. Yaqbwzlahhanj caemh gag maj ranz de lo.
Song bouxcai caeuq Yehhozvaz doxbiek bae Sojdohmaj hih song boux mwnq, gyoengqde yiengqhaemh bae daengz Sojdohmaj Singz. Gyoengqde daengz hih mwhde,
naeuz: “Goengjau hax, cingj faenhsou bae laeng gou, swiqswiq ha, youq haemh yietyietbaeg bax. Daengz haetcog menhcij caiq ganjroen bax.”
Yiengq song bouxcai mwnq han naeuz: “Mbouj hoh, raeuz youq doengh rogn'x youq haemh ndaej lo.”
Hoeng, Lozdwz caenhrox hah caenhrox hah gyoengqde le, gyoengqde cij haeuj ranz Lozdwz bae. Lozdwz couh loengh haeux loengh byaek gauj gij bingj mij fat goq he hawj gyoengqde gw, daih gyoengqde.
Daengz mwh gyoengqde ijvanh hwnj congz ninz hih mwhde, Sojdohmaj Singz sojmiz hih vunzsai, mboujguenj bouxlaux lwgngez, cungj daeuj veiz aen ranz Lozdwz,

hemq Lozdwz naeuz: “Lozdwz, Lozdwz! Song boux haemhneix daeuj ndaw ranz mwngz mwnq nej, youq mwjlaw lah? Mwngz vaiqdi daiq song boux de okdaeuj; gyoengqraeuz siengj gaemh song boux de, ej song boux de!”
Lozdwz dingqri gyoengq vunz yienghneix hemq le, couh hoi dou ok daeuj, caemh doq majcangq gven aen dou de,
couh doiq gyoengq vunz naeuz: “Gak boux beixnuengx hax, cingj faenhsou ciengeiz gaej guh gij saeh yienjcik yienjgienq neix!

Gou miz song dah lwgsau mijyaengz ok haq haem; gou hawj song dah de ok daeuj, youzcaih faenhsou ij baenzlawz baenjbot cungj ndaej lo, cijaeu faenhsou mbouj daeuj cimyex song bouxhek neix couh ndaej lo. Giqyienz song boux de daeuj daengz laeng gou neij, gou couh ij baujhuq gyoengqde.”

Hoeng, gij vunz Sojdohmaj engqgya haep Lozdwz naeuz: “Deuz! Deuz! Mwngz suenq guxmaz nex! Ndaeknyab vunz vaihguek daeuj mwnqn'x doz youq he hih lah! Hoeng, ijsiengj daeuj cijveih raeuz lah! Yaxq! Yaep gyoengqraeuz cungj uj hawjm'z mouyou bae, beij song boux mwnq vanzlij camj bae.” Gyoengqde yienghneix gangj le, couh doq bae nyoengx Lozdwz, siengj mboengj dou haeuj bae.
Couh youq mwhneix, song bouxcai mwnq iet fawz okdaeuj rag dawz Lozdwz haeuj ranz maj, couh doq haephak dou.

Rag haeujmaj le, song boux de caiq loengh ndaek cungj myigmyiengz he hwj hawj gij vunzsai dauqrog dou he, mboujguenj bouxlaux lwgngez, cungj ngaiz ralwenq hwj yawj mbouj raen saek yiengh, mo bae mo dauq, cungj mo mbouj raen aen dou youq dilaw.

Gajlaeng song boux mwnq cam Lozdwz naeuz: “Youq ndaw singz neix mwngz miz maz vunz laem hah? Miz lwgmbauq, lwgsau, lwggwiz, cixnaeuz miz maz caencik beixnuengx laem lwi? Hauhnaeuz miz nex, couh vaiqdi daiq gyoengqde deuz ok aen singz neix bae bax,

aenvih Yehhozvaz gaenq dingqri gij vunz gauq naeuz aen singz neix gij vunz he baenxlai vaih, guh gij saeh yienjcik yienjgienq he lo. Vih yienghneix de baij raeuz daeuj dineix cawz aen singz neix sojmiz hih vunz bae, sojhij raeuz couh ij cawz aen singz neix bae lo.”

Lozdwz dingq le, couh bae naeuz song daeg ijvanh aeu song dah lwgsau de mwnq ni, naeuz: “Faenhsou vaiqdi deuz ok aen singz neix bae! Yehhozvaz ijvanh cawz aen singz neix lo!” Hoeng, song daeg de naemqnaeuz de gangjriu gaijmbwq lah.

Daengz ranzrongh le, bouxcai couh ci Lozdwz naeuz: “Vaiqdi! Vaiqdi! Vaiqdi daiq mehyah mwngz caeuq song dah lwgsau mwngz deuz ok aen singz neix bae, mienxndaej faenhsou ngaiz rai gaen gajlaeng hangx aen singz neix!”

Hoeng, Lozdwz yaepyaep yuekyuek siengj bae caiq mbouj siengj bae, cungj mboujyaengz siengj doeng, yiengq song bouxcai mwnq, couh vih Yehhozvaz cojgvaq Lozdwz, couh rag dawz gij fawz Lozdwz caeuq mehyah de caeuq song dahlwg de, ep gyoengqde deuz ok aen singz mwnq.

Deuz daengz rog singz le, bouxcai couh doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou vaiqdi deuzmingh bax! Mbouj ndaej ngeux yawj dauqlaeng, caemh mbouj ndaej dingz youq mwnq bingz he; ij deuz hwnj bya bae cij ndaej, mijn'x faenhsou caemh ngaiz gaenhangx rai vwq.”
Hoeng Lozdwz dauq gouz song boux de naeuz: “Bouxcawj gou hax, gouz mwngz gaejyungh yienghneix!

Mwngz giqyienz bang gou, gouq diuz mingh gou, mwngz couh gaejyungh hawj gou deuz bae baenq gyae. Hawjm'z yawj hux, aen bya mwnq daiq gyae huh; hoengjlau gou cungj mijyaengz deuz bae daengz haem, cungj ngaiz rai huh.”

De caiq naeuz: “Hawjm'z yawj lux, mwnq miz aen mbanj iq he, liz dineix caiq gaenh, deuz bae daengz caiq ndaej vaiq. Hawj gou deuz bae aen mbanj mwnq bax! Aen mbanj mwnq cix iq; cijaeu mwngz mbouj cawz aen de, gou deuz bae daengz mwnq couh ndaej baux diuz mingh gou lo.”
Yiengq, bouxcai han de naeuz: “Yiengq couh yiengq bax! Gou dapwngq mwngz, mbouj cawz aen mbanj mwnq.
Yiengq mwngz vaiq riq vaiq deuz bax! Mwngz mijyaengz ndaej riq deuz bae daengz mwnq, gou couh gijmaz cungj mbouj ndaej guh.” (Gajlaeng aen mbanj iq mwnq couh heuh Sojwj;
Couh yienghneix, Lozdwz deuz bae daengz Sojwj. Deuz bae daengz hih mwhde, gyangjngoenz gaenq hwnj lo.
Sawqmwh, Yehhozvaz daj gwnzmbwn coengq liuzvangz caeuq feiz roengz Sojdohmaj caeuq Ngozmohlah song mwnq neix bae,

dawz song aen singz neix caeuq ndaw singz sojmiz hih vunz, daiqlienz seiqhenz song aen singz neix dih bingzyienz caeuq ndaw bingzyienz soj hwnj hih doenghgo cungj cenzbuq byaeu liux, it go cungj mij lw, it boux cungj mij lauq,
daiqlienz mehyah Lozdwz byaij gajlaeng baex ngeux dauqlaeng baex yawj he hih lah, cungj ngaiz bienqbaenz diuz saeu gyu he lo.
Yiengq Yaqbwzlahhanj nej, de gag maj ranz de le, daengz haet daixsam daihcaeux, de hwnq le, couh bae daengz de gaxgonq ndwn youq dangqnaj Yehhozvaz hih mwnq.
De yawj roengz Sojdohmaj caeuq Ngozmohlah song mwnq neix, caeuq seiqhenz sojmiz hih dieg bae, yawjraen doengh mwnq neix cungj hoenz loedloed, guemjluemz bae, lujnaeuz oenq yiuz nwih.
Mwh Cangqdiq ij byaeu song mwnq dieg neix hih mwhde, de siengj daengz Yaqbwzlahhanj, vih Yaqbwzlahhanj hwj hawj Lozdwz deuz ok aen singz de ij byaeu he bae, hawj Lozdwz ndaej baux mingh.
Lozdwz mbouj gamj youq Sojwj youq, couh daiq song dahlwg de buen hwnj bya bae, youq conghgamj youq.
Gajlaeng dahlwg daeuz de doiq dahlwg iq de naeuz: “Nuengx hax, daxboh raeuz gaenq laux liux lo, dieg neix caemh aiq mij vunzsai daeuj aeu raeuz maj guh yah luh.
Daeuj, daengj raeuz aeu laeuj hawj daxboh gw; hawj de gw fiz le, raeuz couh caeuq de ninz. Ninz le, raeuz couh ndaej dajlaeng daxboh miz lwg, hawj de miz daih gajlaeng hwj mbouj ngaiz cied lo.”

De yienghneix gangj le, couh youq haemh mwnq, song dah de couh aeu laeuj hawj daxboh de gw, hawj de gw fiz bae. Yiengq, dahlwg daeuz de couh caeuq de ninz. Hoeng, Lozdwz cungj fiz hwj moengx cwenxcwenx liux, mij rox nginhngvanh dahlwg de baenzlawz caeuq de ninz.

Yiengq daengz ngoenz daixngeih, dahlwg daeuz de caiq doiq dahlwg iq de naeuz: “Haemhlwenz gou gaenq caeuq daxboh ninz lo. Haemhneix raeuz caiq hawj daxboh gw laeuj. Hawj de gw fiz le, mwngz couh bae caeuq de ninz. Yiengq raeuz couh ndaej dajlaeng daxboh miz lwg, hawj de ndaej miz doengh daih gajlaeng mbouj ngaiz cied.”

Couh yienghneix, haemh mwnq song dah de caiq hawj daxboh de gw laeuj. Hawj de gw fiz le, dahlwg iq de couh bae caeuq daxboh de ninz. De caemh fiz hwj moengx cwenxcwenx, mij rox nginhngvanh dahlwg de baenzlawz caeuq de ninz.
Gajlaeng, song dahlwg Lozdwz cungj dajlaeng de ndaej hwnjndang.
Dahlwg daeuz seng miz daeglwg he, an coh hawj de heuh Mohyaz.
Dahlwg iq caemh seng daeglwg he, an coh hawj de heuh Benq-Yaqmij.
Gajlaeng, Yaqbwzlahhanj caiq
Youq mwnq youq le, de doiq gij vunz mwnq naeuz mehyah de Sajlah dwg dahnuengx de lah. Yiengq goengjvuengz Gihlah'wj Yaqbijmijlwz

Yiengq miz ngwnz he, Cangqdiq hawj goengjvuengz Gihlah'wj Yaqbijmijlwz fangxngwnzloq; youq ndaw loq Cangqdiq doiq de naeuz: “Mwngz hax, hab rai luh! Mwngz aeu ma hih dah vunzbaz mwnq hax, de gaenq miz gvan lo.”
Aenvih Yaqbijmijlwz mijyaengz ndaej yaek haeuj laeng dah de bae haem, sojlaiz de couh doiq Cangqdiq naeuz:

Cangqdiq caiq youq ndaw loq han de naeuz: “Gou rox hah, gou rox mwngz guh hih gienh saeh neix dwg doiq ndaej hwnj liengzsim hah, sojlaiz gou cij mij hawjm'z yaek haeuj laeng dah de bae, caemh mij ngaiz daekcoih daengz gou.

Seizneix mwngz ij daiq dah mwnq maj hawj goeng de boiz. Goeng de dwg boux cenz gij vah gou he. Yiengq, goeng de couh bang mwngz gouz gou; gou couh mbouj hawj mwngz ngaiz rai. Hoeng, hauhnaeuz mwngz mbouj daiq dah mwnq maj boiz hawj goeng de boiz nex, mwngz caemh gag rox, mwngz caeuq gij vunz mwngz cungj ngaiz rairaeg bae.”
Daengz haet daixngeih daihcaeux, Yaqbijmijlwz hwnq le, couh hawj gyoengq vunz gaen henz ndang de daeuj doxcomz, naeuz gyoengqde ni gij saeh ndaw loq de. Gyoengqde dingq le, cungj lau hwj ij rai bae.

Gajlaeng Yaqbijmijlwz hawj Yaqbwzlahhanj daeuj, gvaiq de naeuz: “Mwngz vihmaz ij yienghneix doiq gou! Gou miz maz daekcoih mwngz, guh hawj gou caeuq gij vunz gou souh coih gajlaeng hangx mwngz! Mwngz guh hih gij saeh neix daiq ya lai luh.”
De caiq saek naeuz: “Mwngz yienghneix guh ndaej gijmaz mwngz nex?”
Yaqbwzlahhanj han de naeuz: “Gou naemqnaeuz gij vunz dieg neix mbouj lau Cangqdiq, ij gaj gou, ciengj aeu mehyah gou;
Gizsaed hax, mehyah gou Sajlah caemh cingqcaen dwg dahnuengx gou nej, cijmboujgoq de caeuq gou dwg doengz boh mbouj doengz meh hwj lah; gajlaeng de cij haq hawj gou guh yah lah.

Mwh Cangqdiq hawj gou biek ranz boh gou bae liuzlangq hih mwhde, gou gaenq raengq de goq naeuz: ‘Mboujguenj raeuz bae daengz mwnqlaw, mwngz cungj ij naeuz gou dwg daeggo mwngz, yiengq couh dwg naeuz mwngz ndiep gou lo,’ gij vah neix.”
Yaqbijmijlwz dingq de yienghneix gangj le, couh soengq yiengz hah, cwz hah, caeuq vunzhoiq hah hawj Yaqbwzlahhanj, caemhcaiq daiq mehyah de daeuj hawj de boiz.
Gajlaeng, Yaqbijmijlwz doiq Yaqbwzlahhanj naeuz: “Mwngz bae byaijbyaij yawjyawj gij dieg gou goqdoh bae; mwngz ij haenj youq mwnqlawz youq cungj ndaej, youzcaih mwngz aiq.”
De caemhcaiq doiq Sajlah naeuz: “Gou hawj daeggo mwngz ngeihsam gaen
Gaxgonq, Yehhozvaz vih mehyah Yaqbwzlahhanj ngaiz souh daengz gij saeh neix, de couh hawj Yaqbijmijlwz caeuq mehyah de, daiqlienz gij vunzbaz ndaw vangzgungh de cungj mbouj ndaej miz lwg.
Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq cojgvaq Sajlah, caemh hengz gaxgonq de dapwngq hawj Sajlah miz lwg.
Yiengq Sajlah caemh cingqcaen mizndang lo, caemh cingqcaen daengz mwh Cangqdiq naeuz hih mwhde, gannaeuz Yaqbwzlahhanj gaenq laux liux lo, hoeng vanzlij miz daeglwg he hawj de.
Yaqbwzlahhanj couh an coh hawj laeq lwg neix heuh Hijsaj.
Hijsaj seng okdaeuj ndaej daengz daixbet ngoenz le, Yaqbwzlahhanj couh ciuq Cangqdiq dingh hih gveihdingq hawj de gozlij.
Seng Hijsaj hih mwhde, Yaqbwzlahhanj ndaej bak bi.
Gajlaeng, Sajlah naeuz: “Cangqdiq sawjhawj gou angq riu; famz dingqri daengz gienh saeh neix hih vunz cungj caemh caeuq gou angq hwj riu.”
De caiq naeuz: “Miz byawz ndaej sien rox sien naeuz Yaqbwzlahhanj ni naeuz: ‘Sajlah ndaej miz lwg’ gij vah neix nex? Seizneix gou gingqyienz daengz de laux le ndaej seng miz daeglwg he hawj de.”
Laeq lwg neix ciemh ngoenz ciemh hung, ndaej daengz geknauq lo. Daengz ngoenz geknauq he, Yaqbwzlahhanj couh loengh laeuj cingj hek, loengh hwj cienfanh hoengh he.
Couh youq ngoenz mwnq, Sajlah yawjraen Hijsizmajliq cix yex cix riu daeglwg de. (Hijsizmajliq couh dwg daeglwg Yaqgyaz, vunz Ngaihgiz, seng hawj Yaqbwzlahhanj he.)

De yawjraen yienghneix le, couh ndatheiq hwj doiq Yaqbwzlahhanj naeuz: “Mwngz boenq dahhoiq neix caeuq daeglwg de deuz bae! Mbouj ndaej hawj daeglwg dahhoiq neix caeuq daeglwg gou doxcaeuq ciep aeu gij gyadangq mwngz law.”
Yiengq Yaqbwzlahhanj couh vih gienh saeh neix hwj simnyap ij rai bae, aenvih Hijsizmajliq caemh dwg daeglwg de hah.

Hoeng, Cangqdiq vued Yaqbwzlahhanj naeuz: “Mwngz gaejyungh vih daeglwg neix caeuq Yaqgyaz dahhoiq neix causim; mwngz caenh ciuq Sajlah naeuz hih yienghmwnq bae guh sat lo. Fanjcingq dwg Hijsaj, daeglwg neix, seng hih lwg cij suenq dwg doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz.
Gajlaeng daeglwg dahhoiq neix, gou caemh gaengjdingq ij hawj doengh daih gajlaeng de bienqbaenz aen guek hung he, aenvih de caemh dwg mwngz seng he.”

Couh yienghneix, daengz haet daixngeih daihcaeux, Yaqbwzlahhanj couh dawz bingj caeuq daehnaeng raemx he daeuj beq hwnj gwnz hongzmbaq Yaqgyaz bae hawj de, caiq daiq laeq lwg de daeuj hawj de, hawj de deuz lo. Deuz le, gajlaeng Yaqgyaz youq rogndoi Bezciqbah byaij bae byaij dauq, mbouj rox hih ij bae mwnqlaw,
daeh raemx de caemh gw liux lo. Yiengq de couh dawz laeq lwg de coengq youq laj go faex hwj,

bonjfaenh de couh gag byaij bae liz laeq lwg de aiq miz saek bak baj yamq gyae baenzneix, couh naenghnag roengzma, gag naeuz: “Gou mbouj nyienh yawj laeq lwg neix couh yienghneix ngaiz rai bae law!” De cungj siengsim hwj naengh youq mwnq coengq sing daej engxengx.

Gajlaeng, Cangqdiq dingqri laeq lwgngez mwnq daej, yiengq bouxcai Cangqdiq couh dajlwh gwnzmbwn heuh Yaqgyaz naeuz: “Yaqgyaz hax, Yaqgyaz! Mwngz guxmaz daej vauxvaux lah? Gaej lau; Cangqdiq gaenq dingqri laeq lwg mwngz daej lo.
Vaiqdi hwnq! Bae umj laeq lwg mwngz. Gou gaengjdingq hawj doengh daih gajlaeng de fat lai hwj bienqbaenz aen guekgya hung he.”
Bouxcai gangj doengh gawq neix sat le, Cangqdiq couh hawj Yaqgyaz yawjraen aen cingjraemx he. De couh majcangq dawz aen daehnaeng coux raemx de bae coux raemx ma hawj daeglwg de gw.
Couh yienghneix, Cangqdiq siengzseiz baujyouh laeq lwgngez neix; laeq lwgngez neix caemh ciemh ngoenz ciemh hung. De youq rogndoi Bahlanz youq, caemh dwg boux dwk naqgung remrem he.
Daxmeh de caemh aeu dah lwgsau vunz Ngaihgiz he hawj de guh yah.

Miz baez he, goengjvuengz Gihlah'wj Yaqbijmijlwz caeuq boux gywnhcangj de Feihgoz bae cimh Yaqbwzlahhanj. Gyoengqde doiq Yaqbwzlahhanj naeuz: “Mboujguenj mwngz guh gijmaz, Cangqdiq cungj baujyouh mwngz, soengq fuk hawj mwngz.

Sojhij gou seizneix muengh mwngz youq dangqnaj Cangqdiq doiq gou baujcingq, baujcingq baezneix mwngz mbouj yaeuh gou caeuq gij lwg gij lan doengh daih gajlaeng gou. Gou baenzlawz doiq mwngz ndei, mwngz caemh ij baenzlawz doiq gou caeuq gij vunz dieg mwngz seizneix doz youq he ndei.”
Yaqbwzlahhanj han naeuz: “Ndaej hah, gou nyienh'eiq baujcingq.”
De yienghneix naeuz le, couh soengq cwz, soengq yiengz hawj Yaqbijmijlwz, yiengq song boux de couh doxdingh lo.
Yiengq Yaqbwzlahhanj soengq daeuj hih mwhde, de couh dawz caet duz yiengzcohlwg linghvaih coengq youq lingh gok hwj.
Yaqbijmijlwz raen le, couh cam naeuz: “Mwngz dawz caet duz yiengzcohlwg linghvaih coengq hwj, dwg gijmaz iqswh nej?”
Yaqbwzlahhanj han naeuz: “Cingj mwngz sou caet duz yiengzcohlwg neix; sou caet duz neix le, couh dwg cingqmingz naeuz mwngz gaenq nginh aen cingj ngaiz ciemq aeu mwnq dwg aen cingj gou lo.”
Yiengq de couh an mwnq dieg mwnq heuh Bezciqbah, aenvih song boux de youq mwnq doxdingh baujcingq.
Couh yienghneix, song boux de youq Bezciqbah doxdingh doxhanh lo. Dingh ndei le, Yaqbijmijlwz caeuq boux gywnhcangj de Feihgoz maj mwnq dieg Feihliqswq vunz mwnq lo.
Yiengq Yaqbwzlahhanj youq Bezciqbah ndaem go faex hunghung he, caemh youq mwnq gingqbaiq Yehhozvaz, seiqseiz lix dih Cangqdiq.
Yaqbwzlahhanj youq dieg miz Feihliqswq vunz youq he doz youq baenx haujlai caez.
Gij saeh neix goq le, Cangqdiq ij sawq Yaqbwzlahhanj, yiengq de couh heuh Yaqbwzlahhanj naeuz: “Yaqbwzlahhanj!”
Yaqbwzlahhanj han naeuz: “Aex, gou youq dineix.”

Cangqdiq couh naeuz: “Mwngz daiq daeglwg mwngz, couh dwg daeglwg dog mwngz, caemh dwg mwngz ceiq ndiep ceiq aiq hih Hijsaj, daiq de bae dieg Mohliqyaq. Bae daengz mwnq le, gou yinx aen bya he naeuz mwngz ni, hawj mwngz daiq de bae mwnq, aeu de ma coemh hwj bwiz gou.”
Bae daengz daixsam ngoenz le, Yaqbwzlahhanj daj lizgyae couh yawjraen mwnq dieg mwnq.
De couh doiq song bouxhoiq de naeuz: “Faenhsou caeuq duz lawz youq dineix daengj, daengj gou caeuq daeglwg gou bae mwnq baex baiqbaiq he gaenq, di haem cij ma.”
Raengq sat le, de couh dawz gij liu hawj daeglwg de gwed; bonjfaenh de cix dawz gyoqfeiz caeuq cax. Couh yienghneix, bohlwg vunz couh hwnj bya bae noengxnoengx lo.
Bae le, Hijsaj heuh daxboh de naeuz: “Boh hax boh!”
Yiengq Yaqbwzlahhanj han naeuz: “Aex, lwg hax, guxmaz lah!”
Hijsaj han naeuz: “Gyoqfeiz caeuq liu cungj miz lo, hoeng, duz yiengz ij coemh hwj dajbwiz he nej?”

Yaqbwzlahhanj han naeuz: “Lwg hax, duz yiengz coemh hwj dajbwiz he, Cangqdiq de gag cwnjbiq miz hawj nex; raeuz mboujyungh you.” Song boux de yienghneix mwngz gawq gwh gawq caemh vanzlij dwg giqcuz ganjroen.

Gajlaeng song boux de bae daengz gwnz bya. Daengz mwnq Cangqdiq yinx naeuz Yaqbwzlahhanj ni he le, de couh youq mwnq caeb aen daiz dajbwiz he. Caeb ndei le, couh dawz liu baij hwnj gwnz daiz de bae, caiq dawz daeglwg de goenj hwnjdaeuj, coengq hwnj gwnz liu bae.
Coengq ndei le, de couh dawz cax yingx hwnjdaeuj ij gaj daeglwg de.
Couh youq mwhneix, bouxcai Yehhozvaz daj gwnzmbwn hemq de naeuz: “Yaqbwzlahhanj! Yaqbwzlahhanj!”
Yaqbwzlahhanj han naeuz: “Aex, gou youq dineix!”

Bouxcai naeuz: “Mwngz mbouj ndaej doengh fawz gaj daeglwg mwngz. Seizneix gou rox mwngz dwg boux dingq gij vah Cangqdiq caeuq sinq Cangqdiq he hih vunz lo, aenvih mwngz daiq daeglwg dog mwngz cungj sijndaej aeu hawj de.”
