Yaqbwzlahhanj dingq daengz neij le, couh ngiengx raeuj hwnjdaeuj muenghyawj, sawqmwh yawjraen miz duz yiengzdaeg he, song gij gok de ngaiz dap youq ndaek caz oen he mbouj ndaej ok ma. Yiengq de couh bae gej aeu duz de ma dingj daeglwg de coemh hwj guh dajbwiz.
Vih yienghneix, Yaqbwzlahhanj couh an mwnq dieg mwnq heuh Yehhozvaz-Hijlwz.
Bouxcai Yehhozvaz caiq daj gwnzmbwn hemq Yaqbwzlahhanj mbat daixngeih naeuz:
“Yehhozvaz naeuz: ‘Aenvih mwngz daiq daeglwg dog mwngz cungj sijndaej aeu hawj gou, sojhij gou gamj aeu gij mingh gou ma baujcingq,

gou bietdingh soengq fuk hawj mwngz, hawj doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz fat lailai hwj, fat lai luj gij ndaundeiq gwnzmbwn, luj anjsa henz haij yienghmwnq lai. Gyoengqde caemh ndaej hoenxhingz dizyinz ciemq aeu aen singz gyoengqde.
Lajmbwn sojmiz hih minzcuz cungj dwg dajlaeng doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz hih boux he ndaej miz fuk, aenvih mwngz dingq gij vah gou.’”
Bouxcai gangj doengh gawq neix sat le, Yaqbwzlahhanj couh dauq ma daengz song bouxhoiq mwnq. Gyoengqde couh itheij maj Bezciqbah, couh dwg Yaqbwzlahhanj doz youq hih mwnq dieg mwnq.
Gij saeh neix goq le, miz vunz naeuz Yaqbwzlahhanj ni beixsauj de Mizgyah caeuq daeggo de Nazhoq caemh miz geij daeglwg lo.
Daegdaeuz dwg Uhswh, gajlaeng daengz Buqswh, daengz Gihmujliq (Gihmujliq couh dwg daxboh Yaqlanz),
roengz ma daengz Gihceh, Hahsoj, Bizdaz, Izlah caeuq Bijdujliq.
Gajlaeng Bijdujliq seng Liqbwzgyah dah lwgsau neix. Bet daeglwg neix cungj dwg Mizgyah seng hawj Nazhoq he.
Meh yahnoix Nazhoq heuh Liuzmaj; de caemh seng miz Dizbaz, Gyahhamz, Dahyaz caeuq Majgyah.
Sajlah souh ndaej bak ngeihcaet bi,
caemh dwg rai youq dieg Gyahnamz dih Gihlez-Yaqbah, couh dwg seizneix hih Hihbwzlwnz. Yaqbwzlahhanj youq mwnq daej mehyah de, daej haemz daej gik, soujlingz mehyah de.
Gajlaeng, Yaqbwzlahhanj daj henz guenjcaiz mehyah de ok bae, bae gouz gij vunz Hwz cuz bonjdeih mwnq hih gij vunz gangj vah couh baenz he, naeuz:
“Gou dwg doz youq dieg faenhsou hih vaihdieg vunz he. Gouz faenhsou hai gaiq dieg he hawj gou, hawj gou aeu ma guh diegmoh, hawj gou ndaej aeu ma moek mehyah gou.”
Yiengq, gij vunz Hwz cuz han de naeuz:

“Ox, beix hax, mwngz dwg boux vunz soenhgingq, vunz beiqfug he dih vunz! Mwngz raen mwnq diegmohlawz ndei, couh aeu ma moek mehyah mwngz bax. Raeuz dineix mij'z vunz naeuz mbouj hawj diegmoh hawj mwngz law.”
Yaqbwzlahhanj dingq gyoengqde yienghneix naeuz le, couh gvih roengzma sax gyoengqde,
doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Hauhnaeuz faenhsou nyienh'eiq hawj gou youq dineix moek mehyah gou nex, gou couh cingj faenhsou bang gou bae naeuz Hijfuzlwnz, daeglwg Sojyaz,

cingj de dawz conghgamj youq Mwzbijlah mwnq hai hawj gou; conghgamj mwnq couh dwg youq raeuj reih de. Conghgamj de dij geijlwh ngaenz, couh hai hawj gou geijlwh ngaenz bax, hawj gou ndaej aeu ma guh diegmoh.”
Yaqbwzlahhanj doiq gyoengqde yienghneix naeuz hih mwhde, Hijfuzlwnz cingq naengh youq baksingz

“Ox! Goengjau hax, mboujyungh hoi ngaenz law. Cingj mwngz dingq gou gangj; gyoengq vunz caemh youq dineix dingqri. Gou dawz gaiq reih caeuq conghgamj mwnq cungj soengq hawj mwngz, soengq hawj mwngz aeu ma moek mehyah mwngz.”
Yaqbwzlahhanj dingq le, youhcaiq gvih roengzma sax gyoengq vunzlai,

caemh doiq Hijfuzlwnz naeuz: “Docih lo, docih lo, hoeng caemh cingj mwngz dingq gou naeuz. Gou ij cawx gij reih mwngz aeu lah; cingj mwngz sou gij ngaenz gou bax! Yiengq gou couh ndaej youq mwnq moek mehyah gou lo.”
Yiengq Hijfuzlwnz han de naeuz:
“Goengjau, gou caiq cingj mwngz dingq gou gangj. Gij reih mwnq cijmboujgoq ngamq dij saek gouj gaen

Yaqbwzlahhanj dingq le, caemh dungziq Hijfuzlwnz gangj hih yiengh gyaq neix, couh youq dangqnaj vunzlai aeu aen mwhde gij vunz dajhaicawx yungh hih caengh ma caengh gouj gaen naek hih ngaenz hawj Hijfuzlwnz.
Couh yienghneix, Hijfuzlwnz youq gaenh Manqliq dih gij reih Mwzbijlah daiqlienz conghgamj mwnq caeuq doenghheij faex seiqhenz de
cungj gvi hawj Yaqbwzlahhanj liux lo. Gij saeh neix couh dwg youq dangqnaj gyoengq Hwz cuz vunz youq baksingz mwnq dingh roengzma he.
Gajlaeng Yaqbwzlahhanj couh dawz mehyah de moek youq conghgamj mwnq.
Couh yienghneix, gij reih caeuq conghgamj mwnq couh bienqbaenz Yaqbwzlahhanj dih diegmoh lo.
Yaqbwzlahhanj nienzgeij gaenq laux ladlad liux lo; seiqvunz de mboujguenj de guh gijmaz saeh, Yehhozvaz cungj soengq fuk hawj de.
Miz ngoenz he, de doiq boux guenjgya de, caemh dwg bouxhoiq nienzgeij ceiq laux he, naeuz: “Daeuj, dawz gij fawz mwngz coengq haeuj luengqha gou daeuj.
Gou ij hawj mwngz yiengq gou baujcingq, baujcingq mbouj hawj daeglwg gou youq dieg neix aeu gij lwgsau vunz Gyahnamz ma guh yah;

Yaqbwzlahhanj yienghneix naeuz le, boux guenjgya de couh doiq de naeuz: “Yiengq, hauhnaeuz dah lwgsau mwnq mbouj haenj gaen gou daengz mwnq dieg neix ma nej, dwg mbouj dwg gou bietdingh ij daiq daeglwg mwngz maj dieg coj mwngz hax?”
Gajlaeng Yaqbwzlahhanj han de naeuz: “Mwngz ciengeiz mbouj ndaej daiq daeglwg gou maj dieg mwnq,

aenvih Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq hawj gou biek ranz boh gou, aen cuz boh gou, ok daeuj hih mwhde, de doiq gou baujcingq goq naeuz: ‘Gou ij dawz dieg neix soengq hawj doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz.’ Yiengq gou caemh sinq de gaengjdingq baij bouxcai de roengz daeuj daiq mwngz bae, daj mwnq aeu dah lwgsau he ma hawj daeglwg gou guh yah dih.

Hauhnaeuz dah lwgsau mwnq mbouj haenj gaen mwngz ma, yiengq couh mbouj suenq naeuz mwngz guh mbouj daengz, caeuq gij baujcingq neix mij maz gvanhaeh law; cijaeu mwngz mbouj daiq daeglwg gou maj mwnq couh ndaej lo.”
Bouxhoiq raen Yaqbwzlahhanj cungj gangj daengz yienghneix bae lo, yiengq de couh coengq fawz haeuj luengqha Yaqbwzlahhanj bae, yiengq de baujcingq lo.
Couh yienghneix, bouxhoiq couh daj ndaw gyoengq lozdoz Yaqbwzlahhanj genj aeu cib duz lozdoz ma doz gak cungj doxgaiq, yiengq fueng Meijsojbuqdazmijyaq, bae daengz aen singz Nazhoq.
De daengz mwnq le, couh hawj doengh duz lozdoz bomz youq rog singz hih henz aen cingjraemx mwnq. Mwhde dwg yiengqhaemh, ngamqluj gij vunzbaz ok daeuj aeu raemx.

De couh gouz Yehhozvaz naeuz: “Yehhozvaz hax! Bouxcawj gou Yaqbwzlahhanj dih Cangqdiq hax! Gouz mwngz hawj gou ngoenzneix guh hih saeh guh ndaej doeng, hawj Yaqbwzlahhanj rox naeuz mwngz dwg aiq de dih.
Gou seizneix couh ndwn youq henz cingjraemx lo; gij vunzbaz ndaw singz cingq ok daeuj aeu raemx.

Gou ij cam gij vunzbaz mwnq naeuz: ‘Cingj mwngz coengq aen guenqraemx mwngz roengzma, hawj gaemz raemx he hawj gou gw, ndaej lwi?’ Yiengq, hauhnaeuz miz dahlawz han naeuz: ‘Hawj mwngz gw bax; gou caemh hawj doengh duz lozdoz mwngz gw laem,’ yiengq gou muengh dah mwnq couh dwg mwngz hawj bouxhoiq mwngz Hijsaj hih yah lo. Yienghneix gou couh rox mwngz doiq bouxcawj gou ndei, yawj bouxcawj gou dij lo.”

Boux guenjgya ngamq gouz daengz dineix, sawqmwh couh miz dah he, gij coh de heuh Liqbwzgyah he, gwnz mbaq de gwed miz aen guenqraemx he, daeuj daengz henz cingj. Dah neix dwg dahlwg Bijdujliq; Bijdujliq dwg daeglwg daeggo Yaqbwzlahhanj, dwg Nazhoq caeuq Mizgyah seng he.
Dah Liqbwzgyah gig gyaeu, caemh mijyaengz miz vunzsai yaek de goq. De roengz bae daek raemx le, couh hwnj ma.
Boux guenjgya raen le, couh riq goqbae doiq de naeuz: “Gouz mwngz hawj di raemx hawj gou gw, ndaej lwi?”
Liqbwzgyah han naeuz: “Ndaej hah, goengjau, hawj mwngz gw.” De doq gangj couh doq nyungjnyat daj gwnz mbaq dawz aen guenqraemx roengzma, song fawz hwj dawz hawj goeng guenjgya gw.
Hawj de gw le, Liqbwzgyah vanzlij naeuz: “Gou caiq daek raemx ma hawj doengh duz lozdoz mwngz gw laem, hawj gyoengqde gw imq bae.”
Gangj sat, couh majcangq dawz gij raemx ndaw guenq raix haeuj ndaw ruhraemx bae, youhcaiq bae daek raemx ma hawj doengh duz lozdoz gw.

Liqbwzgyah aeu raemx hawj duz lozdoz gw hih mwhde, boux guenjgya youq henz de yawj, yawj de yawj nijnij, mij gangj saek gawq vah, siengj rox mbat neix de daeuj banh hih saeh dwg mbouj dwg Yehhozvaz gaenq nganhbaiz ndei hawj de lo.
Daengj lozdoz gw raemx ndaej le, boux guenjgya couh dawz aen naek miz roek gwz
naeuz: “Nuengx hax, cingj mwngz naeuz gou ni, mwngz dwg dahlwg byawz lah? Ndaw ranz boh mwngz miz mwnq hawj raeuz youq hih haz?”
Dah de han naeuz: “Gou dwg dahlwg Bijdujliq; daxgoeng daxbuz gou dwg Nazhoq caeuq Mizgyah.
Ndaw ranz gou miz baenxbienh gij gueng lozdoz, caemh miz mwnq hawj sou youq he.”
Boux guenjgya dingq le, couh gvih roengzma baiqsax Yehhozvaz,

naeuz: “Yehhozvaz bouxcawj gou dih Cangqdiq hax, gou ij haenh mwngz, aenvih mwngz itcig cungj doiq bouxcawj gou ndei, cungj gangj daengz guh daengz, gangj vah gw vah. Mwngz itloh daiq gou daeuj daengz gij caencik bouxcawj gou.”
Gajlaeng Liqbwzgyah riq maj naeuz daxmeh de caeuq ndaw ranz de ni.
Liqbwzgyah miz daeggo he heuh Lahbanh.

couh doiq de naeuz: “Goengjau hax, mwngz dwg boux Yehhozvaz soengq fuk hawj he dih vunz; vihmaz ndwn youq rog neix nej? Cingj mwngz haeuj ndaw ranz gou maj bax! Gou gaenq soujsib ndei mwnq youq he hawj mwngz lo, caemh cwnjbiq ndei mwnq youq he hawj doengh duz lozdoz lo.”

Gajlaeng, boux guenjgya couh gaen Lahbanh haeuj ranz bae. Lahbanh couh dawz doenghheij doxgaiq gwnz gumq lozdoz roengzma, caiq gueng doengh duz de, caemh aeu raemx hawj boux guenjgya mwnq caeuq doengh boux caeuq de itheij daeuj he swiq ha.

Lahbanh guh doenghgij neix ndaej le, caiq daek haeux baij byaek ndei heuh de gw. Hoeng, boux guenjgya mwnq engq han naeuz: “Mbouj hah, gou mbouj gw hah; gou mijyaengz gangj gou daeuj dineix ij guh gijmaz saeh haem. Daengj gou dawz gij saeh gou gangj ndei le cij gw.”
Yiengq Lahbanh han naeuz: “Ox, ndaej hah, cingj mwngz gangj bax.”
Gajlaeng, boux guenjgya couh gangj naeuz: “Gou dwg bouxhoiq Yaqbwzlahhanj he.

Yehhozvaz soengq fuk hawj bouxcawj gou lai hux lai, sawjhawj de bienqbaenz boux fouqfouq mizmiz he, caemh soengq hawj baenx gyoengq yiengz, baenx gyoengq cwz, lozdoz caeuq lawz, gimngaenz caeuq hoiq vunzsai vunzbaz.
Mehcawj gou Sajlah nienz laux mwhde seng miz daeglwg he; bouxcawj gou caemh dawz sojmiz hih gyahcanj cungj hawj daeglwg neix liux.
Bouxcawj gou hawj gou yiengq de baujcingq naeuz: ‘Mwngz baujcingq mbouj hawj daeglwg gou aeu gij lwgsau Gyahnamz ma guh yah;
mwngz ij bae daengz dieg coj boh gou, youq ndaw minzcuz gou aeu dah lwgsau he ma hawj daeglwg gou guh yah.’
“Yiengq gou couh cam bouxcawj gou naeuz: ‘Hauhnaeuz dah mwnq mbouj haenj gaen gou ma nej, ij baenzlawz guh?’

“De han naeuz: ‘Gou soqlaiz cungj dwg dingq Yehhozvaz gaen Yehhozvaz; de gaengjdingq baij bouxcai de daeuj caeuq mwngz bae, hawj mwngz guh ndaej doenghgij saeh neix. Mwngz couh ndaej youq laeng gij caencik ndaw minzcuz gou aeu dah lwgsau he ma hawj daeglwg gou guh yah lo.
Yiengq, hauhnaeuz gij caencik gou mbouj hawj dah de gaen mwngz ma, yiengq caemh mbouj caeuq gij baujcingq mwngz miz gvanhaeh.’
“Sojhij, ngoenzneix gou daeuj daengz henz cingj le, couh naeuz: ‘Yehhozvaz, bouxcawj gou Yaqbwzlahhanj dih Cangqdiq hax, muengh mwngz hawj gou mbat neix daeuj guh hih saeh guh ndaej doeng.
Seizneix gou couh ndwn youq henz cingjraemx lo. Gou cam gij lwgsau daeuj aeu raemx mwnq, cam de aeu raemx ma gw;
hauhnaeuz miz dahlawz hawj gou caeuq doengh duz lozdoz gou gw nex, couh muengh dah mwnq dwg mwngz dingh hawj daeglwg bouxcawj gou guh hih yah lo.’

“Ndaw sim gou ij gouz hih vah cungj mijyaengz gouz liux haemlwng, Liqbwzgyah gaenq gwed aen guenqraemx he bae daengz henz cingj aeu raemx lo. Yiengq gou couh cam de naeuz: ‘Cingj mwngz hawj di raemx hawj gou gw ndaej lwi?’

“De couh vaiqdi nyungjnyat daj gwnz mbaq dawz guenqraemx roengzma, naeuz: ‘Cingj mwngz gw bax. Gou caemh ij hawj doengh duz lozdoz mwngz gw laem.’ Couh yienghneix, gou couh ndaej gw raemx, daiqlienz duz lozdoz cungj caemh ndaej gw.
“Gw le, gou couh cam de naeuz: ‘Mwngz dwg dahlwg byawz lah?’
“De couh han naeuz: ‘Gou dwg dahlwg Bijdujliq; boh gou couh dwg daeglwg Nazhoq caeuq Mizgyah he.’
“Gou dingq le, couh aeu aen gyengx gim he raek haeuj aen ndaeng de bae, caiq dawz song aen goenhfawz daenj hawj de.

Gajlaeng, gou couh gvih roengzma sax Yehhozvaz, haenh Yehhozvaz bouxcawj gou Yaqbwzlahhanj dih Cangqdiq, aenvih de daiq gou daeuj banh doeng gienh saeh neix, hawj bouxcawj gou ndaej aeu dahlan daegnuengx de ma guh bawx.”
De gangj daengz dineix le, couh naeuz: “Mbouj rox hih faenhsou baenzlwh yiengh yawj; gou muengh faenhsou hawj gou rox, hawj gou haemq ndei rox ij baenzlawz yiengh guh.”
Gajlaeng, daeggo de caeuq daxboh de han naeuz: “Ndaek gijn'x dwg Yehhozvaz nganhbaiz lah; raeuz ndaej nganhbaiz haz!
Nex, Liqbwzgyah couh youq dineix; mwngz ndaej ciuq Yehhozvaz gangj hih yienghmwnq daiq de maj hawj daeglwg bouxcawj mwngz guh yah hah.”
Bouxhoiq Yaqbwzlahhanj dingq song boux de yienghneix naeuz le, couh bomz roengz doem bae baiq Yehhozvaz.

Baiq le, de couh aeu doenghgij raek youq gwnz hoz, gwnz fawz, gwnz rwz hih gimgim ngaenzngaenz caeuq buh soengq hawj Liqbwzgyah, caemh soengq hawj daeggo de caeuq daxmeh de haujlai dijbauj hih doxgaiq.
Gajlaeng boux guenjgya mwnq caeuq doengh boux gaen de itheij daeuj he cij gw haeux. Gw le, gyoengqde caemh youq mwnq youq haemh.
Daengz doengxhaet daihcaeux hwnq daeuj le, boux guenjgya naeuz: “Raeuz ij maj laeng bouxcawj raeuz hoh lo.”
Hoeng, daeggo Liqbwzgyah caeuq daxmeh de naeuz: “Hawj Liqbwzgyah caeuq raeuz lai youq geij ngoenz laem bax, gijmaj youq saek cib ngoenz laem haj.”
Yiengq boux guenjgya han naeuz: “Giqyienz Yehhozvaz gaenq hawj gou banh ndaej gij saeh neix lo, faenhsou couh gaej hah gou lo; gou ij vaiqdi maj naeuz bouxcawj gou ni hax.”
Gajlaeng gyoengqde han naeuz: “Raeuz heuh Liqbwzgyah daeuj camcam de yawj, yawjyawj de ij baenzlawz guh.”
Yiengq gyoengqde couh heuh Liqbwzgyah daeuj cam de naeuz: “Mwngz haenj gaen boux neix bae lwi?”
Liqbwzgyah doq han naeuz: “Gou haenj gaen de bae hah.”

Gyoengqde raen Liqbwzgyah yienghneix naeuz le, couh hawj Liqbwzgyah caeuq meh daj lij iq cix daiq de daengz hung hih naijmah gaen boux guenjgya Yaqbwzlahhanj caeuq doengh boux gaen de itheij daeuj he bae lo.

Liqbwzgyah ijvanh okdin bae hih mwhde, gij vunz ndaw ranz de hoh fuk hawj de naeuz: “Dahnuengx raeuz hax, muengh mwngz ndaej guh fanh vunz dih daxmeh! Muengh doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz hoenx ndaej hingz dizyinz!”
Couh yienghneix, Liqbwzgyah caeuq doenghheij dahhoiq swqhaeuh de cwnjbiq ndei le, couh gwih lozdoz gaen boux guenjgya mwnq bae lo.

Mwh goeng guenjgya caeuq Liqbwzgyah okdin ma ranz hih mwhde, Hijsaj dwg youq Biqwj-Lahhaijlaiz youq he. (Biqwj-Lahhaijlaiz dwg youq Gyahnamz dih mwnq gansauq he.) Couh youq mwh goeng guenjgya caeuq Liqbwzgyah mijyaengz ma daengz ranz hih mwhde, Hijsaj gaenq ma daengz ranz daxboh de lo.
Yiengq miz ngoenz he yiengqhaemh, Hijsaj ok rog reih bae doeng byaij sae byaij gag ngeix gijmaz, sawqmwh ngiengx raeuj hwnjdaeuj yawj, yawjraen miz lozdoz byaij goqdaeuj.
Ngamqluj mwhneix Liqbwzgyah caemh yawjraen Hijsaj. De yawjraen Hijsaj le, couh nyungjnyat daj gwnz gumq lozdoz diuq roengzma,
cam boux guenjgya mwnq naeuz: “Boux daj ndaw reih byaij goqdaeuj hih boux mwnq dwg byawz lah?”
Boux guenjgya han naeuz: “Dwg bouxcawj gou Hijsaj.” Liqbwzgyah dingq boux guenjgya yienghneix naeuz le, couh nyungjnyat vaiqdi aeu cahginh ma goemq naj hwj.
Gajlaeng, boux guenjgya couh dawz de banh hih saeh gangj naeuz Hijsaj ni.

Hijsaj dingq le, couh daiq Liqbwzgyah haeuj ndaw cangqbungz daxmeh de gaxgonq youq goq he bae. Couh yienghneix, Hijsaj aeu Liqbwzgyah ma guh yah lo. Hijsaj caemh gig aiq de. Hijsaj dajlwh daxmeh de rai le cungj dwg simnyap sizsiz, guh hwj daengz seizneix Liqbwzgyah daeuj le, de cij gaihcij vuenheij.
Yaqbwzlahhanj caiq aeu daixlingh mehyah, gij coh meh de heuh Gihdujlah.
De seng miz Sinhlanz, Yozsanh, Mijdanq, Mijdenq, Ihswhbah caeuq Cuhyaq.
Yozsanh seng Siqbah caeuq Dijdanq; Dijdanq dwg cojgoeng Yaqcuhliq vunz, Liqduhciq vunz caeuq Liquhmij vunz.
Mijdenq seng miz Hijfaz, Hijfuz, Hahnoz, Yaqbijdaq caeuq Hijlwzdaq. Gwnz neix hih vunz cungj dwg Gihdujlah dih doengh daih gajlaeng.
Yaqbwzlahhanj dawz sojmiz hih gyahcanj cungj hawj Hijsaj liux.

Hoeng doenghheij lwg yahnoix de nej, de domh mwh de lij youq, mijyaengz rai mwhde, couh hawj di doxgaiq hawj gyoengqde, caemh hawj gyoengqde buen bae fueng baixdoeng, liz daeglwg de Hijsaj gyae'gyae he bae.
Yaqbwzlahhanj ndaej souhyienz raixcaix, souh ndaej daengz itbak caetcib haj bi
cij an'an onjonj rai gvaqseiq.

Song daeglwg de Hijsaj caeuq Hijsizmajliq dawz de moek youq conghgamj Mwzbijlah. Congh mwnq couh dwg youq gij reih gaenh Manqliq he. Gij reih neix dwg Yaqbwzlahhanj laeng Hijfuzlwnz daeglwg Sojyaz Hwz cuz vunz cawx ma he.
Yaqbwzlahhanj caeuq mehyah de Sajlah cungj dwg moek youq mwnq.
Yaqbwzlahhanj rai le, Cangqdiq soengq fuk hawj daeglwg de Hijsaj. Hijsaj youq mwnq gaenh Biqwj-Lahhaijlaiz mwnq youq.
Hijsizmajliq dwg daeglwg Yaqgyaz seng hawj Yaqbwzlahhanj he. Yaqgyaz dwg vunz Ngaihgiz, caemh dwg dahhoiq Sajlah.
Laj neix dwg heij lwg Hijsizmajliq hih coh, dwg ciuq gyoengqde seng gonq seng laeng ma baiz sij youq laj neix, couh dwg Nizbaiqyoz, Gihdaz, Yaqdwzbez, Mijbijsanh,
Mijswhmaj, Duqmaj, Majsaj,
Hahdaq, Dizmaj, Ihduz, Nazfeihswh caeuq Gihdijmaj.
Gwnz neix cungj dwg gyoengq lwg Hijsizmajliq. Gyoengqde youq hih dieg cungj dwg ciuq gyoengqde gak vunz dih coh ma an he, gyoengqde caemh dwg cibngeih aen cuz dih cojgoeng.
Hijsizmajliq souh ndaej itbak samcib caet bi cij rai.
Doengh daih gajlaeng de youq hih deixfueng dwg gaenh Ngaihgiz, dwg youq fueng daj Ngaihgiz bae Yaqsuz dih mwnq Hahfeizlah daengz Cuh'wj he. Gyoengqde caeuq gij beixnuengx de mbouj youq doxdep.
Laj neix dwg ranz daeglwg Yaqbwzlahhanj Hijsaj dih lizsij.

Hijsaj ndaej seiqcib bi mwhmwnq, aeu Liqbwzgyah ma guh yah. Liqbwzgyah dwg dah lwgsau Bijdujliq. (Bijdujliq dwg youq dieg Bahdanj-Yaqlanz.) Liqbwzgyah caemh dwg dahnuengx Lahbanh; gyoengqde cungj dwg Yaqlanz vunz.
Liqbwzgyah
De daiqndang,

Yehhozvaz han de naeuz: “Song laeq lwg youq ndaw dungx mwngz caemhdangq song aen guek, caemh dwg song aen doxhangz dih minzcuz, ij dajlwh gwnz ndang mwngz ok daeuj. Aen cuz beij aen cuz ak; baezneix boux beix ij swqhaeuh boux nuengx.”
Daengz mwh seng de, cingqcaen seng miz doiq suengjseng he.
Laeq seng okdaeuj daixdaeuz de baenx ndang cungj hoengz, cix cenz ndang cungj hwnj miz fwn, lujnaeuz daenj diuz buh fwn he nwih. Yiengq, couh an coh hawj de heuh Hijsauj.
Daegnuengx de nej, de caemh gaenhangx seng okdaeuj lo. Gij fawz de gaem dawz giujdin Hijsauj hwj, yiengq couh an coh hawj de heuh Yajgoz.
Gajlaeng song laeq lwgngez neix menhmenh hung lo. Hijsauj haenj dwk nyaen, siengzseiz ok rogndoi rognaz bae; hoeng Yajgoz nej, Yajgoz haemq dingh, haenj youq ranz youq.
Hijsaj haenj Hijsauj, aenvih de haenj gw Hijsauj dwk ndaej ma dih doengh duz nyaen de; Liqbwzgyah nej, de haemq haenj Yajgoz.
Miz ngoenz he, Yajgoz youq ranz cawj duhhoengz dang. Hijsauj dajlwh rogndoi rognaz ma youh baeg youh dungxiek hozhawq.
Yiengq de raen le, couh doiq Yajgoz naeuz: “Mwngz hawj gou di gij hoengzhoengz mwnq hax; hawj gou gw veiq! Gou iek hwj ij rai lo!” (Vih yienghneix Hijsauj caemh dwg heuh Hijdungh.
Yajgoz raen de yienghneix le, couh han naeuz: “Ndaej hah! Hoeng, mwngz sien dawz gij gienz lwgdaeuz mwngz hai hawj gou bax.”
Hijsauj doq han naeuz: “Ox, gou cungj iek hwj ij rai lo! Gij gienz lwgdaeuz doiq gou miz maz yungh nex?”
Yajgoz caiq naeuz: “Mwngz sien yiengq gou baujcingq dawz gij gienz lwgdaeuz nyiengh hawj gou gaenq!” Yiengq Hijsauj couh doiq de baujcingq dawz gij gienz lwgdaeuz nyiengh hawj de.
Yajgoz couh hawj menqbauh hawj duhhoengz dang hawj Hijsauj gw. De gw le, couh baet hangx deuz lo. Yienghneix couh dwg naeuz Hijsauj gaenhbaenj yawj mbouj dij gij gienz lwgdaeuz de.

Doenghbaez youq aen nienzdaiq Yaqbwzlahhanj, mwnq dieg neix, couh dwg Gyahnamz, miz ciengz ieknanh he; seizneix mwnq dieg neix caemh miz ieknanh. Yiengq Hijsaj couh deuznanh bae daengz Gihlah'wj, bae laeng Yaqbijmijlwz
Yienzlaiz Yehhozvaz caemh yienh hawj Hijsaj raen, raengq de naeuz goq: “Mwngz gaej bae Ngaihgiz lo; bae mwnq dieg gou ij hawj mwngz youq he hax.”

“Mwngz camqciz sien youq dineix youq ndaej lo. Hauhnaeuz mwngz dingq gou, youq mwnqneix youq, gou couh caeuq mwngz youq, caiq soengq fuk hawj mwngz. Gou ij hengz gaxgonq gou caeuq daxboh mwngz Yaqbwzlahhanj soj baujcingq hih, couh dwg ij dawz manx dieg neix cungj soengq hawj mwngz caeuq gyoengq lwglwg lanlan laenjlaenj mwngz,

hawj doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz fat ndaej lai luj gij ndaundeiq gwnzmbwn, caemh dawz mwnqneix sojmiz dih dieg soengq hawj gyoengqde. Lajmbwn gak aen minzcuz dih vunz cungj dwg dajlaeng doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz hih boux he
aenvih Yaqbwzlahhanj gig naeuzdingq; de dingq gij vah gou. Gou raengq de, mingqlingq de gijmaz, de cungj dingq, caemh soenhsouj doenghgij fazliz gou.”
Yiengq, Hijsaj couh louz youq Gihlah'wj youq.

Gajlaeng gij vunz dieg mwnq dwen daengz mehyah de, hoeng Hijsaj dauq han naeuz: “De dwg dahnuengx gou lah.” Aenvih Liqbwzgyah gyaeu gywtgywt baenxsau raixcaix, yiengq Hijsaj mbouj gamj nginh naeuz Liqbwzgyah dwg mehyah de. De gag naemj: “Gou mbouj ndaej naeuz Liqbwzgyah dwg mehyah gou, mbouj nex, gyoengqde vih ij ciengj aeu mehyah gou, couh gaj gou.”

Gajlaeng Hijsaj youq mwnq youq haujlai caez le, miz ngoenz he, goengjvuengz Feihliqswq dajlwh conghcang muengh okdaeuj yawj, sawqmwh yawjraen Hijsaj caeuq Liqbwzgyah caenh luj gvanjbaz yienghmwnq doxgot doxcup.
De raen yienghmwnq le, couh heuh Hijsaj daeuj laeng de, doiq de naeuz: “Ox, laixmboujlawz Liqbwzgyah dwg mehyah mwngz! Mwngz vihmaz naeuz de dwg dahnuengx mwngz nex?”
Gajlaeng Hijsaj han naeuz: “Hauhnaeuz gou naeuz de dwg mehyah gou nex, gou lau vih de hwj le gou ngaiz rai.”

Yaqbijmijlwz caiq naeuz: “Mwngz doiq raeuz soj gangj soj guh dih saeh dwg gijmaz iqswh nej? Ceng di he, gij vunz raeuz neij miz vunz caeuq mehyah mwngz ninz, yiengq mwngz mbouj dwg hawj raeuz rap saeh vuengj lo maz!”
Gajlaeng, Yaqbijmijlwz couh yiengq gij beksingq de fat dunghgauq naeuz: “Mboujlwnh bouxlawz sienghaih Hijsaj caeuq mehyah de, couh gajrai bouxlawz.”
Hijsaj youq mwnq dieg mwnq dajndaem. Aenvih Yehhozvaz soengq fuk hawj de, de bi mwnq funghsouh, sou ndaej beij de ndaem roengzbae hih lai ndaej baenx bak boix.
Hijsaj fouq lo. Gij gyadangq de yied ngoenz yied lai,

Daxboh Hijsaj Yaqbwzlahhanj lij lix mwhde, gyoengq hoiq de vat dih doenghheij cingjraemx mwnq, seizneix heij cingjraemx neix cungj ngaiz gij vunz Feihliqswq aeu doem ma dienz liux lo, dienz hwj netnet saedsaed bae.

Gajlaeng Yaqbijmijlwz couh doiq Hijsaj naeuz: “Mwngz gaej caeuq gyoengqraeuz youq mwnqneix youq lo! Buen bae daixlingh mwnq youq bax, aenvih mwngz gaenq beij raeuz giengz, beij raeuz fouq ndaej lai lo!”
Yiengq, Hijsaj couh dajlwh mwnq buen deuz, buen bae daengz ndaw lueg Gihlah'wj, youq mwnq dap bungz youq.

Gajlaeng, de caemh ciuqyiengh coemq gaxgonq daxboh de yungh goq hih doenghheij cingj mwnq doiqyungz vat, caemh ciuqyiengh heuh doengh aen cingj neix luj gaxgonq daxboh de soj heuh hih yienghmwnq ityiengh heuh.
Youq mwnq youq le, gyoengq hoiq Hijsaj couh ij ngaiz vat cingj cij ndaej. Gyoengqde vat ndaej aen cingj miz raemx danh okdaeuj he le,

youq Gihlah'wj gij vunz dajciengx he couh caeuq gyoengq vunz Hijsaj dajciengx he doxceng, naeuz: “Gij raemx neix dwg gij raemx gyoengqraeuz!” Couh vih yienghneix, Hijsaj couh heuh aen cingj mwnq heuh Aihswz
Gajlaeng, gyoengq hoiq Hijsaj caemhcaiq vat aen cingj he. Yiengq, gyoengqde caiq vih aen cingj neix hwj daeuj doxceng. Hijsaj couh an aen cingj neix heuh Sihdiznaz.

Hijsaj couh bae daixlingh mwnq, caemhcaiq vat aen cingj he. Mbat neix gyoengqde mij daeuj vih aen cingj neix hwj doxceng lo. Yiengq Hijsaj couh naeuz: “Mbat neix Yehhozvaz soengq hawj raeuz gvangq yubyub dih dieg; baezneix raeuz ij fatdad lailai hwj hwngqhwngq seiqseiq bae.” De couh an aen cingj neix heuh Liqhozbwz.
Mwh Hijsaj bae daengz Bezciqbah hih

ngwnz mwnq, Yehhozvaz yienh hawj de raen, naeuz: “Gou dwg Cangqdiq, couh dwg baujcuk baujyouh daxboh mwngz Yaqbwzlahhanj dih Cangqdiq. Mwngz gaejyungh lau, aenvih gou caeuq mwngz youq. Vih bouxhoiq gou Yaqbwzlahhanj dih laizyouz, gou ij soengq fuk hawj mwngz, vanzlij sawjhawj doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz fatdad lailai hwj hwngqhwngq seiqseiq bae.”
Gajlaeng, Hijsaj couh youq mwnq caeb aen daiz dajbwiz he hwj haenh Yehhozvaz, gingqbaiq Yehhozvaz. De caemh youq mwnq dap bungz hwj youq, gyoengq hoiq de caemhcaiq youq mwnq vat aen cingj he.
Yaqbijmijlwz caeuq boux bang de ok geiqmaeuz he Yaqhuqsaj, vanzlij miz boux gywnhcangj de Feihgoz, dajlwh Gihlah'wj bae daengz Hijsaj mwnq.
Yiengq Hijsaj doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou giqyienz baenxlai haenq gou, vanzlij boenq gou dajlaeng dieg sou okma, seizneix vihmaz cungj lij daeuj laeng gou nej?”
Gyoengqde han naeuz: “Aenvih gyoengqraeuz rox, Yehhozvaz cungj dwg caeuq mwngz youq. Mboujyienz seizneix gyoengqraeuz song mbiengj cungj caezgya baujcingq, caezgya doxdingh ndei hwj,

baujcingq mwngz mbouj haih gyoengqraeuz, caemh luj raeuz mij haih goq mwngz ityiengh, cungj dwg doiq mwngz ndei, vanzlij hawj mwngz bingzan ok ma. Hawjm'z yawj hux, Yehhozvaz soengq fuk hawj mwngz baenx lai!”
Gajlaeng Hijsaj couh loengh geij daiz byaek cingj gyoengqde gw, yiengq gyoengqde couh caezgya gw lo.
Daengz ngoenz daixngeih, gyoengqde daihcaeux hwnq le, couh caezgya doxbaujcingq. Yiengq, Hijsaj couh soengq gyoengqde okma, gyoengqde caemh an'an onjonj maj lo.
Couh youq ngoenz mwnq, gyoengq hoiq Hijsaj caemh daeuj naeuz de ni, naeuz: “Gyoengqraeuz vat cingj cimh ndaej raen raemx lo!”
Yiengq, Hijsaj couh an aen cingj mwnq heuh Siqbah.
Hijsauj ndaej seiqcib bi mwhde, aeu song dah lwgsau Hwz cuz vunz ma guh yah. Song dah neix, dah he dwg dah lwgsau Bijliq, heuh Youzdiz, dah he dwg dah lwgsau Hijlwnz, heuh Bahsizmaz.
Song mehyah Hijsauj siengzseiz hawj Hijsaj caeuq Liqbwzgyah simnyap ij rai.

Hijsaj laux le, song cehra de cungj rava foenjfoenj myox myadmyad liux lo, yawj cungj mbouj raen saek di laem lo. Miz ngoenz he, de hawj vunz heuh daeglwg daeuz de Hijsauj daeuj daengz dangqnaj de. De couh naeuz: “Lwg hax!”
Hijsauj han naeuz: “Ox! Guxmaz lah?”
De caiq naeuz: “Mwngz yawj lux, gou gaenq laux liux lo; mbouj rox ij lix ndaej geijlai caez laem lo.
Seizneix mwngz dawz gij dwk nyaen soj yungh dih doxgaiq, gung hah, naq hah, bae rogndoi rognaz dwk nyaen ma.
Dwk ma le, couh ciuq gou haenj gw hih loengh. Loengh ndei le, dawz daeuj hawj gou gw, domh gou mijyaengz rai cihsenz, sien hoh fuk hawj mwngz gaenq.”
Mwh Hijsaj doiq daeglwg de gangj hih gij vah mwnq, Liqbwzgyah dingqri lo. Yiengq, daengj Hijsauj bae dwk nyaen le,
Liqbwzgyah couh gangj naeuz daeglwg iq de Yajgoz ni, naeuz: “Gou dingqri daxboh mwngz doiq daeggo mwngz naeuz:
‘Mwngz bae dwk nyaen ma, loengh feihgw hwj hawj gou; domh gou seizneix vanz mijyaengz rai, gou ij youq dangqnaj Yehhozvaz hoh fuk hawj mwngz.’”
Liqbwzgyah caiq naeuz: “Lwg hah! Seizneix mwngz dingq gou gangj, ciuq gij vah gou bae guh.
Mwngz seizneix majcangq bae daengz gyoengq yiengz mwnq genj aeu song duz yiengzlwg cix biz cix oiq he ma hawj gou; gou couh ciuq daxboh mwngz haenj gw hih yienghmwnq ma loengh.
Loengh ndaej le, mwngz couh dawz bae hawj daxboh mwngz gw, hawj de mijyaengz rai cihsenz sien hoh fuk hawj mwngz.”
Hoeng, Yajgoz doiq daxmeh de naeuz: “Daeggo gou baenx ndang cungj dwg miz fwn; gou nej, gou cenz ndang cungj ngaeuz ngamxngamh.
Dingjlingz daxboh mo deng gou, rox naeuz gou yaeuh de, daengz mwhmwnq gou mboujdanh mbouj ndaej hoh fuk, dauqfanj ngaiz mang.”
Daxmeh de han naeuz: “Lwg hah, mwngz gaejyungh you; hauhnaeuz mwngz ngaiz mang nex, couh youz gou rap bax! Mwngz caenhrox ciuq gou gangj hih yienghmwnq bae guh ndaej lo; bae ying yiengz ma hawj gou.”
Yiengq, Yajgoz couh bae ying yiengz ma hawj daxmeh de. Daxmeh de couh ciuq daxboh de haenj gw hih yienghmwnq loengh.
Loengh ndei le, de couh dawz dauq buh daeglwg daeuz de, coengq youq laeng de hih dauq ceiq ndei he, aeu ma hawj daeglwg iq de daenj,
caemhcaiq aeu gij naeng yiengz ngamq gaj mwnq, lij daiq fwn he, daeuj duk gij fawz caeuq gij hoz mwnq ngaeuz he hwj.
Yiengq le, couh dawz de loengh ndei hih nohyiengz caeuq menqbauh, dawz daeuj hawj Yajgoz.
Yajgoz byaij bae daengz daxboh de mwnq, heuh sing he: “Boh!”
Boh de han naeuz: “Aex, lwg hax, mwngz dwg byawz lah?”

Yajgoz han naeuz: “Gou dwg daeglwg daeuz mwngz Hijsauj hah. Gou gaenq ciuq mwngz raengq hih guh ndei lo. Cingj mwngz hwnq hwnjdaeuj, hwnq hwnjdaeuj naengh ndei hwj gw gij nohnyaen gou dwk ndaej ma he hax; gw ndaej le, ndaej hoh fuk hawj gou lo.”
Gajlaeng, Hijsaj cam naeuz: “Yoq? Lwg hah, mwngz guxmaz ndaej baenx vaiq, couh dwk ndaej nyaen ma lah?”
Yajgoz han naeuz: “Dwg Yehhozvaz, Cangqdiq mwngz bang gou lah.”
Hijsaj caiq doiq Yajgoz naeuz: “Lwg hax, mwngz dep gou dineix daeuj, daengj gou laxlax momo mwngz yawj, yawjyawj mwngz cingqcaen dwg daeglwg daeuz gou haz.”
Yiengq, Yajgoz couh byaij bae dep daxboh de. Daxboh de couh momo laxlax de naeuz: “Geizheih, sing dwg sing Yajgoz; fawz dwg fawz Hijsauj.”
Aenvih gij fawz Yajgoz caemh luj gij fawz Hijsauj yienghmwnq fwn nyumjnyumq, Hijsaj gaenhbaenj nginh mbouj ok de dwg Yajgoz, couh
Hoeng, Hijsaj vanzlij caiq cam de naeuz: “Mwngz cingqcaen dwg daeglwg daeuz gou Hijsauj haz?”
Yajgoz caiq han naeuz: “Dwg hah! Gou dwg hah!”
Gajlaeng Hijsaj couh naeuz: “Lwg hah, dawz nohnyaen goqdaeuj hawj gou gw; daengj gou gw sat le, couh hoh fuk hawj mwngz.”
Yiengq Yajgoz couh dawz daxmeh loengh hih nohyiengz ndenq hawj de, caemhcaiq aeu laeuj hawj de gw.
Gw sat le, Hijsaj doiq Yajgoz naeuz: “Lwg hax, mwngz daeuj gotgot gou bax.”

Yajgoz caemh bae got daxboh de, yiengq daxboh de mupraen gij heiq rang diuz buh de le, couh hoh fuk hawj de naeuz: “Gij heiq rang gwnz ndang daeglwg gou hax, caemh rang luj Yehhozvaz soengq raemxfwn hawj reih le gij rang mwnq baenxlai rang.
Muengh Cangqdiq soengq hawj mwngz gij raemxraiz
Gij doem biz lajdeih, haeux mienh fungcuk, laeuj lai raixcaix, gaiqgaiq cungj miz.
Muengh ciencien fanhfanh minzcuz swqhaeuh mwngz,
Ciencien fanhfanh guekgya cungj daeuj baiq mwngz sax mwngz.
Mwngz ndaej guenjciq beixnuengx mwngz;
Doengh daih gajlaeng daxmeh mwngz cungj daeuj baiqbaiq saxsax doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz.
Bouxlawz mang mwngz hih, bouxlawz caemh ngaiz mang;
Bouxlawz hoh fuk hawj mwngz hih, bouxlawz caemh ndaej miz fuk.”
Hijsaj hoh fuk hawj Yajgoz sat le, Yajgoz ngamqngamq dajlaeng daxboh de mwnq ok ma, daeggo de Hijsauj caemh ngamqngamq luj letlet bae dwk nyaen ma.
Yiengq, Hijsauj caemh loengh ndei le, couh dawz bae hawj daxboh de, naeuz: “Boh! Cingj mwngz hwnq daeuj; gw gij nohnyaen gou bang mwngz dwk ndaej ma he hax. Gw sat le, couh hoh fuk hawj gou bax!”
Hijsaj dingq le, couh doeksaet hwj cam naeuz: “Mwngz dwg bouxlawz hax?”
Hijsauj han naeuz: “Gou dwg daeglwg daeuz mwngz Hijsauj hah.”

Hijsaj dingq gawq vah neix le, cungj simvueng hwj ndang saenz dedded naeuz: “Yiengq mwngz mijyaengz daeuj cihsenz, dwg byawz aeu nohnyaen daeuj hawj gou gw lah? Gou gaenq gw lo, caemhcaiq hoh fuk hawj de lo. Baezneix de gaengjdingq miz fuk; gij fuk neix itcig dwg de ndaej.”
Hijsauj dingq daxboh de naeuz yienghneix le, couh coengq sing hwj daej engxengx hwnjdaeuj, gouz daxboh de naeuz: “Gou nej? Boh hax, gouz mwngz caemh hoh fuk hawj gou bax!”
Hoeng, Hijsaj han naeuz: “Daegnuengx mwngz gvijgvij gvaiqgvaiq, daeuj coemx gou aeu gij fuk mwngz lo.”
Gajlaeng Hijsauj

Gajlaeng Hijsaj han naeuz: “Gou gaenq laeb de guh bouxcawj mwngz lo; mwngz caeuq sojmiz hih gyoengq beixnuengx de cungj dwg guh gij hoiq de. Caemh nyok hawj de gaiqgaiq cungj miz, bibi cungj miz doengh go haeux caeuq buzdauz ndaej ngauz laeuj. Lwg hax! Gou seizneix vanzlij miz gijmaz ndaej hawj mwngz nex?”
Hijsauj caiq cam naeuz: “Boh hax, mwngz cijngamq miz yiengh fuk he ndaej hox maz? Boh hax boh, gouzgouz mwngz caemh hoh fuk hawj gou bax!” Gangj sat le, caiq coengq sing daej engxengx.
Gajlaeng daxboh de raen Hijsauj yienghneix le, couh doiq de naeuz:
Mwngz youq dih deixfueng, mbouj dwg doem biz;
Gij raemxraiz gwnzmbwn mbouj caiq doek hawj mwngz.
Mwngz ij gauq bae hangz vunz gw,
Caiq ngaiz swqhaeuh daegnuengx mwngz.
Hoeng, cungj ij miz ngoenz daengz mwngz dingx mbouj ndaej he.
Daengz mwhmwnq, mwngz couh fanj hwnjdaeuj, ndaej luet ek lo;
Mwngz mbouj caiq ngaiz daegnuengx mwngz guenjciq laem lo.
Hijsauj couh vih daxboh de hoh fuk hawj Yajgoz, de couh haemzcaeuz Yajgoz, couh gag naemj naeuz: “Fanjcingq daxboh ijvanh rai lo; daengj daengz de rai gvaqseiq le, couh gajrai Yajgoz bae.”

Gajlaeng miz vunz naeuz Liqbwzgyah ni, naeuz Hijsauj giqvaq ij gaj Yajgoz. Yiengq, Liqbwzgyah couh baij vunz bae heuh daeglwg iq de daeuj, doiq de naeuz: “Daeggo mwngz ijsiengj gaj mwngz ma boixhaemz.”
De caiq naeuz: “Lwg hax! Mwngz seizneix ij dingq gij vah gou, ciuq gij vah gou bae guh. Seizneix mwngz majcangq deuz bae Hahlanz, laeng daeggo gou Lahbanh mwnq bae youq.
Camqciz laeng de youq duenh he gaenq; daengj daengz daeggo mwngz hozroengz mbouj aeuqheiq,
caemh lumz gaxgonq mwngz doiq de soj guh hih saeh le, gou menhcij baij vunz bae ciep mwngz ma. Gou hozbiet ngoenz he ngaiz vwt bae song daeglwg nej?”
Yiengq, Liqbwzgyah
Gajlaeng Hijsaj couh heuh Yajgoz daeuj daengz dangqnaj de, youh raengq youh hoh fuk hawj de naeuz: “Mwngz gaejyungh aeu gij lwgsau Gyahnamz ma guh yah lo.
Seizneix mwngz majcangq bae Bahdanj-Yaqlanz, bae laeng goengjda mwngz Bijdujliq bae, laeng gyoengq lwgsau boxlungz mwngz aeu dah he ma guh yah.
Muengh akak rengzrengz gaiqgaiq cungj ndaej guh daengz dih Cangqdiq soengq fuk hawj mwngz, sawjhawj mwngz miz lwglwg lanlan hwngqhwngq seiqseiq, bienqbaenz aen minzcuz hunghung he.

Muengh Cangqdiq soengq hawj Yaqbwzlahhanj dih gij fuk mwnq, seizneix caemh muengh de cenz hawj mwngz caeuq gij lwglwg lanlan doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz. Yiengq, mwngz gajlaeng caemh ndaej aeu gij dieg mwngz seizneix doz youq he, couh dwg gij dieg Cangqdiq soengq hawj Yaqbwzlahhanj he.”
Couh yienghneix, Hijsaj hawj Yajgoz bae lo, hawj de bae daengz Bahdanj-Yaqlanz, bae laeng boxlungz de. (Boxlungz de heuh Lahbanh, dwg daeglwg Bijdujliq Yaqlanz vunz, dwg daeggo Liqbwzgyah.)

Hijsauj rox naeuz daxboh de gaenq hoh fuk hawj Yajgoz, caiq hawj de bae Bahdanj-Yaqlanz aeu yah, caiq rox daengz daxboh de hoh fuk hawj Yajgoz hih mwhde, raengq de naeuz, mbouj hawj de aeu gij lwgsau Gyahnamz ma guh yah,
caemh rox Yajgoz dingq gij bohmeh de le, bae Bahdanj-Yaqlanz lo.
De couh rox daengz daxboh de mbouj haenj gij vunzbaz Gyahnamz le,
couh
Yajgoz dajlwh Bezciqbah bae Hahlanz.
Bae daengz dangjroen, gyangjngoenz doek mwhde, de ngamqluj byaij daengz mwnq deixfueng he, gajlaeng, de couh youq mwnq youq haemh. Mwhde, de aeu ngauq rin he ma demh raeuj hwj ninz.
Ninz le, fangxngwnzloq, loqraen miz baenx mbaek baenx mbaek lae, daj lajdoem sang daengz gwnzmbwn. Youq gwnz lae miz doengh bouxcai Cangqdiq hwnjhwnj roengzroengz,

caemh raen Cangqdiq ndwn youq baixgwnz lae, doiq de naeuz: “Gou dwg Yehhozvaz, dwg baujcuk baujyouh daxgoeng mwngz Yaqbwzlahhanj caeuq daxboh mwngz Hijsaj dih Cangqdiq. Gou ij dawz dieg mwngz ninz neix soengq hawj mwngz caeuq gij lwglwg lanlan doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz.

Doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz fatdad hwj doeng sae namz baek dauqcawq cungj miz, ij lai luj boenqcingh bae. Baezneix lajmbwn sojmiz dih minzcuz cungj dwg youz mwngz caeuq doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz ndaej miz fuk.

Gou caemh caeuq mwngz youq; mboujlwnh mwngz bae daengz mwnqlaw, gou cungj baujcuk baujyouh mwngz, vanzlij daiq mwngz dauq ma daengz gij dieg neix. Gou baenzbaenz cungj mbouj liz mbouj vwt mwngz; gou ij doiqyienh gaxgonq gou dapwngq hawj mwngz hih.”
Yajgoz fangxngwnzloq daengz dineix le, baex singj hwnjdaeuj he couh naeuz: “Ox, Cangqdiq gaengjdingq dwg youq dieg neix; gou it di cungj mbouj rox.”

Gajlaeng, Yajgoz cungj lau hwj ij rai bae, couh naeuz: “Mwnq dieg neix, mbouj dwg guxmaz dieg; vunz it di cungj mbouj ndaej seizbienh. Mwnq dieg neix, gaengjdingq dwg ranz Cangqdiq, dieg Cangqdiq, bakdou
Couh yienghneix, daengz haet daixngeih, Yajgoz hwnq le, couh dawz ngauq rin de aeu ma demh raeuj ninz mwnq, laeb hwnjdaeuj guh gijnenqbeih, caiq aeu youz makmbi ma raix hwnjbae,
caiq an coh hawj mwnq dieg mwnq heuh Bwzdwzliq. (
Gajlaeng Yajgoz baujcingq naeuz: “Cangqdiq, hauhnaeuz mwngz caeuq gou youq, baujcuk baujyouh gou itloh an'an onjonj bae, caiq nyok gij gw hawj gou, caemh nyok buh hawj gou daenj,
vanzlij hawj gou an'an onjonj dauq ma daengz ranz daxboh gou, yiengq gou couh nginh mwngz dwg gou dih Cangqdiq.
Gou caemh laeb ngauq rin gijnenqbeih neix ma guh gingqbaiq mwngz.
Yajgoz vanzlij caiq ganjroen; de bae daengz gij dieg vunz baixdoeng he.

De raen ndaw doengh reih miz aen cingj he. Youq henz cingj miz sam gyoengq yiengz ninz youq henz de, aenvih gij vunz ciengx yiengz cungj dwg dajlwh ndaw cingj neix aeu raemx hwnj ma hawj yiengz gw he. Hoeng, aen cingj neix gwnz de goemq miz baj rin hunghung he.
(Daengj daengz gyoengq yiengz ma caez le, gij vunz ciengx yiengz cij buen baj rin hung mwnq, aeu raemx hwnj ma hawj yiengz gw, gajlaeng caiq dawz baj rin hung mwnq goemq boiz.)
Yajgoz raen le, couh bae cam gyoengq ciengx yiengz mwnq naeuz: “Baengzyoux, faenhsou dajlwh mwnqlawz daeuj hax?”
Gyoengqde han naeuz: “Gyoengqraeuz dwg dajlwh Hahlanz daeuj he.”
Yajgoz caiq cam naeuz: “Faenhsou rox lan Nazhoq, Lahbanh haz?”
Gyoengqde caiq han naeuz: “Rox hah.”
Yajgoz youhcaiq cam naeuz: “De baenzlawz yiengh hah; vanzlij ndei bax?”
Gyoengqde caemhcaiq han naeuz: “Ndei hah. Neq, hawjm'z yawj hux, dahlwg de Lahgyez duq gyoengq yiengz de goqdaeuj lo.”

Gajlaeng Yajgoz naeuz: “Yawj lux, gyangjngoenz cungj lij sang gvangxgvangx, mijyaengz daeng gyoengq yiengz doxcomz haem; faenhsou vihmaz mbouj hawj gyoengq yiengz gw raemx le, caiq doiqyungz duq gyoengqde bae ciengx nej?”
Gyoengqde dingq le, han naeuz: “Gyoengqraeuz ij daengj daengz doengh gyoengq yiengz cungj ma caez le, cij ndaej gwenj baj rin hung goemq cingj, cij ndaej aeu raemx hawj gyoengq yiengz gw.”
Yajgoz caeuq gyoengqde gangj vah hih mwhde, Lahgyez cingq duq gyoengq yiengz daxboh de goqdaeuj. (Yienzlaiz Lahgyez caemh dwg boux ciengx yiengz he.)
Yajgoz yawjraen Lahgyez duq gyoengq yiengz daxboh bonjfaenh de byaij goqdaeuj le, couh bae gwenj baj rin goemq cingj mwnq, sien aeu raemx hawj gyoengq yiengz boxlungz de gw.
Gajlaeng Yajgoz cungj angq hwj raemxra roengz bae, couh rumj goqbae ciep
De doq raemxra roengz doq naeuz Lahgyez ni naeuz bonjfaenh de dwg vaihseng daxboh de, dwg daeglwg Liqbwzgyah. Lahgyez dingq le, couh riq maj naeuz daxboh de ni.
Lahbanh dingqri naeuz daeglwg dahnuengx de Yajgoz daeuj lo le, couh angq hwj vaiqdi riq okbae ciep de, daiq de ma ranz. Yajgoz caemh gangj naeuz de ni sojmiz dih saeh.
Lahbanh dingq le, angq hwj naeuz: “Mwngz cingqcaen dwg caen vaihseng gou!”
Mwhde, aenvih Yajgoz gig haenj Lahgyez, yiengq de couh doiq Lahbanh naeuz: “Hauhnaeuz mwngz dapwngq hawj dahlwg iq mwngz haq laeng gou nex, gou nyienh'eiq bang mwngz guh caet bi hong.”
Lahbanh han naeuz: “Doiq gou ma gangj, hawj de haq laeng mwngz giengz goq haq laeng vunz. Mwngz couh youq laeng gou mwnqneix youq bax!”
Yajgoz vihliux Lahgyez, de bang Lahbanh guh baenx caet bi hong, hoeng, caet bi neix doiq de ma gangj, caemhdangq luj geij ngoenz ityiengh, aenvih de gig aiq Lahgyez.
Caet bi muenx le, Yajgoz couh doiq Lahbanh naeuz: “Dingh hih caet bi daengz lo; cingj mwngz hawj dahlwg mwngz haq hawj gou bax. Yiengq gou couh ndaej aeu de ma guh yah lo.”
Gajlaeng Lahbanh couh cingj laeuj, cingj dieg mwnq sojmiz dih vunz daeuj gw laeuj.
Hoeng daengz laep le, Lahbanh dauqfanj soengq dahlwg daeuz de Liqyaq daeuj hawj Yajgoz. Yajgoz couh caeuq de ninz.
Lahbanh caemh soengq Sizbwz dahhoiq neix hawj Liqyaq guh hoiq.

Daengz haet daixngeih le, Yajgoz cij rox naeuz yienzlaiz dwg Liqyaq lah. Yiengq de couh bae cimh Lahbanh, naeuz: “Mwngz vihmaz yienghneix doiq gou? Gou dwg vihliux Lahgyez cij bang mwngz guh caet bi hong; mwngz vihmaz yaeuh gou?”
Lahbanh han naeuz: “Ciuq gyoengqraeuz dineix dih laehbeih, dahnuengx mbouj ndaej haq gaxgonq daxce.
Hauhnaeuz mwngz nyienh'eiq caiq bang gou guh caet bi hong haem nex, daengj caet ngoenz laeuj goq le, gou couh hawj dah lwgsau iq gou caemh haq hawj mwngz.”
Gajlaeng Yajgoz caemh dungziq lo. Cingj caet ngoenz laeuj muenx le, Lahbanh couh hawj dah lwgsau iq de haq laeng Yajgoz guh yah,
caemhcaiq hawj dahhoiq he Bizlah hawj Lahgyez guh hoiq.
Yiengq Yajgoz couh caeuq Lahgyez guh gvanjbaz lo. De vanzlij haemq aiq Lahgyez, aiq Lahgyez lai goq Liqyaq. Couh yienghneix, Yajgoz caiq caeuq Lahbanh guh caet bi hong.
Yiengq Yehhozvaz raen Yajgoz mbouj aiq Liqyaq le, couh hawj Liqyaq mizseng, dauqfanj hawj Lahgyez maen.
Liqyaq daiqndang le, seng miz daeglwg he. De naeuz: “Aenvih Yehhozvaz raen gou haemzhoj,” yiengq de couh an coh hawj laeq lwg neix heuh Lijbenq.

Liqyaq caiq mizndang, seng miz daeglwg he. De naeuz: “Yehhozvaz dingqri gou ienq naeuz: ‘Goeng gou mbouj aiq gou’ le, couh caiq soengq daeglwg neix hawj gou.” Yiengq de couh an coh hawj daeglwg neix heuh Sihmenj.

Liqyaq youhcaiq mizndang, caemhcaiq seng miz daeglwg he. De naeuz: “Mbat neix goeng gou gaengjdingq haenj gaen gou, aenvih gou seng baenx sam daeglwg hawj de.” Yiengq de couh an coh hawj daeglwg neix heuh Liqveiq.
Gajlaeng Liqyaq youhcaiq mizndang, youhcaiq seng miz daeglwg he. De naeuz: “Mbat neix gou ij haenh Yehhozvaz!” Yiengq de couh an coh hawj laeq lwg neix heuh Youzdaq.
Lahgyez raen bonjfaenh de mij seng ndaej saek boux lwg hawj Yajgoz le, couh rahoengz daxce de, couh doiq Yajgoz naeuz: “Mwngz hawj gou seng lwg bax; mbouj nex, gou cingxnyienh rai hoh lo!”
Gajlaeng, Yajgoz aeuqheiq Lahgyez hwj naeuz: “Mwngz naemqnaeuz gou dwg Cangqdiq hajx? Mbouj hawj mwngz ndaej mizseng hih dwg Cangqdiq, mbouj dwg gou hah!”
Lahgyez dingq le, couh doiq Yajgoz naeuz: “Nex, dahhoiq gou Bizlah youq dineix; mwngz couh caeuq de ninz bax. Ninz le, gou couh ndaej dajlaeng de miz lwg lo,
Gajlaeng Lahgyez couh hawj goengjgvan de aeu Bizlah ma guh yahnoix. Yiengq, Yajgoz couh caeuq de ninz.
Bizlah cingqgawq daiqndang gwhraix, seng daeglwg he hawj Yajgoz.
Gajlaeng Lahgyez naeuz: “Cangqdiq dingqri gou gouz de, couh buenq hawj gou deng, caemh soengq hawj gou daeglwg he.” Yiengq de couh an coh hawj daeglwg neix heuh Danq.
Dahhoiq Lahgyez, Bizlah, caiq daiqndang, caiq seng daeglwg daixngeih hawj Yajgoz.
Yiengq Lahgyez couh naeuz: “Gou caeuq daxce doxdaeuq doxceng; yawj yienghneix, vanzlij dwg gou hingz lo.” Gajlaeng de couh an coh hawj daeglwg neix heuh Nazfuzdahliq.
Liqyaq raen bonjfaenh de dingz seng mbouj ndaej caiq miz lwg le, couh hawj dahhoiq de Sizbwz hawj Yajgoz guh yahnoix.
Gajlaeng dahhoiq de couh seng daeglwg he hawj Yajgoz.
Yiengq Liqyaq couh naeuz: “Gou mingh gaeuq ndei lo!” Couh an coh hawj daeglwg neix heuh Gyahdwz.
Dahhoiq Liqyaq caiq seng daeglwg daixngeih hawj Yajgoz.
Liqyaq caemhcaiq naeuz: “Ox! Gou angq hwx; gij vunzbaz cungj ij naeuz gou angq raixcaix.” Yiengq de couh an coh hawj daeglwg neix heuh Yaqsez.
Miz baez he, daeng mwh ndaej gvej mienh mwhde, Lijbenq bae reih, youq ndaw reih raen miz cungj mak he heuh funghgyez.
Hoeng Liqyaq han naeuz: “Mwngz ciengj aeu goeng gojyez gou mbouj cuksuenq, vanzlij ij ciengj aeu daeglwg gou yaeb ndaej ma hih mak haj?”
Lahgyez caemh doq han naeuz: “Hauhnaeuz mwngz hawj di mak daeglwg mwngz yaeb ndaej ma hih hawj gou nex, haemhneix gou couh hawj Yajgoz caeuq mwngz ninz.”

Gajlaeng daengz haemh le, Yajgoz dajlwh ndaw reih ma. Liqyaq couh rumj okdaeuj ciep de, naeuz: “Haemhneix mwngz ij caeuq gou ninz, aenvih gou gaenq aeu funghgyez, couh dwg daeglwg gou yaeb ndaej ma hih, aeu ma vuenh mwngz lo.” Haemh mwnq Yajgoz couh caeuq Liqyaq ninz lo.
Yiengq, Cangqdiq dingqri Liqyaq gouz de, couh dapwngq de, hawj de mizndang, seng daixhaj daeglwg hawj Yajgoz.
Liqyaq naeuz: “Gaxgonq gou ngaiz hawj dahhoiq gou hawj goeng gou guh yahnoix; seizneix Cangqdiq couh cangj hawj gou, hawj gou ndaej
Liqyaq youhcaiq mizndang, caiq seng daixroek daeglwg hawj Yajgoz.

Liqyaq caiq naeuz: “Cangqdiq caiq soengq hawj gou dijbauj dih daeglwg neix; seizneix goeng gojyez gou gaengjdingq yawjhwnj gou, aenvih gou seng baenx roek daeglwg hawj de lo.” Yiengq de couh an coh hawj daeglwg neix heuh Sihbuqlwnz.
Gajlaeng Liqyaq caiq seng miz dah lwgsau he, an coh hawj de heuh Dijnaz.
Yiengq Lahgyez nej, Cangqdiq itcig cungj dingqri de gouz de, yiengq seizneix Cangqdiq couh bang de, hawj de mizseng lo.
Yiengq Lahgyez couh mizndang. Seng ndaej daeglwg he le, de couh naeuz: “Cangqdiq hawj gou mbouj caiq miz gij saetnaj mwnq lo.”
De couh an coh hawj daeglwg neix heuh Yozswz
Lahgyez seng Yozswz le, Yajgoz couh doiq Lahbanh naeuz: “Gou ijsiengj maj ranz, maj laeng dieg Gyahnamz gou lo.
Cingj mwngz hawj gou daiq heij lwg heij yah gou maj bax. Gyoengqde dwg gou bang mwngz guh baenx
Yiengq Lahbanh han naeuz: “Muengh mwngz vanzlij giqcuz youq mwnqneix youq! Gou suenqmingh goq lo, rox dwg vihliux mwngz Yehhozvaz cij soengq fuk hawj gou.”
De caiq naeuz: “Mwngz naeuz gou ni, mwngz ijsiengj aeu geijlai ngaenzhong? Mwngz naeuz geijlai, gou couh hawj mwngz geijlai.”
Yajgoz dauqfanj han naeuz: “Gou baenzlawz bang mwngz guh hong—gyoengq yiengz mwngz hah, gyoengq cwz mwngz hah, gou bang mwngz guenjleix le, gyoengqde baenzlawz fatdad hwnjdaeuj—mwngz caemh gag rox.

Mwh gou mijyaengz daeuj dineix mwhde, mwngz sojmiz hih cungj gig noix; seizneix nej, cwz hah, yiengz hah, baenx gyoengq baenx gyoengq. Mboujguenj gou bang mwngz guh gijmaz, Cangqdiq cungj soengq fuk hawj mwngz. Nanzdauh gou ij daengz seizlawz bae cij ndaej gag laeb aen gya bonjfaenh gou nex?”
Gajlaeng Lahbanh cam naeuz: “Yiengq gou ij hawj mwngz gijmaz nej?”
Yajgoz han naeuz: “Mwngz cungj mboujyungh hawj gou gijmaz. Caenhgag dapwngq gou yiengh he couh ndaej lo; gou couh doiqyungz bang mwngz ciengx yiengz.

Gou ngoenzneix ij byaij gyoengq yiengz mwngz goqdoh bae, dawz sojmiz hih baenx demj hah, raizbanq hah, couh dwg miz baenx demj ndaem hih menzyiengz, caeuq miz baenx demj bieg hih yiengzbya genj okdaeuj,

Yienghneix baezneix mwngz daeuj caz yawj gou ndaej dih ngaenzhong, caemh ndaej cingqmingz naeuz gou dwg boux lauxsaed he; famz dwg youq laeng gou ciengx hih yiengz, hauhnaeuz mbouj dwg miz baenx demj miz raizbanq hih yiengzbya, caeuq mbouj dwg miz baenx demj ndaem hih menzyiengz, couh suenq gou caeg aeu lo.”
Lahbanh dingq le, couh doq han naeuz: “Ndaej hah, gou dungziq hawj mwngz yienghneix guh.”

Hoeng, couh youq ngoenz mwnq, Lahbanh couh dawz miz baenx demj, miz raizbanq hih yiengzbyadaeg, caeuq miz baenx demj, miz raizbanq caiq cab miz saekbieg hih yiengzbyameh, caemh caeuq sojmiz saekndaem hih menzyiengz cungj genj okdaeuj, hawj doengh daeglwg de guenj.
Doengh daeglwg de couh duq doengh gyoengq yiengz neix bae gyae'gyae, bae daengz mwnq liz Yajgoz ciengx hih yiengz ij byaij miz sam ngoenz baenxlai gyae cij ndaej daengz he. Yajgoz nej, Yajgoz

Gajlaeng, Yajgoz couh aeu go faexyangz hah, faexgingq hah, faexgyaeuq hah, aeu doengh go neix, aeu nge oiq hih ma le, couh bok gij naeng de bae. Bok reg gek reg, bok hawj de bienqbaenz reg gek reg bieg bae le,

couh dawz doengh ngefaex neix ma coengq haeuj ndaw doenghheij ruhraemx gyoengq yiengz bienqnaengz daeuj gw raemx he hwj. Yiengq gyoengq yiengz daeuj gw raemx, caemh raen doengh ngefaex neix, couh youq mwnq doxgwih.
Gyoengq yiengz yiengq haeuj doengh ngefaex miz baenx reg neix bae doxgwih le, roengz okdaeuj dih yiengzlwg cungj dwg miz baenx demj caeuq raizbanq he.
Yajgoz vanzlij dawz doengh duz menzyiengzmeh Lahbanh genj okdaeuj linghvaih coengq,

Hauhnaeuz daengz doengh duz yiengz biz bwdbwd hoenz hwdhwd he boiqcungj nex, Yajgoz couh dawz doengh ngefaex bok naeng bienqbaenz baenx reg mwnq coengq youq doengh ruhraemx dangqnaj gyoengqde hwj, hawj doengh duz yiengz yiengq haeuj doengh ngefaex miz baenx reg he bae doxgwih.

Hauhnaeuz daengz doengh duz yiengz cix byom cix ngoenh mwnq boiqcungj nex, de couh mbouj coengq doengh ngefaex neix lo. Yiengq, doengh duz cix byom cix ngoenh mwnq couh gvi hawj Lahbanh, doengh duz cix biz cix hoenz mwnq couh gvi haeuj bonjfaenh lo.
Gajlaeng, Yajgoz yied ngoenz yied fat, yied ngoenz yied fouq, miz baenx gyoengq baenx gyoengq yiengz hah, vunzhoiq hah, duz lawz hah, caeuq duz lozdoz hah.
Yajgoz dingqri vunz naeuz doengh daeglwg Lahbanh gangj naeuz: “Yajgoz ciengj aeu gij gyadangq daxboh raeuz liux; de sojmiz dih cienzcaiz cungj dwg dajlaeng gij gyadangq daxboh raeuz ndaej hih.”
Mwhde, Yajgoz caemh gag roxnginh Lahbanh doiq de mbouj luj gaxgonq yienghmwnq caen lo.
Gajlaeng Yehhozvaz couh doiq Yajgoz naeuz: “Mwngz ij maj laeng dieg daxgoeng mwngz hah, daxboh mwngz hah, gij beixnuengx mwngz hah mwnq bae. Gou caemh caeuq mwngz youq, cauqguq mwngz.”
Yiengq Yajgoz couh baij vunz maj naeuz Lahgyez caeuq Liqyaq, hawj song boux de bae mwnq dieg ciengx yiengz mwnq cimh de.

Yajgoz couh doiq song boux de naeuz: “Gou roxnginh daxboh faenhsou doiq gou mbouj luj gaxgonq yienghmwnq ndei lo, hoeng, baujcuk baujyouh daxboh gou dih Cangqdiq itcig cungj caeuq gou youq, cauqguq gou.
Song boux faenhsou caemh rox, gou caenh gij goengrengz gou ma bang daxboh faenhsou lo,
hoeng de vanzlij coemx gou. Gannaeuz de mbatmbat gaij gij ngaenzhong gou lah, hoeng, mboujguenj de baenzlawz, Cangqdiq vanzlij mboujcwnj de sienghaih gou.

Sou yawj hux, hauhnaeuz daxboh faenhsou naeuz: ‘Miz baenx demj dih yiengz couh suenq gij ngaenzhong mwngz,’ yiengq baenx gyoengq yiengz cungj roengz miz baenx demj dih yiengzlwg; hauhnaeuz de naeuz: ‘Miz raizbanq dih yiengz couh suenq gij ngaenzhong mwngz,’ yiengq baenx gyoengq yiengz cungj roengz miz raizbanq dih yiengzlwg.
Couh dwg yienghneix Cangqdiq dawz doengh duz daxboh faenhsou dued ma soengq hawj gou.
“Miz mbat he, daeng gyoengq yiengz boiqcungj mwhde, gou miz mbat fangxngwnzloq he, loqraen doengh duz yiengzgoeng gwih youq gwnz gumq duz yiengzmeh he, cungj dwg miz baenx demj hah, miz raizbanq hah.
Youq ndaw loq gou, bouxcai Cangqdiq heuh gou naeuz: ‘Yajgoz!’ Gou han naeuz: ‘Aex!’

De naeuz: ‘Hawjm'z yawj hux, sojmiz gwih youq gwnz gumq duz yiengzmeh dih yiengzgoeng cungj dwg miz baenx demj caeuq miz raizbanq he. Mboujguenj Lahbanh baenzlawz doiq mwngz, gou cungj yawjraen, cungj rox.

Gou couh dwg youq Bwzdwzliq mwnq yienh hawj mwngz raen dih Cangqdiq, couh dwg youq mwnq mwngz aeu youz ma raix hwnj gwnz ngauq rin gijnenqbeih bae guh geiqhauh, caiq doiq gou baujcingq goq dih mwnq. Seizneix mwngz ij majcangq maj laeng dieg bohmeh mwngz.’”
Yiengq Lahgyez caeuq Liqyaq cungj majcangq han naeuz: “Ndaej hah, ndaej hah, fanjcingq raeuz youq ranz daxboh caemh mbouj faen ndaej gijmaz gyadangq.
De mbouj dwg yawj raeuz dangq bouxwnq bouxrog maz? De dawz raeuz ma vuenh gij ngaenzhong mwngz, caemh lujnaeuz de dawz raeuz hai le, caiq gag gyan aeu gij ngaenz de.
Sojhij Cangqdiq dajlaeng daxboh dued ndaej ma dih gyadangq, cungj dwg gij raeuz caeuq gyoengq lwg raeuz. Seizneix mboujguenj Cangqdiq raengq mwngz guh gijmaz, mwngz cungj ciuq de bae guh bax!”
caemh duq de youq Bahdanj-Yaqlanz soj ndaej dih doenghduz, caeuq daiq de rom ndaej dih doxgaiq, couh maj dieg Gyahnamz laeng daxboh de Hijsaj lo.
Mwhde, Lahbanh mbouj youq ranz, bae daet fwn yiengz lo. Lahgyez couh swngzgei caeg aeu duz you ndaw ranz daxboh de.
Yajgoz muenz Lahbanh, mbouj naeuz de ni;
de daiq de sojmiz dih gyadangq, nyungjnyungj nyatnyat caegcaeg deuz, deuz goq diuz dah
Daengz ngoenz daixsam, miz vunz naeuz Lahbanh ni, naeuz: “Yajgoz caeg deuz lo.”
Yiengq Lahbanh couh daiq baenx gyoengq beixnuengx de bae boenq Yajgoz, boenq daengz daixcaet ngoenz, youq Gihlez cij boenq ndaej dawz.
Ngoenz mwnq singjngwnz, Cangqdiq hawj Lahbanh fangxngwnzloq, daezsingj de naeuz: “Mwngz ij siujsim! Mbouj ndaej sienghaih Yajgoz, daiqlienz haep cungj mbouj ndaej haep de.”
Mwhde Yajgoz youq rungh Gihlez dap bungz youq. Lahbanh boenq dawz Yajgoz le, de caemh caeuq gyoengq vunz de youq mwnq dap bungz youq.
Gajlaeng, Lahbanh cam Yajgoz naeuz: “Mwngz vihmaz ij yienghneix guh, yienghneix yaeuh gou, doiq song dahlwg gou caenh lujnaeuz hoenxciengq yienghmwnq gaemh dawz, daiq gyoengqde deuz nej?

Mwngz vihmaz muenz gou caegcaeg deuz? Hauhnaeuz mwngz sien naeuz gou ni nex, gou caemh vuenvuen heijheij soengq faenhsou bae, caiq ndaek gyong, ndaek laz, danz gimz, ciengq go, soengq faenhsou bae laem hwx.
Mwngz caemh mbouj hawj gou cup dahlwg gou caeuq doenghheij lan vaihseng gou. Mwngz yienghneix guh cingqcaen gaeuq ngawz lo.

Seizneix mwngz ngaiz gou boenq dawz lo. Baenjlaiz gou seizbienh ndaej sienghaih faenhsou hih, hoeng ngoenzlwenz singjngwnz boux Cangqdiq daxboh mwngz doiq gou naeuz: ‘Mwngz ij siujsim! Mboujcwnj mwngz haep Yajgoz.’
Gou rox naeuz mwngz siengj ranz daxboh mwngz lo, cungj ngengh ij maj, yiengq mwngz couh bae bax. Hoeng, mwngz vihmaz ij caeg aeu duz you ndaw ranz gou nej?”
Yajgoz han naeuz: “Gou caegcaeg deuz, dwg lau mwngz dajlaeng gou dued aeu dahlwg mwngz maj hah.

Mwngz youq dangqnaj gij beixnuengx raeuz cimhcimh yawj, cimhraen gijmaz dwg gij doxgaiq mwngz hih, couh dawz bae bax. Hauhnaeuz mwngz youq laeng bouxlawz mo ndaej raen duz you mwngz nex, bouxlawz couh ngaiz gajrai!” Gizsaed Yajgoz gaenhbaenj mbouj rox Lahgyez caeg aeu duz you daxboh de.

Gajlaeng, Lahbanh couh gaihcij sousou diemjdiemj. De sien haeuj aen cangqbungz Yajgoz bae diemj gaxgonq, cij daengz aen Liqyaq, caiq daengz aen song dahhoiq gyoengqde bae diemj, hoeng cungj mij diemj ndaej raen saek gaiq. Yiengq de caiq haeuj aen cangqbungz Lahgyez bae diemj.
Gizsaed Lahgyez gaenq dawz duz you yo haeuj aen daeh'an duz lozdoz bae lo. De yo le, couh naengh youq gwnz de hwj, hawj Lahbanh cimh baenx cenz cangqbungz cungj mij cimh ndaej raen saek yiengh.

Lahgyez doiq daxboh de naeuz: “Boh hax, seizneix gou ndangdaej mbouj fungbienh; mboujeiqseiq lo, mbouj ndaej youq dangqnaj mwngz ndwn hwnjdaeuj. Cingj mwngz gaejyungh aeuqheiq.” Lahbanh dauqcawq diemj, dauqcawq cimh, cungj mij cimh ndaej raen duz you ndaw ranz de.
Gajlaeng Yajgoz hujheiq dengxdengx hwj saemjcam Lahbanh naeuz: “Gou dauqdaej famh gijmaz coih, famh gijmaz faz hawj mwngz daeuj boenq gou luj boenq vunzfamh nwih?

Mwngz diemj gij doxgaiq gou liux, diemj ndaej raen gijmaz nex? Diemj ndaej raen, couh dawz okdaeuj coengq youq dangqnaj gyoengq beixnuengx gou caeuq gyoengq beixnuengx mwngz hah, hawj gyoengqde bingzbingz song boux raeuz yawj.
“Gou youq laeng mwngz youq baenx ngeihcib bi. Youq ngeihcib bi neix daeuj, gij menzyiengzmeh caeuq gij yiengzbyameh mwngz mij ngaiz lon goq saek duz lwg.
Daiqlienz ngaiz duz nyaen haeb rai hih yiengz, gou cungj mij dawz bae hawj mwngz yawj; gou gag boiz. Hoeng, mwngz nej? Mboujlwnh doengxngoenz doengxngwnz
“Gou siengzseiz doengxngoenz souh ndit souh hwngq, ij rai dwgrengz; singjngwnz singjhaemh nit hwj ninz ra mbouj laep.

Gou youq laeng mwngz baenx ngeihcib bi, vih ij aeu song dahlwg mwngz, begbeg bang mwngz guh baenx cibseiq bi hong. Vihliux gyoengq yiengz mwngz, gou swqhaeuh mwngz roek bi. Mwngz caiq siengzseiz gaij gij ngaenzhong gou.

Hauhnaeuz mbouj dwg boux miz vi hawj vunz roxnginh lau hih Cangqdiq, baujhuq daxgoeng gou Yaqbwzlahhanj caeuq daxboh gou Hijsaj dih Cangqdiq caeuq gou youq nex, mwngz gaengjdingq hawj gou baet fawz hoengq maj. Caeklaiq hwx, caeklaiq Cangqdiq yawjraen gij haemzhoj gou caeuq gij dwgrengz gou, couh youq ngoenzlwenz singjngwnz de buenq hawj mwngz miz coih.”

Lahbanh dingq Yajgoz yienghneix naeuz le, couh han de naeuz: “Lwgsau lwgsau gou, vaihseng vaihseng gou, yiengz cix dwg yiengz gou; youq dangqnaj mwngz sojmiz dih cungj dwg gij gou liux. Hoeng ngoenzneix gou ij ndaej dawz gyoengqde baenzlawz yiengh bae?
Daeuj, mboujyienz raeuz song boux doxdingh ndei, guh raeuz gajlaeng dih baengzgawq.”
Yiengq Yajgoz couh dawz ngauq rin he ma laeb guh geiqhauh.
De caiq doiq gyoengq vunz ndaw ranz de naeuz: “Faenhsou aeu rin ma dong guh baenx dong hwj.” Gajlaeng gyoengqde couh dong baenx dong rin. Dong ndei le, couh youq henz dong rin de caezgya gw haeux.
Gajlaeng, Lahbanh couh doiq Yajgoz naeuz: “Ngoenzneix dong rin neix couh dwg guh mwngz caeuq gou doxdingh ndei dih baengzgawq.”
Lahbanh caemhcaiq naeuz: “Daengj raeuz song boux doxbiek le, muengh Yehhozvaz gyenhciq raeuz song boux.” Yiengq mwnq dieg neix caemh heuh Mijswhbah.

Lahbanh caiq naeuz: “Hauhnaeuz mwngz yawj doengh dahlwg gou mbouj dij, cixnaeuz caiq aeu daixlingh mehyah nex, cungjsuenq naeuz mij vunz rox, hoeng, mwngz ijaeu ndaejgeiq, Cangqdiq youq cungqgyan gyenhciq raeuz song boux.
Mwngz yawj, laeb youq cungqgyan song boux raeuz dih dong rin caeuq ngauq rin laeb guh geiqniemh neix

cungj dwg gyoengqraeuz dih baengzgawq. Gou gyenhgyez mbouj yamq cauhgoq dong rin caeuq ngauq rin laeb guh geiqniemh neix bae haih mwngz, mwngz caemh mbouj ndaej yamq goq dong rin caeuq ngauq rin laeb guh geiqniemh neix daeuj haih gou.

Muengh Yaqbwzlahhanj sinq dih cwnz caeuq Nazhoq sinq dih cwnz buenqdingh song boux raeuz deng caeuq mbouj deng.” Gajlaeng Yajgoz couh yiengq daxboh de Hijsaj soj soenhgingq dih Cangqdiq, couh dwg boux miz vi hawj vunz roxnginh lau hih Cangqdiq baujcingq yienghneix guh,
caemh youq gwnz bya dajcoengq bwiz Cangqdiq, caiq cingj
Daengz haet daixngeih daihcaeux, Lahbanh hwnq le, couh cup doengh gyoengq lan vaihseng de caeuq dahlwg de. Gajlaeng de couh maj ranz lo.
Yajgoz vanzlij dwg giqcuz ganjroen. Daengz buenqbangh roen, gyoengq cai Cangqdiq daeuj yawj de.
Yajgoz raen gyoengqde le, couh naeuz: “Gyoengq neix dwg gyoengq bing Cangqdiq!” Gajlaeng de couh heuh mwnq dieg mwnq heuh Majhahnenq.
Yajgoz sien baij vunz bae Sih'wj (Sih'wj caemh dwg dieg Hijdungh), bae cimh daeggo de Hijsauj, ijsiengj lox hawj de hozroengz.
De couh raengq gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou doiq daeggo gou naeuz: ‘Bouxhoiq mwngz
Gou seizneix miz baenx gyoengq cwz, baenx gyoengq lawz, baenx gyoengq yiengz, caemh miz baenx gyoengq hoiq. Seizneix baij vunz daeuj naeuz bouxcawj gou ni; muengh mwngz mbouj yiem gou.”’”
Gajlaeng doengh boux baij bae mwnq ma naeuz Yajgoz ni, naeuz: “Raeuz bae daengz daeggo mwngz mwnq, raen de daiq baenx seiqbak vunz yiengq mwngz mwnqneix daeuj.”
Yiengq Yajgoz cungj lau hwj dungxmbouq ndangsaenz heiq memmem liux, vaiqdi hawj gij vunz caeuq doenghduz cungj faen baenz song buek hwj.
De gag naemj naeuz: “Hauhnaeuz Hijsauj daeuj hoenx buek he nex, vanzlij lw buek he ndaej riq deuz.”
Gajlaeng, Yajgoz couh gouz Cangqdiq naeuz: “Cangqdiq hax,
mwngz doiq gou naeuz goq, naeuz: ‘Gou ij baujhuq mwngz, hawj doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz fatdad lai luj gij sa henz haij ityiengh, hanz geq cungj geq mbouj rox liux.’
Ngoenz mwnq doengxhaemh de couh daj gij doenghduz de aeu mbangj okdaeuj guh laex, soengq hawj daeggo de Hijsauj:
yiengzbyameh miz songbak duz, yiengzbyadaeg miz ngeihcib duz; menzyiengzmeh miz songbak duz, menzyiengzdaeg miz ngeihcib duz;
caiq miz samcib duz lozdozmeh vanzlij daiqnauq lienz lwg he; cwzmeh miz seiqcib duz, cwzdaeg miz cib duz; lawzmeh miz ngeihcib duz, lawzdaeg miz cib duz.

De dawz doengh duz neix it cungj faen it gyoengq okdaeuj, caemh hawj it bouxhoiq guenj it gyoengq, caiq doiq gyoengq hoiq de naeuz: “Faenhsou bae gaxgonq; gyoengq caeuq gyoengq ij gek miz duenh roen he hwj.”

De caiq raengq bouxhoiq byaij ceiq daixdaeuz he naeuz: “Hauhnaeuz daeggo gou raen mwngz, cam naeuz: ‘Mwngz dwg vunz ranzlawz? Bouxcawj mwngz dwg bouxlawz? Mwngz ij bae mwnqlawz? Gyoengq doenghduz dangqnaj mwngz dwg gij bouxlawz?’
yiengq mwngz couh naeuz: ‘Dwg bouxhoiq mwngz Yajgoz; de ij dawz gij neix ma guh laex soengq hawj bouxcawj de Hijsauj. De caemh daeuj hwj; de byaij youq gajlaeng raeuz.’”
Gajlaeng Yajgoz caiq raengq doengh boux duq doengh gyoengq gajlaeng he naeuz: “Faenhsou raen Hijsauj nex, caemh ij yienghneix doiq de naeuz.
Vanzlij ij naeuz: ‘Bouxhoiq mwngz Yajgoz daeuj gajlaeng.’”

Yajgoz yienghneix guh dwg aenvih de gag naemj: “Gou sien yungh gyoengq doenghduz neix ma guh laex soengq hawj de, lox de, daengj de hozroengz mbouj haenq le, gou menhcij bae caeuq de raennaj; saekseiz de caemh nyiuz gou nej.”
Couh yienghneix, Yajgoz couh hawj gyoengq hoiq duq gyoengq doenghduz bae gaxgonq; bonjfaenh de vanzlij youq ndaw yingz youq haemh.
Ngwnz mwnq Yajgoz hwnq le, couh sien daiq song mehyah de caeuq song meh yahnoix de caiq cib'it daeglwg de dangh goq diuz dah Yajboz bae.
De hawj gyoengqde sien goq bae le, gajlaeng lij lw dih vunz hah, doxgaiq hah, doenghduz hah cungj caemh goq bae liux lo.
Lij gag lw Yajgoz youq gajlaeng.
Sawqmwh miz boux he daeuj caeuq de doxbanj; song boux de banj hox, banj hox, banj daengz ranz fuemxluemj.
Gajlaeng boux mwnq raen bonjfaenh banj mbouj goq de, couh youq daj saivaq roengz ma dih duq ndok mwnq dub mbat he, yiengq gij ha de couh ngaiz gyoeg lo.
Boux mwnq naeuz: “Ranz ij rongh lo; coengq gou veiq!”
Yajgoz han naeuz: “Mwngz mbouj hoh fuk hawj gou, gou couh mbouj hawj mwngz bae.”
Yiengq boux mwnq cam naeuz: “Mwngz heuh maz coh?”
Yajgoz han naeuz: “Gou heuh Yajgoz.”
Gajlaeng boux mwnq naeuz: “Daj seizneix hwnj, gij coh mwngz mbouj caiq heuh Yajgoz laem lo; ij heuh Hijswzlez, aenvih mwngz caeuq Cangqdiq caeuq vunz doxbanj cungj ndaej hingz.”
Yajgoz cam naeuz: “Cingj mwngz naeuz gou ni, gij coh mwngz heuh maz?”
Boux mwnq han naeuz: “Mwngz ij cam gij coh gou ma guh maz?” Gangj sat le, couh youq mwnq hoh fuk hawj Yajgoz lo.
Gajlaeng Yajgoz couh heuh mwnq dieg mwnq heuh Biznujihlwz.
Yajgoz daj Biznujihlwz okdin bae hih mwhde, gyangjngoenz ngamqngamq hwnj. Aenvih gij ha de ngaiz gyoeg, byaij roen vaij ngwtngat ngwtngat.
Yiengq gij vunz Hijswzlez vih gijnenq Yajgoz dih gienh saeh neix, itcig daengz seizneix cungj mbouj gw doenghduz hih duq ndok mwnq caeuq gij nginz de.
Yajgoz daj lizgyae couh yawjraen Hijsauj daiq baenx seiqbak vunz yiengq de mwnqneix byaij daeuj. De couh vaiqdi dawz gyoengq lwg de faen hawj Liqyaq, Lahgyez caeuq song meh yahnoix de daiq,
vanzlij hawj song meh yahnoix gag daiq gij lwg bonjfaenh de byaij daixdaeuz, Liqyaq caeuq gij lwg de byaij gaen gajlaeng gyoengqde, hawj Lahgyez caeuq Yozswz byaij ceiq gajlaeng.
Yajgoz bonjfaenh de byaij ceiq daixdaeuz. De itmienh byaij, itmienh gvih roengz doem bae sax, sax miz caet mbat baenx lai, cij byaij daengz daeggo de mwnq.
Hijsauj raen Yajgoz le, couh rumj hwnjdaeuj umj dawz de, caiq got dawz gij hoz de, cup de. Song boux cungj doxgot hwj, angq hwj daej hwnjdaeuj lo.
Gajlaeng Hijsauj yawjraen gaen youq baixlaeng Yajgoz dih vunzbazmeh caeuq lwgngez, couh cam naeuz: “Gaen mwngz daeuj hih doengh gyoengq vunz neix dwg byawz lah?”
Yajgoz han naeuz: “Gyoengq lwg neix dwg Cangqdiq soengq hawj bouxhoiq mwngz he.”
Yiengq song meh yahnoix de couh daiq gij lwg de goqdaeuj baiq Hijsauj.
Liqyaq caemh daiq gij lwg de goqdaeuj baiq. Gajlaeng Lahgyez caemh daiq Yozswz goqdaeuj baiq Hijsauj.
Hijsauj caiq cam naeuz: “Haxbaenh gou youq dangjroen nyangz hih gyoengq doenghduz nej, dwg guxmaz lah?”
Yajgoz han naeuz: “Gyoengq doenghduz mwnq dwg gou soengq hawj mwngz lah, muengh mwngz hozroengz mbouj aeuqheiq gou.”
Hijsauj naeuz: “Nuengx hax, gou gijmaz cungj miz lo; vanzlij dwg mwngz gag louz bax!”

Yiengq, Yajgoz caiq han naeuz: “Mbouj hah, hauhnaeuz mwngz yawjhwnj gou, couh cingj mwngz sou gij laex gou. Seizneix mwngz doiq gou baenxlai ndei; gou ndaej raen naj mwngz caemh luj ndaej raen naj Cangqdiq lo!
Cingj mwngz sou gij laex gou soengq hawj mwngz hih bax! Cangqdiq soengq fuk hawj gou, sawjhawj gou yienghyiengh cungj miz.” Yajgoz yienghneix gouz sam gouz seiq le, Hijsauj cij sou gij laex de.
Gajlaeng Hijsauj naeuz: “Yiengq raeuz itheij maj bax! Gou byaij gaxgonq mwngz.”

Yajgoz han naeuz: “Bouxcawj gou hax, mwngz caemh rox gyoengq lwgngez vanzlij iq, caiq gyacangq cwzlwg iq, yiengzlwg iq, vanzlij gw nauq; gou ij cauqguq gyoengqde. Hauhnaeuz caiq hawj gyoengqde ganj ngoenz roen laem, hoengjlau gyoengq cwzlwg hah yiengzlwg hah cungj rai baeg lah.

Bouxcawj hax, cingj mwngz sien maj gaxgonq bax. Gou ij youq gajlaeng menhmenh byaij, yawjyawj lwgngez hah, cwz hah, yiengz hah; gyoengqde byaij ndaej geijlai vaiq, raeuz couh byaij geijlai vaiq, itcig byaij bae daengz dieg Sih'wj caeuq bouxcawj gou doxraennaj.”
Hijsauj caiq naeuz: “Ndaej hah, yiengq gou louz geij boux vunz hawj mwngz, hawj gyoengqde soengq mwngz ma.”
Hoeng Yajgoz dauq han naeuz: “Mboujyungh lo! Vihmaz ij yienghneix guh nej? Cijaeu mwngz mbouj yiem gou couh ndaej lo.”
Hijsauj ngoenz mwnq couh sien dauqlaeng maj Sih'wj gaxgonq.
Hoeng, Yajgoz nej, de dauq yiengq Suhgoz bae, youq mwnq hwnq ranz hwj
Yajgoz dajlwh Bahdanj-Yaqlanz ma mwhde, itloh bingzbingz an'an ma daengz Gyahnamz diqgih dih aen singz Siqgiemq, youq henz singz neix cap yingz youq.
Mwnq dieg cap yingz mwnq dwg aeu bak gaiq ngaenz laeng gyoengq lwg Hahmaz cawx ma he. (Hahmaz couh dwg daxboh Siqgiemq.)
Yajgoz youq mwnq caeb aen daiz dajbwiz he, an coh hawj aen de heuh Ihliq-Ihlozih-Hijswzlez
Dijnaz dwg Liqyaq caeuq Yajgoz seng hih lwgsau. Miz ngoenz he, de ok bae yawjyawj gij vunzbaz dieg mwnq.
Dieg mwnq miz boux he heuh Siqgiemq. Daxboh de heuh Hahmaz, dwg Hihveiq vunz, caemh dwg dang dieg mwnq hih daeuzdaeuz he. Siqgiemq yawjraen Dijnaz, couh rag dawz de, gaemh de.
Siqgiemq raen Dijnaz gyaeu le, couh maez de, haenj de, caiq gangj vah ndei ma lox de, siengj aeu de ma guh yah.
Yiengq Siqgiemq couh doiq daxboh de naeuz: “Boh hax, gouz mwngz siengj banqfaz aeu dahlwg Yajgoz ma hawj gou guh yah.”

Yajgoz rox naeuz dahlwg de ngaiz vunz gaemh lo, hoeng, mwhde ngamqngamq luj gyoengq lwg de bae rogndoi dajciengx. De couh cang guh ngoemx mbouj rox, mbouj ok sing, daengj gyoengq lwg de ma le menh ngvanh.
Gajlaeng, daxboh Siqgiemq couh daeuj laeng Yajgoz, bang daeglwg de cam yah.

Gyoengq lwg Yajgoz rox gienh saeh neix le, cungj aeuqheiq hwj ij rai bae, couh daj rogndoi ma, nginhnaeuz Siqgiemq gaemh dahnuengx gyoengqde doiq aen gyahcuz Hijswzlez mingzdaeuz mbouj ndei, mbouj wnggai guh.
Hahmaz caeuq gyoengqde cimciek naeuz: “Daeglwg gou haenj Dijnaz; cingj faenhsou hawj de haq hawj daeglwg gou guh yah bax!
Gyoengqraeuz song aen minzcuz ndaej doxaeu hah, doxhaq hah; gij lwgsau faenhsou ndaej haq laeng raeuz, faenhsou caemh ndaej aeu gij lwgsau gyoengqraeuz.

Yienghneix, faenhsou ndaej caeuq gyoengqraeuz doxcaeuq youq mwnqneix youq lo! Faenhsou haenj youq mwnqlawz cungj ndaej, seizbienh, caemh ndaej seizbienh guh seng'eiq, dajhai hah, dajcawx hah, cauh gya hah, guh gya hah cungj ndaej.”
Siqgiemq caemh gouz daxboh Dijnaz caeuq gyoengq beixnuengx de naeuz: “Cijaeu faenhsou hawj, faenhsou siengj aeu gijmaz, raeuz cungj hawj gijmaz.
Mboujguenj soengq laex geijlai cungj ndaej, gou cungj hawj. Cijaeu faenhsou hawj Dijnaz haq hawj gou guh yah couh ndaej lo.”
Gyoengq lwg Yajgoz vihliux Siqgiemq gaemh dahnuengx gyoengqde, yiengq gyoengqde couh maixmingz guqiq coemx Siqgiemq caeuq Hahmaz,
naeuz: “Gyoengqraeuz mbouj hawj dahnuengx raeuz haq laeng boux mijyaengz youq gwnz ndang heh geiqhauh goq hih law. Yienghmwnq daiq saetnaj gyoengqraeuz lo.
Cizfeih faenhsou dapwngq gij diuzgyenq raeuz, couh dwg ndaw singz faenhsou sojmiz dih vunzsai caemh luj gyoengqraeuz ityiengh youq gwnz ndang heh di naeng he hwj guh geiqhauh,

yiengq, gyoengqraeuz couh hawj gij lwgsau raeuz haq laeng faenhsou, gij lwgsau faenhsou caemh ndaej haq laeng raeuz. Gyoengqraeuz couh youq dieg neix caeuq faenhsou doxcaeuq youq, guhbaenz aen minzcuz he.
Hoeng, hauhnaeuz faenhsou mbouj dungziq gij diuzgyenq raeuz nex, gyoengqraeuz couh daiq dahnuengx raeuz bae lingh mwnq, mbouj youq dineix youq lo.”
Hahmaz caeuq daeglwg de roxnginh naeuz gyoengqde daez dih gij diuzgyenq neix caemh hab leuz.
Aenvih Siqgiemq gig haenj Dijnaz, yiengq de couh majcangq ciuq gyoengqde daez hih yienghmwnq guh. Siqgiemq youq ndaw gyahcuz de dwg boux vunz ceiq soenhgingq he,
yiengq, Hahmaz couh daiq daeglwg de Siqgiemq bae daengz baksingz, bae mwnq doiq gij vunz ndaw singz naeuz:

“Gyoengq vunz daeuj laeng dieg raeuz youq hih hax, gyoengqde caeuq gyoengqraeuz doxhuz hwj, hawj gyoengqde youq mwnqneix youq lo, seizbienh hai cawx. Fanjcingq mwnq dieg neix caemh gvangq, ndaej gaeuq hawj gyoengqde youq. Gyoengqraeuz ndaej aeu gij lwgsau gyoengqde ma guh yah, gij lwgsau gyoengqraeuz caemh ndaej haq hawj gyoengqde guh yah.

“Hoeng, gyoengq vunz neix miz gij diuzgyenq he, couh dwg naeuz gyoengqraeuz bietdingh ij ciuq gij diuzgyenq gyoengqde guh, gyoengqde cij haenj caeuq gyoengqraeuz doxcaeuq youq, bienqbaenz aen minzcuz he. Couh dwg gyoengqraeuz sojmiz dih vunzsai caemh caeuq gyoengqde sojmiz dih vunzsai ityiengh ij ngaiz youq gwnz ndang heh mwnq he hwj guh geiqhauh cij ndaej.

Gyoengqraeuz dungziq bax! Dungziq le, gyoengqde couh caeuq gyoengqraeuz doxcaeuq youq lo. Yiengq daengz mwhde, gij gyadangq gyoengqde hah, doenghduz hah, mijyaengz cenznaengz cungj dwg gij raeuz liux haz?”
Mwhde, famzsoj dajlwh baksingz haeuj ok dih vunz, cungj dingq gij vah Hahmaz caeuq daeglwg de, yiengq cenz singz sojmiz dih vunzsai cungj youq gwnz ndang heh mwnq he hwj guh geiqhauh lo.

Gyoengqde ngamq heh ndaej daixsam ngoenz, song daeglwg Yajgoz, couh dwg song daeggo caeuq Dijnaz doxdaep saejndw he Sihmenj caeuq Liqveiq, domh gyoengq vunz ceiq in mwhde, song boux de cungj dawz giemq hwj haeuj singz bae, caegguk gajrai sojmiz dih vunzsai liux.
Daiqlienz Hahmaz caeuq daeglwg de Siqgiemq caemh gajrai lo. Gajrai liux le, couh dajlwh ndaw ranz Siqgiemq daiq Dijnaz okma.

Gajlaeng gyoengq lwg Yajgoz bae daengz ndaw singz, yawjraen gij vunzsai cungj ngaiz gajrai liux lo, couh duet aeu aen singz neix sojmiz dih doxgaiq. Gyoengqde couh dwg vihliux ij boixhaemz dahnuengx de youq mwnq dieg neix ngaiz vunz gaemh,
couh duet aeu doengh gyoengq yiengz hah, cwz hah, duz lawz hah,
ndaw ranz dijbauj dih doxgaiq hah, daiqlienz vunzbaz, lwgngez cungj ciengj. Mboujguenj ndaw reih cixnaeuz ndaw singz, sojmiz dih doxgaiq cungj ciengj aeu liux,

Gij saeh neix goq le, Yajgoz couh naeuz Sihmenj caeuq Liqveiq, naeuz: “Faenhsou lienzlih daengz gou, hawj gou youq mwnq dieg neix ngaiz gij vunz Gyahnamz caeuq gij vunz Bijliqsij dwgcaengz gou. Gyoengqraeuz vunz cix noix; hauhnaeuz gyoengqde miz saek ngoenz doxyuk hwj daeuj hoenx raeuz nex, gyoengqraeuz cenz ranz cungj ngaiz rairaeg raicied bae.”
Hoeng, song boux de han naeuz: “Nanzdauh hawj gyoengqde yawj dahnuengx raeuz dangq lauxgawj maz?”

Cangqdiq doiq Yajgoz naeuz: “Mwngz ij buen bae Bwzdwzliq youq, caemh ij youq mwnq caeb aen daiz dajbwiz he hawj gou. Gou couh dwg mwh mwngz deuz daeggo mwngz mwhde yienh hawj mwngz raen dih Cangqdiq hax.”
Yiengq Yajgoz couh doiq gij vunz ndaw ranz de caeuq gij vunz caeuq de doxcaeuq youq hih naeuz:

Yajgoz doiq gyoengq vunz yienghneix naeuz le, gyoengqde couh dawz sojmiz hih you caeuq gyoengqde daiq dih ngaexrwz gyau hawj Yajgoz. Yajgoz couh dawz doenghgij neix haem youq laj go faex hung gaenh Siqgiemq mwnq he.
Haem ndaej le, gyoengqde couh buen bae lo. Bae hih mwhde, Cangqdiq loengh hawj gij singz seiqhenz he hih vunz cungj lau hwj dungxmbouq ndangsaenz liux, cungj mij vunz gamj bae boenq gyoengqde.
Yajgoz daiq gyoengq vunz de bae daengz dieg Gyahnamz dih Luqswh. (Luqswh couh dwg Bwzdwzliq).
De youq mwnq caeb aen daiz dajbwiz he, couh an mwnq dieg mwnq heuh Ihlwz-Bwzdwzliq
Gajlaeng, meh daj lij iq cix daiq Liqbwzgyah hung he, couh dwg Dijbohlah, de rai lo, moek youq laj go faex baixnamz Bwzdwzliq he. Yiengq go faex mwnq couh heuh Yaqlwnz-Bahguj.
Yajgoz dajlwh Bahdanj-Yaqlanz ma daengz Bwzdwzliq le, Cangqdiq caiq yienh hawj de raen, caemhcaiq soengq fuk hawj de
naeuz: “Gaxgonq gij coh mwngz heuh Yajgoz, hoeng, daj seizneix doxbae, mbouj caiq heuh Yajgoz laem lo; heuh Hijswzlez ndaej lo.” Couh yienghneix, Cangqdiq gaij coh hawj Yajgoz heuh Hijswzlez.

Cangqdiq caiq doiq de naeuz: “Gou dwg akak rengzrengz gaiqgaiq cungj ndaej guh daengz dih Cangqdiq. Mwngz ij miz lwglwg lanlan; doengh daih lwglan gajlaeng mwngz ij bienqbaenz aen guekgya he, gajlaeng, vanzlij caiq bienqbaenz haujlai haujlai aen guekgya. Gij lwglan mwngz caemh miz haujlai vunz ndaej dang vuengz.
Gou ij dawz gou soengq hawj Yaqbwzlahhanj caeuq Hijsaj dih dieg hax, soengq hawj mwngz caeuq doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz.”
Cangqdiq gangj daengz dineix le, couh daj mwnq bae lo.
Gajlaeng Yajgoz couh youq mwnq dieg Cangqdiq yienh hawj de raen, caeuq de gangj vah hih mwnq dieg mwnq, laeb ngauq rin he, laeb ma guh gijnenqbeih, caiq raix laeuj, raix youz makmbi hwnjbae bwiz.
Aenvih Cangqdiq youq mwnq doiq Yajgoz gangj vah, yiengq Yajgoz vanzlij dwg heuh mwnq dieg neix heuh Bwzdwzliq.
Yajgoz daiq gyoengq vunz de dajlwh Bwzdwzliq bae. Youq mwnq dieg liz Hijfazdah vanzlij miz duenh roen laem, Lahgyez daengz mwh seng lwg he lo, hoeng, ngaiz deng hojseng.
Youq mwh de cienfanh in, cienfanh hojyouq hih mwhde, meh ciepseng de doiq de naeuz: “Mwngz gaejyungh lau; mwngz caiq ndaej daeglwg he lo.”
Mwh de ijvanh rai gatcaw, hoenzsaenz ijvanh bae hih mwhde, de an coh hawj laeq lwg de heuh Benqngozniz
Gajlaeng, Lahgyez rai le, moek youq henz roen bae Hijfazdah he. (Hijfazdah couh dwg Bwzliqhaengz.)
Yajgoz youq henz moh Lahgyez laeb baj sigbei he guh beimoh. Baj beimoh neix daengz seizneix vanzlij youq henz moh de.
Hijswzlez
Hijswzlez vanzlij youq mwnq dieg mwnq hih mwhde, daeglwg daeuz de Lijbenq engqgya bae caeuq Bizlah ninz. Bizlah couh dwg yahnoix Hijswzlez. Gajlaeng ngaiz Hijswzlez rox.
Yajgoz itgungh miz cibngeih daeglwg.
Liqyaq soj seng dih lwg miz daeglwg daeuz Yajgoz Lijbenq, vanzlij miz Sihmenj, Liqveiq, Youzdaq, Hijcazgyah caeuq Sihbuqlwnz.
Lahgyez soj seng dih lwg miz Yozswz caeuq Benqyajminj.
Dahhoiq Lahgyez, heuh Bizlah, seng miz Danq caeuq Nazfuzdahliq.
Dahhoiq Liqyaq, heuh Sizbwz, seng miz Gyahdwz caeuq Yaqsez.
Doengh gyoengq lwg neix dwg Yajgoz youq Bahdanj-Yaqlanz seng he.
Yajgoz bae daengz Manqliq, (mwnq dieg neix gaenh Gihlez-Yaqbah; Gihlez-Yaqbah couh dwg Hihbwzlwnz), bae laeng daxboh de, couh dwg mwnq daxgoeng de Yaqbwzlahhanj doz youq goq hih mwnq dieg mwnq.
Hijsaj ndaej souhyienz raixcaix; de souh ndaej bakbet bi
cij an'an onjonj rai gvaqseiq. Gajlaeng, song daeglwg de, Hijsauj caeuq Yajgoz, dawz de bae moek lo.
Laj neix dwg ranz Hijsauj dih lizsij. (Hijsauj caemh dwg Hijdungh.)

Hijsauj aeu song dah lwgsau dieg Gyahnamz ma guh yah. Meh he dwg Yaqdaq, dwg dah lwgsau Hijlwnz (Hijlwnz dwg Hwz cuz vunz he); meh he dwg Ahhozliqbahmaj, dwg dah lwgsau Yaqnaz, caemh dwg dahlan Giqbenq (Giqbenq dwg Hihveiq cuz vunz).
Gajlaeng de caiq aeu Bahsizmaz, dah lwgsau Hijsizmajliq ma guh yah. Bahsizmaz caemh dwg dahnuengx Nizbaiqyoz.
Yaqdaq seng Hijliqfaz hawj Hijsauj; Bahsizmaz seng Liuzwj hawj Hijsauj;
Ahhozliqbahmaj seng Yeh'uhswh, Yajlanz caeuq Gojlah. Doenghheij lwg neix cungj dwg gij lwg Hijsauj, cungj dwg youq Gyahnamz seng he.

Gajlaeng, Hijsauj daiq doenghheij lwg heij yah de caeuq ndaw ranz de sojmiz dih vunz hah, cwz hah, yiengz hah, doenghduz hah, caeuq sojmiz dih gyadangq, couh dwg youq dieg Gyahnamz soj ndaej soj miz hih, cungj buen bae daixlingh mwnq dieg, mbouj caeuq daegnuengx de Yajgoz doxcaeuq youq lo.
Aenvih song ranz de gyadangq lai raixcaix, yiengz hah, cwz hah, mwnq dieg mwnq cungj mbouj gaeuq coengq, mbouj gaeuq gyoengqde youq, sojhij mbouj ndaej doxcaeuq youq.
Yiengq Hijsauj couh buen bae Sih'wj, mwnq dieg bya he youq.
Hijsauj couh dwg gij vunz Hijdungh youq Sih'wj dih cojgoeng. Laj neix dwg Hijsauj youq Sih'wj dih doengh daih gajlaeng de.
Hijliqfaz dwg daeglwg Hijsauj caeuq Yaqdaq seng he.
Gyoengq lwg Liuzwj dwg Nazhah, Seqlah, Cahmaj caeuq Mijsaj. Seiq daeglwg neix couh dwg gij lan Bahsizmaz.
Mehyah Hijsauj Ahhozliqbahmaj dwg dahlan Giqbenq, caemh dwg dah lwgsau Yaqnaz. Hijsauj caeuq de seng miz sam daeglwg: Yeh'uhswh, Yajlanz caeuq Gojlah.
Laj neix couh dwg gij lwglan Hijsauj dih gak aen cuz dih cuzcangj.
Hijliqfaz dwg daeglwg daeuz Hijsauj. Gij lwg de faen miz Dizmanq, Ahmaz, Sijboh, Gihnazswh,

Gojlah, Gyahdanj caeuq Yaqmajliz; gyoengq neix cungj dwg gak aen cuz dih cuzcangj. Cungj dwg youq dieg Hijdungh daj Hijliqfaz soj ok dih cuzcangj, caemh dwg doengh daih gajlaeng mehyah Hijsauj Yaqdaq he.

Daeglwg Hijsauj Liuzwj dih gij lwg de faen miz Nazhah, Seqlah, Cahmaj caeuq Mijsaj. Gyoengq neix cungj dwg youq dieg Hijdungh daj Liuzwj soj faen okdaeuj dih cuzcangj, cungj dwg gij lan mehyah Hijsauj Bahsizmaz he.

Gij lwg mehyah Hijsauj Ahhozliqbahmaj faen miz Yeh'uhswh, Yajlanz caeuq Gojlah. Gyoengq neix cungj dwg dajlwh mehyah Hijsauj Ahhozliqbahmaj faen okdaeuj dih cuzcangj. (Ahhozliqbahmaj couh dwg dahlwg Yaqnaz.)
Gwnz neix sojmiz dih cuzcangj cungj dwg gij lwglan Hijsauj. (Hijsauj couh dwg Hijdungh.)
Laj neix dwg youq Hijdungh youq dih Hozliq vunz, Sih'wj dih lwglan. Gyoengqde dwg Lozdanh, Cozbah, Giqbenq, Yaqnaz,
Dijswnq, Hijcaz caeuq Dijcanh. Gyoengq neix cungj dwg daj dieg Hijdungh Hozliq vunz Sih'wj dih gij lwglan ndaw de faen okdaeuj dih cuzcangj.
Gij lwg Lozdanh dwg Hozliq caeuq Hihmanq.
Gij lwg Cozbah dwg Yaqlwzvaenz, Majnazyaz, Hijbahluz, Siqboh caeuq Ahnamz.
Gij lwg Giqbenq dwg Yaqyaj caeuq Yaqnaz. Couh dwg Yaqnaz youq rogndoi bang daxboh de coengq lawz, raen ndaej aen mboq raemxraeuj he.
Yaqnaz miz daeglwg he heuh Dijswnq, caemh miz dah lwgsau he heuh Ahhozliqbahmaj.
Gij lwg Dijswnq dwg Yinhdanq, Ihciqbanh, Izlanz caeuq Gihlanz.
Gij lwg Hijcaz dwg Bizhanj, Sajfanh caeuq Yaqganq.
Gij lwg Dijcanh dwg Uhswh caeuq Yaqlanz.
Hozliq vunz dih cuzcangj couh dwg Lozdanh, Cozbah, Giqbenq, Yaqnaz,
Dijswnq, Hijcaz caeuq Dijcanh. Gyoengq neix cungj dwg youq dieg Sih'wj dih gak aen cuz dih cuzcangj.
Gij vunz Hijswzlez youq dieg Gyahnamz mijyaengz miz vuengz mwhde, youq dieg Hijdungh cix miz vunz guh vuengz lo. Gyoengqde couh dwg:
Bijlah; Bijlah dwg daeglwg Bijwj. Bijlah youq Hijdungh dih Dingzhahbah Singz guh vuengz.
Bijlah rai le, daengz Yozbah ciep de guh vuengz; Yozbah dwg daeglwg Seqlah, dwg Bohswhlah vunz.
Yozbah rai le, daengz Huqcanh ciep de guh vuengz; Huqcanh dwg dieg Dizmanq vunz.

Huqcanh rai le, daengz Hahdaz ciep de guh vuengz; Hahdaz dwg daeglwg Bijdaz. Hahdaz couh dwg boux youq dieg Mohyaz hoenx ndaej hingz gij vunz Mijdenq mwnq. De dang vuengz hih aen singz neix heuh Yaqveiqdwz.
Hahdaz rai le, daengz Sanghlah ciep de guh vuengz; Sanghlah dwg Majswqliqgyah vunz.
Sanghlah rai le, daengz Saujloz ciep de guh vuengz; Saujloz dwg Liqhozbwz vunz. Liqhozbwz dwg youq henz dah he.
Saujloz rai le, daengz Bahlwzhahnamz ciep de guh vuengz; Bahlwzhahnamz dwg daeglwg Yaqgwzboh.
Daeglwg Yaqgwzboh Bahlwzhahnamz rai le, daengz Hahdaz ciep de guh vuengz. De guh vuengz hih aen singz neix heuh Bah'uh. Mehyah de heuh Mijhihdahbez, dwg dahlan Mij-Cazhoz, dah lwgsau Majdwzlez.
Laj neix dwg daj Hijsauj soj ok dih cuzcangj:
Laj neix dwg ranz Yajgoz dih lizsij.

Yozswz ndaej cibcaet bi mwhmwnq, de siengzseiz gaenhangx gyoengq doengz boh mbouj doengz meh dih geij boux daeggo de bae coengq yiengz. (Geij boux daeggo de couh dwg Bizlah caeuq Sizbwz seng dih lwg.) Yozswz haenj bauqsieng naeuz daxboh de ni gyoengq daeggo de guh gijmaz vaihsaeh.
Yajgoz ceiq aiq Yozswz, aenvih Yozswz dwg de laux le cij miz he. De nyib diuz bauz raez, gyaeugyaeu ndeindei he hawj Yozswz daenj.
Yiengq doengh daeggo de raen daxboh dwzbez aiq Yozswz, couh aeuqheiq daegnuengx de aeu, mbouj caeuq de doxndei.
Miz ngwnz he, Yozswz fangxngwnzloq, yiengq de caemh naeuz gyoengq daeggo de ni, naeuz de fangxngwnzloq raen gijmaz. Gyoengqde dingq le, engqgya aeuqheiq de ij rai.
Mwhde, Yozswz baenzlawz naeuz nej? De naeuz: “Go hax, faenhsou dingqdingq yawj daeggou loqraen gijmaz.

Gou loqraen gyoengqraeuz cungj caezgya youq ndaw reih cug mienh. Doengh lwg mienh gou hax, geizheih hwx, sawqmwh ndwn hwnjdaeuj, ndwn hwj soh fwdfwd. Doengh lwg faenhsou cug mwnq hax, cungj daeuj gvaengz doengh lwg gou baiqbaiq saxsax.”

Doengh daeggo de dingq le, cungj lengx de naeuz: “Ciuq mwngz yienghneix naeuz, nanzdauh mwngz cingqcaen ndaej guh goengjvuengz raeuz? Nanzdauh mwngz caen ij guenjciq gyoengqraeuz?” Gyoengqde couh vih de gangj naeuz de fangxngwnzloq raen dih saeh, engqgya haenq de.

Gajlaeng, Yozswz caiq fangxngwnzloq, de caiq gangj naeuz gyoengq daeggo de ni. De naeuz: “Gou caiq fangxngwnzloq lo. Mbat neix gou loqraen gyangjngoenz, aen ndwen caeuq cib'it aen ndaundeiq cungj daeuj sax gou.”

De gangj naeuz doengh daeggo de ni le, caemh gangj naeuz daxboh de ni. Daxboh de engq gvaiq de naeuz: “Mwngz ndaek gij fangxngwnzloq neix dwg gijmaz loq nex? Nanzdauh gou caeuq meh mwngz, vanzlij miz heij go mwngz cungj ij gvih roengz doem bae sax mwngz maz?”
Mbat neix doengh daeggo Yozswz engqgya haenq de, hoeng, daxboh de dauq dawz gij saeh neix geiq youq ndaw sim hwj siengjsiengj yawj dauqdaej dwg gijmaz iqswh.
Doengh daeggo Yozswz bang daxboh gyoengqde bae Siqgiemq coengq yiengz.
Miz ngoenz he, daxboh de doiq Yozswz naeuz: “Doengh daeggo mwngz mbouj dwg youq Siqgiemq coengq yiengz haz? Mwngz bae yawjyawj gyoengqde veiq.”
Yozswz han naeuz: “Ox! Gou majcangq bae.”

Daxboh de caiq naeuz: “Mwngz bae yawjyawj doengh daeggo mwngz caeuq gij yiengz dwg mbouj dwg cungj ndei; miz maz saeh, ma naeuz gou ni.” Daxboh de raengq de ndei le, Yozswz couh dajlwh lueg Hihbwzlwnz bae Siqgiemq,
