Bae daengz Siqgiemq le, de youq rogndoi byaij bae byaij dauq. Miz boux he raen de
Yozswz han naeuz: “Gou cimh doengh daeggo gou; mwngz raen gyoengqde goq haz? Hauhnaeuz raen, naeuz gou ni gyoengqde youq mwnqlawz coengq yiengz, ndaej lwi?”
Gajlaeng boux mwnq naeuz: “Gyoengqde gaenq bae lo. Gou dingqri gyoengqde naeuz ij bae Dohdanh.” Yozswz dingq le, couh bae Dohdanh, youq mwnq dieg ciengx yiengz mwnq cimh ndaej raen gyoengq daeggo de.
Yiengq, gyoengq daeggo de daj lizgyae couh yawjraen de lo. Gyoengqde raen le, couh domh de mijyaengz byaij daeuj daengz gaenh gyoengqde, couh doxyuk hwj ij baenzlawz gaj de,
cungj caezgya naeuz: “Hawjm'z yawj hux! Ngauq ak fangxngwnzloq hih daeuj lo.
Daeuj bax daeuj bax, daeuj gyoengqraeuz dawz de gajgak bae, vwt roengz aen cingj hawq he bae,
Yiengq, Lijbenq,

Caenh dawz de gveng roengz ndaw cingj hawq neix bae couh ndaej lo; yienghneix de caemh ciuqyiengh rai.” Daeggo conghbak gan yienghneix naeuz, hoeng ndaw sim de siengj, hauhnaeuz ciuq luj yienghneix nex, ndaej gouq de haemq vaiq, couh ndaej soengq maj hawj daxboh lo.
Yozswz ngamqngamq daengz gyoengq daeggo de mwnq,

Gyoengqde dawz de gveng roengzbae le, couh naengh roengzma gw haeux. Sawqmwh yawjraen miz buek Hijsizmajliq vunz canghrih he, gyoengqde aeu lozdoz ma doz sam cungj iengfaex rang fwtfwt ceiq dijbauj he, couh dwg yanghliuq, yeijyangh caeuq mozyoz, dajlwh Gihlez bae daengz Ngaihgiz hai, ngamqngamq luj letlet ij byaij goq gyoengqde mwnq bae.
Youzdaq doiq geij boux beixnuengx de naeuz: “Gyoengqraeuz gajhaih nuengx bonjfaenh, siengj muenz saeh hwnjdaeuj, doiq raeuz miz maz ik nex?

Mboujyienz dawz de hai hawj gyoengq Hijsizmajliq gyoengq vunz canghrih mwnq. De vanzlij dwg caen daegnuengx raeuz, caeuq raeuz caemh nginz caemh rag hwj; gyoengqraeuz mbouj ndaej hoi fawz haih de!” Youzdaq yienghneix naeuz le, gajlaeng gyoengqde caemh dungziq de dih cawjeiq.
Daengj daengz buek dajhai mwnq goq daeuj le, gyoengqde couh dajlwh ndaw cingj hawq rag de hwnjma, couh hai hawj buek vunz Hijsizmajliq mwnq, hai ndaej seiq liengx buenq naek dih ngaenz.

Doengh daeggo Yozswz dawz de hai hawj buek canghrih mwnq hih mwhde, Lijbenq mbouj youq henz de. Lijbenq ma daengz henz cingj le, cij rox naeuz Yozswz mbouj raen lo. De mbouj raen Yozswz le, couh gikheiq hwj gag mbek diuz buh bonjfaenh,
maj daengz gyoengq nuengx mwnq naeuz: “Yozswz mbouj raen lo! Daegnuengx mbouj raen lo! Gou ij baenzlawz guh, bae mwnqlawz cimh nej? Ij baenzlawz maj naeuz daxboh ni nej?”
Gajlaeng, gyoengqde gaj duz yiengzdaeg he, dawz diuz buh raez Yozswz iep roengz lwed yiengz bae.
Iep ndaej le, couh dawz maj hawj daxboh gyoengqde, naeuz: “Gyoengqraeuz nyaeb ndaej diuz buh raez he. Hawjm'z yawj hux, dwg diuz buh daeglwg mwngz moj?”
Yajgoz yawj le, couh majcangq rox, couh naeuz: “Dwg diuz buh raez daeglwg gou; de gaengjdingq ngaiz nyaen gw lo! Yozswz caen ngaiz nyaen sikyungz liux lo!”
De yienghneix naeuz le, cungj siengsim gikheiq hwj ij rai, couh gag mbek gij buh bonjfaenh vaih, couh daenj diuz buhmaz co cabcab coeg yabyab he hwj hauq daeglwg de, daej baenx geij ngoenz.

Gajlaeng, gyoengq lwg de cungj daeuj vued de, hoeng de gaenhbaenj mbouj leix gyoengqde, vanzlij doq daej doq naeuz: “Lwg gou rai lo! Gou ij siengsim daengz roengz ndawlaep bae, siengsim daengz cimh ndaej raen lwg gou bae.” Yajgoz vih Yozswz ngaiz rai, siengsim hwj daej haemz daej hoj.
Hoeng, mwhneix Yozswz gaenq ngaiz buek vunz canghrih mwnq daiq bae daengz Ngaihgiz, hai hawj goengjvuengz Ngaihgiz dih boux gingjveiqcangj he guh hoiq. Boux gingjveiqcangj neix dwg heuh Bohdizfaz.
Mwhmwnq, Youzdaq liz gyoengq goengjlungz nuengxau de, bae laj Yaqduqlanz, laeng boux heuh Hihlah he youq.
Youzdaq youq mwnq roxnaj dah lwgsau he; dah lwgsau neix dwg dah lwgsau Cuhyaq, dwg Gyahnamz vunz he. Youzdaq couh aeu dah de ma guh yah.
Gajlaeng mehyah de couh mizndang, seng miz daeglwg he. Yiengq Youzdaq couh an coh hawj laeq lwg neix heuh Wj.
Yah de caiq mizndang lo, caiq seng miz daeglwg he, an coh hawj laeq lwg neix heuh Ngoznamz.
Yah de youhcaiq mizndang, youhcaiq seng miz daeglwg he, youhcaiq an coh hawj laeq lwg neix heuh Siqlah. Yah de seng Siqlah mwhde, Youzdaq youq Gihsiz.
Youzdaq aeu yah hawj daeglwg daeuz de; gij coh mehyah de heuh Dahmaj.
Daeglwg daeuz Youzdaq, heuh Wj, youq ndaw lwgra Yehhozvaz dwg boux vunz rwix vunz yak he, sojhij Yehhozvaz aeu diuz mingh de bae lo.

Gajlaeng, Youzdaq doiq Ngoznamz naeuz: “Mwngz bae caeuq beixsauj mwngz bax, caeuq de ninz, bang daeggo mwngz, hawj de miz lwg miz lan, hawj de gajlaeng mbouj ngaiz cied. Gij neix dwg mwngz guh nuengxau dih swzyimq.”

Ngoznamz rox naeuz baezneix seng dih lwg mbouj dwg ndaej gvi hawj bonjfaenh le, yiengq de moix it mbat caeuq beixsauj de ninz, cungj guqiq ceq gij guxmaz guxmaz de ok rog bae, mbouj nyienh'eiq bang daeggo de miz lwg.
Ngoznamz soj guh dih saeh youq ndaw lwgra Yehhozvaz cungj dwg vaihsaeh, sojhij Yehhozvaz couh aeu gij mingh de.

Gajlaeng, Youzdaq doiq mehbawx de Dahmaj naeuz: “Mwngz maj laeng boxda mwngz soujmaiq bax. Daengj daengz daeglwg gou Siqlah hung baenz vunz le, menhcij aeu mwngz.” Youzdaq gangj gij vah neix, ndaw sim de gag naemj, hoengjlau Siqlah caemh luj song boux daeggo de ngaiz rai. Yiengq Dahmaj couh maj laeng boxda de, youq laeng boxda de youq.
Goq haujlai caez, mehyah Youzdaq, couh dwg dahlwg Cuhyaq, rai lo. Soujsangq goq le, Youzdaq caeuq boux baengzyoux de Hihlah bae daengz Dingznaz, aenvih youq mwnq miz vunz bang de daet fwn yiengz.
Yiengq miz vunz naeuz Dahmaj ni, naeuz: “Aex! Goeng gyagoeng mwngz bae Dingznaz daet fwn yiengz lo.”
Dahmaj rox naeuz Siqlah gaenq hung lo, hoeng, vanzlij mijyaengz daeuj aeu de maj guh yah, couh duet diuz buh soujyauq de, aeu cahginh ma goemq naj hwj,
Youzdaq yawjraen de le, naemqnaeuz de dwg lauxgawj lah, aenvih de aeu cahginh ma goemq naj hwj. Youzdaq couh byaij goq laeng de bae, doiq de naeuz: “Aex! Daeuj hax, gaen gou bae ninz nax!”
Yienzlaiz Youzdaq gaenhbaenj mbouj rox de dwg mehbawx bonjfaenh.
Yiengq Dahmaj cam de naeuz: “Gou caeuq mwngz ninz, ndaej hawj gou gijmaz nej?”
Youzdaq han naeuz: “Gou dajlwh gyoengq yiengz gou genj aeu duz yiengzlwg he, hawj vunz soengq daeuj hawj mwngz.”
Dahmaj couh han naeuz: “Ndaej hah, ndaej hah. Hoeng, seizneix mwngz mijyaengz soengq daeuj hawj gou hah, mwngz sien louz yiengh doxgaiq he ma guh dijyaz cij ndaej hah.”
Yiengq Youzdaq cam naeuz: “Mwngz ij aeu gijmaz ma guh dijyaz nej?”
Dahmaj naeuz: “Aeu aen yaenq
Dahmaj hwnq le, vanzlij dwg maj laeng mehdai youq, de couh dawz mbaw cahginh goemq naj de roengz, caiq doiqyungz daenj diuz buh soujyauq de.

Gajlaeng Youzdaq hawj boux baengzyoux de Hihlah, hawj de bang dawz duz yiengzlwg he bae cimh boux vunzbaz mwnq, vuenh aeu gij doxgaiq gaxgonq dijyaz mwnq ma, hoeng, Hihlah mboujguenj baenzlawz cimh, cungj cimh mbouj raen de.
Yiengq de couh cam gij vunz bonjdeih mwnq, cam naeuz: “Youq henz roen Ihnazyinq hih boux lauxgawj mwnq, nwj bae lah, cungj mij raen nex?”
Gij vunz mwnq han naeuz: “Dineix coengzlaiz mij lauxgawj goq.”
Gajlaeng, Hihlah couh maj lo, maj naeuz Youzdaq ni, naeuz: “Gou cimh mij raen de. Gij vunz mwnq vanzlij naeuz mwnq coengzlaiz mij lauxgawj goq.”

Youzdaq dingq le, han naeuz: “Suenq lox! Doenghgij doxgaiq mwnq ajcaih de aeu bae suenq lox, suenq gou soengq hawj de sat lo. Mbouj caiq bae cimh de lo, mienxndaej vunz riu raeuz. Fanjcingq raeuz gaenq soengq duz yiengz he bae hawj de lo, hoeng cimh de mij raen, mij banqfaz hah.”
Goq sam ndwen le, miz vunz naeuz Youzdaq ni naeuz: “Mehbawx mwngz guh lauxgawj, mizndang lo.”
Youzdaq dingq le, couh ndatheiq hwj ij rai bae, couh naeuz: “Rag de okdaeuj, vuengvak de rai bae!”

Yiengq, couh youq mwh Dahmaj ngaiz rag okdaeuj hih mwhde, de hawj vunz bang de dawz doenghgij doxgaiq de bae hawj goeng gyagoeng de yawj, caemh hawj boux bang de mwnq naeuz: “Hawj mwngz yawj lux, doenghgij doxgaiq neix dwg gij bouxlawz, couh dwg bouxlawz hawj gou mizndang lo. Cingj mwngz yawj ndei hwj, yawjyawj aen yaenq neix caeuq diuz cag riengh de, caeuq diuz faexdwngx neix, dwg gij bouxlawz.”

Gajlaeng, Youzdaq rox naeuz doenghgij doxgaiq neix dwg gij bonjfaenh de le, couh naeuz: “Ox! Dwg de haemq deng; gou mij deng lo. Baenjlaiz gou wnggai hawj daeglwg gou Siqlah aeu de ma guh yah hih, hoeng gou mij hawj de aeu; gou mij deng lo.” (Daj mbat mwnq, Youzdaq caiq mij caeuq de ninz goq.)
Gajlaeng Dahmaj ijvanh daeng seng lo, cij rox naeuz ndaw ndang de miz doiq suengjseng he.
Daengz seng hih mwhde, miz laeq he sien iet cik fawz de okdaeuj. Meh ciepseng de couh aeu diuz cag hoengz he ma cug gij fawz de hwj geiqhauh, naeuz: “Laeq neix sien seng okdaeuj gaxgonq.”
Hoeng liuh mbouj daengz de caiq ywt gij fawz de haeujmaj; daeggo de dauqfanj sien ok daeuj gaxgonq. Meh ciepseng de naeuz: “Mwngz baeq ciengj ok daeuj gaxgonq lah!” Yiengq
Gajlaeng daegnuengx de caemh gaenhangx seng okdaeuj lo. Gij fawz de vanzlij cug miz cag hoengz hwj, couh an coh hawj de heuh Seqlah.
Yozswz nej, Yozswz ngaiz buek vunz canghrih mwnq dawz bae daengz Ngaihgiz hai hawj goengjvuengz Ngaihgiz dih boux gingjveiqcangj he, heuh Bohdizfaz.
Yiengq Yozswz couh youq laeng boux de youq. Yehhozvaz caemh caeuq Yozswz youq, sawjhawj de yienghyiengh swnh.
Bouxcawj de Bohdizfaz raen Yehhozvaz siengzseiz cungj caeuq Yozswz youq, caiq soengq fuk hawj de, sawjhawj de guh hih saeh yienghyiengh cungj swnh.

Couh vih yienghneix, bouxcawj cungj gag haenj de, couh hawj de gaen henz ndang bonjfaenh, caemh dwg yawj de dwg boux ceiq ndei ceiq caen he. Bouxcawj caiq hawj de guenj sojmiz dih hongranz caeuq bouxcawj sojmiz dih gyasaeh.
Dajlwh Yozswz daeuj guenj le, Yehhozvaz vihliux Yozswz dih yienzyouz caemh soengq fuk hawj bouxcawj de Bohdizfaz. Ndaw ranz de caeuq sojmiz dih reihnaz, Yehhozvaz caemh soengq fuk hawj.
Bohdizfaz dawz sojmiz dih guxmaz cungj gyau hawj Yozswz guenjleix le, de maj ranz cij rox gw haeux, mboujyungh guh saek yiengh.
Mwhde Yozswz ndangdaej giencangq caiq baenxmbauq.
Mbouj geijlwh caez mehyah bouxcawj yawjhwnj de, couh douhdouh degdeg loxlox legleg de naeuz: “Daeuj veiq, daeuj caeuq gwh ninz nax!”

Yozswz dingq le, couh doq naeuz: “Ox, mbouj ndaej, mbouj ndaej! Bouxcawj gou baenxlai sinq gou; de dawz de sojmiz dih guxmaz cungj gyau hawj gou guenj. Gou youq dineix, de cungj mbouj hoj guenj saek yiengh.

Youq ndaw ranz, de hawj gou dang boux ceiq ak he, cungj coengq fawz hawj gou liux, cawzok mwngz, aenvih mwngz dwg mehyah de. Gou baeq ndaej guh gij saeh mbouj ya mbouj yongq, mbouj sam mbouj seiq neix nej? Yienghneix daekcoih Cangqdiq vwx!”
Yozswz mboujguenj meh cawjranz de ngoenzngoenz baenzlawz gyaek de, de ciuqyiengh mbouj leix mbouj langh meh de, mbouj caeuq meh de ninz, lienz dep cungj mbouj dep meh de.
Gajlaeng, miz ngoenz he, Yozswz haeuj ndaw fungh bae guh hong, ngamqngamq luj letlet mwhneix ndaw ranz mij saek boux vunz.

Meh cawjranz raen yienghneix le, couh byaij haeujbae, couh cij dawz diuz buh de naeuz: “Daeuj! Daeuj caeuq gwh ninz nax!” Yozswz mbouj han mbouj haemq, couh riq ok rog bae. Hoeng diuz buh de ngaiz meh cawjranz de ya dawz youq ndaw fawz.
Meh de raen ndaw fawz bonjfaenh vanzlij gaem dawz diuz buh Yozswz hwj, hoeng Yozswz gaenq riq ok rog bae lo;

de couh swngzgei hemq, hemq hawj gyoengq hoiq de daeuj. Yiengq de couh daejdaej danqdanq naeuz: “Faenhsou yawj hax, goeng gou daiq boux Hihbwzlaiz vunz neix ma sainaj raeuz! Daxbaenh de haeuj laeng gou daeuj siengj gaemh gou.
Caeklaiq gou hemq hwnjdaeuj, de lau hwj couh vaiqdi gveng diuz buh youq henz ndang gou couh riq okbae lo.”
Gajlaeng, meh cawjranz couh dawz diuz buh diuh youq henz ndang hwj daengj goeng de ma.

Yiengq, goeng de ma le, meh de couh luenhbangh an gij saeh he ma naeuz goeng de ni. De naeuz: “Mwngz daiq ma hih bouxhoiq mwnq, couh dwg boux Hihbwzlaiz vunz mwnq, engqgya ndonj haeuj laeng gou mwnqneix daeuj, ijsiengj gaemh gou.
Gou hoi rengz hemq le, de couh gveng diuz buh de youq neij, mbouj aeu lo, deuz hwj maetlaenq bae.
Goeng cawjranz Yozswz dingqri mehyah de naeuz yienghneix le, couh ndatheiq hwj ij rai,
couh gaemh dawz Yozswz bae gyaeng, caeuq gyoengq vunz daekcoih goengjvuengz hih gyoengq vunzfamh mwnq gyaeng youq itheij.
Hoeng, Yehhozvaz ciuqyiengh caeuq Yozswz youq, vanzlij soengq fuk hawj de, sawj yuzcangj yawjhwnj de.
Yiengq yuzcangj couh baij de guenj ndaw lauz sojmiz dih vunzfamh, caeuq ndaw lauz sojmiz dih saeh.
Yehhozvaz vanzlij caeuq Yozswz youq, sawj de guh gijmaz cungj baenz, cungj swnh; yuzcangj cungj mboujyungh causim.
Yiengq, goq duenh he le, boux guenj gij laeuj caeuq boux guenj guh gij menqbauh goengjvuengz he, song boux neix cungj daekcoih goengjvuengz.
Guh hwj goengjvuengz ndatheiq ij rai,
couh dawz song boux de bae laeng boux guenj gyenhyuz hih ndaw lauz de, hawj de guenj. Yozswz caemh dwg youq mwnq ngaiz de guenj.
Gajlaeng, boux guenj gyenhyuz baij Yozswz swqhaeuh song boux de.
Song boux neix ngaiz youq mwnq haujlai caez le,
miz ngwnz he, song boux de cungj fangxngwnzloq, hoeng, gag vunz gag fangxngwnzloq mbouj doxdoengz, gag gaiq gag miz iqswh.
Haet daixngeih, Yozswz haeuj bae yawj gyoengqde, raen gyoengqde heiq memmem le,
couh cam gyoengqde naeuz: “Ngoenzneix faenhsou vihmaz heiq memmem lah?”
Gyoengqde dingq le, han naeuz: “Raeuz song boux cungj fangxngwnzloq, hoeng, mij vunz ndaej bang raeuz cek gij iqswh de.”
Gajlaeng, Yozswz naeuz: “Cek fangxngwnzloq, mbouj dwg Cangqdiq cij ndaej maz? Faenhsou loqraen gijmaz hawjm'z naeuz gou ni yawj hux.”
Yiengq boux guenj laeuj mwnq couh gangj naeuz Yozswz ni de loqraen gijmaz. De naeuz: “Gou loqraen youq dangqnaj gou miz go buzdauz he.
Go de miz sam nga, cij ngamqngamq did, couh hoi va giet mak cix sug lo.
Ndaw fawz gou dawz aen cenjlaeuj goengjvuengz, caiq mbaet buzdauz ma caenj aeu gij raemx de roengz ndaw cenjlaeuj bae, couh ndenq hawj goengjvuengz.”
Yozswz dingq le, naeuz: “Gij fangxngwnzloq mwngz gij iqswh de dwg yienghneix: Sam nga couh dwg naeuz sam ngoenz.
Youq ndaw sam ngoenz neix, goengjvuengz ij heuh mwngz bae, ij hawj mwngz doiqyungz ndaej guh gij hong gaxgonq; mwngz vanzlij dwg caem laeuj, ndenq laeuj hawj goengjvuengz luj gaxgonq yienghmwnq.”

Yozswz vanzlij naeuz: “Daengj mwngz ndaej ok maj doiqyungz guh gij hong gaxgonq nex, mwngz ij ndaejgeiq gou vwq, bang gou mbat he; cingj mwngz youq dangqnaj goengjvuengz bang gou gangj vah ndei, hawj de coengq gou okmaj.

Gou saedsaeh dwg daj mwnq dieg Hihbwzlaiz vunz mwnq ngaiz gaemh daeuj daengz neij he. Gou youq dineix cungj mij guh gijmaz vaihsaeh hah, hoeng, mbouj rox hih vih guxmaz ngaiz gyaeng haeuj ndaw lauz neix daeuj.”
Boux guenj guh menqbauh mwnq raen Yozswz cek gij loq cek ndaej baenxlai ndei, couh doiq Yozswz naeuz: “Gou caemh fangxngwnzloq hwj, loqraen gwnz dingjraeuj bonjfaenh dingj miz sam loz menqbauh.
Loz ceiq baixgwnz de dwg coux hawj goengjvuengz gw he, miz gak cungj gak mbouj doengz, hoeng, miz roeg daeuj ding hwj ding hwj gw gij menqbauh ndaw loz.”
Yiengq, Yozswz couh han naeuz: “Ox, gij loq mwngz, gij iqswh de dwg yienghneix: Sam aen loz, caemhdangq lujnaeuz sam ngoenz.
Ndaw sam ngoenz neix, goengjvuengz ij heuh mwngz bae, dawz mwngz venj hwnjdaeuj, venj hwnj gwnz faex bae, hawj gij roeg daeuj ding gw, dot gw gij noh mwngz.”

Daengz daixsam ngoenz, ngamqngamq luj letlet goengjvuengz guh ngoenzseng. De cingj doenghheij gyoengq daqcwnz de daeuj gw laeuj, caiq heuh boux guenj laeuj caeuq boux guenj guh menqbauh mwnq dajlwh ndaw lauz bae daengz dangqnaj gyoengq daqcwnz.
Boux guenj laeuj mwnq doiqyungz ndaej guh gij hong gaxgonq, caem laeuj hawj goengjvuengz,
hoeng, boux guenj guh menqbauh mwnq dauqfanj ngaiz venj hwnj gwnz faex bae, caemh ngamqngamq luj letlet luj Yozswz gaxgonq cek naeuz gyoengqde ni hih yienghmwnq.
Boux guenj laeuj mwnq ndaej doiqyungz guh gij hong gaxgonq boiz le, gaenhbaenj mbouj dawz haeuj rwz Yozswz gaxgonq youq ndaw lauz raengq de dih vah.
Goq song bi le, goengjvuengz Ngaihgiz miz mbat fangxngwnzloq he, loqraen bonjfaenh de ndwn youq hamq dah Nizloz,
yawjraen miz caet duz cwzmeh biz bwdbwd hoenz hwdhwd dajlwh ndaw dah hwnj hamq ma gw nywj.
Gajlaeng caiq miz caet duz cwzmeh byombyom ndangjndangj he, caemh dajlwh ndaw dah hwnj ma, ndwn youq henz caet duz cwz biz bwdbwd mwnq.
Hoeng, caet duz cwz byom mwnq engq gyan gw caet duz cwz biz mwnq. Loq daengz dineix, goengjvuengz couh singj lo.
Gajlaeng goeng de caiq doiqyungz ninz ralaep, caiq fangxngwnzloq. Mbat neix loqraen miz go mienh he; go de ok miz caet riengz mienh mbot mbwtmbwt.
Gajlaeng caiq ok miz caet riengz bauz badbad, ngaiz rumz doeng ci hwj reuq ratrat liux.
Caet riengz mienh bauz neix dawz caet riengz mienh mbot mwnq gyan roengzbae liux. Loq daengz dineix, goeng de caiq singj lo; singj le de cij rox naeuz yienzlaiz dwg fangxngwnzloq lah.

Daengz haet daixngeih, gij loq de cungj lij youq ndaw uk de baenxlai luenh. Yiengq de couh baij vunz bae heuh Ngaihgiz sojmiz dih bouxsien caeuq boux rox saw lai he daeuj, naeuz gyoengqde ni de fangxngwnzloq raen gijmaz, siengj hawj gyoengqde cek gij loq de dauqdaej dwg gijmaz iqswh. Hoeng, cungj mij saek boux rox cek gij loq de.
Ngamqluj mwhneix, boux guenj laeuj mwnq doiq goengjvuengz naeuz: “Ox! Gou gaeuq ngawz lo; seizneix gou cij ndaejgeiq!
Miz mbat he, mwngz aeuqheiq, roengz mingqlingq dawz boux guenj guh menqbauh mwnq caeuq gou gyaeng haeuj ndaw lauz gingjveiqfuj bae.
Miz haemh he, raeuz song boux cungj fangxngwnzloq, gag vunz gag loq mbouj doxdoengz.

Mwhde, miz boux Hihbwzlaiz vunz hauxseng he caemh caeuq raeuz gyaeng youq itheij; de gaxgonq dwg swqhaeuh gingjveiqcangj he. Raeuz gangj naeuz de ni naeuz gyoengqraeuz loqraen gijmaz, yiengq de couh bang raeuz cek gij loq raeuz, naeuz raeuz ni, gak vunz loqraen dih dwg gijmaz iqswh.
Gajlaeng hax, cingqcaen gaeuq lingz hoh, caemh luj de cek gij loq mwnq ityiengh: gou ndaej doiqyungz guh gij hong gaxgonq he boiz, goeng guenj guh menqbauh mwnq caemh ngaiz venj hwnjdaeuj lo.”

Goengjvuengz dingq de yienghneix naeuz le, couh baij vunz bae heuh Yozswz daeuj laeng de, yiengq gyoengqde couh nyungjnyungj nyatnyat dajlwh ndaw lauz daiq Yozswz okma. De ok ma le, couh gvet mumh, lawh buh seuqset le, couh bae laeng goengjvuengz.
Goengjvuengz raen de le, couh naeuz Yozswz naeuz: “Gou caemh miz yiengh fangxngwnzloq he, hoeng, mij vunz rox cek. Gou dingqri vunz naeuz mwngz rox cek gij fangxngwnzloq vunz.”
Yozswz dingq le, han naeuz: “Goengjvuengz hax, mbouj dwg gou rox cek loq law; dwg Cangqdiq hawj gou rox cek lah.”
Yiengq, goengjvuengz couh naeuz Yozswz ni naeuz: “Gou fangxngwnzloq raen gou ndwn youq hamq dah Nizloz.
Sawqmwh miz caet duz cwzmeh biz bwdbwd hoenz hwdhwd, dajlwh ndaw dah hwnj hamq dah ma gw nywj.

Gajlaeng caemhcaiq miz caet duz cwzmeh byombyom ndangjndangj cix yakyawj he caemh gaenhangx hwnj ma. Youq Ngaihgiz, gou coengzlaiz mijyaengz raen goq miz cungj cwz byombyom ndangjndangj caiq yakyawj neix.
Doengh duz cwz byombyom ndangjndangj caiq yakyawj mwnq engqgya gyan gw doengh duz cwz biz bwdbwd mwnq.
Gyoengqde gannaeuz gw doengh duz cwz biz mwnq lah, hoeng, caemh ciuqyiengh luj gaxgonq yienghmwnq byombyom ndangjndangj; yawj mbouj ok gyoengqde gw goq cwz biz. Loq daengz dineix, gou couh singj lo.
“Gajlaeng, gou caiq miz mbat fangxngwnzloq he, loqraen miz go mienh he ok miz caet riengz mienh, mbot mbwtmbwt.
Caemhcaiq gaenhangx ok miz caet riengz mienh, bauz badbad, ngaiz rumz doeng ci hwj reuq ratrat he.
Caet riengz mienh bauz badbad mwnq engqgya gyan caet riengz mienh mbot mbwtmbwt mwnq roengzbae.
“Gou gangj naeuz gij fangxngwnzloq neix naeuz bouxsien ni, hoeng mij saek boux rox cek gij loq neix dwg gijmaz iqswh.”

Yozswz dingq le, doiq goengjvuengz naeuz: “Goengjvuengz, mwngz fangxngwnzloq song yiengh, gizsaed cijngamq dwg yiengh he; doenghgij iqswh de cungj dwg doxdoengz. Cangqdiq couh yungh yienghneix naeuz mwngz ni de ij guh gijmaz lo.
Ndaw loq ndaw de naeuz miz caet duz cwzmeh biz bwdbwd mwnq, couh dangq naeuz caet bi; doengh caet riengz mienh mbot mbwtmbwt mwnq caemhdangq caet bi. Doenghgij neix gij iqswh de cungj dwg doxdoengz.
Doengh caet duz cwzmeh byom byangjbyangq cix hojyawj mwnq caeuq doengh caet riengz mienh bauz badbad reuq ratrat mwnq caemhdangq caet bi, couh dwg naeuz dangq caet bi iekvangh.
“Caemh luj daxbaenh gou naeuz goengjvuengz ni, Cangqdiq gaenq naeuz mwngz ni de ij guh gijmaz lo,
couh dwg naeuz cenz Ngaihgiz miz caet bi fungcuk,
gajlaeng caemh miz caet bi mij sou ndaej saek ceh. Cenz Ngaihgiz cungj iekiek vanghvangh, youqgaenj raixcaix, hawj vunz cungj mbouj ndaejgeiq gaxgonq caemh miz fungcuk goq.
Goengjvuengz hax, Cangqdiq hawj mwngz fanjfuz fangxngwnzloq song mbat baenx lai, couh dwg naeuz de gietdingh ij guh gij saeh neix lo vwh.”
Yozswz vanzlij caiq naeuz: “Goengjvuengz, mwngz wnggai genj boux vunz ceiq coengjmingz ceiq rox faenbied ndaej ok gijmaz saeh hab mbouj hab guh he daeuj guenjleix Ngaihgiz.
Caemh youq cenz guek gak dieg genj vunz daeuj cwnjbiq youq caet bi sou ndaej lai fungcuk mwnq, sou hwnj cenz guek sou ndaej dih haj faenh cih it dih haeux,
diuh haeuj ndaw canghguq ndaw singz bae, caenhgag goengjvuengz cij ndaej miz gienz hawj byawz yungh he,
fuengz daengz caet bi iekvangh mwnq. Bienh haeux neix caemh ndaej gaeuq Ngaihgiz sojmiz dih vunz lo, youq caet bi iekvangh mwnq mbouj ngaiz iek hwj rairaeg raicied bae lo.”
Goengjvuengz dingq le, caeuq doengh gyoengq gaen henz ndang de cungj dungziq Yozswz yienghneix naeuz.
Gajlaeng, de couh doiq gyoengq gaen henz ndang de naeuz: “Gij Hoenzsaenz Cangqdiq caeuq Yozswz youq; senj de ceiq hab lo. Mij saek boux ndaej beij de hab.”
Goeng de yienghneix naeuz le, vanzlij doiq Yozswz naeuz: “Giqyienz Cangqdiq gijmaz cungj gangj naeuz mwngz ni lo, yiengq caemh mij'z vunz ndaej luj mwngz cix coengjmingz cix yawj ndaej gyae laem lo.
Gou hawj mwngz guenj aen gya gou; Ngaihgiz sojmiz hih vunz cungj ij dingq mwngz cijveih. Gou ceiq ak couh daengz mwngz lo.
Couh dwg naeuz mwngz ndaej guenj baenx cenz Ngaihgiz liux.”
Goengjvuengz naeuz daengz neij le, couh duet aeu aen haedfawz miz yaenq de, daenj hawj Yozswz, caiq hawj de daenj diuz buhbauz raez gyaeundei he, youhcaiq daiq hangqlenq gim hawj de.
Yiengq caiq hawj Yozswz naengh aen ci dang daixngeih ak cij ndaej naengh he, caemh miz vunz youq dangqnaj hemq: “Gvih roengzma, gvih roengzma!” Couh yienghneix, Yozswz guenj baenx cenz Ngaihgiz.
Goengjvuengz caiq doiq Yozswz naeuz: “Gou gannaeuz dwg dang vuengz lah, hoeng, youq Ngaihgiz mij'z mwngz hoi bak gangj vah bihcwnj, mij'z vunz ndaej gag ok cawjeiq guh gijmaz.”
Goengjvuengz caemhcaiq an coh hawj Yozswz heuh Sajfaznaqdwz-Bahneiqyaq,
Yozswz samcib bi couh gaihcij bang goengjvuengz Ngaihgiz guenjleix guekgya daixsaeh, dajlwh vangzgungh bae Ngaihgiz gak dieg, dauqcawq byaijbyaij cazcaz yawjyawj.
Youq caet bi fungcuk mwhde,
de dawz gij haeux seiqhenz singz he ma dong hwj,
dong ndaej baenxbienh, lai luj gij sa henz haij nwih, guh hwj mij banqfaz rau bae.
Mwh ijvanh daengz doengh bi iekvangh mwnq, mehyah Yozswz gaenq seng miz song daeglwg lo.
Mwh Yozswz an coh hawj daeglwg daeuz de hih mwhde, de naeuz: “Ox! Cangqdiq sawjhawj gou lumz gaxgonq ndaw ranz bohmeh gou sojmiz dih nanh,” couh yienghneix de couh an coh hawj de heuh Majnazsih.
Gajlaeng Yozswz an coh hawj daeglwg ngeih de hih mwhde, de caemh naeuz: “Cangqdiq hawj gou youq mwnq dieg haemzhoj neix miz lwg, hwngqseiq hwnjdaeuj,” yiengq couh an coh hawj de heuh Hijfazlenz.
Ndaw guek Ngaihgiz lienzdaemh caet bi fungcuk le,

caemh luj gaxgonq Yozswz naeuz hih yienghmwnq, caemhcaiq lienzdaemh daengz caet bi iekvangh. Gannaeuz gak guek gak dieg cungj ngaiz iekvangh lah, hoeng ndaw guek Ngaihgiz ndaw de dauqcawq cungj miz haeux.

Mwh Ngaihgiz gak dieg cungj roeb daengz iekvangh mwhde, gij vunz cungj bae gouz goengjvuengz aeu haeux hwj hemq bae, yiengq goengjvuengz couh mingqlingq gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou bae cimh Yozswz aeu; sojmiz dih saeh cungj youz de nganhbaiz.”
Aenvih Ngaihgiz dauqcawq cungj roeb daengz iekvangh, yied ngoenz yied yiemzcungq, yiengq Yozswz couh hoi sojmiz dih canghguq, dawz gij haeux hai hawj gij vunz Ngaihgiz.
Daiqlienz gak guek gak dieg dih vunz cungj caemh daeuj daengz Ngaihgiz laeng Yozswz cawx haeux.
Iekvangh gaenq

Mwhde Yozswz youq Ngaihgiz dang daixngeih ak hwj, de fuqswz hai haeux hawj gyoengq vunz dajlwh gak dieg daeuj he. Doengh daeggo de caemh daeuj lo. Daeuj daengz dangqnaj de le, couh gvih roengzma sax de.
Yozswz baex myaeg yawj he, couh doq rox naeuz dwg gyoengqde lo, hoeng de gyajcang mbouj roxnaj gyoengqde hwj, naj ndaem ndetndet hwj cam naeuz: “Faenhsou dajlwh mwnqlawz daeuj?”
Gyoengqde han naeuz: “Gyoengqraeuz dajlwh Gyahnamz daeuj, siengj daeuj neij cawx haeux lah.”
Yozswz gan rox gyoengqde, hoeng gyoengqde dauqfanj mij rox de.

Yozswz ngeix daengz gaxgonq de fangxngwnzloq goq dih saeh, couh doiq gyoengq daeggo de naeuz: “Faenhsou dwg gyenhdez, dwg aen guek faenhsou baij daeuj dineix, cenmonz damqdingq yawjyawj, dauqdaej dineix miz mbouj miz mwnq ndaej hoenx he!”
Doengh daeggo de dingq le, couh doq han naeuz: “Ox, goeng'ak, mij dwg law; gyoengqraeuz dwg daeuj cawx haeux lah!
Gyoengqraeuz cungj dwg goengjlungz nuengxau he, caiq dwg lauxlaux saedsaed dih vunz, mbouj dwg gyenhdez law.”
Yozswz vanzlij guqiq doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Mij dwg! Faenhsou gaengjdingq dwg daeuj neij damqdingq yawjyawj dineix dauqdaej miz mbouj miz mwnq ndaej hoenx he.”

Gajlaeng doengh daeggo de cungj vaiqdi han naeuz: “Goeng'ak hax, gyoengqraeuz cungj dwg dangq bouxhoiq mwngz lah. Itgungh miz cibngeih boux goengjlungz nuengxau, cungj dwg caemh boux boh he. Bohmeh raeuz cungj dwg youq Gyahnamz; daegnuengx ceiq iq seizneix youq henz ndang daxboh, caeuq daxboh youq. Vanzlij miz daegnuengx laem, hoeng, de gaenq ngaiz rai lo.”
Yozswz mboujguenj gyoengq daeggo de baenzlaw naeuz, de vanzlij caiq guqiq naeuz: “Faenhsou gaengjdingq dwg gyenhdez!

Gou ij gaujniemq gaujniemq faenhsou yawj. Gou gamj hij gij coh goengjvuengz ma baujcingq, cizfeih faenhsou ndaej daiq daegnuengx ceiq iq faenhsou daeuj neij, mbouj nex, gaej muengh naeuz faenhsou ndaej yamq ok dineix maj lo.

Faenhsou baij boux he maj daiq daegnuengx iq faenhsou daeuj; lij lw hih vunz gyaeng haeuj ndaw lauz bae. Yungh yienghneix ma cingqmingz yawj faenhsou soj gangj hih vah dwg caen haj gyaj. Mbouj nex, gou couh naeuz faenhsou dwg gyenhdez!”
Couh yienghneix, Yozswz couh gyaeng gyoengqde sam ngoenz.
Daengz daixsam ngoenz le, Yozswz doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Gou dwg boux gingqcungh Cangqdiq he; hauhnaeuz faenhsou ciuq gij vah gou bae guh nex, gou couh nyiuz faenhsou, mbouj aeu gij mingh faenhsou.
Hauhnaeuz faenhsou cingqcaen dwg lauxsaed hih vunz, couh louz boux he youq ndaw lauz; lij lw hih vunz ndaej dawz gij haeux bonjfaenh cawx ndaej hih dawz maj hawj gyoengq vunz iek ndaw ranz lo.

Gajlaeng daiq daegnuengx iq faenhsou daeuj hawj gou yawj, yienghneix couh ndaej cingqmingz naeuz faenhsou gangj hih vah dwg lauxsaed he, gou couh nyiuz faenhsou mbouj rai.” Yozswz yienghneix naeuz le, gyoengqde caemh dungziq lo.

Gajlaeng, gyoengqde cungj gag ienq naeuz: “Mbat neix gyoengqraeuz bauqwngq dawz lo! Gaxgonq gyoengqraeuz cungj gag haih nuengx bonjfaenh, mingzmingz raen de souh haemz souh hoj gouz gyoengqraeuz lo, hoeng gyoengqraeuz cungj mij leix mij langh de. Mbat neix lwnz daengz raeuz souh coih lo.”

Couh youq mwhneix, Lijbenq daeggo gyoengqde dingq gyoengqde yienghneix naeuz le, couh doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Gou cungj byah goq faenhsou lo nex, naeuz mbouj hawj faenhsou haih daegnuengx raeuz lo, hoeng faenhsou mbouj dingq. Seizneix faenhsou raen mijyaengz, haih de dih coih, mbat neix daengz raeuz rap lo.”
Mwh gyoengqde gangj hih doenghgij vah neix, gyoengqde mbouj rox naeuz Yozswz rox dingq, aenvih Yozswz caeuq gyoengqde gangj hih vah, cungj dwg miz vunz youq henz de bang de fanhyiz he.

Yozswz dingq gyoengqde gangj vah le, couh byaij goq daixlingh mwnq bae, daej donq he, caiq doiqyungz byaij goqma caeuq gyoengqde gangj vah. Gajlaeng dajlaeng gyoengqde rag Sihmenj okdaeuj, couh youq dangqnaj gyoengqde goenj hwnjdaeuj.

Yozswz raengq gij vunz de, hawj gyoengqde dawz doengh aen daeh daeggo de ma coux haeux rim hwj hawj gyoengqde, caiq dawz gij ngaenz gyoengqde oet haeuj gak aen daeh gyoengqde bae boiz, caemhcaiq cwnjbiq youq buenqroen hih gij gw he. Yiengq gij vunz de caemh ciuq guh lo.
Sojmiz hih cungj cwnjbiq ndei le, doengh daeggo de couh dawz daeh haeux doz hwnj gwnz gumq duz lawz bae, couh maj ranz lo.

Daengz haemh le, youq buenqroen miz mwnq youq he, gyoengqde couh doz youq mwnq youq haemh. Yiengq miz boux he gej bak daeh ij aeu swzliuq ma gueng duz lawz, cij raen gij ngaenz bonjfaenh cungj lij coengq youq ndaw daeh.
Gajlaeng de couh naeuz doenghheij goengjlungz nuengxau de ni, naeuz: “Hawjm'z yawj lux, gij ngaenz gou caiq doiq boiz ma lo, youq ndaw daeh gou nwih.”
Gyoengqde dingq le, cungj dungxmbouq ndangsaenz, boux yawj boux, heiq memmem hwj naeuz: “Dauqdaej Cangqdiq ijsiengj hawj raeuz guh gijmaz nex?”
Gyoengqde maj daengz dieg Gyahnamz, daengz daxboh gyoengqde mwnq le, couh geq naeuz de ni gyoengqde roeb daengz gijmaz saeh. Gyoengqde naeuz:
“Bouxcawj Ngaihgiz doiq gyoengqraeuz gaeuq yiemz lo, ngengh naeuz gyoengqraeuz dwg gyenhdez, dawz gyoengqraeuz cenzbuq gyaeng haeuj ndaw lauz bae.
Gyoengqraeuz naeuz raeuz mij dwg gyenhdez law, dwg vunz lauxsaed lah.
Gyoengqraeuz cibngeih boux goengjlungz nuengxau cungj dwg caemh boux boh he lah, miz daegnuengx he gaenq ngaiz rai lo, daegnuengx ceiq iq he seizneix caeuq daxboh youq dieg Gyahnamz.

“Hoeng, bouxcawj Ngaihgiz naeuz: ‘Hauhnaeuz ijsiengj hawj gou sinq faenhsou dwg mbouj dwg lauxsaed hih vunz, faenhsou couh sien aeu boux he louz youq dineix; lij lw hih vunz dawz haeux maj ranz hawj gij vunz iek ndaw ranz.

Gajlaeng le, daiq daegnuengx iq ndaw ranz daeuj laeng gou dineix; yiengq, gou cij sinq naeuz faenhsou dwg vunz lauxsaed, mbouj dwg gyenhdez. Gou cij coengq boux beixnuengx faenhsou, vanzlij hawj faenhsou seizbienh daeuj laeng gou cawx haeux.’”

Gyoengqde geq naeuz daxboh ni liux le, couh dawz doengh daeh haeux raix okdaeuj. Liuh mbouj daengz gak vunz dih ngaenz cungj lij youq ndaw daeh bonjfaenh. Guh hwj gyoengqde caeuq daxboh de raen gij ngaenz le, cungj lau liux.

Daxboh gyoengqde doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou ijsiengj hawj gij lwg gou cungj baih liux bae maz! Yozswz mij miz lo, Sihmenj caemh mij lo; faenhsou vanzlij ij daiq daeg lwgsod gou bae laem hajx! Sojmiz hih beiqciz cungj ngaiz gou dawz liux lo!”

Gajlaeng, Lijbenq doiq daxboh de naeuz: “Dawz de gyau hawj gou bax; gou baujcingq daiq de ma. Hauhnaeuz gou mbouj daiq de ma hawj mwngz, mwngz couh gaj song daeglwg gou bax! Mwngz coengqsim dawz de gyau hawj gou bax. Gou gaengjdingq daiq de ma hawj mwngz.”

Hoeng, Yajgoz naeuz: “Gou mbouj hawj de gaen faenhsou bae law! Caen daeggo de gaenq ngaiz rai lo; Lahgyez seng hih lwg, lij gag lw de boux dog laem lo. Dingjlingz faenhsou bae daengz buenqroen roeb miz gijmaz saeh ngaiz haih nej, yiengq caemhdangq faenhsou hawj gou vunz laux rai ra mbouj laep lo.”
Dieg Gyahnamz iekvangh gig yiemzcungq.
Yajgoz cenz ranz cungj gw liux gij haeux dajlwh Ngaihgiz cawx ma he lo. Gajlaeng, Yajgoz couh doiq gyoengq lwg de naeuz: “Faenhsou caiq doiqyungz bae cawx di haeux he ma bax!”

Yiengq Youzdaq couh doiq daxboh de naeuz: “Boux mwnq gingjgauq goq gyoengqraeuz naeuz: ‘Hauhnaeuz faenhsou mbouj daiq laeq nuengx iq faenhsou daeuj nex, gaej muengh naeuz faenhsou ndaej daeuj raen gou lo.’
Boh, mwngz hawj nuengx iq caeuq raeuz bae nex, raeuz couh bang mwngz bae cawx haeux.

Hauhnaeuz mwngz mbouj hawj nex, raeuz caemh mbouj ndaej bae lo, aenvih boux mwnq gangj goq naeuz: ‘Hauhnaeuz nuengx iq faenhsou mbouj caeuq faenhsou itheij daeuj nex, couh mboujcwnj faenhsou daeuj raen gou.’”
Gajlaeng Yajgoz naeuz: “Faenhsou vihmaz ij yienghneix haih gou? Vihmaz naeuz boux mwnq ni naeuz faenhsou vanzlij miz daegnuengx iq laem nex?”

Gyoengqde han naeuz: “Boux mwnq caenhrox saemj, caenhrox caz gyoengqraeuz caeuq ndaw ranz raeuz baenzlawz yiengh: ‘Faenhsou lij miz daxboh laem lwi? Faenhsou vanzlij miz mbouj miz beixnuengx hah?’ Yiengq gyoengqraeuz cungj lauxlaux saedsaed naeuz de ni lo. Bouxlawz rox naeuz de ij hawj raeuz daiq nuengx iq raeuz bae nex?”

Youzdaq caiq doiq daxboh de naeuz: “Gyau daegnuengx iq hawj gou bax. Raeuz majcangq bae cawx haeux, mienxndaej raeuz cenz ranz bouxlaux, bouxnoix, daiqlienz mwngz caeuq gij lwgyah raeuz cungj ngaiz rai iek.
Gou ndaej baux laeq nuengx neix dih nganhcenz; hauhnaeuz gou mbouj ndaej bingzan daiq de ma nex, nyienh'eiq baenxseiq vunz rap gij coih neix.”
Gangj daengz dineix le, Youzdaq couh naeuz: “Neq, hawjm'z yawj hux, hauhnaeuz raeuz mbouj ngaiz nguh nex, seizneix cungj ndaej bae ma song ngaux lux!”
Yiengq daxboh de han naeuz: “Hauhnaeuz ngengh ij yienghneix guh nex, caemh ndaej, hoeng faenhsou caemh ij dawz di mwnq raeuz neij gij ceiq ndei he, luj dangzrwi hah,
Caiq daiq ngaenz bae lai boix he hwj, dawz gij ngaenz mbat gaxgonq youq ndaw daeh raen mwnq nax—aiq dwg loek dinghluh—aeu bae boiz vunz.
Faenhsou daiq daegnuengx iq sou vaiqdi bae cimh boux vunz mwnq bax.

Muengh Cangqdiq, couh dwg akak rengzrengz gaiqgaiq cungj ndaej guh daengz dih Cangqdiq, sawjhawj de sim'unq le, ndaej hawj Benqyajminj caeuq Sihmenj gaen faenhsou ma. Hauhnaeuz yienghneix cungj lij ij hawj gou baih lwg nex, gou caemh gauqswz lo, cungj caenhbouh liux lo, mij banqfaz laem lo, suenq lo.”
Couh yienghneix, gyoengqde couh daiq di caenxcingz caeuq song boix dih ngaenz, caemh daiq Benqyajminj bae Ngaihgiz cimh Yozswz lo.

Yozswz raen Benqyajminj caeuq gyoengqde daeuj le, couh naeuz boux guenjgya de hawj de daiq gyoengqde bae ndaw ranz de, caemhcaiq raengq de naeuz: “Maj gaj bit gaj gaeq loengh byaek daengj gou; haeuxringz gou ij caeuq gyoengqde gw.”
Boux guenjgya caemh ciuq de naeuz hih yienghmwnq bae guh, daiq gyoengqde maj ranz Yozswz.

Aenvih Yozswz hawj gyoengqde haeuj ndaw ranz de bae, yiengq gyoengqde cungj lau hwj naeuz: “Aiq dwg vih gij ngaenz mbat gaxgonq coengq youq ndaw daeh, cij daiq gyoengqraeuz daeuj dineix, ijsiengj hoenx gyoengqraeuz, ciengj aeu duz lawz raeuz, caeuq ep gyoengqraeuz hawj de guh hoiq dinghluh.”
Gyoengqde yienghneix lwnh naeuz le, couh youq mwh gyoengqde ngamq baex daengz bakdou he couh majcangq cam boux guenjgya de naeuz:
“Goengjau, mbat gaxgonq gyoengqraeuz daeuj dineix dwg daeuj cawx haeux he.

Hoeng, maj daengz buenqroen doz haemh yietbaeg le, hoi bak daeh cij rox naeuz gij ngaenz bonjfaenh cungj lij youq ndaw daeh bonjfaenh, it faen cungj mbouj noix. Seizneix, gyoengqraeuz doiqyungz daiq gij ngaenz mwnq daeuj lo,
vanzlij linghvaih daiq daeuj mbat neix ij cawx haeux he dih ngaenz. Gyoengqraeuz cingqcaen mbouj rox mbat gaxgonq dwg bouxlawz dawz ngaenz coengq haeuj ndaw daeh raeuz bae.”

Goeng guenjgya dingq le, vued gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou gaej heiq gaej lau; gij ngaenz faenhsou gou gaenq senqsi sou lo. Gij ngaenz ndaw daeh faenhsou dwg boux baujcuk baujyouh faenhsou caeuq cojgoeng faenhsou dih Cangqdiq soengq hawj faenhsou coengq youq ndaw daeh lah.” Goeng de yienghneix gangj sat le, couh daiq Sihmenj okdaeuj hawj gyoengqde.
Boux guenjgya daiq gyoengqde haeuj maj ranz Yozswz le, couh daek raemx hawj gyoengqde swiq ha,
Doengh daeggo Yozswz gaenq rox naeuz gyoengqde haeuxringz ij youq mwnq gw haeux lo, yiengq gyoengqde couh cwnjbiq ndei doenghgij caenxcingz mwnq, daengj de ma le couh soengq hawj de.
Yozswz ma daengz ranz le, gyoengqde couh dawz gij caenxcingz soengq hawj de, caemh bomz roengz doem bae sax de.

Yozswz raen yienghneix le, couh dongx gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou baenzlawz yiengh hah? Ndei lwi?” Caiq cam gyoengqde naeuz: “Daxboh faenhsou hax, couh dwg faenhsou gangj goq dih boux vunz laux mwnq hax, de ndei lwi? Vanzlij youq bax?”
Gyoengqde han naeuz: “Daxboh gyoengqraeuz, bouxhoiq mwngz, ndei hwj; de vanzlij giencangq.” Gangj sat, gyoengqde youhcaiq gvih roengzma sax de.

Yozswz yawjraen caeuq bonjfaenh doxdaep saejndw dih daegnuengx iq de Benqyajminj le, couh cam naeuz: “Boux neix couh dwg faenhsou naeuz gou ni goq hih daegnuengx ceiq iq he laj?” Caemhcaiq naeuz: “Nuengx iq, muengh Cangqdiq soengq fuk hawj mwngz.”

Yozswz gangj sat, couh nyungjnyat byaij okbae. Aenvih de baenxlai caez mij raen daegnuengx iq de lo, couh cojgvaq hwj ceng di he cungj mbaet mbouj ndaej, ijvanh youq dangqnaj gyoengqde daej lo, yiengq de couh maj daengz ndaw fungh bonjfaenh de le, daej donq he.
Gajlaeng de couh naenx youq ndaw sim hwj mbouj daej, swiq naj le couh ok daeuj, heuh gij vunz de nda daiz baij haeux baij byaek.

Yozswz gag daiz he, gyoengq beixnuengx de caemh gag daiz he, gyoengq vunz buenx gw he, dwg vunz Ngaihgiz, caemh gag lingh nda daiz he, aenvih gij vunz Ngaihgiz dwgcaengz caeuq gij vunz Hihbwzlaiz caemh daiz gw haeux.
Yozswz hawj gyoengq beixnuengx de baez boux baez boux hwj naj yiengq laeng de bae naengh;

Yozswz mingqlingq gyoengq hoiq de dawz gij haeux gij byaek gwnz daiz de faen hawj gyoengq beixnuengx de. Hoeng, faenh Benqyajminj beij gak boux beixnuengx de lai haj boix. Couh yienghneix, gyoengqde couh caeuq Yozswz gw laeuj, gw hwj angq fwngjfwngq.

Gajlaeng, Yozswz raengq boux guenjgya de naeuz: “Mwngz dawz doenghheij daeh gyoengqde cwnqliengq coux rim bae; duz lawz gyoengqde doz ndaej geijlai couh coux geijlai. Caemhcaiq dawz gak vunz dih ngaenz coengq haeuj gak vunz hih daeh bae,
caiq dawz aen cenj ngaenz coux laeuj gou coengq youq boux ceiq oiq he ndaw daeh de bae, caeuq gij ngaenz doxcaeuq coengq.” Yiengq boux guenjgya caemh ciuq gij vah Yozswz bae guh lo.
Daengz haet daixngeih ranz baex rongh he, Yozswz couh hawj gyoengq beixnuengx de

Hoeng ngamqngamq ok singz mbouj geijlai gyae, Yozswz couh doiq boux guenjgya de naeuz: “Mwngz majcangq bae boenq gyoengq vunz mwnq. Boenq dawz le, couh saemjcam gyoengqde naeuz: ‘Bouxcawj gou doiq faenhsou baenxlai ndei; faenhsou mbouj boixaen sat lo, hoeng, dauqfanj boixhaemz.
Aen cenj neix mbouj dwg aen cenj bouxcawj gou haz? Aen cenj neix dwg de aeu ma gw laeuj he, caemh dwg aeu ma yaep bazgvaq he. Faenhsou yienghneix guh gaeuq sieb hoh!’”
Gajlaeng boux guenjgya boenq dawz gyoengqde le, couh ciuq Yozswz raengq hih gij vah mwnq bae naeuz gyoengqde.
Gyoengqde han naeuz: “Goengjau, mwngz gangj gij vah neix dauqdaej dwg gijmaz iqswh nex? Gyoengqraeuz coengzlaiz mij guh cungj saeh neix goq!

Mwngz caemh rox gyoengqraeuz, mbat gaxgonq youq ndaw daeh raeuz raen dih doenghgij ngaenz mwnq, mbat neix vanzlij cenmonz dajlwh Gyahnamz daiq daeuj boiz hawj faenhsou; gyoengqraeuz baeq caeg aeu gij gimngaenz bouxcawj mwngz hwj?
Goengjau, hauhnaeuz mwngz raen gyoengqraeuz ndaw neix bouxlawz yo miz aen cenj mwnq nex, couh dawz bouxlawz gajrai; gyoengqraeuz lij lw hih vunz nyienh'eiq hawj mwngz guh hoiq.”

Boux guenjgya couh han naeuz: “Ndaej hah, faenhsou yienghneix gangj caemh miz dauhleix leuz, hoeng gou caenhgag youq laeng bouxlawz cimh ndaej raen aen cenj, couh gag hawj bouxlawz guh bouxhoiq gou lah; lij lw hih vunz mij miz coih law.”
Gajlaeng gyoengqde cungj vaiqdi dajlwh gwnz gumq duz lawz dawz doengh daeh roengzma, nyungjnyungj nyatnyat vaiqdi vaiqdi gej bak daeh.
Yiengq boux guenjgya couh dajlwh boux daeggo daeuz gyenjcaz roengzma daengz boux ceiq iq he Benqyajminj. Gajlaeng engq youq ndaw daeh Benqyajminj raen aen cenj he,

guh hwj gyoengq beixnuengx de cungj siengsim hwj gag mbek gij buh bonjfaenh vaih liux, caiq doiqyungz dawz doengh daeh haeux doz hwnj gwnz gumq duz lawz bae, gaen goeng guenjgya maj daengz ndaw singz.
Youzdaq caeuq gij beixnuengx de bae daengz ndaw ranz Yozswz; Yozswz vanzlij youq ranz. Gyoengqde couh youq dangqnaj de gvih roengzma sax de.
Gajlaeng Yozswz doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou gingqyienz guh ok cungj saeh neix! Nanzdauh faenhsou mbouj rox, luj gou yienghneix dih vunz, baenzbaenz cungj rox yaep bazgvaq maz?”

Yiengq Youzdaq han naeuz: “Daengz mwhneix, raeuz doiq bouxcawj raeuz miz maz vah gangj laem, caemh mij vah ndaej gangj lo. Vunz caeuq doxgaiq cungj youq dineix; nanzdauh raeuz lij gag hemq vuengj maz? Cangqdiq gaenq caz ok bouxhoiq mwngz dih coih lo! Seizneix raeuz caeuq boux youq laeng de cimh ndaej aen cenj mwnq cungj dwg bouxhoiq mwngz.”

Yozswz dingq le, han naeuz: “Mbouj hah, gou mbouj dwg gij iqswh neix! Gou caenhgag aeu boux youq laeng de cimh ndaej raen aen cenj mwnq ma caeuq gou guh hoiq lah. Lij lw hih vunz cungj ndaej bingzbingz an'an maj cimh daxboh faenhsou.”

Gajlaeng, Youzdaq couh byaij bae dep Yozswz, gouz Yozswz naeuz: “Bouxcawj hax, cingj mwngz hawj gou gangj conz vah he naeuz mwngz ni. Giqyienz mwngz dang hung dang ak ndaej luj goengjvuengz lo, gouz mwngz gaejyungh doiq gou fatheiq.
“Mbat gaxgonq mwngz cam goq gyoengqraeuz naeuz: ‘Faenhsou dwg mbouj dwg vanzlij miz daxboh caeuq miz goengjlungz nuengxau?’

Gajlaeng gyoengqraeuz han naeuz: ‘Raeuz vanzlij miz daxboh nienzgeij laux he caeuq miz daegnuengx nienzgeij lij iq laem. Daegnuengx iq neix dwg daxboh nienz laux le cij seng miz he. Daeggo caeuq de doxdaep saejndw he gaenq rai lo; meh seng de lij caenhgag miz de laem lo, sojhij daxboh dwzbez ndiep de.’
“Bouxcawj hax, mwngz raengq raeuz hawj raeuz daiq de daeuj hawj mwngz caenra raen de.
Raeuz caemh naeuz mwngz ni goq, laeq lwgngez neix mbouj ndaej liz boh de; hauhnaeuz de mbouj youq lo, boh de gaengjdingq ngaiz rai.
Hoeng, mwngz caenhrox naeuz: ‘Hauhnaeuz faenhsou mbouj daiq daegnuengx iq daeuj nex, couh mboujcwnj caiq daeuj raen gou.’
“Gyoengqraeuz maj daengz daxboh raeuz, couh dawz gij vah mwngz gangj naeuz de ni.
Gajlaeng, daxboh caiq hawj gyoengqraeuz dauq daeuj cawx di haeux he.
Yiengq, gyoengqraeuz naeuz: ‘Hauhnaeuz daegnuengx iq caeuq gyoengqraeuz bae nex, gyoengqraeuz couh bae; daegnuengx iq mbouj bae, raeuz caemh mbouj ndaej caiq raen boux vunz mwnq.’
Daxboh raeuz doiq gyoengqraeuz naeuz: ‘Faenhsou rox hah, Lahgyez caenhgag seng hawj gou song daeglwg sat lo.
Miz daeg he gaenq mij youq lo, daengz seizneix gauqcaez cungj mij raen de lo, aiq ngaiz duz nyaen sik soiq liux lo.
Seizneix faenhsou caiq ij daiq daeg neix bae; hauhnaeuz de youq dangjroen ngaiz miz maz saeh nex, yiengq caemhdangq faenhsou hawj gou vunz laux rai ra mbouj laep lo!’
“Bouxcawj hax, gij mingh daxboh raeuz caeuq gij mingh laeq lwgngez neix riengh youq itheij he. Yiengq, hauhnaeuz seizneix laeq nuengx neix mbouj caeuq raeuz itheij maj daengz daxboh raeuz mwnq nex,
daxboh raeuz yawj mbouj raen laeq nuengx neix nex, de gaengjdingq mij mingh lo. Yiengq couh dwg naeuz raeuz bonjfaenh gag hawj boh bonjfaenh laux le rai ra mbouj laep lo!
“Aenvih gou yiengq daxboh baujcingq goq laeq nuengx neix bingzan, naeuz: ‘Hauhnaeuz gou mbouj ndaej daiq daegnuengx neix ma hawj mwngz nex, gou nyienh'eiq baenx seiqvunz rap coih,’
yiengq seizneix laeq nuengx neix mbouj ndaej gaen gou maj, gou mij naj maj raen daxboh, hawj de souh daengz yienghneix nanh.

Yozswz dingq le, youq dangqnaj gyoengq vunz gaen henz ndang de cungj mbaet mbouj ndaej hwj siengj daej lo, couh youq mwhneix, de couh mingqlingq gyoengqde ok rog bae. De yienghneix guh dwg siengj youq de caeuq doenghheij beixnuengx de doxnginh hih mwhde, mbouj siengj miz gij vunzrog youq henz de.

De mingqlingq gyoengqde ok bae le, couh coengq sing daej engxengx hwnjdaeuj, daej hwj gij vunz Ngaihgiz cungj dingqri lo, caemh cenz bae daengz ndaw vangzgungh, goengjvuengz Ngaihgiz cenz ranz vunz caemh cungj rox gienh saeh neix lo.

Yozswz daej le, couh doiq gyoengq beixnuengx de naeuz: “Gou couh dwg Yozswz. Daxboh raeuz vanzlij youq bax?” Yozswz yienghneix naeuz le, gyoengq beixnuengx de cungj doeksaet hwj lau hwj ij rai, guh hwj ngoemxngwd mij vah ndaej gangj bae.

Gajlaeng Yozswz vanzlij hawj gyoengq beixnuengx de goq daeuj gaenh dangqnaj de hwj, couh doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Gou couh dwg beixnuengx faenhsou Yozswz, caemh dwg ngaiz faenhsou hai bae daengz Ngaihgiz dih Yozswz.
Hoeng, faenhsou gaejyungh vih gienh saeh neix hwj you, caemh gaejyungh gag gvaiq bonjfaenh. Dwg Cangqdiq baij gou sien daeuj daengz dineix gaxgonq lah; dwg vih ij gouq daixgya dih mingh lah.
Mwnq dieg neix gaenq ngaiz iekvangh lienzdaemh miz song bi lo, vanzlij miz haj bi laem, mij ndaej geng, mij ndaej ndaem, engq mij ndaej sou.
Cangqdiq baij gou sien daeuj daengz dineix, couh dwg ij baux faenhsou dih mingh, couh yungh cungj banqfaz geizmiuj neix daeuj baux aen gyahcuz raeuz lah.

Sojhij, dwg Cangqdiq dawz gou soengq daeuj daengz dineix lah, mbouj dwg faenhsou law. Cangqdiq sawjhawj gou ndaej guh boux bang goengjvuengz Ngaihgiz ok cawjeiq, youq ndaw ranz goengjvuengz ndaej guh boux guenjgya he, caemh ndaej guenj baenx cenz guek dih saeh.”

Gajlaeng Yozswz caiq doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou vaiqdi maj laeng daxboh, naeuz de ni, naeuz: ‘Daeglwg mwngz Yozswz yienghneix naeuz: “Cangqdiq gaenq hawj gou dang baenx cenz guek Ngaihgiz dih bouxcawj lo. Vaiqdi daeuj laeng gou dineix; gaej ngaiz cizgyenh lo!
Mwngz ndaej daiq gij lwglwg lanlan mwngz, daiq cwzcwz yiengzyiengz caeuq mwngz sojmiz dih gyadangq, daeuj dieg Gohsanh youq, youq mwnq gaenh gou.

Yienghneix gou couh ndaej ciengx mwngz, swqhaeuh mwngz haemq fungbienh, mienxndaej mwngz caeuq aen gyahcuz mwngz ngaiz miz nanh caeuq ngaiz baih, aenvih cungj lij miz haj bi iekvangh baenxlai caez laem.”’”
Yozswz caemhcaiq naeuz: “Hawjm'z yawj lux, seizneix faenhsou caeuq daegnuengx gou Benqyajminj cungj caenra raen, gij neix cungj dwg gou Yozswz caenbak doiq faenhsou gangj hih.
Naeuz daxboh ni, gou youq Ngaihgiz cix miz fuk cix yungzdaeuz. Caemh naeuz de ni, faenhsou youq dineix soj caenra raen hih cungj naeuz de ni. Faenhsou vaiqdi maj ciep de daeuj dineix.”
Gangj sat, Yozswz couh caeuq daegnuengx de Benqyajminj doxgot hwj daej ngwdngwd.
De vanzlij doq daej doq got doengh daeggo de, cup gyoengqde. Gajlaeng geij beixnuengx de couh doxcomz hwj gangj vah.
Gyoengq beixnuengx Yozswz daeuj, caemh cenz bae daengz ndaw vangzgungh, yiengq goengjvuengz caeuq gij vunz youq ndaw vangzgungh de rox naeuz gyoengq beixnuengx Yozswz daeuj lo, cungj angq hwj ij rai.
Gajlaeng, goengjvuengz doiq Yozswz naeuz: “Naeuz gyoengq beixnuengx mwngz ni, hawj gyoengqde coux haeux ndei le, couh doz hwnj gwnz gumq duz lawz bae, couh majcangq maj Gyahnamz.
Hawj ndaw ranz daxboh mwngz cenz ranz cungj daeuj dineix daeuj. Gou ij soengq hawj de cenz Ngaihgiz ceiq ndei dih dieg, hawj gyoengqde youq dineix miz gw miz daenj, hab'eiq habhoz, fungcuk saenghhoz.
Mwngz caemh ij raengq gyoengqde, hawj gyoengqde dajlwh Ngaihgiz dineix daiq ci maj ciep gij lwg gij yah gyoengqde caeuq daxboh gyoengqde cungj itheij buen daeuj dineix.
Gaejyungh insik gij gyadangq mwnq de, aenvih cenz Ngaihgiz ceiq ndei dih dieg cungj dwg gij gyoengqde.”
Gajlaeng, gyoengq lwg Yajgoz cungj yienghyiengh ciuq guh lo. Yozswz caemh ciuq goengjvuengz raengq hih yienghmwnq bae cwnjbiq ci. De caemh cwnjbiq gij youq dangjroen ij gw he hawj gyoengqde,
caiq soengq hawj gyoengqde boux vunz boux dauq buh, hoeng, soengq hawj Benqyajminj haj dauq buh caeuq caet gaen

De caemhcaiq soengq hawj daxboh de cib duz lawzgoeng, gwnz gumq doz miz cenz Ngaihgiz ceiq ndei dih doxgaiq, vanzlij miz cib duz lawzmeh, gwnz gumq doz miz daxboh de youq dangjroen soj ij yungh hih haeux hah, bingj hah, caeuq sojmiz hih gij gw hah.
Yozswz yienghneix cwnjbiq ndei le, couh hawj gyoengq beixnuengx de maj lo, caemh raengq gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou youq dangjroen gaejyungh doxceng.”
Couh yienghneix, gyoengqde dajlwh Ngaihgiz maj daengz dieg Gyahnamz laeng daxboh gyoengqde.
Gyoengqde couh naeuz daxboh ni naeuz: “Yozswz vanzlij lix! Seizneix youq Ngaihgiz de ndaej guenj baenx cenz guek hwj.”
Daxboh de dingq le, cungj doeksaet hwj guh hwj ngoemxngwd bae. De mbouj sinq naeuz Yozswz vanzlij lix.
Hoeng, gajlaeng de dingqri naeuz Yozswz raengq de dih vah, caemhcaiq raen Yozswz baij gij ci Ngaihgiz daeuj ciep de bae Ngaihgiz le, de cij sinq, cij angq hwj ij rai.
Gajlaeng, de naeuz: “Ox! Baenz lo, baenz lo, lwg gou Yozswz vanzlij lix! Domh gou mijyaengz rai, ij bae yawjyawj de cij ndaej.”
Gajlaeng Yajgoz
Haemh mwnq, Cangqdiq couh hawj de fangxngwnzloq, loqraen Cangqdiq caeuq de gangj vah. Cangqdiq heuh de naeuz: “Yajgoz, Yajgoz!”
Yajgoz han naeuz: “Aex, gou youq dineix!”

Cangqdiq naeuz: “Gou dwg baujcuk baujyouh daxboh mwngz dih Cangqdiq. Mwngz gaejyungh lau bae Ngaihgiz; gou gaengjdingq hawj doengh daih lwglwg lanlan laenjlaenj mwngz youq mwnq cungj ndaej bienqbaenz aen minzcuz hung he.
Gou ij cingqcaen caeuq mwngz itheij bae Ngaihgiz, caemh ij cingqcaen daiq doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz ma daengz dineix. Yozswz caemh ndaej dawzrai mwngz.”
Yajgoz dingq le, couh dajlwh Bezciqbah okdin bae Ngaihgiz. Doengh daeglwg de hawj de caeuq daxmeh gyoengqde caeuq doenghheij lwg heij yah gyoengqde naengh aen ci goengjvuengz baij daeuj he.
Yajgoz daiq gyoengq lwglwg lanlan laenjlaenj de,
Laj neix dwg ranz Yajgoz gaen de itheij bae Ngaihgiz hih coh:
Daeglwg daeuz Yajgoz, Lijbenq,
caeuq doengh daeglwg de Hahnoz, Fazluq, Hijswhlwnz caeuq Gyahmij.
Sihmenj caeuq doengh daeglwg de Yehmujliq, Yajminj, Ayaz, Yajginh, Sojyaz caeuq Saujloz. (Daxmeh Saujloz dwg lwgsau Gyahnamz.)
Liqveiq caeuq doengh daeglwg de Gwzswnq, Gohyaz caeuq Mijlahliq.

Youzdaq caeuq doengh daeglwg de Wj, Ngoznamz, Siqlah, Fazlwzswh caeuq Seqlah (hoeng Wj caeuq Ngoznamz gaenq rai youq dieg Gyahnamz lo). Fazlwzswh caemh miz lwg lo, couh dwg Hijswhlwnz caeuq Hahmujlwz.
Hijcazgyah caeuq doengh daeglwg de Dozlah, Bujvaj, Yozbwz caeuq Sinhlwnz.
Sihbuqlwnz caeuq doengh daeglwg de Sihlez, Hijlwnz caeuq Yajliq.
Gij vunz gwnz neix dwg Liqyaq youq laeng boxda de dieg Bahdanj-Yaqlanz seng hih lwglwg lanlan, caemh miz lwgsau Dijnaz. Gyoengq lwglan neix itgungh miz samcib sam vunz.
Gyahdwz caeuq doengh daeglwg de Sijfaehywnz, Hahgih, Cuhniz, Hijswhbaenj, Hijliq, Yaqlozdij caeuq Yaqlezliq.
Yaqsez caeuq gij lwg de Yimhnaz, Hiqswhvaj, Hiqswhveiz, Bijliqyaq, caeuq dahlwg de Sihlah. Bijliqyaq caemh miz lwg lo, couh dwg Hihbez caeuq Majgyez.
Gwnz neix dwg Sizbwz dih doengh daih gajlaeng. Sizbwz dwg Lahbanh soengq hawj dah lwgsau de Liqyaq guh swqhaeuh de. De vih Yajgoz seng hih lwglan, itgungh miz cibroek vunz.
Mehyah Yajgoz Lahgyez seng miz song daeglwg: Yozswz caeuq Benqyajminj.
Mehyah Yozswz Yaqsihnaz youq Ngaihgiz seng miz song daeglwg: Majnazsih caeuq Hijfazlenz. Yaqsihnaz dwg dah lwgsau Bohdizfeihlah goengjsae dajbwiz neix he, dwg youq An Singz he.
Benqyajminj caeuq doengh daeglwg de Bijlah, Bijgyez, Yaqsizbez, Gihlah, Naijmanq, Hijhih, Lozsiz, Mujbingz, Huqbingz caeuq Yaqlwz.
Gwnz neix dwg Lahgyez seng hawj Yajgoz dih lwglan, itgungh miz cibseiq vunz.
Danq caeuq daeglwg de Huqsinh.
Nazfuzdahliq caeuq doengh daeglwg de Yajceh, Gyezniz, Yehswz caeuq Siqlaengj.
Gwnz neix dwg Bizlah dih doengh daih gajlaeng. Bizlah dwg Lahbanh soengq hawj dah lwgsau de Lahgyez guh swqhaeuh de he. De seng hawj Yajgoz dih lwglan, itgungh miz caet boux.
Gaen Yajgoz bae Ngaihgiz dih gij lwg gij lan gij laenj de, bawx mbouj suenq, itgungh miz roekcib roek vunz.
Gyacangq Yajgoz caeuq Yozswz caeuq song daeglwg Yozswz youq Ngaihgiz seng he, ranz Yajgoz bae daengz Ngaihgiz mwhde itgungh miz caetcib vunz.
Couh yienghneix, Yajgoz bae daengz Ngaihgiz le, couh sien baij Youzdaq bae cimh Yozswz, bae cam de ij bae dieg Gohsanh baenzlawz bae. Yiengq mwh Yajgoz daengz Gohsanh hih mwhde,
Yozswz dawz ci hoenxciengq bae yawj daxboh de. Gyoengqde raennaj le, Yozswz couh got dawz daxboh de daej haujlai caez.
Gajlaeng Yajgoz doiq Yozswz naeuz: “Gou ndaej caenra raen mwngz vanzlij lix, gou rai ra caemh laep lo!”

Yozswz doiq doengh gyoengq goengjlungz nuengxau de caeuq gij vunz ndaw ranz daxboh de naeuz: “Gou ij bae naeuz goengjvuengz ni, naeuz: ‘Gyoengq beixnuengx gou caeuq gij vunz ndaw ranz daxboh gou gaenq dajlwh Gyahnamz buen daeuj daengz dineix lo.
Gyoengqde cungj dwg dajciengx he, cenmonz dajciengx goq saedceij; gyoengqde dawz sojmiz dih yiengz hah, cwz hah, caeuq sojmiz dih gyadangq hah cungj buen daeuj daengz dineix lo.’”
De caiq naeuz: “Goengjvuengz heuh faenhsou bae caeuq de raennaj, cam faenhsou guh gijmaz hong nex,

faenhsou ij yienghneix han: ‘Bouxhoiq mwngz dajlwh cojgoeng raeuz cungj dwg dajciengx goq saedceij he.’ Yiengq, goengjvuengz couh hawj faenhsou youq dieg Gohsanh youq lo, aenvih gij vunz Ngaihgiz dwgcaengz gij vunz ciengx yiengz he.”
Yozswz daj gyoengq beixnuengx de genj aeu haj boux beixnuengx okdaeuj daiq gyoengqde caeuq daxboh de bae laeng goengjvuengz.
Yozswz bauq le, goengjvuengz caemh raen gyoengq beixnuengx de lo, couh cam gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou dwg guh gijmaz hong lah?”
Gyoengqde han naeuz: “Goengjvuengz, gyoengqraeuz dajlwh coj goenggoeng geqgeq raeuz daengz seizneix, gyoengqraeuz cungj dwg ciengx yiengz goq saedceij he.

Aenvih dieg Gyahnamz iekvangh daiq youqgaenj lai, mij dieg nywj ndaej ciengx yiengz, raeuz cij daeuj daengz dineix camqciz youq lah. Seizneix raeuz gouz mwngz hawj gyoengqraeuz youq dieg Gohsanh youq, ndaej lwi?”
Goengjvuengz dingq gyoengqde yienghneix naeuz le, couh doiq Yozswz naeuz: “Daxboh mwngz caeuq gyoengq beixnuengx mwngz gaenq daeuj daengz mwngz dineix lo.

Gij dieg Ngaihgiz couh youq dangqnaj mwngz. Youzcaih mwngz genj, genj mwnq dieg ceiq ndei hih hawj gyoengqde cungj ndaej; gyoengqde ij youq dieg Gohsanh youq caemh ndaej. Hauhnaeuz mwngz rox naeuz gyoengqde miz byawz caixhangz hih, couh baij byawz daeuj guenj gij doenghduz cukseng gou.”
Gajlaeng Yozswz daiq daxboh de haeuj bae laeng goengjvuengz; daxboh de caemh gangj gij hoh fuk hih vah ma dongx goengjvuengz.
Yiengq goengjvuengz cam de naeuz: “Vunzlaux, mwngz ndaej geijlwh bi lah?”
Yajgoz han naeuz: “Seiqvunz gou seizneix gaenq ndaej baksam bi lo. Seiqvunz gou youh dinj youh dwgrengz, mbouj ndaej beij cojgoeng gou miz hih vunz lix ndaej caez.”
Yajgoz caiq hoh fuk hawj goengjvuengz, couh ok ma lo.

Yozswz ciuq goengjvuengz raengq hih yienghmwnq bae nganhbaiz daxboh de caeuq gyoengq beixnuengx de, dawz ndaw guek Ngaihgiz ceiq ndei hih dieg, couh dwg Gohsanh, hawj gyoengqde. (Gohsanh couh dwg Lanzswz.)
De caiq hawj haeux hawj ndaw ranz daxboh de caeuq ndaw ranz gyoengq beixnuengx de, mboujguenj miz geijlai vunz cungj hawj geijlai vunz.
Iekvangh yied ngoenz yied yiemzcungq, dauqcawq cungj mij saek ceh haeux. Ngaihgiz vunz caeuq Gyahnamz vunz cungj iek hwj ndangdaej nyieg liux, guh hwj ngunh bae,
hoeng gyoengq vunz caemh mij ngaenz cawx haeux lo. Yozswz caemh sou ndaej baenx cenz Ngaihgiz caeuq baenx cenz Gyahnamz sojmiz hih ngaenz, dawz gij ngaenz neix gyau hawj vangzgungh.

Gij vunz Ngaihgiz caeuq gij vunz Gyahnamz cungj yungh ngaenz liux le, gij vunz Ngaihgiz couh bae cimh Yozswz, gouz de naeuz: “Gij ngaenz raeuz liux lo; cingj mwngz caiq hawj raeuz di haeux he bax! Nanzdauh mwngz yawj raeuz rai iek youq dangqnaj mwngz hoh lajx?”
Yozswz han naeuz: “Gij ngaenz faenhsou yungh liux lo, yiengq couh aeu doengh duz cukseng daeuj vuenh haeux sat leqx!”
Gajlaeng, gyoengqde couh daiq cwz hah, yiengz hah, max hah, lawz hah, daeuj caeuq Yozswz vuenh haeux. Bi mwnq, Yozswz aeu haeux vuenh ndaej gij vunz sojmiz dih doengh duz cukseng liux.

Daengz bi daixngeih, gij vunz caiq daeuj gouz Yozswz naeuz: “Goeng'ak hax, raeuz mbouj muenz mwngz, saedsaeh naeuz mwngz ni, gij ngaenz raeuz cungj yungh caenhbouh liux lo, daiqlienz doengh duz cukseng cungj hawj mwngz lo. Seizneix cawzok aen ndang bonjfaenh caeuq reihnaz, gyoengqraeuz cingqcaen mbouj miz saek yiengh lo, gungzgungz ndangjndangj liux lo.

Nanzdauh mwngz yawj gyoengqraeuz vwt dieg vangh, vunz cixcaemh ngaiz rai iek hoh lajx? Gouz mwngz aeu haeux ma vuenh gyoengqraeuz caeuq gij reihnaz raeuz bax! Gij reihnaz gvi hawj goengjvuengz, gyoengqraeuz caemh nyienh'eiq guh hoiq de. Cingj mwngz hawj haeuxceh hawj gyoengqraeuz, yiengq gyoengqraeuz caemh mbouj ngaiz rai iek, reihnaz caemh mbouj ngaiz vwt vangh lo.”
Gyoengq vunz iek hwj ij rai, gak vunz cungj gag hai reihnaz hwj hemq bae. Yozswz bang goengjvuengz soucawx cenz Ngaihgiz dih dieg. Yiengq, cenz Ngaihgiz hih dieg cungj gvi hawj goengjvuengz liux,
cenz Ngaihgiz hih vunz cungj caemh bienqbaenz goengjvuengz hih hoiq.

Caenhgag gij dieg gyoengq goengjsae dajbwiz he mij ngaiz soucawx ma lo, aenvih gyoengqde cungj dwg guqdingq dajlwh laeng goengjvuengz lingx saenghhozfeiq he, sojhij gyoengqde mbouj ngaiz hai gij dieg bonjfaenh.
Yozswz doiq gij beksingq Ngaihgiz naeuz: “Gou gaenq bang goengjvuengz cawx faenhsou caeuq gij dieg faenhsou lo. Seizneix, gou hawj haeuxceh hawj faenhsou, hawj faenhsou dajgeng dajndaem.
Daengz ndaej daeng sou le, faenhsou ij dawz faenhsou sou ndaej hih haj faenh cih it
Gij vunz han naeuz: “Ox, goeng'ak hax, mwngz gouq gyoengqraeuz dih mingh! Cijaeu mwngz haenj, gyoengqraeuz cingxnyienh hawj goengjvuengz guh hoiq.”

Gajlaeng Yozswz dingh diuz he gvanhhih gij dieg Ngaihgiz dih fazliz, couh dwg sou ndaej dih haj faenh cih it gyau hawj goengjvuengz. Diuz fazliz neix itcig daengz seizneix cungj lij miz yungh. Caenhgag gij dieg doengh goengjsae dajbwiz mbouj ngaiz gvi hawj goengjvuengz hoh luh.
Ranz Yajgoz
Yajgoz youq mwnq youq baenx cibcaet bi; de souh ndaej itbak seiqcib caet bi.
De ijvanh rai mwhde, de baij vunz bae heuh Yozswz, heuh de daeuj daengz bakcongz de, doiq de naeuz: “Hauhnaeuz mwngz ndiep gou nex, couh dawz gij fawz mwngz coengq haeuj luengqha gou daeuj baujcingq,
Daengz gou rai nex, cingj mwngz daiq gou dajlwh Ngaihgiz maj daengz ranz cojgoeng gou, dawz gou moek youq gij diegmoh cojgoeng mwnq, caeuq cojgoeng doxcaeuq youq.”
Yajgoz yienghneix naeuz le, Yozswz couh han naeuz: “Gou gaengjdingq ciuq gij vah mwngz bae guh.”
Yajgoz caiq naeuz: “Yiengq mwngz ij yiengq gou baujcingq cij ndaej.” Yozswz couh yiengq de baujcingq; Yajgoz caemh youq gwnz congz baex sax he.
Goq duenh he le, miz vunz naeuz Yozswz ni naeuz daxboh de bingh lo, yiengq de couh daiq song daeglwg de Majnazsih caeuq Hijfazlenz bae yawj daxboh de.
Yiengq, Yajgoz rox naeuz Yozswz daeuj yawj de lo le, couh cengqgengz hwnq hwnjdaeuj,
doiq Yozswz naeuz: “Mwh gou youq dieg Gyahnamz dep aen haw Luqswh mwnq, akak rengzrengz gaiqgaiq cungj ndaej guh daengz dih Cangqdiq yienh hawj gou raen goq, vanzlij hoh fuk hawj gou.

De doiq gou naeuz: ‘Gou ij soengq hawj mwngz haujlai haujlai lwglwg lanlan, hawj aen cuz mwngz hwngqhwngq seiqseiq, doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz bienqbaenz aen minzcuz hunghung he. Gou caemh dawz mwnq dieg neix soengq hawj doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz; mwnq dieg neix couh yungjyenj dwg gyoengqde dih gyadangq.’”

Yajgoz caiq naeuz: “Gou mijyaengz daeuj Ngaihgiz mwhde, mwngz youq dineix seng song daeglwg; gyoengqde ij gvi hawj gou, caemh luj Lijbenq caeuq Sihmenj ityiengh dwg lwg gou, faen ndaej faenh gyahcanj he.
Hauhnaeuz baezneix mwngz lij miz hih lwg, vanzlij dwg gvi hawj mwngz, hoeng, gyoengqde ndaej laeng Hijfazlenz caeuq Majnazsih hih gyadangq aeu ndaej faenh dieg he.

Mwh gou dajlwh Bahdanj-Yaqlanz maj ranz hih mwhmwnq, de youq buenqroen gaenq rai lo, couh dwg youq mwnq Gyahnamz, liz Hijfazdah mbouj geij gyae hih mwnq. Gou cungj siengsim ij rai, caemh dawz de moek youq henz roen bae Hijfazdah hih diuz roen mwnq lo.” (Hijfazdah couh dwg Bwzliqhaengz.)
Gajlaeng, Yajgoz raen song daeglwg Yozswz, couh cam de naeuz: “Gyoengqde dwg byawz lah?”
Yozswz han naeuz: “Dwg song daeglwg gou he, dwg gou daeuj daengz Ngaihgiz le, Cangqdiq soengq hawj gou he.”
Yajgoz caiq naeuz: “Mwngz daiq gyoengqde daeuj gaenh dangqnaj gou hwj, daengj gou hoh fuk hawj gyoengqde.”
Mwhde, aenvih Yajgoz daiq laux lai lo, ra cixcaemh va foenjfoenj lo, Yozswz dingq le, couh daiq song daeglwg de bae daengz dangqnaj Yajgoz. Yiengq, Yajgoz youh got youh cup song daeg de.

Gajlaeng Yajgoz doiq Yozswz naeuz: “Siengj mbouj daengz gou seiqvunz neix vanzlij ndaej raen daengz mwngz! Cangqdiq mbouj caenhgag hawj raeuz bohlwg ndaej doxraennaj, doxcomz, vanzlij ndaej hawj gou raen gij lan gou.”
Gajlaeng Yozswz daj song henz raeujhoq

Baiq le, Yozswz youhcaiq daiq song daeglwg de goqdaeuj daengz dangqnaj Yajgoz, fawz gvaz ying Hijfazlenz daeglwg ngeih hawj de ndwn youq baihswix Yajgoz, fawz swix ying Majnazsih daeglwg daeuz hawj de ndwn youq baixgvaz Yajgoz,
Hoeng, Yajgoz engq coengq fawz gvaz youq gwnz raeuj daegngeih, fawz swix coengq youq gwnz raeuj daegdaeuz, song fawz engq camjca hwj.
De yienghneix coengq le, couh doiq Yozswz naeuz:

hawj gou mij'z maz sienghaih.” De yienghneix naeuz sat le, couh hoh fuk hawj song daeglwg Yozswz naeuz: “Muengh Cangqdiq soengq fuk hawj doenghheij lwg neix! Muengh gij fuk yienzlaiz Cangqdiq soengq hawj gou caeuq cojgoeng gou Yaqbwzlahhanj caeuq Hijsaj hih fuk cenz hawj song daeglwg neix, hawj gyoengqde lwglwg lanlan laenjlaenj hwngqhwngq seiqseiq, seiq lengq seiq miz.”
Yozswz raen daxboh de aeu fawz gvaz ma coengq haeuj gwnz dingjraeuj Hijfazlenz bae le, ndaw sim de mbouj angq, couh dawz gij fawz gvaz daxboh de siengj coengq haeuj gwnz raeuj Majnazsih bae.
De doiq daxboh de naeuz: “Boh, mbouj deng nej! Boh hax, loek lo! Boux neix cij dwg daeglwg daeuz lax; mwngz wnggai coengq fawz gvaz hwnj gwnz raeuj de bae cij deng.”

Hoeng, Yajgoz gaenhbaenj mbouj dingq de, couh naeuz: “Lwg hax lwg, gou rox, gou rox leuz. Majnazsih dih doengh daih gajlaeng caemh ndaej fat baenz aen cuz hung he, gyoengqde caemh ak hah, hoeng, daegnuengx de beij de engqgya ak. Daegnuengx de hih doengh daih gajlaeng engqgya fatdad cauh ndaej haujlai haujlai aen cuz hung.”

Ngoenz mwnq, Yajgoz hoh fuk hawj gyoengqde naeuz: “Gij vunz Hijswzlez ij yungh gij coh faenhsou ma hoh fuk hawj vunz. Gyoengqde ij naeuz: ‘Muengh Cangqdiq sawjhawj mwngz ndaej luj Hijfazlenz caeuq Majnazsih ityiengh.’” Couh yienghneix, Yajgoz hawj Hijfazlenz baiz youq gaxgonq Majnazsih.
Yajgoz caiq doiq Yozswz naeuz: “Mwngz rox lwi, gou mbouj geij caez couh ij rai gvaqseiq lo, hoeng Cangqdiq siengzseiz caeuq faenhsou youq; de ij daiq faenhsou maj daengz mwnq dieg cojgoeng mwnq bae.
Gou hawj dieg hawj mwngz beij gij goengjlungz nuengxau mwngz lai faenh he. Gij dieg mwnq dwg gou aeu giemq caeuq naqgung dajlwh laeng gyoengq Yaqmohliq vunz dued ma he.”
Yajgoz hawj gyoengq lwg de daeuj doxcomz. De doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou veiz goqdaeuj dep gou, daengj gou naeuz faenhsou ni faenhsou baezneix ij roeb daengz gijmaz saeh.
Daeuj bax, gyoengq lwg gou! Faenhsou ij yaek rwz hwj dingq daxboh faenhsou Hijswzlez gangj dih vah.
Lijbenq hax, mwngz dwg lwgdaeuz gou,
Dwg gou ndang ceiq cangq mwhde seng he.
Baenjlaiz ing'yungz raixcaix, goengrengz ak goq vunz.
Hoeng, mwngz luj raemxrongz yienghmwnq fan loedloed,
Mbouj ndaej gungjciq bonjfaenh, couh mbouj ndaej baiz daixdaeuz lo,
Aenvih mwngz caeuq yahnoix boh mwngz ninz, loengh uq aen congz boh mwngz.
Sihmenj caeuq Liqveiq luj doxcaemh con doengzvaq he;
Gyoengqde gaj vunz haih mingh dangq guxcaemz.
Gou mbouj caeuq gyoengqde miz yimhmaeuz,
Mbouj gaep gyoengqde guh doih,
Aenvih gyoengqde aeuqheiq couh gaj vunz,
Caemh seizbienh raemj gat nginz ha cwz.
Gyoengqde yakyak rwixrwix, wnggai mang;
Gyoengqde doegdoeg siebsieb, wnggai fad.
Hawj gyoengqde ngaiz sanqsa cab youq dieg Hijswzlez,
Sanqsa youq ndaw Hijswzlez vunz.
Youzdaq hax, gyoengq goengjlungz nuengxau mwngz ij haenh mwngz.
Gij fawz mwngz ij nap dawz gij hoz dizyinz;
Gyoengq goengjlungz nuengxau mwngz ij sax mwngz.
Lwg gou Youzdaq hax, mwngz luj duz caiceij rangz,
Gaemh ndaej doenghduz, gw sat caiq ndwn bakcongh;
Luj duz caiceijdaeg ninz hwj soh rangxrangh,
Luj duz caiceijmeh, mij vunz gamj doengh de.
Youzdaq gaem gienz mbouj rox duet,
Vuengzdwngx mbouj liz song fawz de.
Fanh guek cungj ij lau de,
Couh ij nab doxgaiq hawj de;
Fanh guek cungj ij sax de.
De baenxlai fouq, miz baenxbienh go buzdauz,
Seizbienh lamh duz lawz haeuj go buzdauz bae,
Dawz duz lawzlwg lamh youq go buzdauz ceiq ndei he.
De youq ndaw laeuj buzdauz saeg buh,
Youq ndaw raemx buzdauz saeg buhbauz.
Song cehra de hoengz, dwg vih gw laeuj,
Diuz faenz de bieg, dwg vih gw nauq yiengz.
Sihbuqlwnz ij youq henz haij;
Baezneix henz haij, de ij guhbaenz sokruz.
Dieg de ij iet daengz Sihdoenq.
Hijcazgyah luj duz lawz hoenz hwdhwd
Bomz youq cungqgyan de doz hih doxgaiq.
De raen mwnq dieg ndaej yietbaeg neix dwg dieg ndei, dieg biz;
De couh gijmaz naek cungj nyienh dang,
Baenz boux guh hong naek dih hoiq.
Caemh ndaej gag saemjbuenq gij vunz bonjfaenh.
De luj duz ngwz henz roen,
Caemh luj duz ngwzdoeg ndaw nyaengq;
De haeb din max,
Hawj boux gwih max fan roengzma.”
Yajgoz gangj daengz dineix le, sawqmwh hemq hwnjdaeuj naeuz: “Yehhozvaz hax! Gou muengh mwngz hawj di rengz hawj gou,
Yajgoz caiq laemxdaemh naeuz:
Gyahdwz ij ngaiz gyoengq caeggeq boenq.
De ij fanj fawz hoenx gyoengqde.
Yaqsez dih dieg ndaej ok miz fungcuk dih doxgaiq;
De miz gij ndei gw ndaej hab soengq hawj goengjvuengz hwj.
Nazfuzdahliq luj duz loegmeh mbwj cug mbwj lamh.
De seng duz loeglwg youh gyaeu youh ndei.
Yozswz luj go mak henz mboq,
Dawz mak bek roemxroemx.
Gij nge de iet ok rog ciengz.
Naqgung ceq de,
Siengj haih de,
Hoeng de dawz naqgung mbouj saenz;
Gij fawz de seuq setset,
Couh dwg aenvih Cangqdiq,
Cangqdiq dwg Hijswzlez dih boux dajciengx,
Hijswzlez dih rin,
Dwg gou, Yajgoz, gingqbaiq dih akak rengzrengz dih Cangqdiq
Soengq gij rengz hawj de.
Baujcuk baujyouh daxboh mwngz dih Cangqdiq bang mwngz;
Akak rengzrengz gaiqgaiq cungj ndaej guh daengz dih Cangqdiq soengq fuk hawj mwngz.
De ij dawz sojmiz dih gwnzmbwn lajdeih dih fuk soengq hawj mwngz,
Hawj gij vunz mwngz hwngqhwngq seiqseiq,
Cwzcwz yiengzyiengz baenx gyoengq baenx gyoengq.
Doenghgij daj cojgoeng mwngz louz roengzma hih hoh fuk,
Beij bya vanzlij gaenj;
Doenghgij hoh fuk neix couh cenz daengz Yozswz.
Yozswz youq gij goengjlungz nuengxau ndaw de, de luj lwg goengjvuengz.
Benqyajminj yak luj duz langz.
Doengxhaet gyan gw de dwk ndaej dih doenghduz;
Doengxhaemh dawz de dued ndaej dih doenghduz faen hawj gij doih de.
Gij neix couh dwg Yajgoz doiq cibngeih daeglwg de gangj hih vah. De doiq moix it boux gangj hih vah cungj dwg hab gyoengqde. Cibngeih daeglwg neix caemh bienqbaenz Hijswzlez dih cibngeih aen cuz.
Yajgoz vanzlij raengq gyoengq lwg de, naeuz: “Gou ijvanh rai gvaqseiq lo; faenhsou ij dawz gou moek youq mwnq cojgoeng gou mwnq, couh dwg ndaek conghgamj manx reih Hijfuzlwnz mwnq.
Manx reih caeuq conghgamj mwnq couh dwg youq dieg Gyahnamz dih Mwzbijlah gaenh Manqliq he, dwg daxgoeng gou laeng Hwz cuz vunz hih Hijfuzlwnz cawx ma guh diegmoh he.
Daxgoeng gou, Yaqbwzlahhanj caeuq daxbuz gou Sajlah moek youq mwnq, bohmeh gou Hijsaj caeuq Liqbwzgyah caemh moek youq mwnq; gou caemh dawz Liqyaq,
Gij dieg mwnq caeuq conghgamj mwnq cungj dwg dajlaeng Hwz cuz vunz cawx ma he.”
Yajgoz raengq gyoengq lwg de doenghgij vah neix le, couh doiqyungz dawz gij ha de coengq hwnj gwnz congz bae, couh rai gvaqseiq lo.
Yajgoz rai gvaqseiq le, Yozswz got dawz daxboh de bamq roengz baj naj de bae daej haemz wekwek, caemh cup baj naj de.
Gajlaeng, Yozswz couh raengq doengh boux canghyw gaen henz ndang de, hawj gyoengqde aeu yanghliuq ma loengh hawj gij seihaiz daxboh de mbouj hawj de naeuh; doengh boux canghyw de caemh ciuq guh lo.
Gyoengqde caemh luj bienqnaengz ityiengh, yungh seiqcib ngoenz cij guh liux mbouj hawj gij seihaiz naeuh he.
Gij vunz Ngaihgiz souj Yajgoz daej baenx caetcib ngoenz.
Goq soujsangq le, Yozswz doiq gyoengq daqcwnz goengjvuengz naeuz: “Cingj faenhsou bang gou naeuz goengjvuengz ni, naeuz

daxboh gou hawj gou baujcingq hawj gou dawz de moek youq bonjfaenh de youq Gyahnamz gag cwnjbiq dih mwnq diegmoh mwnq; sojhij cingj mwngz bihcwnj hawj gou bae cangq daxboh gou. Cangq ndaej le, gou couh majcangq ma lo.”
Yiengq goengjvuengz couh bihcwnj hawj de bae, naeuz: “Mwngz couh ciuq gaxgonq mwngz baenzlawz dapwngq daxboh mwngz bae guh bax!”

Couh yienghneix, Yozswz couh bae cangq daxboh de, caemh miz gyoengq vunz youq Ngaihgiz dang haemq ak he hah, doenghheij gyoengq daqcwnz caeuq gyoengq hoiq goengjvuengz hah, caeuq ndaw gyahcuz goengjvuengz gij vunz haemq cungqyauq he hah cungj gaen de bae.
Yozswz cenz ranz caeuq gyoengq goengjlungz nuengxau de caeuq Yajgoz cenz ranz cungj caemh itheij bae, caenhgag lij lw gij lwgngez caeuq yiengz hah, cwz hah, youq dieg Gohsanh lo.
Caemh miz gyoengq bing dawz doenghheij ci hoenxciengq he hah, gyoengq bingmax hah, baenx buek baenx buek doxcaeuq bae.

Gyoengqde bae daengz mwnq caiqcangz he heuh Yaqdaz (Yaqdaz couh dwg youq diuz dah Yozdanq hih daixlingh mbiengj he), gyoengqde youq mwnq coengq sing daej engxengx. Youq mwnq Yozswz soujsangq baenx caet ngoenz.
Gij vunz Gyahnamz mwnq raen miz vunz youq Yaqdaz daej baenx geij ngoenz, couh naeuz: “Gij vunz Ngaihgiz daej vunzrai, daej hwj baenxlai siengsim!” Sojhij mwnq dieg mwnq couh heuh Yaqbwz-Mwzsih.
Gyoengq lwg Yajgoz caemh ciuq daxboh gaxgonq baenzlawz raengq yienghmwnq bae guh lo;

gyoengqde dawz gij seihaiz daxboh buen maj daengz dieg Gyahnamz, cangq youq manx reih Mwzbijlah dih conghgamj mwnq. (Mwzbijlah caemh gaenh Manqliq.) Manx reih neix caeuq conghgamj mwnq dwg Yaqbwzlahhanj laeng Hijfuzlwnz, Hwz cuz vunz, cawx ma guh diegmoh he.
Yozswz cangq daxboh de ndei le, couh caeuq gyoengq beixnuengx de caeuq gij vunz daeuj camhgyah oksang he cungj itheij maj Ngaihgiz lo.
Daxboh Yozswz rai le, doengh gyoengq daeggo de
Gyoengqde yienghneix naeuz le, couh cingj vunz bae bang naeuz Yozswz ni, naeuz: “Daxboh ijvanh rai mwhde, raengq naeuz:

‘Naeuz Yozswz ni: “Gaxgonq doengh daeggo mwngz haih mwngz goq; hawj mwngz nyiuz gyoengqde bax!”’ Raeuz caemh gouz mwngz mienx gij coih gyoengqraeuz! Gyoengqraeuz cungj dwg bouxhoiq Cangqdiq, couh dwg cauqguq daxboh raeuz dih Cangqdiq!” Yozswz dingqri doenghgij vah neix le, couh daej lo.
Gajlaeng doengh daeggo Yozswz caemh bae yawj de, caemh youq dangqnaj de gvih roengz doem bae baiq de sax de, naeuz: “Gyoengqraeuz cungj dwg bouxhoiq mwngz lah.”
Hoeng Yozswz dauq doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou gaejyungh lau; gou mbouj ndaej dingj Cangqdiq law.
Baenjlaiz faenhsou ij haih gou, hoeng Cangqdiq doiq raeuz ndei; de dauqfanj daj gienh saeh neix bienqbaenz seizneix dih yienghneix, vihliux ndaej baux ndaej haujlai vunz dih mingh.
Sojhij faenhsou gaejyungh lau.” De caiq sim'unq hwj vued gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou coengqsim bax; gou baenzbaenz cungj ij goqhoh ndei faenhsou caeuq gij lwg faenhsou.”
Yozswz caeuq aen gyahcuz daxboh de laemxdaemh youq Ngaihgiz youq. Yozswz souh ndaej daengz bakit bi.
De lij lix mwhde, ndaej raen Hijfazlenz dih lwg caeuq lan, caemh dawz daeglan Majnazsih, couh dwg Majgiz

Yozswz doiq gyoengq vunz ndaw gyahcuz de naeuz: “Gou ijvanh rai lo, hoeng Cangqdiq itdingh daeuj bang faenhsou, daiq faenhsou bae daengz de gaxgonq dapwngq hawj goenggeq hah, daxgoeng hah, caeuq daxboh hah, caeuq faenhsou hah dih gaiq dieg mwnq bae.”
Yozswz caiq raengq gij lwglan Hijswzlez,
Yozswz youq Ngaihgiz souh ndaej bakit bi le, couh rai gvaqseiq lo. Gyoengq vunz aeu yanghliuq ma dawz gij seihaiz de loengh hwj mbouj hawj de naeuh le, couh coengq haeuj gyaeuhfaex bae lo.
Gyoengq lwg Yajgoz
Lijbenq, Sihmenj, Liqveiq, Youzdaq,
Hijcazgyah, Sihbuqlwnz, Benqyajminj,
Danq, Nazfuzdahliq, Gyahdwz caeuq Yaqsez.
Gyoengq neix cenzbuq cungj dwg Yajgoz hih doengh daih gajlaeng de; itgungh miz caetcib vunz. (Mwhmwnq Yozswz gaenq youq Ngaihgiz lo.)
Gajlaeng, Yozswz caeuq doengh gyoengq goengjlungz nuengxau de, vanzlij miz caeuq gyoengqde doengzdangq hih cungj rai lo.
Hoeng, doengh daih gajlaeng gyoengqde, couh dwg Hijswzlez vunz, fatdad hwj lai hux lai, hwngqhwngq seiqseiq; vunz lai cix vaiq, cix lai cix ak, baenx cenz Ngaihgiz mwnqmwnq cungj miz vunz.
Mwhmwnq Ngaihgiz miz goengjvuengz moq he hwnj daeuj guenjleix Ngaihgiz. De doiq Yozswz dih saeh it di cungj mbouj rox.
Yiengq, de doiq gij vunz Ngaihgiz naeuz: “Yawj lux, gij vunz Hijswzlez youh lai youh ak, giengz goq gyoengqraeuz.

Gyoengqraeuz ij siengj banqfaz deiqfuq gyoengqde cij ndaej, mbouj caiq hawj gij vunz gyoengqde caiq fat hwnjdaeuj haem lo, mboujyienz, hauhnaeuz doxhoenx hwnjdaeuj nex, gyoengqde aiq caeuq gij vunz haenq gyoengqraeuz he doxgaep hwnjdaeuj hoenx gyoengqraeuz, gyoengqde couh ndaej deuz ok dieg neix bae lo.”

Gajlaeng gij vunz Ngaihgiz couh baij vunz bae cenmonz guenjyaz gyoengq vunz Hijswzlez, ep gyoengqde guh hong naek ma haih gyoengqde, hawj gyoengqde vih goengjvuengz Ngaihgiz hwnq song aen singz ma cwk haeux, couh dwg aen singz Bijdungh caeuq aen singz Lanzswz.

Hoeng, gyoengq vunz Ngaihgiz yied yawj gyoengq vunz Hijswzlez ngawz, gyoengq vunz Hijswzlez yied fat yied vaiq, yied fat yied lai, dauqcawq cungj miz, guh hawj gij vunz Ngaihgiz cungj roxnginh simnyap ij rai bae.
Yiengq gyoengqde engqgya yawj gij vunz Hijswzlez ngawz,
hawj gyoengqde guh hong dwgrengz, aeu hong naek ma yaz gyoengqde, ep hawj gyoengqde geng naez dajcien, ndaw reih sojmiz dih hong naek cungj hawj gyoengqde guh.
Goengjvuengz moq Ngaihgiz caiq heuh song meh Hihbwzlaiz
“Faenhsou bang gij vunzbaz Hihbwzlaiz ciepseng nex, hauhnaeuz gyoengqde seng miz lwg vunzsai, couh gajrai laeq de bae. Hauhnaeuz seng miz lwg vunzbaz, couh mbouj gajrai; hawj de lix.”
Hoeng, song meh ciepseng mwnq yawjnaek Cangqdiq, mbouj dingq goengjvuengz mingqlingq, caemh hawj lwg vunzsai lix.
Yiengq goengjvuengz couh heuh song meh ciepseng mwnq daeuj saemjcam naeuz: “Faenhsou vihmaz yienghneix guh? Vihmaz hawj gij lwg vunzsai lix nej?”
Gyoengqde han naeuz: “Aenvih gij vunzbaz Hihbwzlaiz caeuq gij vunzbaz Ngaihgiz mbouj doengz. Gyoengqde miz rengz; raeuz mijyaengz bae daengz haem, hoeng, gyoengqde gaenq gag seng huh.”
Aenvih song meh ciepseng mwnq yawjnaek Cangqdiq,

Gajlaeng, goengjvuengz Ngaihgiz doiq cenz guek fat ok gij mingqlingq he naeuz: “Gij vunz Hihbwzlaiz ngamq seng dih vunzsai lwgnding cungj ij ngaiz gveng roengz diuz dah Nizloz bae; caenhgag hawj gij vunzbaz lwgnding lix.”
Yiengq, cingq youq mwhneix, miz boux Hijswzlez vunz aen cuz Liqveiq he, de aeu dah caeuq de doxcaemh aen cuz he ma guh yah.
Gajlaeng dah de seng miz daeg lwgmbauq he. De raen laeq lwgnding neix baenxmbauq raixcaix, couh dawz de yo hwnjdaeuj, yo baenx sam ndwen.

Daengz de cingqcaen mij banqfaz yo laeq lwg neix lo, de couh aeu aen loengx gaeu he daeuj duz lizcingh caeuq duz bwzyouz hwj fuengz raemx iemq raemx roh haeujbae. Gajlaeng de couh dawz laeq lwgngez neix coengq haeuj ndaw loengx gaeu neix bae, couh dawz aen loengx gaeu neix bae daengz henz dah, yo haeuj ndaw caz em bae.
Daxce laeq lwgngez neix dajlwh lizgyae ndwn hwj yawj, yawjyawj daegnuengx de dauqdaej ij baenzlawz yiengh.

Yiengq ngamqngamq luj dah lwgsau goengjvuengz daeuj ndaw dah swiq ndang. Sawqmwh dah de yawjraen youq ndaw caz em miz aen loengx gaeu he. Dah de yawjraen le, couh hawj dahhoiq he bae dawz ma hawj de yawj. (Mwhde doengh dahhoiq de caemh gaen de daeuj daengz henz dah. Gyoengqde youq henz dah byaijbyaij byakbyak

Dahlwg goengjvuengz baex gwenj yawj he, couh raen ndaw de miz daeg lwgngez he. Yiengq laeq lwgngez neix couh daej hwnjdaeuj lo. De couh hojsik hwj naeuz: “Laeq lwgngez neix gaengjdingq dwg laeq lwg Hihbwzlaiz vunz.”

Cingq youq mwhneix, daxce laeq lwgngez neix byaij goqbae daengz gyoengqde mwnq, doiq dahlwg goengjvuengz naeuz: “Aex, hawj mbouj hawj gou bae cimh boux Hihbwzlaiz vunz vunzbaz he ma hawj de ciengx de, hawj de gw nauq hax?”
Dahlwg goengjvuengz han naeuz: “Ox, ndaej hah!” Yiengq dah de couh maj heuh daxmeh de daeuj.

Meh de daeuj le, dahlwg goengjvuengz couh doiq meh de naeuz: “Mwngz umj laeq lwg neix maj bax, bang gou ciengx de; gou menhcij hawj ngaenz hawj mwngz.” Yiengq meh de couh umj laeq lwg neix maj ciengx lo.

Gajlaeng laeq lwgngez neix haemq hung le, meh de couh daiq laeq de bae laeng dahlwg goengjvuengz. Dahlwg goengjvuengz couh nginh laeq de guh daeglwg bonjfaenh. De naeuz: “Gou dajlwh ndaw raemx rag laeq lwg neix hwnjma, couh an coh hawj de heuh Mohsih bax!”

Mohsih hung le, miz baez he, de ok bae laeng gij vunz Hihbwzlaiz caeuq de doxcaemh minzcuz he yawjyawj. Yiengq, de yawjraen gyoengqde guh hong dwgrengz ij rai bae. Youq mwnq, de caemh yawjraen miz boux vunz Ngaihgiz he doh boux caeuq de doxcaemh minzcuz he.
Yiengq Mohsih yawjyawj seiqhenz mij'z vunz, couh hoi fawz doh rai boux Ngaihgiz vunz mwnq, dawz gij seihaiz de moek youq ndaw sa hwj.

Daengz daixngeih ngoenz, Mohsih caiq ok bae. De raen miz song boux Hihbwzlaiz vunz doxceng doxdub. Yiengq, de couh doiq boux mij dauhleix mwnq naeuz: “Mwngz vihmaz ij hangz caeuq mwngz doxcaemh minzcuz he dih vunz nex?”
Boux mwnq han naeuz: “Hwx, mwngz dwg byawz nex? Byawz baij mwngz daeuj guh raeuz dih daeuzdaeuz caeuq raeuz dih fazguenh nex? Nanzdauh mwngz ij gaj gou, caemh luj gaj boux Ngaihgiz vunz mwnq?”
Mohsih baex dingqri gawq neix he le, cungj lau hwj ij rai, ndaw sim de gag naemj: “Ojx, gij saeh neix vunz aiq rox dinghluh!”
Gajlaeng goengjvuengz rox naeuz gienh saeh neix le, couh ij gaj Mohsih. Yiengq Mohsih couh deuz bae daengz Mijdenq, ndoj youq Mijdenq youq.

Gajlaeng, miz ngoenz he, Mohsih naengh youq henz cingjraemx, raen caet dah lwgsau daeuj daek raemx, coux raemx haeuj ruh bae rim hwj ij hawj gyoengq yiengz daxboh gyoengqde gw. (Daxboh gyoengqde couh dwg Mijdenq hih goengjsae dajbwiz he.)
Hoeng, miz gij vunz ciengx yiengz he goq daeuj ij boenq gyoengqde deuz. Mohsih raen le, couh goq bae haeuj gyoengqde, caemh bang gyoengqde aeu raemx hawj yiengz gw.
Gajlaeng, gyoengqde maj ranz. Daxboh gyoengqde Liuzwj

Yiengq gyoengqde han naeuz: “Ox, ngoenzneix miz boux Ngaihgiz vunz he bang gyoengqraeuz, bang raeuz boenq gij vunz ciengx yiengz daeuj hangz raeuz he deuz, caemhcaiq bang raeuz daek raemx hawj yiengz gw.”
Liuzwj dingq le, caiq cam doengh dahlwg de naeuz: “Yiengq de seizneix youq mwnqlaw? Faenhsou vihmaz mbouj leixlangh de? Bae hawj de daeuj laeng raeuz gw haeux bax!”
Gajlaeng,
Gajlaeng Liuzwj vanzlij hawj dahlwg de Sihbohlah haq hawj Mohsih guh yah.
Gajlaeng Sihbohlah seng miz daeglwg he. Mohsih naeuz: “Gou dwg boux vunzseng ro dieg vunz doz youq he,” yiengq de couh an coh hawj daeglwg de heuh Gwzcwnq.
Goq haujlai bi le, goengjvuengz Ngaihgiz rai lo. Hoeng gij vunz Hijswzlez vanzlij dwg guh hong dwgrengz,
Yiengq Cangqdiq dingqri le, couh ngeix daengz gaxgonq de caeuq
De yawjraen gij vunz Hijswzlez guh hwj ij rai ij lix bae le, couh dawz gij saeh neix coengq youq ndaw sim hwj.
Mwhde, Mohsih dwg bang goeng boxda de, couh dwg Mijdenq hih goengjsae dajbwiz he heuh Yezdwzloz, bang de ciengx yiengz.
Sawqmwh, bouxcai Yehhozvaz youq mwnq luj luzfeiz he, youq ndaw caz oen dawz feiz yubyub hawj Mohsih raen. Mohsih yawjraen caz oen dawz feiz, hoeng, caz oen dauq mij ngaiz feiz gyemz dawz.
De yawjraen yienghneix le, cungj raen geizheih raixcaix bae, couh gag naemj: “Aeq, caz oen vihmaz mbouj ngaiz feiz gyemz dawz nej? Daengj gou goq bae yawjyawj!”
Yiengq, Yehhozvaz yawjraen de goq daeuj le, couh daj ndaw caz oen heuh de naeuz: “Mohsih! Mohsih!”
Mohsih han naeuz: “Aex! Gijmaz saeh lah?”

Cangqdiq naeuz: “Mwngz mbouj ndaej daeuj gaenh dineix nej! Ij majcangq duet doiq haiz mwngz bae, aenvih mwngz ndwn youq hih mwnq dieg mwnq dwg gou youq he, gaenq gek hwnjdaeuj lo. Mbouj ndaej laizluenh caij haeujdaeuj hih nej.”

Cangqdiq caiq naeuz: “Gou dwg baujcuk baujyouh cojgoeng mwngz dih Cangqdiq, dwg Yaqbwzlahhanj dih Cangqdiq, Hijsaj dih Cangqdiq, Yajgoz dih Cangqdiq.” Mohsih dingq de yienghneix naeuz le, cungj lau hwj got raeuj bae mbouj gamj yawj de.

Yehhozvaz vanzlij caiq naeuz: “Gou gaenq yawjraen gij vunz gou youq Ngaihgiz ngaiz souh daengz bwkhaih, souh daengz cienfanh dwgrengz sinhoj he, caemh dingqri gyoengqde ngaiz goeng guenj hong bwk gyoengqde hwj gangznaek daejdanq gouz gouq, caemh rox gyoengqde dih haemzhoj.

Sojhij gou roengz daeuj couh dwg ij gouq gyoengqde, gouq gyoengqde duet ok gij vunz Ngaihgiz, daiq gyoengqde bae daengz mwnq dieg youh gvangq, doem youh biz he, couh dwg dieg ndei, ndaem gogo cungj ndaej sou, couh dwg mwnq dieg Gyahnamz vunz hah, Hwz vunz hah, Yaqmohliq vunz hah, Bijliqsij vunz hah, Hihveiq vunz hah, caeuq Yehbuqswh vunz hah mwnq dieg mwnq bae.

“Gou saedsaeh gaenq dingq daengz gij sing gij vunz Hijswzlez daejdanq he; gij sing gyoengqde gaenq cenz daeuj daengz ndaw rwz gou lo. Gou caemh yawjraen Ngaihgiz vunz baenzlawz hangz, baenzlawz haep gyoengqde.
Seizneix gou baij mwngz bae laeng goengjvuengz Ngaihgiz mwnq bae, dawz gij vunz gou, couh dwg Hijswzlez vunz, dajlwh Ngaihgiz daiq okma.”
Mohsih dingq le, han naeuz: “Gou dwg guxmaz vunz nex? Gou baenzlawz gamj bae laeng goengjvuengz daiq gij vunz Hijswzlez okma nej?”

Cangqdiq han naeuz: “Gou menhcij buenx mwngz, caeuq mwngz youq. Daengj mwngz daiq gij vunz Hijswzlez okma le, faenhsou ij youq gwnz bya neix baiq gou, sax gou; gij neix couh dwg gou baij mwngz bae hih baengzgawq lo.”

Gajlaeng, Mohsih cam Cangqdiq naeuz: “Hauhnaeuz gou bae daengz gij vunz Hijswzlez mwnq, naeuz: ‘Gou dwg Cangqdiq baij daeuj he, dwg baujcuk baujyouh cojgoeng faenhsou dih Cangqdiq baij gou daeuj dineix lah,’ yiengq, hauhnaeuz gyoengqde cam gou naeuz: ‘Gij coh de heuh maz,’ gou ij baenzlawz naeuz nej?”
