Yiengq Cangqdiq han naeuz: “Gou couh dwg boux gag miz seiqseiz miz

Cangqdiq caiq doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz ij doiq gij vunz Hijswzlez yienghneix naeuz: ‘Yehhozvaz dwg cojgoeng faenhsou dih Cangqdiq, couh dwg Yaqbwzlahhanj hah, Hijsaj hah, Yajgoz hah dih Cangqdiq; dwg de baij gou daeuj daengz laeng faenhsou dineix.’ Yehhozvaz dwg gij coh gou, seiqseiq daihdaih yungjyenj cungj dwg yienghneix heuh.

“Mwngz bae heuh gij vunz Hijswzlez gangj vah couh baenz he daeuj, doiq gyoengqde naeuz: ‘Yehhozvaz, cojgoeng faenhsou dih Cangqdiq, Yaqbwzlahhanj dih Cangqdiq, Hijsaj dih Cangqdiq, Yajgoz dih Cangqdiq, de yienh hawj gou raen goq. De naeuz: “Gou gaenq cuqhiq daengz faenhsou lo, gaenq yawjraen gij vunz Ngaihgiz baenzlawz doiq faenhsou lo.

Gou itdingh daiq faenhsou ok Ngaihgiz ma, daiq faenhsou bae daengz mwnq dieg gvangq yubyub doem cix biz he, ndaem gogo cungj baenz he, couh dwg Gyahnamz vunz hah, Hwz vunz hah, Yaqmohliq vunz hah, Bijliqsij vunz hah, Hihveiq vunz hah, Yehbuqswh vunz hah youq he dih mwnq dieg mwnq bae.”’

“Mwngz yienghneix naeuz, gyoengqde gaengjdingq dingq gij vah mwngz, yiengq mwngz couh ij daiq gyoengq vunz Hijswzlez gangj vah couh baenz he bae laeng goengjvuengz Ngaihgiz, doiq de naeuz: ‘Yehhozvaz, couh dwg Hihbwzlaiz vunz dih Cangqdiq, yienh hawj gyoengqraeuz raen goq. Seizneix cingj mwngz hawj gyoengqraeuz byaij sam ngoenz roen bae daengz rogndoi bae bwiz Yehhozvaz, raeuz dih Cangqdiq.’”
Cangqdiq caiq doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Hoeng, gou caemh rox, cizfeih gou bwk de, mijn'x de mbouj veiq coengq gyoengqsou okma law.
Gou ij yungh gij gienz ak gou ma guh gak cungj geizmiuj daeuj fad gyoengq vunz Ngaihgiz, yiengq goengjvuengz Ngaihgiz gajlaeng vanzlij dwg coengq faenhsou hih.
“Gou ij hawj gij vunz Ngaihgiz doiq faenhsou ndei, soenhgingq faenhsou; mwh faenhsou ok ma mwhde, couh mbouj ngaiz baet fawz hoengq ma lo,

hoeng, moix it boux Hijswzlez hih vunzbaz cungj ij bae laeng gekleiz, couh dwg gij vunzbaz Ngaihgiz caeuq gij hek vunzbaz youq ndaw ranz gyoengqde he, laeng gyoengqde heuh gyoengqde hawj doenghgij aeu gim ma guh he hah, aeu ngaenz ma guh he hah, doenghgij neix caeuq buh hah, aeu ma hawj gyoengq lwg bonjfaenh. Yienghneix, faenhsou couh ndaej dued aeu gij vunz Ngaihgiz dih gyadangq lo.”
Gajlaeng Mohsih han naeuz: “Gyoengqde gaengjdingq mbouj sinq gou, caemh mbouj dingq gij vah gou. Gyoengqde gaengjdingq naeuz: ‘Yehhozvaz gaenhbaenj mij yienh hawj mwngz raen goq.’”
Yiengq Yehhozvaz cam Mohsih naeuz: “Ndaw fawz mwngz dawz hih dwg gijmaz lah?”
Mohsih han naeuz: “Dwg diuz faexbien duq yiengz he.”

Yehhozvaz caiq naeuz: “Mwngz dawz de vwt roengz lajdoem bae.” Yiengq Mohsih couh dawz diuz faexbien neix vwt roengz lajdoem bae. Diuz faexbien neix couh doq majcangq bienqbaenz ndaek duz ngwz he. Mohsih raen le, couh nyungjnyat diuq deuz.

Yehhozvaz vanzlij caiq doiq de naeuz: “Mwngz majcangq gaemh dawz diuz rieng de.” Mohsih caemh ciuq de gangj hih yienghmwnq bae guh, couh gaemh dawz diuz rieng ngwz. Duz ngwz youq ndaw fawz de youhcaiq bienqbaenz diuz faexbien boiz lo.

Yehhozvaz caiq naeuz: “Mwngz couh ciuq yienghneix bae guh, gyoengqde couh sinq naeuz Yehhozvaz, boux Cangqdiq cojgoeng gyoengqde, couh dwg Yaqbwzlahhanj, Hijsaj, Yajgoz dih Cangqdiq, dwg yienh hawj mwngz raen goq hih lo.”

Yehhozvaz caiq doiq de naeuz: “Dawz gij fawz mwngz oet haeuj laj vengqbuh mwngz bae.” Mohsih caemh oet gij fawz haeuj laj vengqbuh bae. Daengj de iet gij fawz de okma mwhde, gij fawz de engq hwnj mazfung hwj bieg supsup.

De caiq naeuz: “Mwngz caiq dawz gij fawz mwngz oet haeuj laj vengqbuh bae.” Mohsih youhcaiq oet gij fawz de haeuj laj vengqbuh bae, caiq iet gij fawz de okma. Gij fawz de gaenq ndei ndupndup luj gaxgonq de boiz, caeuq gij naengnoh seiqhenz de ityiengh ndei ndwtndwt.

Yehhozvaz youhcaiq naeuz: “Hauhnaeuz gyoengqde mbouj sinq mwngz, cixnaeuz mbouj dawz haeuj rwz gaiq geizmiuj daixit nex, mwngz couh loengh gij daixngeih hawj gyoengqde yawj; gyoengqde gaengjdingq sinq.

“Hauhnaeuz gyoengqde daiqlienz song ndaek cungj geizmiuj neix cungj mbouj sinq, caemh mbouj dingq gij vah mwngz nex, yiengq mwngz couh dajlwh ndaw dah aeu di raemx he ma, raix roengz mwnq doem hawq he bae. Yiengq gij raemx mwnq couh bienqbaenz lwed lo.”

Gajlaeng, Mohsih doiq Yehhozvaz naeuz: “Cangqdiq hax! Conghbak gou liglaiz cungj mbouj daiq rox gangj vah geijlai. Daiqlienz mwngz seizneix caeuq gou, bouxhoiq mwngz, gangj vah, gou vanzlij cungj caemh dwg yienghneix. Gou cungj dwg boux gangj vah dwddwd daddad he.”

Yehhozvaz caemhcaiq naeuz: “Dwg bouxlawz cauh conghbak boux vunz nex? Dwg bouxlawz ndaej hawj vunz bakngoemx, rwznuk, raraeh, rafangz nex? Doenghgij neix mbouj dwg cungj dwg gou, Yehhozvaz, cauh hih maz?
Bae bax, gou gaengjdingq bang mwngz gangj vah hih, caemh son mwngz wnggai gangj hih vah.”
Hoeng, Mohsih han naeuz: “Cangqdiq hax, cingj mwngz vanzlij dwg baij daixlingh boux bae bax.”
Gajlaeng Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih fatheiq hwj naeuz: “Mwngz mbouj dwg miz daeggo mwngz Yaqlwnz maz,
Mwngz dawz gij vah mwngz ij gangj hih cenz hawj de. Gou caemh ij soengq hawj mwngz caeuq de hih goujcaiz, youhcaiq son faenhsou baenzlawz guh.
Yiengq, de caemh bang mwngz yiengq gyoengq vunz gangj vah; de dangqguh conghbak mwngz, mwngz dangqguh Cangqdiq de.
Hoeng, mwngz vanzlij daiq diuz faex neix bae, hawj diuz de bienqbaenz ndaek cungj geizmiuj he.”
Gajlaeng, Mohsih couh maj laeng goeng boxda de Yezdwzloz mwnq, doiq de naeuz: “Gouz mwngz hawj gou maj Ngaihgiz yawjyawj gyoengq goengjlungz nuengxau gou bax, yawjyawj gyoengqde baenzlawz yiengh.”
Yiengq Yezdwzloz couh doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz couh maj bax; muengh mwngz itloh bingzbingz an'an.”
Mwh Mohsih vanzlij youq Mijdenq hih mwhde, Yehhozvaz doiq de naeuz: “Mwngz maj Ngaihgiz bax; doenghheij vunz ij gaj mwngz hih gaenq rai liux lo.”

Yiengq Mohsih couh daiq mehyah de caeuq song daeglwg de, hawj gyoengqde gwih hwnj gwnz gumq duz lawz bae, couh maj Ngaihgiz lo. Ndaw fawz Mohsih caemh dawz Cangqdiq hawj de daiq bae hih diuz faexbien duq yiengz mwnq.

Yehhozvaz caiq doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz maj daengz Ngaihgiz le, itdingh ij youq dangqnaj goengjvuengz loengh gou soengq hawj mwngz hih bonjsaeh, guh sojmiz hih ndaek cungj geizmiuj mwnq. Hoeng, gou caemh ij hawj aen sim de bienq gyeng
Daengz mwhmwnq, mwngz ij doiq goengjvuengz naeuz: ‘Yehhozvaz yienghneix naeuz: “Hijswzlez dwg daeglwg daeuz gou.
Gou doiq mwngz naeuz goq, hawj daeglwg gou bae baiq gou, hoeng mwngz vanzlij mbouj hawj de bae. Mwngz yawj veiq! Gou ij gaj daeglwg daeuz mwngz bae lo.”’”
Yiengq caiq dauq gangj daengz Mohsih daiq lwg daiq yah maj Ngaihgiz hih mwhde, de youq buenqroen dap bungz doz haemh hih mwnq deixfueng mwnq, Yehhozvaz couh goq bae ijsiengj gaj de.
Yiengq mehyah Mohsih, Sihbohlah, couh majcangq dawz benq hojsiz he ma, couh gvej gij ok nyouh daeglwg de di naeng he okdaeuj, couh demj haeuj baj din de
(Mehyah Mohsih gangj gawq neix dih iqswh dwg naeuz gaenq gozlij
Mwhde, Yehhozvaz caemh doiq Yaqlwnz naeuz: “Mwngz bae rogndoi bae ciep Mohsih bax.” Yiengq de couh bae gwnz bya Cangqdiq,
Gajlaeng, Mohsih couh dawz Yehhozvaz baij de bae hih mwhde doiq de soj gangj hih vah caeuq soj raengq de baenzlawz guh baenzlawz bienq ndaek cungj geizmiuj he cungj gangj naeuz Yaqlwnz ni liux.
Gangj liux le, Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz couh bae Ngaihgiz, couh heuh gyoengq vunz Hijswzlez gangj vah couh baenz he daeuj doxcomz.
Yiengq Yaqlwnz couh dawz Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih soj gangj hih vah cungj gangj naeuz gyoengqde ni. De caemh youq dangqnaj gyoengq vunzlai guh ndaek cungj geizmiuj mwnq.
Gajlaeng gyoengqde couh sinq lo. Gyoengqde rox daengz Yehhozvaz dwzbez aiq dwzbez cauqguq gij vunz Hijswzlez, caiq caemh rox gyoengqde dih haemzhoj le, couh gvih roengzma baiqbaiq saxsax Yehhozvaz.

Gajlaeng Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz bae laeng goengjvuengz, couh doiq de naeuz: “Yehhozvaz, Hijswzlez dih Cangqdiq, dwg yienghneix naeuz: ‘Coengq gij vunz gou okma, hawj gyoengqde bae daengz rogndoi bae; vih ij baiq gou, gyoengqde ij guh aen ciet he.’”

Yiengq goengjvuengz han naeuz: “Yehhozvaz dwg bouxlawz? De miz maz bonjsaeh ndaej hawj gou dingq de, hawj gou coengq gij vunz Hijswzlez nej? Gou mbouj rox Yehhozvaz, caemh mbouj veiq coengq gij vunz Hijswzlez law.”

Gajlaeng gyoengqde naeuz: “Hihbwzlaiz vunz dih Cangqdiq yienh hawj raeuz raen; gouz mwngz hawj gyoengqraeuz byaij sam ngoenz dih roen bae daengz rogndoi, bae bwiz Yehhozvaz, raeuz dih Cangqdiq, mienxndaej de aeu rairaq hah, cixnaeuz bing hah, cax hah, doenghgij neix daeuj fad gyoengqraeuz, hoenx gyoengqraeuz.”
Goengjvuengz caiq doiq Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz naeuz: “Faenhsou vihmaz ij hawj gyoengq beksingq faenhsou gvangqgungh nej? Vaiq bae guh gij hong faenhsou bax!”
De caemhcaiq naeuz: “Yawj veiq! Vunz baenxlai lai lo, hoeng vanzlij mbouj siengj hawj gij vunz faenhsou guh hong.
Ngoenz mwnq, goengjvuengz raengq boux Ngaihgiz vunz cenmonz guenj gij vunzhoiq Hijswzlez he caeuq boux hoiqdaeuz Hijswzlez vunz he naeuz:
“Mboujcwnj faenhsou caiq hawj nyangj hawj gyoengqde guh cien daj cien lo.

Hoeng, daj hih cien caemh ij luj gaxgonq yienghmwnq ityiengh lai, it di cungj mbouj ndaej noix. Gyoengqde vihliux ij deuzgyik couh daeuj gouz gou, laih naeuz: ‘Gyoengqraeuz ij bae bwiz raeuz dih cwnz. Hawj gyoengqraeuz bae bwiz bax!’
Sojhij gyoengqraeuz ij lai gya hong naek hawj gyoengqde cij ndaej, yiengq gyoengqde couh mij ndaej hoengq bae dingq doenghgij vah sauqyauz mwnq lo!”

Gajlaeng, boux Ngaihgiz vunz guenj gyoengq hoiq mwnq caeuq boux Hijswzlez vunz dang hoiqdaeuz mwnq ok daeuj doiq gij vunz Hijswzlez naeuz: “Goengjvuengz yienghneix naeuz: ‘Gou mbouj caiq hawj nyangj hawj faenhsou laem lo.
Youq mwnqlawz cimh ndaej nyangj hih, faenhsou couh gag bae mwnqlaw cimh bax! Hoeng, gij hong faenhsou it di cungj mbouj ndaej noix.’”
Gyoengq vunz Hijswzlez dingq le, cungj gag faensanq bae daengz Ngaihgiz gak dieg bae nyaeb nyangj nwnh hah, goenqfiengz nwnh hah ma guh nywj guh nyangj.
Goeng guenj gyoengq vunzhoiq mwnq vanzlij haep gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou caemh ij luj gaxgonq miz nyangj hih yienghmwnq ityiengh, ngoenz he caemh ijaeu guh gij hong ngoenz de liux.”

Boux Ngaihgiz vunz guenj gyoengq hoiq mwnq vanzlij doh doengh boux youz Ngaihgiz vunz senj okdaeuj dih Hijswzlez vunz dang hoiqdaeuz he, caiq saemj gyoengqde naeuz: “Ngoenznaengz dingh hawj faenhsou guh hih cien, ngoenzlwenz caeuq ngoenzneix faenhsou vihmaz cungj mij ndaej luj gaxgonq guh liux nej?”
Gajlaeng, Hijswzlez vunz dih hoiqdaeuz bae gouz goengjvuengz, naeuz: “Goengjvuengz, vihmaz ij yienghneix doiq bouxhoiq mwngz nej?

Vihmaz boux guenj gyoengq hoiq mwnq mbouj hawj nyangj hawj gyoengqraeuz sat lo, hoeng vanzlij caenhrox boenq hawj gyoengqraeuz guh cien nej? Seizneix bouxhoiq mwngz cungj ngaiz vunz doh lo. Doenghgij neix cungj dwg gij buqyaq mwngz dih loek.”
Hoeng, goengjvuengz dauqfanj han naeuz: “Faenhsou gyik gyangjgyangq! Cien gyik fanh gyik! Vanzlij miz naj daeuj gouz gou, laih naeuz: ‘Hawj gyoengqraeuz bae bwiz Yehhozvaz bax.’”
De caiq naeuz: “Vaiq maj guh hong! Mbouj hawj nyangj hawj gyoengqsou; cien caemh ij ciuqyiengh guh gaeuq soq okdaeuj gyau.”
Hijswzlez dih hoiqdaeuz baex rox naeuz ngoenznaengz guh dih cien cungj mbouj ndaej noix, couh rox naeuz beiqciz dawz lo.
Gyoengqde dajlaeng goengjvuengz ok ma, ngamqngamq luj letlet nyangz Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz ndwn youq doiqmienh daengj gyoengqde.

Yiengq gyoengqde couh ndaq Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz naeuz: “Muengh Yehhozvaz ceihcaz faenhsou, fad faenhsou! Vih faenhsou hoh, guh hwj hawj gyoengqraeuz youq dangqnaj goengjvuengz caeuq gyoengq gaen henz ndang de haeu liux, mij dij saek haux cienz, caemhdangq ndenq cax hawj gyoengqde gaj raeuz lo.”
Gajlaeng, Mohsih maj daengz Yehhozvaz mwnq le, naeuz: “Cangqdiq hax, mwngz vihmaz yawj aen minzcuz neix mbouj dij? Vihmaz ij baij gou bae nej?

Dajlwh gou hij gij mingzhiq mwngz bae cimh goengjvuengz, daiqbiuj mwngz caeuq de gangj vah le, de couh gaihcij doiq aen minzcuz neix mbouj ndei, yawj mbouj dij saek di, caiq hangz gyoengqde, hoeng mwngz dauqfanj mij gouq gyoengq vunz mwngz saek di.”

Yiengq Yehhozvaz couh doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz couh ijvanh yawjraen gou baenzlawz soujsib goengjvuengz lo. Gou ij yungh gij rengz, gij ak gou ma yaz de, ep de coengq gyoengqde okma, mbouj danhcij naeuz coengq okma, vanzlij ep de boenq gyoengqde ok mwnq dieg de ma.”
Cangqdiq caiq doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Gou dwg Yehhozvaz.

Gou doenghbaez yienh hawj Yaqbwzlahhanj, Hijsaj caeuq Yajgoz raen hih cungj dwg akak rengzrengz gaiqgaiq cungj ndaej guh daengz dih Cangqdiq, hoeng, gij coh Yehhozvaz gou, gou cungj mij hawj gyoengqde rox goq.
Gou caeuq gyoengqde dingh goq, ij dawz gyoengqde doz youq goq dih dieg Gyahnamz soengq hawj gyoengqde.

Gou caemh dingqri gij vunz Hijswzlez youq Ngaihgiz souh daengz gij vunz Ngaihgiz bwkhaih le gangz naek gangz nanh daejdanq dih sing. Gou nej, gou caemh mbouj lumz gou doiq gyoengqde baujcingq goq hih vah.

“Sojhij, mwngz ij dawz gij vah gou naeuz gij vunz Hijswzlez ni, naeuz: ‘Gou dwg Yehhozvaz. Gou ij daj gij vunz Ngaihgiz yaz hawj faenhsou dih diuz rap naek neix daiq faenhsou okma, dajlwh ndaw diuz lienh suj faenhsou mwnq gouq faenhsou okma. Gou ij yungh gij bonjsaeh miz gienz gou ma fad hawj gyoengqde ij rai ij lix bae ma cueg faenhsou.

Gou ij dawz faenhsou dangqguh gij beksingq bonjfaenh gou, gou caemh guh faenhsou dih Cangqdiq. Yienghneix faenhsou couh rox naeuz gou dwg Yehhozvaz, faenhsou dih Cangqdiq, dwg dajlwh laj diuz rap naek gij vunz Ngaihgiz yaz hawj faenhsou mwnq daiq faenhsou okma he dih Cangqdiq.
Gou ij daiq faenhsou bae daengz gou gaxgonq baujcingq soengq hawj Yaqbwzlahhanj, Hijsaj caeuq Yajgoz dih mwnq dieg mwnq, soengq hawj faenhsou aeu ma guh gyadangq. Gou dwg Yehhozvaz.’”

Yiengq Mohsih couh dawz doenghgij vah neix naeuz gij vunz Hijswzlez ni, hoeng, gyoengqde gaenhbaenj mbouj dingq gij vah de, aenvih gyoengqde ciencien fanhfanh dwgrengz sinhoj, caenh lij saijhoz yaengz gat hoh lo, sawjhawj gyoengqde cungj saetsim liux lo.
Gajlaeng, Yehhozvaz caiq doiq Mohsih naeuz:
“Mwngz bae naeuz goengjvuengz Ngaihgiz ni, naeuz de bietdingh ij coengq gij vunz Hijswzlez ok dieg Ngaihgiz ma.”
Yiengq Mohsih han naeuz: “Gij vunz Hijswzlez cungj mbouj dingq gij vah gou, goengjvuengz baenzlawz dingq gou nej? Baenzlawz dingq conghbak ngawz ngadngad gou nej?”

Hoeng, vih ij hawj gij vunz Hijswzlez dajlwh dieg Ngaihgiz ok ma, Yehhozvaz ngengh ij hawj Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz dauq bae daengz gij vunz Hijswzlez caeuq goengjvuengz Ngaihgiz mwnq, hawj song boux de doiq gyoengqde caeuq goengjvuengz naeuz, song boux de ij daiq gij vunz Hijswzlez ok Ngaihgiz ma.
Laj neix geiq miz Hijswzlez minzcuz dih
Daeglwg daeuz Hijswzlez
Daeglwg ngeih Hijswzlez Sihmenj dih lwg dwg Yehmujliq, Yajminj, Ayaz, Yajginh, Sojyaz caeuq Saujloz. Daxmeh Saujloz dwg lwgsau Gyahnamz vunz. Gyoengq neix couh dwg Sihmenj cuz.
Laj neix geiq miz daeglwg sam Hijswzlez Liqveiq dih doengh daih gajlaeng de:
Gyoengq lwg Liqveiq couh dwg Gwzswnq, Gohyaz caeuq Mijlahliq. Liqveiq de souh ndaej daengz itbak samcib caet bi.
Gij lwg Gwzswnq couh dwg Lizniz caeuq Siqmeij.
Gyoengq lwg Gohyaz dwg Amqlanz, Hijswhhah, Hihbwzlwnz caeuq Uhceh. Gohyaz de souh ndaej daengz itbak samcib sam bi.
Gij lwg Mijlahliq dwg Mazliq caeuq Mujsiq. Gyoengq neix couh dwg Liqveiq dih doengh daih gajlaeng de.
Gyoengq lwg Hijswhhah dwg Gojlah, Nizfeih caeuq Siqgihliq.
Gyoengq lwg Uhceh dwg Mijcahliq, Hijliqsajfanj caeuq Sihdizliq.
Yaqlwnz aeu Hijliqcahbah ma guh yah. Hijliqcahbah dwg dah lwgsau Yaqmijnazdaz, dwg dahnuengx Nazswnq. De seng miz Nazdaz, Yaqbijhuq, Hijliqyaqsaj caeuq Hijdahmaj.
Gyoengq lwg Gojlah dwg Yaqsiz, Hijliqgyahnaz caeuq Yaqbijyaqsaj. Gyoengqde dwg Gojlah cuz dih gak aen gyahcuz dih cojgoeng.
Daeglwg Yaqlwnz Hijliqyaqsaj laeng Bujdez aeu dah lwgsau he ma guh yah. De seng miz Feihnizhah.
Doengh gyoengq gwnz neix cungj dwg Liqveiq cuz dih cuzcangj, cungj dwg ciuq baenx aen gya baenx aen gya ma baiz he.

Yaqlwnz caeuq Mohsih song boux neix couh dwg Yehhozvaz mingqlingq song boux de goq, naeuz: “Bae daiq gyoengq Hijswzlez minzcuz dih gak aen cuz, baenx buek baenx buek daiq ok Ngaihgiz ma!” dih song boux mwnq lo.
Bae doiq goengjvuengz Ngaihgiz naeuz ij daiq gij vunz Hijswzlez dajlwh Ngaihgiz daiq okma dih couh dwg Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz.
Caiq gangj daengz Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih naeuz hih,
de naeuz: “Gou dwg Yehhozvaz! Mwngz bae dawz gou caeuq mwngz soj gangj dih vah naeuz goengjvuengz Ngaihgiz ni liux bae.”
Hoeng Mohsih han naeuz: “Mwngz caemh rox gou dwg boux mbouj rox gangj vah he dih vunz; goengjvuengz baenzlawz dingq gij vah gou nej?”
Yehhozvaz dingq le, caiq doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Gou ij hawj mwngz youq dangqnaj goengjvuengz luj gou, Cangqdiq yienghneix, caemh hawj daeggo mwngz Yaqlwnz guh boux bang mwngz cenz gij vah mwngz he.
Mwngz ij dawz gou raengq mwngz sojmiz dih vah caiq youz daeggo mwngz Yaqlwnz bae naeuz goengjvuengz ni, naeuz hawj de coengq gij vunz Hijswzlez dajlwh mwnq dieg de okma.
Hoeng, gou caemh ij hawj goengjvuengz simgyeng caemh akeuq; mboujguenj gou loengh baenx geijlai geizmiuj dih saeh, de vanzlij dwg mbouj dingq gij vah mwngz.

Yiengq gou couh yungh gij bonjsaeh gou ma fad gij vunz Ngaihgiz, fad hawj gyoengqde ij rai ij lix bae. Gajlaeng, gou couh daiq gij vunz Hijswzlez gou luj bing yienghmwnq baizdeiq hwj cingjcingj cizciz dajlwh mwnq dieg mwnq daiq okma.
Youq mwh gou yungh gij bonjsaeh gou ma fad gij vunz Ngaihgiz, caiq daiq gij vunz Hijswzlez dajlwh laeng gyoengqde daiq okma dih mwhmwnq, gyoengqde couh rox naeuz gou dwg Yehhozvaz.”
Yiengq Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz caemh ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq gyoengqde hih yienghmwnq bae guh lo.
Mwh gyoengqde caeuq goengjvuengz gangj dih mwhmwnq, Mohsih ndaej betcib bi, Yaqlwnz ndaej betcib sam bi.
Gajlaeng, Yehhozvaz caiq doiq Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz naeuz:
“Hauhnaeuz goengjvuengz hawj faenhsou guhbienq yiengh geizmiuj he okdaeuj

Yiengq Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz couh bae laeng goengjvuengz. Gyoengqde caemh ciuq Yehhozvaz mingqlingq hih yienghmwnq bae guh lo; Yaqlwnz caemh dawz diuz faexbien vwt youq dangqnaj goengjvuengz caeuq gyoengq gaen henz ndang de. Diuz faexbien mwnq couh majcangq bienqbaenz duz ngwz he lo.

Goengjvuengz raen yienghneix le, caemh majcangq youq ndaw vangzgungh de heuh doengh bouxsien rox coengqfap hah, boux rox guhbienq doeng yiengh sae yiengh he hah daeuj, hawj gyoengqde daeuj guhbienq luj gyoengq Mohsih guhbienq hih yienghmwnq.

Gyoengqde daeuj le, caemh dawz diuz faexbien gyoengqde gveng roengz doem bae, yiengq diuz faexbien gyoengqde caemh bienq duz ngwz. Hoeng, diuz faexbien Mohsih engqgya gyan diuz faexbien gyoengqde roengzbae.
Gannaeuz ngaiz yienghneix lah, hoeng aen sim goengjvuengz vanzlij gyeng caiq akeuq dangqmaz, caemh luj Yehhozvaz gaxgonq naeuz goq dih yienghmwnq, mbouj gaengj dingq gij vah Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz.
Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Goengjvuengz Ngaihgiz nga'ngangq raixcaix, mbouj nyienh coengq gij vunz gou okma.
Haetcog goengjvuengz ij bae henz dah

Yiengq mwngz couh ij doiq de naeuz: ‘Yehhozvaz, Hihbwzlaiz vunz dih Cangqdiq, baij gou daeuj naeuz mwngz ni, ij hawj mwngz coengq gij vunz de okma, gyoengqde couh ndaej bae daengz rogndoi baiq de. Hoeng, mwngz itcig cungj mbouj dingq.
Mwngz yawj veiq, gou ij yungh diuz faex neix ma moeb gij raemx dah neix; gij raemx dah neix couh ij bienqbaenz lwed.

Yehhozvaz caiq doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz ij naeuz Yaqlwnz ni, hawj de dawz diuz faexbien de, yinx haeuj Ngaihgiz sojmiz dih dah hah, rij hah, mieng hah, ceijguq hah, caeuq daemz hah, hawj sojmiz hih raemx cungj bienqbaenz lwed liux bae. Cenz guek dauqcawq cungj dwg lwed, simqciq daiqlienz ndaw doengj raemx, ndaw gang raemx cungj caemh bienq lwed liux.”

Yiengq Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz caemh ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq hih yienghmwnq bae guh, youq dangqnaj goengjvuengz caeuq gyoengq gaen henz ndang de couh yingx hwnj diuz faex de couh moeb roengz dah bae, yiengq sojmiz dih raemx dah couh majcangq bienqbaenz lwed lo.
Gij bya ndaw dah caemh majcangq rai liux lo, gij raemx de caemhcaiq haeu saengxsaengx liux. Gij vunz Ngaihgiz mbouj caiq ndaej gw gij raemx neix lo. Youq Ngaihgiz seiq lengq seiq dwg lwed liux.

Gajlaeng, goengjvuengz hih doengh bouxsien, couh dwg boux rox coengqfap hah, boux rox bienq doeng yiengh sae yiengh he hah, caemh doengzyiengh hawj gij raemx bienqbaenz lwed, caemh luj Yehhozvaz soj gangj dih yienghmwnq, goengjvuengz vanzlij baenxlai nga'ngangq, mbouj gaengj dingq gij vah Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz.
De dauqfanj maj ndaw vangzgungh, caemh mbouj dawz gienh saeh neix coengq youq ndaw sim,
guh hwj cenz Ngaihgiz dih vunz vih mbouj ndaej gw gij raemx ndaw dah Nizloz, cungj gag vat henz dah guh mboq hwj cij ndaej aeu gij raemx de ma gw.
Dajlwh Yehhozvaz yienghneix doh diuz dah neix le, gij cainanh neix lienzdaemh baenx caet ngoenz.
Yehhozvaz caiq doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz bae laeng goengjvuengz Ngaihgiz, doiq de naeuz: ‘Yehhozvaz yienghneix naeuz: “Coengq gij vunz gou okma, hawj gyoengqde bae baiq gou.
Hauhnaeuz mwngz mbouj gaengj coengq gyoengqde okma, gou couh ij hawj aen guek mwngz dauqcawq cungj miz goep.

Diuz dah Nizloz cenznaengz cungj dwg goep liux. Doenghheij goep neix ij haeuj ndaw gunghdenq mwngz, ndaw rug mwngz, gwnz congz mwngz, daiqlienz gyoengq gaen henz ndang mwngz caeuq gyoengq beksingq mwngz dih ndaw ranz de bae. Dauqcawq cungj miz goep vuenz; gyoengqde vuenz haeuj ndaw cauq hah, ndaw buenz gaenx mienh hah bae,
simqciq diuq hwnj gwnz ndang gyoengq gaen henz ndang mwngz caeuq gij beksingq mwngz bae.”’”

Yehhozvaz caiq doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Naeuz Yaqlwnz ni, hawj de dawz diuz faexbien yinx haeuj sojmiz dih dah hah, rij hah, mieng hah, ceijguq hah, caeuq daemz hah bae, hawj gij goep ok daeuj, cenz Ngaihgiz sojmiz dih dieg cungj miz hwj.”
Yiengq Yaqlwnz couh dawz diuz faexbien yinx haeuj sojmiz dih raemx bae. Gij goep couh diuq hwnjdaeuj; cenz Ngaihgiz hih dieg cungj vuenz miz rim bae.
Ngaihgiz hih doengh bouxsien mwnq caemh loengh hawj miz goep ok daeuj.

Gajlaeng, goengjvuengz heuh Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz daeuj naeuz: “Cingj faenhsou bang gou gouz Yehhozvaz, hawj de boenq doenghheij goep neix dajlaeng gou caeuq dajlaeng doenghgij vunz gou deuz bae. Gou couh coengq doenghgij vunz Hijswzlez, hawj gyoengqde bae bwiz Yehhozvaz lo.”

Mohsih han naeuz: “Caih mwngz aiq. Mwngz dingh cizgyenh bax. Gou nyienh'eiq bang mwngz caeuq gyoengq gaen henz ndang mwngz hah, gij beksingq mwngz hah gouz Cangqdiq, gouz de hawj gij goep cungj rai liux, caenhgag hawj ndaw dah Nizloz vanzlij miz.”
Gajlaeng goengjvuengz naeuz: “Couh ngoenzcog bax.”
Mohsih caemh han naeuz: “Ndaej hah, ndaej ciuq gij vah mwngz bae guh hah. Yienghmwnq ndaej hawj mwngz rox, mij'z byawz ndaej beij Yehhozvaz, raeuz dih Cangqdiq;
de ndaej hawj gij goep deuz ok mwngz hah, vangzgungh hah, gyoengq gaen henz ndang mwngz hah, caeuq gij beksingq mwngz hah, caenhgag ndaej youq ndaw dah Nizloz lah.”

Gangj daengz dineix sat le, Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz couh dajlaeng goengjvuengz ok ma. Mohsih couh vih Yehhozvaz baij gij goep daeuj hawj goengjvuengz souh mbouj ndaej mwnq gouz Yehhozvaz, hawj de cawz gij goep mwnq bae.
Yiengq Yehhozvaz couh ciuq Mohsih gouz hih yienghmwnq bae guh lo, couh hawj doenghgij goep youq ndaw ranz hah, daxhongh hah, ndaw naz hah cungj rai liux bae lo.
Gij vunz Ngaihgiz couh dawz gij goep rai dong hwnjdaeuj, dong hwj baenx dong baenx dong, guh hwj Ngaihgiz cenz guek cungj haeu saengxsaengx liux, hoj mup ij rai bae.

Hoeng, goengjvuengz de baex raen ndaw guek de gij goep cungj rai liux lo, raen haemq rwnh le, de caemh luj Yehhozvaz gaxgonq soj gangj dih yienghmwnq, aen sim de youhcaiq gyeng caiq akeuq hwnjdaeuj lo, mbouj caiq dingq gij vah Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz laem lo.
Yehhozvaz youhcaiq doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz naeuz Yaqlwnz ni, naeuz hawj de dawz diuz faexbien moeb roengz gij boenqcingh lajdoem bae, hawj gij boenqcingh cungj bienqbaenz duz raeu liux bae.”

Yiengq gyoengqde couh yienghneix guh lo; Yaqlwnz couh dawz diuz faexbien moeb roengz gij boenqcingh lajdoem bae. Moeb le, cenz Ngaihgiz sojmiz dih boenqcingh cungj bienqbaenz duz raeu liux, gwnz ndang vunz caeuq gwngz ndang doengh duz cukseng cungj vuenz hwj rim bae.

Ngaihgiz dih doengh bouxsien mwnq caemh ijsiengj guhbienq duz raeu, hoeng bienq mbouj ndaej okdaeuj. Mwhmwnq sojmiz dih vunz caeuq doengh duz cukseng dih gwnz ndang cungj cenznaengz raeu, vuenz hwj rim bae.

Yiengq Ngaihgiz dih doengh bouxsien mwnq couh doiq goengjvuengz naeuz: “Gij neix dwg Cangqdiq guh he!” Hoeng, caemh luj Yehhozvaz naeuz goq hih yienghmwnq, aen sim goengjvuengz cienfanh gyeng cienfanh akeuq he,
Yehhozvaz caiq doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Ngoenzcog doengxhaet daihcaeux, goengjvuengz bae henz dah

Hauhnaeuz mwngz mbouj coengq gij vunz gou okma nex, gou couh hawj baenx raq baenx raq nengznyaen mbin hwnj gwnz ndang mwngz hah, gyoengq gaen henz ndang mwngz hah, gij beksingq mwngz hah bae. Ranzranz hohhoh cungj miz, comz hwj rim bae; cenz Ngaihgiz dauqcawq cungj miz, nana netnet bae.
Hoeng, gij vunz gou soj youq hih dieg Gohsanh, dauqfanj mbouj miz. Gou yienghneix guh dwg hawj mwngz rox gou dwg youq dineix fazveih gij gienzveih gou dih Yehhozvaz.
Daengz mwhmwnq, gou caemh ij dawz gij vunz gou caeuq gij beksingq mwngz faengek okdaeuj. Cungj geizmiuj ndaej bienq neix, ngoenzcog couh raen lo.”’”

Couh yienghneix, gajlaeng Yehhozvaz couh hawj baenx buek baenx buek baenx raq baenx raq nengznyaen mbin haeuj ndaw vangzgungh goengjvuengz caeuq gyoengq gaen henz ndang de hih ndaw ranz de bae. Ngaihgiz cenz guek dauqcawq cungj dwg nengznyaen, guh hawj vunz cungj souh mbouj ndaej bae,
guh hwj goengjvuengz heuh Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz daeuj bae. Goeng de doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Bae bax, faenhsou couh youq ndaw guek gou bwiz boux Cangqdiq faenhsou bax.”

Mohsih dingq le han naeuz: “Yienghneix guh nwjhwh ndaej hwj? Aenvih gyoengqraeuz dawz hih doengh duz cukseng daeuj bwiz Yehhozvaz, raeuz dih Cangqdiq, cungj dwg Ngaihgiz vunz soj dwgcaengz hih doengh duz cukseng, dwg famh gyoengqde hih. Hauhnaeuz gyoengqraeuz dawz gij gyoengq Ngaihgiz vunz dwgcaengz dih doengh duz cukseng daeuj youq dangqnaj gyoengqde guh gij dajbwiz nex, yiengq gyoengqraeuz mijyaengz ngaiz gij vunz Ngaihgiz aeu rin ma ndek rai haz?
Gyoengqraeuz ij bae rogndoi cij ndaej, ij byaij sam ngoenz dih roen, caemh bietdingh ij ciuq Yehhozvaz, raeuz dih Cangqdiq, raengq raeuz hih yienghmwnq bae bwiz de cij ndaej.”
Gajlaeng goengjvuengz naeuz: “Gou bihcwnj hawj faenhsou bae rogndoi bwiz Yehhozvaz, sou dih Cangqdiq, hoeng faenhsou mbouj ndaej bae baenqlai gyae. Faenhsou caemh ij bang gou gouz

Mohsih han naeuz: “Gou ok bae couh gouz Yehhozvaz, gouz de ngoenzcog couh hawj gij nengznyaen dajlwh laeng mwngz hah, gyoengq gaen henz ndang mwngz hah, gij beksingq mwngz hah deuz bae. Hoeng, mwngz mbouj ndaej caiq coemx gyoengqraeuz laem lo; mbouj ndaej mbouj hawj gyoengqraeuz bae bwiz Yehhozvaz hoh.”
Yiengq Mohsih couh dajlaeng goengjvuengz ok bae gouz Yehhozvaz.

Yehhozvaz couh ciuq Mohsih gouz hih yienghmwnq bae guh lo. Gij nengznyaen couh dajlwh laeng goengjvuengz hah, gyoengq gaen henz ndang de hah, gyoengq beksingq de hah, deuz okbae; it duz cungj mbouj lw laem lo.
Hoeng, mbat neix aen sim goengjvuengz ciuqyiengh vanzlij gyeng vanzlij akeuq, mbouj coengq gij vunz Hijswzlez okma.

Yehhozvaz youhcaiq doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz bae laeng goengjvuengz, naeuz de ni, naeuz: ‘Yehhozvaz, Hihbwzlaiz vunz dih Cangqdiq, yienghneix naeuz: “Coengq gij vunz gou okma, hawj gyoengqde bae baiq gou.
Hauhnaeuz mwngz ngengh mbouj coengq gyoengqde okma nex,
Yehhozvaz couh ij coengq nanh hawj gij doenghduz cukseng mwngz lo, couh dwg sojmiz dih max hah, lawz hah, lozdoz hah, cwz hah, yiengz hah, hawj doengh duz de rairaq bae.
Hoeng, Yehhozvaz caemh dawz gij cukseng gij vunz Hijswzlez ciengx hih caeuq gij vunz Ngaihgiz ciengx hih cukseng gek okdaeuj; Hijswzlez vunz ciengx hih cukseng it duz cungj mbouj ngaiz rai.”’”
Yehhozvaz caiq naeuz: “Gou gaenq dingh cizgyenh lo, couh dwg ngoenzcog. Ngoenzcog gou couh ij guh gienh saeh neix lo.”

Yehhozvaz gangj daengz guh daengz; ngoenz daixngeih, de couh guh gienh saeh neix lo. Gij vunz Ngaihgiz sojmiz dih doengh duz cukseng cungj ngaiz rairaq dawz, rai liux, hoeng, gij vunz Hijswzlez hih doengh duz cukseng mij ngaiz rai saek duz.

Yiengq goengjvuengz baij vunz bae damqdingq yawjyawj, cij rox naeuz gij vunz Hijswzlez hih doengh duz cukseng it duz cungj mij ngaiz rai. Hoeng, aen sim goeng de ciuqyiengh vanzlij gyeng vanzlij akeuq, mbouj gaengj coengq gij vunz Hijswzlez okma.
Yehhozvaz caiq raengq Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz naeuz: “Faenhsou daj ndaw yiuz aeu geij gaem daeuh ma. Aeu ma le, Mohsih guh youq dangqnaj goengjvuengz vanq gij daeuh neix hwnj gwnzmbwn bae.
Doenghgij daeuh neix caemh ij luj boenqcingh ityiengh sanqsa youq cenz Ngaihgiz, seiq lengq seiq miz. Gij boenq neix
Yehhozvaz yienghneix raengq le, gyoengqde couh ciuq de raengq hih yienghmwnq bae aeu daeuh ma, bae daengz dangqnaj goengjvuengz. Mohsih couh dawz gij daeuh vanq hwnj gwnzmbwn bae. Gij daeuh
Ngaihgiz dih doengh bouxsien cungj mij banqfaz ndaej daeuj daengz dangqnaj Mohsih, aenvih gyoengqde caemh luj sojmiz hih Ngaihgiz vunz ityiengh hwnj baenx ndang baeznok.
Hoeng, caemh luj Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih naeuz goq hih yienghmwnq, de hawj aen sim goengjvuengz gyeng

Yehhozvaz raengq Mohsih naeuz: “Ngoenzcog doengxhaet daihcaeux, mwngz bae laeng goengjvuengz naeuz de ni naeuz: ‘Yehhozvaz, Hihbwzlaiz vunz dih Cangqdiq, naeuz yienghneix: “Coengq gij vunz gou okma, haemq ndei hawj gyoengqde bae baiq gou.
Hoeng,

Hauhnaeuz gou gaenq yungh ndaek cungj gaeuq doeg gaeuq sieb hih doenghheij bingh yalw mwnq ma haih mwngz caeuq gij beksingq mwngz nex, mwngz caeuq gij beksingq mwngz yaengz senqsi rairaeg raicied haz!
Hoeng, gou mij hawj mwngz rai, vih ij hawj mwngz rox gou ak dangqmaz, caemh sawj gij coh gou riengzmingz baenx cenz lajmbwn.
Hoeng, mwngz vanzlij naemqnaeuz bonjfaenh mwngz cungj ak raixcaix, mbouj fug coengq gij vunz gou okma.

Daengj daengz ngoenzcog dih mwhneix, mwngz couh rox lo, gou couh hawj gij byagcaej doek roengzma. Dajlwh laeb aen guek Ngaihgiz daengz seizneix, coengzlaiz mijyaengz miz byagcaej baenx hung, baenxlai youqgaenj goq.

Seizneix mwngz ij baij vunz bae duq doenghheij doengh duz cukseng haeuj ndaw ranz ma, caeuq dawz ndaw reihnaz sojmiz dih sou haeuj ranz ma. Hauhnaeuz youq ndaw reihnaz mbouj haeuj ma hih, mboujguenj vunz haj cixnaeuz doengh duz cukseng caeuq doxgaiq cungj ij ngaiz byagcaej dub dawz byaeu liux bae.”’”
Hoeng, caemh miz mbangj hih vunz mbouj dawz haeuj rwz gij vah Yehhozvaz, hawj gyoengq hoiq caeuq gyoengq doengh duz cukseng de youq ndaw reihnaz, cungj mij hawj gyoengqde haeuj ranz ma haem.

Yehhozvaz caiq doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz dawz diuz faexbien yinx hwnj gwnzmbwn bae, yiengq baenx cenz Ngaihgiz cungj miz byagcaej doek roengzma, dub dawz gij vunz Ngaihgiz caeuq doengh duz cukseng caeuq ndaw reihnaz sojmiz hih doenghgo.”
Mohsih caemh ciuq Yehhozvaz gangj hih yienghmwnq bae guh, yinx diuz faexbien hwnj gwnzmbwn bae. Yehhozvaz couh hawj
Byajmyig,
Byagcaej dub roengz sojmiz hih dieg Ngaihgiz. Sojmiz youq ndaw reih, ndaw naz,
Caenhgag gij vunz Hijswzlez soj youq hih dieg Gohsanh mij ngaiz byagcaej dawz hoh lo.

Yiengq, goengjvuengz couh hawj vunz bae heuh Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz daeuj, couh doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Mbat neix gou famh coih lo. Gou caeuq gij beksingq gou cungj dwg yakrwix he; Yehhozvaz cij dwg deng he.
Raeuz dingx mbouj ndaej ciengz byagcaej, byajraez,
Gajlaeng Mohsih han de naeuz: “Gou baex ok singz couh yingx fawz hwnjdaeuj gouz Yehhozvaz. Gouz le,
Hoeng, gou caemh rox mwngz caeuq gyoengq gaen henz ndang mwngz caeuq gij beksingq mwngz vanzlij mbouj lau Yehhozvaz, raeuz dih Cangqdiq.”
Mwhde, gomaz gaenq hoi va, cungj mienhhung
Hoeng, cungj mienh'iq caeuq cungj mienhco haemq laeng, mij ngaiz dub dawz.
Gajlaeng Mohsih couh dajlaeng goengjvuengz ok singz bae, couh yingx fawz hwnjdaeuj gouz Yehhozvaz. Yiengq,
Yiengq goengjvuengz raen fwn hah,
caemh luj Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih soj gangj dih yienghmwnq lo, mbouj gaengj coengq gij vunz Hijswzlez okma.

Yehhozvaz caiq doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz bae laeng goengjvuengz. Gou ij hawj aen sim de caeuq gyoengq vunz gaen henz ndang de gyeng caemh akeuq. Gou yienghneix guh couh dwg ij youq laeng gyoengqde guh doenghgij geizmiuj neix.

Gou caemh ij hawj mwngz dawz gou youq laeng gij vunz Ngaihgiz mwnq baenzlaw loengh baenzlaw yaeujyak gyoengqde gaijmbwq, caeuq baenzlaw loengh doenghgij geizmiuj he, naeuz doengh daih lwg, daih lan, daih laenj mwngz ni, hawj daixgya rox gou dwg Yehhozvaz.”

Yehhozvaz yienghneix naeuz le, Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz couh haeuj bae laeng goengjvuengz doiq de naeuz: “Yehhozvaz, Hihbwzlaiz vunz dih Cangqdiq, yienghneix naeuz: ‘Mwngz ij daengz seizlaw bae cij fug gou nej? Cij fug coengq gij vunz gou okma, hawj gyoengqde bae baiq gou nej?
Hauhnaeuz mwngz vanzlij mbouj coengq gij vunz gou okma nex, ngoenzcog gou couh hawj duz daek haeuj ndaw guek mwngz daeuj,
hawj ndaw guek mwngz dauqcawq cungj miz, lai hwj nana netnet mbouj raen doem bae. Gyoengqde gw doengh go youq ndaw reihnaz byagcaej dub mbouj dawz lij lw hih doenghgo, lienz faex hah cungj gw liux.

Ndaw vangzgungh mwngz caeuq ndaw ranz doengh boux gaen henz ndang mwngz cungj miz rim bae; sojmiz dih ndaw ranz gij vunz Ngaihgiz cungj ngaiz duz daek ciemq liux. Daj doengh dangq cojgoeng, goenggoeng geqgeq mwngz daengz seizneix cungj mijyaengz raen goq miz gij daek lai luj yienghneix baenxlai yiemzcungq, baenxlai nanh.’” Mohsih yienghneix gangj sat le, couh baetluet dajlaeng goengjvuengz ok ma lo.

Gajlaeng, doengh boux gaen henz ndang goengjvuengz doiq goengjvuengz naeuz: “Mohsih boux vunz neix vanzlij ij haih gyoengqraeuz geijlwh caez laem? Cingj mwngz coengq doenghgij vunz neix okbae, hawj gyoengqde bae baiq Yehhozvaz, gyoengqde dih cwnz bax! Nanzdauh mwngz mbouj rox haz, Ngaihgiz cungj ijvanh baih liux lo?”
Yiengq Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz youhcaiq ngaiz goengjvuengz heuh bae. Goengjvuengz doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou bae baiq Yehhozvaz, faenhsou dih cwnz. Hoeng, dauqdaej ij dwg gij vunzlawz bae nex?”

Mohsih han naeuz: “Gyoengqraeuz baenx gyoengq sojmiz dih vunz, mboujlwnh bouxlaux, lwgngez, vunzsai, vunzbaz cungj bae liux, vanzlij daiq cwzcwz yiengzyiengz doengh duz cukseng itheij bae laem, aenvih gyoengqraeuz ij guh aen ciet baiq Yehhozvaz he.”
Goengjvuengz dingq le, couh fatheiq hwj naeuz: “Gou senqsi cix rox naeuz faenhsou dih gveijmaj lo; yied daek yied laeg hoh lo. Gaej muengh naeuz gou coengq faenhsou bae liux huh.

Ciuq faenhsou gaxgonq gouz hih yienghmwnq bae guh; gou caenhgag hawj gij vunzsai hung he bae lah. Lij lw hih vunz, gou haengzbaengzlaengz cungj mbouj hawj bae.” Gangj sat, de couh boenq Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz okma.

Gajlaeng, Yehhozvaz caiq doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz dawz diuz faexbien yinx haeuj Ngaihgiz cenz guek sojmiz dih dieg bae. Gou ij hawj Ngaihgiz sojmiz dih dieg cungj miz daek, gw gij byagcaej dub roengzma lij lw hih doenghgo, gw liux bae.”

Gajlaeng, Mohsih couh yingx diuz faexbien yinx haeuj Ngaihgiz sojmiz dih dieg bae. Yehhozvaz couh hawj rumz doeng ci haeuj Ngaihgiz bae, ci baenxngoenz baenxngwnz. Daengz doengxhaet daihcaeux, gij daek caeuq rumz doeng cungj ci daeuj daengz Ngaihgiz.
Ngaihgiz sojmiz dih dieg cungj dwg daek, nana netnet bijhuzcih bae, gaeuq youqgaenj lo. Doenghbaez mijyaengz miz yienghneix goq, baezneix caemh mbouj caiq miz.

Gij daek youq lajdoem nana netnet ndaem ruprup bae. Gyoengqde gw doengh go byagcaej dub lij lw hih byaek hah, gij mak gwnz faex hah—mboujguenj faex haj cixnaeuz ndaw reihnaz, fanjcingq doengh go heu yeuj he cungj gw liux bae, it di cungj mbouj lw.
Gajlaeng goengjvuengz cungj gaenjgib hwj heuh Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz daeuj, naeuz: “Gou daekcoih Yehhozvaz, faenhsou dih cwnz lo, caemh daekcoih faenhsou.”
Goengjvuengz yienghneix naeuz le,
Mohsih dingq le, couh dajlaeng goengjvuengz ok ma gouz Yehhozvaz,
yiengq Yehhozvaz couh fan rumz sae. Gij rumz ci hwj hung hux hung, dawz gij daek cungj ci haeuj ndaw Hungz Haij bae. Cenz Ngaihgiz sojmiz dih dieg cungj mij lw saek duz.
Hoeng, Yehhozvaz ciuqyiengh hawj aen sim goengjvuengz gyeng caiq akeuq, mbouj coengq gij vunz Hijswzlez okma.

Gajlaeng, Yehhozvaz caiq doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz dawz diuz faexbien yinx hwnj gwnzmbwn bae, hawj Ngaihgiz sojmiz hih dieg cungj laep saengxsaengx liux bae, laep hwj iet fawz cungj mbouj ndaej raen haj lwgfawz bae.”
Yiengq, Mohsih couh dawz diuz faexbien yinx hwnj gwnzmbwn bae. Ngaihgiz sojmiz hih dieg couh majcangq laep saengxsaengx liux, lienzdaemh laep baenx sam ngoenz baenx lai.
Bouxlawz cungj mbouj raen bouxlawz, bouxlawz cungj mbouj gamj ok bak ranz bonjfaenh. Caenhgag gij vunz Hijswzlez soj youq hih dieg rongh sat lo.

Goengjvuengz raen yienghneix le, caiq heuh Mohsih daeuj, naeuz: “Bae baiq faenhsou dih Yehhozvaz bax! Lwgngez hah, vunzbaz hah cungj ndaej caeuq faenhsou bae; caenh lij lw cwz hah, yiengz hah, louz youq dineix mbouj ndaej bae.”
Yiengq, Mohsih han naeuz: “Mwngz ceiq gijmaj cungj ij hawj raeuz dawz gij dajbwiz dajcoemh hih doengh duz cukseng bae bwiz Yehhozvaz raeuz dih Cangqdiq haj.

Doengh duz cukseng, raeuz cungj ij daiq bae liux cij ndaej, it duz cungj mbouj lw, aenvih gyoengqraeuz ij daj ndaw doengh duz cukseng genj okdaeuj aeu ma bwiz Yehhozvaz raeuz dih Cangqdiq; raeuz caemh dwg ij bae daengz mwnqde le, cij rox naeuz ij genj aeu duzlaw hah.”
Hoeng, Yehhozvaz vanzlij dwg hawj aen sim goengjvuengz gyeng, akeuq, mbouj gaengj coengq gij vunz Hijswzlez okma.

Goeng de hujheiq hwj doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz vaiqdi deuz! Vaiqdi ok bae! Hoeng, mwngz ij siujsim, gaejyungh caiq hawj gou raen mwngz. Hauhnaeuz caiq hawj gou raen mwngz laem nex, mwngz gaengjdingq ij ngaiz rai.”
Mohsih han naeuz: “Mwngz naeuz ndaej deng lo; gou gaengjdingq mbouj caiq raen mwngz laem lo.”

Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Gou vanzlij ij coengq mbat nanh haem hawj goengjvuengz Ngaihgiz caeuq doenghgij vunz Ngaihgiz cij ndaej, coengq hawj de gajlaeng gag fug coengq faenhsou, ep faenhsou ok ma bae.
Mwngz ij naeuz gyoengq vunz Hijswzlez ni, raengq gyoengqde, mboujlwnh vunzsai vunzbaz cungj ij bae laeng gekleiz gij vunz Ngaihgiz aeu gij gim hah, ngaenz hah dih doxgaiq ma.”
Yehhozvaz yienghneix naeuz le, de caemh hawj gij vunz Ngaihgiz doiq gij vunz Hijswzlez ndei, yawjdij gyoengqde;
Yiengq, Mohsih couh

Youq Ngaihgiz sojmiz dih daeglwg daixdaeuz, mboujguenj goengjvuengz haj cixnaeuz vunzhoiq yaqyuij seng hih daeglwg daixdaeuz, caeuq doengh duz cukseng dih duz daeg daixdaeuz he, cungj ij ngaiz rai liux,
hawj baenx cenz Ngaihgiz cungj miz sing daej

Hoeng, youq ndaw gij vunz Hijswzlez ndaw de mij naih saek yiengh, mboujguenj vunz haj cixnaeuz doengh duz cukseng, daiqlienz duz ma cungj mbouj gamj raeuq gyoengqde, dingh rikrik. Yienghneix cij hawj faenhsou rox, Yehhozvaz dawz gij vunz Ngaihgiz caeuq gij vunz Hijswzlez faengek okdaeuj.’

“Daengz mwhmwnq, sojmiz dih doengh boux gaen henz ndang mwngz cungj ij daeuj laeng gou, gvih roengz doem bae baiq gou sax gou cij ndaej, gouz gou naeuz: ‘Cingj mwngz caeuq doenghheij vunz mwngz ok maj bax!’ Daengz mwhmwnq, gyoengqraeuz cij ok maj.” Mohsih yienghneix gangj sat le, couh hujheiq dengxdengx hwj daj ndaw vangzgungh ok ma lo.
Gajlaeng, Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Goengjvuengz gaengjdingq mbouj dingq gij vah faenhsou, yiengq gou couh ndaej youq Ngaihgiz ndaej loengh gij geizmiuj he engqgya lai.”

Couh vih yienghneix, Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz youq dangqnaj goengjvuengz loengh baenx haujlai haujlai geizmiuj dih saeh, hoeng, Yehhozvaz vanzlij hawj aen sim goengjvuengz engqgya gyeng engqgya akeuq, mbouj coengq gij vunz Hijswzlez okma.
Yehhozvaz youq Ngaihgiz doiq Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz naeuz:
“Ij aeu ndwen neix ma guh binaengz dih daixit ndwen.
Faenhsou ij raengq sojmiz dih gij vunz Hijswzlez, ndwen neix cojcib, moix it hoh dih cawjranz cungj ij vih aen gya bonjfaenh genj aeu duz yiengzlwg he, it hoh it duz.
Hauhnaeuz hoh he vunz daiq noix,
“Faenhsou cwnjbiq yiengzlwg hax, ij daj ndaw menzyiengz aeu haj cixnaeuz daj ndaw yiengzbya ndaw de aeu cungj ndaej. Aeu duz ndei ndwtndwt giencangq he, bi he dih yiengzlwg daeg,
aeu ma diuh hwj daengz ndwen neix cibseiq hauh haemh de raixra. Sojmiz dih Hijswzlez vunz cungj ij dawz doengh duz yiengzlwg genj okdaeuj mwnq gaj bae.
Gaj le, couh aeu gij lwed de ma hoz haeuj bakdoumonz hih begdou hah, goemqdou hah bae. Youq ranzlawz gw, couh hoz ranzlawz.
Ngwnz mwnq gyoengqde ij aeu feiz ma hangq yiengzlwg gw, caemh caeuq mij fat goq hih bingj hah, byaek haemz hah, doxcaeuq gw.
Mbouj ndaej gw nohyiengz ndip, engq mbouj ndaej aeu raemx ma cawj hwj gw; ij baenx duz mbouj buq dungx hwj hangq gw.
Mbouj ndaej lw daengz ngoenz daixngeih daihcaeux; hauhnaeuz lw daengz ngoenz daixngeih daihcaeux nex, ij aeu feiz ma vueng bae.

Faenhsou gw noh yiengzlwg hih mwhde, ij cug diuz sairwet gaenj hwj, caemh ij daenj haiz ndei hwj, ndaw fawz caemhcaiq dawz faexdwngx ndei hwj guh ndei cwnjbiq, caemh ij vaiqdi vaiqdi gw cij ndaej. Gij neix dwg Yehhozvaz dih aen ciet Bienqgoqbae.

“Aenvih ngwnz mwnq gou ij bae lieb cenz Ngaihgiz, dawz Ngaihgiz sojmiz dih lwgdaeuz, mboujguenj vunz haj cixnaeuz doengh duz cukseng, cungj ij gajrai liux bae. Gou dwg Yehhozvaz; gou yienghneix guh, couh ndaej cingqmingz gyoengqde dih cwnz mij'z yungh, mbouj ndaej baujhuq gyoengqde.
Gij lwed gwnz begdou couh dwg geiqhauh faenhsou soj youq dih ranz. Gou baex raen lwed couh bienq goq faenhsou bae; gou gaj gij lwgdaeuz Ngaihgiz mwhde, mbouj ngaiz haih daengz faenhsou law.
“Faenhsou ijaeu geiqniemh ngoenz neix, vih Yehhozvaz souj aen ciet neix, yungjyenj dingh roengzma. Faenhsou seiqseiq daihdaih cungj ij souj aen ciet neix.”

Yehhozvaz vanzlij caiq naeuz: “Youq ndaw caet ngoenz neix, faenhsou mbouj ndaej gw gij fat goq dih bingj. Ngoenz daixdaeuz, faenhsou dawz ndaw ranz sojmiz dih yauqmuj gveng deuz liux bae. Youq ndaw caet ngoenz ndaw de, hauhnaeuz miz vunz gw gij bingj fat goq he, couh ij ngaiz daj ndaw minzcuz Hijswzlez boenq okbae, mbouj suenq aen minzcuz Hijswzlez dih vunz.
Daixit ngoenz caeuq daixcaet ngoenz, faenhsou ij doxcomz hwj baiq gou. Ndaw song ngoenz neix, caenhgag cawzok ndaej cwnjbiq gij gw he, sojmiz dih hong cungj mbouj ndaej guh.

“Faenhsou ij souj aen ciet Cawz Yauqmuj neix; aenvih gou dwg youq aen ciet neix hih ngoenz daixdaeuz he daiq gyoengq vunz Hijswzlez ok Ngaihgiz ma, sojhij faenhsou ijaeu souj ngoenz neix, dingh ngoenz neix ma guh seiqseiq daihdaih yungjyenj dih gveihdingq.
Dajlwh ndwen daixdaeuz cibseiq hauh haemh de, itcig daengz ngeihcib it hauh haemh de,

Youq caet ngoenz ndaw de, gak vunz ndaw ranz bonjfaenh mboujcwnj miz yauqmuj; famz youq ndaw caet ngoenz neix gw fat goq dih doxgaiq, mboujlwnh bouxlawz, lingh aen minzcuz dih vunz cix ndaej, aen minzcuz bonjfaenh cix ndaej, cungj ij ngaiz daj mwnq dieg Hijswzlez vunz boenq okbae.
Youq mwnq faenhsou youq hih mwnq, miz fat goq dih doxgaiq, faenhsou cungj mbouj ndaej gw.”
Yiengq, Mohsih couh heuh gij vunz Hijswzlez gangj vah couh baenz he daeuj, doiq gyoengqde naeuz:
Gaj le, couh aeu gaem nywjvaiz he, aeu ma yomx haeuj ndaw buenz lwed yiengz bae le, couh hoz haeuj
aenvih Yehhozvaz ij lieb cenz Ngaihgiz, ij gaj
“Gij neix faenhsou caeuq doengh daih gajlaeng faenhsou cungj ij yungjyenj soenhsouj.
Baezneix, faenhsou bae daengz Yehhozvaz baujcingq soengq hawj faenhsou dih mwnq dieg mwnq nex, caemh ij soenhsouj, caemh ij ciuq yienghneix guh.
Hauhnaeuz heij lwg faenhsou cam naeuz: ‘Yienghneix guh dwg gijmaz iqswh nex?’
faenhsou couh han naeuz: ‘Gij neix couh dwg soengq hawj Yehhozvaz dih ciet Bienqgoqbae guh dajbwiz he. Aenvih mwh gij vunz Hijswzlez youq Ngaihgiz mwhmwnq, de gaj
Gij vunz Hijswzlez dingq le, couh gvih roengzma sax Yehhozvaz.
Yiengq, gyoengqde caemh ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz dih yienghmwnq bae guh lo.

Daengz gyangjngwnz, Yehhozvaz dawz Ngaihgiz sojmiz dih lwgdaeuz cungj gajrai liux; mboujguenj lwg goengjvuengz haj cixnaeuz lwg boux youq ndaw lauz hih vunzfamh, sojmiz dih lwgdaeuz caeuq doengh duz cukseng dih lwgdaeuz cungj ngaiz gaj liux,

guh hwj ngwnz mwnq goengjvuengz caeuq gyoengq gaen henz ndang de hah, gyoengq hoiq de hah, gyoengq beksingq de hah cungj singj hwj hwnq liux. Baenx cenz guek Ngaihgiz cungj cenznaengz sing daej vunzrai; mij saek ranz naeuz mij vunz rai.
Ngwnz mwnq, goengjvuengz heuh Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz bae, doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Vaiq bae bax! Faenhsou caeuq doenghheij vunz Hijswzlez,

Gajlaeng, gij vunz Ngaihgiz caenhrox ci, caenhrox ci gij vunz Hijswzlez, ci gyoengqde vaiqdi daj ndaw guek gyoengqde ok ma. Gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou caiq mbouj vaiqdi ok maj nex, gyoengqraeuz cungj ij ngaiz rai liux bae.”
Yiengq gij vunz Hijswzlez couh dawz ngauq mienh mijyaengz fat goq he coux haeuj ndaw buenz gaenx mienh bae, caemh aeu buh ma duk hwj, couh gwed hwnj gwnz hongzmbaq bae.
Gyoengqde caemh ciuq Mohsih raengq hih yienghmwnq bae guh, laeng gij vunz Ngaihgiz aeu gim hah, ngaenz hah, buh hah.

Yehhozvaz sawj gij vunz Ngaihgiz yawjhwnj gij vunz Hijswzlez; gij vunz Hijswzlez heuh gyoengqde aeu gijmaz, gyoengqde couh hawj gijmaz. Couh yienghneix, gij vunz Hijswzlez couh dangq ndaej dajlaeng gyoengqde dued aeu gij saizcanj gyoengqde lo.
Gajlaeng gij vunz Hijswzlez couh dajlwh Lanzswz byaij bae Suhgoz. Cawzok vunzbaz caeuq lwgngez, caenhgag vunzsai daihgaiq miz roekcib fanh vunz.
Caemh miz lingh aen minzcuz hih vunz, caeuq yiengzyiengz cwzcwz cungj caemh caeuq gyoengqde bae.

Aenvih gyoengqde dajlwh Ngaihgiz ngaiz boenq okma daiq gaenjgib lai, mbouj ndaej cwnjbiq gijmaz doxgaiq gw, caenhgag miz daj Ngaihgiz daiq okma hih mij fat goq hih ngauq mbamienh gaenx ndei ndaej aeu ma hangq hah, cik hah hwj gw yw iek sat lo.
Gij vunz Hijswzlez youq Ngaihgiz youq baenx seiqbak samcib bi.
Ngamqngamq muenx seiqbak samcib bi dih ngoenz mwnq, Yehhozvaz daiq sojmiz hih Hijswzlez minzcuz daj Ngaihgiz okma.
Youq ngwnz mwnq, cungj dwg Yehhozvaz hen gyoengqde baenxngwnz, dwg de dajlwh Ngaihgiz daiq gyoengqde okma dih ngwnz, sojhij gij vunz Hijswzlez seiqseiq daihdaih cungj ij geiqniemh ngwnz neix.
Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz naeuz: “Ciet Bienqgoqbae dih gveihdingq dwg yienghneix: Lingh aen minzcuz dih vunz cungj mboujcwnj gw ciet Bienqgoqbae dih yiengzlwg.
Hoeng, gij vunz yungh ngaenz cawx ma hih hoiq, caemh youq gwnz ndang de gozlij goq dih vunz ndaej gw.
Camqciz doz youq mwnq dieg mwnq dih vunz, caeuq
“Gw hih mwhde, ij youq ndaw ranz gw; mbouj ndaej dawz ok rog bae. Gij ndok duz yiengzlwg, it diuz ndok cungj mbouj ndaej dwg raek.
“Sojmiz dih Hijswzlez vunz cungj ij souj aen ciet neix.

Hauhnaeuz miz boux lingh aen minzcuz hih vunz he youq mwnq faenhsou mwnq youq, caemh nyienh'eiq souj Yehhozvaz dih aen ciet Bienqgoqbae, yiengq, ndaw ranz de sojmiz dih vunzsai cungj ij gozlij, gajlaeng cij ndaej luj gij vunz Hijswzlez ityiengh souj ciet Bienqgoqbae. Mbouj gozlij dih vunz cungj mbouj ndaej gw ciet Bienqgoqbae dih yiengzlwg.
Mboujguenj Hijswzlez vunz haj cixnaeuz lingh aen minzcuz doz youq he dih vunz, cungj ij soenhsouj gij gveihdingq neix.”
Gajlaeng sojmiz dih Hijswzlez vunz cungj ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz hih yienghmwnq bae guh.
Gajlaeng, Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih naeuz:
“Hijswzlez vunz hih doenghheij lwgdaeuz he, mboujguenj vunz haj cixnaeuz doengh duz cukseng, cungj dwg gou he, ij gvi hawj gou.”

Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih yienghneix naeuz le, Mohsih couh doiq gij vunz Hijswzlez naeuz: “Faenhsou ijaeu ndaejgeiq ngoenz neix; ngoenz neix dwg Yehhozvaz yungh gij akak rengzrengz de dajlaeng Ngaihgiz daiq faenhsou okma, dwg hawj faenhsou ndaej duet ok guh hoiq dih ngoenz neix. Ngoenz neix faenhsou mbouj ndaej gw gij fat goq dih bingj.
Faenhsou dwg youq ndwen Yaqbiz dih ngoenz neix dajlwh Ngaihgiz ok ma he.

Baezneix Yehhozvaz ij daiq faenhsou bae daengz mwnq dieg Gyahnamz vunz hah, Hwz vunz hah, Yaqmohliq vunz hah, Hihveiq vunz hah, caeuq Yehbuqswh vunz hah youq hih mwnq dieg mwnq bae, couh dwg de yiengq cojgoeng faenhsou baujcingq goq hih mwnq dieg gvangq yubyub, doem cix biz he, ndaem gogo cungj baenz he dih mwnq dieg mwnq bae. Daengz mwhmwnq, faenhsou moix it bi dih ndwen neix cungj ij souj aen ciet neix.
Youq caet ngoenz ndaw de, faenhsou caenhgag ndaej gw mij fat goq dih bingj. Daengz daixcaet ngoenz, faenhsou ij souj aen ciet neix hwj geiqniemh Yehhozvaz.
Caet ngoenz neix faenhsou ij gw mij fat goq dih bingj; youq dieg faenhsou mboujcwnj raen miz fat goq dih bingj, caemh mboujcwnj raen miz yauqmuj.
“Daengz ngoenz mwnq, faenhsou ij naeuz gij lwglan faenhsou ni, naeuz: ‘Vih ij geiqniemh Yehhozvaz daj Ngaihgiz gouq gou okma hwj gyoengqraeuz couh ij yienghneix guh.’

Souj aen ciet neix couh dwg ij daezsingj faenhsou, caemh lujnaeuz youq gwnz fawz faenhsou geiq miz gijmaz geiqhauh hwj, caeuq youq najbyak faenhsou geiq miz gijmaz geiqhauh hwj, sawj faenhsou siengzseiz dawz gij fazliz Yehhozvaz dauh youq ndaw bak, aenvih Yehhozvaz yungh gij akak rengzrengz de daj Ngaihgiz gouq faenhsou okma.
Sojhij faenhsou moix it bi, daengz mwhde cungj ij soenhsouj gij gveihdingq neix.
“Yehhozvaz yiengq faenhsou caeuq cojgoeng faenhsou baujcingq goq ij daiq faenhsou bae dieg Gyahnamz, dawz mwnq dieg mwnq soengq hawj faenhsou.
Daengz mwhmwnq, faenhsou ij dawz sojmiz dih lwgdaeuz vunzsai, caeuq doengh duz cukseng hih duz daeg daeuz he cungj ij gvi hawj Yehhozvaz.

Hoeng, hauhnaeuz dwg duz lawzdaeg daeuz hih, cungj ij aeu yiengzlwg ma cueg. Hauhnaeuz mbouj cueg nex, couh ij ngaiz doh raek gij hoz duz lawzdaeg. Youq doengh daeglwg faenhsou ndaw de, dwg lwgdaeuz hih cungj ij cueg ma.

“Baezneix, doengh daeglwg mwngz cam mwngz naeuz: ‘Gij neix dwg gijmaz iqswh?’ yiengq mwngz couh naeuz: ‘Yehhozvaz yungh gij akak rengzrengz de dajlaeng gyoengqraeuz youq Ngaihgiz guh hoiq hih mwnq daiq gyoengqraeuz okma.

Mwhmwnq, goengjvuengz Ngaihgiz ngengh mbouj coengq gyoengqraeuz okma, yiengq, Yehhozvaz couh dawz Ngaihgiz sojmiz dih lwgdaeuz, mboujguenj vunz haj cixnaeuz doengh duz cukseng, cungj gajrai liux. Sojhij gou couh aeu sojmiz hih doengh duz cukseng hih lwgdaeuz daeg ma guh dajbwiz hawj Yehhozvaz. Hoeng, lwg vunzsai daeuz cungj ij cueg ma.

Gyoengqraeuz soenhsouj gij gveihdingq neix dwg daezsingj gyoengqraeuz, caemh luj youq gwnz fawz caeuq najbyak geiq miz gijmaz geiqhauh hwj ityiengh, hawj gyoengqraeuz ndaejgeiq dwg Yehhozvaz yungh gij akak rengzrengz de ma daiq gyoengqraeuz dajlwh Ngaihgiz okma.’”

Goengjvuengz coengq gij vunz Hijswzlez okma hih mwhde, Yehhozvaz mij daiq gyoengqde byaij goq diuz roen gaenh mwnq bae (diuz roen gaenh neix dwg goq gij dieg gij vunz Feihliqswq he), engq daiq gyoengqde byaij goq daixlingh mbiengj bae lah. Yehhozvaz de naeuz: “Hoengjlau gij beksingq gou roeb daengz hoenxciengq le, couh ienq hwj dauqlaeng maj Ngaihgiz boiz nej.”
Sojhij Cangqdiq couh daiq gij vunz de gvax goq diuz roen ndoi he, bae daengz henz haij miz em lai he.

Mohsih caemh daiq gij ndok Yozswz okma, aenvih Yozswz hawj gij vunz Hijswzlez baujcingq goq, naeuz: “Cangqdiq itdingh daeuj gouq faenhsou. Daengz mwhmwnq, faenhsou itdingh ij daiq gij ndok gou caeuq faenhsou maj.”
Yiengq, gyoengqde daj Suhgoz gaihcij okdin bae, youq henz ndoi mwnq heuh Hijdangj he cap yingz youq.

Doengxngoenz Yehhozvaz youq ndaw fwj; gij fwj luj diuz saeu he daiq roen hawj gyoengqde. Doengxngwnz Yehhozvaz youq ndaw feiz; gij feiz luj diuz saeu he ciuq roen hawj gyoengqde, hawj gyoengqde singjngwnz cungj ndaej byaij roen.
Doengxngoenz diuz saeu fwj, doengxngwnz diuz saeu feiz cungj mbouj liz dangqnaj gyoengqde.
Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih naeuz:
“Mwngz bae raengq gij vunz Hijswzlez, hawj gyoengqde byaij dauqlaeng, bae mwnq heuh Mizdoz caeuq haij hih cungqgyan de, youq dangqnaj Bij-Hahhihluz gaenh Bahliz-Sijfaenh he cap yingz youq,
hawj goengjvuengz Ngaihgiz naemqnaeuz gij vunz Hijswzlez ngaiz cahmoz dangj naj le ngaiz loengj roen lah.

Gou ij hawj aen sim goengjvuengz gyeng hwnjdaeuj caiq akeuq hwj caeuq gyoengq bing de ok daeuj boenq faenhsou. Daengz mwhmwnq, gou couh ndaej youq laeng de caeuq gyoengq bing de mwnq yienh ok gij ak gou, ndaej hawj gou najrongh. Yiengq gij vunz Ngaihgiz couh rox gou dwg Yehhozvaz.” Yiengq, gij vunz Hijswzlez caemh ciuq de soj raengq hih yienghmwnq bae guh lo.

Goengjvuengz dingqri naeuz gij vunz Hijswzlez gaenq deuz lo le, de caeuq doengh boux gaen henz ndang de couh gaij gij cawjeiq gyoengqde lo, couh naeuz: “Gyoengqraeuz guxmaz ij coengq gij vunz Hijswzlez nej? Coengq gyoengqde le, baezneix bouxlawz daeuj swqhaeuh gyoengqraeuz nej?”
Yehhozvaz vanzlij hawj aen sim goengjvuengz cix gyeng cix akeuq,

Gyoengq bing Ngaihgiz, lienz cenqmaj hah, ci hoenxciengq hah, caeuq bingmax hah cungj bae boenq gij vunz Hijswzlez, boenq daengz gyoengqde cap yingz youq hih henz haij mwnq gaenh Bij-Hahhihluz caeuq Bahliz-Sijfaenh hih mwnq.
Gyoengq vunz Hijswzlez baex raen goengjvuengz caeuq gyoengq bing de boenq daeuj le, cungj lau hwj dungxmbouq ndangsaenz liux, vaiqdi hemq Yehhozvaz gouz

Gajlaeng, gyoengqde vanzlij doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Nanzdauh youq Ngaihgiz mij dieg ndaej moek gyoengqraeuz maz? Vihmaz ij daiq gyoengqraeuz daeuj daengz rogndoi neix soengqrai nej? Mwngz yawj lux! Mwngz guh gijmaz saeh ndei nex, daiq gyoengqraeuz daj Ngaihgiz okma!
Gyoengqraeuz youq Ngaihgiz mbouj dwg naeuz mwngz ni goq lo maz? Gyoengqraeuz cingxnyienh youq Ngaihgiz swqhaeuh gyoengqde; guh hoiq giengz goq rai youq rogndoi neix!”
Yiengq, Mohsih han gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou gaejyungh lau! Gaejyungh luenh riq! Yawjyawj Yehhozvaz ngoenz neix baenzlaw gouq faenhsou! Faenhsou caemh mbouj caiq raen gij vunz Ngaihgiz laem lo.
Yehhozvaz de ij vih faenhsou hwj gux hoenxciengq he. Faenhsou caenhrox dingh youq sat lo, gaej hemq.”
Gajlaeng Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz vihmaz gouz gou nej? Mwngz hawj gij vunz Hijswzlez byaij doxbae.

Yingx diuz faexbien mwngz hwnjdaeuj, yinx haeuj ndaw haij bae. Gij raemx haij couh faen song mbiengj hwj miz ndaek lueng he lo. Gij vunz Hijswzlez couh roengz ndaw haij bae, daj mwnq hawq he byaij goq bae.

Gou ij hawj gij vunz Ngaihgiz akeuq caiq simgyeng le, roengz ndaw haij bae boenq faenhsou. Hoeng, gou ij hawj goengjvuengz caeuq gyoengq bing de hah, ci hoenxciengq de hah, gyoengq bingmax de hah, rox gou giengz goq gyoengqde, ak goq gyoengqde; yiengq gou couh ndaej miz naj.
Gou hoenxbaih gyoengqde mwhmwnq, gij vunz Ngaihgiz couh rox gou dwg Yehhozvaz lo.”
Bouxcai Cangqdiq gaxgonq byaij youq dangqnaj gyoengq Hijswzlez daiq roen, seizneix cienq goqma byaij youq baixlaeng. Diuz saeu fwj caemh daj dangqnaj cienq goq baixlaeng ma lo,

cienq goqma gek gij vunz Ngaihgiz caeuq gij vunz Hijswzlez hwj, hawj gij vunz Ngaihgiz youq ndaw laep, dauqfanj rongh hawj gij vunz Hijswzlez, guh hwj baenxngwnz, song mbiengj cungj mbouj ndaej doxgaenh.

Yiengq Mohsih couh iet fawz yiengq ndaw haij bae, Yehhozvaz couh fan raq rumz doeng hunghung rengzrengz he, ci baenxngwnz, ci hawj gij raemx haij doiq faen song mbiengj bae, ndaej raen gij daej haij hawq bae.
Gij vunz Hijswzlez couh roengz ndaw haij bae, byaij mwnq hawq de. Gij raemx haij lujnaeuz song ngauh ciengz nwih, lanz youq song mbiengj gyoengqde.
Gij vunz Ngaihgiz boenq gyoengqde hih cenqmaj hah, ci hoenxciengq hah, caeuq bingmax hah cungj roengz ndaw haij bae.
Daengz doengxhaet ranz fuemxluemj mwhde, Yehhozvaz daj ndaw diuz saeu feiz yawj gyoengq bing Ngaihgiz,

caiq hawj gij ci hoenxciengq gyoengqde loem roengz ndaw naez bae, hoj gyingj bae. Yiengq gij vunz Ngaihgiz couh naeuz: “Gyoengqraeuz doiq dauqlaeng bax! Mboujyungh caeuq gyoengq Hijswzlez hoenxciengq lo! Yehhozvaz bang gyoengqde hoenx gyoengqraeuz hwj!”

Yehhozvaz caiq doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz iet fawz yiengq ndaw haij bae, hawj gij raemx haij doiqyungz hob boiz, hawj raemx dumh muenx goq gij vunz Ngaihgiz caeuq doenghheij ci hoenxciengq, doenghheij bingmax gyoengqde bae.”

Mohsih couh iet fawz yiengq ndaw haij bae; ranzrongh mwhde, gij raemx youh doiqyungz luj gaxgonq boiz lo. Gij vunz Ngaihgiz ijsiengj daj ndaw raemx hwnj ma, hoeng, cungj ngaiz Yehhozvaz nyoengx gyoengqde laemx youq ndaw haij liux.
Raemx haij hob boiz, dumh muenx gyoengq bing Ngaihgiz, ci hoenxciengq caeuq gyoengq bingmax, it boux cungj mbouj lw, rai liux.
Hoeng, gij vunz Hijswzlez byaij goq ndaw haij mwnq hawq de, gij raemx haij youq song mbiengj gyoengqde luj song ngauh ciengz nwih.
Ngoenz mwnq, Yehhozvaz daiq gij vunz Hijswzlez dajlaeng gij vunz Ngaihgiz gouq okma hih mwhde, gij vunz Hijswzlez raen gij seihaiz gyoengq vunz Ngaihgiz baij lexleh youq henz hamq haij.
Mwh gij vunz Hijswzlez yawjraen Yehhozvaz yungh gij akak rengzrengz de ma hoenxhingz gyoengq Ngaihgiz le, gyoengqde couh lau Yehhozvaz, caemh sinq de, caeuq sinq Mohsih bouxhoiq de.
Gajlaeng, Mohsih caeuq gij vunz Hijswzlez ciengq go haenh Yehhozvaz naeuz:
Gou ij ciengq go haenh Yehhozvaz,
Aenvih de gvanghyungz dih cingqliq lo;
De dawz cenqmaj caeuq bingmax gveng roengz ndaw haij bae.
Yehhozvaz dwg gou dih rengz, dwg gou ciengq dih go;
De gouq gou.
De dwg gou dih Cangqdiq;
Gou ij haenh de.
De dwg Cangqdiq daxboh gou;
Gou ij soenhgingq de, sungzbaiq de.
Yehhozvaz dwg boux bing ak;
Gij coh de dwg Yehhozvaz.
Goengjvuengz dih ci hoenxciengq caeuq bing,
Yehhozvaz gaenq gveng roengz ndaw haij bae,
Caemh dawz ceiq ak hih bing caem roengz ndaw haij bae.
Haij laeg raemx dumh muenx gyoengqde;
Gyoengqde caenh luj rin doek roengz daej haij bae.
Yehhozvaz hax, gij fawz mwngz miz rengz dangqmaz,
Rengz ndaej dawz dizyinz hoenxbaih liux.
Mwngz ak dangqmaz,
Hoenxfan gij vunz daeuj gung mwngz he.
Mwngz ndatheiq dangq feiz,
Gyemz gyoengqde dangq gyemz nyangj.
Mwngz baex diemheiq,
Raemx couh ndaej biu hwnjdaeuj, luj caep ngauh ciengz;
Song mbiengj raemx haij giet gyeng dangqmaz.
Dizyinz naeuz: “Gou ij boenq gyoengqde, gaemh dawz gyoengqde,
Ij faen aeu gij gyadangq gyoengqde,
Couh ndaej hab'eiq habhoz gou.
Gou ij aeu giemq ma met gyoengqde.”
Hoeng,
Raemx haij couh dumh muenx gyoengqde;
Gyoengqde couh luj dozcaengh doek raemx yienghmwnq caem roengz haij bae.
Yehhozvaz hax, miz maz cwnz ndaej luj mwngz,
Luj mwngz yienghmwnq miz vi najrongh,
Hawj vunz haenh, hawj vunz lau,
Ndaej guh gij geizmiuj he?
Mwngz baex iet fawz,
Lajdeih couh gyan gyoengqde.
Mwngz yungh gij aiq mwngz,
Daiq mwngz soj cueg ma hih vunz;
Mwngz yungh gij akak rengzrengz mwngz,
Daiq gyoengqde bae daengz mwnq mwngz youq he.
Lingh aen minzcuz hih vunz dingqri couh simvueng saenz dedded;
Feihliqswq vunz simnyap you fubfub caemh hojyouq.
Mwhmwnq, Hijdungh dih cuzcangj lau raixcaix,
Mohyaz dih inghyungz saenz dedded.
Gij vunz Gyahnamz lau hwj mbeilek bae,
Gyoengqde caenhrox dungxmbouq caeuq mbeilek.
Yehhozvaz hax, aenvih gij akak rengzrengz mwngz,
Gyoengqde luj ngauq rin, mbouj ndaej doenghdanh,
Yawj myoegmyoeg, yawj gij vunz mwngz goq bae,
Daengj gij vunz mwngz soj cueg ma hih goq bae.
Mwngz daiq gij vunz mwngz bae daengz aen bya mwngz youq,
Yehhozvaz hax, couh dwg mwnq dieg mwngz cauh hih youq hih,
Bouxcawj gou hax, couh dwg mwnq dieg mwngz soj laeb ma youq dih dieg.
Yehhozvaz hax, mwngz yungjyenj dwg guh vuengz!

Mohsih gyoengqde yienghneix ciengq, dwg aenvih gyoengqde daj mwnq daej haij bienq hawq he byaij, hoeng, Ngaihgiz hih doenghheij ci hah, max hah, bingmax hah roengz bae daengz ndaw haij le, Yehhozvaz couh hawj raemx haij doiqyungz hob boiz, dumh muenx gyoengqde.
Gajlaeng, cenz gij vah Cangqdiq hih Meijliqnganh, daxce Yaqlwnz, ndaw fawz de dawz gyong hwj, miz baenx gyoengq vunzbaz caemh dawz gyong hwj gaenhangx de, doq ndaek doq diuquj.
Meijliqnganh ciengq naeuz:
Faenhsou ij haenh Yehhozvaz,
Aenvih de hoenxhingz lo!
Gyoengq max caeuq bingmax
Cungj ngaiz de gveng roengz haij bae lo.
Mohsih daiq gij vunz Hijswzlez daj ndaw haij miz em lai mwnq bae daengz rogndoi Cuh'wj, youq rogndoi byaij baenx sam ngoenz, cungj cimh mij raen miz raemx
itcig bae daengz Majlah, hoeng, gij raemx mwnqde dwg haemz he, mbouj ndaej gw. Aenvih gij raemx mwnq haemz, mbouj ndaej gw, yiengq, couh heuh mwnq dieg mwnq heuh Majlah.
Gyoengq vunzlai couh ienq Mohsih naeuz: “Gyoengqraeuz ij gw gijmaz nex?”
Gajlaeng, Mohsih couh heuhgouz Yehhozvaz. Yehhozvaz couh hawj de raen miz ngefaex he; de couh dawz ngefaex neix ma gveng roengz ndaw raemx bae. Yiengq gij raemx couh bienq diemz, ndaej gw lo.
Gij neix dwg Yehhozvaz youq mwnq sawq gyoengqde. Gajlaeng de caemh dingh gveihdingq hawj gyoengqde;

de naeuz: “Hauhnaeuz faenhsou naeuzdingq, gaengj dingq gij vah gou, faenhsou dih Cangqdiq, caemh guh gij saeh gou nginhnaeuz deng hih, soenhsouj gou dih mingqlingq hih, gou couh mbouj aeu gij fad hawj gij vunz Ngaihgiz hih doenghheij bingh mwnq ma fad faenhsou, aenvih gou dwg yw faenhsou dih Yehhozvaz.”
Gajlaeng gyoengqde bae daengz Hijlinz, mwnq miz cibngeih aen mboq caeuq caetcib go faex hung gij mbaw de luj mbaw bingqbeiz he. Gyoengqde couh youq henz mboq mwnq cap yingz youq.

Sojmiz hih Hijswzlez vunz daj Hijlinz bae daengz mwnq rogndoi heuh Swnq he; mwnqneix dwg Hijlinz caeuq Sihnaiq dih cungqgyan he. Mwhneix caemh dwg ngamqluj gyoengqde daj Ngaihgiz ok ma hih ndwen daixngeih dih daixcibhaj ngoenz.
Gyoengqde bae daengz mwnq le, couh ienq Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz naeuz:

“Gyoengqraeuz cingxnyienh youq Ngaihgiz miz noh miz bingj gw hwj rai youq ndaw fawz Yehhozvaz huhluh; seizneix faenhsou daiq gyoengqraeuz ok ma daengz rogndoi neix, ijsiengj hawj gyoengqraeuz rai iek hajx!”

Gajlaeng Yehhozvaz dingqri doenghgij vah neix le, couh doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Gou ij daj gwnzmbwn coengq gij gw he roengzdaeuj hawj faenhsou. Gij vunz Hijswzlez ngoenznaengz cungj ij ok bae nyaeb gaeuq ngoenz mwnq ij gw he. Gou ij yungh cungj fap neix ma sawqsawq gyoengqde, yawjyawj gyoengqde dingq mbouj dingq gij vah gou.
Daengz daixroek ngoenz, gyoengqde ij nyaeb gaeuq gw song ngoenz.”
Couh yienghneix, Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz couh doiq gij vunz Hijswzlez naeuz: “Daengz haemhneix, faenhsou couh rox dwg Yehhozvaz daiq faenhsou daj Ngaihgiz ok ma lo.
Daengz ngoenzcog daihcaeux, faenhsou couh yawjraen Yehhozvaz hih gij akak rengzrengz de, aenvih de gaenq rox faenhsou ienq de lo. Raeuz suenq maz? Faenhsou ienq raeuz aeu?”

Mohsih caiq naeuz: “Doengxhaemh Yehhozvaz swhmboujyienz hawj noh hawj faenhsou gw; doengxhaet de caemh swhmboujyienz hawj gij gw hawj faenhsou gw imq, aenvih de gaenq dingqri faenhsou ienq de lo. Raeuz suenq maz? Gizsaed faenhsou gaenhbaenj mbouj dwg ienq raeuz, dwg ienq Yehhozvaz lah!”
Gajlaeng Mohsih couh doiq Yaqlwnz naeuz: “Mwngz bae naeuz sojmiz hih Hijswzlez vunz ni, hawj gyoengqde daeuj gaenh dangqnaj Yehhozvaz hwj, aenvih Yehhozvaz gaenq dingqri gyoengqde ienq lo.”
Mwh Yaqlwnz doiq gyoengq vunzlai gangj vah hih mwhde, sawqmwh gij ronghndongq Yehhozvaz youq ndaw fwj myig okdaeuj, guh hwj gyoengq vunzlai ngeux raeuj yawj ok rogndoi bae.
Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih naeuz:

“Gou gaenq dingqri gij vunz Hijswzlez ienq lo. Mwngz naeuz gyoengqde ni: ‘Daengz yiengqhaemh, faenhsou couh miz noh gw; daengz doengxhaet, caemh miz gij gw hawj faenhsou gaeuq gw. Yienghmwnq faenhsou couh rox gou dwg Yehhozvaz, faenhsou dih Cangqdiq lo.’”
Couh yienghneix, daengz doengxhaemh, couh miz baenxbienh baenxbienh roeganhcwnz mbin daeuj, lai hwj cungj ndaej goemq baenx aen yingz liux bae. Doengxhaet, seiqhenz yingz roengzraiz hwj rim bae.
Gij raiz hwnj fwi liux le, couh raen miz baenx benq baenx benq mbang mbingqmbingq bieg supsup luj mwi nwih, youq lajdoem bijhuzcih bae.
Yiengq, gij vunz Hijswzlez raen le, mbouj rox dwg gijmaz, cungj gag doxcam naeuz: “Gij neix dwg gijmaz hax?”
Gajlaeng, Mohsih couh han gyoengqde naeuz: “Gij neix couh dwg Yehhozvaz hawj faenhsou hih bingj hah.
Yehhozvaz caemh raengq goq: ‘Faenhsou ij ciuq ndaw cangqbungz faenhsou miz geijlai vunz, gak vunz gw ndaej geijlai ma nyaeb, moix it boux ndaej nyaeb song cingh.’”
Gajlaeng, gij vunz Hijswzlez caemh yienghneix guh lo. Mbangj nyaeb ndaej lai di, mbangj nyaeb ndaej noix di,

hoeng, daengz mwh rau he, nyaeb lai hih caemh mbouj lw, nyaeb noix hih caemh ngamq gaeuq. Moix it boux nyaeb ndaej hih caemh ngamqngamq luj de gw ndaej gaeuq, mbouj lai mbouj noix, ngamqngamq luj letlet.
Mohsih doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Mboujcwnj saek boux diuh daengz ngoenz daixngeih.”
Hoeng, miz mbangj hih vunz mbouj dingq gij vah Mohsih, diuh hwj daengz haet daixngeih. Gij de cungj bienq non bienq haeu liux. Yiengq, Mohsih couh doiq doenghgij vunz neix aeuqheiq ij rai bae.
Couh yienghneix, gij vunz Hijswzlez haetnaengz daihcaeux couh ciuq gak vunz gw ndaej geijlai bae nyaeb, hoeng gyangjngoenz baex cik, gij de cungj siu liux.
Yiengq daengz daixroek ngoenz, gyoengq vunz neix sojmiz hih daeuzdaeuz cungj daeuj naeuz Mohsih ni naeuz: “Gyoengqde nyaeb ndaej baenx song boix, moix it boux seiq cingh.”

Mohsih han doengh boux daeuzdaeuz he naeuz: “Yehhozvaz dwg yienghneix raengq: ‘Ngoenzcog dwg ngoenzyietbaeg, dwg ij souj gou, Yehhozvaz, dih ngoenzyietbaeg. Faenhsou ngoenzneix ij gauj gijmaz hih couh gauj lo, ij cawj gijmaz hih couh cawj lo, loengh ndei hwj diuh daengz ngoenzcog.’”
Yiengq, gyoengqde caemh ciuq Mohsih raengq hih yienghmwnq bae guh, caemh loengh ndei hwj diuh daengz ngoenz daixngeih, caemh mij haeu mij fat non.
Mohsih doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou ngoenzneix couh gw gij neix bax. Aenvih ngoenzneix dwg souj Yehhozvaz dih ngoenzyietbaeg, faenhsou youq ndaw reih cimh mbouj ndaej gij gw law.
Youq roek ngoenz ndaw de, faenhsou cungj nyaeb ndaej gij gw. Caenhgag ngoenz daixcaet, gijmaz doxgw cungj mij miz ndaej nyaeb, aenvih ngoenz neix dwg ngoenzyietbaeg.”
Hoeng, youq ngoenz daixcaet, miz mbangj hih vunz cungj lij ok bae cimh gij doxgw, mboujgoq gyoengqde mij cimh ndaej saek di law.
Yiengq, Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Faenhsou ij daengz seizlawz bae cij gaengj dingq gij vah gou nej?

Faenhsou yawj lux, gou hawj ngoenzyietbaeg hawj faenhsou. Vih yienghneix gou youq daixroek ngoenz soengq hawj faenhsou song ngoenz hih gij gw. Sojhij gou naeuz faenhsou, daengz ngoenz daixcaet, faenhsou gak vunz cungj ij gag youq ranz bonjfaenh, mboujcwnj saek boux ok bae.”
Sojhij gij vunz Hijswzlez youq ngoenz daixcaet cungj mij guh hong.
Cungj gij gw neix, gij vunz Hijswzlez heuh ‘mahnaq’
Mohsih naeuz: “Yehhozvaz dwg yienghneix raengq: ‘Ij coux song cingh mahnaq
Gajlaeng Mohsih doiq Yaqlwnz naeuz: “Dawz aen guenq he daeuj coux song cingh mahnaq hwj, diuh youq mwnq dieg ndei, gek hwnjdaeuj hawj Yehhozvaz he, diuh daengz doengh daih gajlaeng.”
Yaqlwnz ciuq Yehhozvaz baenzlawz raengq Mohsih hih yienghmwnq bae guh; de dawz aen guenq diuh youq mwnq coengq miz doenghgij baengzgawq Yehhozvaz he.
Couh yienghneix, gij vunz Hijswzlez gw baenx seiqcib bi hih mahnaq, itcig daengz gyoengqde bae daengz gaenh dieg Gyahnamz, mwnq miz vunz youq he.
Gyoengq vunz Hijswzlez ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq hih yienghmwnq, dajlwh rogndoi Swnq mwnq byaij bae, baez mwnq baez mwnq senj daengz Liqfeihdingh cap yingz. Hoeng, mwnq dieg mwnq mij raemx ndaej gw.
Yiengq, gyoengq vunz youhcaiq ienq Mohsih naeuz: “Vaiq hawj raemx hawj gyoengqraeuz gw bax!”
Mohsih dingq le, couh doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou vihmaz caiq ienq gou nej? Vihmaz mbouj sinq

Hoeng, gij vunz daiq hozhawq lai, vanzlij ienq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz vihmaz ij daiq gyoengqraeuz daj Ngaihgiz okma, hawj gyoengqraeuz caeuq heij lwg raeuz hah, doenghheij doengh duz cukseng raeuz hah hozhawq ij rai bae nej?”
Mohsih raen yienghneix le, couh heuhgouz Yehhozvaz naeuz: “Gou ij baenzlawz doiq doengh gyoengq vunz neix nej? Gyoengqde aiq ij aeu rin ma ndek gou rai hwx!”
Gajlaeng, Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz dawz diuz faexbien gaxgonq mwngz doh goq diuz dah Nizloz mwnq, caeuq geij boux Hijswzlez vunz gangj vah couh baenz he,

bae Hozlez dih ngauq rin hung mwnq. Youq mwnq gou ij ndwn youq dangqnaj mwngz. Mwngz dawz diuz faexbien moeb roengz ngauq rin hung mwnq bae, ngauq rin hung mwnq couh miz raemx ok daeuj, couh ndaej hawj gyoengq vunz gw lo.” Yiengq, Mohsih couh youq dangqnaj gyoengq vunz gangj vah couh baenz he yienghneix guh lo.
Gajlaeng, Mohsih couh heuh mwnq dieg neix heuh Majsaj.
Gij vunz Yaqmajliz daeuj daengz Liqfeihdingh ij caeuq gij vunz Hijswzlez doxhoenx.
Yiengq, Mohsih doiq Yozcuhyaq naeuz: “Mwngz genj vunz okdaeuj, cwnjbiq caeuq gij vunz Yaqmajliz doxhoenx. Ngoenzcog gou ij dawz diuz faexbien Cangqdiq hwj ndwn youq gwnz dingjbya yawj.”
Yiengq, Yozcuhyaq caemh ciuq Mohsih raengq hih yienghmwnq bae caeuq gij vunz Yaqmajliz doxhoenx. Mohsih, Yaqlwnz caeuq Huqwj cungj youq gwnz dingjbya yawj gyoengqde doxhoenx.
Hauhnaeuz Mohsih seizlawz yingx diuz faexbien de, gij vunz Hijswzlez couh ndaej hingz; seizlawz coengq diuz de, gij vunz Yaqmajliz couh ndaej hingz.

Hoeng, gij fawz Mohsih naet lo. Yiengq, Yaqlwnz caeuq Huqwj couh buen ngauq rin he ma, hawj Mohsih naengh youq gwnz de. Song boux de, it boux youq it mbiengj, raeuz gij fawz de hwj, itcig daengz gyangjngoenz doek.
Couh yienghneix, Yozcuhyaq hoenx ndaej hingz gyoengq Yaqmajliz.

Gajlaeng Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Gou ij cawz gij vunz Yaqmajliz liux bae, cawz hawj gyoengqde youq lajmbwn mij Yaqmajliz gij coh neix bae. Gou gangj hih gij vah neix, mwngz ij sij youq ndaw saw hwj geiq roengzma, hoengjlau lumz bae, caemh naeuz Yozcuhyaq ni.”
Couh vih yienghneix, Mohsih couh caeb aen luz coemh doenghduz hwj dajbwiz he, an coh heuh Yehhozvaz Nezsih
De caemh naeuz: “Yehhozvaz gaenq baujcingq lo, de seiqseiq daihdaih cungj ij caeuq gij vunz Yaqmajliz doxhoenx.”

Goeng boxda Mohsih Yezdwzloz, dieg Mijdenq dih goengjsae dajbwiz, dingqri naeuz Yehhozvaz daiq gij vunz Hijswzlez ok Ngaihgiz ma hih mwhde de baenzlaw bang Mohsih caeuq baenzlaw bang gij vunz Hijswzlez le,
couh daiq mehyah Mohsih caeuq song daeglwg de bae daengz aen bya Cangqdiq. Mehyah de heuh Sihbohlah, couh dwg Mohsih gaxgonq soengq maj laeng boxda de he.
Song daeglwg de, daeg he gij coh de heuh Gwzcwnq
Lingh daeg dwg heuh Hijliqhijseq
Yezdwzloz daiq mehyah Mohsih caeuq song daeglwg de bae daengz aen bya Cangqdiq, couh dwg Mohsih youq aen ndoi cap yingz youq hih mwnq.
Yiengq, Yezdwzloz bae daengz mwnq le, couh sien hawj vunz bae naeuz Mohsih ni naeuz gyoengqde daeuj lo.
Mohsih dingq le, couh ok bae ciep de, sax de, got de. Gajlaeng, gyoengqde caemh doxdongx le, couh haeuj ndaw cangqbungz bae lo.

Mohsih couh gangj naeuz de ni, Yehhozvaz gouq gij vunz Hijswzlez okma hih mwhde, baenzlawz doiq goengjvuengz caeuq baenzlawz doiq gij vunz Ngaihgiz, caeuq gij vunz Hijswzlez youq dangjroen roeb daengz dih nanh hah, Yehhozvaz baenzlaw gouq gyoengqde hah cungj gangj naeuz de ni liux.
Yiengq, de rox naeuz Yehhozvaz dajlwh laeng goengjvuengz Ngaihgiz gouq gij vunz Hijswzlez okma hih mwhde, doiq gij vunz Hijswzlez baenxlai ndei le, cungj angq raixcaix.
De naeuz: “Wnggai haenh Yehhozvaz! Dwg de dajlaeng goengjvuengz caeuq gij vunz Ngaihgiz gouq faenhsou okma!
Seizneix gou rox Yehhozvaz beij sojmiz hih vunz baiq hih cwnz ak, aenvih mwh gij vunz Ngaihgiz hangz caeuq yawj mbouj hwnj gij vunz Hijswzlez hih mwhde, Yehhozvaz gouq gyoengqde ok Ngaihgiz ma.”

Gajlaeng goeng boxda Mohsih couh dawz doengh duz cukseng ij coemh hwj dajbwiz he caeuq doenghgij dajbwiz he bae bwiz Cangqdiq. Yaqlwnz caeuq doengh gyoengq Hijswzlez vunz gangj vah couh baenz he cungj daeuj caeuq goeng boxda Mohsih youq dangqnaj Cangqdiq gw haeux.
Daixngeih ngoenz, Mohsih naengh youq cungqgyan gyoengq vunzlai hwj saemj saeh. Gij vunz lai raixcaix; Mohsih daj doengxhaet buenq daengz doengxhaemh,

Yiengq, goeng boxda de raen yienghneix le, couh doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz vih gyoengq vunzlai banh gijmaz saeh nej? Vihmaz baenx lai vunz, gyoengqde daj doengxhaet daeuj mwnqneix daengj mwngz, hoeng, mwnqneix caenhgag miz mwngz boux dog nej?”
Mohsih han naeuz: “Aenvih gyoengqde daeuj laeng gou dineix gouzcam Cangqdiq.

Gyoengqde song mbiengj miz maz saeh hih, couh daeuj cimh gou buenq hawj gyoengqde, buenq yawj byawz deng byawz mbouj deng. Gou caemh naeuz gyoengqde ni, hawj gyoengqde rox, ij soenhsouj gij gveihdingq Cangqdiq.”
Gajlaeng goeng boxda de naeuz: “Mwngz yienghneix guh mbouj gaeuq ngamj geijlai.
Gij hong neix daiq lai lai; mwngz boux vunz dog banh mbouj liux. Yienghmwnq mwngz caeuq gyoengq vunz cungj ij ngaiz naet hwj dingx mbouj ndaej bae.
Seizneix mwngz dingq gou naeuz, gou ok gij cawjeiq he hawj mwngz; gou muengh Cangqdiq bang mwngz. Mwngz ij bang gij vunz dawz gyoengqde doxgauq doxceng hih saeh cenz naeuz Cangqdiq ni,
caemh ij dawz Cangqdiq dih gveihdingq cenz naeuz gyoengqde ni, son gyoengqde, hawj gyoengqde rox, youq saenghhoz ndaw de ij baenzlawz hengz.

Cawz yienghneix, mwngz caemh ij dajlaeng gyoengq vunz ndaw de genj aeu doengh boux coengjmingz caemh caixhangz he, caemh dwg yawjnaek Cangqdiq, lauxsaed, vunz oet cienz caemh mbouj aeu he hih vunz ma guenj gij vunz Hijswzlez; moix it cien vunz ij miz boux he dungjguenj, cien vunz ndaw de caemh faen bak boux, hajcib boux, cib boux, caemh miz vunz guenj.

Hawj doengh boux vunz neix bang gyoengq vunz buenq saeh. Saeh iq hih, gyoengqde ndaej gag buenq; saeh hung hih cij hawj mwngz buenq. Yienghneix, gyoengqde ndaej bang mwngz dan di he; mwngz couh mbouj baenq dwgrengz lo.

Hauhnaeuz mwngz yienghneix guh, caemh dwg Cangqdiq ij raengq hawj mwngz yienghneix guh he, yienghmwnq mwngz couh mbouj roxnginh naet, gyoengq vunz dih saeh caemh ndaej gaijgyez ndaej vaiq, vunz caemh roxnginh sim'angq.”
Gajlaeng, Mohsih caemh dingq goeng boxda de ok dih cawjeiq, ciuq de soj gangj hih yienghmwnq bae guh lo.
Mohsih couh dajlaeng gyoengq vunz Hijswzlez genj aeu boux coengjmingz caixhangz he, hawj gyoengqde guh cien vunz, bak vunz, hajcib vunz caeuq cib vunz hih boux dang daeuz he.
Gyoengqde caemh bang gyoengq vunz buenq saeh. Roeb daengz gij saeh haemq hoj buenq he, couh gyau hawj Mohsih buenq; gij saeh iq he, gyoengqde couh gag buenq.
Gajlaeng, goeng boxda de couh gag maj dieg bonjfaenh de lo.
Gij vunz Hijswzlez ok Ngaihgiz ma hih daixsam ndwen dih cojit, couh bae daengz aen ndoi Sihnaiq lo.
Gyoengqde daj Liqfeihdingh bae daengz ndoi Sihnaiq, youq laj bya Sihnaiq cap yingz youq.
Gajlaeng Mohsih hwnj bya bae cimh Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq. Yiengq Yehhozvaz daj gwnz bya heuh de naeuz: “Mwngz ij yienghneix naeuz gij vunz Hijswzlez ni, naeuz:
‘Faenhsou gaenq caenra raen gou,

Hauhnaeuz faenhsou dingq gou, soenhsouj gij gou dingh hawj faenhsou he, faenhsou couh suenq dwg gij vunz gou ceiq haenj he. Gannaeuz lajmbwn sojmiz hih cungj dwg gij gou liux lah, hoeng, aenvih faenhsou dwg gou daj gak aen minzcuz senj okdaeuj he,
faenhsou ij gvi hawj gou, guh gij vunz aen guek gou, guh gij vunz dajbwiz gou.’ Doenghgij vah neix mwngz ij naeuz gij vunz Hijswzlez ni.”
Yiengq, Mohsih couh bae heuh gij vunz Hijswzlez gangj vah couh baenz he daeuj doxcomz, dawz gij vah Yehhozvaz raengq de hih naeuz gyoengqde ni.
Gajlaeng
Gajlaeng Mohsih couh maj daengz Yehhozvaz mwnq, ij dawz gij vah gyoengqde hoiz naeuz de ni.

Hoeng, Yehhozvaz youhcaiq doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Gou ij roengz bae laeng mwngz; gou roengz bae hih mwhde, dwg youq ndaw fwj ndaw de hih, dwg ij hawj gij vunz Hijswzlez dingqri gou caeuq mwngz gangj vah, yienghneix hawj gyoengqde baezneix yungjyenj sinq mwngz.” Yehhozvaz yienghneix gangj sat le, Mohsih couh dawz gyoengq vunz gangj hih vah gangj naeuz Yehhozvaz ni.

Yehhozvaz caiq doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz bae naeuz gij vunz Hijswzlez ni, hawj gyoengqde ngoenzneix caeuq ngoenzcog guh ndei cwnjbiq hwj, vanzlij hawj gyoengqde lawh buh saeg buh haem, cwnjbiq ciep gou.
Daengz ngoenzrawz ij cwnjbiq ndei, aenvih ngoenz mwnq, gou, Yehhozvaz, ij daj gwnzmbwn roengz bya Sihnaiq ma hawj vunzlai raen.

Mwngz ij youq seiqhenz bya veh diuz sienq he gek hwnjdaeuj hwj, naeuz gij vunz ni, mbouj ndaej cauhgoq diuz sienq neix, caemh mbouj ndaej hwnj bya bae; bouxlawz dek aen bya neix, couh hawj bouxlawz rai.

Mboujlwnh vunz haj cixnaeuz doengh duz cukseng famh hih, cungj ngaiz dawz bae gajrai. Mbouj ndaej aeu fawz bae mo boux famh mwnq; ij aeu rin ma dub rai cixnaeuz yungh naqgung ma dwk rai. Mwngz ij raengq gyoengqde, hawj gyoengqde youq rog sienq daengj, daengj daengz dingqri miz sing gywnhhauh yiengj raez rangxrangh le, gyoengqde cij ndaej daeuj gaenh doenjbya gaenh diuz sienq mwnq.”
Gajlaeng, Mohsih couh roengz bya bae, naeuz gyoengq vunz ni, hawj gyoengqde guh ndei cwnjbiq, hawj gyoengqde lawh buh saeg buh.
Mohsih doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Daengz daixsam ngoenz ij cwnjbiq ndei, caemh mbouj ndaej dep vunzbaz.”

Couh yienghneix, daengz daixsam ngoenz dih doengxhaet daihcaeux, gwnz bya byajmyig, byajraez, gij fwj fan foedfoed, gij sing gywnhhauh mwnq yiengj gog saxsax. Gij vunz ndaw cangqbungz dingq le, cungj lau hwj saenz dedded liux.
Yiengq Mohsih couh daiq gyoengq vunz okdaeuj daengz laj dinbya cimh Cangqdiq.
Baenx cenz bya Sihnaiq cungj hoenz ngaujngauq fan foedfoed, luj oenq yiuz nwih, aenvih Yehhozvaz caeuq feiz roengz daeuj gwnz bya, guh hwj baenx aen bya cungj doengh fwenxfwenx bae.
Gij sing yiengj mwnq yied yiengj yied gog. Couh youq mwhneix, Mohsih couh caeuq Cangqdiq gangj vah; Cangqdiq couh yungh gij sing luj byajraez he ma dap de.
Yehhozvaz roengz daengz gwnz dingj bya Sihnaiq le, couh heuh Mohsih hwnj gwnz dingjbya bae; Mohsih couh hwnj bya bae.
Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz roengz bae naeuz gyoengq vunz ni, mbouj ndaej roemx cauhgoq diuz sienq daeuj yawj gou, hoengjlau gyoengqde rai vunz daiq lai lai.
Caemh hawj doengh boux cenmonz guh dajbwiz mwnq cwnjbiq ndei, caemh ij swiq cengh bonjfaenh hwj daeuj gaenh gou; mbouj nex, gou lienz gyoengqde cungj gaj.”

Gajlaeng, Mohsih doiq Yehhozvaz naeuz: “Gyoengq vunz mbouj roemx cauhgoq diuz sienq hwnj bya daeuj law, aenvih mwngz gaenq gingjgauq goq raeuz, ij youq seiqhenz bya veh sienq gek hwnjdaeuj, hawj aen bya neix suenq dwg aen bya dwzbez he lo.”

Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz roengz maj bax, roengz maj daiq Yaqlwnz itheij hwnj daeuj, hoeng, gyoengq vunz caeuq doengh boux cenmonz guh dajbwiz he mbouj ndaej cauhgoq diuz sienq mwnq hwnj daeuj daengz dangqnaj gou, hoengjlau gou sawqmwh gaj gyoengqde.”
Yiengq Mohsih couh roengz ma, dawz gij vah Yehhozvaz gangj naeuz gij vunz Hijswzlez ni.
Laj neix dwg Cangqdiq soj raengq dih vah:
“Gou dwg Yehhozvaz, mwngz dih Cangqdiq; dwg gou daj Ngaihgiz, couh dwg mwngz youq Ngaihgiz guh hoiq hih mwnq, daiq mwngz okma he.
Cawz gou ok, mwngz mbouj ndaej bae baiq daixlingh boux cwnz.
Mbouj ndaej vih bonjfaenh hwj dik guxmaz you. Mboujguenj dwg gwnzmbwn, lajdeih, ndaw raemx sojmiz dih doeng yiengh sae yiengh, faenhsou cungj mbouj ndaej ciuq gij de ma dik.

Mbouj ndaej baiq gak cungj you, aenvih gou dwg Yehhozvaz, mwngz dih Cangqdiq; gou dwgcaengz caeuq gou doxdoiqdingj hih cwnz. Gij vunz haenq gou hih, gou gaengjdingq ij fad de, simqciq fad daengz sam seiq daih gajlaeng de bae.
Aiq gou hih, soenhsouj gou mingqlingq hih vunz, gou couh ndiep gyoengqde, simqciq ndiep daengz cien daih bae.
Mbouj ndaej luenhbangh yungh gij coh gou, Yehhozvaz, mwngz dih Cangqdiq; bouxlawz luenh yungh Yehhozvaz gij coh neix nex, gou gaengjdingq dingh coih hawj de.
Ij geiqniemh ngoenzyietbaeg dwg ngoenz dwzbez he.
Miz roek ngoenz ndaej guh hong,

hoeng, daixcaet ngoenz dwg gvi hawj gou, Yehhozvaz, mwngz dih Cangqdiq, guh ngoenzyietbaeg. Ngoenz neix mwngz caeuq doenghheij lwg mwngz hah, gij hoiq mwngz hah, doengh duz cukseng mwngz hah, caeuq youq dieg mwngz doz youq hih doenghheij hek hah cungj mbouj ndaej guh saek yiengh hong.

Aenvih roek ngoenz ndaw de, gou cauh mbwn, cauh deih, cauh haij caeuq cauh sojmiz hih; yiengq, daixcaet ngoenz couh yietbaeg lo. Sojhij, gou soengq fuk hawj ngoenz ngoenzyietbaeg, dingh ngoenz neix guh ngoenz dwzbez he.
Mwngz ij yawjdij bohmeh; yienghneix mwngz cij ndaej youq mwnq gou, mwngz dih Cangqdiq, soengq hawj mwngz hih mwnq dieg mwnq ndaej yangjcouq roengzbae ndaej caez.
Caemh mbouj ndaej gaj vunz.
Mbouj ndaej guhyoux.
Mbouj ndaej guxcaeg.
Mbouj ndaej guh gyaj cingqgiq ma bangjlaih vunz.
Mbouj ndaej dam aeu gij gyadangq vunz, caemh mbouj ndaej loeglienh mehyah vunz hah, bouxhoiq vunz hah, cwz hah, lawz hah, caeuq gak cungj doxgaiq.”

Yiengq, caiq dauq gangj daengz gij vunz Hijswzlez youq laj dinbya, gyoengqde dingqri sing byajraez, gij sing gywnhhauh yiengj raez rangxrangh mwnq, caeuq raen byajmyig, raen gwnz bya hoenz ngaujngauq le, cungj lau hwj ndwn youq gyae'gyae, ndang saenz dedded liux.
Yiengq, gyoengqde doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Gouz mwngz
Gajlaeng, Mohsih doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Gaejyungh lau; Cangqdiq daeuj dwg ij gaujniemq faenhsou lah, hawj faenhsou seiqseiz yawjnaek de, dingq de, mbouj guh loek lah.”
Hoeng, gyoengq vunz vanzlij dwg ndwn youq gyae'gyae he; caenhgag Mohsih byaij bae gaenh gij fwj Cangqdiq youq he mwnq lah.
Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz ij naeuz gij vunz Hijswzlez ni, naeuz: ‘Faenhsou gaenq yawjraen gou daj gwnzmbwn caeuq faenhsou gangj vah lo.
Faenhsou caenhgag ndaej gingqbaiq gou; mbouj ndaej aeu gim hah cixnaeuz ngaenz hah ma guh duz you hwj baiq.
