“‘Faenhsou ij aeu naez ma cuk aen luz dajbwiz he hawj gou, aeu ma guh baij doengh duz cwz hah, yiengz hah youq gwnz de coemh hwj bwiz gou, caeuq vih doxhuz hwj bwiz. Gou dingh hawj faenhsou gingqbaiq hih moix it mwnq deixfueng, gou cungj ij bae, caemh ij soengq fuk hawj faenhsou.
Hauhnaeuz faenhsou aeu rin ma caep aen luz dajbwiz hawj gou nex, mbouj ndaej aeu siuq goq hih rin, aenvih siuq goq hih rin dwg mbouj hab aeu ma caep aen luz dajbwiz hih.
Mbouj ndaej caep aen luz dajbwiz miz baenx mbaek maxdaeuz he hawj gou, mienxndaej faenhsou byaij hwnj mbaeklae bae hih mwhde, caeghangx faenhsou ngaiz loh okdaeuj.’
“Mwngz ij dawz gij gveihdingq neix cenz naeuz gij vunz Hijswzlez ni.

“Hauhnaeuz mwngz cawx boux Hihbwzlaiz vunz he ma guh hoiq nex, boux de cij guh hong roek bi hawj mwngz; daengz daixcaet bi, de couh ndaej doiqyungz swqyouz lo, mboujyungh aeu ngaenz daeuj cueg okma lo.

Hauhnaeuz mwh cawx he, dwg caenhgag cawx boux dog lah, yiengq, daengz mwh de ndaej swqyouz hih mwhde, caemh dwg ndaej de boux dog ok ma lah; hauhnaeuz mwh cawx bae he, de daiq miz yah hih, de caemh ndaej daiq mehyah de ok ma.
Hauhnaeuz boux cawx de hih aeu yah hawj de, mehyah de caemh seng miz lwg nex, yiengq mehyah de caeuq gij lwg de cungj dwg gvi hawj bouxcawj mwnq, caenhgag ndaej bonjfaenh de boux dog ok ma lah.
“Hauhnaeuz bouxhoiq bonjfaenh de gag naeuz: ‘Gou haenj bouxcawj gou, caeuq aiq lwg aiq yah gou, mbouj nyienh'eiq gag ok maj,’
yiengq, bouxcawj de couh ij daiq de bae daengz fazguenh
“Hauhnaeuz miz vunz gag hai dahlwg bonjfaenh hawj vunz guh hoiq nex, yiengq dah de mbouj ndaej luj hoiq vunzsai ndaej doiqyungz swqyouz.

Hauhnaeuz bouxcawj de siengj aeu de ma guh yah, hoeng, gajlaeng caiq mij haenj de laem lo, yiengq, de couh ndaej cueg okma; bouxcawj caemh mij'z gienz ndaej dawz de hai hawj linghvaih minzcuz hih vunz lo, aenvih bouxcawj coemx de goq.
Hauhnaeuz bouxcawj de ij aeu de hawj daeglwg bonjfaenh de guh yah nex, doiq dah de caemh ij luj doiq dahlwg bonjfaenh yienghmwnq.
Hauhnaeuz bouxcawj de aeu de le, caiq linghvaih aeu yahnoix nex, yiengq bouxcawj de doiq de caemh ij luj gaxgonq yienghmwnq; de dih gw hah, daenj hah, caeuq caeuqninz hah cungj dwg mbouj ndaej noix.
Hauhnaeuz bouxcawj de guh mbouj daengz sam demj neix nex, de couh mboujyungh aeu ngaenz daeuj cueg bonjfaenh; bonjfaenh cungj ndaej seizbienh ok ma.
“Mboujlwnh bouxlawz doh vunz ngaiz rai hih, bouxlawz caemh ngaiz gajrai.
Hauhnaeuz mbouj dwg guqiq gaj vunz hih, dwg mbouj siujsim ngaiz dwg vunz rai lah, yiengq de ndaej deuz bae daengz mwnq gou cijdingq hih deixfueng he bae.
Hoeng, hauhnaeuz miz vunz guqiq gaj vunz hih, cungjsuenq de deuz bae daengz aen luz dajbwiz gou mwnq, cungj caemh ij gaemh dawz de ma gaj.
“Byawz doh bohmeh hih, caemh bietdingh gajrai bouxlawz.
“Byawz caeg vunz ma hai hih, mboujguenj de caeg ma hai hawj vunz haj cixnaeuz gag louz hawj bonjfaenh hih, couh gajrai byawz.
“Byawz yawj bohmeh ngawz hih, cungj ij dawz de gajrai bae.
“Hauhnaeuz miz song boux vunz doxdub, miz boux he aeu rin cixnaeuz aeu gaemxgyienz ma doh daixlingh boux hwj ngaiz sieng, sieng hwj ngaiz ninz mbouj ndaej hwnq congz,

hoeng, gajlaeng ndaej hwnq congz hwj, cijmboujgoq de ij ngaiz dawz faexdwngx cij ndaej byaij roen, yiengq boux doh vunz sieng mwnq, de mbouj ngaiz guxmaz, hoeng, ij ngaiz hoi nguh hong hih ngaenz hawj boux sieng mwnq, caemh ij bau yw boux de ndei.
“Famz miz vunz aeu faex ma doh bouxhoiq bonjfaenh hih, mboujlwnh hoiq vunzsai haj cixnaeuz hoiq vunzbaz, doh hwj dangjciengz ngaiz rai hih, boux doh vunz mwnq couh ngaiz buenqhingz.

Hauhnaeuz bouxhoiq ngaiz bouxcawj de doh, doh goq ngoenz daengz song ngoenz le cij ngaiz rai hih, yiengq bouxcawj de couh mbouj ngaiz guxmaz, aenvih bouxhoiq mwnq caemh suenq gij saizcanj de, caemhdangq naeuz de ngaiz saet caiz sat lo.

“Hauhnaeuz miz vunz doxdub, mbouj siujsim ngaiz bungq dawz meh daiqndang he, bungq hwj de ngaiz siujcanj, hoeng, gajlaeng meh de caemh mij maz sienghaih hih, yiengq boux bungq dawz de mwnq couh ij ngaiz ok cienz hawj de, couh dwg ciuq goengjgvan de heuh aeu geijlai ma hawj geijlai, hoeng, caemh ij dunghgoq buenqguenh ma buenq gyezdingq hawj de ok geijlai he.
Hauhnaeuz meh daiqndang mwnq ngaiz sieng, yiengq caemh ij fad hawj boux bungq dawz de sieng mwnq sieng boiz. Couh dwg naeuz, rai boiz rai,
doh ra boiz ra, doh faenz boiz faenz, doh fawz boiz fawz, doh ha boiz ha;
log boiz log, doh boiz doh, fad boiz fad.
“Hauhnaeuz miz vunz doh fangz cehra bouxhoiq bonjfaenh, mboujlwnh hoiq vunzsai haj cixnaeuz hoiq vunzbaz dih cehra he, couh ij ngaiz coengq bouxhoiq mwnq okma guh dingj boiz cehra de.
Hauhnaeuz miz vunz doh doek diuz faenz bouxhoiq bonjfaenh, mboujlwnh hoiq vunzsai haj cixnaeuz hoiq vunzbaz hih diuz faenz he, couh ij ngaiz coengq bouxhoiq mwnq okma guh dingj boiz diuz faenz de.
“Hauhnaeuz miz cwz gving vunz rai hih, mboujlwnh rai vunzsai haj cixnaeuz rai vunzbaz, couh aeu rin ma boemz duz de rai. Hoeng, mbouj ndaej gw gij noh de; bouxcawj duz cwz mwnq caemh mij'z coih.

Hauhnaeuz duz cwz mwnq siengzseiz cungj dwg gving vunz he, caemh miz vunz naeuz bouxcawj de ni lo, hoeng, bouxcawj mwnq vanzlij mbouj lamh duz de ndei, guh hwj duz de gving vunz rai, yiengq couh ij aeu rin ma boemz duz de rai; bouxcawj mwnq caemh ngaiz buenq rai.
Hauhnaeuz fad de aeu ngaenz ma cueg diuz mingh de nex, de caemh ij ciuq fad de deng geijlai ngaenz ma boiz.
Hauhnaeuz cwz gving rai lwg vunzsai haj cixnaeuz lwg vunzbaz, caemh ij ciuq gwnz neix dih guhfap ma guh.
Hauhnaeuz miz cwz gving rai vunzhoiq, mboujlwnh rai hoiq vunzsai haj cixnaeuz hoiq vunzbaz, bietdingh ij aeu caet liengx
“Hauhnaeuz miz vunz gwenj aen cingj, cixnaeuz vat cingj mbouj goeb, miz cwz haj cixnaeuz miz lawz ngaiz doek roengzbae rai,
yiengq, bouxcawj aen cingj mwnq couh ij aeu ngaenz hawj bouxcawj doengh duz cukseng mwnq; duz cukseng couh gvi hawj bouxcawj aen cingj mwnq.
“Hauhnaeuz duz cwz he gving rai lingh duz cwz, yiengq, song mbiengj couh dawz duz cwz lix mwnq hai bae. Hai le, couh bingz faen gij ngaenz de; gij noh cwz rai mwnq caemh faen song mbiengj doxdoengz.

Hauhnaeuz gaenq rox naeuz duz cwz neix haenj doxgoed lo, hoeng, bouxcawj de vanzlij mbouj lamh ndei, yiengq bouxcawj de ij aeu duz cwz lix he boiz hawj bouxcawj duz cwz ngaiz rai mwnq; duz cwz rai mwnq couh gvi hawj boux boiz cwz mwnq.
“Hauhnaeuz miz vunz caeg cwz haj cixnaeuz caeg yiengz, mboujguenj de caeg ma gaj cixnaeuz caeg ma hai, caeg duz cwz he ij boiz haj duz cwz, caeg duz yiengz he ij boiz seiq duz yiengz.
“Hauhnaeuz miz vunzcaeg
hauhnaeuz dwg doengxngoenz haeuj ranz bae caeg, ngaiz gaemh dawz doh rai hih, boux doh rai mwnq, couh suenq de gaj vunz miz coih.

“Bouxcaeg mwnq caeg ndaej ma hih doxgaiq, bietdingh ij boiz vunz. Hauhnaeuz bouxcaeg mwnq ndaw ranz de it yiengh cungj mbouj miz, yiengq couh ij dawz de hai bae guh hoiq ma dingj guh de soj caeg ndaej hih doxgaiq.
“Hauhnaeuz de caeg ma hih cwz hah cixnaeuz lawz hah, yiengz hah vanzlij lix youq laeng de nex, de couh ij boiz hawj vunz lai boix he.

“Hauhnaeuz miz vunz coengq cwz haj cixnaeuz coengq yiengz youq ndaw reih bonjfaenh cixnaeuz ndaw suen buzdauz bonjfaenh, gajlaeng ngaiz doengh duz de ndaenj haeuj ndaw reih vunz bae cix gw cix coekcoek caijcaij nex, yiengq bouxcawj doengh duz mwnq couh ij dawz ndaw reih cixnaeuz ndaw suen buzdauz bonjfaenh de ceiq ndei he sou haeujma boiz vunz.

“Hauhnaeuz miz vunz youq ndaw reih bonjfaenh gyemz feiz, ngaiz gyemz dawz gij oen henz reih bonjfaenh, yiengq ngaiz gyemz lih dawz gij reih vunz, ndaw reih vunz miz mienh dong cixnaeuz miz mienh mijyaengz gvej hih, boux gyemz feiz mwnq ij ngaiz boiz vunz soj gyemz dawz hih doxgaiq.

“Hauhnaeuz miz vunz hawj vunz bang de baujguenj ngaenz cixnaeuz gij dijbauj hih doxgaiq, hoeng ngaiz vunz haeuj ranz bae caeg aeu lo, hauhnaeuz ndaej gaemh dawz bouxcaeg nex, bouxcaeg mwnq couh ij ngaiz boiz lai boix he;
hauhnaeuz mbouj ndaej gaemh dawz bouxcaeg nex, boux bang vunz guenj doxgaiq mwnq couh ij bae hawj boux buenqguenh mwnq buenq, cingqmingz naeuz bonjfaenh de mij caeg aeu gij doxgaiq boux mwnq.

“Hauhnaeuz miz vunz vih doxgaiq doxceng hih, mboujguenj dwg cwz haj cixnaeuz lawz, yiengz haj cixnaeuz buh, cixnaeuz doxgaiq nyaepyingq mbouj raen hih, song mbiengj cungj ij bae daengz mwnq buenq saeh mwnq, hawj boux buenq saeh mwnq buenq, buenq mbiengjlawz miz coih hih, mbiengjlawz couh ngaiz lai boiz boix he.

“Hauhnaeuz miz vunz dawz lawz hah, cwz hah, yiengz hah, cixnaeuz gak cungj doengh duz cukseng hawj vunz bang yawj, hoeng, doengh duz cukseng ngaiz sieng hah, cixnaeuz ngaiz rai hah, ngaiz vunz ying deuz hah, hoeng, mij vunz raen ndaej cingqmingz,

yiengq boux bang yawj mwnq couh ij doiq Cangqdiq fazsiq, baujcingq naeuz bonjfaenh de mij aeu gij doxgaiq vunz; bouxcawj mwnq caemh ij sinq de. Yiengq boux bang vunz yawj mwnq couh mbouj ngaiz boiz lo.
Hoeng, hauhnaeuz doengh duz cukseng dwg boux bang yawj mwnq caeg bae lah, yiengq de couh ij ngaiz boiz hawj bouxcawj mwnq.
Hauhnaeuz ngaiz doengh duz nyaen haeb rai nex, boux bang vunz yawj mwnq couh ij dawz duz rai de ma guh baengzgawq; yiengq, de couh mboujyungh ngaiz boiz lo.
“Hauhnaeuz miz vunz laeng vunz ciq doengh duz cukseng, ciq ma le, ngaiz rai haj cixnaeuz ngaiz sieng, bouxcawj de caemh mbouj youq henz de raen, yiengq, boux ciq mwnq ij ngaiz boiz vunz.
Hauhnaeuz bouxcawj de youq henz de raen nex, couh mboujyungh ngaiz boiz; hauhnaeuz dwg co aeu lah, yiengq gij ngaenz co de caemh ngamqluj aeu ma dienz.

“Hauhnaeuz miz byawz vunzsai yaeuh hawj lwgsau mijyaengz dingqvwnh caeuq mijyaengz ngaiz vunzsai yaek goq haem cix haenj de hwj caeuq de ninz lo, yiengq, boux vunzsai mwnq couh ij ngaiz soengq laex hawj ndaw ranz dah lwgsau mwnq, aeu dah de ma guh yah.

Hauhnaeuz daxboh dah de mbouj dungziq hawj dah lwgsau de haq laeng de, de caemh ij ngaiz ciuq gij vunz aeu yah, aeu gij lwgsau mijyaengz caeuq vunzsai ninz goq he soengq hih laex ma soengq ngaenz hawj de.
“Famz rox coengqfap gimq vunz hih vunzbaz, cungj ij ngaiz gajrai bae.
“Caeuq doenghduz doxgwih hih vunz, ij gajrai boux vunz mwnq bae.
“Mbouj dwg caenhgag bwiz Yehhozvaz, vanzlij caiq bwiz linghvaih hih cwnz hih, cungj ij ngaiz gajrai bae.
“Mbouj ndaej hangz gij vunz daj vaihguek daeuj he; faenhsou ijaeu ndaejgeiq, faenhsou caemh dwg doz youq laeng dieg Ngaihgiz youq goq he.
“Mbouj ndaej yawj mehmaiq cixnaeuz lwggyax ngawz.
Hauhnaeuz yawj gyoengqde ngawz, gyoengqde gouz gou nex, gou gaengjdingq dingqri.
Daengz mwhmwnq, gou couh aeuqheiq faenhsou, yiengq couh aeu cax ma gaj faenhsou, caemh hawj mehyah faenhsou bienqbaenz mehmaiq, gij lwg faenhsou bienqbaenz lwggyax.
“Hauhnaeuz mwngz ciq ngaenz hawj gij vunz gou hih gij vunz gungz he nex, mwngz mbouj ndaej luj coengqcaiq yienghmwnq laeng de suenq aeu leih.

Hauhnaeuz mwngz ciq ngaenz hawj vunz gungz le, aeu diuz buhdox de ma guh dijyaz, yiengq, mwngz bietdingh ij youq gyangjngoenz mijyaengz doek cihsenz aeu hawj de boiz; mbouj ndaej gyangjngoenz doek le cij aeu hawj de,

aenvih de caenhgag miz diuz buhdox neix, gauq diuz buh neix ndaej daenj raeuj lo. Hauhnaeuz mbouj miz diuz buh neix, de baenzlawz ndaej ninz nej? Daengz mwhmwnq, de gouz gou bang de, gou gaengjdingq bang de, aenvih gou dwg boux sim'unq he.
“Mboujcwnj gangj gij vah doegsieb he ma ndaq Cangqdiq, caemh mbouj ndaej mang beksingq dih lingjdauj.
“Ij dawz mwngz ngamq sou haeujma dih haeux hah, laeuj hah, caeuq youz hah daeuj soengq hawj gou; ij haijliengh, mbouj ndaej simsenz.
“Daeglwg daeuz mwngz caemh ij gvi hawj gou;

cwz hah, yiengz hah sojmiz hih duz daixdaeuz de caemh dwg ij gvi hawj gou. Cwzdaeg hah, yiengzdaeg hah, doengh duz daixdaeuz ngamq seng ndaej caet ngoenz ndaw de ndaej gaen duz meh de; daengz daixbet ngoenz le, couh ij gvi hawj gou.
“Faenhsou ij guh gij vunz gou, sojhij, doengh duz cukseng youq ndaw reih ngaiz duz nyaen haeb rai hih, gij noh de, faenhsou mbouj ndaej gw; ij gveng hawj ma gw.
“Mbouj ndaej luenhbangh sauqyauz; mbouj ndaej luenh cingqmingz hwj bang vunz vaih.

“Mbouj ndaej vunz guh vaihsaeh, mwngz caemh gaen guh vaihsaeh. Mbouj ndaej raen vunzlai naeuz deng mwngz caemh gaen naeuz deng, vunz naeuz mbouj deng mwngz caemh gaen naeuz mbouj deng, yienghmwnq ma boqvaiq saedsaeh.
Caemh mbouj ndaej youq gij saeh vunz doxgauq he haeuj vunz gungz.
“Hauhnaeuz raen duz cwz haj cixnaeuz raen duz lawz boux caeuq mwngz miz haemzcaeuz he loengj roen lo, yiengq mwngz ij bang ying duz de ma hawj de.
Hauhnaeuz mwngz raen duz lawz boux caeuq mwngz miz caeuz he doz doxgaiq naek ngaiz daenz laemx, yiengq mwngz mbouj ndaej bienq deuz; ij caeuq bouxcawj de buen gij doxgaiq naek de deuz.
“Youq gwnz fazdingz, mbouj ndaej hawj vunz gungz rap vuengj.
Mbouj ndaej bangjlaih vunz, caemh mbouj ndaej luenh gaj mbouj miz coih hih vunz; mbouj nex, gou bietdingh ij fad doenghgij vunz guh doenghgij saeh neix he.

“Vunz oet cienz hawj mbouj ndaej aeu, aenvih gw vunz doxgaiq le, bak unq, aeu vunz doxgaiq le, fawz dinj, aenvih yienghmwnq couh hawj vunz bienqbaenz mbouj faen cingsuj ndei haj yak—ndei bienq rwix, rwix bienq ndei lo.
“Mbouj ndaej hangz gij vunz daj vaihdieg daeuj doz youq he, aenvih faenhsou caemh doz youq dieg Ngaihgiz youq goq, caemh rox doz youq dieg vunz youq hih haemzhoj.
“Mwngz ij lienzdaemh genggeng ndaemndaem roek bi dih reihnaz, sou roek bi hih haeuxmienh.

Hoeng, daengz daixcaet bi, mbouj ndaej geng, mbouj ndaej ndaem; ij diuh vangh. Ndaw reih soj hwnj hih doenghgo, mwngz mbouj ndaej sou aeu, ndaej hawj gij vunz gungz nyaeb aeu; lij lw hih yiengh hawj doengh duz nyaen gw. Doenghheij suen buzdauz, suen makmbi mwngz hah caemh ciuq yienghneix guh.

“Mwngz moix it aen singhgiz ndaej lienzdaemh guh roek ngoenz hong. Daengz daixcaet ngoenz, mbouj ndaej guh hong lo; ij hawj gij hoiq ndaw ranz mwngz daiqlienz gij lwg hoiq vunzbaz mwnq caeuq daj lingh aen minzcuz goq daeuj guh hong hih ndaej yietbaeg, caeuq ndaej hawj doengh duz cwz hah, lawz hah yietbaeg.
“Famzsoj dwg gou caeuq faenhsou gangj hih vah, faenhsou cungj ijaeu ndaejgeiq. Mbouj ndaej baiq gizdah cwnz, daiqlienz doenghgij coh de cungj mbouj ndaej dwen.
“Vih ij soenhcungq gou, mwngz moix it bi ij souj sam aen ciet.
Mwngz ij souj aen ciet Cawz Yauqmuj he, ciuq gou raengq mwngz hih yienghmwnq ij youq ndwen Yaqbiz
Mwngz caemh ij souj aen ciet Gvejgvej Sousou he, couh dwg youq ndaw reih mwngz dajndaem sou hih gaem daixdaeuz he. Caemh souj aen ciet Gvejsou Sat, sou haeujma diuh hih.
Ndaw ranz mwngz sojmiz hih vunzsai, binaengz daengz sam aen ciet neix caemh ij daeuj bwiz gou, bouxcawj sou Yehhozvaz.

“Mwngz mbouj ndaej aeu gij lwed doengh duz cukseng caeuq fat goq hih bingj doxcaeuq dawz daeuj bwiz gou. Gij lauz doengh duz cukseng dajbwiz mwnq caemh mbouj ndaej louz daengz ngoenz daixngeih daihcaeux.
“Mwngz soj sou ndaej haeujma hih ij aeu gij sou ceiq daixdaeuz he, dawz bae soengq hawj gou, Yehhozvaz, mwngz dih Cangqdiq.
“Mbouj ndaej aeu nauq yiengzmeh ma cawj duz yiengzlwg bonjfaenh de.
“Gou ij baij bouxcai he youq dangqnaj mwngz daiq roen, itloh bae baujhuq mwngz, daiq mwngz bae daengz mwnq dieg gou gaenq cwnjbiq ndei hawj mwngz he.
De dwg hij gij mingzhiq gou daeuj he; faenhsou ij soenhcungq de, ij dingq gij vah de, mbouj ndaej nga'ngangq goq lingh gok bae, aenvih de mbouj nyiuz gij coih faenhsou law.
Hauhnaeuz mwngz saedsaeh dingq gij vah de, ciuq gou soj gangj hih vah bae guh nex, gou caemh yawj boux caeuq mwngz miz caeuz he caemhdangq boux caeuz gou.

Gou hawj bouxcai gou youq dangqnaj mwngz daiq roen, daiq mwngz bae daengz mwnq dieg Yaqmohliq vunz hah, Hwz vunz hah, Bijliqsij vunz hah, Gyahnamz vunz hah, Hihveiq vunz hah, Yehbuqswh vunz hah youq hih mwnq dieg mwnq bae; gou caemh ij cawz gyoengqde bae.
Mwngz mbouj ndaej baiq caeuq swqhaeuh gyoengq cwnz gyoengqde, dauqfanj ij dub soiq doengh dongqsix gyoengqde baiq he bae.

“Faenhsou ij swqhaeuh gou, Yehhozvaz, faenhsou dih Cangqdiq. Hauhnaeuz faenhsou yienghneix guh, gou gaengjdingq soengq fuk hawj faenhsou, nyok gij gw caeuq raemx hawj faenhsou, hawj faenhsou ndangdaej giencangq, mij saek yiengh bingh,
gij vunzbaz faenhsou mbouj miz saek boux naeuz ngaiz siujcanj hah cixnaeuz mbouj mizseng hah yienghmwnq. Gou vanzlij ij hawj faenhsou ndaej souhyienz.
“Mboujguenj mwngz bae daengz mwnq dieglawz, gou cungj ij hawj gij vunz dieg mwnq simvueng ndangsaenz; gij vunz caeuq mwngz miz haemzcaeuz he riq deuz hwj maetlaenq bae.
Gou ij hawj duz dinz mbin bae gaxgonq mwngz boenq doenghgij Hihveiq vunz hah, Gyahnamz vunz hah, Hwz vunz hah deuz bae.

Hoeng, gou mbouj veiq youq bi he boenq gyoengqde deuz liux law; hauhnaeuz youq bi he boenq deuz liux nex, hoengjlau doenghheij dieg reih bienqbaenz dieg vangh le, doengh duz nyaen fat lai hwj daeuj haih mwngz.
Gou ij baez di baez di boenq gyoengqde deuz, daengj daengz gij vunz mwngz fat lai le, caemh ndaej gag guenj gij dieg mwnq le, gou cij boenq gyoengqde deuz liux bae.
“Daengz mwhmwnq, gou couh ij veh sienq gat hawj mwngz, couh dwg dajlwh Hungz Haij daengz Feihliqswq Haij,
Mwngz mbouj ndaej caeuq gyoengqde cixnaeuz caeuq gij cwnz gyoengqde doxdingh gijmaz.
Mbouj ndaej hawj gyoengqde youq laeng dieg mwngz youq, hoengjlau gyoengqde hawj mwngz gaen ciuq gij laehbeih gyoengqde guh le, bae baiq gij cwnz gyoengqde hwj mwngz couh yied gaen yied yinx.”

Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz caeuq Yaqlwnz hah, Nazdaz hah, Yaqbijhuq hah, caeuq caetcib boux Hijswzlez vunz gangj vah couh baenz he hwnj daeuj laeng gou neij, hoeng, faenhsou ij daj lizgyae cix gvih roengzma sax gou lo.
Caenhgag ndaej mwngz daeuj gaenh gou lah; lij lw hih vunz mboujcwnj daeuj gaenh gou, gij vunz caemh mbouj ndaej gaen mwngz hwnj bya daeuj.”

Yiengq, Mohsih couh roengz bya ma, dawz Yehhozvaz soj gangj hih vah caeuq soj dingh hih gveihdingq gangj naeuz gij vunz ni. Gyoengq vunz cungj doengxcaez han bak naeuz: “Yehhozvaz soj raengq hih, gyoengqraeuz gaengjdingq ciuq guh!”
Gajlaeng, Mohsih caemh dawz Yehhozvaz soj mingqlingq hih cungj sij hwnjdaeuj lo.
Daengz haet daixngeih daihcaeux, Mohsih couh youq laj dinbya caeb aen luz dajbwiz he, caemh ciuq gij vunz Hijswzlez dih cibngeih aen cuz ma caep cibngeih dongqsaeu,
caiq hawj gij vunzsai Hijswzlez hih boux haemq hauxseng he bae aeu cwzlwg daeg ma gaj le coemh hwj bwiz Yehhozvaz, caemh vih muengh ndaej doxhuz hwj caemh aeu cwzlwg daeg ma gaj hwj bwiz.
Mohsih dawz gij lwed cwzlwg daeg coux mbangj youq ndaw buenz, mbangj saj youq gwnz luz dajbwiz le,
couh dawz Yehhozvaz soj dingh hih doeg naeuz gij vunz ni. Gyoengq vunz dingq le, cungj naeuz: “Yehhozvaz soj dingh hih gveihdingq, gyoengqraeuz gaengjdingq ciuq hengz.”

Gyoengq vunz gangj sat, Mohsih couh dawz gij lwed ndaw buenz saj hwnj gwnz ndang gyoengq vunzlai bae, naeuz: “Gij neix dwg daiqbiuj Yehhozvaz caeuq faenhsou dingh dih baujcingq lienz diuzgyenq dih lwed.”
Gajlaeng, Mohsih, Yaqlwnz, Nazdaz, Yaqbijhuq caeuq caetcib boux Hijswzlez vunz gangj vah couh baenz he cungj hwnj
Gyoengqde hwnj bae le, yawjraen Hijswzlez dih Cangqdiq, yawjraen laj din de caenh lujnaeuz ndwn youq mwnq aeu lamzbaujsig ma bu roen he nwih, o soemxsoemx, cengh yupyup.
Gannaeuz gyoengqde muenghyawj Cangqdiq lah, hoeng, Cangqdiq gaenhbaenj mij sienghaih gyoengqde saek boux. Gajlaeng gyoengqde couh youq mwnq itheij gw.

Gajlaeng Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz hwnj bya laeng gou dineix daeuj, youq dineix youq; gou ij dawz baj rin gou sij miz hih fazliz caeuq mingqlingq soengq hawj mwngz, hawj mwngz dawz ma son gij vunzlai.”

Yiengq, Mohsih couh raengq gij vunz Hijswzlez gangj vah couh baenz he, naeuz: “Faenhsou youq dineix daengj gou ma. Dineix miz Yaqlwnz caeuq Huqwj caeuq faenhsou youq; hauhnaeuz beksingq miz maz saeh doxcwngq doxceng hih, couh bae cimh song boux de bax.”
Mohsih hwnj bya bae, baenx aen bya cungj dwg fwj guem liux.
Gij ronghndongq Yehhozvaz dingz youq bya Sihnaiq;
Yiengq, Mohsih couh haeuj ndaw fwj hwnj dingjbya bae lo. Daj de
Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih naeuz:
“Mwngz naeuz gij vunz Hijswzlez ni, naeuz hawj gyoengqde soengq doxgaiq daeuj hawj gou. Bouxlawz nyienh'eiq soengq hawj gou hih, faenhsou couh bang gou sou haeujma.
Faenhsou ndaej sou hih dwg gim hah, ngaenz hah, doengz hah,
saeqsaeq nuenxnuenx hih maemaz lamz hah, maemaz aeuj hah, maemaz hoengz hah, caeuq fwn yiengzbya hah,
naeng yiengzgoeng yomx hoengz hah, naeng haijbauq
youz daeng hah, caeuq guh youz rang guh yieng dih yanghliuq hah,
doenghgij aeu ma gep youq hijfuzdwz,
“Gij vunz ij guh aen ranz hab gou youq he, hawj gou ndaej caeuq gyoengqde youq he.
Guh cangqbungz caeuq ndaw cangqbungz sojmiz dih doxgaiq, cungj ij ciuq gou hawj mwngz yawj hih gij yiengh mwnq bae guh.
“Ij aeu faex gimhhozvuenh ma doq aen gvih he. Aen gvih gij raez de ij miz itbak itcib sam gunghfaenh
Aen gvih hih ndaw de caeuq rog de cungj ij aeu cwnz hih gim ma baux liux, gij bien seiqhenz de caemh ij aeu gim ma gep hwj.
Vanzlij daj seiq aen gyengx gim hwj ding youq seiq gij ha de, moix mbiengj song aen.
Caemh ij yungh faex gimhhozvuenh ma guh song diuz faex ram de; song diuz neix caemh ij aeu gim ma baux hwj.
Song diuz faex neix ij con haeuj aen gvih neix hih song mbiengj gyengx gim he bae, ndaej fungbienh ram.
Song diuz faex neix ij siengzseiz dauh youq ndaw gyengx de; mbouj ndaej yot okma.
Ij dawz baj rin gou sij miz fazliz soengq hawj mwngz hih mwnq, coengq haeuj ndaw de bae.
“Caemh ij aeu cwnz hih gim ma guh fa goemq aen gvih neix; aen fa neix caemh dwg heuh ‘fagoemqcoih.’ Gij raez de itbak itcib sam gunghfaenh, gvangq ij miz caetcib gunghfaenh.
Caemh aeu gim ma diz song duz gihluqbwz, coengq youq fagoemqcoih hih song raeuj de.
It raeuj coengq it duz gihluqbwz, caeuq fagoemqcoih doxnem.
Song duz gihluqbwz naj doiq naj yawj roengz fagoemqcoih aj fwed hwj goemq aen de.
Dawz baj rin sij miz fazliz, gou ij soengq hawj mwngz hih baj rin mwnq, coengq haeuj ndaw gvih bae; caemh dawz fagoemqcoih an youq gwnz gvih de.
Gou ij youq mwnq caeuq mwngz doxraen, caemh ij dajlwh cungqgyan song duz gihluqbwz gwnz fagoemqcoih mwnq caeuq mwngz gangj, gangj naeuz gou ij dingh hawj gij vunz Hijswzlez sojmiz dih mingqlingq.
“Ij yungh faex gimhhozvuenh ma doq aen daiz he, gij raez de goujcib gunghfaenh, gij gvangq de seiqcib haj gunghfaenh, gij sang de caetcib gunghfaenh.
Ij aeu cwnz hih gim ma baux hwj, seiqhenz de caemh ij gep miz gim.
Aen daiz dih seiqhenz de ij doq miz luj baj fawz gvangq hih begdaiz; diuz begdaiz de ij gep miz gim.
Seiq gok ha daiz, caemh ij ding miz seiq aen gyengx gim.
Seiq aen gyengx gim ij ding youq baixrog begdaiz, ding hawj de ndaej con faex ram hwj.
Song diuz faex ram daiz ij aeu faex gimhhozvuenh ma guh, caemh ij aeu gim ma baux liux bae.
Doenghheij buenz hah, deb hah, huzlaeuj hah, caeuq vanj caem laeuj hah, doengh aen ij coengq youq gwnz daiz neix, cungj ij aeu gim ma guh.
Aen daiz neix ij baij youq dangqnaj gou; gwnz daiz ij siengzseiz baij miz bingj.

“Ij yungh cwnz hih gim ma guh aen gyaqdaeng he. Aen gyaqdaeng dih gij hangx de hah, gij ganj de hah, caeuq doengh aen cenj coux youz luj duj va gwnz de hah, duqva caeuq limqva de hah cungj dwg caemh ngauq gim he diz okdaeuj doxlienz he.
Aen gyaqdaeng de it mbiengj iet miz sam nga, song mbiengj itgungh miz roek nga.
Moix it nga miz sam duj luj duj va; doengh duj va neix luj vagingq nwih, miz duqva, limqva. Roek nga neix, nga'nga cungj doxdoengz.
Aen gyaqdaeng hih diuz ganj cungqgyan de caemh miz seiq duj luj vagingq, miz duqva, miz limqva.
Aen gyaqdaeng dih moix song nga doxdoiq hih laj doenj doxgap de cungj miz duj he; aen gyaqdaeng miz roek nga, cungj dwg doxdoengz.
Duj va de caeuq gij nga de cungj dwg doxciep; cungj dwg ngauq gim dog diz okdaeuj caemh doxlienz he.
Caemh ij guh aen gyaqdaeng neix hih caet aen daeng de. Doengh aen daeng neix ij ciuq yiengq dangqnaj bae.
“Aen gyaqdaeng neix hih fag nep muenxdaeng de caeuq aen buenz de cungj dwg ij aeu cwnz hih gim ma guh.
Ij aeu roekcib bet gaen
Mwngz ijaeu siujsim, ij ciuq gou youq gwnz bya hawj mwngz raen hih, raengq mwngz hih yienghmwnq ma guh.

“Mwngz ij yungh cib fuk boiqmaz ma guh cangqbungz; doengh fuk boiqmaz neix fukfuk cungj miz sam cungj saek: saeklamz, saekaeuj, saekhoengz, caemh dwg hawj doengh boux fawzsoem rox daemj boiq he daemj. Doengh fuk neix gwnz de cungj caemh ij daemj miz duz gihluqbwz hwj.
Moix fuk gij raez de ij miz cibngeih mij raez, gij gvangq de caemh ij miz song mij gvangq;
Mwngz ij dawz haj fuk haj fuk doxneb swnj hwnjdaeuj, faen guh song fuk hwj.
Song fuk neix hih fuk he gij bien gatsat de caeuq daixlingh fuk hih gij bien daixdaeuz de caemh ij guh miz hajcib gaiq nuk lamz. Doengh gaiq nuk neix cungj ij nuk caeuq nuk doxdoiq.
Caemh ij guh hajcib gaiq ngaeu gim; yungh doenghgij ngaeu neix ma ngaeu doengh fuk neix le cij ndaej guhbaenz aen cangqbungz he.
“Mwngz caemh ij aeu fwn yiengzbya ma daemj hwj guh cib'it fuk boiq fwn, aeu ma guh gij goemq cangqbungz.
Moix fuk dih gij raez de ij miz cibsam mij raez, gij gvangq de caemh ij miz song mij gvangq;

Ij dawz haj fuk doxneb swnj hwnjdaeuj guh fuk he, caemh ij dawz roek fuk doxneb swnj hwnjdaeuj guh fuk he. Roek fuk doxneb swnj neix hih buenq fuk gajlaeng de ij boeb hwj goemq youq gwnz bakdou cangqbungz.
Haj fuk doxneb swnj neix dih gij bien gatsat de ij guh miz hajcib gaiq nuk, roek fuk doxneb swnj mwnq dih gij bien daixdaeuz de caemh ij guh hajcib gaiq nuk.
Caiq guh hajcib gaiq ngaeu doengz ngaeu youq doengh gaiq nuk mwnq hwj, hawj song fuk mwnq bienqbaenz vangq goemq cangqbungz he.
Vangq goemq cangqbungz neix lij lw hih buenq fuk ij vuih youq cangqbungz hih baixlaeng de.
Vangq goemq cangqbungz neix hih song henz de, moix it mbiengj lij lw buenq mij,
Caemh ij aeu naeng yiengzbya yomx hoengz ma guh fan goemq cangqbungz, caemhcaiq yungh naeng haijbauq
“Mwngz ij aeu benj gimhhozvuenh ma daengj hwj guh gij ciengz cangqbungz.
Moix it dip benj ijaeu miz seiq mij haj sang, gvangq ijaeu miz caetcib gunghfaenh gvangq.
Moix dip benj hih raeuj he bietdingh ij siuq miz song gij yod; guh ciengz cangqbungz sojmiz hih benj cungj ij yienghneix guh.
Cangqbungz dih mienh baixnamz ij miz ngeihcib dip benj daengj guh ciengz.
Laj daej ciengz ij aeu ngaenz ma guh miz seiqcib congh hwj ndaej cap doengh dip benj neix haeuj bae he, moix dip cap song congh.
Cangqbungz hih mienh baixbaek caemh ij aeu ngeihcib dip benj guh ciengz.
Laj daej ciengz ij aeu ngaenz ma guh seiqcib congh hwj ndaej cap haeujbae he; moix it dip benj boiq miz song congh.
Cangqbungz dih mienh baixlaeng de, couh dwg mienh baixsae, ij miz roek dip benj guh ciengz.
Cangqbungz hih song gok ciengz baixlaeng de,
itgungh miz bet dip benj caeuq cibroek congh aeu ngaenz ma guh he, moix dip hih laj de cungj boiq guh miz song congh.
“Mwngz caemh ij aeu faex gimhhozvuenh ma guh diuz lanz vang de,
Diuz lanz cungqgyan ij daj raeuj lanz daengz raeuj.
Doengh dip benj neix ij aeu gim ma baux hwj, caemh ij aeu gim ma guh gyengx cij ndaej con diuz faex lanz de haeujbae. Diuz faex lanz caemh ij aeu gim ma baux.
“Mwngz ij ciuq gou youq gwnz bya hawj mwngz raen hih yienghmwnq bae dap cangqbungz.
“Mwngz ij aeu saeqsaeq nuenxnuenx hih maemaz lamz hah, maemaz aeuj hah, maemaz hoengz hah ma hawj doengh boux fawzsoem he daemj hwj guh fanyiemz. Fanyiemz gwnz de caemh ij daemj miz duz gihluqbwz.
Ij dawz fanyiemz neix venj youq seiq diuz dongh faex gimhhozvuenh aeu gim ma baux he. Doengh diuz dongh neix gwnz de miz ngaeu gim; seiq diuz dongh cap youq seiq congh aeu ngaenz ma guh he.
Fanyiemz venj youq gij ngaeu gwnz de, roengz gek hwj guh fungh ndaw fungh rog; fungh ndaw dwg gou youq he. Aen gvih coengq miz baengzgawq mwnq coengq youq baixndaw fanyiemz.
Caiq dawz fagoemqcoih coengq youq gwnz gvih ndaw fungh hwj.
Dawz aen daiz
“Mwngz ij aeu saeqsaeq nuenxnuenx hih maemaz lamz hah, maemaz aeuj hah, maemaz hoengz hah ma hawj doengh boux rox daemj boiq he daemj hwj guh fan yiemzdou cangqbungz.

Caemh ij aeu faex gimhhozvuenh ma guh fan yiemzdou neix hih haj diuz dongh de. Doengh diuz dongh neix ij aeu gim ma baux hwj, gwnz de caemh ij guh miz ngaeu gim, caeuq aeu doengz ma guh haj diuz dongh neix hih haj congh cap.
“Mwngz ij aeu faex gimhhozvuenh ma doq aen luz coemh doenghduz hwj dajbwiz he. Aen de dwg seiq cingq seiq gok he; gij raez de caeuq gij gvangq de cungj dwg song mij sam, gij sang de it mij sam sang.
Aen luz dajbwiz neix mwnq gok de ij guh miz gok dod hwnjdaeuj he hwj; gok caeuq luz dwg doxlienz he, caemh dwg aeu doengz ma baux hwj.
Caemh aeu doengz ma guh doengj coux daeuh hah, fag canj hah, buenz coux lwed hah, fag ca yamx noh hah, buenz coux gyoqfeiz hah. Gwnz aen luz soj yungh hih cungj ij aeu doengz ma guh.
Caemh ij guh fan vangx doengz he boiq aen luz dajbwiz. Fan vangx neix seiq gok de caemh ij guh miz gyengx doengz.
Ij ding fan vangx neix youq ndaw aen luz dajbwiz neix daj laj hwnj daeuj dingxfaen he.
Caemh aeu faex gimhhozvuenh ma guh diuz ram de; diuz ram neix caemh dwg aeu doengz ma baux hwj.
Dawz diuz faex neix con haeuj song aen gyengx henz de bae le, couh ndaej seizbienh ram lo.
Aen luz dajbwiz neix cungj dwg aeu faex ma doq; cungqgyan de dwg hoengq he. Mwngz ij ciuq gou youq gwnz bya hawj mwngz raen hih yienghmwnq bae guh.
“Mwngz caemh ij guh veizciengz hawj cangqbungz; ij aeu saeqsaeq nuenxnuenx maemaz ma daemj guh boiq hwj veiz. Mienh baixnamz de gij raez de ij miz seiqcib haj mij
ij aeu ngeihcib diuz dongh daiqlienz ngeihcib aen cap doengz ma guh venj boiq hwj veiz. Doenghgij ngaeu gwnz de caeuq doengh diuz gaq doxciep gwnz de cungj dwg aeu ngaenz ma guh.
Mienh baixbaek caemh ij miz seiqcib haj mij
“Mienh baixsae de ij miz ngeihcib ngeih mij haj
Mienh baixdoeng de,
Bakdou dih song mbiengj de, moix mbiengj caemh ij miz caet mij
“Bakdou veizciengz caemh ij miz gouj mij
Doengh diuz gaq baixgwnz ciep doengh diuz dongh veizciengz hih, caeuq gij ngaeu gwnz diuz dongh hih ij aeu ngaenz ma guh; doengh aen cap de ij aeu doengz ma guh.
“Cangqbungz dih veizciengz ij miz seiqcib haj mij raez, ngeihcib ngeih mij haj gvangq, song mij sam sang.
Cangqbungz gak mwnq soj yungh dih doxgaiq hah, doengh diuz ding hah, caeuq sojmiz hih doengh diuz ding veizciengz hah, cungj dwg aeu doengz ma guh.

“Mwngz ij raengq gij vunz Hijswzlez, hawj gyoengqde aeu gij youz makmbi daj ndaw rum daem okdaeuj mij'z youz giek he cenmonz aeu ma diemj daeng he, dawz daeuj hawj mwngz diemj daeng; haemhhaemh cungj ij rongh daeng cij ndaej.

Yaqlwnz caeuq daeglwg de youq ndaw cangqbungz, baixrog fanyiemz gek hwj coengq miz aen gvih coengq baengzgawq mwnq, daj doengxhaemh daengz doengxhaet youq dangqnaj Cangqdiq diemj aen daeng cangqbungz, hawj aen de seiqseiz rongh. Doenghgij neix gij vunz Hijswzlez seiqseiq daihdaih cungj ij soenhsouj.

“Mwngz ij daj ndaw gij vunz Hijswzlez ndaw de senj aeu daeggo mwngz Yaqlwnz caeuq doengh daeglwg de Nazdaz hah, Yaqbijhuq hah, Hijliqyaqsaj hah, caeuq Hijdahmaj hah okdaeuj, laeb gyoengqde guh goengjsae dajbwiz hwj daeuj swqhaeuh gou.
Mwngz ij nyib diuz buh swqhaeuh gou cij ndaej daenj he hawj daeggo mwngz, hawj de daenj le, engqgya raen miz vi, cix raen baenxmbauq.
Mwngz ij raengq doengh boux gou soengq hawj gyoengqde caixhangz, coengjmingz, fawzsoem he nyib buh hawj Yaqlwnz daenj, hawj de ndaej guh boux cenmonz bang vunz dajbwiz he daeuj swqhaeuh gou.
Raengq gyoengqde guh baj baiz venj youq aen aek he, caemh nyib hijfuzdwz,
Doenghgij neix cungj dwg ij aeu maegim hah, maemaz lamz hah, maemaz aeuj hah, maemaz hoengz hah ma daemj hwj nyib.
“Ij aeu maegim hah, maemaz lamz hah, maemaz aeuj hah, maemaz hoengz hah ma hawj doengh boux fawzsoem he daemj hwj nyib hijfuzdwz.
Hijfuzdwz hih song diuz banqmbaq ij caeuq hijfuzdwz hih benq dangqnaj caeuq benq baixlaeng de doxciep baenz diuz buh he.
Diuz sai hijfuzdwz caemh ij yungh doxdoengz hih liuq ma hawj boux fawzsoem he daemj.
“Aeu song gaiq hungzmajnauj ma dik cibngeih daeglwg Hijswzlez hih coh hwnjbae,
it gaiq dik roek boux hih coh, daj hung daengz iq, ciuq swnqsiq dik hwnjbae.

Hawj boux fawzsoem rox dik swhcangh he dik doenghgij coh gij lwg Hijswzlez hwnj gwnz song gaiq baujsig neix bae, caemh ij dawz gaiq baujsig haemq youq gaiq gvang aeu maegim ma san gyaeugyaeu ndeindei he bae.

Gajlaeng, couh dawz song gaiq baujsig neix gep hwnj gwnz hijfuzdwz hih song diuz banqmbaq de bae, guh geiqniemh gij vunz Hijswzlez dih geiqniemh rin. Yiengq song gwnz mbaq Yaqlwnz rap miz gij coh gyoengqde, youq dangqnaj gou, Yehhozvaz guh geiqniemh.
“Ij aeu gim ma san song gaiq ndaej haemq
caemh ij aeu gim ma diz song diuz lienh. Diz song diuz lienh neix ij diz luj cag laenz, ij riengh youq gwnz song gaiq haemq miz baujsig mwnq.
“Ij guh gaiq baizaek ndaej guh gyezdingq he
Gaiq baiz neix ij boeb miz song caengz hwj, caemh dwg seiq cingq seiq gok he, cungj dwg cap raez he.
Ij youq gwnz de haemq miz seiq coij baujsig. Coij daixdaeuz gep hungzbaujsig, vangzhiq caeuq hungzhiq;
coij daixngeih gep luzbaujsig, lamzbaujsig caeuq conqsig;
coij daixsam gep swjmajnauj, bwzmajnauj caeuq swjsingh;
coij daixseiq gep ceijcanghhiq, hungzmajnauj, bizhiq. Doenghgij neix cungj ij haemq youq aen gvang aeu maegim ma san he.
Moix it gaiq baujsig hih gwnz de caemh luj dik swhcangh yienghmwnq dik it daeglwg Hijswzlez hih gij coh de hwnjbae; cibngeih gaiq baujsig daiqbiuj Hijswzlez vunz hih cibngeih aen cuz.
“Caemh guh song aen gyengx gim hwj riengh youq gaiq baizaek hih song gok gwnz de.
it raeuj riengh youq it aen gyengx gim.
Linghvaih song raeuj, it raeuj riengh it gaiq aeu gim ma san hwj haemq song gaiq baujsig mwnq, gajlaeng caiq riengh hwnj diuz banqmbaq hih dangqnaj bae.
Caiq diz song aen gyengx gim riengh youq gaiq baiz linghvaih song gok youq mbiengj baixndaw de dep hijfuzdwz.
Vanzlij caiq diz song aen gyengx gim hwj, haeuq haeuj song diuz banq dangqnaj hijfuzdwz hih raeuj laj de dep mwnq doxciep de caeuq baixgwnz diuz sai gyaeu gywtgywt de.
Aeu cag lamz ma cug aen gyengx baiz caeuq aen gyengx hijfuzdwz gaenj hwj, hawj gaiq baiz nem youq gwnz diuz sai hijfuzdwz, nem gaenj bae.

“Yaqlwnz haeuj bae cangqbungz hih mwhde, ij raek baj baiz gwnz de dik miz cibngeih daeglwg Hijswzlez hih coh hih baj baiz mwnq, raek youq aen aek mwnq dep aen sim mwnq; yienghmwnq gou, Yehhozvaz, couh ndaejgeiq lo.

Caemh ij dawz gaiq Uhlingz caeuq Dujmingz coengq youq ndaw baizaek hwj. Yaqlwnz daengz dangqnaj Yehhozvaz mwhde, ij raek youq aen aek, couh dwg youq dangqnaj Yehhozvaz ij siengzseiz dawz gaiq gyezdingqbaiz raek youq aen aek.
“Mwngz ij nyib diuz buhbauz lamz mbangjmbaek baixrog he
Diuz bauz ij guh miz mwnq ndonj hoz he. Mwnq ndonj hoz de ij san miz bien hwj, mbouj hawj de yungzheih lig.
Ij aeu mae lamz hah, mae aeuj hah, mae hoengz hah ma san luj aen maksigsoux hwj riengh haeuj diuz bauz hih gij bing de bae,

Yaqlwnz swqhaeuh gou hih mwhde, bietdingh ij daenj diuz bauz neix; daenj le, haeuj cangqbungz bae daengz dangqnaj gou, Yehhozvaz, caeuq de ok ma mwhde, ndaej dingqri doengh aen doengxlingz neix yiengj le, de couh mbouj ngaiz rai lo.
“Mwngz ij aeu gim ma guh baj baiz he, gwnz de ij dik miz ‘Gvi haeuj Yehhozvaz.’
Ij aeu diuz cag lamz he ma cug baj baiz neix youq gwnz boiq duk raeuj mwnq najbyak mwnq he.

Yaqlwnz dawz baj baiz neix cug youq najbyak couh dangq naeuz de gaenq rap hwnj gij vunz Hijswzlez bwiz gou hih mwhde guh loek he lo. De ij siengzseiz dawz baj baiz neix cug youq najbyak; yienghneix gou, Yehhozvaz, caemh haenj gij vunz Hijswzlez nyok hawj gou hih doxgaiq.
“Ij aeu saeqsaeq nuenxnuenx maemaz ma daemj guh boiqsez hwj nyib diuz bauz baixndaw, caemh aeu saeqsaeq nuenxnuenx maemaz ma daemj guh boiq duk raeuj, caemh daemj guh diuz sairwet.
Mwngz caemh ij nyib buhbauz boiqsez caeuq sairwet caeuq boiq duk raeuj hawj doengh daeglwg Yaqlwnz, hawj gyoengqde daenj le, engqgya raen miz vi, cix baenxmbauq.

Mwngz ij hawj daeggo mwngz caeuq doengh daeglwg de daenj doenghgij buh neix, caeuq boiq duk raeuj hah, sairwet hah, caemh raix youz rang hwnj gwnz dingjraeuj gyoengqde hawj gyoengqde gaglingh okdaeuj gvi hawj gou, laeb gyoengqde guh goengjsae dajbwiz he daeuj swqhaeuh gou.
“Aeu boiqmaz ma nyib vaqdonhboux hawj gyoengqde.

Yaqlwnz caeuq doengh daeglwg de haeuj ndaw cangqbungz caeuq gou doxraen he bae cixnaeuz bae dep aen luz dajbwiz daeuj swqhaeuh gou hih mwhde, cungj ij daenj diuz vaqdonhboux neix youq baixndaw, ndaej cw gyeh ndang laj de, mienxndaej ngaiz daekcoih dawz gou le ngaiz rai.
“Gij neix dwg Yaqlwnz caeuq doengh daih gajlaeng de yungjyenj dih gveihdingq.

“Mwngz ij senj Yaqlwnz caeuq doengh daeglwg de okdaeuj gvi hawj gou, laeb gyoengqde guh goengjsae dajbwiz he daeuj swqhaeuh gou. Yiengq ij baenzlaw guh laeb nej? Couh dwg naeuz, mwngz ij aeu duz cwzlwg daeg he caeuq song duz menzyiengzdaeg, doengh duz de ij dwg ndei ndwtndwt mij miz saek yiengh guxmaz he,
caemh aeu gij mbamienh ceiq ndei he ma guh sam cungj mij fat goq hih bingj; cungj he dwg gyaux youz he, cungj he dwg cat youz he, cungj he dwg mij gyaux mij cat saek yiengh he.
Doenghgij bingj neix, mwngz ij coux haeuj ndaw lamz bae, caiq ying duz cwz caeuq song duz menzyiengzdaeg itheij daiq daeuj bwiz gou.
“Mwngz caemh ij daiq Yaqlwnz caeuq doengh daeglwg de daeuj bakdou cangqbungz caeuq gou doxraen he daeuj bang gyoengqde swiq ndang.

Swiq cengh le, couh hawj Yaqlwnz sien daenj diuz bauz baixndaw caeuq diuz bauz baixrog, gajlaeng caiq daenj hijfuzdwz caeuq raek baj baiz dangqnaj aek, caiq cug diuz sai hijfuzdwz daemj gyaeugyaeu ndeindei mwnq.
Gajlaeng caiq dawz mbaw boiq duk raeuj mwnq duk raeuj hawj de le, cij cug baj baiz aeu gim ma guh mwnq cug youq najbyak hawj de.
Daenj doenghgij neix ndaej le, caiq aeu youz rang ma raix hwnj gwnz dingjraeuj de bae,
Mwngz caemh ij hawj doengh daeglwg Yaqlwnz daenj buhbauz boiqsez,
gyaeb sairwet, duk raeuj. Yiengq, Yaqlwnz caeuq doengh daeglwg de couh ciuq yungjyenj mbouj bienq dih gveihdingq guh goengjsae dajbwiz he daeuj swqhaeuh gou.
“Mwngz ij ying duz cwzlwg daeg ndei ndwtndwt mwnq bae daengz dangqnaj cangqbungz caeuq gou doxraen he mwnq, hawj Yaqlwnz caeuq doengh daeglwg de aeu fawz oemj hwnj gwnz raeuj duz de bae.
Yiengq mwngz couh youq bakdou cangqbungz caeuq gou doxraen he, dangqnaj gou, Yehhozvaz, gaj duz cwz neix.
Gaj le, mwngz couh aeu lwgfawz mwngz demj di lwed he hwj hoz haeuj seiq gok dod aen luz dajbwiz bae. Lij lw hih lwed cungj raix haeuj laj aen luz dajbwiz bae liux bae.
Caiq dawz gij lauzvangx saej de caeuq aen daep de hih mwnq ceiq ndei de, song aen mak de caeuq gij lauzvangx gwnz de, cungj coengq haeuj ndaw luz dajbwiz bae coemh hwj dajbwiz.
Lij gij naeng de hah, gij noh de hah, caeuq gij yaxsij de hah cungj ij dawz ok rog bae coemh hwj bwiz cueg coih.
“Mwngz caemhcaiq ying duz menzyiengzdaeg he daeuj, hawj Yaqlwnz caeuq doengh daeglwg de oemj fawz hwnj gwnz raeuj duz de bae.
Yiengq, mwngz couh gaj duz yiengz neix. Aeu gij lwed de saj haeuj seiqhenz aen luz dajbwiz bae le,
mwngz couh heh duz yiengz neix baenx gaiq baenx gaiq bae. Caemhcaiq swiq gij daepdungx yaxsij de caeuq gij ha de cengh bae le, couh dawz doenghgij neix caeuq ndaek raeuj de
coengq haeuj ndaw luz dajbwiz bae, coemh hwj bwiz gou, Yehhozvaz; gij heiq rang de hawj gou roxnginh haenjheiq.
“Mwngz caiq ij ying daixlingh duz menzyiengzdaeg daeuj laem. Yaqlwnz caeuq doengh daeglwg de caemh ij oemj fawz hwnj gwnz raeuj duz de bae.

Mwngz caemh ij gaj duz yiengz neix. Gaj le, couh aeu di lwed he hoz haeuj Yaqlwnz caeuq doengh daeglwg de dih naenhrwz baixgvaz de bae, caiq hoz haeuj lwgfawzmeh baixgvaz caeuq lwgdinmeh baixgvaz gyoengqde bae. Lij lw hih lwed, saj haeuj seiqhenz luz dajbwiz bae.

Caemhcaiq aeu di youz rang he daeuj, caiq daj gwnz aen luz dajbwiz aeu di lwed he ma saj hwnj gwnz ndang Yaqlwnz caeuq doengh daeglwg de daiqlienz doenghheij buh gyoengqde bae. Yiengq doengh diuz buh gwnz ndang gyoengqde couh caeuq gyoengqde doxdoengz, gaglingh okdaeuj gvi hawj gou.

“Mwngz caemh ij aeu gij lauz duz yiengz neix caeuq diuz rieng de, gij lauzvangx saej de, caeuq aen daep de hih mwnq ceiq ndei he hah, song aen mak de caeuq gij lauzvangx gwnz de hah, caeuq bangqha gvaz de hah (aenvih duz yiengz neix dwg aeu ma bwiz hwj laeb goengjsae dajbwiz he),
caiq daj ndaw lamz soengq hawj gou hih aeu aen bingj mij fat goq he, aen bingj gyaux youz mij fat goq he caeuq aen bingj
aeu doenghgij neix hawj Yaqlwnz caeuq doengh daeglwg de aeu ma youq dangqnaj gou, Yehhozvaz, vad hwj dajbwiz.
Gajlaeng, mwngz couh dajlaeng gyoengqde ciep aeu doenghgij neix ma coengq haeuj aen luz dajbwiz bae coemh, coemh hwj bwiz gou. Gij heiq rang coemh hwj dajbwiz neix hawj gou roxnginh haenjheiq.
“Mwngz ij aeu gij noh'aek duz yiengz mwh laeb Yaqlwnz guh boux swqhaeuh gou, soengq hawj gou hih, aeu ma guh vad hwj bwiz gou. Gajlaeng gij noh dajbwiz neix couh dwg gij mwngz lo.

“Couh dwg naeuz laeb guh boux swqhaeuh gou dajbwiz dih gij noh'aek caeuq gij nohha yiengz, vad hwj dajbwiz goq he, doenghgij neix couh bienqbaenz dwg dwzbez he lo, couh ij gvi hawj Yaqlwnz caeuq doengh daeglwg de.
Famzsoj baezneix gij vunz Hijswzlez vih doxhuz hwj bwiz gou, Yehhozvaz, hih gij noh'aek caeuq gij nohha de, cungj dwg gvi hawj Yaqlwnz caeuq gij lwglan de.
“Yaqlwnz rai le, sojmiz gaxgonq de daenj hwj guh goengjsae dajbwiz hih cungj ij cenz hawj gij lwglan de, daihdaih cenz roengzbae, daengz mwh laeb gyoengqde guh goengjsae dajbwiz he daenj.
Gij lwglan Yaqlwnz mboujguenj bouxlawz ciep guh boux goengjsae dajbwiz swqhaeuh gou he, cungj ij bae aen cangqbungz caeuq gou doxraen he bijlienz daenj doenghgij neix caet ngoenz.
“Mwngz ij dawz mwh laeb guh boux swqhaeuh gou bwiz gou hih gij nohyiengz mwnq bae mwnq dieg dwzbez gou cawj.
Yiengq, Yaqlwnz caeuq doengh daeglwg de ij youq bakdou cangqbungz caeuq gou doxraen he gw gij noh duz yiengz neix caeuq gij bingj ndaw lamz.

Caenhgag gyoengqde cij ndaej gw doenghgij neix; aenvih mwh laeb gyoengqde guh boux swqhaeuh gou hih mwhde, gaenq yungh gij noh neix caeuq gij bingj neix ma cueg gij coih bonjfaenh gyoengqde lo, sojhij mbouj dwg goengjsae dajbwiz hih, cungj mbouj ndaej gw.

Hauhnaeuz ngoenz mwnq gij noh dajbwiz caeuq gij bingj dajbwiz gw mbouj liux nex, ij dawz ma coemh bae; mbouj ndaej diuh daengz ngoenz daixngeih gw laem lo, aenvih doenghgij neix gaenq gvi hawj gou lo.
“Mwngz ij ciuq gou raengq mwngz hih yienghmwnq bae bang Yaqlwnz caeuq doengh daeglwg de guh doenghgij saeh neix, couh dwg laeb gyoengqde guh goengjsae dajbwiz dih hong, ij bijlienz guh caet ngoenz.

Mwngz ngoenznaengz cungj ij aeu duz cwzdaeg he daeuj bwiz cueg coih caeuq hawj aen luz dajbwiz bienqbaenz hab'eiq habhoz gou he, caemh hoz youz rang haeuj aen luz dajbwiz bae, hawj aen de gvi hawj gou.

Mwngz ij bijlienz yienghneix guh caet ngoenz, hawj aen luz dajbwiz bienqbaenz dwzbez hwj gaglingh gek okdaeuj he. Mboujguenj vunz haj cixnaeuz guxmaz, bungq dawz ngad dawz aen de hih, cungj ij gvi hawj gou.
“Mwngz ngoenznaengz cungj ij dawz song duz bi he dih yiengzlwg daeg ma dajbwiz,
doengxhaet duz he, yiengqhaemh duz he.
Doengxhaet bwiz hih duz yiengz mwnq, caemh ij aeu song gaen
Daengz yiengqhaemh bwiz hih duz daixngeih caemh ij luj doengxhaet yienghmwnq doxdoengz guh hwj bwiz; cungj dajbwiz hawj gou neix, gij rang de hawj gou roxnginh simsoeng, haenjheiq.

“Gij neix dwg faenhsou seiqseiq daihdaih cungj ij ciuq yienghneix youq bakdou cangqbungz caeuq Cangqdiq doxraen he coemh hwj dajbwiz gou; mwnq caemh dwg gou caeuq faenhsou Hijswzlez vunz doxraen raengq mwngz he.
Gou youq mwnq caeuq gij vunz gou doxraen, gij rongh gou rongh hwj mwnq dieg mwnq youq ndaw lwgra gou bienqbaenz mwnq dwzbez he.
“Gou ij hawj aen cangqbungz caeuq gou doxraen he caeuq aen luz dajbwiz gvi hawj gou. Yaqlwnz caeuq doengh daeglwg de caemh ij gvi hawj gou guh goengjsae dajbwiz he daeuj swqhaeuh gou.
Gou ij youq ndaw Hijswzlez vunz youq, guh gyoengqde dih Cangqdiq.
Gou ij hawj gyoengqde rox gou dwg Yehhozvaz, gyoengqde dih Cangqdiq. Gou daj Ngaihgiz daiq gyoengqde okma, couh dwg ij caeuq gyoengqde youq. Gou dwg Yehhozvaz, gyoengqde dih Cangqdiq.
“Mwngz ij aeu faex gimhhozvuenh ma doq aen cenmonz siu yieng he.
Aen neix dwg seiq cingq seiq gok he, gij raez caeuq gij gvangq de cungj dwg doxdoengz seiqcib haj gunghfaenh, gij sang de goujcib gunghfaenh sang.
Mienh gwnz de hah, seiq gok dod de hah, caeuq seiq bangx de hah cungj ij baux gim hwnjbae; seiqhenz de caemh ij gep miz bien gim hwj.
Vanzlij guh song aen gyengx gim hwj an youq song bangx henz bien gim hih laj de, hawj diuz ram de ndaej con goq bae ram hwj.
Diuz ram neix ij aeu faex gimhhozvuenh ma guh, caemh ij baux gim hwnjbae.
Aen siu yieng ij coengq youq baixrog fanyiemz dangqnaj aen gvih coengq miz baengzgawq mwnq, couh dwg mwnq gou caeuq mwngz doxraen he.
“Haetnaengz daihcaeux, Yaqlwnz daeuj soujsib gij daeng hih mwhde, ij siu gij yieng rang fwtfwt he.
Yiengqhaemh daeuj diemj daeng hih mwhde, caemh ij doxdoengz siu gij yieng rang he. Baezneix faenhsou daihdaih cungj ij siu gij yieng neix; mbouj ndaej dingz.
Mbouj ndaej youq aen siu yieng neix siu daixlingh cungj yieng, caemh mbouj ndaej youq gwnz de coemh noh hwj dajbwiz cixnaeuz baij haeux, baij laeuj dajbwiz.

Yaqlwnz moix it bi ij miz mbat he aeu gij lwed duz bwiz cueg coih mwnq ma hoz haeuj aen siu yieng hih gok dod de bae, hawj aen de yungjyenj ndaej guh aen siu yieng hwj bwiz gou he. Daihdaih cungj ij yienghneix guh; mbouj ndaej dingz. Aen siu yieng neix dwg dwzbez he, caemh dwg bwiz gou, Yehhozvaz cij ndaej yungh he.”
Yehhozvaz caiq doiq Mohsih naeuz:
“Mwngz gyoebsuenq gij vunz Hijswzlez mwhde, bouxboux
Daengh miz coh hih cungj dwg ij ciuq aen caengh cangqbungz yungh he ma gyau, it boux ij gyau roek gwz
“Ngeihcib bi doxhwnj dih vunzsai, daengh miz coh hih, cungj ij soengq gij caenxcingz neix hawj gou.
Gyau cueg mingh hih ngaenz, mbouj faen boux fouq caeuq boux gungz. Boux fouq mbouj lai gyau, boux gungz caemh mbouj noix gyau.

Laeng gij vunz Hijswzlez aeu gij ngaenz neix ma dwg ij hawj cangqbungz caeuq gou doxraen he yungh he. Gij neix dwg gyoengqde vih cueg gij mingh bonjfaenh gyoengqde hwj gien he. Gajlaeng gyoengqde couh ndaejgeiq gyoengqde gien hih ngaenz, couh ngeix daengz gyoengqde youq ndaw lwgra gou, Yehhozvaz, gaenq ndaej cueg mingh lo.”
Yehhozvaz vanzlij caiq doiq Mohsih naeuz:

“Mwngz ij aeu doengz ma guh aen buenz dajswiq caeuq aen gyaq coengq buenz he. Dawz aen buenz neix coux raemx rim hwj, coengq youq cangqbungz caeuq gou doxraen he caeuq aen luz dajbwiz hih cungqgyan he hwj.
Yaqlwnz caeuq doengh daeglwg de haeuj ndaw cangqbungz caeuq gou doxraen he bae
Gyoengqde ij swiq fawz swiq ha cij ndaej mbouj ngaiz rai. Gij neix dwg de caeuq gij lwglan de yungjyenj ij soenhsouj dih gveihdingq.”
Yehhozvaz vanzlij caiq doiq Mohsih naeuz:
“Mwngz ij aeu gij yanghliuq ceiq ndei he, couh dwg raemx mozyoz cibngeih gaen, gveiqbiz rang roek gaen, canghbuj rang roek gaen,
caeuq cibngeih gaen gveiqbiz,
Ij ciuq guh yanghceij yienghmwnq ma guh gij youz rang caenhgag gou cij ndaej yungh he.
Yungh gij youz rang neix ma hoz haeuj aen cangqbungz caeuq gou doxraen he hah, aen gvih coengq miz baengzgawq hah,
daiz baij bingj dajbwiz hah, gwnz daiz soj yungh hih doxgaiq hah, caeuq aen daeng daiqlienz aen de soj yungh hih doxgaiq hah, aen siu yieng hah,
aen luz coemh doenghduz hwj dajbwiz hah caeuq gwnz luz soj yungh hih doxgaiq hah, buenz dajswiq caeuq gyaq buenz hah.
Yiengq hoz goq hih doenghgij neix, couh bienqbaenz dwzbez he, caenhgag ndaej gou yungh he lo. Mboujguenj vunz hah cixnaeuz guxmaz, ngad dawz bungq dawz hih cungj ij gvi hawj gou.
“Mwngz caemh ij raix youz rang hwnj gwnz raeuj Yaqlwnz caeuq doengh daeglwg de bae, laeb gyoengqde guh goengjsae dajbwiz daeuj swqhaeuh gou.
“Mwngz caemh ij naeuz gij vunz Hijswzlez ni, naeuz: ‘Gij youz rang neix dwg faenhsou seiqseiq daihdaih cenmonz vih Yehhozvaz hwj yungh he dih youz.

Mbouj ndaej aeu gij youz neix ma raix hwnj gwnz ndang boux mbouj dwg goengjsae dajbwiz he bae, caemh mbouj ndaej yungh cungj fap neix ma boiq cungj youz neix hwj luenh yungh. Gij youz neix dwg Yehhozvaz cij ndaej yungh; dwg dwzbez hih youz.

Hauhnaeuz miz vunz boiq youz caeuq cungj youz neix doxdoengz, cixnaeuz aeu gij youz de ma raix hwnj gwnz ndang boux mbouj dwg goengjsae dajbwiz he bae nex, couh daj ndaw Hijswzlez vunz cawz gij coh de bae, mbouj hawj de miz faenh.’”

Yehhozvaz caiq doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz ij aeu gij rang fwtfwt dih yanghliuq, couh dwg nazdahfuz hah, cwhhijlez hah, hijliqbijnaz hah, doenghgij rang fwtfwt neix hih yanghliuq caeuq cwnz hih yeijyangh, mwngz cungj ij aeu doxdoengz
ma gyaux hwj, caiq gya gyu haem, ciuq guh yanghceij yienghmwnq boiqfap ma guh gij yieng cenmonz hawj gou yungh he.
Caemh aeu mbangj ma daem mienz hwj dawz daeuj cangqbungz, coengq youq dangqnaj aen gvih coengq miz baengzgawq mwnq, couh dwg mwnq gou caeuq mwngz doxraen he.
“Gij yieng neix dwg dwzbez he; faenhsou mbouj ndaej luenh yungh.
Sojhij faenhsou mbouj ndaej yungh cungj fap neix ma boiq guh gij yieng bonjfaenh, aenvih gij yieng neix dwg gvi hawj gou he, caenhgag gou cij ndaej yungh he.
Hauhnaeuz miz vunz guh doengz cungj yieng neix ma gag yungh hih, couh daj ndaw Hijswzlez vunz cawz gij coh de bae, mbouj hawj de miz faenh.”
Yehhozvaz youhcaiq doiq Mohsih naeuz:
“Mohsih, gou naeuz mwngz ni, gou gaenq daj ndaw cuz Youzdaq genj aeu Bijsajlez okdaeuj lo; Bijsajlez couh dwg daeglan Huqwj, laeq lwg Uhliq.
Gou gaenq hawj gij Hoenzsaenz gou hawj de lo, hawj de ndaej miz coengjmingz, caixhangz, fawzsoem ndaej guh gak cungj dinfawz he,
lujbaenz veh doz hah, aeu gim, aeu ngaenz, aeu doengz hah ma diz gak cungj doxgaiq hah,
caemh rox dik rox baux baujsig hah, rox dik faex hah, caiq rox guh doenghgij saeqmaed dih doxgaiq hah.

“Gou caiq daj aen cuz Danq genj aeu Yaqhozliqyaqbwz, couh dwg daeglwg Yaqhihsajmaz, genj okdaeuj bang de. Gou caemh nyok fawzsoem hawj doenghheij vunz caixhangz he, hawj gyoengqde ndaej guh doenghgij gou raengq mwngz he,
couh dwg aen cangqbungz caeuq gou doxraen he hah, aen gvih coengq miz baengzgawq hah caeuq aen fa de, couh dwg fagoemqcoih hah, ndaw aen cangqbungz caeuq gou doxraen he soj yungh dih doxgaiq hah,
daiz baij bingj dajbwiz caeuq gwnz daiz soj yungh hih doxgaiq, daeng gim caeuq daeng gim soj yungh hih doxgaiq, aen siu yieng hah,
aen luz coemh hwj dajbwiz hah caeuq gwnz luz soj yungh hih doxgaiq hah, aen buenz dajswiq hah caeuq gyaq buenz hah,
Yaqlwnz caeuq doengh daeglwg de guh goengjsae dajbwiz daenj hih doenghgij buh gyaeugyaeu ndeindei he hah,
gij youz rang hah, caeuq ndaw cangqbungz soj yungh hih yieng hah, doenghgij neix gyoengqde cungj ij ciuq gou raengq mwngz hih yienghmwnq bae guh.”
Yehhozvaz youhcaiq doiq Mohsih naeuz:

“Mwngz ij naeuz gij vunz Hijswzlez ni, naeuz: ‘Faenhsou bietdingh ij soenhsouj ngoenzyietbaeg gou, aenvih ngoenz neix dwg gou dingh hawj faenhsou seiqseiq daihdaih guh geiqniemh he, dwg hawj faenhsou rox dwg gou, Yehhozvaz, senj aeu faenhsou he.

Faenhsou bietdingh ij soenhsouj ngoenzyietbaeg. Bouxlawz mbouj dawz haeuj rwz ngoenzyietbaeg, yawj mbouj hwnj ngoenzyietbaeg nex, couh gaj bouxlawz. Bouxlawz youq ngoenzyietbaeg vanzlij guh hong hih, couh mbouj suenq dwg gij vunz gou lo.

Faenhsou miz roek ngoenz ndaej guh hong, hoeng, daixcaet ngoenz dwg ngoenzyietbaeg, dwg ngoenz dwzbez gvi hawj gou he; mbouj ndaej guh hong. Bouxlawz youq ngoenzyietbaeg guh hong hih, couh gaj bouxlawz.
Sojhij, gij vunz Hijswzlez seiqseiq daihdaih cungj ij soenhsouj gou dingh hawj gyoengqde dih ngoenzyietbaeg.
Gij neix dwg gou caeuq gij vunz Hijswzlez yungjyenj dih baengzgawq. Aenvih roek ngoenz ndaw de, gou, Yehhozvaz, cauh mbwn cauh deih, daixcaet ngoenz sat hong yietbaeg lo.’”
Yehhozvaz youq bya Sihnaiq caeuq Mohsih gangj doenghgij vah neix sat le, couh dawz song baj rin aeu lwgfawz de ma dik miz hih fazliz, gyau hawj Mohsih.

Caiq gangj daengz Mohsih hwnj bya bae, gij vunz Hijswzlez raen Mohsih baenx gauqcaez lo, vanzlij mijyaengz raen roengz bya ma, yiengq gyoengqde couh daixgya bae cam Yaqlwnz naeuz: “Boux daiq gyoengqraeuz daj Ngaihgiz okma hih hax, mbouj rox hih de seizneix baenzlawz yiengh lah. Mboujyienz mwngz cauh duz you he daeuj daiq gyoengqraeuz bax!”
Yaqlwnz dingq le, couh doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou duet aeu gij ngaexgim heij yah heij lwg faenhsou dawz daeuj hawj gou bax.”
Gajlaeng, gyoengqde sojmiz hih vunz cungj duet dawz bae hawj Yaqlwnz.
Yaqlwnz couh dawz doenghgij ngaexgim neix ma diz guh duz cwzlwg daeg he.
Gyoengqde raen le, cungj hemq naeuz: “Hijswzlez vunz hax! Gij neix couh dwg daiq mwngz ok Ngaihgiz ma dih cwnz!”
Yaqlwnz raen yienghneix le, couh youq dangqnaj duz cwzlwg neix caeb aen luz dajbwiz he, caiq yiengq gyoengq vunz senhbuq naeuz: “Ngoenzcog ij vih Yehhozvaz souj ciet.”
Yiengq daengz ngoenz daixngeih daihcaeux, gyoengq vunz couh ying doenghduz daeuj coemh hwj dajbwiz caeuq bwiz doxhuz. Bwiz sat le, caiq gwgw angqangq, rek ruxrux.

Yiengq caiq gangj daengz Mohsih youq gwnz bya Sihnaiq, Yehhozvaz doiq de gangj vah sat le, de vanzlij caiq doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz vaiqdi roengz maj bax, aenvih mwngz daj Ngaihgiz daiq okma hih gij vunz mwngz famh coih lo.
Gyoengqde baenxlai vaiq couh lumz gou soj raengq gyoengqde dih vah, gag diz duz cwzlwg he hwj ma baiq, vanzlij naeuz: ‘Hijswzlez vunz hax, duz cwz neix dwg daiq mwngz daj Ngaihgiz okma dih cwnz!’”
Yehhozvaz caiq doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Gou rox gyoengq vunz neix nga'ngangq ij rai.
Seizneix mwngz gaejyungh lanz gou; caih gou fatheiq gyoengqde, fatheiq hawj gyoengqde rairaeg raicied bae, hawj doengh daih gajlaeng mwngz fat lai hwj bienqbaenz aen guek hunghung he bae.”

Gajlaeng, Mohsih gouz Yehhozvaz, de dih Cangqdiq, naeuz: “Yehhozvaz hax, mwngz vihmaz doiq gij vunz mwngz fatheiq nex? Gyoengqde dwg mwngz yungh gij akak rengzrengz mwngz dajlwh Ngaihgiz daiq gyoengqde okma hah.

Vihmaz ij hawj gij vunz Ngaihgiz luenhlaih naeuz mwngz guqiq daiq gyoengqde ok Ngaihgiz ma, siengj hawj gyoengqde rai youq gwnz bya, hawj gyoengqde rairaeg raicied bae nej? Gouz mwngz gaejyungh aeuqheiq, gaejyungh hawj gyoengqde souh nanh.

Gouz mwngz ndaejgeiq bouxhoiq mwngz Yaqbwzlahhanj, Hijsaj caeuq Hijswzlez, ndaejgeiq mwngz doiq gyoengqde yungh gij coh bonjfaenh mwngz ma fazsiq goq, ij hawj doengh daih gajlaeng gyoengqde fatdad lailai hwj luj gij ndaundeiq gwnzmbwn, vanzlij dawz mwngz dapwngq goq dih mwnq dieg mwnq soengq hawj doengh daih gajlaeng gyoengqde ma guh gyadangq, caemh dwg seiqseiz mbouj rox duet he dih gyadangq.”
Mohsih yienghneix gouz le, gajlaeng Yehhozvaz couh sim'unq hwj hozroengz mbouj caiq fatheiq, mbouj hawj gij vunz Hijswzlez ngaiz raicied lo.
Yiengq Mohsih couh dawz
Mwh de roengz bya ma hih mwhde, Yozcuhyaq baex dingqri gyoengq vunz hemq yuxyux he, couh doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Youq ndaw yingz miz sing doxhoenx.”
Mohsih han naeuz: “Ox, mbouj dwg! Mbouj dwg sing doxhoenx; sing hoenxhingz cix mbouj dwg, sing hoenx saw cix mbouj dwg. Gou dingqri hih dauq dwg sing vunz ciengq go lah.”

Gajlaeng Mohsih byaij gaenh gyoengq vunz le, couh yawjraen cwzlwg gim caeuq gyoengq vunz saetsaet diuqdiuq, yiengq de couh hujheiq dengxdengx hwj dawz song baj rin dik miz fazliz hih boemz youq laj dinbya, soiq liux.
Caiq dawz gyoengqde diz hih duz cwzlwg mwnq coemh bae, muh mienzmienz hwj saj roengz raemx bae fad hawj gyoengqde gw.
De yienghneix guh le, couh doiq Yaqlwnz naeuz: “Gyoengq vunz neix doiq mwngz guh lo gijmaz? Mwngz vihmaz hawj gyoengqde gij coih naek neix!”
Hoeng, Yaqlwnz de dauq han naeuz: “Bouxcawj hax, gouz mwngz gaejyungh fatheiq. Mwngz caemh rox, gij vunz neix cungj haenj guh yak guh rwix.

Gyoengqde doiq gou naeuz: ‘Gyoengqraeuz mbouj rox boux daiq gyoengqraeuz ok Ngaihgiz ma hih boux mwnq, mbouj rox hih de ngaiz roeb daengz gijmaz saeh. Sojhij mwngz guh duz you he ma daiq gyoengqraeuz.’
Yiengq gou couh doiq gyoengqde naeuz: ‘Bouxlawz raek miz gim hih aeu daeuj hawj gou.’ Gajlaeng gyoengqde couh dawz daeuj hawj gou; gou couh gveng haeuj feiz bae, duz cwzlwg neix couh ok daeuj lo.”
Mohsih raen Yaqlwnz mbouj guenj gyoengq vunz, sawj gyoengqde baenxlai laengzsaengj, hawj dizyinz dawz ma guh vahriu.

De raen yienghneix le, couh ndwn youq bak yingz, hemq gyoengq vunz naeuz: “Bouxlawz haenj haeuj Yehhozvaz hih, couh goq gou mwnqneix daeuj!” Gajlaeng gij lwglan Liqveiq cungj goq laeng de mwnq bae doxcomz.

De couh doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Yehhozvaz, Hijswzlez dih Cangqdiq, yienghneix naeuz: ‘Faenhsou gak vunz cungj ij dawz giemq hwj daj ndaw yingz hih bakdou neix daengz bakdou mwnq byaij bae ma song ngaux, nyangz beixnuengx gaj beixnuengx, nyangz baengzyoux gaj baengzyoux, nyangz gekleiz gaj gekleiz.’”
Yiengq gij lwglan Liqveiq caemh ciuq gij vah Mohsih bae guh lo. Ngoenz mwnq, ngaiz gaj hih vunz daihgaiq miz samcien vunz.

Mohsih caiq doiq gij vunz Liqveiq naeuz: “Ngoenzneix faenhsou gaglingh okma gvi hawj Yehhozvaz, dingq gij vah de, gaj gij lwg bonjfaenh, gaj gij goengjlungz nuengxau caeuq gaj baengzyoux. Yiengq Yehhozvaz couh soengq fuk hawj faenhsou.”

Daengz ngoenz daixngeih, Mohsih doiq gyoengq vunz naeuz: “Faenhsou famh coih hung lo. Seizneix gou ij doiqyungz hwnj bae laeng Yehhozvaz, saekseiz lij ij ndaej bang faenhsou gouz de mienx gij coih faenhsou.”
Mohsih dauq bae daengz Yehhozvaz mwnq, naeuz: “Aex! Gyoengq vunz neix famh coih hung lo, gag cauh you hwj baiq.
Gouz mwngz mienx gij coih gyoengqde; hauhnaeuz mwngz mbouj nyienh mienx gij coih gyoengqde nex, couh cingj mwngz dajlwh bonjbouh mwngz geiq miz mingzcoh he cawz gij coh gou bae.”
Gajlaeng Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Bouxlawz daekcoih gou, gou couh daj ndaw bonjbouh gou duz gij coh bouxlawz.

Mwngz seizneix bae daiq gyoengq vunz bae mwnq gou naeuz mwngz ni hih mwnq dieg mwnq bae; miz bouxcai gou youq dangqnaj faenhsou daiq roen. Cijmboujgoq, cungj veiq miz ngoenz he, gou ij fad gyoengqde.”
Aenvih gyoengq vunz hawj Yaqlwnz cauh cwzlwg ma baiq, sojhij, Yehhozvaz couh hawj gyoengqde miz nanh.

Gajlaeng Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz daiq gyoengq mwngz daj Ngaihgiz daiq okma hih vunz daj mwnqneix bae mwnq gou baujcingq goq nyok hawj Yaqbwzlahhanj, Hijsaj, Yajgoz dih doengh daih gajlaeng de hih mwnq dieg mwnq bae.

Gou ij baij bouxcai he hawj faenhsou daiq roen, boenq dieg mwnq hih Gyahnamz vunz hah, Yaqmohliq vunz hah, Hwz vunz hah, Bijliqsij vunz hah, Hihveiq vunz hah, Yehbuqswh vunz hah, boenq gyoengqde deuz.

Mwngz bae hih mwnq dieg mwnq dwg gvangq yubyub, ndaem gogo cungj baenz he. Hoeng, gou mbouj caeuq faenhsou bae, aenvih faenhsou daiq nga'ngangq lai, hoengjlau gou youq dangjroen dawz faenhsou gajrai raeg bae.”

Yehhozvaz caiq doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz ij doiq gij vunz Hijswzlez naeuz: ‘Yehhozvaz naeuz: “Faenhsou dwg nga'ngangq hih vunz; gou baex caeuq faenhsou he, couh ij dawz faenhsou gaj liux bae. Sojhij seizneix faenhsou ij dawz gwnz ndang faenhsou raek miz hih ngaexgim hah, haedfawz hah, hangqlenq hah, dungjdungj duet roengzma, yiengq gou cij rox ij baenzlawz doiq faenhsou.”’”
Couh yienghneix, gij vunz Hijswzlez daj mwh ok

Mwhde, moix it mbat gij vunz Hijswzlez cap yingz, Mohsih cungj youq mwnq liz aen yingz mauqhuz gyae he mwnq dap cangqbungz. De heuh aen cangqbungz neix heuh guh ‘cangqbungz caeuq Cangqdiq doxraen he.’
Yiengq moix it mbat Mohsih bae aen cangqbungz neix, gyoengq vunz cungj gag vunz gag ndwn youq bak cangqbungz bonjfaenh yawj, yawj daengz Mohsih haeuj aen cangqbungz neix bae.
Moix it mbat Mohsih haeuj bae daengz cangqbungz le, cungj miz diuz saeu fwj he roengz bakdou cangqbungz neix daeuj, Yehhozvaz cungj caeuq Mohsih gangj vah.
Yiengq gyoengq vunz bouxboux baex raen diuz saeu fwj dingz youq bak cangqbungz neix he, cungj bomz roengzma sax.

Yehhozvaz caeuq Mohsih gangj vah cungj dwg naj doiq naj hwj gangj he, caenh lujnaeuz caeuq baengzyoux gangj vah yienghmwnq. Yiengq Mohsih moix it mbat dauq ma ndaw yingz, boux hauxseng bang de Yozcuhyaq, daeglwg Naenq, de cungj dwg vanzlij youq ndaw cangqbungz neix.

Yiengq miz mbat he, Mohsih doiq Yehhozvaz naeuz: “Mwngz raengq gou naeuz: ‘Daiq gyoengq vunz bae,’ hoeng, mwngz mij hawj gou rox byawz caeuq gou bae hah. Mwngz caenhgag naeuz: ‘Gou rox mwngz caemh ndiep mwngz,’ gawq neix lax,

yiengq, hauhnaeuz seizneix mwngz cingqcaen ndiep gou nex, gouz mwngz naeuz gou ni mwngz dih cawjeiq, gou cij ndaej rox ij baenzlaw ciuq gij cawjeiq mwngz bae guh hab'eiq habhoz mwngz hah. Caemh gouz mwngz ndaejgeiq gyoengq vunz neix; gyoengqde cungj dwg gij vunz mwngz.”
Yiengq Yehhozvaz han de naeuz: “Gou gaengjdingq caeuq mwngz bae, hawj mwngz haemq mbouj you, haemq simsoeng.”
Gajlaeng, Mohsih naeuz: “Hauhnaeuz mwngz mbouj caeuq gyoengqraeuz bae nex, gouz mwngz gaejyungh hawj gyoengqraeuz daj mwnqneix senj deuz.

Hauhnaeuz mwngz mbouj caeuq gyoengqraeuz bae, gij vunz baenzlawz rox mwngz ndiep gou caeuq ndiep gij vunz mwngz nej? Mbouj dwg miz mwngz caeuq raeuz bae, cij ndaej hawj gou caeuq gij vunz mwngz caeuq lajmbwn fanh aen minzcuz dih vunz faengek hwnjdaeuj maz?”
Yehhozvaz han Mohsih naeuz: “Ndaej hah, mwngz gouz hih, gou cungj dapwngq mwngz, aenvih gou ndiep mwngz, caemh rox mwngz.”
Yiengq Mohsih caiq naeuz: “Gouz mwngz hawj gou caenra raen gij rongh mwngz, ndaej lwi?”

Yehhozvaz caiq han naeuz: “Gou ij yienh gou sojmiz hih ndei youq dangqnaj mwngz hawj mwngz raen, caemh youq dangqnaj mwngz naeuz gij coh gou, Yehhozvaz. Gou ij ndiep byawz, couh ndiep byawz; gou ij cojgvaq byawz, couh cojgvaq byawz.”
Yehhozvaz youhcaiq naeuz: “Gou mbouj hawj mwngz raen baj naj gou law, aenvih raen gou hih vunz cungj ij ngaiz rai.”
Yehhozvaz vanzlij caiq naeuz: “Hoeng, youq henz ndang gou miz ndaek ngauq rin hung he; mwngz ij ndwn hwnj gwnz rin bae.
Mwh gij rongh gou goq dangqnaj mwngz bae hih mwhde, gou ij dawz mwngz coengq haeuj ngvamh rin bae, aeu gij fawz gou ma goemq mwngz hwj, daengj gou goq bae.
Goq bae le, gou couh sou gij fawz gou, yiengq mwngz caenhgag ndaej raen baixlaeng gou, mbouj ndaej raen baj naj gou.”
Yehhozvaz raengq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz ij siuq song baj rin luj song baj rin gaxgonq mwnq; gou ij dawz ngaiz mwngz dub soiq hih song baj rin gwnz de dik miz fazliz hih doiqyungz dik hwnj gwnz de bae.
Mwngz ij cwnjbiq ndei ngoenzcog doengxhaet daihcaeux, hwnj gwnz dingj bya Sihnaiq bae cimh gou.
Mboujcwnj miz vunz gaen mwngz hwnj bae. Baenx aen bya cungj mboujcwnj miz vunz, laj dinbya caemh mboujcwnj miz cwz, miz yiengz gw nywj.”

Yiengq Mohsih couh siuq song baj rin luj song baj gaxgonq ityiengh. Daengz ngoenz daixngeih daihcaeux, de couh ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq hih yienghmwnq, dawz song baj rin hwnj gwnz dingj bya Sihnaiq bae lo.
Yehhozvaz youq ndaw fwj caeuq gij fwj roengz daeuj, ndwn youq Mohsih ndwn youq hih mwnq, couh gag heuh ‘Yehhozvaz,’ gij coh bonjfaenh de.

Gajlaeng Yehhozvaz daj dangqnaj Mohsih goq bae, couh naeuz: “Gou dwg Yehhozvaz! Gou dwg miz cojgvaq caiq sim'unq he dih Cangqdiq, mbouj laizluenh fatheiq, cix lauxsaed cix aiq vunz raixcaix he dih Cangqdiq.

Gij aiq gou louz daengz cien nienz fanh daih, caemh mienx coih, mienx gij doegdoeg siebsieb he, hoeng, gou caemh mbouj dawz miz coih dangq mij coih ma yawj, dauqfanj ij fad boux miz coih he, fad daengz sam seiq daih gajlaeng de bae.”
Mohsih dingq le, nyungjnyat bomz roengz doem bae sax,

naeuz: “Yehhozvaz hax, hauhnaeuz mwngz ndiep gou nex, gouz mwngz buenx raeuz caeuq raeuz bae. Gannaeuz gyoengq vunz neix nga'ngangq raixcaix lah, hoeng, cungj gouz mwngz mienx gij coih gyoengqraeuz, sou gyoengqraeuz ma guh gij gyadangq mwngz bax.”

Yehhozvaz caiq doiq Mohsih naeuz: “Seizneix gou ij baujcingq, ij youq dangqnaj gij vunz Hijswzlez guh gij saeh geizmiuj he, youq lajmbwn sojmiz hih dieg, sojmiz hih minzcuz cungj mijyaengz raen goq he. Gij vunz seiqhenz mwngz cungj rox dwg gou, Yehhozvaz guh he, aenvih gou guh hih gij saeh neix dwg hawj vunz lau he.

Gou caemh ij bang mwngz boenq Yaqmohliq vunz hah, Gyahnamz vunz hah, Hwz vunz hah, Bijliqsij vunz hah, Hihveiq vunz hah, Yehbuqswh vunz hah deuz bae. Gou yienghneix bang mwngz, yiengq mwngz caemh ij soenhsouj gou dingh hawj mwngz hih,
couh dwg mwngz ijaeu siujsim, mwngz mbouj ndaej caeuq doenghgij vunz mwnq mwngz bae daengz goq he doxdingh gijmaz, hoengjlau mwngz ngaiz luj duz nou yienghmwnq ngaiz aen canggaep gaep dawz.
Dauqfanj vanzlij ij cek aen daiz dajbwiz gyoengqde, dub soiq dongqsix caeuq duz you gyoengqde.
“Mbouj ndaej baiq gak cungj you, aenvih gou, Yehhozvaz, rahoengz he; gij coh gou couh dwg ‘Rahoengz.’

Mwngz mbouj ndaej caeuq gij vunz dieg mwnq miz gijmaz doxdingh, hoengjlau gyoengqde baiq gij you gyoengqde, bwiz gij you gyoengqde caemh iu faenhsou bae gw gij noh dajbwiz de, guh gij saeh mbouj ya mbouj yongq he.
Daeglwg faenhsou caemh veiq aeu gij lwgsau gyoengqde ma guh yah. Dahlwg gyoengqde caemh baiq gij you gyoengqde, caemh hawj daeglwg faenhsou gaen gyoengqde baiq.
“Faenhsou mbouj ndaej gag cauh you ma baiq.

“Faenhsou ij souj aen ciet Cawz Yauqmuj he, ij ciuq gou raengq mwngz hih, youq ndwen Yaqbiz soj gveihdingq hih, ij gw caet ngoenz mij fat goq hih bingj, aenvih faenhsou dwg youq ndwen Yaqbiz ndaej ok Ngaihgiz ma he.
“Daeglwg daeuz faenhsou caeuq sojmiz roengz daixdaeuz hih cukseng daeg, mboujguenj cwz haj cixnaeuz yiengz, cungj dwg gvi hawj gou.

Hoeng, doengh duz lawz roengz daixdaeuz he ndaej aeu yiengzlwg ma cueg; hauhnaeuz mbouj cueg ma nex, couh ij ngaiz doh gij hoz duz de raek. Faenhsou sojmiz seng daixdaeuz hih lwg vunzsai cungj ij cueg ma.
“Faenhsou mbouj ndaej fawz hoengq daeuj yawj gou.
“Faenhsou ndaej guh roek ngoenz hong, hoeng, daixcaet ngoenz, faenhsou ij yietbaeg; cungjsuenq naeuz daengz mwh dajndaem dajsou he, caemh ij ciuqyiengh yietbaeg.
“Daengz ndaej sou mienh mwhde, ij souj aen ciet Caetcaet, gyau gij mienh ngamq sou moq haeujma he. Daengz nienzdaej, caemh ij souj aen ciet Diuh Mienh.
“Ndaw ranz faenhsou sojmiz hih vunzsai, binaengz daengz sam aen ciet neix caemh ij daeuj bwiz gou, Yehhozvaz, Hijswzlez dih Cangqdiq.

Gou ij dajlaeng faenhsou mwnq boenq lingh aen minzcuz deuz, hawj faenhsou ndaej miz dieg lai; daengz binaengz faenhsou daeuj baiq gou, Yehhozvaz, sam mbat mwhde, couh mbouj lau miz vunz daeuj ciemq aeu gij dieg faenhsou lo.
“Mwngz dawz gij lwed doenghduz daeuj dajbwiz hih mwhde, mbouj ndaej dawz gij bingj fat goq he daeuj doxcaeuq dajbwiz.
“Doenghgij noh bwiz aen ciet Bienqgoqbae hih, mbouj ndaej diuh daengz haet daixngeih.
“Mwngz ij dawz mwngz soj sou ndaej haeujma hih, ij aeu gij sou ceiq daixdaeuz he dawz bae soengq hawj gou, Yehhozvaz, mwngz dih Cangqdiq.
“Mbouj ndaej aeu nauq yiengzmeh ma cawj duz yiengzlwg bonjfaenh de.”

Yehhozvaz vanzlij raengq Mohsih naeuz: “Mwngz ij dawz doenghgij vah neix sij hwnjdaeuj, aenvih gou ij dawz gij vah neix ma guxdingh, dingh baujcingq lienz diuzgyenq hawj mwngz caeuq gij vunz Hijswzlez.”

Couh yienghneix, Mohsih youq gwnz bya laeng Yehhozvaz mwnq youq baenx seiqcib ngwnzngoenz, mbouj gw haeux, mbouj gw raemx. Gajlaeng Yehhozvaz vanzlij dawz cib diuz fazliz dik hwnj gwnz song baj rin neix bae.
Mohsih dawz song baj rin dik miz cib diuz fazliz he daj gwnz bya Sihnaiq roengz ma mwhde, cungj mbouj rox bonjfaenh de vih Yehhozvaz caeuq de gangj vah hwj naj rongh sagsag.
Yaqlwnz caeuq gij vunz Hijswzlez raen baj naj Mohsih rongh sagsag le, cungj lau hwj mbouj gamj dep de.
Mohsih raen yienghneix le, couh heuh gyoengqde goq daeuj, yiengq Yaqlwnz caeuq gij vunz Hijswzlez hih doengh boux lingjdauj he cungj goq laeng de daeuj. Mohsih couh caeuq gyoengqde gangj vah.
Gajlaeng gij vunz Hijswzlez caemh daeuj dep de, yiengq de couh gangj naeuz gyoengqde ni Yehhozvaz dih mingqlingq.
Mohsih caeuq gyoengqde gangj sat le, couh aeu sujbaq ma goemq naj hwj.

Moix it mbat Mohsih bae caeuq Yehhozvaz gangj vah mwhde, cungj dwg dawz mbaw sujbaq goemq naj de roengz; moix it mbat Yehhozvaz caeuq de gangj vah, de cungj caiq ok ma gangj naeuz gyoengq vunz ni Yehhozvaz caeuq de gangj hih vah.
Mohsih raen gyoengq vunz lau raen baj naj de rongh, youhcaiq doiqyungz aeu sujbaq ma goemq naj hwj, goemq daengz de caiq bae caeuq Yehhozvaz gangj vah mwhde cij dawz mbaw de roengz.
Gajlaeng, Mohsih heuh gij vunz Hijswzlez daeuj doxcomz, doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou ij ciuq gij vah Yehhozvaz bae guh,
couh dwg faenhsou ndaej guh roek ngoenz hong; ngoenz daixcaet dwg ngoenzyietbaeg, dwg gvi hawj Yehhozvaz guh ngoenz yietbaeg he. Mboujguenj byawz youq ngoenz neix guh hong hih couh ij gajrai byawz.
Youq ngoenz ngoenzyietbaeg, mboujguenj youq ndaw ranz bonjfaenh
Mohsih doiq sojmiz hih Hijswzlez vunz naeuz: “Yehhozvaz yienghneix naeuz:
‘Faenhsou ij soengq caenxcingz hawj gou, Yehhozvaz. Famz dwg nyienh'eiq soengq hih, couh dwg ndaej soengq gim hah, ngaenz hah, doengz hah,
maemaz lamz hah, maemaz aeuj hah, maemaz hoengz hah, caeuq fwn yiengzbya hah,
naeng yiengzgoeng yomx hoengz hah, naeng haijbauq
youz daeng hah, guh youz rang caeuq guh yieng hih yanghliuq hah,
aeu ma gep diuz buh hijfuzdwz caeuq baj baizaek hih hungzmajnauj hah caeuq gak cungj baujsig hah.’
“Faenhsou bouxlawz fawzsoem caixhangz hih cungj ij daeuj guh Yehhozvaz soj raengq hih,
couh dwg cangqbungz caeuq fan goemq cangqbungz hah, gij ngaeu de hah, benj hah, diuz faex lanz vang he hah, diuz dongh hah, congh cap he hah,
aen gvih coengq miz baengzgawq caeuq diuz faex ram de hah, fagoemqcoih caeuq fanyiemz gek fungh hah,
aen daiz baij bingj dajbwiz caeuq diuz faex ram de hah, vanzlij miz gwnz daiz sojmiz hih doxgaiq hah, gij bingj dajbwiz he hah,
aen gyaqdaeng caeuq de hih gak yiengh doxgaiq, daeng caeuq youz hah,
aen siu yieng caeuq diuz faex ram de hah, youz rang caeuq yieng hah, fanyiemz bakdou cangqbungz hah,
aen luz coemh doenghduz hwj dajbwiz caeuq gij vangx doengz gwnz de hah, diuz faex ram de hah, caeuq de sojmiz hih doxgaiq hah, buenz dajswiq caeuq gyaq coengq buenz hah,
boiq veizciengz hah, doengh diuz dongh caeuq doengh congh cap diuz dongh de hah, fan yiemzdou veizciengz hah,
cangqbungz caeuq veizciengz hih doengh diuz ding de caeuq doengh diuz cag de hah,
vanzlij miz goengjsae dajbwiz soj daenj hih buh hah, couh dwg Yaqlwnz caeuq doengh daeglwg de youq ndaw veizciengz cangqbungz guh dajbwiz swqhaeuh Yehhozvaz daenj hih buh hah.”
Gij vunz Hijswzlez dajlaeng Mohsih mwnq sanq le,

doengh boux nyienh'eiq soengq doxgaiq hawj Yehhozvaz hih cungj daeuj soengq hwj hemq bae, soengq hawj guh cangqbungz caeuq Cangqdiq doxraen he soj yungh hih hah, diuz buh goengjsae dajbwiz daenj hih hah.
Moix it boux nyienh'eiq soengq hih vunzsai vunzbaz cungj dawz gim daeuj lo: nep gim hah, ngaexrwz gim hah, haedfawz gim hah, gim hangqlenq hah, doenghgij neix, cungj soengq daeuj hawj Yehhozvaz.
Bouxlawz miz maemaz lamz hah, maemaz aeuj hah, maemaz hoengz hah, fwn yiengzbya hah, naeng yiengzgoeng yomx hoengz hah, naeng haijbauq hah cungj dawz daeuj soengq.
Famz bouxlawz miz ngaenz caeuq miz doengz ndaej soengq hawj Yehhozvaz hih cungj dawz daeuj lo. Famz bouxlawz miz faex gimhhozvuenh ndaej guh gijmaz hih caemh cungj dawz daeuj lo.
Doenghgij vunzbaz fawzsoem, caixhangz, rox laenz mae hih, couh dwg aeu maemaz lamz hah, maemaz aeuj hah, maemaz hoengz hah ma laenz hih caemh dawz daeuj soengq lo.
Gyoengqde caemh aeu fwn yiengzbya ma laenz mae.
Gij vunz Hijswzlez hih doengh boux dang ak he caemh dawz hungzmajnauj hah, gak cungj baujsig hah, doenghgij ndaej aeu ma gep hwnj gwnz hijfuzdwz caeuq gij baizaek bae hih daeuj lo.
Gyoengqde caemh aeu gij ndaej guh yieng hih liuh hah, youz daeng hah, caeuq guh youz rang hih liuh hah daeuj.

Gij vunz Hijswzlez mboujguenj vunzsai haj cixnaeuz vunzbaz, famz nyienh'eiq soengq doxgaiq hawj Yehhozvaz hih cungj soengq daeuj lo, soengq daeuj aeu ma guh Yehhozvaz raengq Mohsih soj ij guh dih saeh.
Mohsih doiq gij vunz Hijswzlez naeuz: “Yehhozvaz gaenq senj Bijsajlez lo; Bijsajlez dwg aen cuz Youzdaq he, dwg daeglwg Uhliq, caemh dwg daeglan Huqwj.
Gij Hoenzsaenz Yehhozvaz caemh hwnj gwnz ndang de, hawj de cix caixhangz cix coengjmingz, gijmaz hong cungj ndaej guh,
lujbaenz veh doz hah, aeu gim, aeu ngaenz, aeu doengz hah ma diz gak cungj doxgaiq hah,
caemh ndaej dik ndaej baux baujsig hah, dik faex hah, caemhcaiq rox gak cungj dinfawz hah.
Yehhozvaz caemhcaiq hawj de caeuq Yaqhozliqyaqbwz boux neix (de dwg ndaw cuz Danq he, dwg daeglwg Yaqhihsajmaz) hawj song boux de miz bonjsaeh ndaej son vunz.

Yehhozvaz hawj gyoengqde miz bonjsaeh, caixhangz, coengjmingz, ndaej guh gak cungj hong. Mboujguenj dik doxgaiq haj cixnaeuz veh doz, cixnaeuz aeu maemaz lamz, maemaz aeuj, maemaz hoengz hah ma daemj boiq cungj ndaej.”

Mohsih caiq naeuz: “Bijsajlez caeuq Yaqhozliqyaqbwz caeuq gak boux miz dinfawz hih—couh dwg Yehhozvaz soengq hawj gyoengqde hih caixhangz, coengjmingz, hawj gyoengqde rox guh aen ranz Cangqdiq youq dih gak cungj hong hih—cungj ij ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq hih yienghmwnq bae guh.”
Mohsih heuh Bijsajlez, Yaqhozliqyaqbwz caeuq doengh boux Yehhozvaz soengq hawj gyoengqde hih caixhangz hah, coengjmingz hah daeuj guh hong.

Gyoengqde dajlaeng Mohsih lingx doenghgij vunz Hijswzlez soengq daeuj guh aen ranz Cangqdiq youq hih doxgaiq. Hoeng, gij vunz Hijswzlez moix ngoenz doengxhaet cungj lij nyienh'eiq soengq doxgaiq daeuj,
guh hwj doengh boux fuqswz guh aen ranz Cangqdiq youq he mbouj ndaej mbouj dingz hong hwj
bae naeuz Mohsih ni, naeuz: “Gij vunz soj soengq hih doxgaiq gaenq cauhgoq Yehhozvaz soj raengq hih lo.”

Yiengq Mohsih couh mingqlingq cenz yingz naeuz: “Faenhsou mbouj caiq vih guh aen ranz Cangqdiq youq hih hwj soengq doxgaiq daeuj lo.” Mohsih yienghneix naeuz le, gajlaeng gyoengq vunz cij mbouj soengq doxgaiq daeuj,
aenvih gij vunz soengq daeuj hih doxgaiq gaenq gaeuq guh aen ranz Cangqdiq soj yungh hih vanzlij lw.

Doengh boux fawzsoem caixhangz he yungh cib fuk boiq ma guhbaenz cangqbungz. Doengh fan boiq neix dwg Bijsajlez aeu saeqsaeq nuenxnuenx hih maemaz lamz hah, maemaz aeuj hah, maemaz hoengz hah ma daemj hwj guhbaenz he; gwnz de vanzlij daemj miz duz gihluqbwz hwj.
Moix fuk boiq dih cikconq cungj dwg doxdoengz; gij raez de miz cibngeih mij raez, gij gvangq de miz song mij gvangq.
Gyoengqde haj fuk haj fuk doxneb swnj hwnjdaeuj guhbaenz song fuk.
Song fuk neix hih fuk he gij bien gatsat de caeuq daixlingh fuk hih gij bien daixdaeuz de cungj guh miz hajcib aen nuk lamz, caemh dwg nuk caeuq nuk doxdoiq.
Gyoengqde caemh guh miz hajcib gaiq ngaeu gim, dawz song fuk neix ngaeu doxlienz hwnjdaeuj ndaej guhbaenz aen cangqbungz he.
Gyoengqde caemh aeu fwn yiengzbya ma guh cib'it fan boiq, aeu ma guh goemq gwnz dingj cangqbungz.
Cib'it fan boiq neix cikconq cungj doxdoengz; gij raez de miz cibsam mij raez, gij gvangq de miz song mij gvangq.
Gyoengqde dawz haj fuk boiq doxneb swnj hwnjdaeuj guh fuk he, caiq dawz roek fuk caemh doxneb swnj hwnjdaeuj guh fuk he.
Song fuk neix hih fuk he gij bien gatsat de caeuq fuk daixlingh hih gij bien daixdaeuz de cungj guh miz hajcib aen nuk,
caemh guh miz hajcib gaiq ngaeu doengz hwj, dawz song fuk neix ngaeu doxlienz hwnjdaeuj guhbaenz fan goemq dingj cangqbungz he lo.
Gajlaeng caiq aeu naeng yiengzgoeng yomx hoengz ma guh gij goemq dingj de, youhcaiq aeu naeng haijbauq
Gyoengqde aeu faex gimhhozvuenh ma guh benj daengj hwj guh ciengz cangqbungz.
Moix it dip hih sang miz seiq mij haj sang, gvangq miz caetcib gunghfaenh gvangq.
Moix it dip hih raeuj he cungj siuq miz song yod. Cangqbungz sojmiz hih benj cungj dwg yienghneix guh.
Gyoengqde gawq ngeihcib dip benj hwj guh cangqbungz dih mbiengj baixnamz de.
Ngeihcib dip benj neix dih laj de guh miz seiqcib aen cap ngaenz; moix it dip benj hih laj de miz song gaiq yod cap.
Gyoengqde caemh gawq ngeihcib dip benj hwj guh cangqbungz dih mbiengj baixbaek de,
caemhcaiq guh miz seiqcib congh cap aeu ngaenz ma guh he. Moix it dip benj hih laj de miz song congh.
Gyoengqde caemhcaiq gawq roek dip benj hwj guh cangqbungz dih mbiengj baixlaeng de, couh dwg mbiengj baixsae.
Gyoengqde caemh gawq benj hwj guh song gok baixlaeng de, it gok miz song dip benj.
Song dip benj neix dwg doxgap he; raeuj gwnz de dwg aeu gyengx ma gu hwj. Song gokvan cungj dwg guh doxdoengz.
Mbiengj baixsae itgungh miz bet dip benj caeuq cibroek congh cap; moix it dip benj hih laj de cungj miz song congh cap dwg aeu ngaenz ma guh he.
Gyoengqde caemh aeu faex gimhhozvuenh ma guh diuz lanz vang de.
Diuz lanz cungqgyan ij daj raeuj lanz daengz raeuj.
Doengh dip benj cungj dwg aeu gim ma baux hwj, caiq haeuq gyengx gim haeuj bae hwj ndaej con diuz lanz vang haeujbae. Diuz faex lanz vang de caemh dwg aeu gim ma baux.

Gyoengqde aeu saeqsaeq nuenxnuenx hih maemaz lamz hah, maemaz aeuj hah, maemaz hoengz hah ma daemj hwj guh fanyiemz gek fungh. Fanyiemz gwnz de caemh daemj miz duz gihluqbwz hwj, caemh dwg hawj boux fawzsoem rox daemj he daemj hwnjbae he.

Gyoengqde caemhcaiq aeu faex gimhhozvuenh ma guh seiq diuz dongh venj fanyiemz. Doengh diuz dongh neix caemh dwg aeu gim ma baux hwj, gwnz de caemh miz ngaeu gim. Moix it diuz dongh hih laj de caemh miz aen cap aeu ngaenz ma guh he.
Gyoengqde caiq aeu saeqsaeq nuenxnuenx hih maemaz lamz hah, maemaz aeuj hah, maemaz hoengz hah ma daemj guh fanyiemz venj bakdou cangqbungz,
caemh guh haj diuz dongh gwnz de miz ngaeu he ma venj fan yiemzdou. Doengh diuz dongh neix caemh aeu gim ma baux hwj. Moix it diuz dongh hih laj de caemh miz aen cap aeu doengz ma guh he.
Bijsajlez aeu faex gimhhozvuenh ma doq aen gvih coux doenghgij baengzgawq he. Aen de gij raez de miz itbak itcib sam gunghfaenh, gvangq caeuq sang cungj dwg caetcib gunghfaenh.
Ndaw rog cungj baux gim hwj, seiqhenz caiq gep miz bien gim.
Caiq diz seiq aen gyengx gim hwj ding youq seiq ha de, moix it mbiengj song aen.
Caemhcaiq aeu faex gimhhozvuenh ma baux gim hwj guh song diuz faex ram de,
ndaej con haeuj aen gyengx bae ram aen de.
De aeu cwnz hih gim ma guh fagoemqcoih, couh dwg aen fa aen gvih coengq miz baengzgawq mwnq. Gij raez de miz itbak itcib sam gunghfaenh, gij gvangq de miz caetcib gunghfaenh.
Caemh aeu gim ma diz guh song duz gihluqbwz
Song duz gihluqbwz naj doiq naj yawj roengz fagoemqcoih aj fwed hwj goemq aen de.
De aeu faex gimhhozvuenh ma doq aen daiz baij bingj he. Gij raez de goujcib gunghfaenh raez, gij gvangq de seiqcib haj gunghfaenh gvangq, gij sang de caetcib gunghfaenh sang,
caemh aeu gim ma baux hwj, seiqhenz de caemh gep miz bien gim.
Seiqhenz daiz caemh guh miz baj fawz gvangq he hih begdaiz, gij begdaiz caemh gep miz bien gim.
De caemh diz seiq aen gyengx gim hwj ding youq seiq gok ha daiz,
caemh dwg ding dep gij begdaiz, hawj de ndaej con diuz ram haeujbae ram.
De caemhcaiq aeu faex gimhhozvuenh ma guh song diuz faex ram de, caiq baux gim haeujbae hwj.
De vanzlij caiq aeu gim ma guh gwnz daiz soj yungh hih doxgaiq, lujbaenz buenz hah, deb hah, huz coux laeuj hah, cenj caem laeuj hah.

De aeu gim ma guh aen gyaqdaeng he. Aen gyaqdaeng neix hih gij hangx de hah, gij ganj de hah, doengh aen cenj coux youz gwnz de luj duj va caeuq duqva hah, limqva hah, doenghgij neix cungj dwg caemh ngauq gim he diz okdaeuj vanzlij doxnem he.
Aen gyaqdaeng hih it mbiengj iet miz sam nga; song mbiengj itgungh miz roek nga.
It nga miz sam duj luj duj vagingq, caemh miz duqva, limqva. Roek nga neix, nga'nga cungj doxdoengz.
Aen gyaqdaeng hih diuz ganj cungqgyan de hih caemh miz seiq duj luj duj vagingq, caemh miz duqva, limqva.
Gyaqdaeng dih moix song nga doxdoiq hih laj doenj doxgap de cungj miz duq he; gyaqdaeng miz roek nga cungj dwg doxdoengz.
Gij duq caeuq gij nga de cungj dwg doxciep, cungj dwg ngauq gim dog diz okdaeuj caemh doxnem he.
De caemh aeu gim ma guh aen gyaqdaeng neix hih caet aen daeng gwnz de caeuq fag nep muenxdaeng de caeuq aen buenz de.
De yungh roekcib bet gaen
De aeu faex gimhhozvuenh ma guh aen siu yieng he. Aen de dwg seiq cingq seiq gok he; gij raez caeuq gij gvangq de cungj dwg seiqcib haj gunghfaenh, gij sang de goujcib gunghfaenh sang.
De caiq aeu gim ma baux mienh gwnz de caeuq seiq gok de; seiqhenz de caemh gep miz bien gim.
De vanzlij guh song aen gyengx gim hwj an youq laj song henz bien gim, hawj diuz ram de ndaej con goqbae ram hwj.
Diuz ram neix de aeu faex gimhhozvuenh ma guh, caemh baux gim hwj.
De caemh ciuq guh yanghceij yienghmwnq ma guh youz rang caeuq gij yieng rang fwtfwt he.

Bijsajlez de aeu faex gimhhozvuenh ma doq aen luz coemh doenghduz hwj dajbwiz. Aen neix dwg seiq cingq seiq gok he; gij raez caeuq gij gvangq de cungj dwg song mij sam, gij sang de miz it mij sam sang.
Gij gok de guh miz gok dod hwnjdaeuj he; seiq gok dod caeuq aen luz dajbwiz neix doxlienz, caemh dwg aeu doengz ma baux.
Aen neix hih doengj coux daeuh hah, buenz coux lwed hah, fag canj hah, fag ca yamx noh hah, caeuq buenz coux gyoqfeiz hah, doenghgij doxgaiq neix cungj dwg aeu doengz ma guh.
De caiq guh fan vangx doengz he, ding youq aen luz coemh doenghduz hwj dajbwiz neix hih daj laj doxhwnj dingxfaen.
Seiq gok de caemh guh miz gyengx doengz hwj ndaej con diuz ram goqbae,
caemh aeu faex gimhhozvuenh ma baux doengz hwj guh diuz ram de,
