dawz diuz ram neix con haeuj song aen gyengx bangx henz de bae, hawj de ndaej ram. Aen luz coemh doenghduz hwj dajbwiz neix dwg aeu benj ma doq he; cungqgyan de dwg hoengq he.
De aeu doenghheij gingq doengz doengh boux vunzbaz youq bakdou cangqbungz guh swqhaeuh he ma guh buenz doengz dajswiq caeuq aen gyaq coengq buenz de.
De aeu saeqsaeq nuenxnuenx hih maemaz ma daemj guh boiq hwj guh veizciengz cangqbungz. Mbiengj veizciengz baixnamz de miz seiqcib haj mij
miz ngeihcib diuz dongh caeuq miz ngeihcib aen cap aeu doengz ma guh he. Gij ngaeu gwnz de caeuq doengh diuz gaq doxciep gwnz de dwg aeu ngaenz ma guh.
Mienh veizciengz baixbaek caemh caeuq mienh veizciengz baixnamz doxdoengz, gij raez de miz seiqcib haj mij
Mienh veizciengz baixsae hih gij gvangq de miz ngeihcib ngeih mij haj
Veizciengz hih mienh baixdoeng,
Bakdou hih song mbiengj de moix mbiengj cungj dwg doxdoengz, miz caet mij
Veizciengz hih boiq cungj dwg aeu saeqsaeq nuenxnuenx hih maemaz ma daemj hwj guh he.

Aen cap diuz dongh cungj dwg aeu doengz ma guh he; gij ngaeu gwnz diuz dongh caeuq diuz gaq doxciep gwnz de cungj dwg aeu ngaenz ma guh. Gwnz dingj diuz dongh cungj dwg aeu ngaenz ma baux he. Veizciengz sojmiz hih dongh cungj dwg miz diuz gaq doxciep aeu ngaenz ma guh he.
Fanyiemz bakdou veizciengz dwg aeu saeqsaeq nuenxnuenx hih maemaz lamz hah, maemaz aeuj hah, maemaz hoengz hah ma daemj guh he. Gij gvangq de miz gouj mij
Fan de dwg venj youq seiq diuz dongh miz cap aeu doengz ma guh he. Gij ngaeu gwnz dongh hah, gij baux dingj dongh hah, caeuq doengh diuz gaq doxciep gwnz de hah cungj dwg aeu ngaenz ma guh he.
Cangqbungz caeuq veizciengz sojmiz hih ding cungj dwg aeu doengz ma diz guh he.
Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih soj raengq hih saeh, cungj dwg youz aen cuz Youzdaq dih Bijsajlez, daeglan Huqwj, couh dwg daeglwg Uhliq guh he.
Soengq daeuj guh aen ranz Cangqdiq youq he soj yungh hih gim, ciuq aen caengh cangqbungz ma suenq, miz songcien gaen.
Daj ndaw bonjbouh geiq hwnjdaeuj gij vunz soj gien hih ngaenz, ciuq aen caengh cangqbungz ma suenq, itgungh miz roekcien betbak seiqcib gaen.

Daengh youq ndaw bonjbouh ngeihcib bi doxhwnj hih vunzsai, miz roekcib fanh lingz samcien hajbak hajcib vunz. Ciuq aen caengh cangqbungz ma suenq, bingzgvwnh moix it boux vunzsai gien hawj hih ngaenz miz roek gwz.
Gyoengqde aeu roekcien betbak gaen
aeu seiqcib gaen
Gij vunz soengq hawj hih doengz itgungh ndaej seiqcien betbak itcib haj gaen.
Aeu doenghgij doengz neix ma diz guh bakdou cangqbungz caeuq Cangqdiq doxraen he hih aen cap dongh hah, caeuq aen luz coemh doenghduz hwj dajbwiz daiqlienz fan vangx caeuq aen de sojmiz hih doxgaiq.
Vanzlij guh veizciengz caeuq bakdou veizciengz hih doengh aen cap laj de, caeuq cangqbungz, veizciengz soj yungh hih ding.
Yiengq gyoengqde couh aeu maegim hah, saeqsaeq nuenxnuenx hih maemaz lamz hah, maemaz aeuj hah, maemaz hoengz hah ma daemj hwj guh diuz buh hijfuzdwz.
Cungj maegim neix dwg doengh boux fawzsoem he aeu gim ma dub mbangmbang hwj daet baenx diuz baenx diuz saeq setset luj mae hwj ma caeuq maemaz lamz, maemaz aeuj, maemaz hoengz ma daemj hwj guh boiq.
Gyoengqde caiq ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq Mohsih hih yienghmwnq,
Gyoengqde caiq ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq Mohsih hih yienghmwnq
De caiq hawj boux caixhangz fawzsoem he guh baizaek, caemh luj guh hijfuzdwz yienghmwnq aeu maegim hah, saeqsaeq nuenxnuenx hih maemaz lamz hah, maemaz aeuj hah, maemaz hoengz hah ma daemj hwj guh.
Gaiq baizaek dwg boeb miz song caengz, seiq cingq seiq gok he, gij raez de caeuq gij gvangq de cungj dwg cap he.
Gwnz de haemq miz seiq coij baujsig. Daixit coij dwg hungzbaujsig, vangzhiq caeuq hungzhiq;
daixngeih coij dwg luzbaujsig, lamzbaujsig, caeuq conqsig;
daixsam coij dwg swjmajnauj, bwzmajnauj caeuq swjsingh;
daixseiq coij dwg ceijcanghhiq, hungzmajnauj caeuq bizhiq. Doenghgij baujsig neix cungj dwg haemq youq aen gvang aeu maegim ma san.
Moix it gaiq baujsig gwnz de cungj dik miz it daeglwg Hijswzlez hih coh; cibngeih gaiq baujsig daiqbiuj Hijswzlez dih cibngeih aen cuz.
Gyoengqde caiq aeu gim ma diz luj cag laenz yienghmwnq ma guh diuz lienh baizaek.
Caemhcaiq guh song aen gyengx gim caeuq song gaiq gvang aeu maegim ma san he. Song aen gyengx gim youq song gok baizaek,
song diuz lienh neix hih song raeuj con youq song aen gyengx gim,
lij song raeuj guqdingq youq song gaiq gvang aeu gim ma san guh he mwnq, caiq ding haeuj song diuz banqmbaq hijfuzdwz hih mwnq dangqnaj de.
Gyoengqde caiq diz song aen gyengx gim ding youq baizaek hih linghvaih song gok youq mbiengj baixndaw de dep hijfuzdwz,
caemhcaiq diz song aen gyengx gim hwj ding youq song diuz banqmbaq dangqnaj hijfuzdwz hih raeuj laj de dep mwnq doxciep de caeuq baixgwnz diuz sai de.

Caiq aeu cag lamz ma dawz aen gyengx baizaek caeuq aen gyengx hijfuzdwz doxcug hwj, hawj gaiq baizaek caeuq diuz sai hijfuzdwz doxnem hwj mbouj yungzheih luet. Gij neix dwg ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq Mohsih hih yienghmwnq bae guh hih.
Gyoengqde caiq daemj boiqmaz lamz ma nyib buhbauz hijfuzdwz.
Diuz bauz neix hih mwnq ndonj hoz de gep miz bien hwj mbouj yungzheih lig.
Gyoengqde caiq aeu saeqsaeq nuenxnuenx maemaz lamz hah, maemaz aeuj hah, maemaz hoengz hah ma san guh luj maksigsoux hwj,
Gyoengqde caiq ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq Mohsih hih yienghmwnq
Gyoengqde caiq aeu gim ma diz guh baj baiz he, gwnz de dik miz ‘Gvi haeuj Yehhozvaz.’
Gajlaeng couh aeu cag lamz ma cug baj baiz neix youq gwnz boiq duk raeuj mwnq najbyak mwnq. Doenghgij neix cungj dwg ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq Mohsih hih yienghmwnq bae guh he.
Couh yienghneix, gij vunz Hijswzlez ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq Mohsih hih yienghmwnq bae guhbaenz cangqbungz, couh dwg cangqbungz caeuq Cangqdiq doxraen he lo.
Gyoengqde couh dawz cangqbungz dih gak yiengh doxgaiq dawz bae hawj Mohsih yawj:
Ngaeu hah, benj hah, diuz lanz vang he hah, diuz dongh hah, aen cap hah,
yomx hoengz hih fan naeng yiengzgoeng goemq dingj he hah, fan naeng haijbauq
aen gvih coengq miz baengzgawq caeuq diuz faex ram de hah, fagoemqcoih hah,
daiz baij bingj hah caeuq gwnz daiz de soj yungh hih doxgaiq hah, bingj dajbwiz hah,
aen gyaqdaeng gim caeuq de soj yungh hih gak yiengh doxgaiq hah, youz daeng hah,
aen aeu gim ma guh hwj siu yieng hah, gij youz rang dwzbez he hah, gij yieng rang fwtfwt he hah, fanyiemz bakdou cangqbungz hah,

aen luz aeu doengz ma guh hwj coemh doenghduz hwj dajbwiz caeuq fan vangx doengz de hah, diuz faex ram de caeuq aen de soj yungh hih doxgaiq hah, buenz doengz dajswiq caeuq aen gyaq coengq buenz de hah,

veizciengz hih boiq hah, doengh diuz dongh caeuq aen cap de hah, fanyiemz bakdou veizciengz hah, cag hah, ding hah, caeuq ndaw cangqbungz—couh dwg cangqbungz caeuq Cangqdiq doxraen he—soj yungh hih doxgaiq hah,
vanzlij miz Yaqlwnz caeuq daeglwg de youq ranz Cangqdiq guh goengjsae dajbwiz daenj hih buh hah.
Doenghgij neix cungj dwg ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq Mohsih hih yienghmwnq bae guh he.
Mohsih raen gij vunz Hijswzlez cungj dwg ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq hih bae guh ndei lo, yiengq de couh hoh fuk hawj gyoengqde.
Yehhozvaz doiq Mohsih naeuz:
“Mwngz ij youq yienznyied
Dawz aen gvih coengq miz baengzgawq coengq haeuj ndaw de bae le, caiq aeu fanyiemz ma baex aen de hwj.
Caemh ij dawz aen daiz baij bingj buen haeujbae, baij gwnz daiz ndei hwj, caiq dawz aen gyaqdaeng buen haeujbae cang ndei.
Caemhcaiq dawz aen aeu gim ma guh hwj siu yieng he coengq youq dangqnaj aen gvih coengq miz baengzgawq, caiq venj fanyiemz bakdou cangqbungz hwj.
“Caemh dawz aen luz coemh doenghgij dajbwiz hih aen luz mwnq coengq cingq bakdou aen cangqbungz caeuq gou doxraen he hih caek rog de hwj.
Aen buenz dajswiq ij coux raemx hwj coengq youq cangqbungz caeuq gou doxraen he caeuq aen luz dajbwiz hih cungqgyan de.
Mwngz caemh ij veiz ndei veizciengz hwj, caiq venj fanyiemz bakdou veizciengz laem.
“Mwngz vanzlij ij aeu youz rang ma hoz haeuj cangqbungz caeuq de sojmiz hih doxgaiq, yiengq couh suenq gek hwnjdaeuj gvi haeuj gou.
Gajlaeng, caemhcaiq hoz aen luz coemh doenghgij hwj dajbwiz hih caeuq aen de sojmiz hih doxgaiq, hawj de gek hwnjdaeuj gvi haeuj gou.
Mwngz vanzlij caiq hoz youz rang haeuj aen buenz dajswiq caeuq aen gyaq coengq buenz de bae, hawj de gek hwnjdaeuj gvi haeuj gou.
“Mwngz ij daiq Yaqlwnz caeuq doengh daeglwg de daengz bakdou aen cangqbungz caeuq gou doxraen he bae; mwngz ij youq mwnq bang gyoengqde swiq ndang.

Mwngz caemh ij bang Yaqlwnz daenj diuz buh mwh daeuj swqhaeuh gou cij ndaej daenj hih diuz buh mwnq, caiq raix youz rang haeuj laeng de bae, hawj de gaglingh okdaeuj guh goengjsae dajbwiz daeuj swqhaeuh gou he.
Caemhcaiq bang doengh daeglwg de daenj buhbauz,
caemh luj raix youz haeuj laeng daxboh gyoengqde bae hih yienghmwnq, raix youz hawj gyoengqde, hawj gyoengqde caeuq doengh daih gajlaeng de cungj dwg guh goengjsae dajbwiz hwj daeuj swqhaeuh gou.”
Doenghgij neix, Mohsih cungj ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq hih yienghmwnq bae guh.
Daengz daixngeih bi,
Mohsih dawz doengh aen cap an ndei, cap doengh dip benj hwnjdaeuj, con doengh diuz lanz vang he ndei le, couh cap ndei doengh diuz dongh.
De caiq ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq hih yienghmwnq goemq aen cangqbungz, caiq goemq doengh caengz ceiq gwnz dingj de.
De caiq dawz baj rin dik miz fazliz coengq haeuj ndaw gvih coengq miz baengzgawq bae, dawz diuz faex ram de con haeuj aen gyengx song henz de bae, dawz fagoemqcoih coengq hwnj gwnz de bae.
Gajlaeng couh dawz aen gvih coengq miz baengzgawq coengq haeuj ndaw cangqbungz bae, venj yiemz baex hwj. Doenghgij neix cungj dwg ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq hih yienghmwnq bae guh.
Mohsih caiq dawz aen daiz baij bingj coengq haeuj ndaw cangqbungz hih mbiengj baixbaek bae, youq baixrog fanyiemz.
Gwnz daiz baij miz soengq hawj Yehhozvaz hih bingj. Doenghgij neix cungj dwg ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq hih yienghmwnq bae guh he.
Mohsih caemh dawz aen gyaqdaeng coengq youq ndaw cangqbungz hih mbiengj baixnamz caeuq aen daiz baij bingj doxdoiq.
Gajlaeng caiq diemj daeng hawj Yehhozvaz. Gij neix cungj dwg ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq hih yienghmwnq bae guh.
De caiq dawz aen aeu gim ma guh hwj siu yieng he coengq youq ndaw cangqbungz caeuq Cangqdiq doxraen he hih baixrog fanyiemz,
ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq hih, youq gwnz aen de siu gij yieng rang fwtfwt he,
caiq venj fanyiemz bakdou cangqbungz.

De caiq dawz aen luz coemh doenghgij hwj dajbwiz he coengq youq dangqnaj cangqbungz, youq ndaw de coemh cwz coemh yiengz caiq coemh mbamienh hwj dajbwiz. Doenghgij neix cungj dwg ciuq Yehhozvaz raengq Mohsih hih yienghmwnq bae guh he.
Mohsih dawz aen buenz dajswiq coux raemx hwj coengq youq aen cangqbungz caeuq Cangqdiq doxraen he caeuq aen luz coemh doenghgij hwj dajbwiz hih cungqgyan de.
Bienqnaengz Mohsih caeuq Yaqlwnz caeuq doengh daeglwg Yaqlwnz
Mohsih youq cangqbungz caeuq aen luz coemh hwj dajbwiz hih seiqhenz de guh veizciengz, caemh venj fanyiemz bakdou veizciengz. Couh yienghneix, sojmiz hih cungj guh liux lo.
Doenghgij hong neix guh sat mwhde, miz fwj daeuj guem aen cangqbungz caeuq Cangqdiq doxraen he. Gij ronghndongq Yehhozvaz rongh youq ndaw de myig myiengzmyiengz.
Daiqlienz Mohsih cungj mbouj ndaej haeuj bae, aenvih gij fwj dingz youq gwnz aen cangqbungz caeuq Cangqdiq doxraen he, gij ronghndongq Yehhozvaz cungj myig baenx cenz cangqbungz liux.
Gij vunz Hijswzlez moix it baez roeb daengz gij fwj daj cangqbungz swng hwnjbae mwhde, gyoengqde couh ij buen deuz.
Hauhnaeuz gij fwj mbouj swng deuz, vanzlij dingz youq cangqbungz nex, gyoengqde caemh mbouj buen deuz, cungj dwg daengj daengz gij fwj swng hwnjbae, gyoengqde cij buen deuz.
Youq gyoengqde itloh itloh bae hih mwhde, doengxngoenz gyoengqde raen gij fwj Yehhozvaz dingz youq gwnz cangqbungz, doengxhaemh raen gij fwj ndaw de daiq miz feiz rongh hwj.
Doenghbaez
Gajlaeng Hijliqmijlwz rai lo, lij mehyah de caeuq song daeglwg de.
Song daeglwg de gajlaeng cungj dwg aeu gij lwgsau Mohyaz ma guh yah, meh he heuh Ngozwjbah, meh he heuh Luqdwz. Gyoengqde youq mwnq aiq miz saek cib bi yienghneix,
hoeng song daeg de gajlaeng caemh rai lo, lij gag lw Nazngozmij meh vunz dog, mij lwg, mij gvan, gyax gyedgyed.
Gajlaeng Nazngozmij dingqri naeuz Yehhozvaz soengq fuk hawj gij vunz
De yienghneix siengj le,

Song meh de soengq de daengz dangjroen le, Nazngozmij doiq song mehbawx de naeuz: “Faenhsou gag vunz gag maj laeng mehdai faenhsou bax! Goeng gojyez faenhsou yaengz goq mwhde, faenhsou doiq gyoengqde caeuq doiq gou cungj baenxlai ndei; seizneix caemh muengh Yehhozvaz doiq faenhsou ndei luj mwngz doiq raeuz ndei yienghmwnq.
Muengh Yehhozvaz baujcuk baujyouh faenhsou doiqyungz cimh ndaej gojyez, ndaej laeb aen gya ndei he.” Nazngozmij yienghneix gangj sat le, ij doxbiek bae hih mwhde couh cup song mehbawx de.
Song mehbawx de raen yienghneix le, cungj coengq sing hwj daej hwnjdaeuj naeuz: “Mbouj, mbouj! Raeuz siengj gaen mwngz maj laeng aen cuz mwngz.”
Yiengq Nazngozmij naeuz: “Mbouj hah, lwg hah, gag maj mbanj sou ndaej lo. Vihmaz ij gaen gou bae nej? Gou caiq mij lwg ndaej hawj faenhsou guh gvan laem lo.
Maj lo, lwg hah; gou daiq laux lai lo, caiq mbouj ndaej haq laem lo. Cungjsuenq naeuz gou caiq ndaej haq, cungjsuenq naeuz haemhneix majcangq mizndang seng lwgngez caemh mij'z yungh lo.
Nanzdauh faenhsou ij naenxhoz naenxheiq gag gvaq baenx seiqvunz maz? Mbouj, baenzbaenz cungj mbouj ndaej! Lwg hax, gou seizneix beij faenhsou lij haemzhoj, aenvih Yehhozvaz gaenq vwt gou lo.”
De gangj geij gawq vah neix le, gyoengqde engqgya got raeuj coengq sing daej hwj haemz wekwek bae. Gajlaeng mehbawx daeuz de cup Nazngozmij
Nazngozmij raen yienghneix le couh naeuz: “Nex, beixsauj mwngz gaenq gag maj aen gyahcuz bonjfaenh de caeuq de soj sinq dih cwnz lo; mwngz caemh gag maj lo bax!”

Hoeng Luqdwz engq han naeuz: “Gaejyungh caenhrox coi gou deuz, gaejyungh ep gou mbouj hawj gou gaen mwngz. Fanjcingq mwngz daengz mwnqlaw, gou caemh daengz mwnqlaw; mwngz youq mwnqlaw, gou caemh youq mwnqlaw. Aen cuz mwngz caemh dwg aen cuz gou; mwngz sinq dih cwnz, gou caemh sinq.
Mwngz rai youq mwnqlaw, gou caemh rai youq mwnqlaw; mwngz moek youq mwnqlaw, gou caemh moek youq mwnqlaw. Gou gamj baujcingq, caenhgag miz rai cij ndaej hawj raeuz song boux doxbiek.
Nazngozmij raen mehbawx ngeih de cungj caenhrox ij gaenhangx bonjfaenh bae, couh mbouj caiq ep de baenx lai lo.

Couh yienghneix, Nazngozmij caeuq mehbawx ngeih de couh itheij maj daengz Bwzliqhaengz Singz. Gyoengqde ngamqngamq haeuj singz, cenz singz vunz cungj raen gig geizheih, gij vunzbaz mwnq dauqcawq cungj lwnh yebyeb, naeuz: “Yoq, de mbouj dwg Nazngozmij maz?”
Nazngozmij dingqri le, couh doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou gaejyungh caiq heuh gou Nazngozmij

Mwh gou dajlwh mwnqneix deuznanh bae hih mwhde, gou cenz ranz baenxlai hwngqseiq. Hoeng seizneix ma nej? Lij gag lw gou meh vunz dog haem lo, gyax gyedgyed. Akak rengzrengz gaiqgaiq cungj ndaej guh daengz dih Cangqdiq cauh hawj gou miz nanh, lujnaeuz Yehhozvaz gauq gou nwih. Faenhsou cungj lij heuh gou Nazngozmij, miz maz iqswh nex?”
Nazngozmij caeuq mehbawx ngeih de lwgsau vaihguek dajlwh Mohyaz ma daengz Bwzliqhaengz Singz hih mwhde, ngamqngamq luj letlet ndaej daeng gvej mienh.
Ndaw ranz goeng gojyez Nazngozmij, Hijliqmijlwz, ndaw cuz de miz boux beixnuengx doengzdangz

Miz ngoenz he, lwgsau vaihguek Luqdwz cam meh gyaboz de naeuz: “Gou ijsiengj bae reih mienh nyaeb mienh doek, saekseiz dauq roeb ndaej saek boux simndei, dauq hawj gou youq ndaw reih de nyaeb mienh doek, ndaej lwi?”
Meh gyaboz de han naeuz: “Ox, ndaej hah, lwg hax; bae bax.”

Yiengq Luqdwz bae daengz ndaw reih le, de couh siengj gaenhangx gyoengq vunz gvej mienh cug mienh mwnq nyaeb mienh doek. Hoeng ngamqngamq luj letlet dingjlingz gaiq reih mienh mwnq dwg gaiq reih Hijliqmijlwz cuz dih Boh'ahswh.
Mbouj geij caez, Boh'ahswh dajlwh Bwzliqhaengz Singz ma daengz ndaw reih. De dongx gyoengq hoiq gvej mienh mwnq naeuz: “Yehhozvaz caeuq sou doxcaeuq youq!”
Gyoengqde han naeuz: “Muengh Yehhozvaz soengq fuk hawj mwngz!”
Boux de han naeuz: “Dwg lwgsau Mohyaz, dajlwh Mohyaz gaenhangx Nazngozmij ma he.

de gouz gou naeuz ndaej mbouj ndaej hawj de gaenhangx gyoengq vunz gvej mienh mwnq nyaeb mienh doek. Dajlwh haetneix daeuj daengz seizneix, caenhgag cawzok bae ndaw diengz naengh yaep he sat lo, cungj mij deuz goq.”
Boh'ahswh dingq le, couh goq bae doiq Luqdwz naeuz: “Lwg hax, gou naeuz mwngz ni,

Gyoengqde bae daengz mwnqlaw gvej, mwngz caemh gaen bae daengz mwnqlaw. Gou menhcij raengq gyoengq hoiq vunzsai hauxseng mwnq, mboujcwnj gyoengqde hangz mwngz. Gyoengq hoiq gou caemh coux miz geij gang raemx; hauhnaeuz mwngz hozhawq nex, seizbienh bae daek gw.”

Luqdwz dingq de yienghneix naeuz le, couh majcangq gvih roengzma sax de, naeuz: “Liuh mbouj daengz daemxmwngz cuqhiq daengz gou, guh hwj gou doeksaet bae. Gou dwg vunz vaihguek he, hoeng daemxmwngz doiq gou ndaej baenxlai ndei!”

Boh'ahswh han naeuz: “Gou senqsi cix dingqri naeuz mwngz dajlwh goeng mwngz rai le, mwngz cungj doiq gyaboz mwngz baenxlai ndei, vwt bohmeh bonjfaenh, vwt diegseng bonjfaenh, gaen gyaboz daeuj daengz dieg cix seng, vunz cix seng neix.
Mwngz doiq vunz

Luqdwz dingq le, caiq naeuz: “Bouxcawj gou hax, docih mwngz lo! Mwngz doiq gou baenxlai ndei; yienznaeuz gou daiqlienz guh gij hoiq mwngz cungj mbouj boiqndaej lah, hoeng, mwngz lij gangj gij vah ndei neix ma vued gou.”

Gajlaeng daengz gw haeuxringz hih mwhde, Boh'ahswh heuh Luqdwz goq daeuj naeuz: “Cimzcimz gij menqbauh raeuz yawj; aeu ciengq ma demj gw bax!” Couh yienghneix, Luqdwz couh caeuq gyoengq hoiq mwnq itheij naengh roengzma gw. Boh'ahswh caiq aeu mienh ceuj hawj de gw, hawj de gw imq hwj vanzlij lw.

Yiengq gw haeux sat le, Luqdwz couh majcangq bae nyaeb mienh doek lo. Boh'ahswh caiq raengq gyoengq hoiq de naeuz: “Cungjsuenq naeuz de caiq bae ndaw dong mienh nyaeb aeu, sou cungj mbouj ndaej naeuz de,
mbouj danhcij yienghneix, faenhsou vanzlij yot gij mienh okdaeuj coengq youq lajdoem hwj ajcaih de nyaeb ndaej haemq vaiq. Faenhsou ijaeu ndaejgeiq, mboujcwnj haep de haqx.”

Luqdwz couh yienghneix caiq lienzdaemh bae nyaeb mienh doek, itcig nyaeb daengz yiengqhaemh. Gajlaeng de dawz ngoenz mwnq soj nyaeb ndaej dih mienh ma daj, daj ndaej baenx loz, ceng mbouj geij miz samcib gaen
Daj ndei le, de couh dawz loz mienh neix caeuq haeuxringz de gw lij lw he aeu maj daengz ndaw singz hawj meh gyaboz de.
Yiengq Nazngozmij raen mehbawx de nyaeb ndaej baenx lai mienh le, couh cam de naeuz: “Mwngz ngoenzneix bae mwnqlaw nyaeb mienh lah?
Luqdwz dingq le, couh naeuz meh gyaboz de ni, naeuz: “Ngoenzneix gou bae gaiq reih mienh Boh'ahswh nyaeb mienh.”

Nazngozmij dingq le, naeuz: “Ox! Muengh Yehhozvaz soengq fuk hawj de! Yehhozvaz doiq ndaw ranz raeuz baenxlai ndei; mboujguenj boux rai boux lix, de cungj dwg yungjyenj aiq.” De vanzlij caiq naeuz: “Boh'ahswh dwg ndaw cuz raeuz dih boux beixnuengx caemh nginz caemh rag he; de miz swzyimq goqhoh raeuz!”
Luqdwz dingq meh gyaboz de yienghneix naeuz le, caiq naeuz: “De vanzlij naeuz gou, hawj gou gaenhangx gyoengq hoiq de nyaeb mienh, itcig nyaeb daengz gvej sat.”

Gajlaeng Nazngozmij han naeuz: “Ox lwg hax, yienghneix cingq baenz luh. Mwngz couh youq ndaw reih Boh'ahswh gaen gyoengq hoiq vunzbaz de bax. Hauhnaeuz mwngz bae gij reih daixlingh boux nyaeb, caemh lau ngaiz vunz hangz hah.”
Couh yienghneix, Luqdwz itcig gaenhangx gyoengq hoiq vunzbaz mwnq nyaeb mienh, nyaeb daengz gvej mienh sat. Luqdwz caemh vanzlij caeuq meh gyaboz de itheij youq.
Miz ngoenz he, meh gyaboz Luqdwz doiq Luqdwz naeuz: “Lwg hax, gou ij bang mwngz cimh aen gya ndei he, hawj mwngz baezneix saedceij goq ndaej engqgya ndei.
Neq, couh dwg mwngz mbat gaxgonq bae gaen gij hoiq vunzbaz de nyaeb mienh hax, Boh'ahswh hax, de caiq caeuq raeuz dwg beixnuengx caemh nginz caemh rag he hwj,
Yiengq mwngz haemhneix couh swiq ndang ndei, cat yanghceij hwj, daenj buh seuqset hwj, couh caegcaeg bae mwnq daengj de. Hoeng, mbouj ndaej hawj de raen, hawj de rox.

Daengj daengz de gw haeux sat le, bae ninz mwhde, mwngz ij cuqhiq de, yawj de ninz youq mwnqlaw. Daengj de ninz ndaek le, mwngz couh bae cij fan denz goemq rwengjdin de, ninz youq henz din de. Daengz mwhde, de swhmboujyienz naeuz mwngz ni ij baenzlaw guh.”
Luqdwz dingq le, couh han naeuz: “Ox, mwngz hawj gou baenzlaw guh, gou couh baenzlaw guh.”
Gajlaeng Luqdwz couh ciuq meh gyaboz de naeuz hih yienghmwnq bae guh. Haemh mwnq de couh bae daengz caiqcangz
Yiengq haemh mwnq Boh'ahswh
Ninz daengz gyangjngwnz le, Boh'ahswh sawqmwh singj hwj fonj mbat ndang he. Fonj le, de raen miz boux vunzbaz he ninz youq henz din de.
De raen yienghneix le, couh naeuz: “Veix! Mwngz dwg bouxlaw?”
Gajlaeng Luqdwz couh han naeuz: “Ox, gou dwg bouxhoiq mwngz dih Luqdwz. Cingj mwngz aeu gok denz mwngz ma goemqgoemq gou bax,

Boh'ahswh dingq le, naeuz: “Muengh Yehhozvaz soengq fuk hawj mwngz! Baenjlaiz mwngz seizbienh ndaej cimh boux hauxseng baenxmbauq he ma guh gvan hih, mboujguenj boux de gungz haj cixnaeuz fouq, hoeng mwngz cungj mbouj bae cimh, dauq daeuj laeng gou lah. Ciuq yienghneix ma yawj, engqgya rox mwngz doiq aen gya goeng gojyez mwngz baenxlai ndei, baenxlai lauxsaed lo.”

De caiq naeuz: “Lwg hah, mwngz gaejyungh heiq; mwngz soj gouz hih, gou gaengjdingq nganhbaiz ndei hawj mwngz. Gij vunz ndaw singz cungj rox naeuz mwngz dwg boux aeueiq bouxlaux he, gw dauhleix caemh gig roxsoq he.
Mwngz naeuz ndaej deng hah; gou dwg boux beixnuengx caemh nginz caemh rag he, hoeng vanzlij miz boux laem beij gou caeuq aen cuz mwngz haemq caen he; de engqgya miz swzyimq ij goqhoh mwngz.

Yienghneix bax, haemhneix mwngz couh youq dineix youq. Daengj ngoenzcog gou menh bae yawjyawj boux mwnq caen mbouj caensim doiq mwngz, baujhuq mwngz. Hauhnaeuz de haenj nex, sien nyiengh hawj de gaxgonq; hauhnaeuz de mbouj haenj nex, gou gamj yiengq seiqseiz lix dih Yehhozvaz baujcingq, gou caensim fuqswz aeu mwngz. Seizneix mwngz coengqsim ninz daengz ranzrongh bax.”

Couh yienghneix, de couh youq henz din Boh'ahswh ninz daengz ranz buemxsuemj cij hwnq. Boh'ahswh ndaw sim caemh gag naemj naeuz: “Ciengeiz mbouj ndaej hawj bouxlaw rox boux vunzbaz neix daeuj dineix goq.”

Gajlaeng Boh'ahswh doiq de naeuz: “Dawz mbaw bauhdaeuzginh mwngz mbe ndei hwj, daengj gou raix mienh hawj mwngz.” Luqdwz caemh ciuq guh lo. Boh'ahswh couh raix mienh hawj de, miz roek faenqgei yienghneix, caiq bang de dawz hwnj mbaq bae, gajlaeng de couh maj ndaw singz lo.
Luqdwz ma daengz ranz le, meh gyaboz de cam de naeuz: “Baenzlaw yiengh hah, lwg hax?”
Yiengq Luqdwz couh gangj naeuz meh gyaboz de ni, Boh'ahswh baenzlawz baenzlawz.
Caemh naeuz: “De vanzlij naeuz: ‘Mwngz mbouj ndaej fawz hoengq maj; ij aeu di mienh maj hawj meh gyaboz mwngz cij ndaej,’ yiengq de couh hawj gou baenx lai mienh lo.”
Meh gyaboz dingq le, couh naeuz: “Lwg hah, raeuz couh naengh roengzma daengj bax. Coengqsim, de ngoenzneix gaengjdingq banh ndei gij saeh neix; de banh mbouj ndaej mbouj fug hih.”
Couh yienghneix, Boh'ahswh couh bae baksingz naengh.
Mwhde Boh'ahswh caemh dajlwh ndaw singz cingj daeuj cib boux vunz gangj vah couh baenz he naengh youq mwnq dingq.
Boh'ahswh couh doiq boux beixnuengx mwnq naeuz: “Nazngozmij dajlwh Mohyaz ma lo. De ij hai ndaw cuz raeuz Hijliqmijlwz dih gaiq dieg mwnq.

Gou naeuz mwngz ni, dwg siengj hawj mwngz gyezdingq cawx mbouj cawx. Hauhnaeuz mwngz cawx ma nex, couh youq dangqnaj gyoengq vunz neix cingqmingz naeuz mwngz cawx lo. Hauhnaeuz mwngz mbouj cawx, caemh cingj mwngz naeuz gou ni, aenvih mwngz youq ndaw cuz raeuz dwg boux beij gou miz swhgwz he.”
Boux de dingq le, han naeuz: “Gou haenj cawx gij dieg mwnq hwj.”

Boh'ahswh caiq naeuz: “Yiengq mwngz laeng Nazngozmij cawx gij dieg mwnq nex, ij doq aeu Luqdwz mehmaiq mwnq, lwgsau Mohyaz, ma guh yah. Yienghneix gij gyahcanj boux rai mwnq couh yungjyenj lij dwg youq ndaw aen cuz boux rai mwnq.”

Boh'ahswh gangj daengz dineix le, boux beixnuengx mwnq couh naeuz: “Hauhnaeuz yienghneix nex, gou couh mbouj cawx lo. Gou mbouj siengj vihliux cawx gij dieg neix hwj dauq doiq bonjfaenh gou mbouj ndei. Gou vanzlij dwg nyiengh hawj mwngz cawx sat lo; mwngz cawx bax.”

(Yienzlaiz mwhmwnq, gij vunz Hijswzlez guh gijmaz doxvuenh haj, cixnaeuz dajcueg dajcawx dieg, cungj dwg yungh duet haiz ma gyau hawj daixlingh mbiengj, cingqmingz naeuz song mbiengj cungj gangj ndei gaengjdingq hai cawx lo.)
Yiengq, mwh boux de doq doiq Boh'ahswh naeuz “Mwngz cawx bax,” hih mwhde, de couh doq duet haiz hawj Boh'ahswh lo.

Gajlaeng Boh'ahswh couh doiq gyoengq vunz gangj vah couh baenz mwnq caeuq gij vunz gvaengz youq henz he naeuz: “Ngoenzneix faenhsou cungj caemh raen cingsuj lo bax. Hauhnaeuz baezneix miz vunz cam, faenhsou ndaej bang gou cingqmingz lo, sojmiz haeuj Hijliqmijlwz caeuq song daeglwg de Gihlenz caeuq Majlwnz hih, gou gaenq dajlwh ndaw fawz Nazngozmij cawx ma lo.

Cawzok gij neix, vanzlij miz, gou caemhcaiq aeu mehyah Majlwnz lwgsau Mohyaz Luqdwz ma guh yah. Yienghneix gij gyahcanj boux rai mwnq couh yungjyenj lij dwg youq ndaw aen cuz boux rai mwnq, caiq ndaej mbouj hawj gij singq de youq ndaw cuz ngaiz cied, caemh ndaej hawj gij singq de laemxdaemh youq ndaw mbanj de daihdaih cenz roengzbae. Ngoenzneix faenhsou cungj dwg gij saeh neix dih cingqmingz vunz.”

Boh'ahswh yienghneix gangj le, doengh boux gangj vah couh baenz he caeuq mwhde soj gvaengz youq baksingz dih vunz cungj naeuz: “Raeuz nyienh'eiq cingqmingz. Muengh Yehhozvaz sawjhawj ngoenzneix haeuj aen gya mwngz bae hih dah neix, caemh luj laeb hwnj aen gya Hijswzlez dih Lahgyez caeuq Liqyaq ityiengh, miz lwg miz lan, hwngqhwngq seiqseiq. Muengh Yehhozvaz sawjhawj mwngz youq Hijfazdah cuz miz mingz, riengzmingz baenx Bwzliqhaengz.
Muengh Yehhozvaz domh dah neix cungj lij oiq ndaej hawj mwngz miz vunz swnjcoj, hawj aen gya mwngz
Couh yienghneix, Boh'ahswh couh aeu Luqdwz ma guh yah lo. De caeuq Luqdwz guh gvanjbaz le, Yehhozvaz hawj Luqdwz mizndang; gajlaeng de seng miz daeglwg he.
Gajlaeng gij vunzbaz ndaw singz mwnq youq dangqnaj Nazngozmij naeuz: “Yehhozvaz gaeuq ndei hoh, wnggai haenh de! Aenvih de

Laeq lwg neix gaengjdingq ndaej hawj mwngz sim'angq, de gaengjdingq ndaej ciengxlaux mwngz. Laeq lwg neix dwg mehbawx roxsoq mwngz seng he; mehbawx mwngz gaeuq ndei lo, gaeuq aiq mwngz lo, beij miz caet daeglwg vanzlij giengz.”
Gajlaeng Nazngozmij couh umj laeq lwgngez neix youq ndaw rumq hwj, suenqbaenz aeu ma ciengx lo.
Gajlaeng gij vunzbaz ndaw singz mwnq an coh hawj laeq lwgngez neix heuh Ngozbiqdwz. Gyoengqde naeuz: “Nazngozmij caiq miz lwgsai lox!”
Boux Ngozbiqdwz neix couh dwg daxboh Yehsih lo; Yehsih couh dwg daxboh Daqveiq
Fazlwzswh dih lwg lan laenj dwg yienghneix:
Fazlwzswh miz Hihswhlwnz,
Hihswhlwnz miz Lanz,
Lanz miz Yaqmijnazdaz,
Yaqmijnazdaz miz Nazswnq,
Nazswnq miz Sajmaenz,
Sajmaenz miz Boh'ahswh,
Boh'ahswh miz Ngozbiqdwz,
Ngozbiqdwz miz Yehsih,
Yehsih miz Daqveiq.
Miz ngoenz he, Yehhozvaz doiq Yoznaz, daeglwg Yaqmijdaiq naeuz:
“Mwngz majcangq bae daengz Niznizveih Singz bae fok gij vunz mwnq, aenvih gyoengqde gig yakrwix; gou yawj mbouj goq ra. Mwngz bae gingjgauq gyoengqde, naeuz gou ijvanh buenqhingz gyoengqde.”

Hoeng Yoznaz mbouj dingq de, dauqfanj bae daixlingh mbiengj bae, siengj deuzndoj Yehhozvaz. De deuz bae daengz Yozbaq gangj; youq mwnq de nyangz aen ruz hung ij hoi bae Dahswh he. De raen yienghneix le, couh hoi ngaenz, couh hwnj aen ruz mwnq bae, dajsuenq gaen gyoengq fou gwnz ruz bae daengz Dahswh, deuz bae gyae'gyae ndoj Yehhozvaz.
Cingq youq aen ruz bae hih mwhde, Yehhozvaz hawj gwnz haij fan rumz hung. Rumz hung raemx hung bongx hwj ruz ij vaih.

Gyoengq fouruz raen yienghneix le, bouxboux cungj lau hwj simvueng liux, vueng hwj gag vunz gag yiengq gij cwnz bonjfaenh hemqgouz gouq. Gajlaeng vihliux mbouj hawj aen ruz baenqlai naek, gyoengqde couh dawz gij doxgaiq ndaw ruz cenzbuq gveng roengz haij bae.
Hoeng mwhneix Yoznaz gaenq youq ndaw ruz ceiq lajdaej he aen canghruz ninz ralaep lo, ninz hwj ndaek fwjfwq.

Couh youq mwhneix, boux guenj ruz mwnq, de raen Yoznaz youq mwnq ninz le, couh ndatheiq hwj byaij goqbae fok de naeuz: “Veix! Daengz mwhneix mwngz cungj lij ninz baenxlai ndaek hajx? Vaiqdi hwnq! Vaiqdi yiengq gij cwnz mwngz gouz gouq bax! Saekseiz gij cwnz mwngz dauq hojsik raeuz, dauq ndaej gouq gij mingh gyoengqraeuz.”

Gyoengqde raen le, couh cam Yoznaz naeuz: “Naeuz raeuz ni, ciengz nanh neix dwg mbouj dwg youz mwngz daiq daeuj hih? Mwngz dwg guh gijmaz hih? Daj mwnqlaw daeuj? Dwg aen gueklaw dih vunz? Aen minzcuzlawz?”

Gajlaeng, Yoznaz han naeuz: “Gou dwg Hihbwzlaiz vunz. Gou baiq dih cwnz dwg Yehhozvaz; de dwg Cangqdiq, boux ceiq ak ceiq miz gienz dih cwnz. Sojmiz dih gwnzmbwn caeuq lajdeih cungj dwg de cauh okdaeuj dih.”
De vanzlij caiq naeuz: “Gou vih ij deuzndoj de cij deuz daeuj daengz neij lah.”
Gyoengqde dingq le, cungj lau hwj dungxmbouq ndangsaenz liux, couh naeuz: “Aixyax, cungj saeh neix mwngz caemh guh ndaej okdaeuj?”
Mwhneix rumzrumz raemxraemx engqgya yied ci yied hung. Gyoengqde couh cam Yoznaz naeuz: “Raeuz ij baenzlawz fad mwngz cij ndaej hawj rumz raemx hung dingz roengzma nej?”

Yoznaz naeuz: “Gou cungj rox naeuz sou roeb daengz raq rumz hung neix dwg youz gou yinxhwnj hih. Sou couh dawz gou gveng roengz haij bae bax; gveng roengzbae le, rumz hung raemx hung swhmboujyienz couh gag dingz roengzma lo.”
Yoznaz gan yienghneix naeuz lah, hoeng gyoengq fouruz vanzlij buekmingh vad ruz, ijsiengj vad haeuj hamq bae. Hoeng rumz hung yied bongx yied rem, gaenhbaenj mij banqfaz ndaej doxbae.
couh hemqgouz Yehhozvaz naeuz: “Yehhozvaz hax!
Gyoengqde yienghneix gangjgouz sat le, couh dawz Yoznaz gveng roengz ndaw haij bae. Gyoengqde baex gveng roengzbae he, rumz raemx hung couh majcangq doq dinghcub.
Gyoengqde raen yienghneix le, cungj gig beiqfug gig gingqcungh Yehhozvaz, vanzlij bwiz de, caiq yiengq de baujcingq baezneix guxmaz guxmaz.
Yoznaz nej, de ngaiz gveng roengz haij bae le, Yehhozvaz nganhbaiz duz bya hung he goq daeuj, dawz de gyan roengzbae. De youq ndaw dungx duz bya hung sam ngoenz sam ngwnz.
Yoznaz youq ndaw dungx duz bya haenh Yehhozvaz, naeuz:
Yehhozvaz
Gou roeb daengz nanh gouz mwngz nex,
Mwngz couh hoi bak han gou.
Gou youq ndawlaep gouz mwngz bang,
Mwngz caemh dingqri gij sing gou.
Mwngz dawz gou gveng roengz haij bae,
Gveng daengz mwnq ceiq laeg
Raemxgit daeuj gvaeg gou;
Gij raemxrongz hung mwngz caiq dumh gou.
Gou ndaw sim naeuz:
“Gou dajlwh dangqnaj mwngz ngaiz boenq deuz;
Baenzlawz caiq ndaej raen gunghdenq mwngz,
Mwnq mwngz youq mwnq nej?”
Raemx haij duk gou gaenjgaenj,
Gab dawz gij hoz gou.
Seiqhenz cungj dwg vaengz laeg,
Myez haij caiq cug aen raeuj gou.
Gou roengz daengz lajdaej haij luengqbya he;
Laj de luj miz binqdou youq baixlaeng gou gaenq suj ndaet.
Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq hax!
Couh dwg mwngz dawz gou daj ndaw gumz rai gouq gou okdaeuj.
Mwh gou ij gatcaw mwhde,
Gou couh ngeix daengz mwngz.
Yehhozvaz
Gou yiengq mwngz gangj hih vah gaenq cenz haeuj gunghdenq mwngz bae lo,
Caemh cenz haeuj rwz mwngz bae lo.
Byawz bae baiq duz you,
Cungj dwg begbeg baiq;
Byawz gvih baiq gyaj cwnz,
Couh dwg de vwt mwngz caencwnz doiq de dih hojsik.
Gou nej, gou ij haenh mwngz, docih mwngz, bwiz mwngz.
Gou caemh gangj daengz guh daengz gaxgonq gou soj caeuq mwngz gangj goq dih saeh.
Yehhozvaz
Caenhgag miz mwngz cij ndaej gouq vunz!
Yoznaz gangj sat le, Yehhozvaz couh hawj duz bya dawz Yoznaz haiz youq gwnz hamq.
Yehhozvaz caiq doiq Yoznaz naeuz:
“Mwngz vaiq bae daengz Niznizveih aen singz hung mwnq bae, yiengq gij vunz mwnq cenzgangj gij vah gou.”
Yiengq, mbat neix Yoznaz dingq gij vah Yehhozvaz lo; de couh bae daengz Niznizveih Singz. Mwhde, aen singz Niznizveih hung raixcaix, ij byaij sam ngoenz cij ndaej byaij goqdoh.

Gajlaeng Yoznaz byaij haeuj aen singz mwnq bae lo. De byaij haeujbae ngoenz he, yiengq gij vunz mwnq cenzgangj naeuz: “Goq seiqcib ngoenz haem, Niznizveih lienz vunz lienz singz couh ij ngaiz coeb liux bae.”

Gij vunz Niznizveih dingq le, couh sinq Cangqdiq dih vah. Gyoengqde vanzlij senhbuq lekdungx; mboujlwnh boux dang ak hajx cixnaeuz boux yaqyuij mij dang saek yiengh, cungj ij vuenh daenj buh boiq daehmaz,

Couh yienghneix, gij vah Yoznaz cenz bae daengz goengjvuengz Niznizveih. Goengjvuengz dingq le, de couh daj aen lungzeij de ndwn hwnjdaeuj, doq byaij doq duet diuz lungzbauz de okdaeuj, couh doq daenj diuz buh boiq daehmaz haeujbae,
Gajlaeng de baij vunz bae yiengq gij vunz Niznizveih mwnq fat dunghgauq naeuz:
Goengjvuengz caeuq gij daqcwnz de mingqlingq naeuz:
Vunz caeuq gij doenghduz ndaw ranz, gijmaz doxgaiq cungj mbouj ndaej gw; cungj ij lekdungx.
Vunz cungj ij daenj buh boiq daehmaz, doenghduz caemh ij gyuj boiq boiqmaz. Bouxboux cungj ij lauxsaed gouz Cangqdiq, daj ndaw sim nginh loek gaij goqma, mbouj caiq haih vunz, vwt gij doegsieb bae.
Saekseiz de dauq vih gij neix gaijbienq cawjeiq, mbouj caiq fatheiq. Yienghneix, gyoengqraeuz couh mbouj lau ngaiz rairaeg raicied lo!

Gajlaeng, Cangqdiq yawjraen gyoengqde soj guh dih saeh, couh rox gyoengqde mbouj caiq guh doenghgij doegsieb he lo, couh gaijbienq gij cawjeiq de, mbouj hawj yienzlaiz senhbuq dih nanh nanh dawz gyoengqde lo.
Yehhozvaz yienghneix gaijbienq cawjeiq le, Yoznaz cix mbouj fug cix aeuqheiq.
Yienghneix de couh ienq naeuz: “Yehhozvaz
Heix, Yehhozvaz
Yehhozvaz han naeuz: “Mwngz naemqnaeuz mwngz ndatheiq lij deng?”
Gajlaeng Yehhozvaz Cangqdiq hawj go youzcoengh he hwnj youq henz ndang Yoznaz, hawj go de hwnj hwj sang goq Yoznaz bae, hawj de ndaej gang raemh, hawj de haemq ndeiyouq. Yoznaz raen le, angq ij rai.
Hoeng daengz haet daixngeih, Cangqdiq youh hawj duz non he daeuj gw go youzcoengh, gw hawj go de cungj reuq liux bae.

Gyangjngoenz ok daeuj le, Cangqdiq caiq hawj gij rumz gig ndat he daj baixdoeng ci goqdaeuj. Gij heiq ndit de gig ndat, cik daengz gwnz raeuj Yoznaz. Yoznaz ngaiz ndit cik hwj raeuj muenh ij rai hojyouq bae, couh hemq naeuz: “Gou cingxnyienh rai lo! Rai lij haemq ndeiyouq!”
Cangqdiq dingq le, couh doiq Yoznaz naeuz: “Geizheih, go youzcoengh neix rai, mwngz ndatheiq guxmaz nex?”
Yoznaz han naeuz: “Baeq mbouj ndatheiq? Gou cungj aeuqheiq ij rai hoh lo!”
Yehhozvaz couh doiq Yoznaz naeuz: “Go neix youq ngwnz he ndaej maj hung, caiq ndaej youq ngwnz he rai bae. Mwngz youh mbouj ndaem go de, youh mbouj viq go de hung; mwngz lij baenxlai langx go de!

Gangjnaeuz ndaw Niznizveih Singz hih vunz, gyoengqde miz baenx cibngeih lai fanh vunz, daiq fawz gvaz fawz swix cungj faen mbouj ok haem, caemh vanzlij miz baenxbienh moumou, vaizvaiz, gaeqgaeq. Baenx hung dih singz, gou baeq mbouj langx gyoengqde hwj? Cingqcaen lo!”
Yehsuh Gihduz dwg gij lwglan Daqveiq,
Yaqbwzlahhanj miz Hijsaj,
Hijsaj miz Yajgoz,
Yajgoz miz Youzdaq caeuq gij goengjlungz nuengxau Youzdaq.
Youzdaq caeuq mehyah de Dahmaj seng miz Fazlwzswh caeuq Seqlah,
Fazlwzswh miz Hihswhlwnz,
Hihswhlwnz miz Yaqlanz,
Yaqlanz miz Yaqmijnazdaz,
Yaqmijnazdaz miz Nazswnq,
Nazswnq miz Sajmaenz,
Sajmaenz caeuq mehyah de Lahhoz miz Boh'ahswh,
Boh'ahswh caeuq mehyah de Luqdwz miz Ngozbiqdwz,
Ngozbiqdwz miz Yehsih,
Yehsih miz Daqveiq goengjvuengz neix.
Daqveiq goengjvuengz neix caeuq
Sojlozmaenz miz Lozboh'anh,
Lozboh'anh miz Yaqbijyaj,
Yaqbijyaj miz Yaqsaj,
Yaqsaj miz Yozcahfaz,
Yozcahfaz miz Yozlanz,
Yozlanz miz Uhsihyaq,
Uhsihyaq miz Yozdanj,
Yozdanj miz Yaqhahswh,
Yaqhahswh miz Hihsihgyah,
Hihsihgyah miz Majnazsih,
Majnazsih miz Yaqmaenz,
Yaqmaenz miz Yozsihyaq.
Mwh
Ngaiz gaemh dawz boenq bae daengz Bahbijlwnz le, Yehgohnizyaj miz Sajlahdez,
Sajlahdez miz Sojlozbahbwz,
Sojlozbahbwz miz Yaqbijhiq,
Yaqbijhiq miz Hijliqyaqgingq,
Hijliqyaqgingq miz Yaqsoj,
Yaqsoj miz Sajduz,
Sajduz miz Yaqgimh,
Yaqgimh miz Hijliz,
Hijliz miz Hijliqyaqsaj,
Hijliqyaqsaj miz Majdanq,
Majdanq miz Yajgoz,
Yajgoz miz Yozswz.
Yozswz couh dwg goeng gojyez Majliqyaq,
Majliqyaq couh dwg daxmeh Yehsuh, couh dwg boux heuh Gihduz

Ciuq yienghneix suenq hwnjdaeuj, dajlwh Yaqbwzlahhanj daengz Daqveiq itgungh miz cibseiq daih. Yiengq caiq dajlwh Daqveiq daengz mwh gij vunz Hijswzlez ngaiz boenq buen bae daengz Bahbijlwnz hih mwhde, caemh miz cibseiq daih. Caiq dajlwh gij vunz Hijswzlez ngaiz boenq buen bae daengz Bahbijlwnz youq hih mwhde suenq hwnj daengz seng Gihduz caemh dwg miz cibseiq daih.
Laj neix couh dwg geiq mwh seng Yehsuh Gihduz he.
Mwh daxmeh de Majliqyaq caeuq Yozswz dingh guh gvanjbaz, mijyaengz cingqcaen haq hawj Yozswz haem hih mwhde, Hoenzsaenz Cangqdiq cix hawj de mizndang lo.
Goeng de Yozswz dwg boux lauxsaed simndei simsoh he dih vunz hih; de mbouj siengj hawj Majliqyaq saetnaj, couh siengj caegcaeg caeuq de gaij naeuz mbouj caeuq de guh gvanjbaz lo.
Hoeng, couh youq mwh de yienghneix naemj hih mwhde, bouxcai Cangqdiq
De gaengjdingq seng miz daeglwg he; mwngz ij an coh hawj de heuh Yehsuh, aenvih de ij gouq gij vunz de daj ndaw coih ok ma.”
Gij saeh neix cingqgawq lingz ok Cangqdiq hawj boux cenz gij vah de naeuz goq naeuz:
Gaengjdingq ij miz lwgsau mijyaengz caeuq vunzsai ninz goq haem couh miz lwg lo. Gij vunz ij heuh laeq lwg neix heuh Hijmajneiqliq
hih gawq vah neix lo. (‘Hijmajneiqliq’ couh dwg ‘Cangqdiq caeuq raeuz youq’ dih iqswh.)
Gajlaeng, Yozswz singj le, couh ciuq gij vah bouxcai Cangqdiq raengq hih yienghmwnq bae aeu Majliqyaq ma guh yah lo.
Hoeng, de youq mwh Majliqyaq mijyaengz seng lwg mwhde, de itcig cungj mij caeuq de ninz goq. Couh yienghneix, laeq lwg neix seng okdaeuj le, Yozswz couh an coh hawj de heuh Yehsuh.

Yehsuh seng youq Youzdaiq Saengj dih Bwzliqhaengz Singz. De seng hih mwhde, cingq dwg goeng Hihliz guh vuengz hih mwhde. De seng le, miz geij boux coengjmingz rox yawj gijmaz rox suenq gijmaz he daj baixdoeng daeuj daengz Yehluqsajlaengj Singz,
“Ngamq seng hih Youzdaiq vunz dih vuengz youq mwnqlaw lah? Gyoengqraeuz youq baixdoeng yawjraen aen ndaundeiq dwzbez de yienh okdaeuj hwj, sojhij gyoengqraeuz saengzcingz daeuj baiq de sax de lah.”
Yiengq Hihliz goengjvuengz neix caeuq Yehluqsajlaengj cenz singz sojmiz hih vunz dingq daengz gij siuhsiz neix le, cungj roxnginh simyou fubfub.
Gajlaeng, goeng Hihliz couh heuh sojmiz hih goengjsae dajbwiz caeuq fazliz cenhgyah daeuj doxcomz, cam gyoengqde naeuz: “Gihduz youq nwjh seng lah?”
Yiengq, gyoengqde han naeuz: “Youq Youzdaiq Saengj dih Bwzliqhaengz Singz, aenvih boux cenz gij vah Cangqdiq dwg yienghneix sij naeuz goq hih:

Dieg Youzdaiq dih Bwzliqhaengz Singz hax, mwngz gaenhbaenj mbouj dwg youq dieg Youzdaiq dih gak aen singz dih aen ceiq iq ceiq yaez he, aenvih ij miz goengjvuengz he dajlaeng mwngz ok daeuj daiq gij vunz Cangqdiq, Hijswzlez vunz.”

Goeng Hihliz dingq gyoengqde yienghneix gangj le, couh caegcaeg cimh doengh boux daj baixdoeng daeuj hih doengh boux coengjmingz rox yawj gijmaz rox suenq gijmaz mwnq daeuj saemjcam gyoengqde dauqdaej aen ndaundeiq dwzbez mwnq seizlaw yienh okdaeuj.

Gajlaeng goeng de caiq baij gyoengqde bae Bwzliqhaengz Singz; de raengq gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou bae cimh laeq lwgngez mwnq, cimh daengz raen bae. Cimhraen le, ma naeuz gou ni; gou caemh ij bae baiq de.”
Gyoengqde dingq goengjvuengz yienghneix raengq le, couh bae lo. Bae hih mwhde,
Gyoengqde raen aen de le, cungj angq hwj ij rai bae.

Gajlaeng gyoengqde couh majcangq haeuj ndaw ranz mwnq bae. Haeuj bae le, couh yawjraen laeq lwgngez he caeuq daxmeh de Majliqyaq. Gyoengqde raen le, couh bomz roengz doem bae sax laeq lwgngez neix. Gyoengqde sax le, vanzlij caiq hoi
Gajlaeng gyoengqde fangxngwnzloq raen

Gyoengqde maj le, Yozswz fangxngwnzloq; youq ndaw loq de bouxcai Cangqdiq doiq de naeuz: “Vaiq hwnq! Daiq laeq lwgngez neix caeuq daxmeh de deuz bae Ngaihgiz youq bax; ij youq daengz gou naeuz mwngz ni bae, aenvih goeng Hihliz ij cimh laeq lwgngez neix, ijsiengj gaj de.”
Yozswz loqraen yienghneix le, couh vaiqdi hwnq, lienzyeh daiq lwg daiq yah deuz bae Ngaihgiz.
De deuz bae daengz Ngaihgiz youq, itcig youq daengz goeng Hihliz rai. Gij saeh neix ngamq lingz ok Cangqdiq hawj boux cenz gij vah de gangj goq naeuz:
Gou daj Ngaihgiz heuh daeglwg gou ok ma.

Yiengq caiq gangj daengz goeng Hihliz, gajlaeng, goeng Hihliz rox bonjfaenh de ngaiz doengh boux coengjmingz rox yawj gijmaz suenq gijmaz mwnq coemx de le, cungj aeuqheiq hwj ij rai bae. De couh ciuq gaxgonq de dajlaeng doengh boux coengjmingz rox yawj gijmaz rox suenq gijmaz mwnq damqdingq ndaej rox aen ndaundeiq dwzbez mwnq yienh okdaeuj hih cizgyenh ma suenq, couh baij vunz bae dawz Bwzliqhaengz Singz caeuq seiqhenz singz de sojmiz hih lwgngez vunzsai song bi doxroengz cungj gaj liux.
Yienghneix gij saeh neix cingq lingz ok Yehliqmij boux cenz gij vah Cangqdiq neix gaxgonq gangj goq naeuz:
Youq Lahmaj
Gajlaeng goeng Hihliz goengjvuengz neix rai le, bouxcai Cangqdiq caiq yienh youq ndaw loq Yozswz. (Mwhneix Yozswz cingq youq Ngaihgiz.) De youq ndaw loq doiq Yozswz naeuz:
“Hwnq! Daiq lwg daiq yah dauq maj dieg Hijswzlez, aenvih boux ij gaj laeq lwgngez neix hih gaenq rai lo.”
Yozswz loqraen yienghneix le, couh majcangq daiq lwg daiq yah dauq ma daengz dieg Hijswzlez.

Hoeng, de dingq daengz dwg Yaqgihlauj daeglwg Hihliz swnj goeng Hihliz guh Youzdaiq dih vuengz le, couh mbouj gamj bae Youzdaiq Saengj. Gajlaeng de fangxngwnzloq raen Cangqdiq naeuz de, de couh bae dieg Gyahliqliq,
youq mwnq dieg heuh Nazsajlwz he youq. Yienghneix caemh ngamq lingz ok boux cenz gij vah Cangqdiq gangj goq naeuz:
Gij vunz ij naeuz de dwg Nazsajlwz vunz.
Miz baez he, guh sijlij dih Yozhanq youq rogndoi Youzdaiq Saengj cenzgangj
De naeuz: “Cangqdiq dih gienzveih couh ij fazveih lo; faenhsou ij daj ndaw sim nginh loek gaij goqma.”
Boux Yozhanq neix couh dwg boux Hijcaiqyaq boux cenz gij vah Cangqdiq neix naeuz goq naeuz:
Youq rogndoi miz vunz hemq goggog naeuz: “Cwnjbiq diuz roen he hawj bouxcawj; coih diuz roen soh hawj de byaij!”
hih boux mwnq lo.
Mwhde Yozhanq dwg daenj buh fwn lozdoz, rwet gyaeb sai naeng, dwg gw duz daek caeuq dangzrwi ndoi he.
Yiengq miz haujlai vunz daj Yehluqsajlaengj caeuq Youzdaiq Saengj caeuq fueng diuz dah Yozdanq daeuj daengz de mwnq
caemh nginh coih, caemh youq diuz dah Yozdanq hawj de sijlij.
Yozhanq raen miz haujlai gaep haeuj Fazliqcaiq baij
Faenhsou ij guh gij saeh ndaej cingqmingz naeuz faenhsou gaenq gaijgoq he.
Gaejyungh naemqnaeuz faenhsou dwg gij lwglan Yaqbwzlahhanj le,
Faenhsou couh luj go mak; famz go mak mbouj giet mak ndei hih couh ij ngaiz raemj gveng haeuj feiz bae.

“Gou seizneix cijmboujgoq dwg aeu raemx ma sijlij hawj faenhsou lah, dwg hawj faenhsou ij daj ndaw sim nginh loek gaijgoq lah. Hoeng, baezneix ij miz boux beij gou ak he daeuj. Boux de, daiq gou bang de riuj haizcauj cungj mbouj lwnz daengz gou hwx. De ij yungh Hoenzsaenz Cangqdiq caeuq feiz ma sijlij hawj faenhsou.

Ndaw fawz boux de dawz lad, lad dawz gij nyapnyangj he okdaeuj, sauq cengh caiqcangz, dawz ceh mienh coengq haeuj canghguq bae, dawz doenghheij nyapnyap nyangjnyangj he dwk haeuj ndaw feiz mbouj rox maet he bae vueng.”
Mwhde Yehsuh caemh daj Gyahliqliq daeuj diuz dah Yozdanq hawj Yozhanq sijlij.

Yiengq Yozhanq couh naeuz bonjfaenh de mbouj boiqndaej bang de sijlij. De vanzlij naeuz: “Mwngz mboujyungh sijlij nej! Gou caemh mbouj bang mwngz hih; gou wnggai hawj mwngz bang gou sijlij cij deng, hoeng, mwngz dauq daeuj hawj gou bang mwngz sijlij lah!”
Yehsuh dingq le, han naeuz: “Seizneix camqciz yienghneix guh bax, aenvih yienghneix guh dwg ciuq gij cawjeiq Cangqdiq guh hih.” Yozhanq dingq de yienghneix naeuz le, caemh dapwngq de lo.
Couh yienghneix, Yozhanq couh bang Yehsuh sijlij lo.
Caemh miz sing daj gwnzmbwn doiq de naeuz: “Mwngz dwg daeglwg gou; gou gig aiq mwngz. Mwngz hawj gou roxnginh hab'eiq habhoz raixcaix.”
Miz baez he, Hoenzsaenz Cangqdiq daiq Yehsuh bae daengz rogndoi, hawj de ngaiz
hawj de youq rogndoi lekdungx gijmaz cungj mbouj gw, dungxiek seiqcib ngwnzngoenz. Yiengq de lek seiqcib ngwnzngoenz le, roxnginh dungxiek ij rai bae.
Couh youq mwhneix, fangzvuengz daeuj yaeuh de doiq de naeuz: “Hauhnaeuz mwngz dwg daeglwg Cangqdiq nex, mwngz couh mingqlingq ngauq rin neix, hawj de bienq menqbauh bax!”
Yiengq Yehsuh han naeuz:
Vunz mbouj dwg caenhgag gauq miz gw cij ndaej lix nej, dauq dwg ij gauq Cangqdiq soj gangj hih vah cij ndaej lix lah.”
Gajlaeng, fangzvuengz caiq daiq de bae daengz aen singz Cangqdiq,
caiq doiq de naeuz: “Hauhnaeuz mwngz dwg lwg Cangqdiq nex, mwngz couh daj dineix diuq roengzbae bax, aenvih
Cangqdiq raengq bouxcai de, hawj bouxcai de aeu fawz ma raeuz mwngz baujhuq mwngz, hawj mwngz mbouj ngaiz bungq dawz rin
hah.”
Yehsuh dingq le, youhcaiq han naeuz:
Mbouj ndaej sawq Cangqdiq, mwngz dih cwnz
hah.”
Fangzvuengz dingq de yienghneix gangj le,
couh doiq de naeuz: “Neq! Mwngz yawj veiq; hauhnaeuz mwngz baiq gou sax gou nex, gou couh dawz mwngz soj yawjraen hih cungj soengq hawj mwngz.”
Yehsuh dingq le, youhcaiq han de naeuz: “Sajdanq, deuz!
Cangqdiq dwg mwngz dih cwnz; ij baiq ij sax, caenhgag ndaej baiq ndaej sax de, caemh dwg caenhgag ndaej swqhaeuh de.”
Miz baez he, Yehsuh dingq naeuz
Hoeng, de mij maj Nazsajlwz
De yienghneix cingq lingz ok Hijcaiqyaq boux cenz gij vah Cangqdiq neix gangj goq hih vah naeuz:
Dieg Sihbuqlwnz caeuq dieg Nazfuzdahliq, youq henz haij baih hamq dah Yozdanq, linghvaih minzcuz soj youq hih dieg Gyahliqliq hax!
Doenghgij vunz luj youq ndaw laep hih vunz hax, couh ij yawjraen rongh sagsag lo. Doenghheij vunz lau rai he hax, couh ij miz rongh ciuq dawz lo.
Couh dwg daj mwhmwnq hwnj, Yehsuh couh gaihcij cenzgangj naeuz: “Cangqdiq dih gienzveih couh ij fazveih lo; faenhsou wnggai ij daj ndaw sim nginh loek gaij goqma.”

Miz baez he, Yehsuh youq henz huz Gyahliqliq byaij. Yiengq de yawjraen miz song boux beixnuengx youq ndaw huz dwk bya. Song boux de couh dwg Sihmaenz (Sihmaenz caemh heuh Bijdwz) caeuq daegnuengx de Anhdwzlez; song boux de yienzlaiz dwg canghdwkbya he.
Yehsuh yawjraen le, couh doiq song boux de naeuz: “Daeuj, daeuj gaen gou bax; gou ij hawj faenhsou ndaej vunz luj ndaej bya yienghmwnq.”
Gyoengqde dingq le, couh mbouj aeu doenghheij muengx de, couh gaen Yehsuh bae lo.

Gajlaeng, Yehsuh caiq ndij goq henz huz bae, caiq raen miz doiq beixnuengx he, couh dwg song daeglwg Sihbiqdaiq, Yajgoz caeuq Yozhanq. Song boux de cingq naengh youq ndaw ruz caeuq daxboh de fong muengx. De raen le, couh heuh song boux de
Song boux de dingq le, couh majcangq daj gwnz ruz roengz ma, biek daxboh de bae gaen Yehsuh lo.
Gajlaeng, Yehsuh byaij baenx cenz Gyahliqliq sojmiz hih dieg, bae gak aen veiqdangz cenzgangj guek
Couh yienghneix,
Sojhij miz baenx haujlai vunz dajlwh Gyahliqliq hah, Dihgyahbohlij
Yiengq Yehsuh raen miz baenx haujlai vunz daeuj gaen de le, couh hwnj bya bae. De hwnj bae le, ngamq baex naengh roengzma he, gyoengq lwgsae de couh gvaengz goqbae dep de.
Gajlaeng, Yehsuh couh doiq gyoengqde naeuz:
“Mbouj rasang yawjhwnj Cangqdiq hih vunz hax, miz fuk lo, aenvih de dwg haeuj guek Cangqdiq hih.
“Siengsim hih vunz hax, miz fuk lo, aenvih
“Soh semxsemh hih vunz hax, miz fuk lo, aenvih lajmbwn hih dieg couh ij gvi hawj de lo.
“Muengh ndaej ciuq gij cawjeiq Cangqdiq bae guh hih vunz hax, miz fuk lo, aenvih
“Rox hojsik hih vunz hax, miz fuk lo, aenvih
“Simndei lauxsaed hih vunz hax, miz fuk lo, aenvih de couh ij ndaej raen Cangqdiq lo.
“Hawj vunz doxhuz hih vunz hax, miz fuk lo, aenvih Cangqdiq nginh de guh lwg.
“Vih ciuq gij cawjeiq Cangqdiq bae guh hwj ngaiz souh daengz vunz haih hih vunz hax, miz fuk lo, aenvih de dwg haeuj guek Cangqdiq hih.
Hauhnaeuz vih gou hwj ngaiz vunz yug, ngaiz vunz haih, ngaiz vunz luenhbangh bangjlaih hih, faenhsou couh miz fuk lo.

Faenhsou wnggai riuriu angqangq, aenvih youq gwnzmbwn Cangqdiq ij miz haujlai cangj hawj faenhsou, caemh aenvih youq dangq gaxgonq faenhsou caemh miz boux cenz gij vah Cangqdiq caemh yienghneix ngaiz vunz haih goq.”

Yehsuh gangj daengz dineix le, vanzlij caiq naeuz: “Faenhsou dwg lajmbwn hih gyu. Yiengq, hauhnaeuz gij gyu neix gaenq cwt lo, couh ij baenzlaw caiq hawj de ndaej bienq ndaengq haem nej? Mij'z yungh hih gyu, mbouj vwt ok rog bae hawj vunz caij, ij diuh de ma guh maz haem nej?
“Faenhsou dwg lajmbwn hih rongh;

Caemhdangq naeuz mij'z vunz naeuz diemj daeng rongh le, caiq dawz aen de coengq haeuj ndaw gang bae, dauq dwg ij dawz aen de coengq hwnj gwnz daiz bae, hawj aen de ndaej ciuq rongh baenx cenz ranz vunz raen lah.
Caemh doxdoengz, faenhsou caemh wnggai ciuq rongh hawj vunz lajmbwn, hawj gyoengqde yawj ndaej raen faenhsou guh hih ndeisaeh hwj haenh daxboh gwnzmbwn faenhsou.”
Yehsuh vanzlij caiq naeuz: “Gou daeuj lajmbwn mbouj dwg ij daeuj cawz gij vah Mohsih
Gou lauxsaed naeuz sou ni, cijaeu mbwnmbwn deihdeih lij miz, fazliz dih it bit it veh caemh lij miz, miz daengz sojmiz hih cungj lingz okdaeuj bae.

Sojhij, mboujguenj dwg byawz, hauhnaeuz de yawj mbouj hwnj gij fazliz neix hih diuz he, cungjsuenq naeuz diuz mbouj youqgaenj he, cixnaeuz son vunz yienghneix guh hih, de youq guek Cangqdiq mwnq couh dwg boux ceiq yaez ceiq yaqyuij he lo. Hoeng, fanjgoqma, mboujguenj dwg byawz, hauhnaeuz de soenhsouj gij fazliz neix caemh son vunz ciuq yienghmwnq bae guh hih, de youq guek Cangqdiq couh dwg boux ceiq rem ceiq veijdaq he lo.

Gou saedsaeh naeuz sou ni, cizfeih faenhsou youq ndaw lwgra Cangqdiq ndaej beij gij fazliz cenhgyah caeuq ndaej beij gij vunz Fazliqcaiq baij he ndwn ndaej cingq, mbouj nex, faenhsou gaengjdingq mbouj ndaej gaep haeuj guek Cangqdiq.”
Yehsuh vanzlij caiq naeuz: “Faenhsou gaengjdingq ndaej dingqri naeuz goq gimqcij dangq doenghbaez hih vah bax, couh dwg naeuz: ‘Mbouj ndaej gaj vunz; gaj vunz hih gaengjdingq ngaiz buenqhingz.’

Hoeng, gou naeuz sou ni, mboujguenj byawz fatheiq vunz hih, caemh ngaiz souh daengz saemjbuenq; naeuz vunz mij'z yungh hih couh ij ngaiz souh daengz gauhgiz fazdingz saemjbuenq, caemh mboujguenj byawz ndaq naeuz vunz ngawz hih caemh gaengjdingq mbouj ndaej duet ok mwnq Cangqdiq fad fangz dawz feiz he.
Sojhij, mwngz dawz gij dajbwiz bae dajbwiz hih mwhde, hauhnaeuz mwngz ngeix daengz miz vunz caeuq mwngz doiq mwngz mbouj muenx nex,
mwngz couh camqciz mbouj bwiz; sien bae caeuq de gangjhuz gaenq, menhcij caiq bwiz.
Hauhnaeuz miz vunz bae gauq mwngz
Gou saedsaeh naeuz sou ni, daengz mwhmwnq, mwngz ca faen he mbouj ndaej boiz liux, mwngz couh gaej muengh naeuz ndaej coengq okma lo.
“Faenhsou dingqri naeuz goq mbouj ndaej guhyoux gij vah neix lo bax?
Gou naeuz sou ni, mboujguenj byawz raen vunzbaz couh ijsiengj caeuq de hih, yiengq de caemhdangq gaenq caeuq de guhyoux lo.

Hauhnaeuz cehra mwngz hawj mwngz famh coih hih, yiengq couh ij dawz ceh de vet okdaeuj gveng bae; cingxnyienh aen ndangdaej noix bae yiengh he lah, yienghneix dauq giengz goq baenx cenz ndang cungj ngaiz

Hauhnaeuz gij fawz gvaz mwngz hawj mwngz famh coih hih, yiengq couh ij dawz gij de raemj bae, gveng bae; cingxnyienh aen ndang noix bae yiengh he, yienghneix dauq giengz goq baenx cenz ndang cungj ngaiz
“Caemh miz
Hoeng, gou naeuz sou ni hax, cizfeih dwg meh de caeuq vunz guhyoux
“Faenhsou caemh gaengjdingq dingqri gij vah doiq dangq doenghbaez naeuz goq naeuz: ‘Yiengq Cangqdiq fazsiq goq hih couh ijaeu gangj daengz guh daengz; mbouj ndaej bak lai myaiz led.’
Hoeng, gou naeuz sou ni hax, mboujguenj guxmaz cungj mbouj ndaej fazsiq; mbouj ndaej yinx hwnj mbwn bae fazsiq, aenvih aen mbwn dwg aen lungzeij Cangqdiq.
Caemh mbouj ndaej yinx lajdeih bae fazsiq, aenvih lajdeih dwg gij ha eij Cangqdiq; caemh mbouj ndaej yinx haeuj Yehluqsajlaengj bae fazsiq, aenvih Yehluqsajlaengj dwg aen singz
Engq mbouj ndaej yinx haeuj ndaek raeuj bonjfaenh bae fazsiq, aenvih mwngz mbouj ndaej hawj dug byoem mwngz bienq ndaem bienq bieg.
Couh dwg naeuz, faenhsou gangj vah, ‘dwg’ couh naeuz ‘dwg,’ ‘mbouj dwg’ couh naeuz ‘mbouj dwg;’
“Faenhsou caemh dingqri naeuz goq naeuz: ‘Doh ra boiz ra, doh faenz boiz faenz,’ gawq neix lo bax.
Hoeng, gou naeuz sou ni, gaejyungh caeuq vunz vaih doxngig. Hauhnaeuz miz vunz mbap mbiengj naj gvaz mwngz, mwngz couh veq mbiengj naj swix mwngz hawj de ajcaih de mbap.
Caiq hauhnaeuz miz vunz ij gauq mwngz, ijsiengj aeu diuz buh baixndaw mwngz hih, yiengq mwngz couh daiqlienz diuz buh baixrog mwngz cungj ajcaih de aeu.
Caiq hauhnaeuz miz vunz ep mwngz buenx de byaij leix roen he, yiengq mwngz couh ij buenx de byaij song leix roen.
Youhcaiq hauhnaeuz miz vunz gouz mwngz nex, mwngz couh dapwngq de; miz vunz ij laeng mwngz ciq gijmaz hih, yiengq mwngz couh ij ciq hawj de, mbouj ndaej doi.
“Faenhsou caemh dingqri naeuz goq: ‘Ij aiq doenghheij gekleiz mwngz, haenq doenghheij caeuq mwngz miz haemzcaeuz he,’ gawq neix lwi?
Hoeng, gou naeuz sou ni, faenhsou ij aiq doengh boux caeuq faenhsou doxmiz haemzcaeuz he, caemh ij bang doengh boux haih mwngz goq he gouz Cangqdiq.

Yienghmwnq cij ndaej guh lwg Bohmbwn, aenvih Bohmbwn hawj gyangjngoenz ciuq vunz ndei, caemh ciuq vunz rwix vunz vaih; hawj fwn doek hawj vunz simndei simsoh he, caemh doek hawj vunz simdoeg simfwn he.
Yiengq, hauhnaeuz faenhsou cij rox aiq doenghheij aiq faenhsou he,
Caiq hauhnaeuz faenhsou cij rox dongx gij baengzyoux faenhsou lah, yiengq caemh ij miz maz daekeiq nex! Yienghneix guh, daiqlienz doenghheij linghvaih minzcuz
Sojhij faenhsou wnggai guh boux simndei liuxliux he, caemh luj Bohmbwn faenhsou yienghmwnq ndei liuxliux he.”

Yehsuh vanzlij caiq naeuz: “Faenhsou ij siujsim, mbouj ndaej guqiq youq dangqnaj vunzlai loh hawj vunz rox hawj vunz raen mwngz guh gijmaz gijmaz ndeisaeh; hauhnaeuz yienghmwnq, couh mbouj ndaej dajlaeng Bohmbwn faenhsou mwnq ndaej gijmaz cangj lo.

Sojhij, mwngz hawj vunz mwhde, gaejyungh dauqcawq cej naeuz vunz ni; gaejyungh luj doengh boux gyajcang guh simndei mwnq youq veiqdangz cixnaeuz youq gwnz gai soj guh hih yienghmwnq siengj hawj vunz haenh gyoengqde. Gou saedsaeh naeuz sou ni, gyoengqde yienghneix guh cijmboujgoq caenhgag ndaej hawj vunz haenh yiengh dog lah,
Mwngz hawj vunz mwhde, gaejyungh hawj fawz swix rox fawz gvaz guh gijmaz.
mboujyungh guqiq hawj vunz rox. Yienghneix, yawj vunz cingx goq gingq bohliz bae hih Bohmbwn faenhsou, de gaengjdingq cangj hawj faenhsou hih.

“Faenhsou gouz Cangqdiq haenh Cangqdiq hih mwhde, mbouj ndaej luj doengh boux cang guh vunz simndei simsoh mwnq, haenj ndwn youq veiqdangz cixnaeuz youq gwnz gai mwnq vunz lai he gouzhaenh Cangqdiq hawj vunz yawj. Gou saedsaeh naeuz sou ni, gyoengqde yienghneix guh, cijmboujgoq caenhgag ndaej yienghneix hwj lah;

Gou saedsaeh naeuz sou ni, faenhsou gouz Cangqdiq haenh Cangqdiq mwhde, wnggai haeuj ndaw fungh maj haep dou hwj gouzhaenh boux faenhsou aeu ra ma yawj mbouj raen dih Bohmbwn, yienghneix boux yawj vunz cingx goq gingq bohliz bae dih Bohmbwn faenhsou gaengjdingq hoh fuk hawj faenhsou.
“Faenhsou gouzhaenh
Faenhsou ciengeiz mbouj ndaej hag gyoengqde, aenvih faenhsou mijyaengz hoi bak gouzhaenh haem, Bohmbwn faenhsou cix rox faenhsou ij aeu gijmaz lo.
Sojhij, faenhsou gouzhaenh Cangqdiq nex, ij yienghneix naeuz:
Bohmbwn raeuz hax, caenhgag mwngz cij dwg caencwnz;
Vunz ij soenhcungq mwngz.
Muengh gij gienzveih mwngz youq lajmbwn fazveih.
Muengh gij cawjeiq mwngz ndaej youq lajmbwn doiqyienh,
Caemh luj youq gwnzmbwn doiqyienh yienghmwnq.
Muengh mwngz nyok hawj raeuz ngoenznaengz ij gw he.
Gouz mwngz mienx gij coih raeuz,
Aenvih raeuz caemh mienx doengh boux daekcoih raeuz he lo.
Caemh muengh raeuz mbouj ngaiz yungx bae guh vaihsaeh;
Gouq gyoengqraeuz duet ok boux simdoeg simsieb mwnq.
[Aenvih caenhgag mwngz cij dwg vuengz, cij miz gienz, cij boiqndaej vunz haenh, yungjyenj haenh roengzbae. Ahmaenz.]
Hauhnaeuz faenhsou rox nyiuz vunz, Bohmbwn faenhsou caemh nyiuz faenhsou;
yiengq fanjgoqma, hauhnaeuz faenhsou mbouj rox nyiuz vunz nex, Bohmbwn faenhsou caemh mbouj nyiuz faenhsou hih.”
Yehsuh gangj daengz dineix le, vanzlij caiq naeuz: “Gou saedsaeh naeuz sou ni, faenhsou lekdungx
Gou caiq naeuz sou ni, faenhsou lekdungx

mbouj ndaej hawj vunz yawj ndaej ok faenhsou lekdungx, caenhgag hawj boux aeu ra ma yawj mbouj raen dih Bohmbwn faenhsou rox ndaej lo. Yienghmwnq, yawj vunz cingx goq gingq bohliz bae dih Bohmbwn faenhsou, de gaengjdingq hoh fuk hawj faenhsou.”
Yehsuh youhcaiq naeuz: “Faenhsou mbouj ndaej vih bonjfaenh hwj youq lajmbwn rom doxgaiq, rom cienzcaiz, aenvih lajmbwn miz non sae, caemh ngaiz hwnj singq hwnj naej, caemh miz caeg daeuj caeg aeu.
Sojhij faenhsou ij rom cienzcaiz hih, wnggai rom youq gwnzmbwn, aenvih gwnzmbwn mbouj miz non sae, mbouj rox hwnj singq hwnj naej, caemh mbouj miz caeg daeuj caeg.
Faenhsou wnggai rox, cienzcaiz youq mwnqlaw, aen sim caemh youq mwnqlaw.”
De caiq naeuz: “Cehra faenhsou caemhdangq gwnz ndang faenhsou hih aen daeng he. Ceh de rongh, baenx ndang cungj caemh rongh;
hauhnaeuz ceh de fangz, baenx ndang cungj caemh laep, ndaw sim de caemh laep, yiengq couh youqgaenj lo!”

De caiq naeuz: “Bouxhoiq he mbouj ndaej swqhaeuh song bouxcawj; mbouj nex, de gaengjdingq haenj boux he, yiem boux he, cixnaeuz naek boux he, mbaeu boux he. Sojhij faenhsou mbouj ndaej gingqbaiq Cangqdiq caiq baiqfug ngaenz.
“Sojhij gou caiq saedsaeh naeuz sou ni, gaejyungh vih gw vih daenj hwj you, aenvih mingh dij goq gij gw, aen ndang dij goq buh.
Hawjm'z ngeixngeix yawj hux, doenghheij roeg mbin gwnz mbwn, gyoengqde cungj mij ndaem mij sou, caemh mij canghguq, hoeng, Bohmbwn faenhsou ciuqyiengh ciengx gyoengqde,
Caiq gangjnaeuz faenhsou dineix, miz byawz gauq baengh you le ndaej hawj bonjfaenh lai souhyienz diemjcung he

“Gou vanzlij caiq naeuz faenhsou hax, faenhsou vihmaz ij vih daenj hwj you nej? Faenhsou ngeixngeix yawj hux, doengh go va bwzhoz rogndoi, doengh go de dwg baenzlaw hwnj hwnjdaeuj hih. Go de cix mbouj hoj guh hong, cix mbouj hoj daemj faiq,
hoeng, gou naeuz sou ni, cungjsuenq Sojlozmaenz

“Heix, faenhsou hax, sinq Cangqdiq sinq daiq noix lai lo. Hawjm'z yawjyawj hux, doenghheij nyaengq rogndoi hax, doengh go de hwnj le, goq mbouj geijlwh ngoenz couh ngaiz aeu ma dwk feiz lo. Hoeng, Cangqdiq ciuqyiengh doiq go de ndei, hawj go de heu swdswd. Gangjnaeuz dwg faenhsou hwx, de mbouj engqgya ij hawj buh hawj faenhsou daenj haz?
“Sojhij, faenhsou gaejyungh yousim febfeb, you naeuz ij gw gijmaz, ij daenj gijmaz.
Doenghheij vunz vih gw vih daenj hwj you hih cungj dwg doenghheij minzcuz
Aen sim faenhsou wnggai sien yiengq aen guek Cangqdiq, caemh guh gij hab'eiq habhoz de he; yienghmwnq faenhsou hih gwgw daenjdaenj sojmiz hih, de cungj swhmboujyienz hawj faenhsou.
“Sojhij hax, faenhsou gaejyungh vih ngoenzcog hwj you, aenvih ngoenzcog miz ngoenzcog hih you; ngoenz he nanz, ngoenz he dang couh ndaej lo.”
Yehsuh vanzlij caiq naeuz: “Faenhsou gaejyungh lwnh naeuz vunz, dwg vunz ndei vunz rwix. Yienghmwnq faenhsou couh mbouj ngaiz
aenvih faenhsou baenzlaw naeuz vunz, Cangqdiq caemh baenzlawz naeuz faenhsou; faenhsou aeu gijmaz ma rau hawj vunz, Cangqdiq caemh doxdoengz aeu gijmaz ma rau hawj faenhsou.
“Faenhsou vihmaz caenhgag yawj ndaej raen ndaw ra boux beixnuengx mwngz miz nwnh faex, dauq yawj mbouj raen ndaw ra bonjfaenh miz gyaengh faex nej?
Ndaw ra mwngz lij miz faex, mwngz ij baenzlaw ndaej naeuz boux beixnuengx mwngz naeuz: ‘Daeuj, daengj gou dawz nwnh faex ndaw ra mwngz ok,’ yienghneix naeuz nej?

Gyajcang guh vunz simndei simsoh hih mwngz hax! Gou naeuz mwngz hax, mwngz vanzlij dwg sien dawz gyaengh faex ndaw ra mwngz ok bax! Yienghmwnq mwngz cij yawj ndaej raen cingsuj, cij ndaej dawz nwnh faex ndaw ra boux beixnuengx mwngz ok hah.
“Mbouj ndaej dawz doenghgij hab hawj Cangqdiq he hawj duz ma, caemh mbouj ndaej dawz cinhcuh gveng youq dangqnaj duz mou, hoengjlau duz de caij le, caiq veq goqma haeb yungz faenhsou.”
Yehsuh caiq naeuz: “Gou naeuz sou ni, faenhsou gouz, couh hawj faenhsou; faenhsou cimh, couh hawj faenhsou cimh ndaej raen. Faenhsou ndaek dou, couh hoi dou hawj faenhsou.
Aenvih famz gouz gijmaz hih, couh ndaej gijmaz; cimh gijmaz hih, couh ndaej raen gijmaz; ndaek dou hih, couh hoi dou hawj.
“Faenhsou ndaw neix miz byawz guh boh hih, lwg heuh aeu bingj, dauq aeu rin hawj de nej?
Heuh aeu bya, dauq aeu ngwzdoeg
Gannaeuz faenhsou mbouj suenq dwg vunz ndei lah, hoeng, vanzlij rox ij aeu gij ndei he hawj lwg, gangjnaeuz dwg Bohmbwn faenhsou, de mbouj engqgya ij dawz gij ndei he hawj doengh boux gouz de he haz?

Sojhij, mboujguenj gijmaz saeh, faenhsou muengh vunz baenzlawz doiq faenhsou, faenhsou caemh ij baenzlaw doiq vunz. Gij neix cungj dwg Mohsih dih fazliz caeuq boux cenz gij vah Cangqdiq soj gangj hih.”
Yehsuh caiq naeuz: “Gou naeuz sou ni, faenhsou wnggai haeuj aen dou gaeb mwnq bae, aenvih doeng haeuj rai haeuj satsoq hih dou dwg gvangq hih, diuz roen de caemh gvangq, miz haujlai vunz haeuj bae.
Hoeng, doeng haeuj
De caiq naeuz: “Faenhsou ijaeu daezfuengz doenghheij gyaj hih boux cenz gij vah Cangqdiq. Gyoengqde daeuj laeng faenhsou dineix luj duz menzyiengz
Aeu gyoengqde soj guh hih ma yawj, couh yawj ndaej ok gyoengqde dwg guxmaz vunz. Caz oen ij baenz ndaej dawz mak buzdauz nej? Caz cah caemh ij baenz ndaej dawz mak uzvahgoj nej?
Caemh doxdoengz, faex ndei dawz mak ndei; faex yaez dawz mak yaez.
Faex ndei mbouj dawz mak yaez; faex yaez mbouj dawz mak ndei.
Famz mbouj dawz mak ndei hih couh ij ngaiz raemj dwk haeuj feiz bae.
Sojhij faex ndei faex yaez yawj gij mak de couh ndaej faen okdaeuj,

Yehsuh vanzlij caiq naeuz: “Gou naeuz sou ni, mbouj dwg naeuz byawz heuh gou ‘Bouxcawj hax bouxcawj,’ heuh hwj dwk sadsad couh ndaej gaep haeuj aen guek Cangqdiq law; caenhgag doengh boux ciuq gij cawjeiq Bohmbwn gou bae guh hih cij ndaej gaep haeuj guek Cangqdiq lah.
Yiengq daengz
Hoeng, daengz mwhmwnq, gou couh gaengjdingq ij doiq gyoengqde naeuz: ‘Gou coengzlaiz mbouj rox faenhsou goq; doenghheij vunz doegdoeg siebsieb faenhsou hax, deuz! Mbouj ndaej daeuj dep gou!’”
Yehsuh vanzlij caiq naeuz: “Faenhsou dingq daengz gij vah gou caemh ciuq gij vah gou bae guh hih vunz, couh luj boux coengjmingz he hwnq ranz hwnq youq gwnz rin.
Yienghmwnq cungjsuenq naeuz miz rumz hung fwn hung daeuj bongx, miz raemxdumh daeuj cung, aen ranz neix ciuqyiengh gaenj dwtdwt mij doengh saek di, aenvih aen de dwg hwnq youq gwnz rin he.
Yiengq famz dingq daengz gij vah gou, hoeng, dauq mij ciuq gij vah gou bae guh hih vunz, couh luj boux vunz ngawzngad he, hwnq ranz hwnq haeuj anjsa bae.
Baex daengz miz rumz miz fwn daeuj ci daeuj bongx, miz raemxdumh raemxrongz daeuj cung he, aen ranz neix couh doq doemqdak liux.”
Yehsuh gangj doenghgij vah neix sat le, gyoengq vunz cungj raen geizheih de soj gangj hih vah,
aenvih de soj gangj hih cungj mbouj luj doenghheij fazliz cenhgyah soj gangj hih, caenh luj boux miz gienzveih he soj gangj hih lah.
Yehsuh gangj doenghgij neix sat le, gajlaeng de couh daj gwnz bya roengz ma. Yiengq miz baenx haujlai vunz daeuj gaen de.

Youq mwnq miz boux hwnj mazfung he daeuj daengz dangqnaj de couh gvih youq dangqnaj de doiq de naeuz: “Bouxcawj gou hax, cijaeu mwngz haenjheiq, mwngz gaengjdingq ndaej yw gou ndei, hawj gou ndaej gancengh.”
Yehsuh raen yienghneix le, couh iet fawz oemj laeng de bae, couh doiq de naeuz: “Gou haenj yw mwngz hah; mwngz ndei lo bax!” Yehsuh baex gangj gawq neix he, boux de couh doq ndei lo.

Gajlaeng, Yehsuh doiq boux de naeuz: “Mwngz ciengeiz mbouj ndaej gangj gij saeh neix naeuz vunz ni! Mwngz ij bae laeng boux guh dajbwiz he hawj de gyenjcaz yawj, caemh ij ciuq Mohsih dih gveihdingq, dawz gij dajbwiz bae bwiz Cangqdiq, hawj gij vunzlai cingqmingz naeuz mwngz bingh ndei lo.”
Yehsuh daj gwnz bya roengz ma bae daengz Gyahbwznungz Singz. Yiengq youq mwnq miz boux Lozmaj lienzcangj he daeuj gouz de, naeuz:
“Bouxcawj gou hax, bouxhoiq gou gyad hwj. De cienfanh indot he, seizneix ninz youq ndaw ranz.”
Yehsuh dingq de yienghneix naeuz le, couh naeuz: “Daengj gou bae yw de.”

Boux lienzcangj dingq de yienghneix naeuz le, couh han de naeuz: “Bouxcawj gou hax, mwngz ij bae ndaw ranz gou, hoeng gou mbouj boiqndaej hawj mwngz bae hah. Gou naeuz, cijaeu mwngz naeuz gawq vah he, bouxhoiq gou couh gaengjdingq ndaej ndei lo.

Caemh luj youq baixgwnz gou miz bouxguen cijveih gou, youq baixlaj gou caemh miz binggyep dingq gou cijveih. Cijaeu gou mingqlingq bouxlawz naeuz: ‘Bae!’ Bouxlawz couh bae; naeuz: ‘Daeuj!’ bouxlawz couh daeuj; doiq bouxhoiq gou naeuz: ‘Mwngz guh gij neix gij neix’ de couh bae guh lo.”

Yehsuh dingq daengz gij vah neix le, cungj raen geizheih ij rai bae. De couh doiq gij vunz gaen de mwnq naeuz: “Gou saedsaeh naeuz sou ni, luj de yienghneix baenxlai miz sinqsim hih vunz, cungjsuenq naeuz youq ndaw Hijswzlez vunz ndaw de, gou cungj mijyaengz raen miz goq.
Gou caiq naeuz sou ni, baezneix ij miz haujlai
Hoeng, baenjlaiz wnggai ndaej gaep haeuj guek Cangqdiq hih

Yehsuh doiq gij vunz yienghneix gangj sat le, couh doiq boux Lozmaj lienzcangj mwnq naeuz: “Mwngz maj ranz bax! Gaengjdingq ciuq mwngz soj sinq hih yienghmwnq guh hawj mwngz.” Couh youq mwhneix, bouxhoiq de couh doq ndaej ndei lo.
Gajlaeng Yehsuh bae laeng Bijdwz. De raen mehdai Bijdwz fatbingh fatndat ninz youq gwnz congz.
De raen yienghneix le, couh baex lax gij fawz mehdai de, meh de couh doq ndei lo. De ndei le, couh hwnq daeuj daih Yehsuh.

Yiengq daengz yiengqhaemh, miz vunz daiq baenx haujlai vunz ngaiz fangz doz he daeuj daengz Yehsuh mwnq, siengj hawj Yehsuh bang gyoengqde boenq fangz. Yehsuh raen yienghneix le, baex naeuz gawq he lah, doenghheij fangz mwnq couh doq boenq okma lo. Youq mwnq, de caemh yw ndei sojmiz hih vunz bingh.
De yienghneix guh ngamq lingz ok Hijcaiqyaq boux cenz gij vah Cangqdiq neix soj gangj hih vah:
De dingj gij bingh gyoengqraeuz, bang rap gij in gyoengqraeuz.
Yehsuh raen miz baenx haujlai vunz daeuj gvaengz de le, couh doiq gyoengq lwgsae de naeuz: “Gyoengqraeuz naengh ruz goq doiqmienh huz mwnq bae bax.”
Couh youq mwhneix, miz boux fazliz cenhgyah he goq daeuj doiq de naeuz: “Lauxsae, mboujguenj mwngz bae daengz mwnqlaw, gou cungj gaen mwngz bae daengz mwnqlaw.”
Yehsuh dingq le, han naeuz: “Huzliz vanzlij miz congh, roeg lij miz rongz, hoeng,
Mwhde caemh miz boux lwgsae he caemh doiq Yehsuh naeuz: “Bouxcawj hax, cingj mwngz hawj gou sien maj moek daxboh gou gaenq.”
Yehsuh dingq le, couh
Couh yienghneix, Yehsuh couh hwnj ruz bae; gyoengq lwgsae de caemh gaen de hwnj ruz bae.
Sawqmwh gwnz huz fan miz ndaek raq rumz hung he. Rumz hung ci hwj gij raemx biu hwnjdaeuj yungyiemj raixcaix, ij mauh goq aen ruz senxsenx bae, hoeng, mwhde Yehsuh dauq ninz
Gyoengq lwgsae de raen yienghneix le,
Yehsuh dingq gyoengq lwgsae yienghneix hemq le, couh doiq gyoengq lwgsae de naeuz: “Doenghheij mbouj gaeuq sinq

Gyoengq lwgsae raen yienghneix le, cungj raen geizheih ij rai bae, couh gag naeuz: “Geizheih, geizheih! Boux vunz bouxn'x, dauqdaej dwg byawz hax? De mingqlingq rumz caeuq raemx, gingqyienz rumzrumz raemxraemx cungj dingq de!”

Couh yienghneix, Yehsuh naengh ruz bae daengz doiqmienh huz dieg Gyahdaqlah. Youq mwnq miz song boux ngaiz fangz doz he daj ndaw gumz moh ok daeuj daengz dangqnaj de. Song boux de cienfanh yak he; bienqnaengz mij'z vunz gamj byaij goq diuz roen mwnq bae.
Song boux de ok daeuj baex raen Yehsuh he le, couh hemq naeuz: “Cangqdiq dih lwg hax, raeuz caeuq mwngz miz maz gvanhaeh nex? Mijyaengz daengz ngoenz
Yiengq ngamqluj mwhneix youq mwnq mbouj geijlwh gyae, miz ndaek gyoengq mou he youq mwnq gw doxgaiq.
Gajlaeng, duz fangz doz youq gwnz ndang mwnq couh gouz Yehsuh naeuz: “Hauhnaeuz mwngz ij boenq gyoengqraeuz okbae nex, couh boenq gyoengqraeuz haeuj ndaw gyoengq mou mwnq bae bax!”

Yehsuh raen yienghneix le, couh naeuz: “Bae bax!” De baex naeuz gawq neix he, duz fangz couh majcangq ok ma ndaenj haeuj gwnz ndang gyoengq mou mwnq bae lo. Yiengq, gyoengq mou mwnq couh cung roengz ndaw huz bae rai liux lo.
Boux ciengx mou mwnq raen yienghneix le, couh majcangq riq haeuj singz bae gangj naeuz vunz ni song boux ngaiz fangz doz mwnq soj roeb daengz hih saeh.
Gajlaeng, baenx cenz singz hih vunz cungj ok daeuj yawj. Gyoengqde raen Yehsuh le, couh gouz Yehsuh, hawj Yehsuh bae daixlingh mwnq, mbouj youq mwnq dieg gyoengqde youq.
Couh vih yienghneix hwj Yehsuh couh dauq hwnj ruz bae, dauq ma daengz baih huz baihneix, couh dwg de youq hih aen singz mwnq.
Yiengq youq mwnq miz vunz aeu damqgyaq ma ram boux vunz gyad he daeuj daengz de mwnq,
Yiengq youq mwnq miz geij boux Youzdaiq fazliz cenhgyah he raen Yehsuh yienghneix naeuz le, ndaw sim couh gag naemj: “Ndaek ngauqm'z dwg byawz nex?
Gajlaeng, Yehsuh rox daengz ndaw sim gyoengqde ngeix gijmaz le, couh doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Ndaw sim faenhsou vihmaz ij naemj gij doegdoeg siebsieb he nej?
mienx coih, vunz yungh ra ma yawj mbouj raen hih. Hoeng, hauhnaeuz gou heuh hawj vunz ndaej ndwn hwnjdaeuj nex,
Gou seizneix couh cingqmingz hawj faenhsou yawj,
Yehsuh ngamq gangj gawq neix sat bak, boux vunz gyad mwnq couh
Guh hwj youq mwnq hih vunz yawj hwj ra byaengqbyat bae, couh haenh Cangqdiq, aenvih de dawz gij gienz neix soengq hawj vunz.

Yehsuh yw boux vunz gyad mwnq ndei le, couh daj aen singz mwnq ok ma bae daixlingh mwnq. De bae hih mwhde, de yawjraen miz boux vunz guh sou ceiq he naengh youq mwnq sou ceiq mwnq; gij coh boux de heuh Majdaiq. De raen le, couh doiq boux de naeuz: “Daeuj gaen gou bax!” Majdaiq dingq Yehsuh yienghneix naeuz le, couh majcangq ndwn hwnjdaeuj, couh gaen Yehsuh bae lo.
Gajlaeng, Yehsuh caeuq doenghheij lwgsae de youq ndaw ranz

Yiengq, doenghheij gaep haeuj Fazliqcaiq baij he raen le, couh naeuz gij lwgsae Yehsuh naeuz: “Boux lauxsae faenhsou vihmaz caeuq doenghheij vunz guh sou ceiq, doenghheij vunz vaih mwnq gw haeux gw laeuj nej?”
Yehsuh dingqri gij vah neix le, couh
Cingq luj
Gou haenj hih dwg hojsik vunz, mbouj haenj gij dajbwiz he nej.

Faenhsou gag bae naemjnaemj gawq neix yawj dwg gijmaz iqswh bax! Aenvih gou daeuj dineix, mbouj dwg hawj gij vunz gag naemqnaeuz bonjfaenh mij'z coih he daeuj gaen gou nej, dauq dwg hawj gij vunz nginh naeuz bonjfaenh miz coih he daeuj gaen gou lah.”
Mwhde miz gij lwgsae

Yehsuh dingq le, couh yungh gij beijgangj he ma doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou raen mbouj raen goq miz gojyez moq aeu yah cingj laeuj, gij hek de siengsim nej? Raen lwi? Hoeng gou naeuz sou ni hax, baex daengz ngoenz vunz daeuj gaemh dawz gojyez moq bae he, daengz mwhmwnq, gyoengqde couh ij lekdungx lo.”

Yehsuh vanzlij yungh gij beijgangj he ma naeuz: “Mij'z vunz naeuz aeu gij boiq mijyaengz swt raemx he ma fong haeuj buh vaih buh rwix bae; yienghmwnq hawj diuz buh vaih mwnq vaih engqgya lai, engqgya gvangq.

Caemh mij'z vunz naeuz dawz laeuj moq coux haeuj daehnaeng gaeuq bae; hauhnaeuz yienghneix, daehnaeng ngaiz ceg, laeuj caemh ngaiz roh okdaeuj. Dauqfanj ij dawz laeuj moq coux haeuj daehnaeng moq bae lah. Yienghneix song yiengh cungj ndaej baux.”
Yehsuh gangj gij beijgangj neix hih mwhde, miz boux dang veiqdangz daeuzdaeuz he daeuj daengz dangqnaj Yehsuh couh gvih bomz roengzbae gouz Yehsuh naeuz:
Yehsuh raen yienghneix le, couh hwnq gaen boux de bae lo. Gyoengq lwgsae de caemh gaen de bae.

Couh youq mwh Yehsuh gaen boux veiqdangz daeuzdaeuz bae hih mwhde, miz boux vunzbaz he, de ndwennaengz miz gij doxgaiq daeuj cungj daeuj mbouj dingz goq he, gaenq miz cibngeih bi yienghneix lo. De daeuj daengz baixlaeng Yehsuh le, couh mo gij dinbuh baixlaeng de,
aenvih boux vunzbaz mwnq gag naemj: “Cijaeu gou ndaej mo dawz gij dinbuh de, gij bingh gou couh gaengjdingq ndaej ndei lo.”
Yiengq, Yehsuh
Caiq gangj daengz Yehsuh gaen boux veiqdangz daeuzdaeuz mwnq, bae daengz ndaw ranz de le, yawjraen gij vunz
De raen yienghneix le, couh doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Ok bae! Faenhsou ok bae bax! Dahlwg neix mij dwg rai law; dwg ninz ralaep lah!” Gyoengq vunz mwnq raen de yienghneix naeuz le, cungj lengxriu de.
Yehsuh boenq gyoengq vunzlai okbae le, couh haeuj ndaw fungh dahlwg mwnq bae, couh rag dawz gij fawz dah de; dah de couh doq hwnq hwnjdaeuj.
Couh yienghneix, gajlaeng gij siuhsiz neix cungj cenz bae baenx cenz diqgih mwnq liux.

Gajlaeng, Yehsuh dajlaeng boux veiqdangz daeuzdaeuz mwnq ok ma, bae daixlingh mwnq. De bae hih mwhde, miz song boux rafangz gaen youq gajlaeng de, hemq naeuz: “Daqveiq dih lwglan hax, hojsik hojsik raeuz bax!”
Yehsuh dingq daengz yienghneix le, couh haeuj aen ranz he bae;
Song boux de dingq le, couh doq han naeuz: “Bouxcawj gou hax, raeuz sinq!”
Yehsuh dingq song boux de yienghneix han le, couh mo song boux de, mo song cehra, couh naeuz: “Ciuq faenhsou sinq hih yienghmwnq guh hawj faenhsou lo.”
Yehsuh baex yienghneix naeuz he le, song boux de couh doq ndaej yawjraen lo. Gajlaeng, Yehsuh couh raengq song boux de naeuz: “Faenhsou ij siujsim, ciengeiz mbouj ndaej naeuz vunz ni gij saeh neix.”
Hoeng, song boux de ok ma le, dauq dawz Yehsuh guh hih gij saeh neix cenz naeuz vunz ni, cenz baenx cenz diqgih mwnq liux.
Youq mwh song boux de daj Yehsuh mwnq ok ma hih mwhde, caemh miz vunz daiq boux vunz ngaiz fangz doz hwj ngoemx he daeuj cimh Yehsuh.

Yehsuh raen le, couh bang boux de boenq duz fangz okma. Duz fangz ok ma le, boux vunz ngoemx mwnq couh doq ndaej gangj vah okdaeuj lo. Gyoengq vunzlai raen yienghneix le, cungj raen geizheih ij rai bae, cungj naeuz: “Youq Hijswzlez, coengzlaiz mij raen miz gij saeh neix goq.”
Hoeng, gij vunz gaep haeuj Fazliqcaiq baij he dauq naeuz:

Gij saeh neix goq le, gajlaeng, Yehsuh bae gak mbanj gak singz bae, bae gak aen veiqdangz bae son vunz, cenzgangj guek Cangqdiq dih ndei siuhsiz, caemh bang vunz yw bingh, yw ndei gak cungj gak bingh.
Gajlaeng de raen miz haujlai vunz miz nanh, mij saek yiengh ndaej baengh, caenh luj gyoengq yiengz mij boux ciengx yiengz he le, couh hojsik hwj ij rai bae,
couh
Sojhij faenhsou ij wnggai gouz bouxcawj haeuxmienh mwnq
Miz baez he, Yehsuh heuh cibngeih boux lwgsae de daeuj doxcomz, daeuj soengq gienz hawj gyoengqde, hawj gyoengqde ndaej boenq fangz caeuq ndaej yw gak cungj bingh.
Laj neix couh dwg
Gajlaeng caiq daengz Feihliz caeuq Bahdohlozmaij, caeuq Dohmaj caeuq guh sou ceiq dih Majdaiq, caiq daengz daeglwg Yaqlwzfeih Yajgoz, gajlaeng caiq daengz Dazdaiq,
caiq daengz Gizcwnq Dangj
Yehsuh heuh cibngeih boux lwgsae neix daeuj le, couh raengq gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou mbouj ndaej bae dieg linghvaih minzcuz he, caemh gaejyungh haeuj aen singz Sajmajliqyaq vunz youq he bae,
dauq ij bae laeng gij vunz Hijswzlez, bae laeng doenghheij vunz luj duz yiengz yienghmwnq loengj roen he bae.
“Faenhsou ij itmienh bae itmienh cenz naeuz vunz ni: ‘Cangqdiq dih gienzveih couh ij fazveih lo.’
Caemh ij yw bingh hawj vunz, hawj vunz ndaej dauqlix, hawj vunz mazfung ndaej ndei, bang vunz boenq fangz. Faenhsou begbeg ndaej hih
“Faenhsou bae hih mwhde, gimgim ngaenzngaenz, cienzdoengz hih cienzdoengz cungj mbouj ndaej raek.
Caemh mbouj ndaej raek daeh raek buh raek haiz raek faexdwngx bae, aenvih

“Mboujguenj faenhsou haeuj aen singzlaw, aen mbanjlaw bae, cungj ij sien damqdingq yawj byawz simndei, nyienh'eiq daih faenhsou, faenhsou couh haeuj ranz byawz bae. Mbouj ndaej youq ranz dawz ranz; ij youq daengz faenhsou bae daixlingh mwnq bae.
Faenhsou haeuj ranzlawz bae, couh ij hoh fuk ranzlawz.

Hauhnaeuz ranz mwnq hih vunz vuenhringz faenhsou hih, faenhsou hoh hih fuk couh gaengjdingq ranz mwnq ndaej; hauhnaeuz ranzlawz mbouj vuenhringz faenhsou hih, faenhsou hoh hih fuk couh gvi hawj faenhsou boiz.

Yiengq, hauhnaeuz ranzlawz cixnaeuz dieglawz mbouj vuenhringz faenhsou hih, mbouj dingq gij vah faenhsou, faenhsou couh mbouj youq ranz mwnq dieg mwnq youq. Yiengq, ok ma hih mwhde, couh ij saemq din hawj gij boenqcingh gwnz din doek youq mwnq,
Gou saedsaeh naeuz sou ni, daengz mwh saemjbuenq hih mwhmwnq, mwnq hih vunz ij souh daengz fad hih ij camj goq gij vunz aen singz Sojdohmaj caeuq Ngozmohlah bae.”

Yehsuh vanzlij caiq doiq cibngeih boux lwgsae de naeuz: “Gou seizneix baij faenhsou ok bae caemhdangq luj duz yiengz ndaenj haeuj ndaw gyoengq langz bae ityiengh. Sojhij faenhsou ij siujsim, ij luj duz ngwz yienghmwnq gvai, caemh ij luj duz roegguqgap yienghmwnq soh.
Faenhsou ij daezfuengz vunz, aenvih gyoengqde ij gaemh dawz faenhsou bae gyau hawj fazdingz, ij youq veiqdangz doh faenhsou.
Faenhsou caemh ij ngaiz vih gou hwj ngaiz vunz gaemh dawz bae daengz goeng'ak mwnq
Aenvih faenhsou soj gangj hih cungj mbouj dwg gij vah faenhsou, dauq dwg gij vah Hoenzsaenz Cangqdiq dunghgoq conghbak faenhsou ma gangj hih lah.
“Gou caiq naeuz sou ni, faenhsou caemh ij ngaiz gij vunz ndaw ranz bonjfaenh cuzmaiq, beixnuengx haih beixnuengx, bohmeh caeuq lwg doxmiz haemzcaeuz, doxhaih rai.
Faenhsou caemh vih gou hwj ngaiz vunz haenq. Hoeng, cijaeu faenhsou gyenhciz roengzbae, daengz gajlaeng faenhsou couh gaengjdingq ndaej gouq.

Yiengq, hauhnaeuz faenhsou ngaiz dieglawz hih vunz bwkhaih nex, faenhsou couh ij senj deuz bae daixlingh dieg. Hoeng, gou saedsaeh naeuz sou ni, faenhsou cungj mijyaengz ndaej byaij Hijswzlez sojmiz hih dieg liux haem hwx, Vunz dih Daiqbiuj cungj daeuj lux.
“Faenhsou wnggai rox, lwgsae mbouj beij lauxsae cungqyauq, bouxhoiq caemh mbouj beij bouxcawj cungqyauq.
Hoeng hauhnaeuz lwgsae ndaej caeuq lauxsae doxdoengz, bouxhoiq ndaej caeuq bouxcawj doxdoengz nex, baenz hoh. Yiengq, hauhnaeuz guh cawjranz hih ngaiz vunz ndaq naeuz:
Yehsuh vanzlij caiq naeuz:

Sojhij gou caegcaeg naeuz sou ni hih, faenhsou ij maixmingz gangj naeuz vunz ni; gou daep haeuj duj rwz faenhsou bae gangjngvap naeuz sou ni hih, faenhsou caemh ij hwnj dingjranz bae hemq naeuz vunz ni.

“Gaejyungh lau doengh boux caenhgag ndaej gaj aen ndangdaej faenhsou, dauq mij bonjsaeh ndaej haih daengz gij hoenzsaenz faenhsou he. Faenhsou ij lau, dauq lau boux miz gienz lienz vunz lienz hoenzsaenz cungj ndaej hawj youq ndaw mwnq fad fangz, mwnq satsoq he hih boux mwnq.”
Yehsuh youhcaiq naeuz: “Song duz roeglaej cijmboujgoq ngamq hai ndaej faen ngaenz he hwj lah, hoeng, hauhnaeuz Bohmbwn mbouj hawj nex, it duz cungj mbouj ngaiz doek roengz doem ma.
Gangjnaeuz faenhsou, de daiqlienz gij byoem faenhsou cungj geq goq hwx.
Sojhij, gou naeuz faenhsou gaejyungh lau; faenhsou
Yehsuh caiq naeuz: “Famz youq dangqnaj vunzlai nginh gou hih, gou caemh youq dangqnaj Bohmbwn gou nginh de;
famz youq dangqnaj vunzlai mbouj nginh gou hih, gou caemh youq dangqnaj Bohmbwn gou mbouj nginh de.”
Yehsuh vanzlij caiq naeuz: “Faenhsou gaejyungh naemqnaeuz gou daeuj lajmbwn dwg hawj vunz doxndei. Gou naeuz sou ni, gou daeuj lajmbwn dwg hawj vunz doengh cax doengh giemq lah.
Dwg hawj lwg caeuq boh mbouj doxndei, lwgsau caeuq meh mbouj doxndei, bawx caeuq meh mbouj doxndei.
Gij dizyinz bonjfaenh gag dwg ndaw ranz vunz.
Doengh boux aiq bohmeh aiq goq gou hih mbouj boiqndaej guh lwgsae gou, aiq lwg aiq goq gou hih caemh mbouj boiqndaej guh lwgsae gou.
Mbouj aemq aen gyaq cixcib
Sij mbouj ndaej diuz mingh bonjfaenh hih, dauq ngaiz vwt mingh; vih gou hwj ngaiz vwt mingh hih, dauq ndaej miz mingh.”
Yehsuh caiq doiq doengh boux lwgsae de naeuz: “Famz daih faenhsou hih caemhdangq daih gou lo; daih gou hih caemhdangq daih boux baij gou daeuj hih lo.

Famz vih boux dwg boux cenz gij vah Cangqdiq hwj daih de hih, caemh gaengjdingq ndaej cangj caeuq boux cenz gij vah Cangqdiq cangj doxdoengz. Famz vih boux dwg simndei simsoh hwj daih de hih, caemh gaengjdingq ndaej cangj caeuq boux simndei simsoh hih cangj doxdoengz.

Gannaeuz gij lwgsae gou mbouj suenq dwg guxmaz vunz lah, hoeng, mboujguenj byawz vih boux de dwg lwgsae gou hwj aeu raemx hawj de gw hih, cungjsuenq naeuz cijngamq hawj cenj raemx he lah, gou saedsaeh naeuz sou ni, boux hawj cenj raemx mwnq gaengjdingq ndaej cangjliq.”
Yehsuh raengq cibngeih boux lwgsae de doenghgij vah neix sat le, couh daj mwnq bae gak aen singz bae son vunz caeuq cenzgangj guek Cangqdiq dih ndei siuhsiz.
Yiengq,
hawj gyoengqde bae cimh Yehsuh naeuz: “Mwngz couh dwg boux
Yehsuh dingq le, doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou maj bax, dawz faenhsou soj raen soj dingq daengz hih maj naeuz Yozhanq ni,
couh dwg naeuz, rafangz bienq raraeh, ha'gyad ndaej byaij roen, mazfung yw ndaej ndei, rwznuk ndaej dingqri, rai ndaej dauqlix, vunz gungz ndaej dingq daengz Cangqdiq dih ndei siuhsiz.
Famz mbouj yiem gou hih vunz miz fuk lo!”

Doengh boux lwgsae Yozhanq dingq Yehsuh gangj sat doenghgij vah neix le, couh maj lo. Gyoengqde maj le, Yehsuh couh doiq gyoengq vunzlai gangj gvanhhih Yozhanq dih saeh; de naeuz: “Gaxgonq faenhsou bae rogndoi ijsiengj yawj gijmaz nej? Siengj yawj go em rumz ci le doengh haj?

Mbouj rox hih faenhsou ok bae dauqdaej ij yawj gijmaz nex? Ij yawj boux daenj buh gyaeu buh ndei hih maz? Hoeng boux daenj buh gyaeu buh ndei hih dwg fouqfouq mizmiz hih, dwg youq aen ranz luj vangzgungh youq hih lax.

Yiengq dauqdaej faenhsou ijsiengj yawj gijmaz nej? Faenhsou dwg mbouj dwg bae yawj boux cenz gij vah Cangqdiq hih nej? Ox! Gou naeuz sou ni hax, deng lo! De beij doengh boux cenz gij vah Cangqdiq he vanzlij rem, vanzlij ak.
De couh dwg boux
Gou ij baij vunz bae byaij youq dangqnaj mwngz hwj guh ndei cwnjbiq.”
