Yehsuh vanzlij caiq naeuz: “Gou saedsaeh naeuz sou ni, youq lajmbwn, mij'z vunz ndaej beij Yozhanq engq veijdaq laem lo, hoeng, youq aen guek Cangqdiq ndaw de, cungjsuenq naeuz boux ceiq yaez ceiq mbouj miz gienz he, cungj ndaej beij Yozhanq veijdaq ndaej lai hwx.

Dajlwh guh sijlij dih Yozhanq daengz seizneix, guek Cangqdiq cungj dwg yungh doenghgij geizmiuj gingjgyauj akak rengzrengz he ma laeb baenz he, hoeng, doenghheij doegdoeg siebsieb nga'ngangq hih vunz siengj ciemq aeu aen de lah.
Gizsaed, sojmiz hih boux cenz gij vah Cangqdiq hih saw caeuq Mohsih dih fazliz saw, itcig daengz guh sijlij dih Yozhanq, cungj sij naeuz goq
Gou lauxsaed naeuz sou ni, gou muengh faenhsou sinq gij vah gou: Yozhanq, de couh dwg
Gou gangj hih doenghgij vah neix, faenhsou ij wnggai dawz haeuj rwz!”
Yehsuh vanzlij caiq naeuz: “Gou ij dawz aen nienzdaiq neix hih vunz beij luj gijmaz nej? Gou naeuz sou ni, gyoengqde couh luj doenghheij lwgngez naengh youq roggai mwnq
‘Gyoengqraeuz guxangq cang guh aeu yah, haq sau, boq dig; faenhsou mbouj diuquj! Gyoengqraeuz guxangq cang guh oksang; faenhsou mbouj daej!’
Yozhanq daeuj lo, de siengzseiz lekdungx caemh mbouj gw laeuj, vunz couh naeuz: ‘De ngaiz fangz doz.’

Vunz dih Daiqbiuj, daeuj lo, cix gw haeux cix gw laeuj. Yiengq, vunz couh naeuz: ‘De ngah gw haeux, ngah gw laeuj, dwg baengzyoux boux sou ceiq caeuq boux baengzyoux vunz vaih he.’ Sojhij naeuz, vunz dwg mbouj dwg coengjmingz, yawj de soj guh hih saeh couh yawj ndaej ok.”

Yehsuh gangj sat doenghgij vah neix le, de vanzlij ndaq doenghheij singz de gaxgonq youq mwnq guh baenx haujlai geizmiuj gingjgyauj hih saeh he, aenvih doenghheij singz mwnq hih vunz nga'ngangq mbouj nginh loek gaijgoq. De ndaq naeuz:

“Gohlahswnq Singz caeuq Bwzcaiqdaq Singz hax, faenhsou satsoq lo! Gou youq faenhsou mwnq guh baenx haujlai geizmiuj hih saeh; hauhnaeuz doenghheij geizmiuj gingjgyauj hih saeh neix youq Daiqwj caeuq Sihdoenq
Sojhij gou saedsaeh naeuz sou ni, daengz ngoenz saemjbuenq hih ngoenz mwnq, faenhsou souh daengz hih fad ij beij Daiqwj caeuq Sihdoenq song aen singz neix hih vunz camj ndaej lai.

“Vanzlij miz Gyahbwznungz aen singz neix. Mwngz naemqnaeuz mwngz ndaej baux hwnj mbwn bae hajx! Mij ndaej law nwjx! Mwngz ij ngaiz doek roengz vaengz bae lah. Gou youq faenhsou mwnq soj guh hih geizmiuj hih saeh, hauhnaeuz dwg youq Sojdohmaj Singz
Gou naeuz sou hax, cungjsuenq naeuz ij fad aen singz neix hwjx, hoeng, daengz ngoenz saemjbuenq hih ngoenz mwnq, caemh fad mbouj ndaej naek luj sou law!”

Yehsuh gangj daengz dineix le, couh naeuz: “Bohmbwn hax, gaemguenj gwnzmbwn caeuq lajdeih hih mwngz hax! Gou haenh mwngz, aenvih mwngz mbouj hawj doengh boux coengjmingz miz vaenzvaq he rox gij saeh neix, dauq loh hawj doengh boux luj lwgngez yienghmwnq lauxsaed he rox lah.
Boh hax, dwg hih; gou rox mwngz haenj yienghneix guh.”

De haenh daengz dineix le, vanzlij naeuz: “Sojmiz hih cungj dwg boh gou hawj gou he. Cawzok daxboh, mij'z vunz rox daeglwg dwg byawz, caemh cawzok lwg caeuq lwg nyienh'eiq naeuz vunz ni hih, mijn'x caemh mij'z vunz rox daxboh dwg byawz.
“Daeuj bax, doenghheij cienfanh dwgrengz sinhoj hih vunz hax, faenhsou daeuj gaen gou bax. Gou ndaej hawj faenhsou
Mboujgoq faenhsou ij dawz aen ek gou hawj faenhsou dawz he daeuj gaen gou hag gou, hag gou sim'unq simsoh; yienghneix, faenhsou cij ndaej sim'onj.
Aenvih aen ek gou dwg yungzheih dawz hih, caemh dwg mbouj naek hih.”
Miz ngoenz ngoenzyietbaeg he, Yehsuh
Yiengq gij vunz gaep haeuj Fazliqcaiq baij he raen le, couh doiq Yehsuh naeuz: “Yawj veiq,
Yehsuh dingq le, couh han gyoengqde naeuz: “Nanzdauh faenhsou mij doeg goq
Ndaw de couh dwg sij naeuz de haeuj ndaw cangqbungz Cangqdiq bae, aeu gij bingj dajcoengq bwiz Cangqdiq he ma gw, caemh aeu hawj gyoengq gaen henz ndang de gw.
Nanzdauh faenhsou mbouj doeg goq
Gou saedsaeh naeuz sou ni, dineix miz boux beij gunghdenq Cangqdiq vanzlij veijdaq he.
Hauhnaeuz faenhsou rox
Gou dwg haenj faenhsou doiq vunz miz aen sim rox hojsik he lah, mbouj dwg haenj faenhsou hawj gij dajbwiz hawj gou law
hih gawq neix nex, faenhsou couh mbouj luenh dingh hawj boux mij'z coih he miz coih lo.
Gvanhhih ngoenzyietbaeg, caenhgag
Yehsuh gangj sat doenghgij vah neix le, couh daj mwnq bae daengz aen veiqdangz gyoengqde.

Ngamqluj youq ndaw veiqdangz mwnq miz boux he, cik fawz de vej. Yiengq couh miz vunz cam Yehsuh naeuz: “Youq ngoenz ngoenzyietbaeg ndaej mbouj ndaej yw bingh hax?” Gyoengqde yienghneix naeuz dih muzdiz dwg siengj gauq de.

Yehsuh dingq le, couh han naeuz: “Beijgangj naeuz, faenhsou ndaw neix miz byawz miz duz yiengz he, duz yiengz neix ngamqluj youq ngoenz ngoenzyietbaeg ngaiz doek roengz cingj bae, yiengq faenhsou ij mbouj ij rag duz de hwnjma nej?
Gangjnaeuz dwg vunz hwx, vunz mbouj beij yiengz dij ndaej lai maz! Sojhij youq ngoenz ngoenzyietbaeg yw bingh dwg habfaz hih.”

Yehsuh gangj sat doenghgij vah neix le, couh doiq boux fawz vej mwnq naeuz: “Iet gij fawz mwngz okdaeuj!” Boux de caemh iet gij fawz de okdaeuj. De baex iet okdaeuj he, gij fawz de couh doq ndeindwt luj daixlingh cik lo.
Yiengq, gij vunz gaep haeuj Fazliqcaiq baij mwnq raen yienghneix le, cungj ndatheiq hwj ij rai bae, couh ok rog bae doxcimciek hwj ij baenzlaw ndaej met Yehsuh.

Gajlaeng Yehsuh rox naeuz miz vunz siengj haih de le, couh daj mwnq ok ma bae daixlingh mwnq. Mwhde miz haujlai vunz gaen de bae. Gyoengq vunz gaen de bae mwnq miz hih vunz miz bingh hwj, hoeng, Yehsuh caemh yw gyoengqde ndei lo.
De yw gyoengqde ndei le, vanzlij raengq gyoengqde mbouj hawj gyoengqde cenz naeuz vunz ni
Gij neix cingq lingz ok Hijcaiqyaq boux cenz gij vah Cangqdiq neix gangj goq hih:

Yawj veiq, boux neix couh dwg gou senj hih hoiq; gou aiq de, haenj de. Gou ij dawz Hoenzsaenz gou nyok hawj de; de gaengjdingq dawz gou gouq vunz caeuq saemjbuenq vunz cenz naeuz linghvaih minzcuz hih vunz ni.
De mbouj ceng mbouj hemq, gwnz gai caemh mij'z vunz dingqri gij sing de.

daiqlienz go em couh ij raek senxsenx lo, hoeng de cungj mbouj veiq bungq go de raek; aen daeng, diuz muenxdaeng de couh ij dawz liux senxsenx lo, hoeng de cungj caemh mbouj boq maet aen de. De cungj dwg swnh semxsemh, itcig daengj daengz de hawj gij ndei he ndaej giengz goq gij mbouj ndei he.
Baenx cenz lajmbwn hih vunz cungj ij muengh de.

Gajlaeng, miz vunz daiq boux ngaiz fangz doz hwj rafangz caeuq ngoemx he daeuj cimh Yehsuh, ij hawj Yehsuh yw boux de. Yehsuh raen yienghneix le, couh yw boux de ndei, hawj boux de ndaej gangj vah okdaeuj, caemh hawj de yawj ndaej raen.
Yiengq gyoengq vunzlai raen yienghneix le, cungj raen geizheih ij rai bae hwj couh naeuz: “Nanzdauh de couh dwg Daqveiq dih lwglan?”
Hoeng, gij vunz gaep haeuj Fazliqcaiq baij he dingq le, dauq naeuz: “Gijn'x, miz maz geizheih nex? De cijmboujgoq dwg baengh Bezsihbuz

Gajlaeng Yehsuh rox gij iqswh gyoengqde le, couh doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Mboujguenj aen gueklawz, ndaw guek gag luenh hih, aen guek mwnq caemh mbouj baenz maz guek lo; baih liux bae. Caemh mboujguenj ranzlawz doxdwk doxdanh hih, ranzlawz caemh gaengjdingq ngaiz siksanq liux bae.
Caiq hauhnaeuz fangzvuengz gag boenq bonjfaenh, yiengq aen guek de mijyaengz siksanq liux haz?
Caiq hauhnaeuz gou
Hoeng, hauhnaeuz gou dwg baengh gij Hoenzsaenz Cangqdiq ma boenq hih, yiengq couh dwg cingqmingz gij gienzveih Cangqdiq gaenq youq faenhsou dineix fazveih lo.
Caiq beijgangj naeuz miz byawz ndaej ciengj ndonj haeuj ndaw ranz boux akak rengzrengz he bae ciengj aeu gij doxgaiq de nej? Cizfeih naeuz ndaej goenj boux de hwnjdaeuj cij ndaej ciengj aeu huhluh.”
Yehsuh yienghneix gangj le, couh naeuz: “Mbouj gaep haeuj gou hih vunz, couh dwg fanjdeiq gou, dwg gou dih dizyinz; mbouj caeuq gou boenq
Sojhij gou naeuz sou ni, vunz soj famh hih coih, soj gangj doenghgij vah bangjlaih vunz hih cungj ndaej nyiuz, caenhgag gangj vah bangjlaih Hoenzsaenz Cangqdiq hih gaengjdingq mbouj ndaej nyiuz.
Gangj vah famh
Yehsuh vanzlij caiq naeuz: “Faex ndei dawz mak ndei, faex yaez dawz mak yaez; faex ndei faex yaez, yawj gij mak de couh ndaej faen okdaeuj.

Doenghgij vunz doegdoeg siebsieb faenhsou hax! Faenhsou cungj dwg doegdoeg siebsieb he, yiengq ij baenz ndaej miz gij vah ndei he gangj okdaeuj hwj nej? Ndaw sim vunz caeng miz gijmaz, caemh gangj gijmaz okdaeuj lo.

Simndei simsoh hih vunz, ndaw sim de caeng hih, yienh okdaeuj hih caemh dwg ndei he. Gij vunz simdoeg simsieb he, ndaw sim de caeng hih caemh dwg doenghgij doegsieb he, yienh okdaeuj hih, caemh dwg doegsieb he.
Hoeng, gou naeuz sou ni, daengz ngoenz saemjbuenq hih ngoenz mwnq, famz luenh gangj vah hwj daekcoih dawz vunz hih couh ij yiengq
aenvih Cangqdiq ij bingz vunz soj gangj hih vah ma dingh hawj vunz miz mbouj miz coih.”

Youq Yehsuh gangj doenghgij vah neix hih mwhde, miz geij boux fazliz cenhgyah caeuq doenghheij gaep haeuj Fazliqcaiq baij he doiq Yehsuh naeuz: “Lauxsae, gyoengqraeuz siengj cingj mwngz loengh gij geizmiuj he hawj raeuz yawj.”
Yehsuh dingq le, couh han naeuz: “Aen nienzdaiq neix hax, gij vunz doegdoeg siebsieb hih cienfanh lai he!
Couh dwg gij saeh Yoznaz, baenzlawz youq ndaw dungx duz bya sam ngwnz sam ngoenz, caeuq Vunz dih Daiqbiuj caemh doxdoengz, youq laj doem ndaw de sam ngwnz sam ngoenz hih yienghmwnq.

Daengj daengz ngoenz saemjbuenq hih ngoenz mwnq, gij vunz Niznizveih ij daeuj gauq faenhsou daih neix hih vunz, gauq naeuz faenhsou miz coih, aenvih gij vunz Niznizveih dingq goq Yoznaz cenzgangj gij vah Cangqdiq le, couh nginh loek gaijgoq lo. Hoeng, hawjm'z yawj hux, seizneix dineix couh miz boux beij Yoznaz vanzlij veijdaq he lo,

Daengz ngoenz saemjbuenq hih ngoenz mwnq, boux nijvangz aen guek baixnamz he ij daeuj gauq gij vunz daih neix hih faenhsou, naeuz faenhsou miz coih, aenvih doenghbaez de daj baenxlai gyae daeuj dingq Sojlozmaenz goengjvuengz neix gangj vah. De daj baenxlai gyae daeuj dingq, hoeng, gij vunz daih neix nej? Youq dineix seizneix couh miz boux beij Sojlozmaenz vanzlij veijdaq he

JHN.6.10	Yehsuh dingq le, couh doiq gyoengq lwgsae de naeuz: “Faenhsou hawj gyoengqde naengh roengzma.” (Yienzlaiz mwnq dwg dieg nywj he.) Gajlaeng gij vunz caemh naengh roengzma lo. Mwhde caenhgag suenq vunzsai daihgaiq miz hajcien vunz yienghneix.

JHN.14.18	“Gou gaengjdingq ij dauq ma faenhsou dineix, mbouj vwt faenhsou hawj faenhsou bienqbaenz lwggyax law.

JHN.14.20	Daengz ngoenz mwnq, faenhsou couh rox, gou caeuq daxboh gou youq, faenhsou caeuq gou youq, gou caeuq faenhsou youq.

JHN.14.22	Yehsuh gangj daengz dineix le, Youzdaq (dineix dih Youzdaq mbouj dwg boux cuzmaiq Yehsuh hih Youzdaq) de cam Yehsuh naeuz: “Bouxcawj hax, vihmaz caenhgag yienh hawj gyoengqraeuz raen, mbouj yienh hawj gij vunz lajmbwn raen nej?”
JHN.14.23	Yehsuh han naeuz: “Aiq gou hih vunz gaengjdingq ciuq gij vah gou bae guh; boh gou caemh gaengjdingq aiq de. Mbouj danhcij yienghneix, boh gou caeuq gou caemh caeuq de youq. 
JHN.14.24	Mbouj aiq gou hih vunz couh mbouj ciuq gij vah gou bae guh. Faenhsou dingq daengz gou soj gangj hih cungj mbouj dwg ciuq gij cawjeiq bonjfaenh gou ma gangj, dauq dwg ciuq gij cawjeiq baij gou daeuj hih daxboh gangj lah.
JHN.14.25	“Gou vanzlij caeuq sou youq hih mwhde, gou gaenq gangj naeuz sou ni goq doenghgij vah neix lo.

JHN.14.27	“Gou louz gij bingzan gou nyok hawj faenhsou. Gou nyok bingzan hawj faenhsou hih caeuq gij vunz nyok hawj faenhsou hih bingzan mbouj doxdoengz. Faenhsou gaejyungh you, caemh gaejyungh lau. 
JHN.14.28	Gou doiq faenhsou gangj goq: ‘Gou ij bae laeng daxboh, hoeng, gou vanzlij ij dauq ma.’ Hauhnaeuz faenhsou cingqcaen aiq gou nex, couh wnggai vuenvuen heijheij, aenvih gou ij bae laeng daxboh; de ak goq gou. 
JHN.14.29	Gou youq gij saeh neix mijyaengz fatseng cihsenz, gou sien naeuz sou ni, muzdiz dwg ij hawj faenhsou daengz mwh gij saeh neix fatseng hih mwhde sinq.
JHN.14.30	“Gou mbouj miz geijlwh cizgyenh ndaej caeuq faenhsou gangj haem lo, aenvih aen seiqgyaiq neix hih vuengz couh ij daeuj lo, hoeng, de mij'z gienz guenj gou law.

JHN.15.1	Yehsuh caeuq gyoengq lwgsae de bae le, couh doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Gou dwg go buzdauz caen he, daxboh gou dwg guh boux ndaem he. 
JHN.15.2	Famz haeuj gij nge gou, hoeng, mbouj dawz mak hih, couh ngaiz de daet bae. Nge ndaej dawz mak hih, de couh caed ngez ndei, hawj nge de dawz mak engqgya lai.

JHN.15.5	“Gou dwg go buzdauz, faenhsou dwg gij nge de. Siengzseiz caeuq gou youq hih, gou caemh siengzseiz caeuq de youq, de caemh ndaej dawz haujlai mak, aenvih mbouj miz gou, faenhsou couh gijmaz cungj mbouj ndaej guh daengz.

JHN.15.7	Yiengq, hauhnaeuz faenhsou siengzseiz caeuq gou youq, caemh ndaejgeiq gij vah gou, ciuq gij vah gou bae guh hih, mboujguenj faenhsou ij aeu gijmaz, gouz couh ndaej lo. 
JHN.15.8	Hauhnaeuz faenhsou lai dawz mak, boh gou couh vih yienghneix hwj ndaej najrongh, faenhsou caemh gaengjdingq dwg lwgsae gou.
JHN.15.9	“Gou aiq faenhsou, caemh luj boh aiq gou yienghmwnq; faenhsou ij siengzseiz souj ndei gou doiq faenhsou dih aiq.

JHN.15.11	Gou naeuz doenghgij saeh neix naeuz faenhsou ni dwg ij hawj faenhsou caemh ndaej vuenheij luj gou, hawj faenhsou ndaej vuenheij raixcaix.

JHN.15.19	Hauhnaeuz faenhsou dwg haeuj aen seiqgyaiq neix nex, aen seiqgyaiq neix hih vunz gaengjdingq aiq faenhsou. Hoeng, faenhsou mbouj dwg haeuj aen seiqgyaiq neix law, aenvih gou gaenq dawz faenhsou senj okdaeuj lo, sojhij aen seiqgyaiq neix couh dwgcaengz faenhsou lo.

JHN.16.1	Yehsuh vanzlij caiq naeuz: “Gou naeuz doenghgij saeh neix naeuz sou ni dwg ij hawj faenhsou gyenhdingq mbouj bienq sim,

JHN.16.5	“Seizneix gou ij dauq maj laeng boux baij gou daeuj hih mwnq bae lo, hoeng, faenhsou mij'z vunz cam gou naeuz: ‘Mwngz ij bae mwnqlaw lah?’

JHN.16.12	“Gou vanzlij caiq miz haujlai saeh ij naeuz sou ni, hoeng, lau faenhsou seizneix mbouj rox.

JHN.16.14	De vih ij hawj gou najrongh, de couh dawz dajlaeng gou ndaej hih saedsaeh cenz naeuz sou ni.

JHN.16.16	Yehsuh vanzlij caiq naeuz: “Goq mbouj geijlwh caez, faenhsou couh mbouj ndaej raen gou laem lo; hoeng, caiq goq mbouj geijlwh caez, faenhsou youhcaiq ndaej raen gou lo.”
JHN.16.17	Yehsuh yienghneix gangj le, miz mbangj hih lwgsae couh doxcam naeuz: “De naeuz raeuz ni: ‘Goq mbouj geijlwh caez, faenhsou couh mbouj caiq ndaej raen gou laem lo,’ caemhcaiq naeuz: ‘Gajlaeng caiq goq mbouj geijlwh caez, faenhsou youhcaiq ndaej raen gou lo,’ vanzlij caemh naeuz: ‘aenvih gou ij bae laeng daxboh lo.’ Doenghgij vah neix dwg gijmaz iqswh nej? 
JHN.16.18	‘Mbouj geijlwh caez,’ dauqdaej dwg gijmaz iqswh nex? Gyoengqraeuz saedsaeh mbouj rox de gangj gijmaz.”
JHN.16.19	Gajlaeng Yehsuh yawj ndaej ok gyoengqde ijsiengj cam de gijmaz le, couh doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Gou naeuz: ‘Mbouj geijlwh caez, faenhsou couh mbouj caiq ndaej raen gou laem lo,’ caemhcaiq naeuz: ‘Caemh mbouj geijlwh caez, faenhsou youhcaiq ndaej raen gou lo,’ faenhsou vih gawq neix mbouj rox hwj doxcam dwg lwi? 
JHN.16.20	Gou saedsaeh naeuz sou ni, faenhsou ij daej ngwdngwd, gij vunz dauq riuriu angqangq. Faenhsou ij you ij heiq, hoeng faenhsou dih youheiq couh ij bienqbaenz angq vaujvauq lo. 
JHN.16.21	Cingq luj vunzbaz seng lwg mwhde, ij in'in hojyouq hojyouq, hoeng, daengj daengz lwgngez seng le, de couh vih bonjfaenh de miz laeq lwg neix hwj angq, lumz gaxgonq de in caeuq hojyouq lo. 
JHN.16.22	Caemh doxdoengz, faenhsou seizneix gannaeuz miz youheiq lah, hoeng, daengj daengz gou dauqlix caiq ndaej raen faenhsou hih mwhde, faenhsou couh angq vaujvauq lo; mbouj danhcij yienghneix, faenhsou sim'angq hih mij vunz ndaej dued aeu bae.
JHN.16.23	“Gou saedsaeh naeuz sou ni, daengz ngoenz mwnq, faenhsou gijmaz cungj mboujyungh cam gou; mboujguenj faenhsou hij gij coh gou ma gouz daxboh gijmaz, de gaengjdingq nyok hawj faenhsou gijmaz. 
JHN.16.24	Faenhsou coengzlaiz cungj mij hij gij coh gou ma gouz goq gijmaz, hoeng, cijaeu faenhsou seizneix gouz, couh gaengjdingq ndaej; yienghneix couh ndaej hawj faenhsou angq raixcaix.”
JHN.16.25	Yehsuh vanzlij caiq naeuz: “Gou soqlaiz cungj yungh beijgangj ma naeuz sou ni gij saeh neix, hoeng, mwhde couh ij daengz lo, gou mbouj caiq yungh beijgangj ma gangj naeuz sou ni lo; gou ganhseiq cizsez gangj naeuz sou ni daxboh hih saeh ndaej lo.

JHN.16.28	Gou dajlaeng daxboh mwnq daeuj daengz lajmbwn, caiq daj lajmbwn dauq maj laeng daxboh mwnq.”

JHN.16.31	Yehsuh dingq le, couh naeuz: “Ox! Seizneix faenhsou cij sinq! 
JHN.16.32	Hoeng, mwhde couh ij daengz lo, seizneix couh dwg lo, faenhsou couh ij ngaiz faensanq, gak vunz gag maj ranz, lij gou gag youq; mwhde couh ij daengz lo, couh dwg mwhneix lo. Hoeng, gou naeuz sou ni, mbouj dwg gag gou gag youq law; vanzlij miz daxboh caeuq gou youq nej.

JHN.17.1	Yehsuh gangj doenghgij vah neix sat le, couh muengh hwnj mbwn bae yawj, naeuz: “Boh hax, mwhde daengz lo; mwngz hawj lwg mwngz najrongh bax, yiengq lwg mwngz caemh ndaej hawj mwngz najrongh lo. 
JHN.17.2	Cingq luj mwngz dawz gij gienz guenjleix sojmiz vunz he nyok hawj de yienghmwnq, hawj de ndaej hawj doenghheij vunz mwngz nyok hawj de he ndaej seiqseiz lix. 
JHN.17.3	Gij seiqseiz lix neix couh dwg ndaej rox mwngz—caenhgag mwngz cij dwg caen hih cwnz he—caeuq rox gou, Yehsuh Gihduz, mwngz baij daeuj hih. 
JHN.17.4	Mwngz hawj gou guh hih hong gou gaenq guh liux lo; youq lajmbwn gou gaenq hawj mwngz najrongh lo.

JHN.17.6	“Mwngz senj hawj gou hih vunz, gou gaenq naeuz hawj gyoengqde ni, hawj gyoengqde rox mwngz lo. Baenjlaiz gyoengqde dwg gij vunz mwngz hih, hoeng, mwngz dawz gyoengqde soengq hawj gou lo; gyoengqde caemh dingq gij vah mwngz hwj.

JHN.17.9	“Gou mbouj bang heijvunz gouz mwngz, hoeng, gou dauq bang gij vunz mwngz senj okdaeuj nyok hawj gou he gouz, aenvih gyoengqde baenjlaiz dwg gij vunz mwngz hih. 
JHN.17.10	Gou sojmiz hih cungj dwg gij mwngz liux, mwngz sojmiz hih caemh dwg gij gou liux. Gyoengqde hawj gou ndaej najrongh.

JHN.17.13	“Seizneix gou couh ij bae laeng mwngz mwnq lo, hoeng, gou lij youq lajmbwn hih mwhde, gangj doenghgij vah neix dwg ij hawj gyoengqde luj gou yienghmwnq angq raixcaix. 
JHN.17.14	Gou dawz gij vah mwngz gangj naeuz gyoengqde ni; yiengq doenghheij aen seiqgyaiq neix hih vunz couh haenq gyoengqde, aenvih gyoengqde caeuq gou doxdoengz, mbouj dwg gaep haeuj gij vunz aen seiqgyaiq neix he. 
JHN.17.15	Gou mbouj gouz mwngz mbouj hawj gyoengqde bae dep aen seiqgyaiq neix hih vunz, caenhgag gouz mwngz baujhuq gyoengqde, hawj gyoengqde ndaej duet ok 
JHN.17.16	Gyoengqde caemh luj gou mbouj dwg haeuj aen seiqgyaiq neix hih vunz.

JHN.19.35	Boux caenra raen gij saeh neix hih boux mwnq caemh cingqmingz goq gij saeh neix hwj. Gij cingqmingz de caemh dwg saedsaeh he; de caemh rox bonjfaenh de soj gangj hih dwg saedsaeh hih. De cingqmingz dwg vih ij hawj faenhsou caemh sinq. 
JHN.19.36	Doenghgij saeh gwnz neix ngamqluj lingz ok ndaw Singqgingh ndaw de soj sij naeuz hih:
JHN.19.36	Gij ndok de diuz he cungj mbouj ndaej raek.
JHN.19.37	Ndaw de caemh vanzlij caiq sij miz gawq he:
JHN.19.37	Gyoengqde ij yawj boux ngaiz bonjfaenh gyoengqde ndaemq hih vunz.
JHN.19.38	Gajlaeng, Yozswz Yaqliqmajdaiq Singz vunz bae gouz Bijlahdoh, gouz de hawj de lingx gij seihaiz Yehsuh maj. Bijlahdoh caemh hawj; yiengq de couh bae dawz Yehsuh ma. Boux Yozswz neix caemh dwg gij lwgsae Yehsuh, hoeng, de mbouj hawj vunz rox de caemh dwg lwgsae Yehsuh, aenvih de lau gij 
JHN.19.39	Yiengq miz boux he, gij coh de heuh Nizgohdijmuj, couh dwg boux gaxgonq doengxhaemh bae laeng Yehsuh goq hih boux mwnq,
JHN.19.40	Song boux de caemh ciuq gij vunz Youzdaiq bienqnaengz moek vunzrai dih guhfap, aeu boiqmaz ma yomx ndei gij rang doxgyaux mwnq hwj, couh gyuj ndei gij seihaiz Yehsuh.
JHN.19.41	Youq mwnq Yehsuh ngaiz vunz ding hwnj gwnz gyaq cixcib bae hih mwnq, miz aen suen he. Ndaw suen de miz congh moh moq mijyaengz miz vunz coengq goq he. 
JHN.19.42	Aenvih ngoenz mwnq dwg gij vunz Youzdaiq dih ngoenz cwnjbiq, caiq gyacangq congh moh mwnq caiq gaenh, gyoengqde couh dawz Yehsuh bae mwnq cangq lo.
JHN.20.1	Ngoenzsinghgiz doengxhaet daihcaeux ranz mijyaengz rongh, Mbanj Mazdaqlah dih Majliqyaq couh bae daengz aen moh coengq Yehsuh mwnq lo. De bae daengz mwnq le, engq raen ngauq rin caet bakcongh moh mwnq gaenq nod deuz lo. 
JHN.20.2	De raen yienghneix le, couh riq bae cimh Sihmaenz-Bijdwz caeuq boux lwgsae Yehsuh haenjheiq he mwnq, doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Miz vunz daj ndaw moh senj bouxcawj raeuz deuz lo; mbouj rox hih senj de bae mwnqlaw coengq lo!”
JHN.20.3	Bijdwz caeuq boux lwgsae Yehsuh haenjheiq he mwnq dingq Majliqyaq yienghneix naeuz le, song boux de couh vaiqdi riq bae aen moh mwnq yawj. 
JHN.20.4	Boux lwgsae mwnq, de riq ndaej haemq vaiq. De riq bae daengz gaxgonq, 
JHN.20.5	hoeng de mij haeuj aen moh mwnq bae yawj; youq rog neix goemz roengzma ndomqyawj lah. De yawjraen vangq boiqmaz gyuj Yehsuh mwnq vanzlij youq mwnq. 
JHN.20.6	Sihmaenz-Bijdwz riq bae daengz gajlaeng. De bae daengz couh doq cizsez haeuj ndaw moh bae yawj, yawjraen vangq boiqmaz gyuj Yehsuh mwnq coengq youq mwnq, 
JHN.20.7	hoeng, mbaw gyuj raeuj de mij caeuq vangq boiqmaz doxcaeuq coengq, gag gienj hwj coengq youq gok he.
JHN.20.8	Gajlaeng boux lwgsae sien riq bae daengz mwnq, de caemh haeuj bae; haeuj bae yawjraen yienghneix le, couh sinq lo. 
JHN.20.9	Vihmaz de seizneix cij sinq, dwg aenvih yienzlaiz gyoengq lwgsae Yehsuh gaenhbaenj mbouj rox ndaw Singqgingh ndaw de soj sij naeuz hih, de gaengjdingq rai ndaej dauqlix, gawq neix dih gij iqswh de. 
JHN.20.10	Song boux de raen yienghneix le, couh gag maj ranz lo.
JHN.20.11	Song boux de gaenq maj ranz lo, hoeng, Majliqyaq cungj lij gag ndwn youq rog moh mwnq daej. De doq daej doq ndomqyawj ndaw moh. 
JHN.20.12	Baex ndomqyawj he, engq yawjraen miz song boux bouxcai Cangqdiq daenj buh bieg hwj naengh youq mwnq gaxgonq coengq Yehsuh mwnq, boux he youq raeuj, boux he youq rieng.
JHN.20.13	Bouxcai Cangqdiq raen de le, couh cam de naeuz: “Dahnuengx, mwngz ij daej maz lah?”
JHN.20.13	Yiengq Majliqyaq han naeuz: “Miz vunz dawz bouxcawj gou deuz lo; mbouj rox hih gyoengqde dawz de bae daengz mwnqlaw coengq lo.”
JHN.20.14	Majliqyaq gangj gawq neix sat le, baex veq ndang goqma he, couh raen Yehsuh ndwn youq mwnq, hoeng, de mbouj rox de couh dwg Yehsuh. 
JHN.20.15	Gajlaeng, Yehsuh doiq de naeuz: “Dahnuengx, mwngz ij daej maz lah? Mwngz ij cimh byawz lah?”
JHN.20.15	Hoeng, Majliqyaq naemqnaeuz de dwg boux guenj suen mwnq lah, couh doiq de naeuz: “Goengjau, hauhnaeuz dwg mwngz dawz de bae nex, gou gouz mwngz naeuz gou ni, mwngz coengq de youq mwnqlaw lah? Gou ij bae dawz de ma.”
JHN.20.16	Yehsuh dingq de yienghneix naeuz le, couh heuh de naeuz: “Majliqyaq!”
JHN.20.16	Yehsuh heuh le, Majliqyaq couh veq ndang goq laeng de bae, couh yungh Hihbwzlaiz vah ma heuh de naeuz: “Lahbohniz! Lahbohniz!” (‘Lahbohniz’ gij iqswh de dwg naeuz ‘lauxsae.’) 
JHN.20.17	Gajlaeng, Yehsuh doiq de naeuz: “Gaej rag dawz gou, aenvih gou mijyaengz hwnj bae laeng daxboh mwnq haem. Mwngz bae daengz doenghheij beixnuengx gou mwnq bae, bae naeuz gyoengqde ni, gou ij hwnj bae laeng boh gou mwnq, Cangqdiq gou lo; de caemh dwg boh faenhsou, Cangqdiq faenhsou hwj.”
JHN.20.18	Mbanj Mazdaqlah dih Majliqyaq dingq Yehsuh yienghneix naeuz le, couh bae naeuz gyoengq lwgsae ni naeuz: “Gou gaenq ndaej raen bouxcawj raeuz lo!” Gajlaeng de vanzlij caiq gangj naeuz gyoengq lwgsae ni Yehsuh doiq de soj gangj hih vah.
JHN.20.19	Couh youq ngoenz mwnq, ngoenzsinghgiz doengxhaemh, gyoengq lwgsae doxcomz. Aenvih gyoengqde lau gij 
JHN.20.20	De naeuz gawq neix le, couh iet fawz okdaeuj hawj gyoengqde yawj, caiq bwenj famhdungx de hawj gyoengqde yawj. Gyoengq lwgsae raen le, couh rox de dwg bouxcawj gyoengqde lo, couh angq hwj ij rai bae.
JHN.20.21	Gajlaeng Yehsuh youhcaiq doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Muengh faenhsou bingzan! Boh baenzlaw baij gou daeuj, gou caemh baenzlaw baij faenhsou bae.” 
JHN.20.22	De gangj gawq vah neix sat le, couh boq gaemz heiq he hawj gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou lingx aeu Hoenzsaenz Cangqdiq bax! 
JHN.20.23	Faenhsou mienx byawz hih coih, byawz couh ndaej mienx coih lo; faenhsou mbouj mienx byawz hih coih, byawz couh mbouj ndaej mienx coih lo.”
JHN.20.24	Hoeng, cibngeih boux lwgsae ndaw de miz boux he, gij coh de heuh Dohmaj, caemh heuh Dihdujmaj, mwh Yehsuh yienh hawj gyoengq lwgsae raen hih mwhde de mbouj caeuq gyoengq lwgsae doih youq mwnq, mbouj ndaej raen Yehsuh. 
JHN.20.25	Gajlaeng gyoengq lwgsae doih doiq de naeuz: “Gyoengqraeuz ndaej raen bouxcawj raeuz hwj!”
JHN.20.25	Hoeng, Dohmaj mbouj sinq; de naeuz: “Cizfeih gou ndaej caenra raen gij fawz de hih mwnq ding sieng mwnq, gij fawz gou ndaej mo daengz mwnq ding sieng de, ndaej mo daengz famhdungx de, mbouj nex gou gaengjdingq mbouj sinq.”
JHN.20.26	Yiengq goq bet ngoenz le, gyoengq lwgsae caiq doxcomz; mbat neix Dohmaj caemh caeuq gyoengqde doxcomz, dou caemh gven hwj. 
JHN.20.27	De naeuz gawq neix sat le, couh doiq Dohmaj naeuz: “Aeu lwgfawz mwngz momo gij fawz gou yawj, caiq momo famhdungx gou yawj bax! Gaejyungh ngeiz mbouj sinq; cijaeu sinq couh ndaej lo!”
JHN.20.28	Dohmaj raen yienghneix le, couh naeuz: “Ox! Bouxcawj gou Cangqdiq hax!”
JHN.20.29	Gajlaeng Yehsuh caiq doiq Dohmaj naeuz: “Aenvih mwngz yawjraen gou cij sinq. Hoeng, doengh boux mij raen gou he cix sinq lo, doengh boux mwnq gaeuq miz fuk lo.”
JHN.20.30	Gajlaeng, Yehsuh vanzlij youq dangqnaj gyoengq lwgsae de guh baenx haujlai geizmiuj dih saeh, hoeng, cungj mij sij youq ndaw bonj saw neix. 
JHN.20.31	Sij youq ndaw bonj saw neix hih saeh dwg vih ij hawj faenhsou sinq Yehsuh dwg Gihduz, 
JHN.21.1	Gij saeh neix goq le, Yehsuh youq henz haij Dizbijlijyaq caiq yienh hawj gyoengq lwgsae de raen. De baenzlaw yienh hawj gyoengq lwgsae de raen nej, dwg yienghneix hih:
JHN.21.2	Miz baez he, Sihmaenz-Bijdwz caeuq Dohmaj (vunz caemh heuh de Dihdujmaj) caeuq Nazdanqnez Gyahliqliq dih Mbanj Gyahnaz vunz caeuq song daeglwg Sihbiqdaiq, vanzlij miz song boux lwgsae haem doxcomz youq itheij. 
JHN.21.3	Yiengq Sihmaenz-Bijdwz doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Gou ij bae dwk bya lo.”
JHN.21.3	Yiengq gyoengqde han naeuz: “Raeuz caemh gaen mwngz bae.” Couh yienghneix, gyoengqde couh hwnj ruz bae dwk bya lo, hoeng, gyoengqde dwk baenx ngwnz cungj mij dwk ndaej saek duz.
JHN.21.4	Couh youq mwh ranz ij rongh hih mwh he, Yehsuh ndwn youq gwnz hamq mwnq, hoeng, gyoengq lwgsae gaenhbaenj mbouj rox de couh dwg Yehsuh. 
JHN.21.5	Yehsuh doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Baengzyoux, faenhsou dwk ndaej bya lwi?”
JHN.21.5	Gyoengqde han naeuz: “Mij ndaej hah.”
JHN.21.6	Gajlaeng, Yehsuh caiq doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Dawz fan muengx vanq roengz baixgvaz aen ruz bae; gaengjdingq dwk ndaej bya.” Gyoengqde dingq le, caemh ciuq de gangj hih yienghmwnq bae guh lo. Liuh mbouj daengz cingqgawq ndaej baenxbienh bya gwhraix, lai hwj daiq rag muengx cungj rag mbouj ndaej hwnjma bae.
JHN.21.7	Yiengq, Yehsuh haenjheiq hih boux lwgsae mwnq raen yienghneix le, couh doiq Bijdwz naeuz: “Aex! Dwg bouxcawj raeuz!” Sihmaenz-Bijdwz baex dingq naeuz dwg bouxcawj le, couh vaiqdi dawz diuz buh baixrog de cug haeuj rwet bae (aenvih mwhde de dwg loxgenz he). De cug haeuj rwet bae le, couh doq diuq roengz haij bae, 
JHN.21.8	Mwhde aen ruz liz henz hamq mbouj geijlwh gyae, aiq miz bak mij yienghneix gyae. 
JHN.21.9	Gajlaeng gyoengqde hwnj hamq ma le, couh yawjraen miz dong feizdanq he, gwnz de gak miz bya caeuq bingj hwj. 
JHN.21.10	Yehsuh couh doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Dawz geij duz bya faenhsou dwk ndaej he goq daeuj.” 
JHN.21.11	Yehsuh yienghneix naeuz le, Sihmaenz-Bijdwz couh hwnj ruz bae rag fan muengxbya hwnj hamq ma. Ndaw muengx mwnq cenznaengz ndaej bya hung, itgungh muengx ndaej itbak hajcib sam duz. Gannaeuz muengx ndaej baenxbienh bya lah, hoeng, fan muengx cungj mbouj ngaiz vaih saek di.
JHN.21.12	Gajlaeng Yehsuh caiq doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Daeuj, gw haeuxngaiz bax!” Mwhde gyoengq lwgsae raen yienghneix lo, hoeng cungj mij saek boux gamj cam de dwg byawz, aenvih gyoengqde bouxboux cungj gag rox, de couh dwg bouxcawj gyoengqde dih Yehsuh lo. 
JHN.21.13	Yehsuh yienghneix naeuz le, couh byaij goqbae aeu bingj aeu bya faen hawj gyoengqde gw.
JHN.21.14	Yehsuh rai ndaej dauqlix le, mbat neix dwg de daixsam mbat yienh hawj gyoengq lwgsae de raen.
JHN.21.15	Couh yienghneix, gyoengqde gw haeuxngaiz sat le, Yehsuh cam Sihmaenz-Bijdwz naeuz: “Sihmaenz daeglwg Yozhanq, mwngz beij gizdah lwgsae aiq gou lwi?”
JHN.21.15	Bijdwz dingq le, han naeuz: “Dwg hah, bouxcawj gou hax, mwngz rox gou aiq mwngz hah.”
JHN.21.15	Yehsuh dingq le, couh doiq de naeuz: “Yiengq mwngz couh gueng doenghheij yiengzlwg iq gou bax!”
JHN.21.16	De yienghneix naeuz le, vanzlij caiq cam Bijdwz daixngeih mbat naeuz: “Sihmaenz daeglwg Yozhanq, mwngz aiq gou lwi?”
JHN.21.16	Bijdwz dingq le, caiq han de naeuz: “Bouxcawj gou hax, dwg hah, mwngz rox gou aiq mwngz hah.”
JHN.21.16	Yehsuh dingq le, caiq doiq de naeuz: “Yiengq mwngz couh ciengx gij yiengz gou bax!”
JHN.21.17	De yienghneix naeuz le, youhcaiq cam Bijdwz daixsam mbat naeuz: “Sihmaenz daeglwg Yozhanq, mwngz aiq gou lwi?”
JHN.21.17	Bijdwz raen Yehsuh sam mbat cungj yienghneix cam de naeuz: “Mwngz aiq gou lwi?” le, couh yousim hwj doiq Yehsuh naeuz: “Bouxcawj gou hax, mwngz mij'z naeuz gijmaz mbouj rox hah; mwngz rox gou aiq mwngz hah!”
JHN.21.17	Yehsuh dingq le, youhcaiq doiq de naeuz: “Mwngz gueng gij yiengz gou bax!”
JHN.21.18	Yehsuh gangj sat doenghgij vah neix le, caiq doiq Bijdwz naeuz: “Gou saedsaeh naeuz mwngz ni lo, mwngz lij hauxseng hih mwh he, ndaej gag cug sairwet, siengj bae mwnqlaw couh bae mwnqlaw; hoeng, daengj daengz laux le, couh mbouj dwg yienghneix lo. Mwngz ngaiz iet fawz hawj vunz cug mwngz, vunz daiq mwngz bae mwnq mwngz mbouj haenj bae he.” 
JHN.21.19	(Yehsuh gangj gij vah neix dwg naeuz Bijdwz ni, Bijdwz de ij baenzlaw rai hwj ndaej hawj Cangqdiq najrongh.) Yehsuh gangj sat doenghgij vah neix le, vanzlij caiq doiq Bijdwz naeuz: “Mwngz daeuj gaen gou bax!”
JHN.21.20	Gajlaeng Bijdwz veq ndang goqma yawjraen Yehsuh haenjheiq hih boux lwgsae mwnq gaen youq gajlaeng, couh dwg boux lwgsae youq mwh donq haeuxcaeuz gatsat mwnq naengh youq henz ndang Yehsuh cam Yehsuh naeuz: “Bouxcawj gou hax, dwg byawz ij cuzmaiq mwngz hax?” hih boux lwgsae mwnq lo. 
JHN.21.21	Bijdwz raen yienghneix le, couh cam Yehsuh naeuz: “Bouxcawj hax, yiengq de nej? De ij ngaiz yienghlawz rai hax?”
JHN.21.22	Yehsuh dingq le, han de naeuz: “Mwngz ij cam ma guh gijmaz nex? Hauhnaeuz gou ij hawj de daengj daengz gou dauq daeuj hih mwhde, cix ij gvan maz mwngz saeh nej? Mwngz caenhrox gaen gou sat lo.” 
JHN.21.23	Couh vih yienghneix, gajlaeng youq ndaw gyoengq lwgsae ndaw de cungj cenz naeuz boux lwgsae mwnq mbouj rox rai. Gizsaed, Yehsuh gaenhbaenj mbouj dwg naeuz de mbouj rox rai, dwg naeuz: “Hauhnaeuz gou hawj de daengj daengz gou dauq daeuj hih mwhde, cix ij caeuq mwngz miz maz gvanhaeh nex?” gawq neix lah.
JHN.21.24	Boux lwgsae mwnq couh dwg ndaej cingqmingz gwnz neix sojmiz hih saeh, caemh dawz doenghgij saeh neix geiq roengzma hih boux mwnq lo. Gyoengqraeuz caemh rox de soj cingqmingz hih cungj dwg saedsaeh hih.
JHN.21.25	Cawzok gwnz neix doenghgij saeh neix, Yehsuh vanzlij guh baenx haujlai saeh haem, hauhnaeuz yienghyiengh cungj ij sij okdaeuj liux nex, gwh yawj hax, baenx cenz ciqgyaiq cungj coux mbouj liux hwx.
ACT.1.1	Dizahfeihloz senhsaengh, gou gaenq youq daixit cek saw sij gvanhhih Yehsuh daj gaihcij soj guh dih saeh caeuq soj son hih, 
ACT.1.2	itcig daengz de ciep hwnj mbwn bae hih ngoenz mwnq, cungj sij goq lo.
ACT.1.2	Youq de mijyaengz ciep hwnj mbwn bae cihsenz, de hawj Hoenzsaenz Cangqdiq raengq gij lwgsae de senj okdaeuj he. 
ACT.1.3	Daj de souh nanh goq hwnj seiqcib ngoenz ndaw de, de yienh hawj gyoengq lwgsae de raen goq haujlai mbat, yungh haujlai cungj fanghfaz ma cingqmingz de vanzlij lix, caemh vanzlij caeuq gyoengqde gangj gvanhhih aen guek Cangqdiq dih saeh.
ACT.1.4	Miz mbat he, de caeuq gyoengq lwgsae de doxcomz. De raengq gyoengqde naeuz: “Faenhsou mbouj ndaej lizgaih Yehluqsajlaengj; ij youq mwnqneix daengj Bohmbwn dapwngq goq ij hawj faenhsou hih, couh dwg gou caeuq faenhsou gangj goq hih, 
ACT.1.5	couh dwg naeuz goq mbouj geijlwh ngoenz, Hoenzsaenz Cangqdiq couh ij daeuj daengz gwnz ndang faenhsou, sijlij hawj faenhsou—mbouj luj gaxgonq Yozhanq aeu raemx ma sijlij law.”
ACT.1.6	Miz mbat he, gyoengq lwgsae caeuq Yehsuh doxcomz; gyoengqde cam Yehsuh naeuz: “Bouxcawj hax, mwngz dwg mbouj dwg ij youq mwhneix hawj aen guek Hijswzlez raeuz ndaej dauqyungz laeb guek hax?”
ACT.1.7	Yehsuh han gyoengqde naeuz: “Bohmbwn de gag ciuq gij gienzveih bonjfaenh de ma dingh mwhlawz, ngoenzlawz; gij neix mbouj dwg faenhsou siengj rox couh ndaej rox hih nej. 
ACT.1.8	Hoeng, daengz mwh Hoenzsaenz Cangqdiq daeuj daengz gwnz ndang faenhsou nex, faenhsou couh ndaej miz ndaek cungj geizmiuj dih bonjsaeh he lo; faenhsou ij bae baenx cenz Yehluqsajlaengj, cenz Youzdaiq, cenz Sajmajliqyaq simqciq baenx cenz lajmbwn sojmiz hih dieg bae, gangj naeuz gij vunz ni, hawj gyoengqde rox gou sojmiz dih saeh.”
ACT.1.9	Couh youq mwh de gangj sat doenghgij vah neix hih mwhde, de mingzmingz youq dangqnaj gyoengqde hwnj mbwn bae lo. Miz vangq fwj he baex gyoengqde hwj yawj mij raen de laem lo. 
ACT.1.10	De hwnj mbwn bae hih mwhde, gyoengqde cungj muengh hwnj gwnzmbwn bae yawj, yawj hwj ra mbouj yaep. Couh youq mwhneix, sawqmwh miz song boux daenj buh bieg hwj ndwn youq henz ndang gyoengqde, 
ACT.1.11	doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Gij vunz Gyahliqliq faenhsou hax, faenhsou vihmaz ij ndwn youq dineix muengh mbwn yawj mbwn nej? Boux biek faenhsou hwnj mbwn bae hih Yehsuh, faenhsou yawjraen de baenzlaw hwnj mbwn bae, baezneix de caemh dwg baenzlaw roengz ma lo.”
ACT.1.12	Gajlaeng gyoengqde couh daj bya Gamjlamj maj Yehluqsajlaengj. (Daj mwnq daengz Yehluqsajlaengj daihgaiq miz song leix roen.) 
ACT.1.13	Gyoengqde maj daengz ndaw singz le, couh hwnj laeuz bae, haeuj aen fungh gyoengqde youq he mwnq bae lo. Youq mwnq miz Bijdwz, Yozhanq, Yajgoz, Anhdwzlez, Feihliz, Dohmaj, Bahdohlozmaij, Majdaiq, daeglwg Yaqlwzfeih Yajgoz, vanzlij miz Gizcwnq Dangj

ACT.26.16	Mwngz vaiq ndwn hwnjdaeuj! Gou cingqcingz daegnaengh yienh hawj mwngz raen he dwg ij hawj mwngz guh bouxhoiq gou lah; mwngz ij dawz mwngz ngoenzneix soj yawjraen hih caeuq baezneix gou ij gangj naeuz mwngz ni hih cungj bae gangj naeuz vunz ni liux bae. 
ACT.26.17	Gou ij daj gij vunz Youzdaiq caeuq gij vunz linghvaih minzcuz he gouq mwngz okma. 
ACT.26.18	Gou baij mwngz bae laeng gyoengqde mwnq, hawj gyoengqde singqsag hwnjdaeuj, hawj gyoengqde ndaej daj ndaw laep cienq daengz mwnq rongh he, ndaej daj Sajdanq mwnq duet ok gij gaemhanh de, ndaej bae daengz ndaw rumq Cangqdiq mwnq bae, youhcaiq vih sinq gou hwj ndaej mienx coih, ndaej caeuq gij vunz sinq gou he doxdoengz ndaej gaep haeuj guek Cangqdiq.’”
ACT.26.19	Baujloz vanzlij caiq naeuz: “Sojhij, Yaqgihbaq goeng'ak hax, gou mbouj gamj famh gij vah daj gwnzmbwn daeuj raengq gou hih nej. 
ACT.26.20	Gou couh sien bae Daqmajswqgwz, gajlaeng daengz Yehluqsajlaengj, caiq gajlaeng caiq bae daengz Youzdaiq sojmiz hih dieg, simqciq daengz lingh minzcuz bae, gienq gyoengqde daj ndaw sim nginh loek gaij goqma sinq Cangqdiq, vanzlij guh gij ndaej cingqmingz cingqcaen dwg caensim gaijgoq he. 
ACT.26.21	Couh dwg vih gij neix hwj gou youq ndaw gunghdenq Cangqdiq ngaiz gij vunz Youzdaiq gaemh dawz ij gaj gou lo. 
ACT.26.22	Hoeng, caeklaiq gou ndaej do gij fuk Cangqdiq, vanzlij ndaej lix daengz seizneix, hawj gou ndaej youq dineix doiq goeng'ak cixnaeuz doiq beksingq gangj vah. Gou soj gangj hih caemh ngamq dwg doengh boux cenz gij vah Cangqdiq caeuq Mohsih soj gangj goq hih ij fatseng hih gij saeh mwnq lo, 
ACT.26.23	couh dwg naeuz Gihduz gaengjdingq ngaiz vunz haih, caemh gaengjdingq ndaej dwg daixit boux daj rai ndaej dauqlix hwj ndaej hawj gij vunz Youzdaiq caeuq gij vunz linghvaih minzcuz he rox, rox gyoengqde caemh ndaej ndaej gouq.”
ACT.26.24	Baujloz yienghneix baij dauhleix le, Feihswhduh couh hemq hwnjdaeuj naeuz: “Baujloz! Mwngz vangh lo maz! Dwg mbouj dwg ndaek dungx saw mwngz daiq lai lai lo, hawj mwngz fatmwnh lo.”
ACT.26.25	Baujloz dingq le, han naeuz: “Feihswhduh saengjcangj hax, gou mbouj dwg vangh law. Gou soj gangj hih cungj dwg saedsaeh, mbouj miz saek di gyaj. 
ACT.26.26	Gou caemh rox goeng'ak Yaqgihbaq caemh rox gij saeh neix. Sojhij gou cij gamj youq dangqnaj de miz maz gangj maz lah, aenvih mij saek yiengh ndaej deuz ok lwgra de, caiq gyacangq gij saeh neix bouxboux cungj caemh rox.” 
ACT.26.27	Baujloz yienghneix gangj le, fanjgoqma cam Yaqgihbaq naeuz: “Goeng'ak hax, mwngz sinq boux cenz gij vah Cangqdiq lwi? Hoeng gou rox mwngz sinq hwj.”
ACT.26.28	Yaqgihbaq dingq le, han Baujloz naeuz: “Nanzdauh mwngz gangj geij gawq vah couh ndaej gangj hawj gou guh Yehsuh dih lwgsae lo mah.”
ACT.26.29	Yiengq Baujloz han naeuz: “Mboujguenj vah lai vah noix, gou siengzseiz yiengq Cangqdiq soj gouz hih cungj dwg muengh mwngz caeuq ngoenzneix youq dineix sojmiz hih vunz ndaej luj gou yienghneix dwg Yehsuh dih lwgsae, cijmboujgoq ciengeiz gaej luj gou ngoenzneix mbouj ndaej swqyouz.”
ACT.26.30	Baujloz yienghneix naeuz le, Yaqgihbaq couh ndwn hwnjdaeuj doiq okma. Goeng saengjcangj caeuq Bwznizgih caeuq youq mwnq hih vunz cungj caemh gaen doiq okma lo. 
ACT.26.31	Gyoengqde doiq okma le, couh caezgya lwnh naeuz: “Boux vunz neix gaenhbaenj mbouj famh gijmaz hab rai hab goenj dih coih hah.”
ACT.26.32	Gajlaeng Yaqgihbaq doiq Feihswhduh naeuz: “Hauhnaeuz de mbouj yiengq goengjvuengz Lozmaj cangqsuq nex, couh ndaej coengq de lo.”
ACT.27.1	Feihswhduh gyezdingq hawj gyoengqraeuz naengh ruz bae Iqdaqliq
ACT.27.2	Yiengq gyoengqraeuz couh hwnj aen ruz daj Yaqdaqmijdenz daeuj he. Aen ruz neix dwg yiengq henz haij Yaqsiqyaq dih geij mwnq sokruz he bae. Caeuq gyoengqraeuz caemh naengh aen ruz neix bae hih miz aen saengj Majgizdoenq dih aen singz Dezsajloznizgyah dih Yaqlijdazguj boux neix.
ACT.27.3	Daengz daixngeih ngoenz, gyoengqraeuz bae daengz sokruz Sihdoenq. Youzliuz dwzbez cauqguq Baujloz, hawj de hwnj ruz ma bae yawj gij baengzyoux de, caemh bihcwnj hawj gij baengzyoux de daih de, soengq doxgaiq hawj de. 
ACT.27.4	Gajlaeng gyoengqraeuz caiq daj mwnq naengh ruz bae. Aenvih mwhde ngig rumz, aen ruz couh ndij goq henz hamq Caiqbujluqswh mwnq boihrumz he bae. 
ACT.27.5	Aen ruz hoi goq Gihliqgyah Saengj, Bangzfeihliqyaq Saengj, bae daengz Lijgyah Saengj dih Meijlah Singz. 
ACT.27.6	Youq mwnq, Youzliuz lienzcangj raen aen ruz daj Yaqlizcanhdaq daeuj he; ngamqluj aen de ij bae Iqdaqliq. Yiengq de couh hawj gyoengqraeuz hwnj aen ruz mwnq bae.
ACT.27.7	Hoeng, aen ruz bae cienfanh menh he, bae baenx geij ngoenz hohloeng, cij ngamqngamq ndaej bae daengz doiqmienh aen singz Gwznizswq. Aenvih ngig rumz daiq youqgaenj lai, gyoengqraeuz vih ij baex rumz mbouj ndaej ciuq fueng yienzlaiz he bae lo, bik mbouj ndaej ngaiz van goq aen dauj Gwzlijdwz mwnq boihrumz he, daj doiqmienh dieg Sajmohniz goq bae. 
ACT.27.8	Gyoengqraeuz ndij goq hamq haij Gwzlijdwz bae, bae hwj cienfanh dwgrengz he, gajlaeng cijngamq ndaej bae daengz mwnq dieg heuh Sokruz Ndei he gaenh aen singz heuh Lahsihyaq he.
ACT.27.9	Aenvih mbouj swnh rumz, aen ruz bae hwj cienfanh nguh he. Gyoengqraeuz youq gwnz ruz hih cizgyenh caemh caez, guh hwj cauhgoq aen ciet Cueg Coih lo.
ACT.27.10	“Gak boux hax, hauhnaeuz gyoengqraeuz cungj lij giqcuz naengh ruz bae haem nex, ciuq gou yawj hax, cungj gig veizyiemj. Mbouj danhcij naeuz doxgaiq caeuq ruz satsoq, daiqlienz gyoengqraeuz cungj caemh ngaiz satsoq.” 
ACT.27.11	Hoeng, goeng lienzcangj mbouj sinq Baujloz, cingxnyienh sinq goeng ruzcangj caeuq sinq goeng cawjruz. 
ACT.27.12	Caemhcaiq gyacangq sokruz neix dingz ruz goq doeng mbouj daiq baenz geijlai, sojhij dingxfaen lai vunz cungj yauhgyiuz giqcuz naengh ruz bae. Gyoengqde naemj saekseiz lij ndaej bae daengz Feihnizgih
ACT.27.13	Couh youq mwhneix, ngamqluj miz rumz namz ci goqdaeuj fexfex, yiengq gyoengqde couh naemq ngamqluj lo, sojhij couh gaihcij caiq hoi ruz bae lo. Gyoengqde couh ndij goq henz haij Gwzlijdwz bae. 
ACT.27.14	Hoeng, ngamq bae mbouj geij caez, couh miz ndaek raq rumz hung he daj gwnz dauj bongx goqdaeuj. (Cungj rumz neix dwg heuh Rumz Doengbaek.) 
ACT.27.15	Aen ruz ngaiz raq rumz neix bongx; gyoengqraeuz lienz vunz daiq ruz cungj ngaiz bongx deuz. 
ACT.27.16	Aenvih ruz ngaiz bongx bae daengz gaenh aen dauj iq heuh Gauhdaq dih mwnq boihrumz he, gajlaeng gyoengqraeuz uj hwj mouyou liux cij ndaej dawz aen ruz iq riengh youq rieng ruz duengq hwnj gwnz ruz bae. 
ACT.27.17	Gajlaeng couh aeu cag ma goenj aen ruz hung ndei hwj, 
ACT.27.18	Rumz hung vanzlij dwg bongx mbouj dingz. Yiengq daengz ngoenz daixngeih le, gyoengqde fug gveng gij doxgaiq gwnz ruz roengz haij bae lo. 
ACT.27.19	Daengz daixsam ngoenz, gyoengqde daiqlienz gwnz ruz soj yungh hih cungj gveng lo. 
ACT.27.20	Gyoengqraeuz bijlienz baenx geij ngoenz cungj mij raen gyangjngoenz caeuq ndaundeiq. Rumz hung vanzlij dwg bongx hwj youqgaenj raixcaix, guh hwj gyoengqraeuz cungj roxnginh mij'z muengh lo.
ACT.27.21	Gwnz ruz sojmiz hih vunz bijlienz baenx geij ngoenz cungj mij gw doxgaiq lo. Baujloz couh ndwn hwnjdaeuj doiq gyoengq vunz naeuz: “Gak boux hax, hauhnaeuz faenhsou senqsi cix dingq gij vah gou, mbouj lizgaih Gwzlijdwz nex, couh mbouj ngaiz roeb daengz yienghneix lo. 
ACT.27.22	Hoeng, seizneix gou naeuz faenhsou, coengqsim bax. Faenhsou dineix mij'z vunz ngaiz rai law; ceiq lai aen ruz neix ngaiz satsoq, 
ACT.27.23	aenvih ngoenzlwenz singjngwnz, gou soqlaiz cungj swqhaeuh dih Cangqdiq, bouxcawj gou, de baij bouxcai de daeuj, doiq gou naeuz: 
ACT.27.24	‘Baujloz, mwngz gaej lau! Mwngz bietdingh ndaej ndwn youq dangqnaj goengjvuengz Lozmaj. Cangqdiq caemh ij vih mwngz hwj gouq baenx cenz ruz dih vunz.’ 
ACT.27.25	Sojhij, gak boux coengqsim bax! Gou sinq Cangqdiq baenzlaw doiq gou gangj caemh gaengjdingq baenzlaw guh. 
ACT.27.26	Cijmboujgoq gyoengqraeuz gaengjdingq ij ngaiz biu bae daengz aen dauj he.”
ACT.27.27	Yiengq daengz daixcibseiq ngoenz hih ngwnz mwnq, aen ruz vanzlij dwg youq gwnz haij Yaqdijlijyaq biu bae biu dauq. Daihgaiq daengz gyangjngwnz, doengh boux fouruz naemqnaeuz aen ruz gaenq gaenh dieg hawq lo. 
ACT.27.28	Gyoengqde couh bau diuz cag damq laeg mwnq roengz haij bae, yiengq damq miz cibngeih ciengh laeg. Gajlaeng caiq doxbae di he le, caiq damq, vanzlij miz gouj ciengh laeg. 
ACT.27.29	Gyoengqde raen yienghneix le, cungj lau aen ruz ngaiz bungq dawz rin, couh daj rieng ruz bau seiq gaiq ngaeu roengzbae, hawj aen ruz camqciz dingz youq mwnq, muengh dingx ndaej daengz ranzrongh.
ACT.27.30	Gajlaeng, gyoengq fouruz siengj deuz ok aen ruz neix, couh dawz aen ruz iq coengq roengz haij bae, gyajcang daj raeuj ruz bau ngaeu roengzbae hwj. 
ACT.27.31	Baujloz raen yienghneix le, couh doiq boux lienzcangj caeuq gyoengq binggyep naeuz: “Doenghheij vunz neix mbouj daengj youq gwnz ruz youq, yaepm'x gwnz ruz neix sojmiz hih vunz cungj ngaiz byaeu liux.” 
ACT.27.32	Gyoengq binggyep dingq le, couh raemj gat diuz cag aen ruz iq, ajcaih aen de fouz bae vangraeh.
ACT.27.33	Couh yienghneix, daengz ranz ij rongh lo, Baujloz couh gienq gyoengq vunzlai gw doxgaiq. De naeuz: “Faenhsou yousim youheiq baenx cibseiq ngoenz mbouj gw gijmaz lo. 
ACT.27.34	Gou seizneix gienq faenhsou gw di doxgaiq he, yiengq cij ndaej dingx roengzbae hah, aenvih faenhsou dineix sojmiz hih vunz lienz dug byoem he cungj mbouj ngaiz sienghaih.” 
ACT.27.35	Baujloz gangj gij vah neix le, couh dawz bingj hwnjdaeuj, youq dangqnaj vunzlai docih Cangqdiq le, couh euj hwj gw. 
ACT.27.36	Gyoengq vunz raen yienghneix le, couh coengqsim, caemh gaen de gw lo. 
ACT.27.37	(Caeuq raeuz caemh naengh aen ruz neix hih miz songbak caetcib roek vunz.) 
ACT.27.38	Gyoengq vunz gw imq le, vih ij hawj aen ruz haemq mbaeu, couh dawz gij mienh gwnz ruz gveng roengz haij bae.
ACT.27.39	Yiengq daengz ranzrongh lo, gyoengqde nginh mbouj ok mwnq dieg mwnq dwg mwnqlaw, hoeng, dauq raen miz mwnq haijvanh he, caemhcaiq miz anjsa he. Gyoengqde couh siengj banqfaz hawj aen ruz youq mwnq dingz. 
ACT.27.40	Gajlaeng, gyoengqde couh raemj doengh diuz cag gij ngaeu gat, ajcaih doenghgij ngaeu youq ndaw haij, caemh gej diuz cag cug baj dox,
ACT.27.41	Hoeng, ngaiz roeb daengz lueng raemx git he. Aen ruz aen raeuj de ngaiz gak youq mwnq raemx dinj de; aen rieng ruz de ngaiz raemx git cung hwj vaih liux.
ACT.27.42	Gyoengq binggyep raen yienghneix le, cungj lau gyoengq vunzfamh ndaem raemx deuz, couh siengj gaj gyoengqde bae. 
ACT.27.43	Hoeng, boux lienzcangj mwnq siengj gouq Baujloz, couh mbouj hawj gyoengqde yienghmwnq guh. Gajlaeng, de mingqlingq doenghgij vunz rox riuz raemx he diuq roengz raemx bae sien youz hwnj hamq. 
ACT.27.44	Lij lw hih vunz, yungh benj cixnaeuz yungh gijmaz gwnz ruz ndaej fouz hih youz hwnj hamq. Couh yienghneix, gwnz ruz sojmiz hih vunz cungj ndaej gouq liux.
ACT.28.1	Gyoengqraeuz ndaej hwnj hamq ma le, cij rox naeuz aen dauj mwnq heuh Majwjdah. 
ACT.28.2	Gwnz dauj mwnq hih vunz doiq gyoengqraeuz gig ndei, caux feiz hawj gyoengqraeuz byoq, aenvih mwhde cingq fwn doek, cixcaemh nit. 
ACT.28.3	Baujloz dawz lwg liu he coengq haeuj ndaw feiz bae. Yiengq ndaw lwg liu mwnq miz duz ngwzdoeg he, ngaiz feiz ndat le, couh ok daeuj, haeb dawz gij fawz de mbouj coengq. 
ACT.28.4	Yiengq gij vunz raen duz ngwzdoeg youq gwnz fawz Baujloz le, couh lwnh naeuz: “Boux vunz neix gaengjdingq dwg vunzfamh gaj vunz he; gannaeuz daj ndaw haij ndaej deuz rai lah, hoeng, mbwn cungj mbouj nyiuz de.” 
ACT.28.5	Couh youq mwhneix, Baujloz engq faenq duz de hwnj gwnz feiz bae; bonjfaenh de mij naih saek yiengh. 
ACT.28.6	Gyoengq vunz mwnq cungj naemqnaeuz gij fawz de gaengjdingq ij ngaiz gawh, cixnaeuz de gaengjdingq ij ngaiz laemx roengzbae rai lah. Laixlawz, goq baenx haujlai caez lo, cungj mij raen de ngaiz saek yiengh, gajlaeng couh vaiqdi gaij naeuz: “Ox, de dwg cwnzsien!”
ACT.28.7	Liz mwnq mbouj geijlwh gyae miz reih hwj; gij reih mwnq dwg gij reih Buqbwzliuz. De dwg aen dauj mwnq dih goeng daeuzdaeuz he. De hawj gyoengqraeuz bae laeng de youq, caemh daih gyoengqraeuz sam ngoenz. 
ACT.28.8	Mwhde, daxboh de ngaiz bingh fatndat caeuq oksiq, ninz youq gwnz congz. Yiengq Baujloz rox le, couh haeuj ndaw fungh de bae yawj de, bang de gouz Cangqdiq, oemj fawz hwnj gwnz ndang de bae yw gij bingh de ndei. 
ACT.28.9	Yiengq daj baez mwnq hwnj, aen dauj mwnq sojmiz miz bingh hih vunz cungj daeuj hawj Baujloz yw, caemh bouxboux cungj yw ndaej ndei. 
ACT.28.10	Sojhij gyoengqde doiq gyoengqraeuz cienfanh ndei he. Gajlaeng, gyoengqraeuz ij daj mwnq naengh ruz okma hih mwhde, gyoengq vunz mwnq soengq baenx haujlai doxgaiq hawj gyoengqraeuz ij yungh hih.
ACT.28.11	Goq sam ndwen le, gyoengqraeuz dap aen ruz daj Yaqlizcanhdaq daeuj he. Aen ruz neix miz coh hwj; gij coh de dwg heuh Suengjseng. Aen ruz neix dingz youq aen dauj neix goq doeng he. 
ACT.28.12	Gyoengqraeuz dap aen ruz neix bae daengz Siqlahguj le, couh youq mwnq dingz sam ngoenz. 
ACT.28.13	Gajlaeng, caiq daj mwnq giqcuz naengh ruz gvax goq mwnq dawz mwnq bae Liqgih'ungh. Bae daengz daixngeih ngoenz le, miz rumz namz, sojhij sam ngoenz couh bae daengz Buqdiuhliq lo. 
ACT.28.14	Youq mwnq raen miz geij boux lwgsae; gyoengqde cingj gyoengqraeuz youq mwnq caet ngoenz. Gajlaeng, gyoengqraeuz couh byaij bae Lozmaj lo.
ACT.28.15	Yiengq, youq Lozmaj Singz hih doenghheij lwgsae he rox naeuz gyoengqraeuz ij bae le, couh bae daengz aen haw heuh Yaqbijuh he
ACT.28.16	Gyoengqraeuz bae daengz Lozmaj le, boux lienzcangj mwnq bihcwnj hawj Baujloz gag youq aen ranzco de youq, hoeng boux bing gam de mwnq caemh caeuq de youq mwnq hwj.
ACT.28.17	Yiengq goq sam ngoenz le, Baujloz couh cingj gij Youzdaiq vunz dih lingjdauj daeuj, cingj gyoengqde daeuj doiq gyoengqde naeuz: “Gak boux beixnuengx hax, gou cungj mij guh gijmaz hwj famh gij vunz aen minzcuz neix caeuq famh gij cojgoeng raeuz hih laehbeih haem. Hoeng, gou youq Yehluqsajlaengj dauq ngaiz vunz gyaeng hwnjdaeuj, caiq ngaiz vunz gam soengq bae hawj gij vunz Lozmaj. 
ACT.28.18	Gyoengqde saemj gou, raen gou mij famh gij hab rai dih coih haem le, couh siengj coengq gou lo. 
ACT.28.19	Hoeng, gij vunz Youzdaiq mbouj fug, guh hawj gou mij banqfaz, cij yiengq goengjvuengz Lozmaj cangqsuq lah; gaenhbaenj mij gijmaz naeuz ij gauq gij minzcuz raeuz law. 
ACT.28.20	Couh dwg vih gij neix hwj gou cij cingj faenhsou daeuj caeuq gou raennaj lah. Gou dwg vih gij vunz Hijswzlez soj muengh hih boux mwnq hwj ngaiz lienh, ngaiz gyaeng lah.”
ACT.28.21	Gyoengqde dingq le, couh doiq Baujloz naeuz: “Gvanhhih mwngz dih saeh, raeuz gaenhbaenj mbouj rox, caemh mij sou ndaej maz saenq naeuz mwngz youq Youzdaiq Saengj fatseng gijmaz saeh, caemh mij saek boux daeuj naeuz gyoengqraeuz ni naeuz mwngz miz maz mbouj ndei dih saeh. 
ACT.28.22	Hoeng, gyoengqraeuz seizneix siengj dingqdingq mwngz yawj, yawj mwngz ij miz gijmaz vah gangj, aenvih gyoengqraeuz caemh rox aen gyauqbaij neix dauqcawq cungj ngaiz vunz fanjdeiq.” 
ACT.28.23	Gajlaeng gyoengqde couh caeuq Baujloz dingh ngoenz he hwj doxcomz.
ACT.28.23	Yiengq daengz ngoenz mwnq, miz haujlai vunz bae daengz mwnq Baujloz youq hih mwnq. Baujloz daj doengxhaet daengz doengxhaemh cungj dwg doiq gyoengq vunz gangj gvanhhih guek Cangqdiq dih ndei siuhsiz. De caemh yungh Mohsih dih fazliz caeuq gij saw boux cenz gij vah Cangqdiq he ma gangj, gangj hawj gyoengq vunz sinq Yehsuh. 
ACT.28.24	Yiengq, miz hih vunz dingq le, caemh sinq lo; miz hih vunz dingq le, dauq mbouj sinq. 
ACT.28.25	Gyoengq vunz gak vunz yawjfap cungj mbouj doxdoengz, yiengq couh ij sanq lo. Gyoengq vunz ij sanq bae hih mwhde, Baujloz couh naeuz gawq he. De naeuz: “Hoenzsaenz Cangqdiq hawj Hijcaiqyaq, boux cenz gij vah Cangqdiq neix, hawj de doiq gij cojgoeng faenhsou soj gangj hih cungj dwg deng hih! 
ACT.28.26	Hoenzsaenz Cangqdiq naeuz:
ACT.28.26	Mwngz bae naeuz gij minzcuz neix ni, naeuz: ‘Faenhsou dingq le caiq dingq, hoeng, baenzlaw dingq cungj dingq mbouj rox; yawj le caiq yawj, hoeng, baenzlaw yawj cungj yawj mbouj ok.

1TH.5.3	Cingq youq mwh vunz naeuz “Sojmiz hih cungj bingzan” hih mwhde, sawqmwh nanh dawz gyoengqde, caenh luj vunzbaz daiqndang ij seng lwg hih yienghmwnq in; gij nanh neix gyoengqde mij banqfaz ndaej deuz.
1TH.5.4	Hoeng, gak boux beixnuengx hax, faenhsou mbouj dwg luj doenghheij vunz ndoj youq ndaw laep mwnq, baex daengz ngoenz Gihduz luj bouxcaeg yienghmwnq sawqmwh dauq daeuj hih mwhde, couh doeksaet,

1TH.5.6	Sojhij gyoengqraeuz mbouj wnggai luj doenghheij vunz ninz ndaek hih yienghmwnq, ij wnggai baujciz cinghsingj, daezsingj bonjfaenh, 
1TH.5.7	aenvih vunz ninz dwg youq doengxngwnz ninz; doenghgij vunz laeujgeq he dwg youq doengxngwnz laeuj fiz he. 
1TH.5.8	Yiengq, giqyienz gyoengqraeuz dwg haeuj doengxngoenz, dwg rongh hih vwz, couh wnggai baujciz singqsag, ij aeu sinq

1TH.5.10	Bouxcawj raeuz Yehsuh Gihduz vih gyoengqraeuz hwj ngaiz rai, vih dwg ij hawj gyoengqraeuz mboujguenj dwg gaenq rai hih vunz cixnaeuz dwg vanzlij lix hih vunz, cungj ndaej youq de dauq daeuj hih mwhde ndaej caeuq de itheij lix. 
1TH.5.11	Sojhij, faenhsou wnggai doxbang doxson, caemh luj faenhsou seizneix soj guh hih ityiengh.
1TH.5.12	Gak boux beixnuengx hax, gyoengqraeuz seizneix gienq faenhsou, gienq faenhsou soenhcungq doenghheij youq faenhsou mwnq guh hong dwgrengz hih vunz, couh dwg doenghheij lingjdauj faenhsou caeuq gienq son faenhsou hih vunz, 
1TH.5.13	caemh ij vih gyoengqde soj guh hih hong hwj engqgya aiq gyoengqde, yawjnaek gyoengqde, soenhgingq gyoengqde. Faenhsou caemh ij wnggai doxhuz.

2TH.1.1	Dezsajloznizgyah Singz dih gyauqveiq, couh dwg sinq Cangqdiq Bohmbwn raeuz caeuq sinq bouxcawj raeuz Yehsuh Gihduz hih faenhsou, faenhsou ndei! Gou dwg Baujloz. Gou caeuq Sihlah caeuq Dizmohdaiq sij saenq hawj faenhsou.
2TH.1.2	Muengh Cangqdiq daxboh raeuz caeuq bouxcawj raeuz Yehsuh Gihduz doiq faenhsou haijliengh, hawj faenhsou bingzan!
2TH.1.3	Gak boux beixnuengx hax, gyoengqraeuz wnggai siengzseiz vih faenhsou hwj docih Cangqdiq, aenvih faenhsou sinq 
2TH.1.4	Couh vih yienghneix, gyoengqraeuz youq Cangqdiq hih gak aen gyauqveiq cungj haenh faenhsou, haenh faenhsou youq roeb daengz sojmiz hih bwkhaih sojmiz hih nanh, hoeng, vanzlij gyenhciz naenxsim caeuq sinq 
2TH.1.5	Gij neix couh ndaej cingqmingz Cangqdiq dih gyezdingq dwg deng hih; de gaengjdingq yawj faenhsou dwg boiqndaej gaep haeuj aen guek de hih, aenvih faenhsou cingq vih aen guek de hwj souh nanh hih. 
2TH.1.6	Cangqdiq dwg goengbingz hih; de gaengjdingq hawj doenghheij vunz bwkhaih faenhsou hih souh daengz bauqwngq, 
2TH.1.7	caemh gaengjdingq hawj faenhsou doenghheij ngaiz souh daengz nanh hih ndaej caeuq gyoengqraeuz doxdoengz ndaej bingzan. Daengz mwh bouxcawj raeuz Yehsuh 
2TH.1.8	de caemh ij fad doenghheij mbouj rox de caeuq mbouj dingq gij ndei siuhsiz bouxcawj raeuz Yehsuh 
2TH.1.9	Doenghheij vunz neix gaengjdingq ij souh daengz fad, couh dwg hawj gyoengqde yungjyenj satsoq, yungjyenj mbouj ndaej dep bouxcawj raeuz caeuq mbouj ndaej miz faenh gij ak veijdaq de. 
2TH.1.10	Daengz bouxcawj raeuz dauq daeuj hih mwhmwnq, de couh ndaej youq doenghheij vunz de mwnq ndaej najrongh, ndaej hawj sojmiz sinq de hih vunz haenh de. Faenhsou caemh caeuq gyoengqde doxdoengz, aenvih faenhsou sinq gyoengqraeuz doiq faenhsou soj cenz hih gij ndei siuhsiz de.
2TH.1.11	Couh vih yienghneix, gyoengqraeuz siengzseiz bang faenhsou gouzhaenh Cangqdiq, gouz de yawj faenhsou boiqndaej de senjdingh faenhsou he, caemh gouz de nyok rengz hawj faenhsou, hawj faenhsou guh faenhsou vih sinq Cangqdiq hwj guh hih ndeisaeh. 
2TH.1.12	Yienghneix bouxcawj raeuz Yehsuh 
2TH.2.1	Gak boux beixnuengx hax, gangj daengz gvanhhih bouxcawj raeuz Yehsuh Gihduz dauq daeuj caeuq gyoengqraeuz doxraen doxcomz hih gij saeh neix, gyoengqraeuz seizneix gienq faenhsou. 
2TH.2.2	Gienq faenhsou: hauhnaeuz dingqri vunz naeuz bouxcawj raeuz gaenq dauq daeuj lo, yiengq faenhsou gaejyungh sinq, cix gaejyungh simvueng. Cungjsuenq gyoengqde naeuz dwg hoenzsaenz naeuz cixnaeuz dwg dajlaeng gyoengqraeuz ndaej dingq daengz hih siuhsiz cixnaeuz dwg daj ndaw saenq gyoengqraeuz ndaej rox he, cungj mbouj ndaej sinq. 
2TH.2.3	Mboujguenj vunz baenzlawz yaeuh faenhsou, faenhsou cungj mbouj ndaej sinq, aenvih ngoenz bouxcawj raeuz dauq daeuj cihsenz gaengjdingq ij miz vunz yiem 
2TH.2.4	De ij ok daeuj fanjdeiq sojmiz heuh cwnz he caeuq vunz cungj soenhcungq gingqbaiq he, de gag yawj bonjfaenh cauhgoq daengxheij, simqciq vanzlij gag bae naengh youq gunghdenq Cangqdiq, gag naeuz bonjfaenh de dwg Cangqdiq.
2TH.2.5	Mbouj rox hih faenhsou ndaej mbouj ndaejgeiq? Mwh gou youq faenhsou mwnq hih mwhde, gou gangj naeuz faenhsou ni goq gij saeh neix lo. 
2TH.2.6	Seizneix faenhsou caemh rox dwg guxmaz laengz de, hawj de daengz mwhde cij yienh okdaeuj. 
2TH.2.7	Gizsaed ndaek doegsieb mwnq gaenq caegcaeg gaihcij doengh fawz lo, hoeng, cijmboujgoq seizneix miz boux he laengz de; daengj daengz mbouj laengz de hih mwhde 
2TH.2.8	de couh ok daeuj lo. Hoeng, bouxcawj raeuz gaengjdingq ij yungh gij heiq bonjfaenh de ma met de; bouxcawj raeuz baex yienh myig myiengzmyiengz okdaeuj he couh cawz de.
2TH.2.9	Boux doegsieb neix ij daeuj guh gij hong Sajdanq 
2TH.2.10	gveijmaj yungh gak cungj doegsieb he ma yaeuh doenghheij cingq byaij haeuj satsoq he bae he, aenvih gyoengqde mbouj haenj gij saedsaeh ndaej gouq vunz he. 
2TH.2.11	Sojhij Cangqdiq couh hawj gyoengqde mbouj rox faenbied saedsaeh caeuq mbouj saedsaeh he gyaj he, hawj gyoengqde bae sinq doenghheij vah gyaj he, 
2TH.2.12	gajlaeng 
2TH.2.13	Yiengq gangj daengz gyoengqraeuz, cinhngaiq dih gak boux beixnuengx bouxcawj raeuz soj aiq dih vunz hax, gyoengqraeuz wnggai vih faenhsou hwj docih Cangqdiq, aenvih Cangqdiq daj gaihcij cix senjdingh faenhsou lo, vih ij hawj faenhsou ndaej baengh Hoenzsaenz de hwj ndaej guh gij vunz de, caemh hawj faenhsou sinq saedsaeh hwj ndaej gouq. 
2TH.2.14	Cangqdiq vih yienghneix hwj couh dunghgoq gyoengqraeuz soj cenz hih ndei siuhsiz hwj senj faenhsou, hawj faenhsou ndaej do gij rongh bouxcawj raeuz Yehsuh Gihduz.
2TH.2.15	Sojhij gak boux beixnuengx hax, faenhsou wnggai gyenhgyez geiq ndei souj ndei gyoengqraeuz soj son faenhsou hih, mboujguenj dwg aeu bak gangj haj cixnaeuz dwg sij saenq son, faenhsou cungj ij geiq ndei.
2TH.2.16	Muengh bouxcawj raeuz Yehsuh Gihduz, caeuq aiq gyoengqraeuz doiq gyoengqraeuz haijliengh, yungjyenj nai gyoengqraeuz, hawj gyoengqraeuz miz muengh dih Cangqdiq Bohmbwn 
2TH.2.17	gujliq faenhsou, nyok rengz hawj faenhsou, hawj faenhsou ndaej gangj gij doiq vunz miz ik caeuq guh sojmiz hih ndeisaeh.
2TH.3.1	Gak boux beixnuengx hax, gou vanzlij miz vah ij caeuq faenhsou gangj. Gou cingj faenhsou bang gyoengqraeuz gouz Cangqdiq, gouz hawj gij ndei siuhsiz de caemh ndaej luj youq faenhsou mwnq cenz bae vaiq hux vaiq, ndaej hawj vunz soenhcungq. 
2TH.3.2	Caemh gouz ndaej hawj raeuz duet ok doenghheij vunz doegsieb he, aenvih mbouj dwg bouxboux cungj sinq 
2TH.3.3	Hoeng, bouxcawj raeuz 
2TH.3.4	De vanzlij hawj gyoengqraeuz sinq faenhsou, sinq faenhsou ciuq gyoengqraeuz soj raengq hih yienghmwnq bae guh, caemh dwg giqcuz ciuq guh roengzbae. 
2TH.3.5	Muengh bouxcawj raeuz daiq faenhsou, hawj faenhsou ndaej luj Cangqdiq yienghmwnq miz aiqsim, luj Gihduz yienghmwnq gyenhciz naenxsim.
2TH.3.6	Gak boux beixnuengx hax, seizneix gyoengqraeuz hij gij mingzhiq bouxcawj raeuz Yehsuh Gihduz ma mingqlingq faenhsou: mboujguenj boux beixnuengxlawz laengzlaengz saengjsaengj mbouj guh gijmaz, mbouj soenhsouj gyoengqraeuz soj son hih, faenhsou couh ij liz gyoengqde, mbouj dep gyoengqde. 
2TH.3.7	Faenhsou caemh gag rox ij baenzlaw hag gyoengqraeuz, aenvih gyoengqraeuz youq faenhsou mwnq hih mwhde gaenhbaenj mbouj caeggyik, 
2TH.3.8	caemh mij begbeg gw vunz hoengq, dauq dwg ngwnzngoenz dwgrengz guh hong, gag ciengx bonjfaenh lah, vih mbouj hawj faenhsou fuqswz gyoengqraeuz dih saenghhoz. 
2TH.3.9	Gizsaed, gyoengqraeuz yienghneix guh gaenhbaenj mbouj dwg naeuz gyoengqraeuz mij'z gienz laeng faenhsou aeu gijmaz, dauq dwg ij guh ndei bangjyangq hwj hawj faenhsou hag lah.
2TH.3.10	Gyoengqraeuz youq faenhsou mwnq hih mwhde, gyoengqraeuz gaenq raengq faenhsou goq, naeuz, hauhnaeuz miz vunz mbouj haenj guh hong nex, couh mbouj ndaej gw haeux, 
2TH.3.11	aenvih gyoengqraeuz dingq naeuz faenhsou mwnq miz hih vunz ijsiengj gw ndei youqlag gyekgyek, caiq ijsiengj guenj henzsaeh. 
2TH.3.12	Gyoengqraeuz seizneix caemh hij gij mingzhiq bouxcawj raeuz Yehsuh Gihduz ma mingqlingq doenghgij vunz neix, ij simdingh roengzma, gag guh gag gw. 
2TH.3.13	Gangj daengz faenhsou gak boux beixnuengx hax, faenhsou ij gyenhciz guh ndeisaeh, mbouj ndaej doeknaiq.
2TH.3.14	Yiengq, hauhnaeuz miz vunz mbouj dingq fung saenq gyoengqraeuz soj sij hih vah hih, ij cuqhiq daezfuengz de, mbouj gaen de, mbouj caeuq de miz laizvangj, hawj de gag roxnginh nyaenq. 
2TH.3.15	Hoeng, cijmboujgoq mbouj ndaej dawz de dangq boux dizyinz faenhsou, dauq ij doiq de luj doiq boux beixnuengx he yienghmwnq gienq de.
2TH.3.16	Muengh hawj vunz miz bingzan dih bouxcawj

1TI.1.4	caeuq naeuz gyoengqde mbouj hawj gyoengqde doiq doenghgij gojgaeq doenghbaez he caeuq doenghheij gyabouh raez rangxrangh he maezgae, aenvih doenghgij neix cungj dwg cauh hawj vunz doxeuq, gaenhbaenj mbouj ndaej bang vunz hawj vunz ciuq Cangqdiq dih giqvaq ma guh. Hoeng, gij giqvaq neix dwg gauq sinq 
1TI.1.5	Couh dwg naeuz hawj mwngz naeuz doenghheij vunz neix dih muzdiz dwg hawj vunz doxaiq. Gij aiq neix wnggai dwg daj ndaw sim vunz mij'z coih he caeuq dwg mbouj miz gijmaz doiq mbouj hwnj liengzsim he caeuq dwg miz caensim sinqsim he. 
1TI.1.6	Hoeng hojsik miz hih vunz bienq sim lo, mbouj miz aen sim yienghneix lo, dauq bae gangj rumz gangj rengx, gangj doenghgij mij'z yungh he. 
1TI.1.7	Gyoengqde siengj guh 
1TI.1.8	Gyoengqraeuz rox, fazliz baenjlaiz dwg deng hih, cijaeu vunz yungh ndaej cingqdangq. 
1TI.1.9	Gyoengqraeuz caemh rox, fazliz mbouj dwg laeb hawj doenghgij vunz ndei he, dauq dwg laeb hawj doenghgij vunz nga'ngangq mbouj dingq vah, famh coih mbouj gingqbaiq Cangqdiq, yawjnaek aen nienzdaiq neix, mbouj siengj guh gij hab'eiq habhoz Cangqdiq he, gaj vunz gaj bohmeh, 
1TI.1.10	ndaengndwet, vunzsai caeuq vunzsai, hai vunz, gangj gyajvah, guh gyaj cingqgiq, caeuq doenghheij veizfanj ciuq gij saedsaeh Cangqdiq son vunz hih vunz laeb hih lah. 
1TI.1.11	Gij saedsaeh neix dwg ciuq wnggai haenh hih najrongh hih Cangqdiq cenz hawj gou dih ndei siuhsiz ma gangj hih.
1TI.1.12	Gou docih nyok bonjsaeh hawj gou hih bouxcawj raeuz Yehsuh Gihduz, aenvih de yawj gou dwg boux sinq ndaej goq lauxsaed he dih vunz, de baij gou swqhaeuh de. 
1TI.1.13	Gannaeuz gaxgonq gou gangj vah daekcoih de, bwkhaih gyauqveiq goq, caemh dwg boux doegdoeg siebsieb hih vunz he lah, hoeng, Cangqdiq ciuqyiengh aiq gou mbouj yiem gou, aenvih mwhde gou mbouj sinq de, mbouj rox bonjfaenh guh gijmaz, sojhij cij guh doenghgij saeh ya'mboujlw neix. 
1TI.1.14	Mbouj danhcij naeuz yienghneix, bouxcawj raeuz Yehsuh Gihduz vanzlij doiq gou haijliengh raixcaix, hawj gou ndaej sinq de caeuq ndaej miz aiqsim.
1TI.1.15	Yehsuh Gihduz daeuj lajmbwn guh vunz dwg vih ij gouq gij vunz famh coih he; gawq vah neix dwg deng hih mbouj loek hih, hoeng, gou cingq dwg doenghgij vunz famh coih ndaw de dih boux ceiq vaih he. 
1TI.1.16	Caemh dwg vih yienghneix hwj Yehsuh Gihduz doiq gou haijliengh raixcaix; yienghneix de couh ndaej youq gwnz ndang ceiq vaih hih gou yienh ok de miz naenxsim raixcaix he, caemh ndaej hawj doenghgij vunz baezneix ij daeuj sinq de he, ndaej seiqseiz lix he, rox daengz gyoengqde caeuq gou doxdoengz caemh ndaej miz muengh.
1TI.1.17	Muengh soenhgingq najrongh cungj gvi hawj Cangqdiq; Cangqdiq dwg seiqseiz lix mbouj rox rai, aeu ra ma yawj mbouj raen, caenhgag de cij dwg vuengz cij dwg Cangqdiq he! Ahmaenz.

2TI.1.4	Gou baex ngeix daengz gou caeuq mwngz doxbiek hih mwhde mwngz riuz raemxra, gou couh ngwnzngoenz cungj siengj vaiqdi ndaej raen daengz mwngz, ndaej raen mwngz ndaej hawj gou sim'angq.
2TI.1.5	Gou rox mwngz cungj dwg cingqcaen sinq 
2TI.1.6	Sojhij gou daezsingj mwngz, mwngz ij dawz Cangqdiq dunghgoq gij fawz gou oemj fawz hawj mwngz goq hih gij bonjsaeh mwnq caiq hwng hwnjdaeuj, 
2TI.1.7	aenvih Cangqdiq nyok hawj raeuz hih mbouj dwg lau fixfih hih sim, dauq dwg mbeihung miz vi miz rengz, miz aiq, ndaej gag guh gag guenj hih sim lah.
2TI.1.8	Sojhij, mwngz mbouj ndaej vih guh bouxcawj raeuz dih cingqyinz hwj roxnginh saetnaj saetnyaenq, caemh mbouj ndaej yawj gou vih de hwj ngaiz gyaeng hih roxnginh saetnaj saetnyaenq, dauq ij caeuq gou baengh Cangqdiq dih rengz vih cenz Cangqdiq dih ndei siuhsiz hwj itheij souh nanh cij deng. 
2TI.1.9	Cangqdiq gouq gyoengqraeuz, senj gyoengqraeuz mbouj dwg naeuz yawj gyoengqraeuz miz guh gijmaz ndeisaeh hih, dauq dwg ciuq gij cawjeiq de caeuq de dih haijliengh lah. Gij haijliengh neix, dwg de youq mijyaengz cauh mbwn cauh deih mwhde, de cix gyezdingq dunghgoq Yehsuh Gihduz ma hwj doiq gyoengqraeuz haijliengh lo, 
2TI.1.10	hoeng, daengz seizneix, boux gouq raeuz hih Yehsuh Gihduz daeuj lajmbwn guh vunz le cij yienh okdaeuj lah. De gaenq hawj vunz mbouj caiq rox rai haem lo; de cenz gij ndei siuhsiz hwj dawz mbouj rox rai hih mingh yienh okdaeuj lo.
2TI.1.11	Gou dwg vih gij ndei siuhsiz neix hwj baij daeuj guh boux cenzgangj gij saedsaeh Cangqdiq he, guh boux dwzbaijyienz caeuq guh boux lauxsae he. 
2TI.1.12	Sojhij gou dwg vih gij neix hwj souh daengz nanh, hoeng, gou mbouj raen saetnaj hah, aenvih gou rox gou sinq hih dwg byawz, caemh sinq de ndaej baujhuq de soj gyau hawj gou hih,
2TI.1.13	Mwngz ij geiq ndei gou soj son mwngz hih, caemh ij ciuq gou soj son mwngz hih ma son vunz, caemh ij baengh Yehsuh Gihduz caeuq de nyok hawj mwngz dih aiq hwj ma son vunz. 
2TI.1.14	Caemh ij baengh youq ndaw sim raeuz dih Hoenzsaenz Cangqdiq, souj ndei de gyau hawj mwngz hih gij dijbauj mwnq.
2TI.1.15	Mwngz caemh rox, youq Yaqsiqyaq yienzlaiz gij vunz gaen gou he ceng mbouj geijlai sojmiz hih vunz cungj yiem gou; daiqlienz Feihgizluq caeuq Hwzmohgizniz cungj dwg. 
2TI.1.16	Hoeng Anizswzfuz 
2TI.1.17	dauq dwg de baex daengz Lozmaj he couh dauqcawq bae cimh gou, caemh dwg cimh daengz raen veizcij. 
2TI.1.18	Mwngz caemh rox, de youq Hijfuzsoj bang gou haujlai. Muengh bouxcawj raeuz dauq daeuj hih mwhde hojsik de!
2TI.2.1	Lwg gou Dizmohdaiq hax, mwngz ij baengh Yehsuh Gihduz dih haijliengh hwj gyenhgyangz hwnjdaeuj. 
2TI.2.2	Gaxgonq mwngz youq dangqnaj haujlai cingqyinz dingq gou cenzgangj goq 
2TI.2.3	Mwngz caemh ij luj Yehsuh Gihduz dih boux bing ndei he yienghmwnq caeuq gou doengz souh nanh. 
2TI.2.4	Dang bing hih vunz mbouj ndaej hawj gizdah saeh gaz dawz, yiengq cij ndaej hawj gywnhguenh haenjheiq. 
2TI.2.5	Caemh doxdoengz, ywnqdungqyienz bijcaiq bietdingh ij soenhsouj bijcaiq dih gveihswz, yienghmwnq cij ndaej hingz, ndaej cangjliq. 
2TI.2.6	Vunz dwgrengz sinhoj dajgeng dajndaem couh wnggai sien ndaej. 
2TI.2.7	Mwngz ij wnggai ngeixngeix gou soj gangj hih vah, aenvih Cangqdiq gaengjdingq bang mwngz, hawj mwngz rox sojmiz hih.
2TI.2.8	Mwngz ijaeu ndaejgeiq boux daj rai ndaej dauqlix dih Yehsuh Gihduz; de dwg Daqveiq dih lwglan. Gij neix couh dwg gou soj cenzgangj hih ndei siuhsiz lo. 
2TI.2.9	Gou vih cenz gij ndei siuhsiz neix hwj ngaiz souh nanh, simqciq ngaiz luj vunzfamh yienghmwnq ngaiz goenj ngaiz gyaeng. Hoeng, mboujguenj baenzlawz, Cangqdiq dih ndei siuhsiz ciuqyiengh gyaeng mbouj ndaej. 
2TI.2.10	Vih yienghneix, gou nyienh'eiq vih gij vunz Cangqdiq senj okdaeuj he hwj souh sojmiz hih nanh, hawj gyoengqde ndaej sinq Yehsuh Gihduz hwj ndaej gouq caeuq ndaej seiqseiz najrongh.
2TI.2.11	Sojhij, gou saedsaeh naeuz mwngz ni, duenh vah laj neix dwg saedsaeh hih, sinq ndaej goq hih, couh dwg:
2TI.2.11	Hauhnaeuz gyoengqraeuz caeuq Yehsuh Gihduz doengz rai,
2TI.2.11	Gyoengqraeuz caemh caeuq de doengz lix lo.
2TI.2.12	Hauhnaeuz gyoengqraeuz gyenhciz sinq de mbouj doeknaiq,
2TI.2.12	Gyoengqraeuz couh ndaej caeuq de dang vuengz lo.
2TI.2.12	Yiengq, caiq hauhnaeuz gyoengqraeuz mbouj nginh de nex,
2TI.2.12	De caemh mbouj nginh raeuz lo.
2TI.2.13	Hoeng, cungjsuenq naeuz gyoengqraeuz sinq mbouj goq,
2TI.2.13	De ciuqyiengh sinq ndaej goq,
2TI.2.13	Aenvih de dwg de, gangj vah gw vah he.
2TI.2.14	Mwngz ij youq dangqnaj Cangqdiq daezsingj gyoengq vunzlai, raengq gyoengqde mbouj ndaej vih gawq saw he hwj doxceng; yienghmwnq doiq gij vunz dingq he mij'z yungh, dauq miz haih hih. 
2TI.2.15	Mwngz wnggai luj boux gunghyinz ndei he mbouj miz gijmaz saetnaj he hwj hawj goeng lauxbanj hab'eiq, ij cwnqliengq guh daengz hab'eiq habhoz Cangqdiq hih vunz, gaijyiz gij saedsaeh Cangqdiq gaijyiz ndaej deng, ndaej cwnj. 
2TI.2.16	Mwngz mbouj ndaej gaen doenghheij gangj vah rumz vah rengx he hwj mbouj dawz haeuj rwz Cangqdiq, aenvih gangj rumz gangj rengx hih vunz, yied gangj yied hawj vunz bienqbaenz mbouj dawz haeuj rwz Cangqdiq he. 
2TI.2.17	Gij vah gyoengqde cenz bae cienfanh vaiq he, yied cenz yied gvangq, caemh luj baeznok yienghmwnq yied naeuh yied gvangq.
2TI.2.17	Doenghheij vunz neix ndaw de couh miz Hijmijnaij caeuq Feihlijduz song boux neix. 
2TI.2.18	Gyoengqde liz saedsaeh, yiem saedsaeh, naeuz gijmaz dauqlix hih saeh gaenq goq lo, guh hwj miz hih vunz sinqsim cungj fouz fedfed mbouj dingh lo.
2TI.2.19	Hoeng, Cangqdiq dih saedsaeh couh luj hauxranz yienghmwnq gaenj dwtdwt, it di cungj mbouj doengh; gwnz de dik miz: “Cangqdiq rox doenghgij vunz de” caeuq: “Famz gaep haeuj Cangqdiq hih vunz cungj mbouj wnggai guh doenghgij doegsieb he.”
2TI.2.20	Youq doenghheij ndaw ranz vunz fouq he mbouj danhcij naeuz miz aen gim aen ngaenz coux doxgaiq he, vanzlij miz doengh aen faex he, aen vax he; miz hih dwg dijbauj hih, miz hih dwg yaqyuij hih. 
2TI.2.21	Yiengq caemh doxdoengz, hauhnaeuz byawz siengj hawj bouxcawj yawjdij nex, couh ij gag caepcingq bonjfaenh, mbouj cimyex doenghgij saeh doegsieb he, yienghmwnq cij ndaej daengz bouxcawj de baij de guh gak cungj saeh ndei.
2TI.2.22	Mwngz mbouj ndaej luj doenghheij hauxseng rangz mwnq mbouj rox naenxsim, siengj guh gijmaz couh guh gijmaz. Wnggai gaen doenghheij vunz caensim gingqbaiq Cangqdiq he guh vunz simndei simsoh he, miz aen sim sinq 
2TI.2.23	Doenghheij mij'z yungh hih doxeuq, mwngz gaejyungh cimyex haeujbae, aenvih mwngz rox doxeuq ndaej bienqbaenz doxceng. 
2TI.2.24	Guh bouxhoiq Yehsuh hih, mbouj ndaej doxceng; doiq vunz wnggai ngeihheiq swnh semxsemh, rox son vunz, rox naenxsim. 
2TI.2.25	Caemh wnggai swnh semxsemh hwj naeuz gij vunz fanjdeiq mwngz he; yienghmwnq saekseiz Cangqdiq lij hawj gyoengqde miz gihveiq gaijgoq, hawj gyoengqde rox saedsaeh, 
2TI.2.26	hawj doenghheij vunz fanjdeiq mwngz ngaiz fangzvuengz gaemh dawz bae ciuq fangzvuengz bae guh hih, hawj gyoengqde ndaej singqsag goqdaeuj, ndaej duet ok ndaw fawz fangzvuengz.
2TI.3.1	Mwngz ijaeu rox, aen seiqgyaiq neix hih duenh gajlaeng he gaengjdingq ij miz nanh.

2TI.3.3	mbouj miz aiqsim, mbouj rox nyiuz vunz, haenj doeng gangj sae gangj vunz vaihvah, mbouj rox naenxsim, doegdoeg siebsieb, mbouj haenj gij ndei he, 
2TI.3.4	cuzmaiq baengzyoux, haenj guxmaz couh guxmaz, gag naemqnaeuz bonjfaenh ak raixcaix, caenh haenj yangjcouq mbouj haenj Cangqdiq. 
2TI.3.5	Gyoengqde gyajcang yawjnaek Cangqdiq sinq Cangqdiq; gizsaed gyoengqde gaenhbaenj mbouj dawz haeuj rwz de, mbouj sinq de. Luj doengh gyoengq vunz neix, mwngz mbouj ndaej cimyex haeuj bae.
2TI.3.6	Gyoengqde miz mbangj hih vunz cungj haenj ndonj ranz dawz ranz, conghbak gyoengqde caemh rox ndau, ndau hwj ndaej gaemhanh doenghheij vunzbaz miz coih gaz dawz he, mij'z maz daezfuengz, ngaiz gak cungj siengjmuengh guenjciq he. 
2TI.3.7	Doenghheij vunzbaz neix, gannaeuz gyoengqde siengzseiz ijsiengj hag lah, hoeng cungj hag mbouj rox gij saedsaeh Cangqdiq. 
2TI.3.8	Gyoengq vunz neix fanjdeiq saedsaeh, caemh luj doenghbaez hih Yajniz caeuq Yangzbiq
2TI.3.9	Hoeng, gyoengqde cangjyangz mbouj geijlwh caez lo, caemh luj song boux mwnq gij haexnyangj gyoengqde gaengjdingq ij ngaiz loh okdaeuj.
2TI.3.10	Dizmohdaiq hax, mwngz gaenq rox gou baenzlaw son vunz, baenzlaw guh, miz maz muzbiuh hah, caemh rox gou dih sinqsim, naenxsim, aiqsim, mbouj doeknaiq. 
2TI.3.11	Mwngz caemh rox gou youq Anhdizah hah, Hijgohnenq hah, caeuq Luqswhdwz hah soj souh daengz hih bwkhaih, souh daengz hih nanh, gou baenzlawz naenxsim, caeuq Cangqdiq baenzlaw gouq gou hah; doenghgij neix, mwngz cungj rox. 
2TI.3.12	Gizsaed mwngz caemh wnggai rox, famz siengj gaen Yehsuh Gihduz hwj guh hab'eiq habhoz Cangqdiq dih vunz cungj ij ngaiz souh daengz bwkhaih. 
2TI.3.13	Hoeng, doenghheij guh doeg guh sieb, coemx vunz hih vunz yied ngoenz yied doeg; gyoengqde yaeuh vunz, caemh ij ngaiz vunz yaeuh gyoengqde.
2TI.3.14	Dizmohdaiq hax, mwngz ij ciuq mwngz soj hag soj sinq hih yienghmwnq ma guh roengzbae, aenvih mwngz rox mwngz dwg gaen byawz hag he, 
2TI.3.15	caiq gyacangq mwngz caemh rox mwngz daj lij iq cix sug Singqgingh lo. Gij Singqgingh neix ndaej hawj vunz singqsag goqdaeuj hwj sinq Yehsuh Gihduz hwj ndaej gouq. 
2TI.3.16	Singqgingh ndaw de dih moix it gawq cungj dwg Hoenzsaenz Cangqdiq daezsingj hawj sij he. 2TI.3.17	hawj gij vunz gvi haeuj Cangqdiq he ndaej guh ndei cwnjbiq hwj guh gak cungj saeh ndei.
2TI.4.1	Gou youq dangqnaj Cangqdiq caeuq dangqnaj Yehsuh Gihduz, boux ij dauq daeuj lajmbwn guh vuengz saemjbuenq vunzrai caeuq vunzlix hih boux neix, mingqlingq mwngz, 
2TI.4.2	mingqlingq mwngz ij cenzgangj Cangqdiq dih ndei siuhsiz, mboujguenj seizlaw, fung mbouj fungbienh, caemh ij naiqsim bihbingz vunz, naeuz vunz, gienq vunz; mboujguenj guxmaz cungj ij son aeu. 
2TI.4.3	Gou yienghneix naeuz dwg aenvih cungj ij miz ngoenz he, gij vunz mbouj caiq haenj dingq gij saedsaeh Cangqdiq, dauq ciuq bonjfaenh haenj gijmaz couh guh gijmaz, siengj baenzlaw couh baenzlaw hwj bae cimh doenghheij lauxsae cij rox gangj gij vah gyoengqde haenj dingq he. 
2TI.4.4	Gyoengqde caet rwz mbouj dingq gij vah saedsaeh he, dauq bae dingq doenghgij vah boq ien he. 
2TI.4.5	Hoeng, mboujguenj guxmaz, mwngz cungj ij singqsag, mbouj lau souh nanh, gyenhciz guh gij hong cenzgangj Cangqdiq dih ndei siuhsiz, caensim guh ndei gij hong Cangqdiq.
2TI.4.6	Hoeng, gou nej, gou couh luj gij laeuj dajbwiz he couh ij raix okbae lo; gou couh ij caeuq aen seiqgyaiq neix doxbiek lo. 
2TI.4.7	Gou dih saenghhoz caemh luj ywnqdungqyienz bijcaiq; gou gaenq camhgyah ciengz bijcaiq mwnq lo, caiq caemh ndaej ndei caemh caiq sat lo. Couh dwg naeuz gou baenxseiq cungj caensim swqhaeuh Cangqdiq he. 
2TI.4.8	Youq gwnzmbwn gaenq cwnjbiq cangjbyimj ij hawj gou lo, couh dwg hawj gij vunz simndei simsoh he. Gij cangjbyimj neix dwg boux ndwn ndaej cingq saemjbuenq vunz hih bouxcawj raeuz soengq hawj he, dwg de dauq daeuj hih ngoenz mwnq soengq hawj hih. Mbouj danhcij naeuz soengq hawj gou, vanzlij ij soengq hawj sojmiz muengh de dauq daeuj hih vunz.
2TI.4.9	Dizmohdaiq hax, cingj mwngz vaiqdi daeuj laeng gou dineix, 
2TI.4.10	aenvih Dijmaj dam yangjcouq aen nienzdaiq neix hih gak cungj hwj mbouj gaen gou, gag bae daengz Dezsajloznizgyah lo. Lij miz Gwzlwzswq, de 
2TI.4.11	Seizneix lij gag Luqgyah boux dog youq henz ndang gou gaen gou laem lo. Gou naeuz, mwngz daeuj gou dineix nex, mwngz ij daiq Majgoj daeuj, aenvih de ndaej bang gou guh gij hong Cangqdiq hwj. 
2TI.4.12	Gou gaenq baij Deihgihguj bae Hijfuzsoj lo. 
2TI.4.13	Vanzlij miz, mwngz daeuj nex, ij dawz diuz buh baixrog gou daeuj hawj gou, couh dwg mwh gou youq Dwzlozyaq youq ndaw ranz Gyahbuq youq hih mwhde coengq he. Mwngz caemh ij dawz doenghheij saw mwnq daeuj hawj gou, dwzbez dwg geij gienj aeu naeng yiengz ma guh he.
2TI.4.14	Vanzlij miz, Yaqlizcanhdaq goeng cangh dajdiz doengz neix haih gou cienfanh youqgaenj he, hoeng, Cangqdiq caemh ij ciuq de soj guh hih bauqwngq hawj de. 
2TI.4.15	Mwngz ij siujsim de, aenvih de fanjdeiq gyoengqraeuz soj cenzgangj hih, fanjdeiq youqgaenj raixcaix.
2TI.4.16	Mwh gou daixit mbat, 
2TI.4.17	Gannaeuz mwhde bouxboux cungj yiem gou lah, hoeng, Cangqdiq mbouj yiem gou; de ndwn youq henz ndang gou nyok rengz hawj gou, hawj gou mbeihung hwj ndaej dawz ndei siuhsiz cingcing sujsuj hih cenzgangj naeuz haujlai linghvaih minzcuz hih vunz ni. De vanzlij gouq gou luj daj conghbak duz guk
2TI.4.18	Gou sinq Cangqdiq gaengjdingq gouq gou, hawj gou ndaej duet ok sojmiz doegsieb he, daiq gou hwnj gwnzmbwn aen guek de bae. Muengh najrongh yungjyenj cungj gvi hawj de! Ahmaenz.
2TI.4.19	Dizmohdaiq hax, cingj mwngz bang gou cam Bwzgihlah caeuq Yaqgihlah ndei, caemh cam Anizswzfuz cenz ranz ndei.
2TI.4.20	Vanzlij miz, gou naeuz mwngz ni, Hijlahduh youq Gohlimzdoh youq lo. Lij miz Dwzlozfeihmoh, de bingh lo; gou couh hawj de louz youq Mijliqduh youq lo. 
2TI.4.21	Gou cingj mwngz vaiqdi ganj youq haeuj doeng cihsenz daeuj daengz gou dineix.
2TI.4.21	Youq dineix hih Youjbuqloz hah, Buqdenz hah, Liqnuz hah, Gwzlaujdijyaq hah, caeuq baenx gyoengq beixnuengx cungj cam mwngz ndei.
2TI.4.22	Muengh bouxcawj raeuz

TIT.1.5	Gou gaxgonq hawj mwngz louz youq Gwzlijdwz Dauj youq, muzdiz dwg ij hawj mwngz guh doenghgij hong mijyaengz guh liux he, caemh ij hawj mwngz ciuq gou raengq hih youq gak aen singz senj gyauqveiq lingjdauj. 
TIT.1.6	Yiengq senj gyauqveiq lingjdauj, boux de bietdingh ij dwg mij maz diudik he, caemh dwg caenhgag gaen mehyah bonjfaenh, mij gaen goq vunz he.
TIT.1.7	Aenvih gyoengqde dwg bouxhoiq Cangqdiq, dwg gyenhduz gyauqveiq he, yiengq couh bietdingh ij dwg boux mij'z maz diudik he, mbouj gyauhngauq, mbouj yungzheih aeuqheiq, mbouj yinx gw laeuj, dwgcaengz doxdub, mbouj dam cienzcaiz, 
TIT.1.8	haenj daih hek, haenj ndeisaeh, gag caepcingq bonjfaenh, guh saeh gangj vah ndwn ndaej cingq, yawjnaek Cangqdiq, rox naenxsim, 
TIT.1.9	caemh ij gyenhciz sinq gij siuhsiz sinq ndaej goq he, hab gij saedsaeh Cangqdiq he. Yienghneix couh ndaej ciuq gij saedsaeh Cangqdiq ma gienq vunz, caemh ndaej buekhingz doenghheij vunz fanjdeiq he, 
TIT.1.10	aenvih miz haujlai vunz fanjdeiq gij saedsaeh Cangqdiq, haenj gangj vah rumz vah rengx, yaeuh vunz, dwzbez dwg doenghheij vunz naeuz bietdingh ij gozlij cij ndaej gouq hih doenghheij vunz mwnq engqgya.
TIT.1.11	Mwngz bietdingh ij sujcij doenghheij vunz neix, mbouj hawj gyoengqde gangj rumz gangj rengx. Gyoengqde vih dam cienzcaiz hwj son doenghgij mbouj wnggai son he, guh hwj miz haujlai gya sim cungj mbouj dingh lo. 
TIT.1.12	Cingq luj Gwzlijdwz Dauj dih bouxsien he naeuz goq naeuz: “Gwzlijdwz Dauj dih vunz cungj dwg gangj gyajvah he, cungj dwg doegsieb, cix dam gw cix gyik.”

HEB.12.12	Sojhij, faenhsou ijaeu miz singjsaenz cengqgengz yingx gij fawz mij'z rengz faenhsou hwnjdaeuj, ndwn soh gij ha naet faenhsou, 
HEB.12.13	caemh ij coih bingz diuz roen dangqnaj faenhsou, yienghneix couh ndaej hawj gij vunz ha vaij he mbouj ngaiz laemx, dauqfanj ndaej giengz ndei hwnjdaeuj.
HEB.12.14	Gou naeuz faenhsou hax, faenhsou wnggai cwnqliengq caeuq vunz doxhuz, caemh ij goq cungj saenghhoz hab'eiq habhoz Cangqdiq he, aenvih hauhnaeuz mbouj goq cungj saenghhoz hab'eiq habhoz Cangqdiq he nex, couh mbouj ndaej raen Cangqdiq lo.
