HEB.13.1	Faenhsou ij wnggai siengzseiz doxaiq luj caencik beixnuengx yienghmwnq doxaiq. 
HEB.13.2	Ij caensim caen'eiq daih hek, aenvih miz hih vunz couh dwg yienghneix guh hwj engq ndaej daih daengz bouxcai Cangqdiq. 
HEB.13.3	Faenhsou ijaeu ngeix daengz doenghheij ngaiz gyaeng youq ndaw lauz hih vunz, gvansim gyoengqde caemh luj gvansim bonjfaenh faenhsou, caenh lujnaeuz faenhsou caemh ngaiz gyaeng yienghmwnq; caemh ij ngeix daengz doenghheij vunz ngaiz bwkhaih he, gvansim gyoengqde caemh luj gvansim bonjfaenh faenhsou, caenh lujnaeuz faenhsou caemh ngaiz vunz bwkhaih yienghmwnq.
HEB.13.4	Faenhsou daixgya cungj ij soenhcungq vwnhyenh; gvanjbaz dih ndaek cungj gvanhaeh mwnq mbouj ndaej boqvaiq, aenvih guh doenghgij ndaengndwet guhyoux hih vunz gaengjdingq ngaiz Cangqdiq saemjbuenq.
HEB.13.5	Faenhsou caemh mbouj ndaej dam cienzcaiz; ij wnggai doiq bonjfaenh soj miz hih rox gaeuq, aenvih Cangqdiq naeuz goq naeuz:
HEB.13.5	Gou yungjyenj mbouj liz faenhsou vwt faenhsou.
HEB.13.6	Sojhij gyoengqraeuz wnggai mbeihung hwj naeuz: “Cangqdiq dwg bang gou hih; gou gaengjdingq mbouj lau. Vunz cix ij dawz gou baenzlaw yiengh bae?”
HEB.13.7	Faenhsou caemh ijaeu ngeix daengz doenghbaez daiq faenhsou, cenz gij vah Cangqdiq naeuz faenhsou ni hih vunz; ij hag gyoengqde miz sinqsim, louzsim gyoengqde baenxseiq vunz dwg baenzlaw saenghhoz, dwg baenzlaw ndaej doiq vunz miz ik. 
HEB.13.8	 Yehsuh Gihduz; de mboujguenj seizlawz, ngoenzlwenz cixnaeuz ngoenzneix cixnaeuz daengz yungjyenj, cungj dwg doxdoengz.
HEB.13.9	Faenhsou mbouj ndaej gaen 
HEB.13.10	Hoeng, gyoengqraeuz miz aen daiz dajbwiz he, 
HEB.13.11	Yienzlaiz ciuq gij gveihdingq gaeuq, goengjsae dajbwiz daeuzdaeuz ij gaj doenghduz hwj dawz gij lwed de ma dangq guh gij dajbwiz hwj bae daengz cangqbungz Cangqdiq bwiz cueg coih; lij duz de, ij youq rog yingz coemh. 
HEB.13.12	Caemh doxdoengz, Yehsuh caemh dwg rai youq rog; de yungh gij lwed bonjfaenh de ma hawj vunz bienqbaenz mij'z coih. 
HEB.13.13	Yienghneix gyoengqraeuz caemh wnggai ok rog singz bae cimh de, caeuq de itheij ngaiz souh daengz vunz nyoegnyamx, 
HEB.13.14	aenvih aen seiqgyaiq neix mbouj miz aen singz yungjyenj dwg aen gyoengqraeuz he; gyoengqraeuz seizneix cingq muengh daengj aen singz yungjyenj mwnq nex.
HEB.13.15	Gyoengqraeuz wnggai dunghgoq Yehsuh Gihduz hwj siengzseiz yungh haenh ma bwiz hawj Cangqdiq, couh dwg naeuz yungh conghbak raeuz ma gangj, nginh de baenxlai ndei. 
HEB.13.16	Gyoengqraeuz caemh mbouj ndaej lumz guh ndeisaeh caeuq bang vunz, aenvih yienghneix guh couh dangq gij dajbwiz Cangqdiq haenjheiq he.
HEB.13.17	Faenhsou caemh ij dingq doenghheij daiq faenhsou he, ij ciuq gij vah gyoengqde bae guh, aenvih gyoengqde dwg hen caeuq baujhuq gij hoenzsaenz faenhsou he, caemh dwg ij 
HEB.13.18	Ceiqhaeuq, cingj faenhsou bang gyoengqraeuz gouzhaenh Cangqdiq bax! Aenvih gyoengqraeuz gag rox gyoengqraeuz soj guh hih cungj dwg doiq ndaej hwnj liengzsim hih; gyoengqraeuz caemh muengh gyoengqraeuz guh saeh guh ndaej deng. 
HEB.13.19	Youq dineix, gou engqgya dwzbez cingj faenhsou bang gou gouz Cangqdiq, gouz de hawj gou ndaej vaiqdi maj faenhsou mwnq.
HEB.13.20	Muengh nyok bingzan dih Cangqdiq, couh dwg boux dunghgoq gij lwed laeb gij baujcingq yungjyenj mbouj bienq hih ma hawj veijdaq dih bouxcawj raeuz Yehsuh boux ciengx yiengz neix daj rai ndaej dauqlix dih Cangqdiq, 
HEB.13.21	muengh de nyok hawj faenhsou soj ij yungh hih gij ndei he, hawj faenhsou ndaej ciuq gij cawjeiq de bae guh. Caemh muengh de dunghgoq Yehsuh Gihduz dih rengz hwj youq gwnz ndang faenhsou guh de soj haenj hih saeh. Muengh najrongh yungjyenj gvi hawj de! Ahmaenz.
HEB.13.22	Gak boux beixnuengx hax, gou gyenjdanh sij fung saenq mbouj daiq raez neix; gou cingj faenhsou naiqsim yawj ndaw de gou doiq faenhsou dih gujliq.
HEB.13.23	Gou siengj hawj faenhsou rox Dizmohdaiq boux beixnuengx gyoengqraeuz, de gaenq ndaej coengq okma lo. Hauhnaeuz de ndaej daeuj daengz gou dineix vaiq nex, gou couh caeuq de itheij bae faenhsou mwnq yawj faenhsou.

HEB.13.25	Muengh Cangqdiq doiq faenhsou daixgya haijliengh! Ahmaenz.
JAS.1.1	Gou dwg Yajgoz, dwg bouxhoiq Cangqdiq, caemh dwg bouxhoiq bouxcawj raeuz Yehsuh Gihduz; faensanq youq gak dieg hih cibngeih aen cuz 
JAS.1.2	Gak boux beixnuengx hax, faenhsou roeb daengz gak cungj gaujniemq hih, ij wnggai nginh dwg gienh saeh ndei he hwj sim'angq; 
JAS.1.3	faenhsou wnggai rox, dunghgoq gaujniemq faenhsou sinq 
JAS.1.4	Hoeng, faenhsou ij rox gyenhciz roengzbae, cij ndaej guh daengz mij maz diudik, cibcukcib ndei he.
JAS.1.5	Hauhnaeuz faenhsou miz byawz mbouj coengjmingz geijlai hih, couh wnggai gouz Cangqdiq. Gouz le, de couh nyok coengjmingz hawj faenhsou lo, aenvih de mbouj gvaiq vunz gouz de; de haenjheiq nyok hawj vunz lailai. 
JAS.1.6	Cijaeu faenhsou miz sinqsim bae gouz, mbouj ngeiz

JAS.1.9	Gungzndangj hih beixnuengx hax, wnggai angq, aenvih faenhsou

JAS.1.11	gyangjngoenz ok daeuj cik, nywj caemh reuq, va caemh loenq. Caemh doxdoengz, boux fouqmiz hih, youq de lauh ngaenz hih mwhde, caemh luj yienghneix gajlaeng caemh ngaiz rai lo.
JAS.1.12	Dingx ndaej gaujniemq hih vunz dwg miz fuk hih, aenvih de dunghgoq gaujniemq ndaej gaeuqgwz le, couh cangjliq ndaej seiqseiz lix dih gij najrongh mwnq lo; gij najrongh neix dwg bouxcawj raeuz baujcingq hawj gij vunz aiq de he. 
JAS.1.13	Yiengq, hauhnaeuz ngaiz yaeuh hwj siengj guh vaihsaeh hih mwhde, mbouj ndaej naeuz: “Gou ngaiz Cangqdiq yaeuh lo,” yienghneix naeuz, aenvih Cangqdiq mbouj ngaiz vunz yaeuh hwj guh vaihsaeh, de caemh mbouj yaeuh vunz. 
JAS.1.14	Gizsaed, vunz ngaiz yaeuh, dwg vih bonjfaenh dih damsim hwj gag bae guh lah.

JAS.1.16	Sojhij, gak boux beixnuengx hax, gaejyungh ngaiz vunz yaeuh. 
JAS.1.17	Cauh rongh dih Cangqdiq,

JAS.1.19	Gak boux beixnuengx hax, faenhsou wnggai rox, wnggai sijsaeq dingq vunz gangj, gaejyungh gaenj gangj gijmaz vah, caemh gaejyungh singqheiq gaenj fatheiq,

JAS.2.1	Gak boux beixnuengx hax, giqyienz gyoengqraeuz dwg lwgsae najrongh dih bouxcawj raeuz Yehsuh Gihduz vwz, yiengq couh mbouj ndaej yawj vunz guh saeh lo. 
JAS.2.2	Beijgangj naeuz miz boux vunz fouq he, gwnz fawz de daenj miz haedfawz gim hwj caemh daenj buh gyaeugyaeu ndeindei hwj haeuj ndaw veiqdangz faenhsou bae. Yiengq caemh miz boux vunz gungz he, gij buh de vaih vadvad, caemh haeuj ndaw veiqdangz faenhsou bae. 
JAS.2.3	Yiengq, hauhnaeuz faenhsou riu veujveuq hwj doiq boux vunz fouq mwnq naeuz: “Daeuj, cingj mwngz naengh mwnq daixdaeuz neix,” doiq boux vunz gungz mwnq dauq naeuz: “Mwngz couh ndwn youq mwnq bax!” cixnaeuz doiq de naeuz: “Naengh youq henz daengq gak ha gou bax!”

JAS.2.5	Gak boux beixnuengx hax, cingj faenhsou dingq gou naeuz sou ni: Cangqdiq senj doenghheij vunz vunz yawj gyoengqde dwg vunz gungz hih okdaeuj, hawj gyoengqde sinq Gihduz raixcaix, caemh hawj gyoengqde ndaej gaep haeuj aen guek de; aen guek de dwg de baujcingq hawj gij vunz aiq de he.

JAS.2.17	Caemh doxdoengz, caenhgag naeuz sinq, sinq, sinq, hoeng dauq mij guh saek yiengh ndeisaeh, yiengq caemh daengjhih lingz.

JAS.2.22	Faenhsou yawj hux, de yienghneix guh couh ndaej cingqmingz naeuz de sinq hah. Sojhij ciuq luj yienghneix ma yawj, de cix sinq cix guh; sinq caeuq guh doxbangbouj. Vih guh hwj ndaej suenq sinq liuxliux.

JAS.2.23	Aenvih Yaqbwzlahhanj sinq Cangqdiq, yiengq de couh ndaej youq ndaw lwgra Cangqdiq suenq dwg boux mij'z coih he hih vunz.
